
1a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang/ sa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha tsa ri tra ma hA kA bya nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan ngag
1b2(mdo 'grel): chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan yon tan tshogs
1b3(mdo 'grel): kyis gang/ /bdag nyid chen po sems can gyi/ /don mdzad yang dag sangs rgyas dang/ /chos dang dge 'dun la
1b4(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /bu ram shing par mthu mnyam bu ram shing pa'i rgyud/ /thub dka' shAkya rnams la spyod pa rnam dag pa/ /
2a1(mdo 'grel): 'phrog byed zla ba lta bur skye dgu rnams la sdug/ rgyal po zas gtsang zhes bya'i ming can byung bar gyur/ /dbang
2a2(mdo 'grel): po dang mtshungs de yi bdag po ldan ma yin/ /nus mthu rjes mtshungs gzi brjid lha mo bde sogs dang/ /padmo can 'dra phun sum
2a3(mdo 'grel): tshogs pas bzhin brtan/ /sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya dpe med sgyu 'dra byung/ /mi skyong rgyal po 'di ni de dang thabs cig tu/ /dga' ba nyer
2a4(mdo 'grel): ldan rnam thos sras kyi dpal bzhin rol/ /de nas yang dag ting 'dzin ldan pa'i rig ma bzhin/ /sdig bral ma de mngal ni rnam par
2b1(mdo 'grel): bzung bar gyur/ /mngal dang nye bar ldan pa nyid kyi sngon rol tu/ /de ni gnyid song glang po'i dbang po dkar po zhig/ rang nyid la ni rab tu zhugs sogs mthong gyur
2b2(mdo 'grel): la/ /de yi mtshan ma nyam thag pa yang thob ma yin/ /lha dang rab tu mtshungs pa de yi lha mo de/ /mngal gyi rigs kyi dpal ni rab tu 'dren byed cing/ /sgyu ma ngal
2b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni mya ngan sgyu med par/ /gtsang la nyon mongs med pa'i dgon par blo gros mdzad/ /de ni lum bi zhes bya'i nags mthar gyur pa'i sa/ /sna tshogs ljon shing sna
2b4(mdo 'grel): tshogs shing rta mngon dga' bar/ /bsam gtan la bzod dben pa'i nags kyi mdza' bzhed ma/ /'gro ba'i ched dang gnas phyir mi skyong la zhus so/ /de yi chos dang ldan
2b5(mdo 'grel): la 'phags pa'i zhe 'dod dag/ rnam par shes nas ya mtshan dga' ba yis gang ste/ /zhi ba'i grong nas sa yi bdag po gshegs gyur te/ /de yi dga' ba'i rgyu
3a1(mdo 'grel): yin rnam par rgyu phyir min/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i nags der rgyal po'i bdag ldan ma/ /rab tu bltams pa'i dus ni yang dag mngon gzigs shing/ /bla re
3a2(mdo 'grel): nye bar phul ba'i gzims mal rab thob ste/ /mi mo stong phrag dag gis mngon par dga' bar byed/ /de nas skar ma rgyal rab ldan par gyur pa'i tshe/ /brtul zhugs legs
3a3(mdo 'grel): par 'dus byas lha mo de yi ni/ /rtsibs logs dag nas 'jig rten phan phyir sras bltams te/ /tshor ba dang ni bral zhing nad dang bral ba nyid/ /ji ltar brla skyes brla nas rgya
3a4(mdo 'grel): chen lag pa nas/ /dbang po dang mtshungs nga la nu ni spyi bo nas/ /mtshan ldan nyid kyang lag pa'i cha shas gsang ba nas/ /rnam pa de ltar de yi skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
3a5(mdo 'grel): mngal nas mngon par nges par byung ba gzugs mdzes te/ /nam mkha' dag las 'phos 'dra skye gnas las ma skyes/ /bskal pa gcig min rnams su bsgoms pa'i
3b1(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid ni/ /gang zhig yang dag rab tu shes na skyes gyur blun po min/ /nyi ma gzhon nu sa la mngon par babs pa bzhin/ /gsal ba dang ni brtan pas gang zhig mdzes pa ste/ /
3b2(mdo 'grel): de ltar shin tu gsal yang nges par rtog pa na/ /ri bong gis mtshan ji ltar mig dag phrogs par gyur/ /de ni rang gi lus kyi 'od rab 'bar ba yis/ /sgron ma'i 'od kyang gsal bar
3b3(mdo 'grel): byed pas ltar bcom ste/ /rin thang chen po 'dzam bu chu gser mdzes pa'i mdog/ phyogs rnams thams cad rnam par snang zhing gsal bar mdzad/ /'khrugs pa ma yin yon po'i skyon
3b4(mdo 'grel): dag rab bsal zhing/ /shin tu brtan pa dang ldan rnam par yangs pa'i 'gros/ /de ltar mi g.yo rab tu brtan pa'i gom pa bdun/ /drang srong skar ma bdun dang rab mnyam gshegs
3b5(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /byang chub phyir dang 'gro la phan pa'i phyir skyes shing/ /'di ni bdag gi srid pa'i skye ba tha ma zhes/ /seng ge'i 'gros 'dra phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam gzigs nas/ /snod ldan
3b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi don byed dag kyang smras par gyur/ /nam mkha' dag las rab babs zla ba'i 'od zer dkar/ /drang dang dro ba'i chu rgyun rnam pa gnyis kyi shugs/ /lus la yang dag reg pas
4a1(mdo 'grel): bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /mdzes shing yid 'ong de yi spyi bor babs par gyur/ /dpal ldan bla bre bres par gser gyi 'bar zhing mtshan/ /bai DUrya yi rkang pa'i gzims mal la gzims pa/ /de la
4a2(mdo 'grel): gus phyir gser gyi pad+ma'i phyag mnga' ba'i/ /gnod sbyin bdag rnams kun nas yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /mi mngon gyur pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' la/ /gang gi
4a3(mdo 'grel): mthu las mgo bo yis ni rab btud cing/ /kun nas gdung ba skyob pa'i gdugs dkar rnams bzung ste/ /byang chub ched du mchog gi bsngags pa dag kyang smras/ /'das pa'i
4a4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par mchod byas pa'i/ /lto 'phye che rnams khyad 'phags chos la sred pa'i phyir/ /gang la rlung yab kyis g.yab gus pa'i mig gzir cing/ /man dar pa'i
4a5(mdo 'grel): me tog rnams kyis yang dag 'thor/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bltams pa'i yon tan gyis tshim pa'i/ /gtsang mar lhag par gnas pa'i rnam dag sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal nyid du bying ba'i 'gro la
4a6(mdo 'grel): phan pa'i phyir/ /lha rnams 'dod chags bral ba na yang dga' bar gyur/ /gang gis rab tu bltams che rang rgyal phur bu nyid/ /rlung gis bsnun pa'i gru ltar sa gzhi g.yas gyur cing/ /tsan dan dang bcas utpal pad+ma'i snying po yi/ /
4b1(mdo 'grel): char ba dag ni nam mkha' i sprin dang bral bas babs/ /yid 'ong rag na bde ba'i rlung dag byung gyur te/ /lha yi na bza' dag ni mngon bar 'bebs byed cing/ /nyi ma de nyid lhag par mngon par gsal pa ste/ /zhi ba'i 'od zer 'dus ma byas pa'i me 'bar ro/ /shar dang byang gi mtshams kyi
4b2(mdo 'grel): khang pa'i phyogs gcig na/ /bsil ba'i chu yi khron pa rang byung gyur pa ste/ /pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ya mtshan gyur rnams kyis/ /gang la bya ba rnams ni stegs bzhin rab tu byas/ /chos dang ldan pa'i lha dang 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /da ni blta ba'i don du nags tshal
4b3(mdo 'grel): rab gang ste/ /rmad byung ngo mtshar gyur pa nyid kyi shing las kyang/ /me tog rnams ni dus ma yin par nges par brul/ /'tshe bar byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang de yi tshe/ phan tshun dag tu phyin te gnod pa mi byed la/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten dag na nad gang ji snyed ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'bad
4b4(mdo 'grel): pa med par de tshe bcom/ /mkha' 'gro'i bya ni mtho min sgra sgrogs ri dags kyang/ /chu klung dang ni chu yang zhi bar bab gyur la/ /phyogs rnams rab snang dge ba'i nam mkha' rab mdzes shing/ /lha yi rnga rnams mkha' la rab tu grags par gyur/ /rgyud par gyur la mgon ni nye bar thob nas bzhin//
4b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dag kyang mchog tu rab zhi thob gyur la/ /'jig rten rnams kyi thar pa'i bla ma rab bltams che/ /'dod pa'i lha nyid kho na dga' ba med par gyur/ /shin tu ngo mtshar sras kyi skye ba mthong gyur nas/ /mi bdag brtan pa yin yang rnam par 'gyur nas song/ /rab dga' skyes pa nyid
4b6(mdo 'grel): dang yid mi bde skyes te/ /brtse ba las ni mchi ma rnam pa gnyis byung ngo/ /mi ma yin pa'i sras po nyid kyi nus pa dang/ /ma yi rang bzhin kyang ni stobs chung nyid kyi phyir/ /grang dang dro ba'i chu dag 'dres pa'i chu klung bzhin/ /lha mo 'jigs pa dang ni dga' bas gang par gyur/ /lhag ma spangs
4b7(mdo 'grel): te 'jigs pa nyid ni shes byas nas/ /yid 'ong 'dod ba'i ched du rtogs pa ma yin pa'i/ /bud med rgan mo rnams kyi bde legs gyur byas shing/ /gtsang mar byas te lha rnams dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yi mtshan nyid dag kyang shes shing thos gyur nas/ /spyod dang thos dang tshig 
5a1(mdo 'grel): la grags thob bram ze rnams/ /rnam rgyas zhal ni ya mtshan dga' ba yid gang ste/ /dga' dang 'jigs par gyur pa'i mi yi lha la smras/ mi dag sa la bu ma gtogs pa'i khyad 'phags pa/ /gzhan gang cung zad 'dod min zhi ba de yi phyir/ /khyod kyi sgron ma
5a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni rigs kyi sgron ma ste/ /khyod nyid dga' bar mdzod cig dga' ston da lta bgyi/ /de phyir brtan par rnam dpyod med pa gar mdzod dang/ /rigs ni nges pa nyid du mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni khyod kyi bu zhes skyes par gyur pa ste/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal
5a3(mdo 'grel): dag gis mngon par bcom pa'i mgon/ /mchog gyur 'di la mchog gyur gser gyi 'od mnga' zhing/ /sgron ma'i 'od zer dag gis mtshan rnams gang gyur pas/ /de nyid rtogs par gyur pa'i thub par 'gyur pa 'am/ /yang na mi dag sa stengs 'khor los
5a4(mdo 'grel): sgyur bar 'gyur/ /sa yi bdag po nyid la gal te dga' 'gyur na/ /stobs dang chos dag gis ni de'i tshe sa steng du/ /rgyal po kun gyi thog tu 'di ni gnas 'gyur te/ /skar ma'i 'od rnams la ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin no/ /de ni gal te thar bzhed nags
5a5(mdo 'grel): su gshegs gyur na/ /mkhyen dang de nyid kyis ni de tsha sa steng du/ /lugs kun zil gyis mnan nas 'di ni gnas 'gyur te/ /mtho ba kun la ri rab ri yi rgyal po bzhin/ /ji ltar lcags rnams la ni gser dag mchog yin la/ /ri rnams la ni ri rab
5a6(mdo 'grel): chu bo rnams la mtsho/ /gza' rnams la ni zla ba dung byed rnams la nyi/ /de ltar khyod kyi sras ni rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /gang gi spyan ngag mi 'dzum mi gzir rnam par spangs pa ste/ /brtan zhing shin tu ring la dkar min rdzi ma dang/ /gzi
5a7(mdo 'grel): brjid ldan pa yin yang 'on kyang zhi ba nyid/ /'di ni kun nas gzigs pa'i spyan mgna' ci la min/ /de na gnyis skyes rnams la mi dag gis smras pa/ /bdag nyid chen po mi skyod snga mas ma mthong ba/ /mthong zhes khyad 'di gang yin 'di la rgyu
5b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan ci/ /de nas bram ze rnams kyi de nyid la smras pa/ /blo dang thos pa las dang grags pa rnams la ni/ /mi skyong sngon dang phyi ma nyid ni tshad ma min/ /dngos po'i lugs la 'dir ni bya ba rgyu yin la/ /'dir yang bdag gis dper brjod dag ni mkhyen
5b2(mdo 'grel): par mdzod/ /gang zhig rgyal po'i bstan bcos shes ldan ngan spong dag/ rig byed drang srong de gnyis kyis ni ma byas pa/ /de dag gis sras zhib pa pa sings dang ni/ /phur bu yis ni dus kyi de nyid bskyed par gyur/ /nyams gyur snga ma rnams kyis
5b3(mdo 'grel): ma mthong rig byed gang/ /dbyangs can ma yi bu yis kyang ni slar smras pa/ /nus med gnas 'jog gis ni ma byas gyur pa gang/ /rgyas pa yis ni de ltar rnam pa mang por brjod/ /'pho byed drang srong chen pos ma bsdebs gyur pa gang/ /tshig gi rkang
5b4(mdo 'grel): pa grog mkhar gyis ni dang por bskyed/ /gso ba gang yang rgyun shes kyis ni ma mthong ba/ /phyi nas de ni drang srong rgyun shes bu yis byas/ /gang yang gnyis skyes nyid ni kun shes ma rnyed pa/ /de ni gting dpogs zu yis rgyal po la thob po/ /bu ram shing pas
5b5(mdo 'grel): dang por ma bsdams gyur pa gang/ /rgya mtsho la ni dug bcas kyis kyang mtshams bzung ngo/ /slob dpon nyid du bram ze'i rnal 'byor chog la/ /gzhan rnams kyis mthong ba skyed byed gshegs par gyur/ /khyab 'jug gis ni grags pa'i las rnams gang
5b6(mdo 'grel): yin pa/ /de rnams la ni dpa' bo la sogs stobs med gyur/ /de phyir lang tsho dang ni rigs dag chad ma yin/ /la la la lar mchog nyid nyer thob 'jig rten na/ /rgyal dang drang srong rnams kyi snga mas ma byas pa/ /de dang de dag rnams ni bu rnams dag gis byas/ /de
5b7(mdo 'grel): ltar gnyis skyes de rnams kyis ni yid ches te/ /mi skyong dbugs 'byin dang yang mngon par dga' gyur la/ /mi 'dod the tshom dag ni yid la rnam bsal te/ /rab tu dga' ba nyid la lhags par 'jogs par gyur/ /dga' ba yis ni gnyis skyes dam pa de
6a1(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ /bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i nor rnams rab phul te/ /ji skad smras bzhin 'di ni sa yi bdag por gyur/ /rgas pa thob nas nags rnams su ni 'gro bar shog /de nas mtshan ma rnams dang dka' thub stobs las ni/ /skye
6a2(mdo 'grel): ba mthar mdzad bltams pa de ni rtogs gyur nas/ /dam pa'i chos la gus pa'i shAkya'i dbang phyug gis/ gnas su dkar min drang srong chen po gshegs par gyur/ /tshangs pa'i dpal nyid kyis dang dka' thub dpal gyis ni/ /'bar ba'i tshang rig rnams
6a3(mdo 'grel): kyi tshad rig de la ni/ /rgyal po'i bla mas gus pa dang ni bkur sti'i phyir/ /mi dbang pho brang du ni rab tu spyan drangs so/ /de ni sa bdag btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nye logs su/ /gzhon nu bltams pa la ni dga' ba'i shugs kyis 'ongs/ /dka' thub mchog
6a4(mdo 'grel): las dang ni rgas pa la bsten nas/ /brtan pa nags kyi 'du shes kyis ltar rnam par zhugs/ /de nas thub pa gdan la gnas pa de la mi skyong gis/ /zhabs bsil mchod yon sngon 'gro yang dag rab mchod nas/ /sngon tshe gnas mchog la ni mdza' 
6a5(mdo 'grel): can lhas bzhin des/ /ji ltar nye bar spyod la snyan gsan phab pa'o/ /bdag gis rigs ni rjes su ni bzung phyir nor ldan des/ /gang zhig bdag la gzigs phyir bcom ldan nyer gshegs la/ /bka' drin gnang bar mdzod cig zhi ba ci bgyi bgyi/
6a6(mdo 'grel): kho bo slob ma lags so thugs ches mdzad par rigs/ /de ltar mi skyong gis ni dngos po thams cad kyis/ /nye bar gsol btab gyur pa'i thub pa ji lta bzhin/ /rab rgyas yangs pa'i spyan ni ya mtshan dang bcas pas/ /zab pa dang ni brtan pa'i
6a7(mdo 'grel): tshig rnams smras pa'o/ /chos 'dod gtong ba dang ldan 'gron la sdug cing 'phangs/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed la 'thad pa 'di yin la/ /sems dpa' rjes 'gro ye shes lang tsho rjes mthun pa/ /khyod kyi blo gros gnyen gang de ltar bdag la yin/ /de dang
6b1(mdo 'grel): de ni gang gis mi skyong drang srong des/ /phra mo'i chos kyis nor rnams rab thob byas nas/ /rtag par cho ga bzhin du mchod sbyin byas gyur pa/ /dka' thub rnams kyis phyug cing nor rnams dag gis dbul/ /bdag gi nye bar 'ongs la dgos pa gang yin
6b2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /bdag gi de ni gson mdzod dga' bar nyer song khyed/ /byang chub rtogs pa'i ched du khyod kyis sras bltams zhes/ /lha yi ngag dag bdag gi nyi ma'i lam du thos/ /ngag de thos nas dang ni yid la bsgoms nas/ /mtshan ma rnams kyis shes
6b3(mdo 'grel): nas de nas nye bar 'ongs/ /brgya byin gyi ni rgyal mtshan yang dag bsgreng ba bzhin/ /shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan blta bar 'dod pa yis/ /zhes pa'i tshig 'di de ltar thos par gyur nas ni/ /mi dbang rab tu dga' bas kun nas g.yos gyur te/ /
6b4(mdo 'grel): yum gyi bang du son las gzhon nu blangs nas ni/ /dka' thub nor can la ni yang dag bstan par gyur/ /de nas drang srong tshe des zhabs la 'khor los mtshan/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang/ /glang po bzhin du 'doms nub smin ma
6b5(mdo 'grel): mdzod spur bcas/ /ya mtshan dang bcas rgyal po sras ni mthong bar gyur/ /lha mo'i pang na zhugs pa me yi bu bzhin/ /ma ma'i bdan bzhugs pa mngon par mthong nas ni/ /byung gyur rdzi ma'i mdza' ru mchi ma rnams byung ste/ /dbugs med gyur nas
6b6(mdo 'grel): gyen du lha la zhal phyogs gyur/ /mig dag mtshims yongs gang dkar min mthong nas ni/ /bu la brtse ba'i phyir ni mi skyong 'dar gyur te/ /mchi ma dang ni gre ba kha zhing ldab ldib bcas/ /thal mo sbyar zhing yan lag btud de dris par gyur/ /gang gi lus
6b7(mdo 'grel): ni lha las bar na cung zad gcig /gang gi skye ba ngo mtshar mang po'i sgron ma ste/ /gang gi don ni mchog tu 'gyur bar smra ba ste/ /rab tu mthong nas brtan pa gang phyir mchi ma 'ong/ /bcom ldan gzhon nu brtan pa'i tshe can yin snyam mam/ /bdag gi mya
7a1(mdo 'grel): ngan ched du skyes pa min nam ci/ /bdag la chu yi snyim ba ci zhig ltar rnyed de/ /'di ni dus kyis 'thung phyir nye bar 'ongs ma yin no/ /bdag gi snyan grags gter ni mi zad yin snyam mam/ /nges par bdag gi rigs kyi lag nor yin
7a2(mdo 'grel): snyam ci/ /bde bar pha rol tu ni rab tu 'gro snyam mam/ /gnyid par gyur kyang bu ni phye ba'i mig gcig yong/ /bdag gi rigs kyi myu gu skyes par ma rgyas par/ /yongs su sgams pa'i skal ba can zhig min snyam mam/ /khyab bdag myur bar gsungs
7a3(mdo 'grel): shig bdag la zhi ba med/ /gnyen 'dun rnams kyi bu la brtse ba khyed kyis rig /de ltar mi 'dod blo yis 'khrul ba byung gyur pa/ /rig nas mi dbang rgyal la thub pa des smras pa/ /bdag gis smras pa gang de the tshom med pa de/ /mi skyod khyed kyi blo gros
7a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan gang ma gyur cig /'di yi gzhan gyur mtshon min bdag gi rnam 'gyur te/ /'on kyang rang la slu bar rab mtshon rnam par 'khrugs/ /skye ba zang pa'i rnyed par bla min rtags pa po/ /'di skyes bdag gi 'gro ba la ni dus yin no/ /rgyal srid rnam
7a5(mdo 'grel): par spangs nas yul rnams la mi gnas/ /'bad pa drag po rnams kyis de nyid thob byas nas/ /'di ni 'gro la gti mug mun pa rnams 'joms phyir/ /ye shes rang bzhin nyi ma rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho nang rnams bkram
7a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i lpu ba can/ /rga ba'i dba' rlabs 'chi ba'i shugs ni drag po las/ /'gro ba nyam thag byid bar gyur rnams 'di yis ni/ /ye shes grub bo chen po yis ni sgrol bar byed/ /shes rab chu yi shugs la brten pa'i tshul khrims dogs/ /ting nge
7a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ni bsil ba'i brtul zhugs dang pa 'phyo/ /'di yi mchog gi chos kyi chu bo rab skor la/ srid pas nyam thag gson pa'i 'jig rten 'thung bar byed/ /sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag dang yul gyis bsgribs rnams dang/ /'khor ba'i 'brog
7b1(mdo 'grel): dgon 'jigs par gnas pa rnams la ni/ /lam rab chung zos rnams la lam 'gro rnams bzhin du/ /'dis ni rnam par dag pa'i lam dga' chad par 'gyur/ /yul gyi bud shing can gyi 'dod chags me yis ni/ /'jig rten skye bo rnam par
7b2(mdo 'grel): bsreg par gyur pa la/ sos ka'i tha mar sprin chen gyis ni char bzhin du/ /'di yis chos kyi char gyis rab tu sim byed 'gyur/ /sred pa'i sgo gtan ma rig mun pa'i sgo glegs can/ /sgo la skye dgu rnams kyi 'thon pa'i rgyu las ni/ /'di
7b3(mdo 'grel): yis mchog rab kun nas rnyed par dka' ba yi/ /dam pa'i chos kyi sgras ni nam par 'byed par 'gyur/ /rang gi las kyi zhags pa rnams kyi yangs dkris shing/ /sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par zil non rten med pa'i/ /'jig rten
7b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed nas kyang/ /chos kyi rgyal po 'dis ni 'ching ba mthar mdzad 'gyur/ smongs sam 'dod pa'i bde ba yis sam rgyags las rung/ /'di yi mthar thug chos gang thos par mi byed pa/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'dir de
7b5(mdo 'grel): mya ngan bya ba'i gnas/ /de phyir khyod nyid 'di la mya ngan ma byed cig/ yon tan rgya mtsho 'di las 'khrul gyur bdag gi ni/ /bsam gtan rnams ni thob kyang don byas med nyid de/ /de yi dam chos ma thos pa la kho bo ni/ /mtho ris dag na gnas kyang phun
7b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs med pa snyam/ /de ltar don thos bshes dang bcas shing btsun mor bcas /yid mi bde ba der nas mi dbang dgar gyur la/ /rnam pa de ltar bdag gi bu ni 'di'o zhes/ /des ni bdag nyid la ni snying po ldan par bsam/ 'phags pa'i chos
7b7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/ /bsam pa'i rnam par bzung bya snying la byas gyur te/ /nges par 'di ni mi sdug chos kyi phyogs min la/ /rigs rgyud nyams pa las ni 'on kyang 'jig ba mthong/ /de nas bu la rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rgyal po la/
8a1(mdo 'grel): bu yi nges pa'i de nyid rig par byas nas su/ /gus bcas gyen du gzugs mthong dkar min thub pa ni/ /rlung gi lam gyis ji ltar 'ongs bar gshegs par gyur/ /blo gros byas pa'i sring mo'i bu yang mthong nas ni/ /thub pa'i gsung
8a2(mdo 'grel): mnyan pa dang de'i lugs la ni/ /rnam mang rjes su brtse ba yin nas legs pa des/ /sdug pa bu bzhin du ni sbyor ba byed du bcug /sras po skyes pas tshim pa'i mi yi bdag po yang/ /yul la song ba'i 'ching ba rnams ni rnam spangs te/ /sras kyi yid 'ong
8a3(mdo 'grel): sras po bltams pa'i las dag ni/ /rigs dang 'dra bar ji lta ba bzhin byed du bcug /zhag bcu yongs su 'ongs par gyur pa nyid kyi tshe/ /mchog gi dga' ba rab ldan snyoms par gyur pa yis/ /sras las mchog tu 'gyur phyir lta yi mchod pa
8a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bkra shis la sogs byas/ /gzhan yang brgya dang stong phrag yongs su gang ba'i grangs/ /brtan dang stobs ldan bu rnams gser gyi rwar bcas shing/ /rgas pa nye bar 'ongs min so ma ldan pa'i ba/ /rang gi sras 'phel phyir
8a5(mdo 'grel): na gnyis skyes rnams la byin/ /de nas snyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni rnam mang yul/ /rang sems tshim par byed pa'i bya ba rnams byas nas/ /yon tan ldan shing dge ba'i yud tsam nges pa na/ /grong khyer rab tu 'jug la dga' bas blo gros mdzad/
8a6(mdo 'grel): de nas mchi gnyis mche ba las byung rin thang che/ /dkar po'i me tog gis spras nor bu'i sgron/ khri la dge ba'i phyir ni lha mo sras ldan ma/ /lha rnams la ni rab tu btung nas bsnyan par gyur/ /de nas gnas brtan skye mo rjes 'brang sras mgon
8a7(mdo 'grel): ma/ /bdag po ldan ma grong la mdun du rab zhugs nas/ /mched ldan lha ni lha rnams kyis ni brgya byin bzhin/ /mi bdag nyid kyang grong ba'i tshogs kyis gshags par gyur/ /de nas gdod drug skyes pas yis ched dbang phyug bzhin/ /shAkya'i
8b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal pos grong khyer rnam par khyab mdzad de/ /zhal ni dka' bas rab gang 'di dang 'di zhes pa'i/ /srid 'phel rgyas pa dang ni grags dang snyan pa mdzad/ /de nas mi yi bdag po'i sras bltams cher skyes pas/ /ser skya zhes pa'i grong khyer ljongs dang
8b2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa de/ /gnod sbyin grong na phun tshogs 'dod pa skyes pa na/ /lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bkram bzhin dga' bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan ngag chen po las gzhon nu sku bltams pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //
8b3(mdo 'grel): skye dang rga ba mthong song bdag skyes bdag pham de'i/ /skyes pa nas brtsams mi nyid nyi mas rgyal po de/ /chu yi shugs rnams kyis ni chu bo sind+hu bzhin/ /nor dang glang po rta dang bshes rnams 'phel bar gyur/ /nor rnams dang ni rin po che dang bzang po'i
8b4(mdo 'grel): gser/ /de dbang ni byas dang ma byas pa nyid kyang/ /yid la re ba yi rang khur gyur pa/ /de la gcig tu phan pa'i cha shas gter rnyed gyur/ /gang zhig pad+ma dang mtshungs gnyis 'thung rnams kyis kyang/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la nye bar 'od bar mi
8b5(mdo 'grel): nus pa'i/ /gang dang ldan pa'i gang chen chad gis dregs de rnams/ /'bad pa las kyang gzhan du de la nye bar gnas/ /sna tshogs mtshan mas mtshan zhing gsar pa'i gser sga dang/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams dag gis brgyan byas rdog ma 'chad/
8b6(mdo 'grel): stobs dang byams pa dang ni nor gyis thob pa yi/ /'di yi mgyogs 'gro rnams kyi grong khyer phye mar byas/ /de bzhin 'di yi yul 'khor du ni chim dang rgyas/ /legs la rdul ldan yon tan ldan pa'o mar ldan/ /rab mchog le'u rnams dang bcas
8b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i ba rnams ni/ /'o ma mang po 'jo ba mang po byung bar gyur/ /'di yang dgra bo dbus gnas nyid du song gyur pa/ /dbus gnas gyur pa mja' bshes nyid du rab tu song/ /khyad par du ni bshes gnyen brtan por song ba ste/ 'di yi phyogs
9a1(mdo 'grel): dag gnyis te dgra yang yod ma yin/ /de bzhin du ni 'di yi 'jam rlung 'brug gi sgra/ /glog gi 'phreng ba 'khyil ba yis ni brgyan pa'i sprin/ /rdo char dang ni thog lhung nyes pa rnams kyis gzhan/ /yul du dus la lha yis char
9a2(mdo 'grel): pa phab par gyur/ /zhing gi las kyi ngal dub byed pa nyung dus kyang/ /'bru ni 'bras bu ldan pa dus sbyor bzhin skyes te/ /de rnams nyid kyang 'di yi sman du byung gyur la/ /bcud dang snying po yis kyang mngon par lhags pa nyid/ /g.yul du
9a3(mdo 'grel): rab tu zhugs la kun tu 'joms pa bzhin/ /lus la the tshom za bar byed pa'i dus na yang/ /rang bzhin gnas shing bde ba nyid du nad med par/ /dus kyi dbang gis mi mo rnams ni rab tu btsas/ /brtul zhugs ldan rnams ma gtogs
9a4(mdo 'grel): nor rdzas dman na yang/ /mi rnams pha rol rnams las don du gnyer mi byed/ /mngon par don du gnyer la 'phags pa nor 'phra yang/ /de tshe 'ga' zhig dag ni rgyab kyis phyogs ma gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po de yi rgyal srid la ni 'ga' //
9a5(mdo 'grel): gnyen la zhe sa med min mi ster ba yang med/ /brtul zhugs med pa nyid min rdzun med 'tshe med pa/ /sgra mi bsgrags kyi sras po lta bu byung bar gyur/ /der yang skyed mos tshal dang lha gnas dka' thub gnas/ /khron pa rdzing dang dge
9a6(mdo 'grel): bcu 'du ba'i gnas rnams kyi/ /bya ba rnams ni mtho ris bzhin du nyer thob nas/ /chos 'dod rnams kyi mngon sum du ni rab tu mdzad/ /mu ge dang ni 'jigs dang nang rnams las grol zhing/ /dga' ? gyur skye ba mtho ris gzhan du
9a7(mdo 'grel): mngon par dga' / /bdag mos bdag po la 'am mo yis bdag por rung/ /phan tshun log par mngon par spyod pa dag kyang med/ /dga' ba'i ched du 'dod la 'ga' zhig gis ma bsnyen/ /'dod pa'i don du nor ni 'ga' zhig gis ma bsrungs//
9b1(mdo 'grel): nor gyi don du chos la 'ga' zhig gis ma spyad/ /chos kyi ched du 'tshe ba 'ga' zhig gis ma byas/ /rkun po sogs dang dgra yang nyams par rang gnas te/ /pha rol mya ngan med pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin/ /rang gi 'khor lo pha rol 'khor lo las grol te//
9b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po de la bde dang lo legs byung bar gyur/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po de yi rgyal srid la/ /de skyes pa na nyi ma'i sras po'i yid shes bzhin/ /dga' bar spyad par gyur la sdig pa rab nyis shing/ /chos rnams 'bar zhing nyon mongs rnams ni
9b3(mdo 'grel): zhi bar gyur/ /gang phyir rnam pa de ltar don kun grub pa dang/ /rgyal po'i rigs kyi phun sum tshogs pa byung gyur te/ /de phyir mi skyong gis ni sras po de yi mtshan/ /don kun grub pa zhes bya 'di ni rab tu mdzad/ /lha mo sgyu ma yang ni lha yi drang
9b4(mdo 'grel): srong mtshungs/ /bu yi nus mthu rnam par spangs pa mthong nas ni/ /bltams la rab tu dga' mas bzod par ma nus te/ /de nas gnas pa'i phyed du ltar ni gshegs par gyur/ /de nas lha yi mngal dang mtshungs pa'i gzhon nu la/ /byams
9b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang khyad par med pa yi/ /ma yi nu mo mdangs mnyam pa yi rang bzhin la/ /yang dag skyed bcud bdag las skyes pa ltar bur gyur/ /de nas nyi ma gzhon nu 'char rir gnas 'dra dang/ /rlung gis rab tu bud par gyur
9b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i me bzhin dang/ /skar ma'i bdag po mun min phyogs la gnas ba ltar/ /gzhon nu de ni rim gyis yang dag 'phel bar gyur/ /de nas rin thang chen po'i tsandan rnams dang ni/ /rin chen 'phreng ba sman gyi snying por bcas rnams dang/ /
9b7(mdo 'grel): ri dags rab tu sbyar ba'i gser gyi shing rta dang/ /'di yi ched du gshegs kyi khyim rnams dag nas blangs/ /lang tsho nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan rnams dang/ /gser gyi rang bzhin ri dags glang chen rta rnams dang/ /gser dang dngul
10a1(mdo 'grel): gyis bris pa'i mi chung gzugs rnams dang/ /shing rta ba glang byung dus yang dag sbyar rnams blangs/ /de ni lang tsho rjes mthun yul la nye spyod pa/ /de rnams kyis ni yul la nyer spyad la/ /dpal dang brtan pa yis dang blo
10a2(mdo 'grel): dang dpal gyis kyang/ /byis pa yin yang byis min rab mtshungs byung bar gyur/ /lang tsho gzhon nu shin tu 'das nas yang dag par/ /'du byed las ni rab tu thob nas dus su ni/ /lo mar dag gis rtogs bya nyin zhag nyung du yis/ /rab? dang
10a3(mdo 'grel): rjes su mthun pa'i rig pa rnams ni blangs/ /drang srong chen po dkar min las ni sngon rol du/ /de yis nye legs don gyi skal ba thos nas ni/ /nags su gshegs par 'gyur zhes shAkya'i rgyal po yis/ /'dod pa rnams la chag pa bskyed
10a4(mdo 'grel): du bcug par gyur/ /brtan pa'i tshul khrims spyod pa spyan gyis rigs de las/ /ngo tsha ngang ni dul ba nyer ldan legs ldan ma/ /grags 'dzin ma zhes grags pa rnam bar yangs sam/ /btsun mor mngon par brjod pa'i dpal mo 'di
10a5(mdo 'grel): la blangs/ /kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang ni rab tu mtshungs pa yis/ /mchog gi lus kyi snar zhing gsal ba de nyid ni/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i mna' ma de dang thabs cig tu/ /bde sogs ma dang mig stong ldan bzhin mngon par dga' / /
10a6(mdo 'grel): yid kyang spyod par byed la cung zhig rab logs pa/ /gang gis mthong mi 'gyur zhes rjes su bsams byas nas/ /sa la rab tu spyod min lding? khang lta nyid du/ /gnas ngag mi skyong gis ni de la rnam bar bstan/ /de nas gzhal med
10a7(mdo 'grel): nam mkhar sa la spyod pa bzhin/ /ston ka'i dus kyi chu gter sprin ni dkar po yi/ /dus sbyor kun tu bdo? ba'i gzhi yi lding khang la/ /bud med? rnams kyi sel snyan rgya chen rnams kyi rnam par gshegs/ /gser gyis gdams pa'i ?
10b1(mdo 'grel): shing can gyi rdza rnga'i skang/ /mi mo'i lags ba'i rtse pmos mngon par brdungs pa yi/ /lha mchog ma yi gar dang mnyam pa'i gar rnams kyis/ /ti se'i gangs ltar de yi pho brang mdzes par gyur/ /dag dang bzo dang rnam 'gyur rnams kyis kyang//
10b2(mdo 'grel): rgyags dang rtse dang rgod pa dngar mo rnams kyis dang/ /smin ma bskyod pa yid dang phyed mig lta? rnams kyis/ /de la der ni mi mo rnams ni dga' bar gyur/ /de nas de ni 'dod pa brten par mkhas pa yis/ /dga' bas dregs pa'i bud med rnams
10b3(mdo 'grel): kyis bzung gyur la/ /gzhal med khang ni rgyab nas bsod nams las can bzhin/ /gzhal med khang gi rgyab nas sa lam gshegs so/ /mi skyong gis kyang de nyid bskyed pa'i ched las ni/ /de yi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis bskul
10b4(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /sdig pa las ni dga' bral zhi la mngon dga' zhing/ /legs la skal bar bgos shing dul la bsnyen par gyur/ /brtan min bzhin du 'dod pa'i bde la ma zhen la/ /ma rungs bskyed mal ni yang dag chags ma gyur/ /brtan
10b5(mdo 'grel): las? dbang ba'i rta ni stabs las rnam thul zhing/ /gnyen dang grong khyer ba rnams yon tan rnams kyis rgyal/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal phyir ni rig pa ma brjod la/ /ye shes dge ba gang yang de la lhag par brjod/ /des ni rang gi skye dgu
10b6(mdo 'grel): rnams la ji lta bar/ /de ltar skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i bsngags pa mdzad/ /skar ma rgyal snang shes ldan sras de lhag pa'i lha/ /ji lta bar ni de yi tshe ring phyir mchod de/ /chung min me la bsreg bya rnams ni bsregs gyur la/ /gnyis
10b7(mdo 'grel): skyes rnams la gser dang ba lang rnams kyang byin/ /'gram stegs chab rnams kyis dang yon tan chab rnams kyis/ /gtsang spra'i ched du lus dang yid la khrus byas te/ /rig byed du ni nye bar bstan pa'i chab rnams dang/ /zhi ba bdag
11a1(mdo 'grel): skyes snying la zhi ba'i bde la 'thungs?/ /gang zhig don dang mi ldan zhi bas smras la/ /gang zhig dga' ba dang bral de nyid ma brjod de/ /zhi ba de nyid me dang rtsub ba'i de nyid phyir/ /ngo tsha ba yis bdag nyid kho na brjod ma nus/ /
11a2(mdo 'grel): don ldan 'dong? pa rnams dang mi 'dod pa rnams la/ /chags pa'i skyon la brten nas rab tu 'thob min te/ /dge ba'i tha snyad gtsang ma la ni bsnyen gyur la/ /mchod sbyin la yang ma mos de ltar ji lta bzhin/ /sred pa dang ldan mngon
11a3(mdo 'grel): par 'ongs la de ma thag/ sbyin bya chu 'dra rnams kyi skom pa bcas gyur la/ /g.yul las ma gtogs ye shes kyi ni sta re yis/ /dgra bo rnams kyi nga rgyal chen po bcom par 'gyur/ /gcig ni rnam par dul la des ni bdun
11a4(mdo 'grel): bsrungs shing/ /bdun po nyid ni dor la lnga po dag ni bsrungs/ /sde tshan gsum po thob la sde tshan gsum rtogs shing/ /sde tshan gnyis po shes la sde mtshan gnyis po spangs/ /nyes pa byas kyang rab tu bskyangs nas gzhom bya la//
11a5(mdo 'grel): 'tshe bar mi byed khro bas kyang ni gzigs ma yin/ /de rnams dag la 'bras bu zhi bas bcings gyur la/ /de rnams dag ni 'dor ba tshul ma yin phyir mthong/ /drang srong rnams kyi mchog gi brtul zhugs spyad gyur la/ /yun ring
11a6(mdo 'grel): yang dag bzung ba'i shar? kho na zhugs rnams dor/ /yon tan dri ldan snyan ngag? rnams ni thob gyur la/ /dri ma can du byed pa'i rdul rnams rnam par ngor/ /rab tu mi gnas gtor ma'i dbya ni ma blangs la/ /pha rol dngos po rnams
11a7(mdo 'grel): la mngon par rlom ma byas/ /dgra rnams la ni chos ma yin pa ma smras la/ /khro ba rnams ni snying gis bzung ba ma yin no/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid sems ni rnam par rab dang la/ /rnal 'byor rab tu ldan pa'i dbang po rnams ci ltar/ /der
11b1(mdo 'grel): ni de ltar sa bdag rab tu sgyur ba can/ /'bangs dang grong khyer pa rnams de lta nyid du byas/ /de nas mdzes pa'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan ma/ /grags 'dzin ma ni rang gi grags pa 'dzin ma la/ /zas gtsang sras po'i sras po sgra gcan sgra
11b2(mdo 'grel): yi zhal/ /sgra gcan 'dzin zhes bya ba dus su skyes par gyur/ /de nas 'dod pa'i bu mnga' mchog gis yid ches te/ /rigs rgyud 'phel ba rab mtshon sa skyong rgyal po ni/ /ji lta nyid du sras po rab tu skyes la dga' / /de lta nyid
11b3(mdo 'grel): du sras po'i sras po skyes la dga' / /bdag gi bu yi bur gyur ba la brtse ba ni/ /bdag bzhin gang las yin zhes dga' ba skyes gyur te/ /dus su des ni cho ga de dang de dmigs shing/ /bu la dga' ba mtho ris bzhin du 'dzags
11b4(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /rgyal po'i khyu mchog grags dang snyan pas mtshan rnams kyis/ /dang po'i skal ba rnams kyi lam la gnas nas ni/ /dkar po ma dor dka' thub rnams la dka' thub dang/ /'tsho ba dor ba'i mchod sbyin rnams kyi
11b5(mdo 'grel): ? mchod par gyur/ /rgyal po'i dpal gyis dang ni dka' thub dpal gyis kyang/ /bsod nams las can de ni de nas 'bar gyur la/ /rigs dang blo dang mdzad spyod kyis kyang gsal ba ste/ /gzi brjid stong gi 'od zer bzhin
11b6(mdo 'grel): du rab tu 'phro/ /rang byung las byung mchod byed sngags ni mchod byas nas/ /sras nas ched du brtan pa'i dpal gyis bzlas byas shing/ /dkar thub byed pa'i las rnams byas gyur skye dgu rnams/ /skyed 'dong skye dgu'i bdag bzhin dang po'i dus
11b7(mdo 'grel): su'o/ /mtshon cha spangs shing bstan bcos rnam par shes gyur la/ /nye bar zhi la bsnyen zhing des la rnam par bzod/ /dbang ldan bzhin du yul rnams gang la ma bsnyen la/ /yab mes bzhin du yul rnams kun la gzigs par gyur//
12a1(mdo 'grel): des kyang bu yi ched du rgyal srid bzung gyur la/ /bu ni rigs kyi don du rigs ni grags pa'i phyir/ /grags pa mtho ris ched du mtho ris bdag nyid phyir/ /chos kyi don du bdag nyid gnas la 'dod par 'gyur/ /de ltar des
12a2(mdo 'grel): ni dam pa rnams kyis nges thob pa'i/ /thos pa las grub chos ni rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /gang las bdag gi bus ni bu yi ngo mthong nas/ /nags tshal nyid du 'gro mi 'gyur zhes mgon blangs so/ /bdag la yang dag gnas pa'i dpal ni
12a3(mdo 'grel): bsrung 'dod pa'i/ /sa skyong rnams kyis sa la bu ni bsrung? ba ste/ /chos ni 'dod pa'i ma yi dbang po de yis kyang/ /yul rnams 'dor ba med par bu ni chos las bsrungs/ /byang chub sems dpa' yul la bde ba'i ro zhes thams
12a4(mdo 'grel): cad kyang/ /sras bskyed pa na dpe med sems dpa' nags su gshegs gyur te/ /de phyir nye bar bsags pa'i las ni rtsa nas bskyed pa'i phyir/ /de ni zhi ba ma thob de srid dga' ba bsnyen par gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba
12a5(mdo 'grel): snyan dngags? chen po las/ /btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas re zhig dus nas 'jam po'i rtswa rnams dang/ /khu byug pho ni gyen du skad? 'don rkang 'thung rnams/ /glu rnams dang ni
12a6(mdo 'grel): nges ldan skyed mos tshal rnams ni/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan des ni thos par gyur/ /de nas bud med skye bo rnams ni dga' ba yi/ /grong khyer skyed mos tshal gyi yid 'ong dngos thos te/ /khyim gyi nang du mngon par bkag
12a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i glu bzhin du/ /phyi rol rab tu 'gro ba'i ched du blo mdzad do/ /de nas sras su mngon brjod yid 'ong de yi ni/ /dgongs pa mi skyong gis ni zhes? par thos gyur nas/ /brtse ba'i phun sum tshogs pas lang tshor 'ongs pa ru/ /ltad
12b1(mdo 'grel): mo dag? la rnam par gshegs par dka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu shin tu gzhon nu'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ /yang dag skyo ba'i sems su ma gyur zhes sems shing/ /nyam thag tha dang skye bo kun nas 'dus pa ni/ /rgyal po'i lam du phyir
12b2(mdo 'grel): la rnam par bzlog pa ste/ /nying lag dman pa rnams dang dbang po ma tshang rnams/ /'khog ba nad pa la sogs bkren rnams phyogs rnams su/ /de nas mchog tu zhi bas yang dag rab ston nas/ /rgyal po'i lam rnams ngag? ni mchog tu
12b3(mdo 'grel): m? par byas/ /de nas dpal ldan rgyal po'i lam ni byas pa na/ /dpal ldan rnam par dul ba rjes 'brang gzhon nu ni/ /gzhal yas khang pa'i logs nas dus su mngon babs nas/ /mngon par rjes gnang byas pa mi skyong la mngon
12b4(mdo 'grel): gshegs/ /de nas mi dbang bu la mchi ma byung gyur te/ /mgo la nye bar bsnoms te yun ring rnam gzigs nas/ /song zhig ces? ni tshig gi bka' dag bstsal gyur la/ /brtse ba dag las de ni yid kyis ma btang ngo/ /de nas de ni 'dzam
12b5(mdo 'grel): bu chu gser sga 'dzin pa'i/ /legs par bslabs pa'i mgyogs 'gro bzhi yis sbyar ba yi/ /dbang po ma nyams mkhas shing gtsang la 'od zer 'chang/ /gser gyi rang bzhin shing rta la ni yang dag 'dzegs/ /de nas 'bras sbos
12b6(mdo 'grel): me tog 'bar ba rab bkram shing/ /phreng ba rnam dbyangs rab tu g.yo ba'i ba dan can/ /zla ba skar ma dang bcas bar snang la bzhin du/ /'brang ba rjes 'brang lam ni rab tu thob par gyur/ /ya mtshan gyur las rab tu rgyas pa'i mig
12b7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni/ /utpal sngon po'i phyed 'dra rnams kyis bkram pa ni/ /rgyal po'i lam la ngal bus gshegs gyur te/ /grong khyer skye bo rnams kyis kun nas mngon par dga' / /kha cig de la zhi ba'i yon tan gyis bstod la/ /de bzhin gzhan 
13a1(mdo 'grel): rnams gsal ba nyid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing/ kha cig dag ni 'di la mngon du phyogs nas kyang/ /dpal dang tshe yi rnams par rgyas la shis pa brjod/ /zhar ba skur? po nang ba mi'u thung rnams kyi/ /tshogs pa rnams ni
13a2(mdo 'grel): rigs chen rnams la nges dral nas/ /mi mo rnams ni nges par zhugs gnas phra rnams las/ /lha yi rjes 'gro rgyal mtshan bzhin du rab tu btung/ /de nas gzhon nu nges par gshegs zhes gtam ngag ni/ /bsgo bya skye las bud
13a3(mdo 'grel): med rnams kyis thos gyur nas/ /bkur 'os skye bos mngon par rjes gnang byas pa rnams/ /blta bar 'dod pas lding khang shong du song bar gyur/ /yon tan ska rags brul zhing gegs byas de rnams ni/ /gnyid log rab tu sang
13a4(mdo 'grel): pas lta byed 'khrugs pa rnams/ /gnas lugs gtam gyis rnam par brgyan rnams rnam gzhag ste/ /ya mtshan gyur pas dogs med par ni yongs su song/ /gzhal yas khang gi skad kyi 'og gi sgra rab dang/ /dril chung sgra rnams
13a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni gdu? bu'i skra rnams kyis/ /rnam par skrag gyur khyim gyi bya ba'i tshogs rnams ni/ /phan tshun shugs rnams las kyang yang dag kun nas gtor/ /gang zhig 'dir ni yan lag rab mchog ma rnams ni/ /myur ba rab tu skyes
13a6(mdo 'grel): gyur tsam tsam skyes rnams kyi/ /'o ma 'dzin rnams rgyas shing skyed smad shing rta ni/ /yangs pa rnams kyis lci ba nyid phyir 'gro ba bzung/ /mdza' gcig legs par rab tu sbyar ba'i rgyan rnams ni/ /rnam par spas pa rnam par gsal
13a7(mdo 'grel): bas ngo tsha bas/ /skyen por 'gro bar nus pa yin yang gzhan ma yis/ /'gro ba nges par bzung ste myur min song bar gyur/ /phan tshun rab tu gcer bas ril por gyur pa rnams/ /yang dag drung las bskyod gyur rna lung 'khyil? ba?
13b1(mdo 'grel): can can? de dag rnams kyi de tshe sgra bcas rgyan rnams ni/ /rlung bgros skar khung rnams su rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /rlung bgrod skar khung rnams las rnam par 'thon pa rnams/ /phan tshun thang ched gyur pa'i rna lung 'khyil ba rnams/ /
13b2(mdo 'grel): bud med rnams kyi 'dam skyes 'dra ba'i 'dam skyes zhal/ /lding khang rnams su bkod pa rnams ni rnam par mdzes/ /de nas khang bzang lang tsho ma rnams kyis khyab cing/ /ya mtshan la ni rab phye skar khung rnams kyis ni/ /lha mo
13b3(mdo 'grel): dang bcas gzhal med rnams kyis nam mkha' bzhin/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i grong khyer kun nas mdzes par gyur/ /skar khung rnams kyi rnam par spangs pa ma yin las/ /phan tshun 'gram par bkod pa'i rna lung can rnams kyi/ /
13b4(mdo 'grel): 'dam skyes pad+ma rnams kyi tshogs rnams bcings pa bzhin/ /rab myos mchog ma rnams kyi zhal ni mdzes par gyur/ /gzhon nu de la lam du rnam par lta ba yi /bud med de rnams sa la 'gro 'dod ltar mdzes shing/ /gyen du
13b5(mdo 'grel): gdong phyogs de la rab tu blta ba yi/ /mi rnams gnam la 'gro bar 'dod bzhin mdzes par gyur/ /lus dang dpal gyis mchog tu 'bar bar gyur pa yi/ /rgyal po'i sras de mthong nas bud med de rnams ni/ /nges par dgongs bar
13b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan min bsam pa dag pa yis/ /'di yi chung ma skal ba bzang zhes ngal bus smra/ /gzugs kyi dngos su me tog tog can dang mtshungs shing/ /rnam par ring zhing rgyas pa'i dpung pa can 'di ni/ /dpal nyid dor nas chos la nye bar
13b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs zhes te/ /de la de dag rnams kyi zhes kho na byas/ /rnam par dul la gtsang zhing brtan pa'i cha lugs can/ /grong pa rnams kyi de ltar rgyal po'i lam khyab pa/ /de ni sngon du gzhon nus mthong nas dga' bas te/ /bdag gi
14a1(mdo 'grel): srid pa gzhan ma cung zhig brtags pa 'dra/ /grong khyer de yang mtho ris bzhin du rab dga' ba/ /mngon par gzigs nas gtsang mar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /snga gzhi skyob ba'i sras po yang dag
14a2(mdo 'grel): bskul don du/ /'khegs? pa'i mi rgan rab tu 'gro bar sprul gyur to/ /de nas gzhon nu yis ni rga bas zil non zhing/ /mi rnams las ni tha dad dbyibs can de gzigs nas/ /g.yo ba mang cing de nyid du ni zhugs pa'i spyan//
14a3(mdo 'grel): chags par gyur cing kha lo 'dzin pa la smas so/ /mngon par nyer 'od mi re su yin 'dren pa kye/ /skra rnams dkar zhing dbyug pa la ni lag pas brten/ /smin mas kun nas mig g.yogs 'khogs shing yan lag drung/
14a4(mdo 'grel): rnam 'gyur 'di ni tha mal gang 'dod yin nam ci/ /de skad cas smre shing rta rab tu 'dren pa po/ /lha mchog de rnams de rnams nyid kyi blo ni rmongs byas shing/ /don ni bsrung bya yin yang skyon med mthong gyur te/ /de yis sa
14a5(mdo 'grel): skyong bdag nyid skyes la nges par gsol/ /gzugs kyi gnod byed stobs kyi rnam par zab po/ /rga ba rnams kyis 'joms byed mya ngan rnams kyi sa/ /dran pa rnams kyi nyams byed dbang po rnams kyi dgra/ /'di ni rgas
14a6(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya gang gis 'di bcom mo/ /'dis kyang byas pa nyid na'am 'thungs gyur cing/ /dus kyi sa la yongs su gnyid log gyur pa ste/ /rim gyis lus rab ldan pa'i lang tshor gyur nas kyang/ /rim gyis de nyid kha nas
14a7(mdo 'grel): rga bar nye bar song/ /de skad ces smras rgyal po'i bdag nyid skyes pa ste/ /cung zhig 'dar zhing kha lo sgyur la 'di skad smras/ /skyon 'di kho bo la yang 'byung ba min nam ci/ /de bzhin 'di la kho lo sgyur ba yis gsol
14b1(mdo 'grel): to/ /'di ni na tshod rab mchog tshe dang ldan pa'i yang/ /gdon mi za bar dus kyi dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin rgas pa gzugs kyi rnam par nyams pa por/ /'jig rten pa yis shes pa nyid dang mthong ba nyid//
14b2(mdo 'grel): de nas sngon gyi bsam pa dag pa'i blo mnga' ba/ /rnam rgyas bskal par bsags pa'i bsod nams las can de/ /rdo rje chen po'i sgra la nye sar ba lang bzhin/ /rgas pa thos nas gzhon nu kun nas yi mug gyur/ /dbugs ni
14b3(mdo 'grel): ring du rgyus nas rang gi mgo bsgul zhing/ /'khogs pa de la spyan ni rnam par zhugs nas su/ /rga ba dang bcas skye ba de rnams gzigs gyur nas/ /sems ni khong du chud pa de yi tshig 'di smras/ /dran pa dang ni gzugs
14b4(mdo 'grel): dang pha rol gnon pa yang/ /de ltar rgas pas rnam dpyod med par 'joms pas de/ /'di lta bur ni mngon sum nyid du mthong na yang/ /'jig rten pa dag skyo med nyer 'gro kho na'o/ /de ltar song na 'dren pa rta rnams phyir bzlog la/ /
14b5(mdo 'grel): khyod ni khyim nyid du ni skyen par rab tu song/ /rgas pa'i 'jigs pa'i sems su gnas pa kho bo la/ /skyed mos tshal gyi sa la bde ba ga la yod/ /de nas rgyal po'i sras po nga yi bka' lung gis/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir
14b6(mdo 'grel): la bzlog par gyur/ /de nas gzhon nus pho brang de nyid kho nar ni/ /bsam pa'i dbang gis stong pa bzhin du rab tu thob/ /gang gis tshe na der yang bde ba ma rnyed de/ /rgas pa rgas pa zhes ni rab tu yongs su rtog/ de nas mi dbang gis
14b7(mdo 'grel): ni rjes gnang de ni slar/ /rim gyis de nyid kho nas phyi rol gshegs par gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang lus la nad dang yongs ldan pa/ /lha mchog de rnams nyid kyis bskyed cing sprul pa'i mi/ /zas gtsang rgyal po'i sras po spyan
15a1(mdo 'grel): der song nyid kyis/ /gzigs nas kha lo sgyur ba de nyid la smras pa/ /gsus pa sbom zhing dbugs dag skyod pa'i lus po can/ /lag pa cha shas zha zhing ring la skya bas lus/ /a ma zhes ni snying rje'i ngag? ngag
15a2(mdo 'grel): smra ba po/ /gzhan la rten nas gnas pa'i mi de su zhig yin/ /de nas kha lo sgyur bas smras pa zhi ba kye/ /'di yi khams ni rab 'khrugs rab stobs rab tu 'phel/ /nad ces bya ba mngon brjod shin tu don med chen po ste/ /nus
15a3(mdo 'grel): kyang gang gis de ni rang dbang med par byas/ /rjes su brtse bcas mi ni de la gzigs bzhin du/ /rgyal po'i sras des slar yang 'di skad ces smras pa/ /skyes gyur skyon de so sor 'di nyid kho na'i 'am/ /nad kyi 'jigs la skye
15a4(mdo 'grel): dgu rnams kyi spyi la yin/ /de nas shing rta rab tu 'dren pa des smras pa/ /gzhon nu nyes pa de ni thun mong gyur pa ste/ /de ltar nad rnams dag ni yongs su bcod? pa ni/ /nad thar phyin na 'jig rten dga' bar nye bar gshegs/ /
15a5(mdo 'grel): de lta don? thos sems ni khong du chud pa de/ /chu rlabs nang song ri bong can bzhin rab 'dar zhing/ /brtse ba thugs rje mnga' bas gsung dag tshig 'di ni/ /cung zhig dngar ba'i dbyangs kyi rab tu smras pa'o/ /skye dgu rnams la rnam
15a6(mdo 'grel): par zhen pa'i nad 'di ni/ /'jig rten pa dag rang bzhin gnas shing blo gtang byed/ /mi shes rnam par rgya chen e ma min rnams kyi/ /gang zhig nad? las rnam par grol rnams bzhad gang byed/ /'dren pa'i phyi rol rab tu 'gro las
15a7(mdo 'grel): phyir log la/ /mi dbang pho brang nyid du shing rta rab tu song/ /bdag gi nad kyi 'jigs pa thos nas dga' ba las/ /sems ni 'khums pa bzhin du rab tu bcom par gyur/ /de ltar lan gnyis phyir log de ni rab gzigs nas/ /
15b1(mdo 'grel): sa yi bdag po yis kyang yongs su gros byas so/ /de yi phyir log nges pa'i mtshan ma thos byung? nas/ /bdag cag rnams ni 'di yis yang dag 'dor snyam ste/ /lam rnams gtsang mar lhag par byed pa po rnams la/ /khros shing
15b2(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs kyang chad pa drag pas gcod pa med/ /slar yang sras po de la khyad par 'phags pa dang/ /ldan pa'i yul la rab tu spyod pa rnams mdzad cing/ /dbang po g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir yang cha ba snyam ste/ /bdag cag rnam par mi
15b3(mdo 'grel): 'dor zhes ni mgon bslangs so/ /gang gi tshe na sgra sogs dbang po'i don rnams kyis/ /sras po 'di la pho brang 'khor na dga' ba med/ /de nas ro gzhan ro la gyur cig ces sems shing/ /phyi rol ltad mo la ni rnam par
15b4(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal to/ /brtse ba las ni sras po'i dgongs pa rtogs nas su/ /de la chags pa'i skyon rnams 'ga' zhig ma bsam nas/ /sgyu rtsal rnams la mngon par shes zhes res ma'i gtso/ /'dzangs ma rnams la des na
15b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag bka' stsal to/ /de nas khyad par du yang mi yi dbang po'i lam/ /legs par brgyan byas nyid dang yongs su brtags pa la/ /'dren pa dang ni shing rta rjes nas rgyal po yis/ /gzhon nu phyi rol du ni rab tu
15b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs su gzhug/ de nas de ltar rgyal po'i bu ni gshegs pa na/ /lha mchog de rnams nyid kyis rnam par sprul pa yi/ /srog song shi ba'i ro de lam du btegs pa ni/ /'dren pa dang ni gzhon nus mthong ste gzhan gyis
15b7(mdo 'grel): min/ /de nas 'dren la rgyal po'i sras po des smras pa/ /zhan zhing sdug pa'i mi rnams dag ni rjes 'brang zhing/ /rgyan gyis brgyan pha yin yang kun nas du ba ste/ /mi bzhi rnams kyis btegs pa pha gi su zhig yin/ /da nas
16a1(mdo 'grel): gtsang ba'i bdag nyid gtsang mar gnas pa yi/ /lha rnams dag gis sems ni zil non 'dren pa po/ /des ni brjod par bya ba min kyang don 'di ni/ /don ldan dbang phyug la ni rab tu rnam par gsol/ /blo dang
16a2(mdo 'grel): dbang po srog gi yon tan dang bral zhing/ /gnyid log ming bral rtswa dang shing du gyur pa ste/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed nas bsrungs nas kyang/ /sdug pa sdug pa rnams kyis spangs pa de ni su yin nam/ /de
16a3(mdo 'grel): ltar tshig ni rab tu 'dren pa las thos nas/ /cung zhig kun nas bskyod nas de nyid la smras pa/ /chos 'di nyid ni skye ba 'di nyid kyang gi 'am/ /mthar gyur 'di 'dra skye dgu kun gyi yin nam ci/ /de nas rab tu 'dren pas 'di
16a4(mdo 'grel): nyid la gsol pa/ /mthar gyur las 'di skye dgu rnams ni kun gyi ste/ /dman dang 'bring dang bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten ngag ni nges par rnam par nyams par gyur/ /de nas mi dbang sras po de ni brtan
16a5(mdo 'grel): na yang/ /'chi ba thos nas de ma thag tu yi mug cing/ /dpung pas shing rta'i shing gi rtse la rab 'khyung? nas/ /gdangs snyan dang ldan dbyangs kyis rab tu smras pa'o/ /'di ni nges par skye dgu rnams kyi mthar thug ste/ /
16a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa dag 'jigs pa spangs shing bag med la/ /mi rnams dag gis sems rnams sra ba snyam pa ste/ /lam la gnas rnams de ltar rang bzhin nyid du gnas/ /de phyir 'dren pa shing rta'i kha ni phyir bzlog dang/ /bdag
16a7(mdo 'grel): cag sa la rnam par rgyu ba'i yul dus ni/ nyam thag dus su rnam par nyams pa shes nas ni/ /sems dang bcas pa gang 'dra 'di na bag med yin/ /mi bdag bdag skyes kyis ni de skad smras na yang/ /de yis shing rta de ni phyir la
16b1(mdo 'grel): ma bzlog ste/ /khyab par ldan pa yin yang mi dbang brtan pa la/ /pad+ma'i tshogs bcas nags nyid du ni gshegs par gyur/ /de nas me tog rgyas ldan gzhon nu'i rkang 'thung zhing/ /yongs su bskor zhing rab dga' mos pa'i
16b2(mdo 'grel): khu byug can/ /gzhal med khang ldan pad+ma dang bcas mdzes pa'i rdzing/ /dga' ba'i tshal 'dra dge ba'i nags te gzigs par gyur/ /lha mchog mas bskor grong khyer rgyan byed bdag po'i gzhir/ /brtul zhugs
16b3(mdo 'grel): gsang ldan thub pa bgegs kyis 'jigs pa bzhin/ /yan lag mchog ma'i tshogs khyab mi skyong bdag skyes sras/ /de nas stobs las nags der shin tu spyan drangs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan ngag
16b4(mdo 'grel): chen po las/ /thugs skyo ba skyes pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas skyed mos tshal de nas/ /ya mtshan gyis ni mig g.yos rnams/ /bud med rnams ni khyo thob bzhin/ /mi skyod sras la mdun
16b5(mdo 'grel): du 'ongs/ /'ongs nas de la de rnams kyis/ /ya mtshan rab rgyas spyan ma rnams/ /pad+ma'i mdzad? 'da' i phyag rnams kyis/ /phrin las yang dag spyod pa byas/ /g.yo med dga' ba rnams gsal ba'i/ /spyan mig rnams
16b6(mdo 'grel): kyis 'thung ba bzhin/ /yid dkrug 'dod pas sems g.yengs rnams/ /de la yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /lhan skyes rgyan rnams kyis bzhin du/ /mtshan ni mdzes rnams kyis brgyan pa/ /'dod lha lus dang ldan no zhes/ de la mi mo de
16b7(mdo 'grel): rnams snyam/ /zhi ba nyid phyir bstan nyid phyir/ /gsang ba'i 'od zer zla ba ni/ /sa la dngos su bab pa bzhin/ /de la kha cig rnams kyis shes/ /de yi lus kyis g.yengs de rnams/ /des bzung lus ni rnams 'gyur zhing/ /phan
17a1(mdo 'grel): tshun mig rnams kyis bsnun nas/ /dal bus dbugs ni rnam par brgyus/ /de ltar mi mo de rnams kyis/ /de ni mig tsam gyis mthong nyid/ /smra ba med cing dga' med par/ /'di yi mthu yi non par gyur/ /
17a2(mdo 'grel): de ltar de rnams rtsom bral zhing/ /snying rjes rnam par 'khrugs mthong nas/ /bram ze mdun na 'don gyi sras/ /blo ldan 'char kas tshig smras so/ /kun gyi sgyu rtsal kun shes shing/ /dgongs pa len la mkhas pa rnams/ /gzugs
17a3(mdo 'grel): dang 'dzangs dang ldan pa ste/ /rang gi yon tan gtsor phyin no/ /lus ngan gyi yang skyed tshal dang/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan na yang/ /yon tan 'di rnams kyis mdzes te/ /nor 'dzin 'di na sngon nyid do/ /chags bral rnams dang drang srong
17a4(mdo 'grel): yang/ /khyed cag rnams kyis g.yo nus shing/ /lha mo rnams kyis shes pa yis/ /lha rnams la yang len par ro/ /dgongs pa shes dang rtse 'jo dang/ /'dzangs dang gzugs ni phun tshogs pas/ /bud med rnams kyi chags
17a5(mdo 'grel): nus na/ /skyes pa rnams kyi smos ci dgos/ /rnam pa de ltar rab sbyar ba/ /de yi rang gi spyod yul las/ /rnam pa de ltar spyod pa 'di/ /khyod kyi drang po'i tshig ma gyur/ /khyod kyi 'di ni ngo tsha bas/ /mig 'khums bag ma
17a6(mdo 'grel): gsar pa yi/ /spyod pa dang mtshungs yang na ni/ /ba glang skyong gi chung ma'i 'os/ /gang yang 'di ni dpa' ba ste/ /dpal gyi mthu las chen po yin/ /bud med kyi yang gzi che ste/ /de phyir 'di yang nges par bya/ /sngon yang ka
17a7(mdo 'grel): shi'i mdzes ma ni/ /smad 'tshong ma yis drang srong che/ /lha yis thub par dka' ba yang/ /drang srong rgyas pa rkang bas brdungs/ /mAn thal gau tam dge slong ni/ /smad 'tshong gtso mo byin ma yis/ /dga' 'dod de yi don
17b1(mdo 'grel): ched du/ /sngon gyi tshe na ro rnams bton/ /gau ta ma mun ring ming/ /drang srong chen po tshe ring po/ /kha dog dbyibs mchog ma yin pa'i/ /bud med kyis ni tshim par byas/ /drang srong rwa skyes thub pa mchog /bud med yul la mi mkhas pa
17b2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs thabs rnams kyis/ /zhi mas de ltar blangs shing pham/ /sna tshogs bshes gnyen drang srong che/ /brtul zhugs chen po bstan pa yang/ /lha mo mar bsrungs mas phrogs te/ /lo bcu rnams la nyi mar shes/
17b3(mdo 'grel): drang srong de rnams de rnams sogs/ /bud med kyis bsgyur blangs gyur na/ /rol zhing lang tsho snga ma yis/ /mi bdag sas po smos ci dgos/ /de ltar gyur na yid ches shing/ /'di ni mi skyong rigs kyi dpal/ /'di las phyir
17b4(mdo 'grel): phyogs ma yin pa/ /ji ltar de ltar nan tan mdzod/ /lang tsho ldan ma dga' zhig rnams/ /mtshungs pa'i skye bo 'phrog pa ste/ /mchog dang mchog min dag gi sems/ /len pa gang de bud med rnams/ /de ltar 'char ka'i
17b5(mdo 'grel): tshig thos nas/ /bud med de rnams phug pa bzhin/ /gzhon nu len par rab mtshon te/ /bdag nyid yang dag kun nas 'dzegs/ /'jigs las 'jigs bzhin yan lag ma/ /de rnams smin dang lta dang sgeg /rgod dang
17b6(mdo 'grel): rol dang 'gro ba yis/ /kun nas bskyod pa'i spyod pa byas/ /rgyal po'i bka' lung sbyar phyir dang/ /gzhon nu nyid kyang 'jam phyir dang/ /rgyags pa yis ni myos pa'i phyir/ /yid mi ches la myur bar dor/ /glang mo'i
17b7(mdo 'grel): tshogs dang thabs cig tu/ /glang po gangs can nags na ltar/ /de nas mi mo'i skye bo yis/ /gzhon nu bskor zhing nags na spyad/ /rnam par mdzes pa'i skyed tshal na/ /lha mos bskor ba'i nyi ma bzhin/ /yid 'ong
18a1(mdo 'grel): nags der gzhon nu de/ /bud med rnams kyi mdun 'gro 'bar/ /rnam par sgeg bcas gzhon nu ma/ /rgyags bsam yangs de rnams dga' / /sra zhing zlum rgyas lhan cig pa'i/ /num rnams kyis de la dregs
18a2(mdo 'grel): dpung ba las brul 'jam ring gnyen/ /lag pa'i ljon shing stobs med ma/ /kha cig bden min 'khrul pa ru/ /byas nas de la stobs las khyud/ /kha cig zengs mchu ma mchu can/ /kha yi chang gi dri ngag gis/ /gcig po dben
18a3(mdo 'grel): bar stong cig ces/ /'di yi rna bar shab shib byed/ /kha cig bka' lung stsol ba bzhin/ /byug pa gsher mas rab smras te/ /'dir ni gus par gyis shig ces/ /rgod dang 'khyud dang 'dod pas so/ /kha cig gser gyi ska
18a4(mdo 'grel): rags kyi/ /cal col rnams kyi tsam tsom dang/ /phra mo'i dar gyis gos gyon zhing/ /'di la ro smrad ston cing bskor/ /yang dang yang du mos ma'i sgyus/ /gzhan ma dar sngon nyil ba de/ /ska rags phan tshun sdud pa ni/ /
18a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo glog phreng bzhin du mdzes/ /tsu ta'i yal ga me tog rgyas/ /bzung nas gzhan ni 'chang gyur la/ /gser gyi bum par mtshungs pa yi/ /'o ma 'dzin pa ston par byed/ /kha cig pad+ma'i nags tshal nas/ /'ongs nas bab
18a6(mdo 'grel): bcas pad+ma'i spyan/ /pad+ma'i zhal gyi logs gnas shing/ /pad+ma'i dpal bzhin bsdad? par gyur/ /rang gnas de la bskul ba bzhin/ /bslus par gyur ces mig rnams kyis/ /kha cig mngon par 'dren bcas lag /
18a7(mdo 'grel): don ldan dngar ba'i klu len no/ /dge ba'i gdong gis gzhan mas ni/ /smin ma'i gzhu ni rnam bkang ste/ /bskor gnas bstan dang rol pa yis/ /'di yi spyod la rjes 'dod byas/ /rgyas zlum nu ldan kha cig ni/ /rgod pas
18b1(mdo 'grel): rna lung g.yos gyur cing/ /khyod ni thob par gyur cig ces/ /mthon po rnams kyis bzhad cing smras/ /gzhan ni de bzhin 'gro 'dod pa/ /me tog phreng ba'i tsar gyis bcings/ /kha cig cong bcas dngar mo yi/ /dag gzhags
18b2(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyis bzung/ /so sor 'bral ba don gnyer dga' / /cu ta'i snyem bzung nas ni/ /me tog 'di ni gang gi zhes/ /rgyags par rnam par 'khrugs shing dris/ /kha cig 'gros dang cha lugs ni/ /skyes pa bzhin du
18b3(mdo 'grel): byas nas ni/ /sa 'dir rgyal bar gyur cig kye/ /bud med kyis 'pham de la smras/ /de nas g.yo ba'i mig can 'gas/ /utpal sngon po snom byed cing/ /cung zhig rgyags skad tshig rnams kyis/ /mi skyong bdag skyes la
18b4(mdo 'grel): smras so/ /gzigs shing jo bo tsU ta'i shing/ /me tog sbrang rtsi'i dris khyab la/ /khu byug 'dir ni skad 'don pa/ /gser gyi gur na bkag pa 'dra/ /mya ngan med pa'i shing 'di gzigs/ /'dod pa can gyi mya ngan 'phel/ /bud
18b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'dir ni sgra grags pa/ /me yis chig pa yin pa 'dra/ /tsu ta'i shing gis yang dag 'khyud/ /gzigs shing til ka yi shing/ /bud med lus ser chags pa yis/ /skyes pa gos dkar gon pa 'dra/ /rab rgyas
18b6(mdo 'grel): kur ba ka gzigs/ /ma zos pa yi smug rtsi'i 'ong/ /bud med rnams kyi san 'od kyis/ /rma phab gyur te dud pa 'dra/ /gzhon nu mya ngan med 'di gzigs/ /'dab ma rnams kyi spras pa gang/ /kho mo'i lag pa mdzes pa
18b7(mdo 'grel): yis/ /ngo mtshar gyur te gnas pa 'dra/ /rdzing bu gzigs shing 'gram skyes pa'i/ /lcang ma rnams kyis rab tu bskor/ /dkar po'i dar gyi gos gyon pa'i/ /rab myos ma rnams nyal ba 'dra/ /bud med rnams la
19a1(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid che/ /gzigs shig ngang pa chu 'di la/ /rgyab na bsgo bya'i bran bzhin du/ /ngang mo rjes 'jug rjes su 'gro/ /rab tu myos pa'i khu byug ni/ /skad brag sgra ni gson mdzod cig /khu byug gzhan ni mngon sum
19a2(mdo 'grel): du/ /kum 'debs brag ca'i sgra brnyan 'dra/ /mkha' la rgyu ba rnams kyi yang/ /rgyags pa dpyid kyis khyer te 'ongs/ /bsam bya min sems skye bo ni/ /shes rab can du rloms pa med/ /de ltar dar la bab pa rnams/ /yid dkrugs 'dod
19a3(mdo 'grel): pas sems dregs shing/ /sna tshogs tshul ni de dang nges/ /gzhon nu la ni nye bar brtsams/ /de ltar kun nas g.yengs na yang/ /bstan pas dbang po dkris pa de/ /'chi bar bya zhes skyo byas shing/ /dga' dang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur//
19a4(mdo 'grel): de rnams kyi ni gnas skabs de/ /gzigs nas skyes mchog ngan pa des/ /mnyam la skyo dang bstan pa yis/ /thugs kyis bsams par gyur pa'o/ /ci zhig bud med 'di rnams ni/ /lang tsho g.yo bar rtogs pa min/ /gang phyir gzugs
19a5(mdo 'grel): kyi myos pa ni/ /gang zhig dga' bas nyams par 'gyur/ /gang gi nang du bying ba ru/ /nges par de rnams kyis mi mthong/ /'gro ba nad kyi chos can la/ /'jigs pa spangs te de ltar dga' / /thams cad 'phrog byed 'chi ba yi/ /nges
19a6(mdo 'grel): bar mngon par shes min zhing/ /de ltar rang gnas skyo med par/ /rtsed mo dang ni bzhad gang byed/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba yang/ /shes ldan yin na sems ldan su/ /rang gnas langs dang 'dug pa 'am/ /nyal byed rgod pa smos ci dgos/
19a7(mdo 'grel): nad dang 'chi ba nyid dang ni/ /mchog tu 'khogs gang de mthong nas/ /rang gnas gyur cing skyo med pa/ /ji ltar sems med de ltar de/ /me tog rnams dang 'bras bu yis/ /rnam par spangs par gyur pa'i shing/ /'gyel lam yang na
19b1(mdo 'grel): bcad pa ste/ /shing gzhan mdzes par byed ma yin/ /de ltar bsam gtan mchog mthong nas/ /yul rnams la ni 'dod pa thal/ /'char ka tshul lugs bstan bcos shes/ /mdza' bo nyid kyis de la smras/ /kho bo mi skyod gis byin te/ /khyod
19b2(mdo 'grel): la grogs su nus pa lo/ /gang phyir khyod la smra 'dod pa/ /rab dga' ldan pa de phyir ro/ /phan pa min las rab 'gegs shing/ /phan pa la yang rjes rab 'jug /sdug pa na yang yongs mi gtod/ /yongs rdzogs shes kyi mtshan nyid do//
19b3(mdo 'grel): bdag de byams par dam bcas nas/ /skyes bu'i don la phyir phyogs pa/ /gal te khyod la btang snyoms byed/ /grogs po nyid kyang ma yin no/ /de phyir mdza' bor gyur nas smras/ /gzhon nu'i lus dang ldan pa ni/ /khyod kyi 'di 'dra
19b4(mdo 'grel): bud med kyi/ /yul la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan min/ /de yi ngo tsha'i rgod don dang/ /bdag nyid dga' ba'i don nyid du/ /bden min gyis kyang mi mo yi/ /rjes su 'jug pa rigs pa yin/ /yang dag 'dud dang rjes 'jug gi /
19b5(mdo 'grel): bud med rnams kyi sems 'ching ste/ /brtse ba'i yon tan skye gnas phyir/ /yid la 'dod pa bud med yin/ /de phyir rnam par spangs pa'i spyan/ /snying la gzhan du phyir bltas kyang/ /'di yi tshul dang rjes mthun par/ /mkhas
19b6(mdo 'grel): bar rnam par dpyad par 'os/ /mkhas pa sman yin bud med la/ /mkhas pa rab mchog rgyan yin no/ /mkhas pa dang bral gzugs dag ni/ /me tog med pa'i nags dang 'dra/ /yang na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /bsam pa rang
19b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin khas len mdzod/ /yul rnams rnyed par dka' thob nas/ /phyi shol byed pa 'os ma yin/ /sngon tshe lha yi dbang pos kyang/ /'dod pa'i chog ces shes byas nas/ /gau ta ma thub pa'i bdag ldan ma/ /bshol med ma la
20a1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa byas/ /zla ba'i chung ma snar ma ni/ /drang srong ri byis don du gnyer/ /de nas de dang 'dra ba yi/ /bskam bya ma ni rnyed ces thos/ /u b+ha thya yi chung ma ni/ /rlung gi bu mo 'thun ma la/ /dka' thub chen po'i phur bu
20a2(mdo 'grel): yis/ /b+ha ra d+hwa dza bskyed par gyur/ /drang srong phur bu'i chung ma ni/ /sbyin sreg ma la sbyin sreg mchog /zla ba yis ni lag pa yi/ /lha yi las byed bskyed par gyur/ /sngon tshe bu mo nag mo ni/ /chur skyes pa las skyes ma la/ /
20a3(mdo 'grel): rtsibs logs skyes ni chags skyes shing/ /ya mu na'i gling du phyin/ /gnod sbyin 'phrang ma rigs ngan ma/ /smod ma la ni dga' 'dod pas/ /gong ma sreg ni za ba'i bu/ /thub pa gnas 'jog gis bskyed do/ /'gro mgyogs rgyal
20a4(mdo 'grel): bo drang srong nyid/ /na tshod rnam par song ba yi/ /lha mo sna tshogs mchod mar bcas/ /sna tshogs shing rta'i nags su dga' / /bud med 'grogs min zhi ba ni/ /skya bseng gis ni shes nas kyang/ /dga' ma'i gzugs yon
20a5(mdo 'grel): gyis bkug ste/ /'dod las skyes pa'i bde ba bsten/ /skyed mdzad rgyal po dmar ser yang/ /bram ze'i bu mo phrogs nas ni/ /na babs thob pa nyid yin kyang/ /yid dkrugs 'dod pa ma bsten min/ /de la sogs pa
20a6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid ches/ /yul rnams smad pa yin na yang/ /dga' ba'i ched du longs spyad de/ /yon tan ldan la sngon nyid do/ /khyod kyang rigs pa las thob cing/ /stobs ldan gzugs ldan dar la bab/ /gang du skye 'gro 'di 'chags
20a7(mdo 'grel): na/ /yul rnams la ni phyi shol byed/ /de ltar 'jam zhing lung dang bcas/ /de yis tshig ni gsan gyur nas/ /'brug gi sgra skad dbyangs kyis ni/ /gzhon nu yis ni lan smras so/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'thad pa ste/ /khyod la
20b1(mdo 'grel): mdza' bo nyid du gsal/ /gang du bdag la ngan par sems/ /'dir ni khyod la rjes zhi bgyi/ /yul rnams la ni phyi shol min/ /'jig rten de'i bdag nyid du shes/ /'gro ba mi rtag par shes nas/ /'dir ni bdag yid dga' ba min//
20b2(mdo 'grel): rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/ /gal te 'di gsum ma yin na/ /yid du 'ong ba'i yul rnams la/ /kho bo yang ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /gal de bud med rnams kyi lus/ /de nyid rtag par 'gyur na ni/ /skyon ldan 'dod pa rnams la yang/ /kho
20b3(mdo 'grel): bo'i sems ni 'dod la phyogs/ /gang tshe 'di dag rnams kyi gzugs/ /rgas pas 'thung ba 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /bdag nyid kyi yang 'dod med na/ /rmongs las der ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i chos/ /rga na 'chi
20b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /skyo ba med par rol ba ni/ /ri dags dang ni bya dang mtshungs/ /bdag nyid chen po 'di rnams kyang/ /'dod pa'i bdag nyid ces smras gang/ /rmongs las der ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i chos/ /
20b5(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni skyo bar bya ba ste/ /gang che de rnams kyi yang tshad/ /gang du ci las zad pa ste/ /bdag nyid chen por mi sems te/ /yul rnams la ni chags pa 'am/ /sbyor min bdag nyid ldan nyid kyis/ /mkhas pa yis kyang dpe brjod
20b6(mdo 'grel): cing/ /bden min gyis kyang bud med kyi/ /skye la zhugs shes smras pa gang/ /de min bdag gis shes ma yin/ /gang du drang min rjes 'jug pa/ /de la bdag gi srid pa med/ /dngos po kun gyi tshogs pa de/ /gal te med na
20b7(mdo 'grel): smod par shog /mi brtan pa yi dad pa dang/ /skyon du mthong ba'i nus pa yis/ /chags pa skyes bar gyur pa'i sems/ /bslu bar bya ba ci zhig yin/ /bud med skyes pa'i chags skyes shing/ /bud med skyes pa phan tshun du/ /gal
21a1(mdo 'grel): te de ltar bslu na ni/ /lta bar nus pa nyid ma yin/ /de ltar gyur na sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyam thag rga 'chi'i skal ba can/ /bdag ni 'phags min 'dod pa la/ /slu bar 'os pa ma yin no/ /e ma shin tu brtan
21a2(mdo 'grel): la stobs ldan khyod kyi sems/ /'dod pa g.yo ba rnams su snying po mthong gyur la/ /shin tu rno zhing 'jigs pa'i yul la zon mdzad cing/ /rga dang rgud pa nang kyi 'jigs pa rnam sems shing/ /'gro ba rnams ni me yis tshig
21a3(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin thos nas/ /zhi ba 'thob min brtan min dga' ba ga la zhig /the tshom med par 'chi zhes rab tu shes pa yi/ /mi rnams gang gi snying la chags ba rab bskyed pa/ /de yi sems ni lcags las gyur par shes pa
21a4(mdo 'grel): ste/ /'jigs pa che la chags pa gang zhig du ba med/ /de nas gzhon nu yis ni 'dod pa rnams kyi rten/ /'joms byed gtam ni rnam par nges pa'i bdag nyid mdzad/ /skye bo rnams kyi mig gi 'gro bya gsal byed kyi/ /
21a5(mdo 'grel): dkyil 'khor sa 'dzin ri bo la ni nub par gyur/ /de nas rgyan tog phreng ba 'bras med 'dzin/ /sgyu rtsal yon tan gyis dang rab dags 'bras med rnams/ /rang gi sems la yid dkrug 'dod pa rnams smad nas/ /yid
21a6(mdo 'grel): la re nyams bud med rnams ni grong du thal/ /de nas grong khyer skyed mas tshal song skye bo'i dpal/ /legs par brtags nas srod la so sor brtul te yang/ /thams cad mi rtag par gyur rnam par sems bzhin du/ /slar yang
21a7(mdo 'grel): mi skyong bdag skyes grong du rnam par zhugs/ /de nas de yi yid na yul la rnam par phyir phyogs rgyal pos thos gyur nas/ /snying la song ba'i zug la glang chen bzhin du mtshan mo de la gnyid ma log /de nas sngags mang
21b1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs lam rnams dag gi thang chang blon por bcas/ /des ni 'dod pa las gzhan sras kyi bla yi nges pa gzigs ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /bud med kyis gegs byas
21b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de ltar yul rnams dam pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis ni/ /sred du bcug kyang shAkya'i rgyal po'i sras po de/ /dug bsgos mda' yis snying la phug pa'i seng ge bzhin/ /
21b3(mdo 'grel): bde brnyed pa ma yin brtan par gshegs ma gyur/ /de nas res dga' zhig na blon po'i bu mkhas shing/ /grogs gyur sna tshogs gtam gyis rjes su 'brangs byas pa/ /nags kyi sa la 'gro 'dod lta bar 'dod pa yis/ mi yi lha yis rjes snang phyi rol
21b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu gshegs/ /gsar pa'i gser gyi srab dang dril bu chung ngu dang/ /rab tu g.yo ba'i rnga yab mdzes pa'i gser rga dang/ /stan bcas dam pa'i rta la mngon par zhon nas ni/ /tog la ljon dang chu skyes tog can bzhin du gshegs/ /
21b5(mdo 'grel): de ni mchog tu rnam par rgyang ring nags mdza' i sa/ /nags tshal 'dod dang sa yi yon tan las gshegs te/ /chu gnyer bzhin du rnam par bkram pa'i bshol lam can/ /nor 'dzin sa la zhing dag rma ba gzigs? par gyur/ /gshol
21b6(mdo 'grel): gyis phye las rnam bkram rtswa myu ka ku sha dang/ /shi gyur 'bu srin srog chags phra mos khyab pa ste/ /rnam par de 'dra'i sa de yang dag mngon gzigs nas/ /rang gi skye bo bsad pa las zhin mya ngan gyur/ /zhing dag rmo ba'i skyes bu rnams
21b7(mdo 'grel): ni rnams gzigs pa/ /rlung gis gtor ba'i rdul gyis rnam 'gyur kha dog can/ /khur bas thang chad rnam par 'khrugs pa'i glang rnams la/ /'phags pa mchog gi mchog tu brtse ba'i snying rje mdzad/ /de nas mgyogs 'gro'i rgyab
22a1(mdo 'grel): nas dal bus babs nas ni/ /sa la rnam par rgyu zhing mya ngan dang ldan pa/ /skye bo dag gi skye dang 'god pa rnam sems shing/ /nges par bkren pa 'di zhes smras shing nyam thag gyur/ /bsam pa yis kyang rnam par
22a2(mdo 'grel): dban? pa mngon bzheng cing/ /rjes su 'ongs pa'i mdza' bshes de rnams phyir bzlog nas/ /kun nas mngon par g.yo zhing mdzes pa'i lo 'dab can/ /'dzam bu'i rtsa ba skye bo med par de gshegs so/ /rin chen bai DUrya
22a3(mdo 'grel): dang mtshungs pa'i rtswa 'jam can/ /gtsang mar ldan pa'i sa gzhi der ni de zhugs te/ /'gro ba'i skye ba dang ni 'god pa rnam sems shing/ /yid ni gnas shing brtan pa'i lam la dmigs pa'o/ /yul la 'dod sogs sems
22a4(mdo 'grel): kyi nang las rnam grol ba'i/ /sems gnas pa ni de ma thag tu thob gyur la/ /bsam gtan dang po zag pa med pa'i rab bskyod pa/ /rtog pa dpyod pa dang bcas zhi ba thob par gyur/ /rnam par dben pa las skyes thob nas
22a5(mdo 'grel): de nas ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba sems kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /yid kyis 'jig rten 'gro ba yang dag rab brtags nas/ /'di nyid de nas gzhan ni rab tu rtogs par gyur/ /kye ma skye bo bkren pa gang zhig rang dbang ni
22a6(mdo 'grel): yod min rga dang na dang rnam par nyams pa'i chos/ /nad pa dang ni shi dang rga bas nyam thag gam/ /gzhan la rgyags pas long zhing shes pa med pas smod/ /'dir ni gal te bdag gis rang dang mtshungs gyur pa/ /gzhan gyi
22a7(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin dag la de ltar smod pa ni/ /mchog gi chos 'di rnam par rtog pa kho bo yi/ /mtshungs par gyur pa ma yin nus pa'ang gzhan med do/ /'gro ba'i rga dang na dang rgung pa'i nyes pa rnams/ /de ltar ji lta ba bzhin rnam par
22b1(mdo 'grel): gzigs te yi/ /stobs dang lang tsho dang ni srog la rab zhugs pa'i/ /bdag tu gyur pa'i rgyags pa skad cig gis med gyur/ /de ni dga' ba med cing rjes su gdung med la/ /the tshom som nyid ma gyur gnyid dang rmugs pa med/ /
22b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la yang dag ma chags shing/ /gzhan la rnam par sdang bar ma gyur phyi shol med/ /de ltar bdag nyid chen po de yi rdul med cing/ /rnam par dag pa'i blo gros 'di ni 'phel gyur la/ /skyes bu gzhan
22b3(mdo 'grel): dag rnams kyis mthong bar ma gyur pa'i/ /dge slong cha lugs ldan pa'i skyes bu nye bar 'ongs/ /su zhig yin pa smos zhes mi yi lha sras kyis/ /de la mngon par dris gyur de la des smras pa/ /mi yi skyes mchog skye dang 'chi bas
22b4(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa yi/ /thar pa'i phyir ni rab tu zhugs pa'i dge sbyong yin/ /bdag ni 'gro ba zad pa'i chos ni thar 'dod cing/ /dge zhing 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas de tshol ba ste/ /yul rnams la ni chogs pa'i nyes pa phyir log pa'o/ /skye
22b5(mdo 'grel): bo med pa'i gnas khang dang ni ri 'am nags/ /shing gi rtsa ba 'ga' zhig tu ni gnas pa yi/ /don dam phyir ni ji ltar nyer ldan slong mo ba/ /sred bral yongs su 'dzin pa med par rnam par rgyu/ /de ltar gzigs pa'i rgyal po'i sras
22b6(mdo 'grel): po de nyid la/ /'di skad smras nas nam mkha' la ni gshegs par gyur/ /de ni de yi lus kyis sangs rgyas gzhan gzigs shing/ /lhan gnas pa de yi dran pa'i ched du 'ongs/ /mkha' la mkha' 'gro bzhin du gshegs pa de
22b7(mdo 'grel): la ni/ /mi mchog yang dag dga' bar gyur cing ya mtshan gyur/ /de nas chos kyi 'du shes nye bar thob gyur nas/ /mngon par nges 'byung cho ga la ni blo gros mdzad/ /de nas dbang po dang mnyam dbang po'i rta thul ba/ /grong 
23a1(mdo 'grel): la rab tu 'jug 'dod rta la rab 'dzegs shing/ /'khor gyi skye bo dag kyang mngon par 'dod pa ste/ /de nyid phyir na mngon 'dod nags ni ma bsten to/ /de ni rga dang 'chi ba zad par byed 'dod pa/ /nags
23a2(mdo 'grel): su gnas phyir blo gros dran pa la bzung nas/ /gnyis 'thung dbang po nags kyis nas grong du ltar/ /'dod pa las min grong la slar yang rab tu zhugs/ /de ni yang dag mthong nas shAkya'i bu mo zhig /rab zhugs lam na thal mo
23a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba dang bcas shing/ /kye ma spyan yangs gang gis bdag po 'di 'dra 'dir/ /mo de bde ma mya ngan 'das ma zhes smras so/ /de nas dbyangs 'di sprin chen dbyangs dang ldan pa yi/ /yongs su thos nas mchog tu zhi ba rnyed gyur
23a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /mya ngan 'das zhes sgra skad thos pa dang ldan des/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba' i chos gar blo gros mdzad/ /de nas gser gyi ri bo'i rtse mo'i sku mnga' zhing/ /glang chen phyag dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs khyu mchog spyan/ /seng ge'i
23a5(mdo 'grel): stobs dang ri bong can gyi zhal mnga' bas/ /mi bzad chos la chags skyes pho brang rab tu thob/ /de nas mtho ris dag na lha yi mdun sa ru/ /lha dbang 'bar ba la ni kun 'gyed gzhon nu bzhin/ /blon po'i tshogs kyis nye bar bsnyen
23a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i mi bdag la/ /ri dags dbang po'i 'gros dang ldan pa mngon par gshegs/ /rab tu btud nas thal mo dang bcas smras gyur pa/ /mi dbang bdag la legs par rjes su gnang ba byin/ /nges par skye bo 'di ni rnam par 'bral
23a7(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ /thar pa'i ched du yongs su rnam par gshags par bgyi/ /de ltar de'i tshigs nges par thos nas rgyal po ni/ /lag ldan gyis ni mngon bsnun ljon pa ltar g.yos shing/ /ka ma la dang rab mtshungs thal mo dag
23b1(mdo 'grel): bzung nas/ /mchi ma dang ni gro ba kha zhing tshig 'di smras/ /brtse ba'i blo gros 'di ni rab tu thong mdzod cig /khyed kyi chos la bsnyen pa'i dus ni ma yin te/ /na tshod dang po dang ni blo gros g.yo ba na/ /chos kyi spyod pa gsungs pa rnams ni
23b2(mdo 'grel): skyon mang ngo/ /yul rnams su ni dbang po ya mtshan glo bur zhing/ /brtul zhugs g.yo ba rnams su nges par nus med la/ /khyad par du ni dben par mngon par mi shes pa/ /dar la bab pa'i yid ni dgon pa nas g.yo'o/ /
23b3(mdo 'grel): mtshon gyur khyod la phun sum tshogs pa gtad nas ni/ /kho bo yi yang chos dga' chos kyi dus yin te/ /rnam par gnon pa brtan pa rnam par gnon pa yis/ /bla ma spangs nas khyod kyi chos kyis chos ma yin/ /de phyir khyod kyis
23b4(mdo 'grel): nan tan nges pa 'di dor la/ /khyod ni re zhig khyim gnas chos la dga' bar gyis/ /dar la bab pas bde ba rnams ni longs spyod nas/ /skyes bu'i dka' thub nags su 'jugs pa nyams dga' o/ /de ltar rgyal po'i tshig 'di rnam par
23b5(mdo 'grel): gsan nas ni/ /ka la bing ka'i dbyangs kyis lan ni smras pa ste/ /rgyal po gal te bdag gi khas len bzhi rnams su/ /khyod kyis 'gyur na dka' thub nags ni mi bsnyen to/ /bdag gi srog ni 'chi ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhing/ /bdag
23b6(mdo 'grel): gi rang gnas gyur 'di nad kyis mi 'phrog la/ /bdag gi lang tsho rgas pa yid ni mi g.yeng zhing/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'di ni rgud pas ma gtor na'o/ /de ltar rnyed par dga' ba'i don smras gyur ba yi/ /sras po la ni shAkya'i rgyal pos
23b7(mdo 'grel): tshig smras pa/ /shin tu rab tu zhugs pa'i blo 'di thong mdzod cig /shin tu yid la re ba 'phya zhing sha thang 'chang/ /de nas lhun po ltar lcis bla ma la smras pa/ /gal te rim pa de dag med de shol mi thabs/ /'bar ba'i me yis tshig
24a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i khang pa nas/ /phyi rol 'byung bar 'dod pa 'dzin par nus ma yin/ /gang gi tshe na 'gro ba nges par 'bral ba ste/ /chos phyir ma yin 'di ni rnam par 'bral bar mchog /'o na bdag la 'chi bas dbang
24a2(mdo 'grel): med 'bral byed cing/ /rang gi don ma byas shing tshim pa ma yin nyid/ /de ltar mthar bzheng sras po de yis nges pa ni/ /sa yis bdag po yis ni nges par thos nas ni/ /'gro bar mi bya zhes ni mngon par brjod nas su/ /
24a3(mdo 'grel): slar yang bsrung ba dag ni 'dod pa mchog rnams mdzad/ /dga' zhing zhi ba sngon 'gro bkur sti mang po las/ /blon po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin dpe bstan cing/ /bla mas mchi ma lhung ba rnams kyi shol btab ste/ /de
24a4(mdo 'grel): nas de ni mya ngan bzhin du khyim la zhugs/ /rna lung mkhyil ba g.yo bas 'o byas gdong ldan ma/ /dbugs rlung stug pos rnam par bskyod pa'i nu ma can/ /brtan pa min pa'i mig ldan bud med rnams kyis ni/ /ri dags mo
24a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis bzhin mngon par gyen du lta/ /gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra dkar ser mdog de ni/ /yan lag mchog ma rnams kyi snying ni myos mdzad cing/ /ngag dang reg bya dang ni lus dang yon tan gyis/ /thos byed lus
24a6(mdo 'grel): dang lta byed bdag gi dngos rnams phrog /nyin mo rnam par thal che de nas khang bzangs la/ /lus kyis nyi ma bzhin du mngon par gsal ba ni/ /rab rib rnam par 'joms 'dod bdag nyid snang ba yis/ /nyi ma
24a7(mdo 'grel): shar ba lhun po la bzhin kun nas 'dzegs/ /gser gyis 'bar zhing gsal ba'i sgron ma'i shing dang ni/ /a ka ru mchog nag po'i bdug mas gang ba'i ltor/ /mngon par 'dzegs nas rdo rje spras shing sna tshogs
24b1(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rab mchog gser gyi bzhugs gdan la ni bsnyen pa'o/ /zla ba ltar dkar gangs dang ldan pa'i rtse mo na/ /nor dbang bdag nyid skyes la lha mo'i tshogs 'dus bzhin/ /de nas lus mchog ma rnams dbang po dang mtshungs
24b2(mdo 'grel): mchog /de la mtshan mor sil snyan rnams kyi nye bar gnas/ /mchog rab lha yi sil snyen 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang/ /de yang de yis bskyed par ma gyur dga' ba med/ /dam pa'i don gyi bde phyir legs pa de yi ni/ /mngon par
24b3(mdo 'grel): nges par 'byung 'dod gang la dga' ma gyur/ /de nas der ni brtul zhugs mchog gyur 'og min gyi/ /lha rnams kyis ni 'di yi nges pa rtogs nas ni/ /lus kyi rnam 'gyur rnam bar 'gyur byas dus gcig la/ /mos pa'i skye bo
24b4(mdo 'grel): rnams ni gnyid du 'gro bar byas/ /de la kha cig dga' ba yin yang 'khros pa bzhin/ /pang du son pa'i gser gyi snod na sna tshogs pa'i/ /pi wang rnam par spangs nas lag pa g.yo ba la/ /'gram pa rnam par bkod nas nyal bar gyur
24b5(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /'khyog min bum pa'i phreng ba sgra sgrog pad+ma dang/ /chu bo'i ngogs na chu spul rab tu rgod pa bzhin/ /gzhan rnams nu mar rnam nyil dkar po'i dar gon zhing/ /gling bu lag par 'byar zhing gnyid log rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin
24b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan rnams pad+ma gsar pa'i snying po ltar/ /'jam zhing gdung bya gser gyis 'bar ba'i dpung rgyan ni/ /'dus pa'i lag pa dag gis dga' ba bzhin du ni/ /rdza rnga nyid ni yongs su 'khyud nas gnyid log gyur/ /de bzhin gzhan ni
24b7(mdo 'grel): gsar ba'i gser gyis rnam brgyan cing/ /bgo ba'i gos ni ser po mchog dag gon pa ste/ /dkar ni ka ri yal ga glang pos bskyel ba bzhin/ /dbang med par ni sdug ma gnyid kyis 'gyel bar gyur/ /de bzhin gzhan ni skar?
25a1(mdo 'grel): khung logs la sngas nas ni/ /nyal bar gyur pa'i lus kyi mchod sdong rnam 'khyog pa/ /rta babs la ni shA la b+han dza ka bzhin du/ /mdzes pa'i do shal rnam par 'phyang ba rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi
25a2(mdo 'grel): zhal gyi pad+ma rnam rgyas shing/ /'gram pa'i logs la nor bu'i rna lung gis dmugs pa/ /mdab ma brgya pa'i sdong bu'i phyed ni khyog pa la/ /gnas pa'i ka ra Ni Da bas skyod bzhin g.yos par gyur/ /gzhan ni ji ltar rnam par zhugs
25a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gnyid log cing/ nu ma'i khur gyis mngon par dud pa'i lus po rnams/ /lag pa'i zhags pa gser gyi gdu bu can rnams kyis/ /phan tshun nye bar 'khyung nas rnam par gnas te mdzes pa'o/ /rnam par g.yo zhing bskyod pa'i
25a4(mdo 'grel): gser gyi skud pa can/ /rna ba'i shog dril kun nas 'khrugs pa'i gdong gis ni/ /yongs su smra ldan pi wang chen po 'khyud nas ni/ /bud med kha cig grogs mo bzhin du gnyid log go /lang tsho ma gzhan lag pa'i dpung pa'i
25a5(mdo 'grel): yul las ni/ /kun nas rnam 'phyang mdzes pa'i logs can paN wa/ /sgeg bcas dga' ba'i mthar ni thang chad sdug pa bzhin/ /brla gnyis dag ni dbus su blangs nas nyal ba'o/ /rab tu yang dag 'khums gyur pad+ma dmar
25a6(mdo 'grel): po'i mdzod/ /nyi ma nub par gyur tshe rdzing bu rnams ji ltar/ /rnam rgyas mig dang mdzes pa'i smin ma yod na yang/ /gzhan rnams mig rnams btsums shing mdzes par ma gyur to/ /de bzhin gzhan ni mgo skyes lhod pa las 'khrugs
25a7(mdo 'grel): shing/ /rgyan dang dar rnams dpyi la rnam nyil de rnams ni/ /yan lag ma yi gzugs brnyan glang pos bcom pa bzhin/ /mgrin pa'i skud pa'i do shal rnam par bkram zhing nyal/ /brtan ldan lus ni yon tan rnams dang
25b1(mdo 'grel): ldan na yang/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni dbang med ngo tshas rnam spangs shing/ /rnam par 'gyur zhing bskyod pa'i yan lag gya gyu dang/ /dbugs ni rnam par rgyu zhing lus po gsal bar gnyid/ /gzhan ni rgyan dang me tog phreng ba rnam brul
25b2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /mdud pa'i gos rnams rnam par nyil gyur 'du shes med/ /btsums pa ma yin dkar po g.yo ba dang bral mig/ srog song ro ltar nyal ba rnam par mdzes mar gyur/ /kha sbyar rnam par gdangs te lus po rab brkyang
25b3(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /kha yi chu ni rab 'dzag gsang ba rnam rab gsal/ /gzhan ma dag ni chang gis 'khrul par gyur pa nyid/ /lus rgyas rnam par 'gyur bar gnyid log mdzes ma gyur/ /de ltar sems pa dang ni rigs kyi rjes 'gro'i gzugs
25b4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs rab myos skye bo de nyal ba/ /rlung gis kun nas bskyod gyur gser gyi pad+ma yi/ /rdzing bu dang ni mtshungs pa'i gzugs ni mdzes par gyur/ /de ltar rnam par 'gyur la brtan min spyod pa can/ /de ltar nyal ba'i lang
25b5(mdo 'grel): tsho ldan ma de mthong nas/ /lus ni yon tan ldan zhing smra ba yid 'ong yang/ /mi skyong sras po des ni rnam par smad par gyur/ /mi gtsang rnam par 'gyur ba gson pa'i 'jig rten te/ /bud med rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo 'di 'dra ba//
25b6(mdo 'grel): bgo ba rnams kyang rgyan rnams kyis kyang slu ba ste/ /bud med rnams kyis yul la skyes ba chags par 'gro/ gal te skyes pas bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /rmi lam rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin du rnam dpyad na/ /nges par
25b7(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni bag med 'phel ba ma yin la/ /'on kyang yon tan rtog pa bcom ste chags par 'gro/ de ltar de yi go skabs rnam par rig nas ni/ /mtshan mor phyir ru 'gro 'dod yang dag skyes par gyur/ /'di yis sems ni kun nas
26a1(mdo 'grel): rtog nas de nas ni/ /lha rnams dag gis khang pa'i sgo ni phye bar gyur/ /de nas lang tsho ldan ma nyal ba de rnams ni/ /smad cing de ni lding khang logs nas babs pa ste/ /mngon par babs nas de nas som
26a2(mdo 'grel): nyi rnam bral bar/ /khang pa'i rim pa dang por phyir ru rnam par gshegs/ /de ni mgyogs 'gro bsrung la go bar byas nas ni/ /skyen par 'dun pa la ni 'di skad ces smras so/ /bsngags ldan rta ni khyer shog myur ba dang ldan
26a3(mdo 'grel): pas/ /bdud rtsi thob phyir 'di las di ring bdag sgom mo/ /bdag gi snying la de ring tshim pa skyes gyur cing/ /nges pa yang ste ji ltar blo gros la zhugs la/ /skye bo me pa la yang mgon dang ldan pa ste/ /nges par 'dod pa'i
26a4(mdo 'grel): don ni mngon du phyogs par 'du/ /ngo tsha nyid dang yang dag 'dud pa spangs nas ni/ /lang tsho ma rnams bdag gi gdod du ji bzhin nyal/ /sgo ni rang bzhin ji ltar rnam par bye ba la/ /nges par bdag ni 'di nas di ring 'gro ba'i dus//
26a5(mdo 'grel): mi dbang bstan pa'i don ni rnam par rig na yang/ /jo go bka' lung des ni de nas rab bzung nas/ /yid la pha rol po yis yang dag bskul ba bzhin/ /mgyogs 'gro khyer te 'ong ba la ni blo gros byas/ /de nas gdong
26a6(mdo 'grel): gi gser gyi srab kyis gang ba ste/ /rgyab na yang ba'i stan g.yogs dag gis nye bar g.yogs/ /stobs dang sems pa mgyogs dang rjes 'gro nyer ldan pa/ /de yis rta mchog de la der ni nye bar 'ongs/ /snga ma'i
26a7(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba rtsib log gsum ga rab rgyas shing/ /rgyab dang rna ba lus skyes spu ni thung zhing dul/ /rgyab kyi rtsib ma dag ni dung cing rnam rgyal la/ /mchu dang dpral ba brang dang dbyi ni rab rgyas pa'o/ /zhi zhing ka ma la dang mtshungs pa'i phyag gis
26b1(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /sku stod rnam par spangs des de la nyer 'khyud nas/ /rgyal mtshan sde la dmag dpon rab tu 'jug pa bzhin/ /mngar mo'i yi ge'i tshig gis zhal ta mdzad pa'o/ /g.yul du khyod la mngon par zhon nas sa skyong gis/ /dgra bo
