26b2(mdo 'grel): rnams ni lan grangs mang por nges par gtor/ /bdag kyang 'chi med go 'phang ji ltar ba bzhin du/ /mgyogs 'gro'i gtso bo nye bar thob pa de ltar mdzod/ /yul thob bde ba la dang nor bsgrub pa la rung/ /g.yul 'gyed pa na
26b3(mdo 'grel): 'khor ni nges par rnyed bla ste/ /rgyud par lhung ba la dang chos la brten par rung/ /skyes bu yi yang 'khor ni rnyed par dka' ba'o/ /'di nyid du yang gang zhig 'khor du gyur pa ni/ /sdig pa'i las la dang ni chos dang ldan la rung//
26b4(mdo 'grel): ji ltar bdag gi nang gi bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa/ mi de rnams kyang de yi cha shas skal ba yis/ /de phyir chos dang ldan pa 'di ni yongs shes nas/ /bdag ni 'di las nges 'byung 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /mgyogs
26b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro mchog skye shugs dang rnam par gnon pa yis/ /bdag phan la dang 'gro phan la ni 'bad par gyis/ /de ltar mdza' shes bzhin du rjes su bslabs nas ni/ /mgyogs 'gro mchog la mi mchog 'gro 'dod de/ /dkar la
26b6(mdo 'grel): dkar min 'gros kyi 'od zer lus ldan pa/ /nyi ma ston ka'i sprin la bzhin du yang dag 'dzegs/ /de nas 'khor gyi skye bos go bar byed pa'i skad/ /mtshan mor gtum pa dam pa'i rta des yongs bkag cing/ /'gram pa'i sgra
26b7(mdo 'grel): med 'tsher ba'i skad ni rab zhi bar/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni dor ba'i gem pa'i 'gros kyis gshegs/ /gser gyi gdu bu'i rgyan ni lag pa'i 'khrim ma la/ /ka ma la 'dras ka ma la rnams rnam byas nas/ /lus 'dud gnod
27a1(mdo 'grel): sbyin rnams ni de nas 'di yis ni/ /tshim gyur lag pa'i rtse mos rmig pa rnam bzung ngo/ /lci mo'i sgo gtan sgo glegs yang dag bcas pa gang/ /bde par gnyis mthung gis kyang phyed pa ma yin pa/ /mi skyong sras
27a2(mdo 'grel): po gshegs tshe skang med grong khyer dang/ /sgo khang de rnams rang nyid rnam par bye bar gyur/ /mngon par gdong phyogs yab dang sras po byi pa dang/ /skye bo rjes su chags dang phun tshogs mchog dang ni/ /blo gros byas shing ltas pa
27a3(mdo 'grel): med par dor nas ni/ /yab kyi grong nas de ci de nas rnam par gshags/ /de nas de ni rnam rgyal 'dam skyes yangs pa'i spyan/ /grong khyer kun nas gzigs nas seng ge'i sgra bsgrogs pa/ /skye dang 'chi ba dag gis pha rol ma mthong
27a4(mdo 'grel): bar/ grong khyer ser skya zhes bya rab tu mi 'jug go /de ltar de yi gsung 'di nges par thos nas ni/ /nor gyi bdag po'i 'khor rnams dag ni dga' bar gyur/ /rab tu dga' ba'i yid can lha yi tshogs rnams ni/ /nan tan
27a5(mdo 'grel): pha rol song ba de la bsngags pa byas/ /me yi lus can mtho ris gnas pa gzhan rnams ni/ /'di yi nges pa shin tu dka' ba rnam rig nas/ /sprin stug gseb nas zla ba'i 'od zer 'thon pa bzhin/ /mtshan mo'i mun pa'i
27a6(mdo 'grel): lam ni rab tu bsal bar byas/ /nyi ma'i mgyogs 'gro lta bu'i mgyogs 'gro de/ /yid kyis sprul pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu bzhin du/ /shing rta 'dren pas gzi nyams skar ldan par snang la/ /de ni shin tu mang po'i dpag
27a7(mdo 'grel): tshang rnams su gshegs/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ phyi rol tu mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas 'gro mig nyi ma ni/ /mngon par shes pa'i
27b1(mdo 'grel): yul tsam na/ /ngan spong bu yi dka' thub gnas/ /mi mchog des ni gzigs par gyur/ /blo phab gnyid log ri dags dang/ /rang gnas gnas par bya gang zhig/ /gzigs nas ngal bsos bzhin du dang/ /don ni byas pa bzhin du
27b2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de ni rgyags pa med don dang/ /dka' thub mchog pa'i don nyid dang/ /rang gi rjes su bsrung ba la/ /rta yi rgyab nas babs par gyur/ /mngon par babs nas kyang reg cing/ /dga' zhing mig gis 'khru ba bzhin/
27b3(mdo 'grel): nges par 'khor zhes rta dang ni/ /'dun pa la ni smras pa'o/ /'di ni mkha' lding dper mgyogs la/ /mgyogs 'gro la ni rjes su 'ongs/ /'dis ni bdag gis stobs dang ni/ /zhi ba bdag la gus pa brtan/ /thams
27b4(mdo 'grel): cad nas don gzhan yin kyang/ /khyod kyis snying la bzung ba ste/ /gang gi jo bo dag la dga' / /'di ni de 'dra dag la nyid/ /gus pa med la nus pa yod/ /nus pa med la gus pa ldan/ /gus pa ldan dang nus pa ste/ /khyod
27b5(mdo 'grel): 'dra sa stengs rnyed par dka' / /de phyir skal ba chen po'i las/ /khyod kyi 'dis ni bdag dga' o/ /gang zhig khyod kyi bsams pa 'di/ /'bras bu las kyang gzhan du phyogs/ /skye bo 'bras bu la gnas pa'i/ /mthun phyogs skye
27b6(mdo 'grel): bo gang gis min/ /zlog la rang gi skye bo yang/ /phal chen pha rol skye bor gyur/ /rigs kyi don du bu bzung zhing/ gsos pa'i don du pha bskyed la/ /srid pa'i bsam pas chags skye ste/ /byed pa med par rang nyid med/ /mang po
27b7(mdo 'grel): brjod cing mdor bsdus nas/ /bdag gi dga' chen legs byas te/ /rta blangs nas ni phyir log dang/ /bdag ni 'dod pa'i gnas rab thob/ /de skad smras nas phyag chen de/ /rjes su bsngags pa byed 'dod pas/ /rgyan rnams kun nas
28a1(mdo 'grel): btogs nas ni/ /gdung sems ldan pa'i nga la byin/ /dbu rgyan dag nas nor bu gsal/ /sgron ma'i las la blangs nas ni/ /nyi ma 'bigs byed la bzhin des/ /tshig 'di smras bzhin bzhugs par gyur//
28a2(mdo 'grel): 'dun ba nor bu 'di long la/ /lan mang btud nas mi skyong ni/ /kun nas gdung ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /blo phebs par ni gsol bar bya/ /skye dang 'chi ba nyams don du/ /dka' thub nags tshal rab thob ste/ /mtho ris skom bas
28a3(mdo 'grel): nges min zhing/ /brtse ba med min khros pa min/ /de phyir de ltar mngon byung ba/ /bdag la mya ngan 'os ma yin/ /yun rings 'dus par gyur nas kyang/ /dus kyis 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /gang phyir nges par 'bral ba ste/ /de
28a4(mdo 'grel): phyir thar phyir bdag gi blo/ /slar yang rang gi skye bo las/ /rnams par 'bral ba gang las min/ mya ngan spong phyir nges 'byung ba/ /bdag la mya ngan 'os ma yin/ /mya ngan rgyud ni 'dod la chags/ /chags pa can la mya ngan bya/ /'di
28a5(mdo 'grel): yang snga ma rnams la grags/ /kho bo cag la nges par gnas/ /de ltar ster byar gyur pas na/ /mya ngan 'os min lam gyis 'gro/ /skyes bu rnams la phyin log tu/ /nor gyis gter byar gyur pa ste/ /sa la chos kyi bdag po
28a6(mdo 'grel): yang/ /rnyed dka' yang na mi yin no/ /gang yang 'di ni dus min par/ /nags su song ba yin zhe na/ /srog kyang g.yo bar gyur pa na/ /chos la dus yong ma yin no/ /de phyir da lta nyid du bdag/ /dge ba bsag ces nges pa de/ /
28a7(mdo 'grel): 'chi ba'i dgra ni gnas pa na/ /gson pa la ni blo gtang cing/ /zhi ba khyod kyis de la sogs/ /sa 'dzin bdag la zhu bya ste/ /ji ltar bdag ni mi dran pa/ /de ltar nyid du 'bad pa gyis/ /gzhan yang bdag la yon tan med/ /khyod
28b1(mdo 'grel): kyis mi bdag la smra bya/ /yon tan med las brtse ba 'dor/ /brtse ba dor las mya ngan med/ /de ltar tshig 'di thos gyur nas/ /'dun pa gdung bas rnam 'khrugs shing/ /mchi mas 'dud pa'i tshig nyid kyis/ /thal mo sbyar
28b2(mdo 'grel): te lan gsol pa/ /jo bo khyed kyi dgongs pa ni/ /gnyen la ral ba ster ba 'dis/ /chu bo'i 'gram na gnyis 'thung bzhin/ /bdag gi sems 'di 'gyur ba'o/ /khyod kyi nges pa 'di lta bus/ /su yis mchi ma 'byung ba med//
28b3(mdo 'grel): lcags las gyur ba'i snying la'ang ste/ /brtsebs 'khrug la smos ci dgos/ /gzhal med khang gi lam 'os pa'i/ /shin tu gzhon nu 'di gang na/ /ku sha'i myu gu rno ba can/ /dka' thub nags kyis gang na/ /khyod kyi 'bad pa
28b4(mdo 'grel): thos nas kyang/ /rta gang bdag gis blangs pa 'di/ /mgon po de ni stobs kyis ni/ /lha yis byed du bcug pa 'dra/ /khyod kyi nan tan nges pa 'di/ /rang dbang shes na gang gi phyir/ /nye bar len te mgyogs 'gro'i rta/ /ser
28b5(mdo 'grel): skya'i gzhi yi mya ngan gnas/ /med pa po yis dam chos bzhin/ /rgyal po brtse ba bgres pa dang/ /sras po sdug go 'dor ba ni/ /phyag chen de ni 'os ma yin/ /dam pa'i bya ba byed bcom bzhin/ /yang dag bskyed pas yongs su ni/ /
28b6(mdo 'grel): thang chad gnyis pa'i ma de dang/ /lha mo brjod par 'os ma yin/ /ma ni rigs ni dpal thob bzhin/ /sras po byis pa yon tan ldan/ /rigs btsun bdag po'i brtul shugs ma/ /lha mo 'dor bar 'os ma yin/ /bsngags 'os sras
28b7(mdo 'grel): po grags pa 'dzin/ /snyan grags chos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /bzhen pa ldan pas grogs mchog bzhin/ /byis pa 'dor bar 'os ma yin/ /ci ste gnyen dang rgyal srid dag/ 'dor ba nyid du blo gros mdzad/ /bdag gis 'gros
29a1(mdo 'grel): ni khyod zhabs na/ /khyab bdag bdag 'dor 'os ma yin/ /ra g+hu'i bu ni bshes bzang bzhin/ /khyod ni dgon par dor nas su/ /me yis tshig pa'i sems kyis ni/ /grong du 'gro bar nus pa med/ /khyod 'dor grong du 'gro
29a2(mdo 'grel): ba na/ /rgyal pos bdag la ci zhig gsung/ /khyod kyi btsun mo'i 'khor du 'am/ /'os pa mthong na ci zhig smra/ /gang yang yon tan med pa yang/ /mi bdag la smros gsung ba yang/ /skyon med thub pa'i bzhin khyod kyi/ /ma gyur pa
29a3(mdo 'grel): de ci zhig smra/ /ngo tsha dang bcas sems kyis ni/ /lce ni thogs par gyur ba yis/ /bdag ni gal te yang smra ba/ /de la dad par 'os pas su/ /gang zhig zla ba'i rno bar/ /smra bar dad par 'dzin pa 'am/ /khyod kyis skyon shes
29a4(mdo 'grel): des skyon ni/ /smra ba dad par 'dzin pa 'am/ /rtag tu rjes su brtse bcas dang/ /rtag par snying rje shes pa yi/ /brtse ba spong ba tshul min te/ /phyir log bdag la bka' i drin mdzod/ /de ltar mya ngan gyis non pa'i/ /'dun
29a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshig 'di gsan gyur nas/ /rang gnas mchog tu brtan pa yis/ /smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsal to/ /'dun pa bdag dang bral ba la/ /kun nas gdung ba 'di thong zhig /lus can 'gro ba tha dad la/ /dgos pa sna tshogs
29a6(mdo 'grel): nges pa yin/ /gang yang brtse las rang gi skye/ /bdag gis rang ni mi 'dor te/ /'chi bas phan tshun dbang med par/ /bdag cag rnams ni 'dor bar 'gyur/ /sred pa chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi/ /mngal gang gis ni bdag
29a7(mdo 'grel): bzung ste/ /'bral med 'bad pa ma de yis/ /bdag su bdag gi de su yin/ /ji ltar sgong skyes gnas shing la/ /yang dag 'dus nas rnam par bral/ /de ltar 'byung po 'dus pa ni/ /nges par 'bral ba'i mdza' yin no/ /ji
29b1(mdo 'grel): ltar sprin rnams 'dus nas ni/ /slar yang rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /de ltar 'du dang 'bral ba ni/ /bdag dang srog chags rnams kyi lugs/ /gang phyir phyir na 'jig rten 'di/ /bslus nas rnam par 'bral ba ste/ /de phyir rmi lam 'dus gyur la/ /
29b2(mdo 'grel): bdag gi ba nyid bzod ma yin/ /shing rnams 'dab ma dmar po dang/ /lhan cig skyes te rnam par 'bral/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'bral bar ni/ /'gyur ba ma yin smos ci dgos/ /de phyir de ltar gyur na ni/ /zhi ba gdung ba ma byed song/ /gal te yang
29b3(mdo 'grel): ni brtse ba 'babs/ /song nas kyang ni slar yang shog /kho bo cag la ltos byas pa'i/ /ser skya'i gzhi ni skye bo la/ /der song brtse ba thong zhig dang/ /'di yi nges la nyon cig smros/ /rga dang 'chi ba zang byas nas/ /yang na myur du 'ong ba'i gtam/ /rtsom pa
29b4(mdo 'grel): nyams shing don ma byas/ /yang na nyams par 'gyur ba smros/ /de ltar 'di yi tshig thos nas/ /bsngags ldan mgyogs 'gro'i mchog gis ni/ /lce yis zhabs la rab blngags te/ mchi ma dron mo phyung bar gyur/ /dran pa dang ni bkra
29b5(mdo 'grel): shis rtags/ /'khor lo dbus ldan phyag gis ni/ /gzhon nus de la reg gyur cing/ /na tshod bzhin du rnam par smras/ /bsngags ldan mchi ma ma 'don cig /dam pa'i rta nyid 'di bstan to/ /sron mdzod khyod kyi dal ba 'dis/ /myur du 'bras bu bcas
29b6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de nas ral gri rnon po nor bu'i yu ba can/ /gser gyi phra ni sna tshogs dang ldan 'dun pa yi/ /lag na yang dag gnas pa brtan pa des bsnams nas/ /khung bu dag nas sprul bzhin zhugs nas rab tu drangs/ /utpa la yi 'dab ma
29b7(mdo 'grel): sngon po de drangs nas/ /sna tshogs dbu rgyan dbu skrar bcas pa rab bcad cing/ /rdzing bu dag na dad pa bzhin du rnam bkram pa/ /'od zer dang ldan par snang rag la de gtor ro/ /mi chod pa mngon par 'dod phyir rnam mang bkur sti'i phyir/ /lha ni gnas
30a1(mdo 'grel): pas rab tu bkram pa de bzung ste/ /ji lta ba bzhin de ni lha ni lha tshogs rnams/ /lha yi khyad par 'phags pa rnams kyis mchod par byas/ /rgyan gyi bu smad ldan pa rnam par spangs nas kyang/ /dbu las dpal ni rnam par rgyang ring
30a2(mdo 'grel): byas nas ni/ /nags su gser gyi ngang pa'i mtshon ma gos gzigs nas/ /brtan pa des ni gos dag mngon par 'dod par gyur/ /de nas lha ni gnas par rig dags rngon pa'i lus/ /dgongs pa rnam dag 'di yi dgongs pa rnams rigs nas/ /
30a3(mdo 'grel): kha bsgyur ngur smrig gos can nyer logs mngon par 'ongs/ /de la shAkya'i rgyal po skyes kyis mngon par smras/ /khyod kyi dge yi ngur smrig drang srong rgyal mtshan dang/ /'tsho ba byed pa'i gzhung 'di rigs pa ma yin te/ /de phyir zhi ba gal te 'dir ni chags
30a4(mdo 'grel): med na/ /bdag la rab tu byin la 'di dang 'di snoms mdzod/ /rngon pas smras pa 'dod sbyin 'dod pa snying po las/ /'di yis blo ni phab nas ri dags rnams gsod do/ /brgya byin mtshungs pa gang de 'dis ni don 'gyur na/ /e ma rab tu bzhes la
30a5(mdo 'grel): dkar po de gsol mdzod/ /de nas de ni mchog tu rab tu dga' ba yis/ /nags su byung ba'i na bza' blangs shing gos dor la/ /sngon pa nyid kyang lha yi lus nyid rnam bzung ste/ /dkar po de nyid blangs nas lha ni gshegs par gyur/ /de nas gzhon
30a6(mdo 'grel): nu dang ni rta mchog skyong ba des/ /de ltar gshegs pa de la ya mtshan skyes gyur te/ /nags nas byung ba'i na bza' nyid dang de la ni/ /slar yang ri mor bya ba mang po skyen par mdzad/ /de nas gdong ni mchi ma dang bcas 'dun pa rnams bzlog nas/ /bdag
30a7(mdo 'grel): nyid chen po brtan dang grags pa 'chang ba ste/ /mtshams kyi sprin gyis g.yogs pa'i skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin/ /ngur smrig gyon zhing gdung gnas gang yin de nas gshegs/ /de nas de ltar jo bo rgyal srid mi bzhed par/ /dka' thub nags su
30b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa mdog nyams snang ba na/ /mgyogs 'gro 'chad de phyag rgyas gyen du bskyod byas nas/ /shin tu rnam par du zhing sa la 'gyel gyur to/ /rnam par bltas nas slar yang sgra bcas par du zhing/ /bsngags ldan rta la lag pa ngag gis nyer
30b2(mdo 'grel): 'khyud nas/ /de nas kho chang yang dang yang du zlos bzhin du/ /lus kyi song bar gyur kyang sems kyis ma yin no/ /la lar rab tu sems shing la lar rnam par du/ /la lar sa la rab tu 'brad cing la lar 'gyel/ /de nas 'gro bzhin gus pa'i dbang gi sdug bsngal
30b3(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /dbang med lam na bya ba mang po byas ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /sngags ldan phyir la bzlog pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas 'dun po du zhing gdong ni mchi ma can/ /bzlog nas nags su 'dun
30b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i dka' thub chags med pa/ /don kun grub pa'i lus kyis mngon par zil mnan nas/ /dka' thub gnas te grub pa bzhin du rab tu thob/ /de nas ri dags rgyal po'i 'gros can rgyal po'i sras po de/ /ri dags gnas der ri dags bzhin du rab zhugs pa/ /phun
30b5(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams dang bral yang lus kyi phun tshogs kyis/ /dka' thub gnas ldan kun gyi mig ngag phrogs par gyur/ /khur ldan rnams bzhin mgo po rnams ni phyed bdud pas/ /lag na gnya' shing bcas par 'gro gyur ya mtshan las/ /de bzhin 'khor
30b6(mdo 'grel): los sgyur ba chung ma dang bcas pa/ /dbang po dang mtshungs de mthong song bar ma gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg bud shing phyir ni bram ze rnams phyir nas/ /me tog lo 'dab thob pa'i lag pa gtsang ma rnams/ /dka' thub gtso bo rnams ni blo rnams byas na yang/ /gshegs
30b7(mdo 'grel): pa mthong ste klog grar sang bar ma gyur to/ /chu gter sngon po bzhin du mthong nas rma bya rnams/ /dga' zhing gyen du dud cing skad dag 'don gyur la/ /rgya skyags ri dags spyod ldan rnams dang ri dags rnams/ /'bru rnams bor nas mngon par gdong phyogs gnas par gyur//
31a1(mdo 'grel): 'od zer ldan pa shar ba lta bur 'bar ba yis/ /bu ram shing ba'i rigs kyi sgron ma de mthong nas/ /sbyin sreg 'jo rnams bzhos pa yin na yang/ /rab tu dga' ba skyes te rab tu 'jo gyur to/ /'di ni nor sbyin rnams kyi brgyad pa yin nam ci/ /tha
31a2(mdo 'grel): skar dag gi nang nas gcig ni 'phos sam zhes/ /de mthong ba la ya mtshan skyes par gyur pa yi/ /thub pa rnams kyi tshig der mthon por sgrogs par gyur/ /lha yi khyu mchog gnyis pa'i lus po lta bu dang/ /'jig rten rgyu dang mi rgyu'i snying po lta bu dang/ /gang 'dod
31a3(mdo 'grel): pa yis nyi ma mngon par babs 'dra ba/ /des ni nags tshal mdza' dag rab tu snang bar mdzad/ /de nas gdung gnas pa de rnams kyi ji lta bzhin/ /nye bar snyan gsan phab cing mngon par mchod gyur la/ /de ni chu bcas chu 'dzin lta bu'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /chos
31a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin rnams la slar yang rab tu mchod par gyur/ /de nas rnam par thar bzhes brtan pa de yis ni/ /dka' thub sna tshogs rnams la nges par rnam gzigs shing/ /mtho ris mngon 'dod bsod nams byas pa'i skye ba yis/ /khyab pa'i dka' thub gnas
31a5(mdo 'grel): der rjes su spyad par gyur/ /dka' thub nor can rnams kyi dka' thub nags tshal der/ /dka' thub rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni nges gsan nas/ /rjes su gshegs pa'i dka' thub ldan pa kha cig la/ /zhi bas de nyid rnam par shes bzheng? 'di gsungs so/ /gang
31a6(mdo 'grel): phyir chos kyi cho ga 'di ni mi shes pa/ /bdag gis dka' thub gnas mthong de ring snga ma'o/ /de phyir khyod kyis bdag la smra bar 'os min te/ /nges pa gang zhig gang la rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /de nas dka' thub rnam par rgyu ba'i gnyis skyes nges/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog
31a7(mdo 'grel): khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa po/ /de la rim gyis dka' thub khyad par rnams dang ni/ /dka' thub 'bras bu dang bcas gtam dag byas pa'o/ /grong byung bza' ba ma yin chu la rab skyes pa'i/ /'dab ma rnams dang chu dang 'bras bu rtsa ba nyid/ /thub pa rnams kyi spyod
31b1(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni lung ji ltar/ /dka' thub rnams kyi rnam rtog tha dad de de'o/ /kha cig ri dags bzhin du rtswa rnams la spyod de/ /gzhan rnams bor ba yis ni mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya ltar 'tshe?/ /kha cig lag 'gro rnams dang lhan cig 'tsho ba ste/ /grog mkhar gyur pa rnams ni
31b2(mdo 'grel): nags na rlung gis so/ /rdo yis rab 'bad bsgrub pa'i spyod pa gzhan rnams te/ /kha cig rang gi so yis nye bar blangs shing za/ /de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan gyis don du btsos byas nas/ /gal te lhag ma yod na bya ba byed pa'o/ /chu yis gsher ba'i ral pa'i tshogs
31b3(mdo 'grel): can kha cig ni/ /gsang sngags sngon 'gro lan gnyis me la sbyin sreg cing/ /kha cig nya dang mnyam par chu la rnams zhugs nas/ /rus sbal bzhin du lus rnams rab tu bskum pa'o/ /de ltar dus su bsags pa'i dka' thub nags tshogs kyi/ /mchog gis
31b4(mdo 'grel): lhar 'gro gzhan gyis mi yi 'jig rten te/ /sdug bsngal lam gyis bde ba nye bar thob phyir dang/ /chos kyi rtsa ba bde ba nyid du gsungs phyir ro/ /de skad ces sogs rkang gnyis dbang po'i sras po yis/ /dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de yi tshig gsan nas/ /de
31b5(mdo 'grel): nyid gzigs pa min yang ngom par ma gyur la/ /bdag tu song ba 'di ni dal bus gsungs par gyur/ /sdug bsngal bdag nyid dka' thub rnam pa dum ste/ /dka' thub dag gi 'bras bu mtho ris gtso bo'o/ /'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'gyur ba dang ldan la//
31b6(mdo 'grel): nyung ngu la dal 'di ni gdung gnas rnams kyi'o/ /'phangs pa rnams dang gnyen dang yul rnams bor nas ni/ /gang zhig mtho ris phyir ni rnam par spyod byed la/ /de rnams rnam par bral te nges par 'gro 'dod la/ /slar yang shin tu 'ching ba chen po nyid yin no/ /
31b7(mdo 'grel): lus kyi dal dub gdung ba'i bya ba rnams kyis ni/ /'dod pa'i rgyu las rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i skyon rnams yongs su mi rtogs par/ /sdug bsngal gyis des sdug bsngal kho na rjes su tshol/ /'chi las skye dgu rnams kyi rtag par
32a1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa ste/ /'bad pa yis ni slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod/ /rab tu zhugs par gyur na nges par 'chi ba ste/ /'di nyid du ni gang las 'jigs pa rnams lhung ngo/ /'di yi don du gcig rnams dal bar rab 'jug cing/ /gzhan
32a2(mdo 'grel): rnams mtho ris don du dal ba 'thob pa ste/ /bde ba'i don du sred pa'i bkren pa don ma byas/ /gson ba'i 'jig rten nges par don med nyid du lhung/ /gang zhig dman pa dor nas khyad 'phags 'gro ba can/ /'bad pa 'di ni nges par smad pa ma yin la/
32a3(mdo 'grel): shes ldan rnams dang mnyam pa'i yongs su gdung pa yis/ /bya ba ma yin de 'dir slar yang byed pa'o/ /lus kyi gtser bas gal te 'dir ni chos yin na/ /lus kyi bde ba chos ma yin par 'gyur ba ste/ /pha rol tu ni bde ba chos kyis kyang 'thob la/ /
32a4(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir 'di yis chos kyis chos min 'bras bu'o/ /gang gis phyir na bsam pa'i dbang gis lus yin la/ /rab tu 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa dag kyang ngo/ /de phyir sems kyi dul ba nyid ni rigs pa ste/ /sems las gzhan pa'i lus ni shir dang mnyam
32a5(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /bza' ba gtsang bas gal te bsod nams 'dod na ni/ /de phyir ri dags rnams kyang bsod nams yod pa ste/ /phyi rol skyes bu gang dag rnams kyang 'bras bu las/ /bskal pa'i nyes pas don rnams gzhan du kha bltas so/ /bsod nams phyir ni
32a6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor na/ /'o na sdug la mngon par mtshams sbyor tshad ma min/ /de ltar gang dag las ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /stegs shes rab tu zhugs te chu la reg par byed/ /der yang de yi snying la tshim pa tsam yin te/
32a7(mdo 'grel): chu yis sdig pa dag par byed pa ma yin phyir/ /yon tan ldan pa'i reg pa'i chu ni gang dang gang/ /de dang de ni sa la gal te stegs 'dod na/ /chu yang the tshom med par chu nyid kho na ste/ /de phyir yon tan ldan rnams kho na stegs su go /de ltar rigs
32b1(mdo 'grel): pa mang po ldan pa de dang de/ /smras te rnam par mdzes pa'i nyi ma nub par gyur/ /de nas sbyin sreg du bas kha dog 'gyur ba'i shing/ /dka' thub rab tu zhi ba'i khrus sar rnam par zhugs/ /mngon par bton pa'i rab tu 'bar ba'i me yis thab la ni/ /dbang bskur
32b2(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i drang srong skye bos khyab pa ste/ /bzlas pa bya yi dbyangs kyis kun nas skad sgrogs lha yi tshogs/ /chos kyi lam gyi las gyi mdza' bzhin rab tu zhugs pa'o/ /de ni mtshan mo thang 'ga' mtshan mor byed 'od kyi/ /dka' thub rnams la yongs su rtog cing
32b3(mdo 'grel): zhugs gyur la/ /dka' thub thams cad yongs su brtags shing mkhyen gyur na/ /dka' thub zhing gi thang de las ni gshegs par gyur/ /de'i gzugs bdag nyid chen por song ba'i yid rnams kyis/ /dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni de nas de rjes
32b4(mdo 'grel): gshegs/ /'phags min sdig pa rnams kyis zil non yul las ni/ /srang srong chen po rnams ni chos bzhin pha rol gshegs/ /de nas ral pa shing shun zur phud kyis rol pa'i/ /dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de rnams des gzigs shing/ /de dag rnams
32b5(mdo 'grel): kyi bka' thub rnams la rjes brten te/ /dpal dang ldan la dge ba'i shing gi rtsa bar gnas/ /de nas dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas/ /mi mchog de la yongs su bskor nas gnas gyur la/ /de dag rnams kyi rgyan pos mchod ma sngon btang ste/
32b6(mdo 'grel): dus kyi zhi bas tshig 'di rab tu 'di smras so/ /khyod kyis byon tshe gdung gnas gang ba bzhin gyur la/ /rab tu gshegs tshe stong pa bzhin du rab tu thob/ /de phyir brtse ba 'di ni 'bor bar 'os min te/ /'tsho bar 'dod pa'i phangs pa'i tshe yis lus bzhin no/ /lha yi
32b7(mdo 'grel): drang srong tshangs pa'i drang srong rgyal po yis/ /drang srong gis bsnyen bsod nams nye bar gang ldan ri/ /dka' thub nor ldan rnams kyi dka' thub de rnams ni/ /gang gi nye logs dag nas mang por 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin kun nas bsod nams dag gi stegs
33a1(mdo 'grel): gyur la/ /nam mkha' i 'og gi them skas dag tu gyur pa ste/ /lha yi drang srong rnams dang drang srong chen po ni/ /chos kyi bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis bsnyen/ /'di nas slar yang khyad 'phags chos kyi che las ni/ /byang gi
33a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs nyid kho nar bsnyen par nus pa ste/ /blo dang ldan pas gom pa gcig tu gyur pa yang/ /lho yi phyogs su 'gro bar nus ba ma yin no/ /dka' thub nags 'dir ji ste bya ba ngan pa 'am/ /bsre ma'i chos bsam lhung ba min nam mi gtsang bar/ /khyed
33a3(mdo 'grel): kyis mthong ste gang gis khyed 'di bzhugs 'dod min/ /de ni gsung la re zhig sred bar bzhugs mdzod cig/ dka' thub gter dang rab tu mtshungs par gyur pa la/ /'di rnams kyis ni dka' thub grogs su 'dod pa ste/ /dbang po dang mnyam khyed dang lhan
33a4(mdo 'grel): gcig gnas pa ni/ /phur bu yi yang mngon par mtho ba 'dren pa yin/ /dka' thub ldan pa'i gtso bos de skad ces smras te/ /srid par rab tu nyams phyir dam bca' byas pa yis/ /mkhas pa'i gtso bo des ni dka' thub ldan dbus su/ /nang du song ba'i
33a5(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin smras par gyur pa'o/ /'gron la sdug cing rang gi skye bo dang mtshungs pa'i/ /drang po'i bdag nyid chos 'dzin thub pa rnams kyi ni/ /bdag la rnam pa de ltar bsam pa skyes pa yis/ /bdag gis dga' ba mchog dang bkur sti skyes par gyur/ /mdor
33a6(mdo 'grel): bsdus gyur na brtse zhing gnyen pa 'di rnams dag/ snying la song ba'i dag rnams dag gis khrus byas bzhin/ /kun nas 'dzin med chos can bdag gi dga' ba ni/ /de ring slar yang cung zhig g.yos bar gyur ba nyid/ /de ltar rab tu zhugs pa'i khyed cag skyabs
33a7(mdo 'grel): 'os rnams/ /shin tu phyogs su lhung ba yang dag bstan pa rnams/ /bor nas 'gro zhes kho bo yi yang sdug bsngal te/ /ji ltar gnyen 'dun rnams ni spangs pa de ltar ro/ /khyed cag rnams kyi chos 'di mtho ris ched du ste/ /bdag gi mngon par mtho ba yang
33b1(mdo 'grel): srid ma yin phyir/ /nags der gang gi bdag ni sdod 'dod ma yin te/ /chos las ldog pa rab tu 'jug pa tha dad phyir/ /de phyir nags 'di dag na gang gis yongs 'gro ba/ /bdag gi ma dga' ma yin pha rol spyod log min/ /sngon gyi dus na rjes mthun chos la
33b2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa yi/ /drang srong chen po thams cad rnams dang mtshungs par gyur/ /de nas don dang ldan la bde zhing yid du 'ong/ /legs mthun mdangs dang ldan la snying po dang ldan pa/ /gzhon nu'i tshig ni dka' thub ldan pa de rnams kyis/ /thos nas khyad 'phags dang
33b3(mdo 'grel): ldan bkur sti mang pos gshegs/ /de nas gnyis skyes thal ba la nyal kha cig ni/ /lus ring gtsug gtor dang ldan shing shun gos gyon zhing/ /mig ni cung zad dkar ser sna ni phra la ring/ /lag gcig spyi blugs ldan pas tshig 'di smras pa'o/ /khyod kyi des
33b4(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du rgya chen blo ldan zhing/ /gzhon nu khyed kyis skye ba la ni nyes pa gzigs/ /mtho ris dang ni thar pa yang dag rnam spyod phyir/ /thar pa gang gi blo gros yod pa de yin no/ /mchod sbyin dka' thub nges pa de dang de rnams kyis/ /chags pa dang ldan mtho ris la ni
33b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar 'dod/ /dgra bo bzhin du chags dang lhan cig g.yul spyad nas/ /sems pa rang ldan thar ba du ni 'gro bar 'dod/ /de phyir gal te khyod kyi blo gros 'di nges na/ /skyen par khyed nyid 'bigs byed phug par gshegs mdzod cig/ gang zhig mthar thug nges
33b6(mdo 'grel): par legs pa thob pa'i mig/ thub pa 'di ni de ru mtshan mo min par gnas/ /da phyir khyod kyis de nyid lam ni thob gyur la/ /sred par gyur na yang dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdag gi mthong ba ji ltar blo gros de de ltar/ /de nyid kyi yang blo gros
33b7(mdo 'grel): bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gsal zhing mtho ba'i shangs dang rnam rgyas yangs pa'i spyan/ /zangs mdog ya chu ma mchu rno dkar mche ba can/ /ljags ni dmar zhing phra ba'i zhal dang ldan pa 'di/ /shes bya'i rgya mtsho mdza' dag la ni 'gro ba nyid/ /khyod kyi zab
34a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni gting dpag dka' gang dang/ /gang zhig sgron ma nyid dang mtshan rnams gang yin pas/ /sngon gyi bskal bar drang srong gis gang ma mthong ba'i/ /slob dpon nyid des la mngon par dga' nas gshegs/ /dka' thub ldan
34a2(mdo 'grel): ba de rnams kyis kyang nga la yang/ /cho ga bzhin rjes byas nas dka' thub nags der gshegs/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /dka' thub kyi nags su zhugs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// /de nas
34a3(mdo 'grel): mgyogs 'gro spyod de yid mi bde gyur te/ /de ltar jo bo nags su nga med par gshegs la/ /lam du mya ngan med pa 'bad par byas gyur te/ /de ltar na yang de'i mchi ma khog ma gyur/ gang la jo bo'i bka' la mtshan mo gcig gis ni/ /mgyogs 'gro de dang
34a4(mdo 'grel): gshegs par gyur pa'i lam/ /lam de nyid la 'gro zhag dag ni brgyad rnams kyis/ /jo bo nyid dang bral ba de yis sems zhing 'ongs/ /'thon pa med pas rgyags pa med bar gyur ba yi/ /sngags ldan mgyogs 'gro nyid kyang mdangs med rgyu ba ste/ /de ltar rgyan de
34a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis brgyan par byas na yang/ /de yis dor bas dpal ni song ba bzhin du gyur/ /phyir log nas kyang dka' thub nags su mngon phyogs te/ /snying rje bar ni yang dang yang du drag tu 'tshe ba/ lam na rtogs pa ldan pa yin yang 'bru 'am chu/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin
34a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par ma dga' ma bslangs so/ /de nas 'gro la phan pa'i bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po des/ /ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer rnam par dman pa la/ /nyin mor byed pas bor ba'i nam mkha' 'bras med bzhin/ /rim gyis de gnyis stong ba bzhin du nye bar song/ /
34a7(mdo 'grel): pad+ma dkar po dang bcas chu yis mdzes gyur cing/ /me tog 'dzin pa'i shing rnams kyis ni brgyan na yang/ /grong khyer ba rnams rab tu dga' ba song gyur te/ /de yi nye ba'i nags de nags ltar mdzes ma gyur/ /de ltar lta byed mchi mas bcom pa'i mi rnams
34b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rab tu 'bar min zhan pa'i yid kyis phyogs su skor/ /'ong du mi ster ba bzhin gnyis po de grong du/ dal bus log pa'i khrus bzhin mngon par song bar gyur/ /shAkya'i rigs kyi drang srong dang bral 'ongs pa yi/ /lus zags 'gros dang ldan bde gnyis mthong nas kyang
34b2(mdo 'grel): sngon tshe shing rta bcu ba'i shing rta 'ongs pa bzhin/ /grong khyer skye bo rnams ni lam du mchi ma phyung/ /de nas mya ngan nye bar ldan pa'i skye bo dang/ mchi ma phyung ba rnams kyis 'dun pa la smas? pa/ /grong khyer yul 'khor dga' mdzad rgyal po'i sras po de/ /khyed kyis
34b3(mdo 'grel): gang du bor zhes rgyab nas rjes su 'gro /de nas gus ldan skye bo de la des smras pa/ /mi dbang sras po bdag gis yongs su por ba min/ /du bzhin skye bo med pa'i nags su kho bo dang/ /khyim gnas cha lugs dag kyang de yis rnam par spangs/ /de yi tshig ni skyed bo de
34b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis thos nas/ /des par shin tu dka' ba nyid ces nges par song gyur la/ /'gyel? zhing mig skyes chu ni rnam par mthong ba ste/ /yid la smrod cing bdag nyid kyis ni 'bras bu long/ /de nas smras pa gnyis skyes rgyal po'i shugs mda' ste/ /gang du gshegs
34b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i nags der di? ring zhugs bar bgyi/ /lus can dbang po ma tshang rnams kyi ji lta bar/ /de dag bral bas bdag cag 'tsho bar 'dod pa med/ nga dang bral ba'i grong khyer 'di ni nags yin la/ /de dang yang dag ldan pa'i nags de grong khyer yin/ /lha ni lha min
34b6(mdo 'grel): gsod tshe brgya byin gyis ji ltar/ /de dang bral bas bdag gi grong khyer mdzes ma gyur/ /de nas slar yang gzhon nu phyir la log ces te/ /yan lag ma rnams skar khung phrad rnams rab thob ste/ /mgyogs 'gro'i rgyab ni rnam bar dbyen pa mthong gyur nas/ /slar yang
34b7(mdo 'grel): skar khung rnams ni rnam par bkag nas du/ /brtul zhugs dang ni mya ngan dag gis yid du bcing/ /brtul zhugs la rab zhugs pas sras bo nyer thob phyir/ /bzlas byas shing gi lha yi khang par mi bdag gis/ /bsam pa ji ltar de dang de rnams byas/ /de nas
35a1(mdo 'grel): mig dag mchi mas rab tu gang ba des/ /mgyogs 'gro blangs nas mgyogs 'gro rjes su 'gro ba ste/ g.yul 'gyed pa na dgra bos jo bo khyer ba ltar/ /mya ngan dag gis mngon bcom mi skyong khang par zhugs/ /mi dbang rgyal po'i khab
35a2(mdo 'grel): tu rnam par zhugs pa na/ /rnam par blta zhing mig dang/ mchi ma 'bab pa yis/ /skye bo la ni sdug bsngal rab tu rtogs 'jug bzhin/ /sngags ldan mgyogs 'gro bsal pa'i dbyangs kyis dus par gyur/ /de nas khang pa'i dbus na spyod pa'i bya rnams dang/ /nye bar
35a3(mdo 'grel): brtag pa'i mgyogs 'gro dam par byed rnams kyis/ /mi dbang sras po log par gshegs la the tshom ste/ /mgyogs 'gro de yid dbyangs la so sor ram 'degs byas/ /ji ltar sngags ldan mgyogs 'gro 'tsher bar byed pa ste/ /nges par gzhon nu khab
35a4(mdo 'grel): tu rnam par zhugs snyam ste/ /dga' ba phul du byung bas bslus pa'i skye bo rnams/ /skye bo'i bdag po'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nye logs so/ /shin tu dga' ba las ni mya ngan gyis brgyal rnams/ /gzhon nu blta ba la ni g.yo ba'i spyan ma rnams/ /ston ka'i chu gter
35a5(mdo 'grel): sprin las glog ni g.yo ba bzhin/ /bud med rnams ni sred pas khyim nas phyir la mthon/ /lan bu rnam par 'phyar zhing dar gos dri ma can/ /mig rtsi dang bral mchi mas mig bcom gdong rnams kyis/ /mtshan mo zad tshe skya reng gis mkhar skar ma bzhin/ /phyi dor dang bral bud
35a6(mdo 'grel): med rigs rnams mdzes ma gyur/ /rkang pa rkang gdub dang bral zangs mdog ma chags rnams/ /gdod pa rna lung dang bral mgrin pa drang po rnams/ /rang bzhin gyis rgyas brla ni 'og pa ba dang bral rnams/ /nu ma do shal dang bral stor g.yogs chad rnams so/ /rten dang
35a7(mdo 'grel): bral ba'i 'dun pa dang ni mgyogs 'gro nyid/ /mig ni mchi ma dang ldan de rnams kyis mthong nas/ /nags mthar khyu mchog dang bral ba glang rnams bzhin du/ /sems khral gdong ldan yan lag mchog ma rnams ni dus/ /de nas rgyal ba'i btsun mo mchi ma dang bcad par//
35b1(mdo 'grel): be'u nyams pa'i ma he mo ltar mnyes pa shin ma/ /gser gyi chu shing lo 'dab rnam par g.yo ba bzhin/ /gau ta ma mas ni lag pa bzung nas 'gyel/ /dbur? pa lag pa snyoms shing gzi brjid bcom pa yi/ /bud med gzhan rnams yid mi bde bas sems med bzhin/ /mchi ma
35b2(mdo 'grel): ma bton 'o dod 'bod min dbugs med par/ /g.yo bral ri mo bris pa bzhin du gnas par gyur/ /brtan min bdag po'i mya ngan gyis brgyal bud med gzhan/ /rnam par lta byed nas 'bab rgyun gyi gdong rnams kyis/ /sa 'dzin ri bo nas 'bab rgyun gyi rdob? ltar/ /tsan dan
35b3(mdo 'grel): rab bskud nu ma rnams la rnam par 'thor/ /de rnams kyis ni mig chus btags pa'i gdong rnams kyis/ /rgyal po'i kha ba de de tshe mdzes par gyur pa ni/ /chu gser dus na chu gter char gyis btags pa yi/ /chu 'dzin pad+ma rnams kyis rdzing bu ji ltar ro/ /rgyas shing bar
35b4(mdo 'grel): med legs par zlum pa'i ser mo can/ /rgyan bral rtsa mi mngon tha'i yan lag mchog ma rnams/ /rlung gis g.yos pa'i ljon shing rang gi 'dab mas ltar/ /pad+ma lta bu'i lag pa rnams kyis brang rnams brdungs/ /nags rlung gis bsgul pad+ma lta bur g.yos pa yis//
35b5(mdo 'grel): dang ba rnams kyi 'khrigs pa rnams kyi chu klung ltar/ /brang brdungs rab bskyod 'brel mtho'i nu ma rnams kyis ni/ /de lta na yang mi mo de rnams mdzes par gyur/ /ji ltar brang rnams la ni lag pas zug byas pa/ /de ltar lag pa rnams la brang na zug byed cing/ /le lo can
35b6(mdo 'grel): ma brtse med stobs med ma yis der/ /lag pa'i rtse dang brang rnams phan tshun zug byas so/ /de nas khros pas rab tu dmar ba'i spyan ldan ma/ /sems khral gyis sbrel mgrin pa kha zhing ldab ldib dang/ /shugs rings phyur bas 'o ma 'dzin g.yo brtan pa yi/ /mya
35b7(mdo 'grel): ngan mchi ma 'dzin pa'i grags 'dzin mas smras pa/ /mtshan mo gnyid log dbang med bdag ni rnams spangs nas/ /'dun pa 'dod pa'i shing rta de ni gang du thal/ /gsum po mnyam du song la khyod dang sngags ldan ni/ /nye bar 'ongs pas kho mo'i yid ni g.yos par gyur/
36a1(mdo 'grel): kho mo 'phags min brtse min bshes ma yin pa'i las/ /phul phyung de 'dir byas nas da ni ci la du/ /mchi ma ma 'don khyod kyi sems ni sim par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi mchi ma dang ni las de gtam ma yin/ /dga' dang song dang phan dang legs
36a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /ci lta ba bzhin don byed khyod nyid dang 'grogs shing/ /slar mi ldog pa'i ched du jo bo sras po thal/ /khyod kyi nga la 'bras bcas sems ni dga' bar gyis/ /mi yi dbang po'i dgra po dag ni mchog yin la/ /sbyor min la mkhas shes rab med pa'i
36a3(mdo 'grel): bshes mchog min/ /nges bar mdza' bshes rnam par mi mkhas khyod kyis ni/ /'di yi rigs kyi nye bar ub pa chen po byas/ /rab chags dri mas 'dres shing dmar pa'i mig can ma/ /kun nas rgyan dang dral ba 'di rnams mya ngan byed/ /gangs ldan ri bo dang mnyam
36a4(mdo 'grel): bdag po gnas na yang/ /bud med rnams ni yugs mo bzhin mdzes pa nyams/ /'di dag rnams kyang bya 'dab lag pa rnam bskyod cing/ /rtag par phug ron rnams kyi ring ba'i skad rnams dang/ /de dang bral bas 'bras med pho brang 'khor dang bcas/ /gzhal med
36a5(mdo 'grel): khang pa'i gtsar rnams shin tu ngu ba 'dra/ /skye bo 'di ni kun nas don med 'dod pa ste/ /bsngags ldan mgyogs 'gro de yang nges pa nyid du'o/ /mtshan mo skye bo gnyid tshe rkun pos rin chen bzhin/ /bdag gi 'di ltar 'di nas nor rdzas thams cad stor/ /mgyogs
36a6(mdo 'grel): 'gro 'dis ni mnga' yi rma srol byung rnams kyang/ /sron bar nus shes grags na lcags rnams smos ci dgos/ /bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i dpal ni blangs gyur nas/ /'dis ni lcags lhung 'jigs la long ba yin nam ci/ /mi dbang pho brang yongs su gang
36a7(mdo 'grel): ba bzhin du ni/ /'phags pa min las da lta drag tu 'tsher bar byed/ /gang gi tshe na mgyogs 'gro lkugs la thang chad gyur/ /gal te skye bo dag la go bar 'tshor byed dam/ /yang na rmig pas sa la rmig pa'i sgra byed dam/ /yang na 'gram pa'i sgra ni mchog tu
36b1(mdo 'grel): bskyod na ni/ /bdag la bsdug bsngal 'di 'dra 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de ltar 'dir ni lha mo'i smre sngags la brten cing/ /mchi mas mdud pa yi ge'i tshig dag thos gyur nas/ /'og tu gdong phyogs mchi ma dang bcas thal sbyar te/ /'dun pas lan 'di dal bur smras par
36b2(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'o/ /lha mo bsngags ldan la ni smod par 'os min zhing/ /kho bo la yang khro bar mdzad pa 'os ma yin/ /kho bo cag gi skyon min lha mo mkhyen bar mdzod/ /mi yi lha de lha bzhin bkra shis kun gyis gshegs/ /bdag gis rgyal po'i bstan pa shes pa yin
36b3(mdo 'grel): na yang/ /lha nyid gang dag gis ni stobs las byas pa bzhin/ /bdag gis mgyogs 'gro 'di ni nye bar 'ongs pa ste/ /lam na ngal ba med par de ltar rjes su song/ /mgyogs 'gro mchog 'di nyid kyang gshegs tshe sa la ni/ /bar snang dag na bzung bzhin rmig pas
36b4(mdo 'grel): ma reg cing/ /de bzhin lha yi ched du gdong ni sngogs byas bzhin/ /'gram pa'i sgra ni byas min 'tsher ba dag kyang med/ /gang las sa skyong bdag nyid skyes pa gshegs pa na/ /de tshe sgo ni rang nyid bye bar gyur pa ste/ /mtshan mo'i mun pa nyi mas bzhin du
36b5(mdo 'grel): bsal gyur te/ /de'i phyir yang lha yi chog de zung gi/ gang phyir mi dbang bka' las skye bo stong phrag dag/ /bad? pa dang ni grong khyer nyid du bag yod kyang/ /de tshe de ni gnyid kyi phrogs shing ma sad de/ /de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung zhig /gang phyir nags
36b6(mdo 'grel): na gnas la mthun pa'i gos dag ni/ /lhan gnas pas dus su 'di la byin gyur la rgyan dag mkha' la rab tu gtor ba de khyer te/ /de yi phyir yang lha yi chog de zung gi/ de phyir de ltar lha mo ded gnyis la skyon du/ /ji ltar song pa de la rtog par 'os ma yin/ /mgyogs
36b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro 'di dang bdag gi 'dod pa mi mdzad par/ /de ni lha rnams dag gis rjes 'gro byas shing gshegs/ /de ltar bdag nyid chen po de yi rab gshegs ba/ /lha yi mtshar mar bud med de rnams kyis thos nas/ /rab tu gshegs las yid la 'bar ba yang thob ste//
37a1(mdo 'grel): mya ngan rab tu nyams bzhin ngo mtshar ldan par thal/ /de nas yid mi bde bas yongs lding min can ma/ /phrug gu rab tu nyams pa'i 'os ba sdug bsngal bzhin/ /rmongs gyur nyid kyang mchi ma dang ldan gdong gis smras/ /rlabs chen dang
37a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'jam zhing dkar min dge ba ste/ /so so so sor rtsa ba nas 'khrungs byen du 'khyil/ /de yi dbu skyes sa la 'thor ba de rnams ni/ /mi dbang dbu rgyan la ni yongs su bkri bar 'os/ /phyag na rib 'phyang ri dags rgyal po'i stobs mnga' zhing/ /khyu mchog
37a3(mdo 'grel): chen po'i spyan ldan gser 'bar 'od mnga' ba/ /'brug dang rnga yi sgra ldan sku stong rnam par yang/ /de ltar gyur kyang dka' thub gnas su gnas par 'os/ /sor mo legs skyes 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel ba dang/ /long bu mi mngon pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar 'jam
37a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /dbus na 'khor lo dang bcas zhabs ni de dag gis/ /drang srong rnams kyi nags mdza' i sa la 'gro 'am ci/ /khang bzang logs na khri dang gdan la 'os pa ste/ /rin chen na bza' lci min tsan dan gyis spras shing/ /de yi lus ni mdangs dang ldan
37a5(mdo 'grel): pa nags dag tu/ /grang dang dro dang chu 'obs rnams su skor ram ci/ /rigs dang gzugs dang stobs dang sems pa dag dang ni/ /thos dang phun sum tshogs dang na tshod kyis khengs shing/ /slong bar ma yin ster ba nyid du mngon 'ongs pa/ /de ni pha rol dag la slongs mo rgyu
37a6(mdo 'grel): 'am ci/ /gser khri dang zhing gzims mal dag la gzims nas ni/ /mtshan mo sil snyan sgra rnams dag gis rab smos pa/ /gos kyi phyogs gcig par nas yi logs la ni/ /bdag gis tul zhugs ldan de de ring ji ltar gzims/ /snying rje'i smre sngags rab tu zlos pa 'di
37a7(mdo 'grel): thos nas/ /bud med de rnams phan tshun lag pas yongs 'khyud de/ /ljon shing ba yos las me tog las ni sbrang rtsi bzhin/ /rnam par lta byed dag nas chu dag 'thor ba'o/ /de na dad pa med pa'i ngang mo bzhin du ni/ /grags 'dzin ma ni nor 'dzin sa la 'gyed gyur la/ /rnam
37b1(mdo 'grel): par 'khrugs shing yang dang yang du ldab ldib kyi/ /skad kyis de dang de dag rnam par smras pa'o/ /chos dang lhan cig spyod ma mgon med kho mo ni/ /de yis dor nas gal te chos ni byed 'dod cing/ /chos dang lhan cig spyod ma dang bral dka' thub gang/ /yongs su longs spyod
37b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod 'di'i chos ni ga la zhig /sngon gyi sa skyong rnams des nges par mthos te/ /legs mthong chen po la sogs mes po chen po rnams/ /bdag po ldan ma dang bcas nags su gshegs gyur la/ /kho mo dang bral chos byed 'dod pa de ltar ltos/ /mchod sbyin du 'am rig
37b3(mdo 'grel): byed chogs 'dus byas shing/ /pho mo gnyis la dbang bskur de yi 'bras bu ni/ /gzhan du mnyam por longs spyod 'dod pa ma mthong ste/ /de nas bdag la 'di yi chos la ser sna skyes/ /bdag ni yid la sdug dang phan tshun phrag dog cing/ /yang yang rtsod par chos dga' 
37b4(mdo 'grel): des ni nges par shes/ /khro ba kho mo spangs nas dbang chen 'jig rten du/ /'jigs med lha mo las ni dga' ba len par 'dod/ /de la lus kyi yon tan bzung ba'i btsun mo de/ /ci 'dra zhig gam 'di ni bdag gis bsam mno ste/ /bdag gi gus pa nyid dang bud med bor nas
37b5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /nags su gang phyir dka' thub rnams la gdung/ /nges par bdag gi 'dod 'di mtho ris bde phyir min/ /sems ldan skye bo'i de ni rnyed par dka' ba min/ /sdug pa des kyang bdag la 'di 'am gzhan du rung/ /gang gi ma spong zhes ni bdag gi yid la re/ /gal te bdag ni
37b6(mdo 'grel): jo ba'i gzigs byed yangs pa'i zhal/ /gtsang zhing bzhad pa gyen du blta ba'i skal med na/ /skal ba dman par 'os min sgra gcan 'dzin 'di yang/ /pha'i pang na yongs su gnas par nam zhig 'gyur/ /e ma yin mnga' 'di yi lus ni shin tu gzhon/ /yid ni mi rnams
37b7(mdo 'grel): kyis bsngags shin tu sra ba ste/ /ngag gi skad grag rab zlos dgra yang dga' ba yi/ /bu ni byis pa 'di 'dra kyem spong bar byed/ /bdag gi 'dod pa'i sems yang shin tu sra ba ste/ /rdo las gyur ram yang na lcags las byas pa 'am/ /bder 'os jo bo dpal dor nags su song
38a1(mdo 'grel): ba la/ mgon med ldan pa gang zhig dum bur ma song ngo/ /de ltar lha mo bdag po'i mya ngan gyis brgyal te/ /sems shing rnam zlos lan cig ma yin 'dis dus la/ /rang bzhin brtan yang dam pa mo de mya ngan gyis/ /brtan pa dran pa ma yin ngo tsha ma byas
38a2(mdo 'grel): so/ /de nas de ltar mya ngan gyis smra rnams 'khrugs pa'i/ /grags 'dzin ma ni sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni/ /char gyis btags pas pad+ma chen po bzhin du ni/ /mchi byas gdong gi bud med rnams ni cho de 'debs/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs shing sbyin sregs bkris byas
38a3(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /mi skyod nyid kyang lha khang dag nas phyir gshegs pa/ /rdo rje'i sgra yis glang po ji bzhin skye ba yi/ /nyam thag sgra des kun nas bcom zhing g.yos par gyur/ /'dun pa dang ni bsngags ldan gnyis po mthong nas kyang/ /sras kyi nges par brten pa yang dag gsan
38a4(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /bde sogs bdag po'i ltad mo zin pa'i rgyal mtshan bzhin/ /mya ngan gyis bcom sa yi bdag po 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /de nas sras po'i mya ngan gyis rmongs yud tsam zhig/ skye bo mtshungs mnyam mngon pa'i skye bos bzung gyur la/ /chab kyi gang ba'i spyan gyis
38a5(mdo 'grel): mgyogs 'gro la gzigs nas/ /sa yi 'ogs nas sa skyong gis ni smre sngags bton/ /g.yul 'gyed pa na dga' chen mang po byas nas ni/ /bsngags ldan khyod kyi bdag gi dga' ba ma yin byas/ /bdag gi dga' ba yon tan dga' de gang gis ni/ /dga' ba yin
38a6(mdo 'grel): yang dga' ba med bzhin nags su bor/ /de phyir de nyid gang du gshegs pa der bdag khyer/ /yang na der ni slar yang skyen par khyer la shog /tshabs chen na ba'i sman dang bral bas de bzhin du/ /de dang bral bas bdag gi 'tsho ba med pa'o/ /rgyal bu gser 'bab
38a7(mdo 'grel): 'chi bas phrogs par gyur pa na/ /dka' thub gang las yang dag rgyal ba shi ma gyur/ /bdag kyang chos 'dzin sras po gshegs par gyur pa na/ /bdag nyid thar 'dod bdag nyid med pa lta bur gyur/ /rgyal rigs bcu byas khyab bdag skye dgu'i bdag po ni/ /mchog
38b1(mdo 'grel): dang mchog min shes pa nyi ma'i sras po yi/ /du ni 'phangs shing sdug bsngal dam pa dang bral la/ /yid mi bde byas yid kyi rmongs pa gang las min/ /rgyal po a dza'i sras po blo dang ldan pa ni/ mi bdag dbang po'i grogs la bdag gi 'dod pa ste/ /sras po nags su
38b2(mdo 'grel): song la gang zhig ltar song la/ /mchi ma don yod ma yin bkren pas 'chos so kye/ /khyod kyis bdag gi chu yi snyim bde gang du/ /phrogs pa'i dka' thub gnas der bzang po bdag la smros/ /de la bdag gi skom pa 'dis ni yongs 'dod de/ /bdag gi srog ni yi dags
38b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar 'dong/ /de ltar sras dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal skyes gyur te/ /sa dang 'dra ba'i lhan skyes brtsam pa rnam spangs nas/ /rA ma'i mya ngan dag gis shing rta bcu pa bzhin/ /mi skyong 'du shes bral bzhin mang po rnam par labs/ /de nas de la thos dang dul dang yon tan
38b4(mdo 'grel): ldan/ rab 'gres mdun na 'don dang blon po blo gros kyis/ /mnyam par bzhag 'di ji lta ba bzhin smras gyur te/ /yongs su gdung ba'i gdong min mya ngan med pa'ang min/ /mi mchog brtan pa mya ngan mthong la brtan par gshegs/ /mya ngan bzhin du mchi ma 'don par 'os ma
38b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ me tog phreng ba rnying bzhin phun tshogs bor nas ni/ /sa na mi skyong mang po nags su shin tu song/ /gzhan yang de yi dgongs pa nges pa 'di sngon tshe/ /drang srong dkar min de yi tshig ni dran par mdzod/ /mtho ris su dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la/ /skad cig
38b6(mdo 'grel): kyang de gnas par bde bas nus ma yin/ /gal te yang de mi mchog 'bad pas byas pa ste/ /myur bar bka' lung stsol mdzod ji snyed 'dir 'gro bgyi/ /sna tshogs rnams kyi sras po de yi ni/ /sna tshogs mang po'i 'thab mo de snyed der byed shog/ /de nas de gnyis la ni mi
38b7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis bslabs la/ /de phyir nges par 'di nas khyed gnyis mngon par song/ /bu la lhag par chags pa'i nags kyi bya yi bzhin/ /bdag gi sems ni dga' bar rab tu song ma yin/ /dam pa zhes ni mi dbang brtan las blon po dang/ /mdun na 'don pa de gnyis
39a1(mdo 'grel): nags der song bar gyur/ /byas zhes mna' ma'i skye bo dang bcas btsun mor bcas/ /mi skyong gis kyang bya ba lhag ma rab tu mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /btsun mo'i 'khor smra sdabs bton
39a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe mdun na 'don dang blo po de/ /mi skyong mchi ma'i lcag gis mngon par bsnun pa dag/ /phug pa'i dam pa'i rta bzhin 'bad pa thams cad las/ /bsam pa bzang pos skyen par nags der song bar
39a3(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /'dra ba'i rjes 'brang dal ba skyes pa de gnyis ni/ /dka' thub nags der dus su nye bar phyin nas ni/ /rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul dor de dul ba'i spyod pa yis/ /drang srong shes ldan bu yi khang par nye bar song/ /de dag gis ni tshul bzhin bram ze de mchod nas/ /de
39a4(mdo 'grel): ni de dag la yang rjes mthun mchod pa ste/ /gdan byas pa dag bdag tu lta ba bcas nas ni/ /shes ldan sras po gdan gnas pa la gtam smras so/ /mdangs gtsang gtsang zhing rnam par yangs pa'i grag pa mnga' / /bu ram shing pa'i rigs su rab 'khrungs
39a5(mdo 'grel): rgyal po yis/ /sh+ru ka rab tu 'dzin dang gsang sngags yongs 'dzin la/ /nag por skye bo 'di ni khyod kyis rigs par mdzod/ /dbang po dang mtshungs de yi rgyal ba dang mtshungs sra/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag ni sgrol 'dod de/ /'di na mngon par
39a6(mdo 'grel): nye bar 'ongs grag de yi phyir/ /bdag cag nye bar 'ongs par bcom ldan mkhyen par mdzod/ /de dag la des smras pa phyag ring gyur pa de/ /rab tu thob gyur gzhon nu shes ba min pa min/ /chos 'di 'khor bar byed ces mngon par mkhyen nas ni/ /mngon par
39a7(mdo 'grel): gdong phyogs ma yin thar bzhed skyen par gshegs/ /de nas de las de nyid de dag nyer thob nas/ /bram ze de la snyan dngags phab nas de ma thag/ dub kyang ma dub pa bzhin rgyal po la gus pas/ /de nyid gang nas gshegs de nas rab tu 'ong/ /song
39b1(mdo 'grel): ste de nas de dag gi ni rngon pa dang/ /rnam par bral ba'i sku lus rab tu 'bar ba de/ /nyi ma stug po'i longs spyod dag la zhugs pa ltar/ /lam ni shing gi rtsa bar nye bar zhugs pa mthong/ /de nas de la mdun na 'don dang sngags 'dzin bcas/ /theg pa rnam par spangs
39b2(mdo 'grel): nas nye bar gshegs pa ste/ /slar gnas thub pa'i bu ni g.yon gyi lhar bcas pas/ /nags gnas lhag spyod blta bar 'dong pa ji ltar ro/ /lha ni pa pa sangs dang phur bus dbang chen bzhin/ /de dag gi ni de nyid bskyed cing mchod pa'o/ /lha ni pa sangs phur bu dag
39b3(mdo 'grel): la dbang chen bzhin/ /mchod 'os des ni de gnyis dag la slar mchod do/ /sbyor bar song ba'i zla ba'i nye sar nabs so bzhin/ /de nas kun nas mngon par rjes gnang byas pa ni/ /de dag shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan de yi ni/ /nye logs dag tu song ba rnam par
39b4(mdo 'grel): mdzes par gyur/ /shing gi rtsa bar gnas pa mngon par 'bar ba yi/ /rgyal po'i sras po de la mdun na 'don gyis smras/ /lha ni yongs 'dus dag la brgya byin sras po ni/ /rgyal ba nye bar gnas la phur bus ji ltar ro/ /khyod kyi mya ngan zug rdu snying la brtags pa na//
39b5(mdo 'grel): sa yi logs la rmongs shing brgyal bar gyur ba ste/ /gzhon nu mig gi chu yi char ldan rgyal po yis/ /gang zhig khyod la smras pa 'di ni mkhyen par mdzod/ /khyod kyis chos la rab dmigs nges par shes pa ste/ /khyod kyi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don ni shes pa'o/ /khyod kyi dus
39b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin par nags su bsnyen las bdag /me dang rab mtshungs mya ngan me yis tshig pa'o/ /de phyir tshur spyon chos dga' dag ni dga' ston du/ /chos kyi don du blo gros de nyid mthong mdzod dang/ /chu bo'i shugs kyis 'gram dogs mngon par bcom pa bzhin/ /bdag la mya
39b7(mdo 'grel): ngan shugs 'di rab tu 'phrel ba'o/ /rlung dang nyi ma me dang thog chen rnams kyi ni/ /'jug pa gang zhig sprin dang chu me ni rnams su/ /rnam par 'byer dang skems dang sreg dang 'byed rnams kyis/ /bdag cag rnams la mya ngan gyis 'jug pa de byed/ /de phyir re zhig nor 'dzin
40a1(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid longs spyod la/ /dus su bstan bcos mthong ste nags su gshegs gyur te/ /'byung po thams cad la ni brtse ba chos yin phyir/ /mi 'dod gnyen 'dun kho bo la ni ltos par mdzod/ /chos de nags nyid kho nar 'grub pa
40a2(mdo 'grel): ma yin te/ /sdom brtson rnams kyi nges par grong khyer na yang 'grub/ /'dir ni blo dang 'bad pa dag ni mtshan ma ste/ /nags dang ltag ni 'jigs pa dag gi mtshan ma'o/ /dbu rgyan 'dzin cing dpung par rna cha do shal dang/ /dpung rgyan rnam par nges pa'i phyag
40a3(mdo 'grel): mnga' mi dbang rnams/ /phun tshogs yan lag dbus na yongs su gnas rnams kyis/ /khyim na gnas kyang thar pa'i lam ni rab tu 'thob/ /brtan pa'i nu bo stobs dang rdo rje'i lag pa dang/ /rnam mdzes bu dang chu stong de nas mthar gnas lha/ /lus
40a4(mdo 'grel): 'phags rgyal po skyes byed dang ni de bzhin du/ /'gro dang ljon shing tsan dang sde rgyal rgyal po rnams/ /nye legs chos kyi cho ga la ni rnam dul ba'i/ /mi bdag khyim na gnas pa de rnams mkhyen mdzod la/ /nor gyi bdag po dang ni mi skyong dpal dag ste/ /gnyis
40a5(mdo 'grel): po dag kyang de phyir dus gcig mkhyen par mdzod/ /mngon par dbang bskur byas pa'i chu yis brlan pa nyid/ /gdung ba skyob pa'i gdugs bzung khyed la drag tu ni/ /nye bar 'khyud nas kun nas gyen du blta pa ste/ /dga' ba des ni nags su rab tu 'jug
40a6(mdo 'grel): par 'dod/ /de ltar mchi mas 'dud pa'i ye ge'i tshig gis ni/ /khyed nyid la ni sa yi bdag pos smras pa ste/ /thos nas de la brtse shing de la dga' don du/ /khyed kyi brtse bas rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa'o/ /khyod las byung ba'i mya ngan chu ni gting med pa'i/ /sdug
40a7(mdo 'grel): bsngal rgya mtshor shAkya'i rgyal po nub gyur te/ /de phyir mgon po rgya mtshor bying la gru bzhin du/ /dman zhing rten dang bral pa de ni sgrol mdzod cig /chu bo gang+gA'i lto nas byung ba 'jigs byed dang/ /lhag spyod dang ni ngan spongs sras po lhag spyod kyis/ /pha yi dga' 
40b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i don du las byas thos nas ni/ /khyed kyang yab kyi bzhed pa mdzad par 'os pa lags/ /gnyen bshes pe'u nyams par 'gyur ba'i ba bzhin du/ /rgyun mi chad par nyam thag snying rjer du ba mo/ /srang srong ri byi bsnyen zhing phyogs su ma song ba/ /yang dag skyed par
40b2(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i lha mo mkhyen par mdzod/ /dad pa rnam par bral ba'i dad mo lta bu dang/ /nags na glang po dang bral glang mo lta bu ni/ /dgon dang bcas kyang mgon med dman zhing nyam thag pa'o/ /btsun mo gzigs pa yis ni skyob par 'os pa yin/ /sras gcig byis pa
40b3(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal 'os pa ma yin pa/ /kun nas gdung ba mthar gyur pa ni 'dren pa ste/ /gang ba'i zla sgra gcan nye bar bsgyur las bzhin/ /sgra gcan 'dzin de gnyen byi mya ngan las thar mdzod/ /pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor dang grong khyer mdza' dag ni/ /khyed dang bral pa'i bud
40b4(mdo 'grel): shing can gyi mya ngan med/ /phyir 'byung dbugs ni du ba mun pa'i rtse mo yis/ /tshig pa dag ni khyed la lta ba'i chu 'dong ngo/ /mdun na 'don pa de yi tshig dag gsan gyur nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang ba'i sems dpa' des/ /yon tan ldan zhing yon
40b5(mdo 'grel): tan shes pas yud tsam zhig /bsam gtan mdzad nas rigs pa'i lan 'di smras pa'o/ /pha rnams kyi ni bu la dgongs pa shes pa ste/ /gang zhig bdag la sa skyong gi ni khyad par du/ /shes pa yin yang na dang rga dang rgud pa las/ /'jigs te nags su phyin nas
40b6(mdo 'grel): rang gi skye bo dor/ /mthar ni gal te dga' ba dang bral ma yin na/ /rang gi skye bo dga' ba lta 'dod cis ma yin/ /gang tshe yun ring gyur kyang rnam par 'bral ba ste/ /de phyir bla ma brtse ba yin yang 'dor bar bgyi/ /gang yang bdag gi ched du mi yi bdag po yis//
40b7(mdo 'grel): mya ngan khyod kyis smras des bdag la dga' ba med/ /gang phyir rmi lam yang dag 'dus par gyur rnams su/ /rnam par bral bar 'gyur la kun nas gdung bar byed/ /'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas ni/ /de bzhin du yang khyod kyis blo gros nges par
41a1(mdo 'grel): song/ /bu min gnyen min kun nas gdung ba'i rgyu yin bzhin/ /'ching ba de ni shes pa med pa'i mtshan ma nyid/ /lam du 'gro rnams 'dir ni 'dus pa ji lta ba'i/ /skye dgu rnams ni dus su nges par 'bral ba ste/ /gnyen 'dun
41a2(mdo 'grel): dam 'cha' skye bos rnam par dman pa yi/ /shes rab ldan pa'i skye bos mya ngan bsnyen nam ci/ /gzhan du rang gi skye bo der nas 'dir 'ongs la/ /'dir yang rab tu bslus nas slar yang 'gro ba ste/ /der song nas kyang pha rol gzhan du 'gro 'gyur la/ /de
41a3(mdo 'grel): ltar 'dor ldan skyo la rjes su brten rnam ci/ /gang tshe mngal nas gzung ste gnas skabs thams cad du/ /gsod pa'i phyir ni 'chi ba rab tu gnas pa ste/ /bu la dga' ba der ni khyed kyis smras pa yi/ /bdag gi nags su brten pa gang phyir dus ma yin
41a4(mdo 'grel): yul la mngon par lhung tshe dus ma yin pa de/ /de bzhin nor gyi cho gar zhugs pa dus yin no/ /dus rnams kun tu dus kyi 'gro ba khyab pa ste/ /dge legs nges par thob la dus yod ma yin no/ /gang yang rgyal pos bdag la rgyal srid 'dir bzhed pa/ /de yang
41a5(mdo 'grel): yab kyi rgya chen mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/ /sred pa las ni nad pa'i mi 'phrod zas bzhin du/ /bdag gi rab tu 'dzin par nus pa ma yin no/ /gti mug rmongs pa'i gzhi ma mi skyong rgyal po nyid/ /rab tu 'thob par mi ni mkhas pas gang phyir nus/ /gang du skyo ba
41a6(mdo 'grel): dang bcas rgyags dang lang dub dang/ /pha rol log par spyod pas chos la gnod pa'o/ /dzam+bu chu gser bzhin du bgal ba'i lding khang na/ /dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang po lta bu dang/ /gza' yis 'khrugs pa'i pad+ma dang bcas chu lta bu/ /rgyal srid dang
41a7(mdo 'grel): ni gser dag sdug bsngal dag gi rten/ /de ltar rgyal srid chos min bde ba ma yin pa/ /ji ltar mi gtsang skyes te mi dbang snga ma rnams/ /sdug bsngal yongs su spang bya na tshod rab mchog tshe/ /rgyal srid nges par dor nas nags su song bar gyur/ /rin chen
41b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du tshim pa mchog ni nyer khyung nas/ /'brog dgon dag na rtswa dang zos pa mchog yin la/ /sbrul nag bzhin du mthong ba ma yin nyes pa ni/ /rnyed bla'i dpal dang lhan cig nyal ba mchog ma yin/ /rgyal srid rnam par spangs pa rgyal po rnams kyi chos/ /mngon
41b2(mdo 'grel): par 'dod pas nags su rab 'jug bsngags pa ste/ /nags tshal yongs su dor nas khyim du rab 'jug pa/ /dam bca' nye bar bcom pa'i 'thad pa ma yin no/ /rigs su skyes shing sems pa dang bcas mi gang gis/ /chos ni mngon par 'dod pas nags su rab
41b3(mdo 'grel): zhugs la/ /ngur smrig rab tu dor nas ngo tsha rnam spangs pa/ /grong khyer 'joms pa yi yang grong la bsnyen ma yin/ /sred dang rnam par rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis/ /gang zhig bskyugs pa'i bza' ba slar yang len byed la/ /sred dang de ni rmongs dang yang na
41b4(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa yis/ /'dod pa rnams ni dor nas slar yang len par byed/ /gang zhig rab 'bar khang pa dag nas ci zhig ltar/ /byung nas slar yang de nyid kho nar rab 'jug la/ /nyes pa mthong de khyim na gnas pa dor nas ni/ /rmongs pas slar yang len par mngon par
41b5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'o/ /gang yang mi skyong khyim na gnas pas thar pa ni/ /'thob pa dang ldan zhes thos de ni med pa ste/ /zhi ba gtso bo'i thar pa'i chos ni gang la 'ang/ /chad pa gtso bo'i rgyal po'i chos ni gang du'o/ /zhi la dga' ba gal te rgyal srid dman pa ste/ /rgyal srid
41b6(mdo 'grel): la blo gal te zhi ba rnam par nyams/ /drang dang dro dang me dang chu yi gcig nyid bzhin/ /zhi ba dang ni rno nyid 'thad pa ma yin no/ /me dang chu yi 'du ba yod pa ma yin la/ /khram dang drang po'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin zhing/ /'phags dang sdig pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin
41b7(mdo 'grel): te/ /zhi dang chad pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin no/ /de phyir sa 'dzin bdag po de rnams nges pas sam/ /rgyal po'i srid rnams spangs te zhi ba thob pa can/ /rgyal srid dag la snyen nas dbang po spas nyid las/ /mthar ma thug par thar par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byas//
42a1(mdo 'grel): de dag rnams kyi rgyal srid la zhi ji lta bzhin/ /bdag ni nags tshal rab thob des bas ma yin zhing/ /khyim dang gnyen gyi 'du shes zhags pa bcad nas ni/ /thar gyur slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod ma yin/ /de ltar bdag nyid rnam
42a2(mdo 'grel): shes yon tan rjes mthun pa/ /re 'dod spangs shing gtan tshigs ldan pa sgrogs pa ste/ /mi dbang bdag nyid skyes kyi smra ldan thos gyur nas/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pa yis kyang lan ni smras pa'i/ /gang zhig chos kyi cho gas des pa khyod kyi 'di/ /rig pa min pa ma yin
42a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni dus rig yin/ /na tshod la gnas yab ni mya ngan phyir byin nas/ /chos 'dod khyod kyi chos ma yin par gyur pa'o/ /nges par khyed kyi blo ni shin tu phra min zhing/ /yang na chos dang don dang 'dod par mkhas ma yin/ /gang zhig ma mthong 'bras bu'i don du khyed
42a4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis/ /mngon sum don ni yongs su brnyes par mdzad nas gshegs/ /yang srid yod ces kha cig dge ni smra ba ste/ /med ces kha cig dang ni nges par dam 'cha'o/ /de ltar gang tshe?  don 'di the tshom gyur pa ste/ /de phyir longs spyod par nus dpal ni nye bar gnas//
42a5(mdo 'grel): gal te slar yang rab tu 'jug pa gang yang yod/ /der ni ji ltar 'bad pa dag la dga' bar bgyi/ /ci ste gzhan du rab tu 'jug la gang yang med/ /'gro ba 'di yi 'bad rtsol med las thar pa 'grub/ /kha cig 'jig rten pha rol yod ces smra ba ste/ /thar pa'i sbyor ba
42a6(mdo 'grel): la ni bsngags pa byed ma yin/ /ji ltar me yi dro dang chu yi gsher ba nyid/ /de ltar rab tu 'jug par rang bzhin nyid du smra/ /dge dang mi dge nyid dang srid dang srid min la/ /kha cig rang bzhin las zhes bsngags pa byed pa ste/ /gang phyir 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin
42a7(mdo 'grel): las yin te/ /de yi phyir yang rab tu 'bad pa don med 'gyur/ /gang zhig dbang po rnams kyis des par rab spyod pa/ /yul rnams la ni dga' ba dang ni mi dga' nyid/ /gang zhig dga' dang nad rnams dag gis sbyor byed de/ /de la gang gis 'bad dam de ni rang bzhin no/ /chu
42b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis ni ma rnams zhi bar nye 'gro zhing/ /'od zer rnams kyi chu ni skems par byed pa ste/ /lus la yang dag gnas pa'i 'byung ba tha dad rnams/ /gcig nyid gyur nas 'gro ba dag ni 'dren par byed/ /gang zhig lag pa rkang pa lto rgyab mgo rnams kyi/ mngal du song ba'i
42b2(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nges par sgrub byed la/ /gang tsheb bdag nyid de yi de yis sbyor ba ste/ /rang bzhin las byung de shes rnams kyis de smra'o/ /bya dang ri dags rnams kyi sna tshogs ngo bo dang/ /tsher ma'i rnon po nyid du rab tu byed pa su/ /rab tu 'jug pa 'di kun rang bzhin las yin la//
42b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa byed pa yod min 'bad pa gang las so/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams dbang phyug las skyes smra ba ste/ /der ni skyes bu'i rab tu 'jug pa la don ci/ /'gro ba'i rab tu 'jug la gang nyid rgyu yin zhing/ /ldog pa la ni nges par de nyid rgyu yin no/ /kha cig bdag gi mtshan
42b4(mdo 'grel): ma nyid du smra ba ste/ /rab tu skye ba nyid dang srid pa zad pa yang/ /'bad pa med las rab tu skye bar smra ba ste/ /'bad pa yis ni thar pa 'thob par smra ba'o/ /lha yi mchod sbyin drang srong rnams kyi rig byed dang/ /pha yi bu lon med pa bu rnams kyis te mi/ /gang gis grol
42b5(mdo 'grel): ba yod pa de yi thar pa zhes/ /bu lon gsum po de dang lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /de ltar cho ga'i bya ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /'bad rtsol bcas pa'i thar pa de shes rnam smra la/ /'bad rtsol ldan pa yin yang rnam par gnon pa yis/ /thar pa 'dod pa rnams ni ngal ba
42b6(mdo 'grel): thob par byed/ /de phyir zhi ba gal te thar la gus yod na/ /cho gar brjod pa ji ltar rigs pas bsnyen mdzod dang/ /'di yi nye bar 'thad pa de ltar gyur pa ste/ /mi yi bdag po'i kun nas gdung ba nyams par 'gyur/ /dka' thub nag 'tshal dag nas khang par
42b7(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa la/ /khyod kyi skyon gyi blo gros gang zhig rab zhugs te/ /yab gcig der yang khyod kyi bsam par ma gyur dang/ /snga ma rnams kyang nags nas rang gi khang par gshegs/ /dka' thub nags na gnas pa bu rnams kyis bskor te/ /rgyal po a mA ri Sha grong du
43a1(mdo 'grel): zhugs gyur la/ /de bzhin 'phags min rnams kyis sa ni rnam bcom pa/ /dka' thub nags nas 'ongs nas rangs byed kyis bsrungs so/ /de bzhin do ba dang bcas mdag po'i ljon shing ming/ /nags gnas bu dang bcas pa grong du zhugs pa ste//
43a2(mdo 'grel): tshangs pa'i drang srong gyur dang thub pa gnas 'jog las sbyin sreg dang bcas mdza' can lha yis dpal gzung ngo/ /rnam pa de ltar chos dang grags par rab zhugs pa/ /nags rnams por nas khang khyim rnams su song ba ste/ /de phyir dka' thub nags nas chos kyi ched
43a3(mdo 'grel): du nyid/ /khyim na rab tu 'gro ba skyon yod ma yin no/ /de nas mi skyong rgyal po'i dga' dang phan pa nyid/ /byas pa'i blon po de yi tshig dag gsan nas ni/ /dman min ma 'khrug chags min brtan dang gnas pa la/ /myur min tshig ni rgyal po sras kyi smras pa'o/ /'dir ni
43a4(mdo 'grel): yod dang med ces the tshom gang de ni/ /gzhan gyi tshig gis bdag la 'di na nges pa med/ /dka' thub dang ni zhi bas de nyid rtogs gyur nas/ /gang 'dir nges par bdag nyid kyis ni bzung bar bgyi/ /phan tshun gnod cing mi gsal the tshom skye ba yi/ /lta ba
43a5(mdo 'grel): ngag ni len par bdag gis nus ma yin/ /mun par long bas long ba'i lam mkhan byed pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo su zhig gzhan gyi rkyen gyi 'gro/ /de nyid ma mthong gyur kyang 'on kyang kho bo yi/ /dge dang mi dger the tshom na dge blo gros gyur/ /'bras bu
43a6(mdo 'grel): med phyir la yang dge ba'i bdag nyid mchog /smod pa'i bdag nyid de nyid la yang bde ba med/ /rnam gzhag med pa'i lung 'ang yang na mthong gyur nas/ /tshad ldan rnams kyi gang smras de ni legs rtogs mdzod/ /nyes la rab dman tshad ldan nyid ni rtogs
43a7(mdo 'grel): mdzod dang/ /nyes pa rab tu dman pas bden min smra ba yin/ /khyim la 'jug par dmigs gang bdag la khyod kyis ni/ /smras shing rengs byed la sogs rnams ni dper bstan te/ /de rnams tshad min chos nges rnams su nus med cing/ /tshang ma'i ched du brtul
43b1(mdo 'grel): zhugs rnams ni yongs su zad/ /de lta na yang nyi mas la lhung gyur la/ /gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bos brtan nyid 'dor na yang/ /de nyid ma mthong yul la kha bltas dbang po ni/ /khyim rnams dag la so so skye bo mi bsnyen to/ /bdag ni 'bar bar gyur pa'i me la 'jug
43b2(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /don ma byas par khyim gyi gzhi la rab mi 'jug/ de ltar thugs rgyal ldan des dam bca' mdzad gyur cing/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bzhengs nas sngar 'dzin med par gshegs/ /de nas mchi ma dang bcas blon dang gnyis skyes gnyis/ /de yi brtan pa
43b3(mdo 'grel): nyid dang nges pa thos gyur nas/ /yi mug bzhi ldan rjes su song nas sdug bsngal ba/ /dal bus song nas grong khyer nyid du song bar gyur/ /de nas de la brtse dang mi skyod la gus las/ /de dag ltos bcas rab tu song zhing gnas gyur la/ /gsal zhing snang bas
43b4(mdo 'grel): nyi ma blta bar dka' ba ltar/ /de ni lam du blta bar ma nus dor bar min/ /mchog tu gshegs te gshegs pa shes phyir de dag gis/ /so ba'i skyes bu gtsang ma spas pa rnams byas nas/ /dga' zhing sras po 'dod pa'i rgyal po la song nas/ /ji
43b5(mdo 'grel): ltar blta 'am zhes ni ji ltar yang song ngo/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /gzhon nu rjes su tshol ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //sku stong rgyas shing rgya chen rgyal po'i sras po ste/ /bsreg bya dang sngags
43b6(mdo 'grel): bdag po de dag rnams spangs te/ /dpa' rlabs g.yo ba'i chu bo gang+gA brgal nas ni/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gyur/ /ri rnams dag gis legs par spas dang brgyan pa dang/ /dge dang dka' thub gter bas gzung dang gtsang ba ste/ /zhi bar
43b7(mdo 'grel): rang byung tshangs pa mtho ris logs su bzhin/ /rig sngags mtshan ma'i grong khyer rab tu thob par gyur/ /zab mor gyur pa'i mdangs dang de yi lugs gsal ba/ /skyes bu rnams ni shin tu gnon pa mthong gyur nas/ /khyu mchog rgya ba mtshan de yi brtul zhugs brtan
44a1(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /der ni de tshe skye bo rnams ni ya mtshan gyur/ /de rab mthong nas gzhan gang ma song de gnas shing/ /der ni gang zhig lam na gnas de rjes 'gro zhing/ /gang zhig skyen por song de brtan por song gyur la/ /kha cig bsdad pa gang
44a2(mdo 'grel): yin de ni langs pa'o/ /skye bo kha cig de la mchod pa'i lag pa yis/ /bsti stang byas nas kha cig mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing/ /kha cig mnyen pa'i tshig gis mngon par stong byed cing/ /kha cig de la rab tu mchod nas song bar gyur/ /de rab mthong nas sna tshogs
44a3(mdo 'grel): cha lugs rnams ngo tsha/ /rab bkram tshig ni lam du smra ba med par song/ /dngos su gzhan du chos rnams dag gi nye logs su/ /kha cig tshul ma yin pa'i blo gros ma gyur to/ /lha dang mtshungs pa'i mi dbang sras po de mthong nas/ /bya ba gzhan ma rnams kyang rgyal po'i lam
44a4(mdo 'grel): du ni/ /mchod mar bkur sti sngon 'gro bud med rnams kyi 'am/ /skyes ba rnams kyi mig dang dom par ma gyur to/ /dpral ba 'am smin ma dag dang zhal lam spyan dag dang/ /sku 'am phyag dag dang ni 'gros sam zhabs dag ni/ /gang gis de yi gang nyid der ni mthong
44a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /de nyid kyis ni de yi mig dag bcings par gyur/ /smin ma mdzod spu dang bcas spyan dag yangs pa dang/ /sku lus mdzes shing dge ba'i dra ba dang ldan phyag /sa skyong nyid du 'os pa'i dge slong cha lugs de/ /mthong nas rgyal po'i khab kyi phun tshogs
44a6(mdo 'grel): g.yos par gyur/ /de nas khang pa'i phyi nas rnam rgyal skye bo'i tshogs/ /ma ga d+ha yi khyim gyi jo bo bzo spyangs kyis/ /mthong bar gyur te de yi rgyu mtshan dris pa ste/ /de nas 'di la skyes bu rnams kyis de smras so/ ye shes mchog gam yang na sa yi dpal ngag ni//
44a7(mdo 'grel): thob par 'gyur zhes bram ze rnams kyis gang smras pa/ /rab tu gshegs par skye bos nges par mthong ba yi/ /shAkya'i bdag pa'i sres po de ni 'di yin no/ /de nas don thos yid kyi chags shing zhen gyur pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sa ni skyes bu de nyid la smras pa/ /de ni gang
44b1(mdo 'grel): du song zhes rnam par shes par mdzod/ /de nas de ltar bgyi zhes skyes bu rjes su song/ /g.yo mi spyan ni gnya' shing gang tsam gzigs pa ste/ /gsung ni kun nas snyoms shing zab mo'i 'phros mnga' ba/ /g.yo ba'i sems dang lus rnams dag ni des bsdams na/ /dge slong
44b2(mdo 'grel): mchog nyid de yang bsod snyom la gshegs so/ /ji ltar nye bar 'thad pa'i bsod snyoms bsnams nas ni/ /rnam par dben zhing char rab 'bab par rab gshegs la/ /der ni tshul bzhin rigs pas mngon par gsol gyur nas/ /de ni sa 'dzin ri bo skya bsed la 'jegs so//
44b3(mdo 'grel): ro d+ha'i nags kyis nye bar spas pa'i ri bo der/ /rma bya'i skad kyis rab gang lo ma'i spyil bo na/ /'char ri'i steng na nyi ma gzhon nu ji lta bar/ /ngur smrig gos kyi nyi ma'i nyi ma de mdzes so/ /der ni de nyid rgyal po'i 'khor de mthong gyur nas/ /bzo sbyangs rgyal po la ni gtam
44b4(mdo 'grel): dag byas pa ste/ /thos nas rgyal po des kyang mchod pa mang po las/ /der ni spas pa'i rjes su 'brang bas rab tu song/ /skya bseng ri bo mchog la skya bseng na dang ni/ /brtson 'grus mnyam zhing ri bo dang mnyam sku lus can/ /mi yi seng ge'i 'gros can cod pan 'dzin
44b5(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ /ral pa g.yo ba'i seng ge gzhin du 'dzegs par gyur/ /de nas de yi steng na rtse mor gyur pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang po nyer bar zhi ba ni/ /ri bong gis mtshan sprin gyi spubs nas byung ba bzhin/ /skyil mo krung gis bzhugs nas rnam par mdzes pa mthong/
44b6(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang phun sum tshogs dang nye bar zhi ba yis/ /chos kyi sprul ba bzhin du nye bar bzhugs de la/ /ya mtshan dang bcas rab tu bsnyen ldan mi dbang po/ /rang byung la ni brgya byin gyis bzhin nye bar gnas/ /rigs pa yis ni rigs pa rig pa rnams kyi mchog/
44b7(mdo 'grel): khams mnyam gyur pa ni la song nas dris pa ste/ /de nyid kyis kyang mtshungs shing zhi bas mi skyong la/ /yid ni rang bzhin gnas dang nad med smras par gyur/ /de nas gtsang la blang ngo'i rna ba ltar sngo ba'i/ /rdo ba'i logs la rgyal po yang dag des gnas shing//
45a1(mdo 'grel): nye sar nye bar bsdad nas rjes su mthun pa yis/ /de yi dgongs pa rnam par shes 'dod 'di smras so/ /rim pas 'ongs pa nyid dang yongs su brtags pa ste/ /khyod kyi rigs kyis bdag gi dga' ba mchog yin la/ /gang phyir bdag la rang
45a2(mdo 'grel): gi na tshod smra 'dod pa/ /skyes te de phyir brtse ba'i tshig 'di mkhyen par mdzod/ /khyod kyi rigs ni rnam rgyas sngon du nyi ma ste/ /lus kyang na tshod gsar pa gsal la mdzes pa 'di/ /gang phyir 'di ni khyod kyis blo gros rim med pas/ /slong mo nyid la mngon
45a3(mdo 'grel): dga' rgyal srid lam yin/ /khyod kyi lus 'di tsan dan dmar po 'os pa ste/ /ngur smrig gis dkris de ni 'os pa ma yin no/ /lag pa 'di ni skye dgu skyod bar 'os pa ste/ /gzhan gyis byin pa'i bza' ba za bar 'os ma yin/ /de phyir zhi ba gal te yab kyi
45a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal srid la/ /khyod kyi yab kyi brtse las stobs kyis mi 'dod cing/ /khyod kyi blo gros rim par bzod par ma gyur na/ /skyen par kho bo'i yul gyi phyed la longs spyod mdzod/ /de lta na ni rang gi skye la gnod min zhing/ /dus kyi rim pa yid kyang dpal gang bsngags
45a5(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /de phyir khyod kyis bdag la brtse ba mdzod cig dang/ /dam pa rnams dang bcas pas dam pa'i dpal 'phel lo/ /ci ste de? ni rigs kyi khengs pa nyid las ni/ /bdag cag rnams la khyod la blo gtad yon tan med/ /sde rgyas rnams ni mda' yis rnam
45a6(mdo 'grel): par dkrugs byas nas/ /bdag dang bcas pas pha rol rnams ni pham par mdzod/ /de phyir 'dir ni gnyis dbus gcig blo tshol mdzod la/ /chos don 'dod pa rnams la cho ga bzhin bsnyen mdzod/ /'di na sde tshan gsum po chags las rnam bzlog nas//
45a7(mdo 'grel): 'di dang gzhan du phyin nas lhung ba kun nas 'thob/ /gang zhig don dang chos la gnod nas 'dod pa dang/ /chos dang 'dod pa yongs su brnyas nas don dang ni/ /'dod dang don dag nye bar zhi bas chos de ni/ /don byas gal te mdza' dag 'dod na don yin no//
45b1(mdo 'grel): de phyir sde mtshan gsum la nges par snyen pa yis/ /khyod kyi gzugs 'di 'bras bu bcas pa nyid du mdzod/ /chos dang don dang 'dod pa dman min thob pa la/ /mi rnams dag gi dman min skye ba'i don du smra/ /de phyir gzhu ni rnam par 'gengs 'os
45b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa'i phyag /'di dag 'bras bu med par byed par 'os min te/ /nga la nu bzhin 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum rnams kyang/ /phan par 'os pa yin na sa 'dir smos ci dgos/ /brtse bas nges par de ni bdag gis smra ba ste/ /ya mtshan gyis min dbang phyug
45b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi chags pas min/ /khyod kyi dge slong nyid kyi cha lugs 'di mthong nas/ /rjes su brtse ba skyes nas mchi ma yang byung ngo/ /de phyir rang rigs rab mtshungs khyod kyi gzugs ji srid/ /rga bas zil gyis mnan nas slar yang ma 'ongs par/ /slor? mo'i
45b4(mdo 'grel): gnas 'dod 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod la/ /dus su chos la dga' ba chos ni gyis mdzod cig /khogs pas nges par chos ni 'thob par nus pa ste/ /'dod pa nye bar spyod la rgas pa'i 'gro ba med/ /de phyir dar la bab pa'i 'dod pa rnams smra ste//
45b5(mdo 'grel): bar ma'i nor yin rgan po rnams kyi chos yin no/ /gson pa'i 'jig rten dag na chos dang don dag ni/ /rnam par dag la bar gyur pa yin phyir lang tsho rnams/ /yang dag bsrung ba yin yang thub par dka' ba ste/ /gang phyir 'dod pas lam de las ni 'phrog
45b6(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /na tshod 'khogs pa rnams ni rnams ni rnam dpyod ldan pa ste/ /shin tu brtan pa'i gnas skabs mchog tu song ba rnams/ /ngo tsha ba nyid phyir dang song ba ma yin phyir/ /'bad pa nyung ngus zhi ba'i bdag nyid gyur pa'o/ /de nyid phyir na g.yo zhing yul ni
45b7(mdo 'grel): gtso bo dang/ /rab mos bzod pa ma yin ring por mthong min la/ /'brog dgon dag la nges par thar nas dbugs phyung bzhin/ /g.yo sgyu mang po'i lang tsho shin tu 'das nas so/ /de phyir mi brtan g.yo la bag med ldan pa yi/ /na tshod gsar ba 'di ni re zhig rnam
46a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'ong/ /'dod pa'i lha yi sngon du na tshod 'ben yin la/ /dbang po rnams las bsrung bar nus pa ma yin no/ /ci ste khyed kyi chos nyid mdzad par 'dod pa ni/ /mchod sbyin gyis lha mchod mdzod 'di ni rigs kyi chos/ /mchod sbyin
46a2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis mtho ris logs ni byin rlabs nas/ /lha dbang nyid kyang mtho ris logs su gshags par gyur/ /gser gyi dpung rgyan rnam par bcings pa'i phyag rnams dang/ /nor bu'i sgron mas 'bar ba'i dbu rgyan sna tshogs can/ /mi skyong dang srong
46a3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang drang srong chen po rnams ngal bas gar gshegs 'gros der mchod sbyin rnams kyis gshegs/ /de ltar ma ga d+ha yi bdag pos tshig smras pa/ /gang zhig dbang po'i bzhin du smra ba yang dag mdzes/ /sna tshogs du ma'i sa phyogs te se'i? gangs
46a4(mdo 'grel): ri ltar/ /rgyal po sras des de thos gyur nas rnam ma g.yos/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /bzo sbyangs sngon du song ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bshes kyi sgo nas phan pa yin pa'i don/
46a5(mdo 'grel): de ltar ma ga d+ha yi bdag po smras pa yis/ /rang gnas rnam par 'gyur min rigs gtsang gtsang ba'o/ /zas gtsang rgyal po'i sras kyi tshig 'di smras pa'o/ /seng gas? mtshan pa'i yangs pa'i rigs su rab skyes pa/ /khyed kyi cho ga de ni ngo mtshar
46a6(mdo 'grel): chem yin/ /gang phyir bshes gnyen phyogs su gshegs 'dod khyod kyi ni/ /yongs su dag pa'i spyod pas spyod pa de yin no/ /rang rigs rjes su spyod pas dam pa min la byams/ /dbang po ma tshang ba la dpal bzhin gnas min la/ /snga mas byas
46a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i dga' ba rims rnams kyis/ /de ni dam pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar byed/ /don ni dka' ba rnams su mi rnams gang zhig gis/ /mdza' bo rnams kyi mnyam pa'i don gyur 'jig rten na/ /gshes gnyen de rnams blo yi yongs su shes bgyi
46b1(mdo 'grel): sde sta? rang gnas dag ni 'phel bar gang gi phyir ma yin/ /de ltar gang gis rdzas dag thob nas 'jig rten na/ bshes rnams dang ni chos la nges par spyor byed pa/ /de rnams kyis ni nor gyi snying po thob pa ste/ /mthar ni nyams las gdung pa skyed par byed ma yin/ /rgyal po mdza' 
46b2(mdo 'grel): bo nyid dang 'phags pa nyid kyis kyang/ /khyod kyi nges pa gang zhig bdag la dmigs pa 'di/ /mdza' bo nyid kyi 'dir ni rjes su bsnyad bgyi ste/ /rgol ba gzhan min 'dir ni bdag gis smra bar bgyi/ /bdag gis rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam rigs nas/ /thar pa 'dod pas chos
46b3(mdo 'grel): 'di rab tu thob pa ste/ /gnyen 'dun dga' ba mchi ma'i gdong ldan rnams spangs nas/ /mi dge'i rgyur gyur 'dod pa rnams ni sngon nyid do/ /bdag gi yul rnams dag las ji ltar 'jigs pa nyid/ /de ltar sprul gyi dug rnams la ni mi 'jigs shing/ /nam mkha' dag las
46b4(mdo 'grel): 'phos pa'i thog rnams las min la/ /rlung dang bcas pa'i me rnams dag las ma yin no/ /mi rtag 'dod pa rnams kyis dge ba'i nor brku zhing/ /stong pa rmi lam sgyu ma dang mtshungs 'jig rten na/ /yid la smos pa yis kyang smongs par byed pa ste/ /me yi sems ni bdag
46b5(mdo 'grel): nyid gnas pa smos ci 'tshal/ kye ma 'dod pas zil gyis non na mtho ris su/ /bde ba thob min 'chi ba'i 'jig rten na smos ci/ rlung grogs ldan pa'i me yi bud shing gis ji ltar/ /sred dang bcas pa'i 'dod pa rnams gyis tshim pa med/ /'gro na 'dod pa rnams dang
46b6(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa'i don med med/ /smongs las de rnams kho nar skye bo rab tu chags/ /de nyid shes nas de ltar don med 'jigs pa ste/ /shes ldan su zhig rang gis don med mngon par 'dod/ /rgya mtsho'i gos can sa ni kun nas kyang/ rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol dral bar 'dod pa
46b7(mdo 'grel): ste/ /rgya mtsho'i chu rnams dang chu bran rnams kyis ltar/ /'jig rten pa yi 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med/ /lha yis gser gyi char pa dag kyang phab gyur la/ /gling rnams bzhi po mdza' dag la yang longs spyad de/ /brgya byin gyis kyang gdan phyed dag kyang rab thob nas/ nga la
47a1(mdo 'grel): nu ni yul rnams dag la ngoms pa med/ /lha na lha rnams kyi yang rgyal srid longs spyad nas/ /mchod sbyin brgya pa lha min 'jigs las rab nyams tshe/ /rgyags las drang srong chen po rnams la'ang khur bcol nas/ /'dod pa rnams la ngoms
47a2(mdo 'grel): med sgra med lhung bar gyur/ /e la'i rgyal pos mtho ris rnams ni rnam dkrugs te/ /brla mdzes lha mo de nyid dbang du byas nas kyang/ /sred phyir drang srong rnams la gser dag phrogs pa ste/ /yul rnams la ni ngoms med nyams par song bar gyur/ /lha min las
47a3(mdo 'grel): ni dbang chen dbang chen las dgra med/ /dgra med las slar dbang chen gang du nyer song ste/ /mtho ris dang ni sa 'am yul ni de rnams su/ /bskal pa'i tshogs 'khrugs rnams la su zhig blo gtang byed/ /shing shun gos can rtsa ba 'bras bu chu za zhing/ /lag
47a4(mdo 'grel): 'gro'i sprul ltar ring ba'i ral pa'i khur rnams kyang/ /gang gis don gzhan ma yin thub pa yang nyams te/ /'dod pa zhes bya'i dgra bo rnams ni su yis chol/ /rno ba'i mtshon cha dang ni rno 'dzin mtshon cha yang/ /gang gi don du 'jigs te las ni 'chi thob la/ /de
47a5(mdo 'grel): dag rnams kyi dge min sems kyang spyod rnams kyi/ /'joms phyir de phyir brtul zhugs rnams kyis smos ci dgos/ /yul rnams su ni mya ngan nyung ngur shes gyur nas/ /kun nas sbyor zhing mchog tu ngoms pa med pa nyid/ /dam pa rnams kyis smod cing nges par
47a6(mdo 'grel): sdig pa ste/ /'dod pa'i ming can dug ni su yis len par byed/ /zhing gis las la sogs pa rnams kyis nyam thag cing/ /'dod pa rnams la mi char rnams kyi rang gnas dang/ /'dod pa'i bdag nyid rnams kyi rang gnas thob nas ni/ /'dod pa rnams ni spong
47a7(mdo 'grel): bar sems ldan rnams kyis nus/ /grub 'gyur 'dod pa rnams su rgyags pa nyer 'thob phyir/ /'dod pa can la 'dod 'byor rgud pa shes bya ste/ /rgyags las bya ba min byed bya ba ma yin la/ /gang gis zad cing ngan 'gror nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang la
47b1(mdo 'grel): 'bad pas thob cing yongs su bskyangs pa rnams/ rnam par bslus nas slar yang so sor 'gro ba ste/ /bdag nyid ldan pas g.yar bo dang mtshungs de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la 'di na mkhas pa su zhig dga' / /btsal nas dang ni blangs nas skom pa skyes pa yi/
47b2(mdo 'grel): gang rnams mi 'dor sdug bsngal bar ni yongs 'gro la/ /'jig rten dag na rtswa sgron dang mtshungs de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /bdag ldan min pa'i snying la gang gis rnam rmugs te/ /rnam par nyams par 'gro 'gyur bde
47b3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gro min zhing/ /kun nas khros pa'i sprul dang rab mtshungs de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /ltogs pas nyam thag khyi bzhin rus pa zos nas kyang/ /gang rnams la ni ngoms par 'gyur ba ma yin nyid/ /'khogs pa'i
47b4(mdo 'grel): rus pa'i keng rus dang mnyam de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /gang gi rgyal po rkun po chu dang me rnams las/ /thun mong gyur ba nyid phyir sdug bsngal skyed byed de/ /rab tu gtor ba'i sha dang mtshungs pa de rnams su/ /'dod
47b5(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /dgra bo dang ni gnyen 'dun 'brel pa rnams las kyang/ /gang la gnas pa rnams ni skyen par rgud pa ste/ /skye mched dang mtshungs nye bar 'tshe ba de rnams su/ 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin//
47b6(mdo 'grel): ri dang nags dang chu dang rgya mtsho rnams su yang/ /gang la rnam par 'phyo ba rnams ni lhung 'gyur te/ /ljon shing rtse mo'i 'bras bu dang mtshungs de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'bad pa drag po 'thob pa rnams/
47b7(mdo 'grel): gang gi skad cig gis 'dir nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ /rmi lam nye bar longs spyod dang mtshungs de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /gang rnams bsgrubs nas dang ni snam par spel nas dang/ /yongs? su?  skyangs nas kyang ni bde
48a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'gro min la/ /lci ba'i me ma mur dang rab mtshungs de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /gang gi don du sgra ngan rnams ni nyams gyur la/ /ro bsregs shing dang rab tu mtshungs pa de rnams su/
48a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa rnams la bdag ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /lha min mdzes sbyin dang ni nye ba'i mdzes sbyin dag/ /gang gi don du phan tshun dgrar song nyams gyur la/ /mdza' bshes gyur cing rnam par 'bral ba de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga'
