48a3(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /gang dag rnams kyi don du chu dang me la dang/ /sha za rnams la bdag nyid 'dir ni 'dor ba ste/ /dge ba ma yin dgra bor gyur pa de rnams su/ /'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin/ /bshes med 'dod pa'i don du bkren por byed pa ste//
48a4(mdo 'grel): gsod dang 'ching ba la sogs sdug bsngal rab thob la/ /'dod pa'i don du sems ni bkren pa'i dka' thub can/ /gson pa'i 'jig rten 'ching ba dang ni ngal bar 'gro/ /ri dags rnams ni gsod phyir glu yis 'phrog byed la/ /gzugs kyi don du phye ma
48a5(mdo 'grel): leb rnams mer mchong zhing/ /sha dag don gnyer nya yis lcags ni za ba ste/ /de phyir yul rnams don med nyid du 'bras bu smin/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod yin zhes gang gi blo yin la/ /kha cig longs spyod rnams ni yongs su spyod pa ste/ /gos sogs
48a6(mdo 'grel): rdzas kyi yon tan yin phyir 'jig rten na/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar byed ces rab tu gzung bar bya/ /skom pa rab tu zhi phyir chu dag 'dod pa ste/ /bkres pa rnam par nyams phyir bza' ba de bzhin du/ /rlung dang gdung ba sgrib pa'i ched du khang pa ste/ /'doms dang
48a7(mdo 'grel): grang ba sgrib pa'i phyir ni bgo ba'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni rnam par 'joms phyir gnas yin la/ /de bzhin lam la dal ba nyams phyir theg pa ste/ /de bzhin gnas ni rnam par spyod phyir stan yin la/ /gtsang dang nad med stobs la brten phyir khrus yin no//
48b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'i ched du gyur pa ste/ /de bzhin skye dgu rnams kyi yul nas longs spyod min/ /rab tu zhi ba'i tshe gdar? bzhugs shes rab can/ /longs spyod rnam ni bza' zhes su yis khas len byed/ /gang zhig 'gro ba'i gdung bas rnam par gdungs pa
48b2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /longs spyod yin zhes grang ba'i bya bar nan tan byed/ /sdug bsngal zhi ba'i bdag nyid la ni rab 'jug cing/ /des ni 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod 'du shes byed/ /gang phyir 'dod pa rnams la mdza' gcig gyur min te/ /de phyir bdag gi de la longs
48b3(mdo 'grel): spyod 'du shes med/ /dngos po gang nyid kyis ni bde ba ster byed pa/ /de nyid kyis ni slar yang sdug bsngal 'dren par byed/ /bgo ba lci mo dang ni lci ba ma yin nyid/ /grang dang dro ba'i tshe na bde dang bde min la/ /zla 'od rnams dang tsan dan nyid kyang dro ba na/ /bde
48b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir dang sdug bsngal phyir yin grang ba na'o/ /gang phyir rnyed dang ma rnyed? la sogs 'jig rten na/ /kun gyi gnyis su 'dzin pa rnams ni rab zhugs te/ /de phyir mdza' gcig bde ba yod pa ma yin zhing/ /sa na skyes bu kha cig mdza' cig sdug bsngal min/ /bde
48b5(mdo 'grel): dang sdug bsngal nyid ni rnam par 'dres mthong nas/ /rgyal srid dang ni bran nyid mnyam pa bdag gi lugs/ /rgyal po nyid ni rtag par rgod pa ma yin zhing/ /dran ni kun nas gdung ba nyid kyang ma yin no/ /gang phyir mi skyong nyid du bka' lung lhag par gyur/
48b6(mdo 'grel): de phyir rgyal po'i sdug bsngal dag ni chen po nyid/ /kun nas bsten pa'i shing dang rab mtshungs rgyal po ni/ /sred pa'i rgyu las yongs su dal bar 'gro ba nyid/ /rgyal srid 'dor ldan bshes min mang por mi skyong gis/ /gal te blo gtad 'cha' bar gyur na
48b7(mdo 'grel): rgud? pa ste/ /ci ste yang na blo gtad nye bar byed min na/ /'dir ni 'jigs ldan rgyal po'i bde ba zhes bya ci/ /gang tshes ni mdza' dag rgyal bar gyur nas kyang/ /gnas pa'i ched du grong khyer gcig pu nyid mthong zhing/ /de nyid la yang pho brang gcig pu bsnyen
49a1(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ /rgyal por gyur pa pha rol don du ngal lam ci/ /rgyal po sdod pa'i gnas kyang mnya' shing gcig nyid de/ /de bzhin bkres pa 'gegs phyir bza' ba tsam yin la/ /de bzhin nyal lam gcig dang stan ni
49a2(mdo 'grel): gcig nyid de/ /lhag dang lhag min mi skyong gis ni rgyags phyir ro/ /gal te tshim pa'i don du 'bras bu de 'dod na/ /rgyal srid rnams dang bral yang bdag ni tshim pa yod/ /tshim pa yod par gyur na skyes bu'i 'jig rten na/ /khyad par med pa ma
49a3(mdo 'grel): yin thams cad khyad par ro/ /de phyir dge dang zhi ba'i lam ni rab thob pa/ /kho bo 'dod pa rnams la bslu bya ma yin la/ /mdza' bshes nyid du dran par byas nas yang dang yang/ /dam bca' nges par skyong zhes bdag la smras pa'o/ /bdag ni nags su
49a4(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa mi bzod pas min la/ /dgra bo'i mnga' rnams kyis ni mgo bo 'dar ba min/ /'bras bu lhag pa rnams las re ba byas min te/ /de phyir khyed kyi tshig de bzung ba ma yin no/ /gang zhig yang yang shin tu sos 'debs khros pa'i sbrul/ /spangs nas
49a5(mdo 'grel): slar yang len pa la ni nan tan byed/ /yang na sreg pa'i rang bzhin 'bar ba'i rtswa yi me/ /spangs nas 'dod pa rnams ni slar yang de yis brten/ /gang zhig ma long long ba'i phyir ni 'dod pa ste/ /grol ba 'ching ba'i phyir dang phyug po nor mod phyir/ /rang
49a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gnas pa'i sems ni bsnyon pa'i sems phyir la/ /yul gyi bdag nyid phyir ni 'dod par de yis byed/ /gang zhig 'dir ni mchog tu zhi ba'i bde ba dang/ /gzhan du sdug bsngal rnams ni kun nas sgrib pa ste/ /byed ldan rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs las
49a7(mdo 'grel): sgro pa 'dod pa/ /slongs mo nye bar rgyu zhes rjes su brtse bya min/ /gang zhig 'dir ni zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob min la/ /gzhan du sdug bsngal rnams kyis rab tu 'dzin byed cing/ /phun tshogs chen po'i bdag nyid la yang rnam gnas pa'i/ /sred pa zil gyis non la
49b1(mdo 'grel): rjes su brtse bar bya/ /sems dpal yi dang spyod pa yi dang rigs nyid kyi/ /khyod kyis brjod pa la ni rjes su mthun pa ste/ /sems dpa' yi dang spyod pa yi dang rigs nyid kyis/ /kho bo yi yang dam bca' 'dren par mtshungs pa'o/ /bdag kyang 'khor ba'i mnga' yis rnam
49b2(mdo 'grel): phug pa/ /zhi ba thob pas 'dod pas rnam par nges 'byung ste/ /nad med mtho ris na yang rgyal srid 'thob pa ru/ /'dod pa med na kye ma mi rnams su smod ci/ /mi skyong gang yang sde gsum mdza' dag brten pa 'di/ /rab mchog mi yi don zhes khyed kyis bdag la smras//
49b3(mdo 'grel): de ltar don med ces ni bdag gis brten pa 'dir/ /mdzad ldan sde mchan gsum ni tshim byed kyang ma yin/ /gang du dga' bar 'gro min 'jigs min nang ma yin/ /skyo min nye bar 'da' min sems kyi nang rnams ni/ /gang na yang dang yang du bya ba yod min pa/ /de nyid  
49b4(mdo 'grel): skyes bu'i don ni mchog tu shes pa'o/ /ji srid na tshod so ma rnam par 'gyur bar 'gro/ /de srid dga' ba yongs su skyongs mdzod zhes smras pa/ /'di ni nges pa ma yin g.yo bar mthong ba ste/ /rga ba brtan pa min dang lang tsho brtan ldan mthong/ /rang gi las mkhan mthar
49b5(mdo 'grel): byed gang gi 'gro ba ni/ /na tshod kun la dbang med rnam par 'gugs pa ste/ /rnam gzhag ma yin rnam par nyams tshe gang ltar ni/ /zhi 'dod mkhas pa dag gis dga' ba rtogs par byed/ /gang tshe rga ba'i gzhu dang nad rnams bkram pa'i mda'/ /mthar byed dge ba
49b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin rngon pa bzhin gnas pas/ /skye dgu'i ri dags bskal pa'i nags rten rnams gtor te/ /na tshod rab mchog la dmigs yid la re ba yi/ /de phyir gzhon nam rgan dang yang na byis pa ni/ /rab tu 'jug par 'dod ngam rnam par ldog pa nyid/ /chos ldan
49b7(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid byas pa ji lta bar gyur pa/ /de ltar myur ba ldan pas 'dir ni bya bar 'os/ bdan? 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rigs su 'os pa rnams/ /chos phyir mchod sbyin bya ba gyis zhes gang smras pa/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bya bas 'dod pa ste/ /mchod sbyin rnams
50a1(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal bde ba 'dod ba med/ /'bras bu 'dod pas dbang med pa rol gsod pa la/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid dam pa rnams kyi rigs tshul man/ /gang yang mchod sbyin dag gis 'bras bu rtag gyur pa/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid gang  
50a2(mdo 'grel): gi da?  ltar byas nas ci/ /sems ni zhi ba yis sam tshul khrims brtul zhugs kyis/ /gal te chos tshul gzhan gyi cha ga ma yin la/ /de lta na yang mchod sbyin bsnyen par 'os yin te/ /gang du gzhan la 'ches nas 'bras bur brjod pa'o/ /'di nyid du
50a3(mdo 'grel): yang re zhig skyes bu gnas pa yi/ /bde ba gang zhig pha rol 'tshe bas rab zhugs pa/ /de yang brtse bcas blo dang ldan pa'i 'dod yin te/ /gang zhig srid pa'i tha mar mi mthong kye ma ci/ /rgyal po 'khor bar bdag gi yid ni dga' med cing/ /'bras bur
50a4(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'jug phyir bdag ni bslu bya min/ /chu 'dzin char gyis brgyab pa'i ljon shing bzhin du ni/ /kun tu song ba'i rab tu 'jug pa rnams ni g.yo/ /rnam par thar pa smra ldan rtsibs phur thub pa ni/ /blta bar 'dod pas bdag ni 'dir yongs de yi phyir/
50a5(mdo 'grel): mi skyong khyod la dge bar gyur cig nga ni 'gro/ /bdag gi nga nyid ltos med dag ni bzod par mdzad/ /lha na dbang po bzhin bsrungs rtag par nyid bzhin bsrungs/ /yon tan gyis bsrungs sa srungs 'dir ni dge legs bsrungs/ /tshe srungs 'phags pa
50a6(mdo 'grel): yis srungs ngam pa'i bu rnams dang/ /dpal srungs rgyal po'i bdag nyid kyis ni chos srungs shig/ /kha pa'i dgra yi rtag las skyes pa las skyes nas/ /ji ltar gnyis skyes gang zhig lus ni rnam thar 'gro/ /kha ba'i dgra? yi dgra yis khyim gyi dgra 
50a7(mdo 'grel): 'joms nang/ /nang du de ltar gang zhig yid ni rnam par thar gshogs mdzod/ /thal mo sbyar bcas re thob mi skyongs gis smras pa/ /khyed kyis ji ltar 'dod pa gags med thob par shog /bya ba byas pa kun nas thob pa dus su 'dod/ /kho bo yi
50b1(mdo 'grel): yang rjes su 'dzin pa khyed kyis mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar gyur ces brtan pa'i dam bca' mdzad nas sa skyong la/ /da nas de ni thams cad sgrol gyi dka' thub gnas su gshegs/ /yongs su gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang ya mtshan gyur pa yi/ /mi skyong nyid kyang
50b2(mdo 'grel): ri yi cho gas kyi grong khyer nyid du song/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod ba zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /'dod pa la rnam par smod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas lus kyi gang ba bzhin/ /bu ram shing pa'i zla ba yis/ /zhi bar
50b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i thub pa yis/ /rtsibs phur gyis na gnas su bsnyen/ /sgyu rtsal shes kyi rigs de yis/ /rgyang nas gzigs nas mthon po yis/ /legs par 'ongs zhes smras pa ste/ /drung du nye bar gshegs pa'o/ /de gnyis phan tshun rigs par ni/ /khams ni
50b4(mdo 'grel): snyoms par dris nas su/ /shing gtsang brtul zhugs gdan dag la/ /sa phyogs gcad bar bzhugs pa'o/ /bkur mang rnam par yang pa yi/ /lta byed dag gis 'thung ba bzhin/ /mi skyong sras po bzhugs de la/ /thub pa mchog nges smras pa'o/ /zhi ba nga? dag
50b5(mdo 'grel): gis shes pa ltar/ /khyim nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyis 'thung rgyags pas zhags pa ltar/ /rtse ba'i zhags pa bcad nas 'ongs/ /khyod kyi yid ni shes rab dang/ /kun nas brtan pa ldan pa nyid/ /dug gi ljon pa'i 'bras bu bzhin/ /gang khyod dpal
50b6(mdo 'grel): dong nas 'ongs so/ /longs spyad lhag ma'i phreng ba bzhin/ /bu rnams dag la dpal byin nas/ /sa skyong 'khogs pa'i na tshod rnams/ /gang zhig nags 'ongs ngo mtshar min/ /bdag gi lugs ni ngo mtshar te/ /so ma'i na chad la khyod kyis/ /yul gyis spyod yul
50b7(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa/ /dpal nyid longs ma spyad nas 'ongs/ /de phyir chos 'di shes pa la/ /khyod ni dam pa'i snod yin la/ /ye shes grub bo byin rlabs nas/ /skyen par sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sgrol/ /gang yang slob mar shes pa na/ /dus kyis bstan bcos la 'jug ste/ /
51a1(mdo 'grel): zab pa las dang nan tan las/ /bdag gis yongs rtog khyod me yin/ /de ltar rtsib 'phur nyid kyi tshig /mi yi drang srong des gsan nas/ /mchog tu bka' bar gyur pa yis/ /lan gnyis rab tu smras pa'o/ /don ma byas kyang
51a2(mdo 'grel): 'di yi ni/ /don byas bzhin du da lta nyid/ /chags dang bral ba gang 'di ni/ /dam pa khyed kyi mngon du gyur/ /blta bar 'dod pas 'od bzhin dang/ /sgrol bar 'dod pas gru bzhin dang/ /'gro bar 'dod pas lam mkhan bzhin/ /khyed mthong ba la
51a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis shes/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs rnams las/ /gal te gsung byar dgongs nas ni/ /de phyir gsung bar 'os pa'o/ /de ltar rtsibs 'phur gyis gzhon nu'i/ /bdag nyid che las bskul ba nyid/ /rang nyid kyi ni bstan bcos kyi/ /nges par
51a4(mdo 'grel): mdor bsdus gsungs pa'o/ /ji ltar 'khor ba yin pa la/ /ji ltar nges par ldog pa nyid/ /nyan pa rnams kyi mchog grub mdza' / /kho bo'i 'di ni gson mdzod cig /rang bzhin dang ni rnam 'gyur dang/ /skye dang 'chi dang rga ba ste/ /re zhig sems dpa' 
51a5(mdo 'grel): zhes brjod pa/ /brtan pa'i sems dpa' de shes mdzod/ /de la rang bzhin shes bya ba/ /rang bzhin shes pa shes par mdzod/ /'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid dang/ /blo dang mi gsal ba nyid do/ /rnam 'gyur zhes bya mkhyen par mdzod/ /yul rnams dang ni
51a6(mdo 'grel): dbang po rnams/ /lag pa rkang pa dag dang ni/ /'phongs dang 'doms dang de bzhin yid/ /'di yi zhing ni shes pa la/ /zhing shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ /zhing shes pa zhes bdag nyid du/ /bdag tu bsam byed rnams kyi smras/ /slob ma dang bcas ser
51a7(mdo 'grel): skya yis/ /'dir ni rab tu rtogs zhes don/ /bu dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa dang/ /skye dgu'i bdag por 'di brjod do/ /skye ba nyid dang rka ba dang/ /na ba dang ni 'chi ba gang/ /de ni gsal zhes rtogs bya ste/ /bzlog las mi gsal ba yang ngo/ /mi shes
51b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang las dang sred/ /'kher pa'i rgyu rnams shes bya ste/ /gsum po 'dir gnas 'gro ba ni/ /snying stobs de ni 'da' ba med/ /log pa las dang ngar 'dzin las/ /the tshom las dang mngon 'phyo las/ /khyad par steng? las thabs min las/ /chags
51b2(mdo 'grel): pa las dang mngon lhung las/ /de la log pa zhes bya ba/ /phyin ci log tu 'jug pa ste/ /bsam par bya ba gzhan sems zhing/ /bya ba gzhan ni phyed pa'o/ /smra pa nga dang rig pa nga/ /'gro ba nga dang gnas pa nga/ /de ltar 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa/ /ngar 'dzin med kyi
51b3(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa'o/ /gang zhig the tshom med dngos rnams/ /gcig tu gyur pas mthong ba ste/ /the tshom med pas 'jim gang ltar/ /de 'dir the tshom du brjod do/ /gang zhig nga nyid de nyid 'di/ /yin dang blo dang las yin la/ /gang zhig drangs te de nyid ded/ zhes
51b4(mdo 'grel): gang de ni mngon par 'phyo/ /rab rgyas rab rgyas ma yin pa'i/ /khyad par med pa'i khyad shes kye/ /rang bzhin rnams kyi gang shes pa/ /de ni khyad par med ces dran/ khyag 'chal ba dang gzhi mi 'grib/ /gsang gtor ngar ni mngon mthor sogs/ /thabs
51b5(mdo 'grel): min zhes ni shes ldan gyis/ /rab tu rtogs bya thabs shes kye/ /chags la mi skye yul rnams la/ /yi dag blo dang las rnams kyis/ /blo ngan gang gis chags byed pa/ /de ni mngon par chags zhes dran/ /bdag gi 'di dang 'di bdag ces/ /gang zhig
51b6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal mngon snyam ste/ /gang zhig 'khor bar ltung zhes bya/ /de ltar mkhas kyi ma rig pa/ /gnas skabs lnga ni rab theb ste/ /mun pa smongs pa smongs pa che/ /mun las gyur pa gnyis nyid do/ /de la mun pa le lor dang/ /rmongs pa skye 'chir rtogs par
51b7(mdo 'grel): mdzod/ /rmongs pa chen po 'dod pa zhes/ /kun nas rmongs med mkhyen par mdzod/ /gang phyir 'di na 'byung rnams kyi/ /chen por yang na rab rmongs byed/ /de phyir phyag chen 'di dag ni/ /rmongs pa chen po zhes dran ne/ /mun las gyur pa khro nyid du//
52a1(mdo 'grel): lhag par byed pa'o bro med kyi/ /mi shes mun las gyur pa ni/ /skyo bar rab bshad skye med kye/ /ma rig pa 'dis byis pa ni/ /gnas skabs lnga dang ldan pa ste/ /'khor bar sdug bsngal gyur pa yi/ /skye ba rnams su
52a2(mdo 'grel): bab par byed/ /lta bo nyam? po shes pa po/ /bya ba dang ni rgyu nyid dag/ da zhes de ltar 'ongs nas ni/ /'khor bar yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /blo ldan rgyu 'di rnams kyis 'di/ /skye ba'i rgyun la rab tu 'jug /rgyu med pa las 'bras bu med/ /de ltar
52a3(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes par 'os/ /de la rab rgyas rab rgyas mig/ gsol ba dang ni mi gsal nyid/ /thar pa 'dod pa bzhin rnams te/ /yang dag 'gro ba rigs par mdzod/ /bzhi po de dag ji lta bzhin/ /'gyur med go 'phang 'thob par byed/ /de phyir 'jig
52a4(mdo 'grel): rten na tshangs pa/ mchog tu tshangs par smra ba rnams/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyod byed 'dir/ /tshangs pa rnams kyi gnas par byed/ /mi skyong sras kyis thub pa de'i/ /tshig 'di de ltar gsan nas ni/ /mthar thug go 'phang nyid dang ni/ /thabs mngon pa
52a5(mdo 'grel): dag dran pa'o/ /ji ltar ji srid gang du ni/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di spyad cing/ /chos 'di yis ni mthar thug pa/ /khyod kyis rnam par bshad par 'os/ /de ltar thub pas bstan bcos lta/ /rnam gsal don ni mdor bsdus pas/ /cho ga'i rtog pa
52a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan nyid kyis/ /chos de de la smras pa'o/ /'dis ni dang por khyim spangs nas/ /slongs mo'i rtags ni brten pa ste/ /phrin las rnam par rgyas pa yi/ /tshul khrims blangs nas 'jug par byed/ khyed ldan rtsod med bstan bcos rig/ mchog tu
52a7(mdo 'grel): tshim pa la gnas nas/ /gang dang de yis gang dang der/ /rnam dben gnas ni brtan pa'o/ /de nas chags las 'jigs mthong nas/ /chags pa med las mchog zhi yang/ /dbang po'i grong ni nges bzung ste/ /yid la zhi ni 'bad pa byed/ /de nas
52b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa zas las dang/ /gnod sems sogs las rnam dben nyid/ /bsam gtan dang po rnam dpyod ldan/ /rnam par dben pa las skyes thob/ /bsam gtan bde ba de thob nas/ /de dang de nyid rnam dpyod cing/ /sngar med bde ba thob pa yis//
52b2(mdo 'grel): byis pa'i skye bo 'phrog par byed/ /'dod dang sdang ba rnam smad pa'i/ /zhi ba'i cho ga de 'dra 'dis/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob pa ste/ /yongs su tshim pas gnas pa'o/ /rnam dpyod yid ni skyo byed rnams/ /mkhas par rnam par shes nas kyang/ /de las
52b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par grol pa ni/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ldan thob/ /gang zhig khyad par ma mthong zhing/ /dga' ba de yis phrogs pa de/ /'od gsal ba yi lha rnams su/ /'od gsal ba yi gnas 'thob bo/ /gang yang dga' ba'i bde de las/ /yid ni
52b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par dben byed pa/ /dga' ba'i bde ba dang brel ba/ /bsam gtan gsum pa thob par byed/ /de 'dra'i bde ba 'dir thob nas/ /gang zhig chags min btang snyoms shing/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rnam spangs pa'i/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa thob par byed
52b5(mdo 'grel): bde dang sdug bsngal zhi phyir dang/ /sems kyi bya ba med pa'i phyir/ /thar zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /der yang kha cig 'bad pa byed/ /bsam gtan de yi 'bras bu ni/ /'bras bu che bas lhas mnyam par/ /yongs spyod shes rab che rnams kyis//
52b6(mdo 'grel): chen po'i dus su smra ba'o/ /ting 'dzin de las rnam langs sing/ /lus skyes skyon rnams mthong nas ni/ /lus la rnam par ldog pa'i phyir/ /shes ldan bsam gtan la 'jog go /de nas bsam gtan de bor nas/ /khyad par la ni nges byas pa'i/ /shes
52b7(mdo 'grel): rab ldan de 'dod las bzhin/ /gzugs rnams las kyang chags pa med/ /lus 'di la ni kha gang du/ /de la yongs su rtog pa ste/ /de nas rdzas sdug rnams la yang/ /nam mkhar lhag par mos par byed/ /nam khar song ba'i bdag nyid du bsdus nas gzhan du blo
53a1(mdo 'grel): ldan gyis/ de nyid mdza' med par mthong zhing/ /khyad par 'phags pa lhag par 'thob/ /nad la mkhas pa gzhan dag ni/ /bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis bzlog nas/ /ci yang med ces mthong ba ni/ /ci yang med pa zhes dran no/ /de nas
53a2(mdo 'grel): gyur nas bya bzhin dang/ /lgang bu dag nas srin bal bzhin/ /zhing shes lus las 'thon pa las/ /thar pa zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /de nyid shes pa'i mkhas pa yis/ /gang zhig thar pa zhes brjod pa/ /'di de tshangs pa dam pa ste/ /rtags med rtag cing 'gyur
53a3(mdo 'grel): ba med/ /de ltar thabs dang thar ba dag /bdag gis khyod la brtan pa ste/ /gal te shes shing gal te seng/ /ji lta ba bzhin rtogs par mdzod/ /rgyal 'dod bu dang skyed byed dang/ /gzhan mi 'brang ba rgan po dang/ /thar pa 'dod pa gzhan rnams kyang/ /lam 'di
53a4(mdo 'grel): thob nas grol bar 'gyur/ /de yi dam pa'i tshig 'di dang/ /rnam par dpyod pa yang bzung nas/ /sngon du rgyu yi stobs thob pas/ /lan ni smras par gyur pa'o/ /gong nas gong du zhi ba yi/ /ye shes phra mo 'di thos shing/ /zhing shes yongs su ma btang phyir//
53a5(mdo 'grel): de ni mthar thugs min par go/ /rnam 'gyur dang ni rang bzhin las/ /zhi dang shes grol yang kho bo yis/ /rab tu skye ba'i chos su dang/ /sa bon chos su snyam pa'o/ /gang yang rnam dag bdag nyid ni/ /nges par thar zhes rtog pa ste/ /slar yang rkyen
53a6(mdo 'grel): dag yod pa las/ /de ni grol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar dus sbyor sa dang chu/ /me las sa bon skye ma yin/ /de bzhin rkyen ni de rnams kyis/ /skye ba de yang bdag gi lugs/ /gang zhig mi shes las sred rnams/ /spangs las thar ba rtogs byed pa/ /de ni
53a7(mdo 'grel): mchog tu yongs spong ba/ bdag yod gyur na yod ma yin/ /spangs nas spangs nas gsum po 'di/ /khyad par du yang nyer 'thob cing/ /gang du bdag ni gnas gyur pa/ /der ni gsum po 'di phra'o/ /skyon rnams phra ba nyid las dang/ /sems kyi bya ba med
53b1(mdo 'grel): las dang/ tshe ni ring ba nyid las kyang/ /thar par kyang ni yongs su rtogs/ /dar 'dzin par ni yongs spong bar/ /gang de yongs su rtog byed la/ /bdag spyod gyur nas dar 'dzin pa/ /yongs su spong ba yod ma yin/ /drang srong rnams kyis ma spangs pa/ /'di ni yon
53b2(mdo 'grel): tan med ma yin/ /de phyir yon tan med gyur na/ /'di yi thar par mi brjod do/ /yon tan can gyi yon tan gyi/ /ldog pa yod pa ma yin te/ /gzugs dang do ba dang bral ba'i/ /me ni nye bar 'thob ma yin/ /lus las sngon lus can dang ni/ /yon tan las sngar
53b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan can/ /ma yin de phyir dang por grol/ /lus bzhin slar yang 'chad par byed/ /zhing shes lus dang rnam bral ba/ /shes pa yin nam shes min nyid/ /gal te shes 'di shes bya yod/ /shes bya yod na mi grol lo/ /ci ste khyod la shes mi 'grub/ /bdag
53b4(mdo 'grel): tu rtog pas ci zhig bya/ /bdag dang bral yang shes pa ni/ /rab grub shing dang rtsig pa bzhin/ /gang phyir gong nas gong du ni/ /de ltar rtsibs 'phur gyi ni chos/ /mkhyen nas de ni ma chim zhing/ /mdza' dag min zhes shes nas su/ /de nas so sor gshegs pa'o//
53b5(mdo 'grel): de nas khyad par tshos 'dod pa/ /lhag spyod kyi ni gnas su gshegs/ /de yi bdag tu 'dzin las kyang/ /des ni lta bar sred ma gyur/ /'du shes 'du shes med pa'i skyon/ /thub pa lhag spyod kyis shes nas/ /'du shes 'du shes med bdag min/ /cung zad med las
53b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan 'gro thob/ /gang phyir dmigs pa phra mo ni/ /'du shes 'du shes med las gzhan/ /'du shes med min 'du shes min/ /de phyir der ni re 'dod med/ gang phyir der ni bla gnas shong shing/ /gzhan du rab tu rgyu ba med/ /phra zhing rno ldan de phyir der/ /'du shes
53b7(mdo 'grel): med min 'du shes med/ /de phyir de yang rab thob nas/ /slar yang 'gro ba 'khor ba ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dod pas/ /de phyir ltag spyod dor ba'o/ /de nas de yi gnas thob nas/ /dge legs de na gnyer nges byas nas/ /gang yang rgyal ba'i drang srong
54a1(mdo 'grel): gi/ grong khyer zhes bya'i gnas bsnyen no/ /de nas nai rany+dzana'i 'gram/ /gtsang mar gtsang zhing pha rol gnon/ /dben pa'i gnas ni mngon 'dod pa'i/ /thub pa yis ni gnas mdzad do/ /de nas de ni sngar brten zhing/ /dbang po lnga yi
54a2(mdo 'grel): dbang las khengs/ /mun pas bsnyen pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /dge slong lnga rnams nges gzigs so/ /bsod nams kyis bsgrubs nor nad med/ dbang don rnams kyis dbang phyug bzhin/ /dge slong de rnams kyis kyang 'dir/ /de mthong gyur nas nye
54a3(mdo 'grel): bar gnas/ /de'i dbang gi gnas slob ma rnams/ /dbang po g.yos pas yid bzhin du/ /rab tu de rnams kyis mchod cing/ /rnam par dul las rjes su 'jug /'chi dang skyes pa mthar byed la/ /de nas thabs ni 'di yis zhes/ /bza' ba med par de yis
54a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /dka' thub gdung ba rnams brtsams so/ /bsnyun gnas cho ga du ma rnams/ /mi yis spyod dka' rnams mdzad cing/ /las ni thob bzhed lo drug tu/ /bdag gis sku lus ring par mdzad/ /pha mdza' med pa'i 'khor ba yi/ /pha rol thob par 'dod pa nges/
54a5(mdo 'grel): bza' ba'i dus su til dang 'bru/ rab sha rnams ni re re gsol/ /dka' thub gdung ba des de yi/ /sku las bri bar byas pa gad/ /slar yang de yi gzi brjid kyis/ /sku lus nye bar 'phel byas gyur/ /ston ka'i dkar phyogs dang po yi/ /zla bas ku mu
54a6(mdo 'grel): da rnams bzhin/ /rid kyang dpal grags ris min zhing/ /gzhan gyi mig rnams tshim par mdzad/ /rus lpags lhag ma lhag med par/ /tshil dang sha dang khag rnams kyis/ /zad kyang zab mo ma zad par/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du de mdzes so/ /de nas sangs rgyas
54a7(mdo 'grel): nyid 'dod pas/ /dal dub gdung bas don med bsal/ /nyon mongs lus can thub pa ni/ /srid las 'jigs pa blo mdzad do/ /chos 'di chags bral phyir min zhing/ /rtogs phyir ma yin thar phyir min/ /de tshe 'dzam bu'i rtsa bar gang/ /bdag gis thos te nges
54b1(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /'di ni stobs chung gis thob par/ /nus pa med phyir gus 'ongs shing/ /sku yi stobs ni 'phel don du/ /slar yang 'di ni rjes su bsam/ /bsres dang skom pas yongs bcer zhing/ /dal las rang gnas med pa'i sems/ /yid kyis theb bya'i 'bras bu ni
54b2(mdo 'grel): ldog pa med pa gang gis 'thob/ /rtag par dbang po tshim pa las/ /yang dag gnas pa 'thob pa ste/ /dbang po yang dag tshim nyid kyi/ /yid ni rang bzhin gnas pas thob/ /dang zhing rab dang yid kyi ni/ /ting 'dzin nye bar skye ba ste/ /ting 'dzin gyis sbyar sems kyi
54b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba rab tu 'jug/ /bsam gtan rab tu zhugs pa las/ /rnyed dka' zhi zhing dga' med mchog /'chi med go 'phang de chos rnams/ /gang gis thob par ba thob bo/ /de phyir bza' ba rtsa ba ste/ /'di ni thabs zhe nges pa yin/ /bza' ba byed la
54b4(mdo 'grel): brtan pa ni/ /dpag med blo yis blo mdzad nas/ /khrus byas nai rany+dza 'gram nas/ /lag byin 'gram gyi ljon shing ni/ /gud pa yid dung yal ga'i rtses/ /sku lus red pa dal bus drangs/ /de nas lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i/ /ba glang skyong ba bdag mo ni/ /snying la dga' skyes
54b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba yi/ /dga' stobs ma ni der 'ongs so/ /dung dkar gyis 'bar lags pa can/ /la ba sngon po gon pa mo/ /lpu ba dang bcas chu sngon phreng/ /chu mchog ya mu na bzhin no/ /spyan mig utpal rab rgyas shing/ /dad pas 'phel ba'i dga' ma nges/ /de la mgo yis
54b6(mdo 'grel): rab btung nas/ /'o ma drangs par gyur pa'o/ /des de gsol nas nga la ni/ /skye ba'i 'bras bu thob byas nas/ /yang dag dbang po drug tshim ste/ /byang chub 'theb par nus par gyur/ /phul byung rgyas pa'i sku mnga' zhing/ /rang gi grags bcas thub pa ni/ nus gyur rgya mtsho
54b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis dag gi/ /mdzes dang brtan pa gcig pos bzung/ /bdag ni nges par grol ba la/ /blo ldan khams lnga rnams kyis ltar/ /kun nas 'jug ces rnam shes nas/ /dge slong lnga rnams kyis de dor/ /de nas 'bad rtsol gnyis pa ni/ /byang chub ched du nges
55a1(mdo 'grel): mdzad de/ /rtswa 'jam bkram pa'i sa gzhi la/ /a shwadThA yi rtsa bar gshegs/ /de tshe glang po'i 'gros mnga' ba'i/ /dpe med zhabs kyi sgra yis sad par byas pa ni/ /thub pa chen po'i byang chub nges par rtogs pa yis/ /grub mchog
55a2(mdo 'grel): nag po zhes byas stod pa smras par gyur/ /ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi zhabs kyis brdzis pa ni/ /yang nas yang du sa ni sgra skad sgrogs pa 'dra/ /ji ltar khyod kyi 'di ni nyi ltar snang ba ste/ /khyod kyi nges par 'dod pa'i go 'phang mkhyen pa nyid/ /ji ltar mkha' la
55a3(mdo 'grel): khug rta'i phreng ba rnam bskor zhing/ /pad+ma'i spyan mnga' khyed la skor ba byed pa nyid/ /ji ltar mkha' la rlung rnams zhi bar 'gro ba ste/ /khyod kyis nges par de ring sangs rgyas 'gyur ba nyid/ /de nas klu mchog gis ni yang dag bstod pa ni/ /lcog las ni
55a4(mdo 'grel): gtsang ma'i rtswa rnams nyer smangs nas/ /byang chub shing chen rtsa ba dge la rab brten cing/ /byang chub ched du dam bca' mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas gnyid log lto 'phye'i gdengs skad bsdus pa la/ /des ni rdo rje'i skyil krung g.yo med mchog bcings
55a5(mdo 'grel): te/ /ji srid bya ba byas pa nyid na ma thob par/ /de srid sa la gdan de 'byed par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas nges pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan gdan mdzad tshe/ /lha na gnas rnams mnyam med dga' ba thob gyur la/ /ri dags tshogs rnams gnas par ma gyur
55a6(mdo 'grel): bya rnams dang/ /rlung gis bsnun pa'i nags kyi ljon shing sgra med gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ ring phur dang lhag spyod drung du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //
55a7(mdo 'grel): der ni rnam par mthar phyin dam bca' mdzad pa na/ /rgyal po'i rigs las rab 'khrungs drang srong chen po ni/ /der ni nye bar zhugs tshe 'jig rten rab dga' zhing/ /dar ni bdud kyang dam pa'i chos kyi dgrar gyur to/ /gang la 'dod pa'i ltar ni 'jig rten
55b1(mdo 'grel): nas ba/ /sna tshogs mtshon cha ma tog mda' can de bzhin na ru/ /'dod pa rab tu spyod pa'i bdag po de nyid la/ /thar pa'i dgra bo bdud du dpe brjod byed pa'o/ /de yi bu ni rol pa dga' ba rgyags pa dang/ /bu mo dga' ma dges ma sred ma gsum rnams kyi/ /de
55b2(mdo 'grel): la sems kyi rnam par 'gyur ba dris pa ste/ /des ni de rnams la tshig mngon par smras/ /thub pa 'dis ni nges pa'i go cha rnams gzung zhing/ /sems dpa' i mtshon cha blo yi mda' ni bsdogs byas nas/ /bdag cag yul rnams la ni rgyal 'dod bsad pa ste/
55b3(mdo 'grel): gang phyir 'dis? ni bdag gi yid ni rnam par 'gyur/ /gal te 'dis bdag zil gyis mnan nas 'gro ba ste/ /'jig pa la yang thar pa'i lam dag 'chad byed cing/ /lus 'phags jo bo spyod las lhung ba'i bzhin du ni/ /de phyir 'di yis bdag gis yul
55b4(mdo 'grel): ni de rang stongs/ /de phyir ji srid 'das ni spyan mig ma thob cing/ /ji srid bdag gi spyod yul dag na gnas pa nyid/ /chu bo shin tu 'phel ba'i shugs kyis zam pa bzhin/ de srid 'di yi brtul zhugs 'joms su 'gro ba'o/ /de nas me tog las byas gzhu ni bzung
55b5(mdo 'grel): nas dang/ /kun tu rmongs par byed pa'i mda' lnga rnams bzung nas/ /skye dgu rnams kyi rang gnas mi byed pa/ /de ni bur bcas a shwadtha? yi rtsa bar song/ /de nas srid pa 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pa'i/ /thub pa rab tu zhi bar gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /lag pa
55b6(mdo 'grel): g.yas pa mtshon cha'i rtse mor brdungs nas ni/ /mda' yis rol zhing bdud kyis 'di ni smras pa'o/ /kye ho rgyal rigs 'chi bas 'jigs pa longs mdzod cig /thar pa'i chos ni spongs la 'jig rten mdzod/ /mda' dang mchod sbyin rnams kyis 'jig rten pham byas
55b7(mdo 'grel): nas/ /'jig rten dag nas dbang po'i go 'phang thob par mdzod/ /gang zhig mi dbang snga ma rnams kyis 'drems pa ste/ /nges par 'byung la 'di ni grags pa'i lam yin zhing/ /rgyal po'i drang srong rnams yangs rigs su skyes pa yis/ /slong mor ba thob
56a1(mdo 'grel): la ni 'di ni bsngags ma yin/ /ji srid nges pa'i bdag nyid de ring mid ldang na/ /dam bca' rnam par ma dor brtan par gyur cig dang/ /gang zhig nya dgra sUdra ka la rnam spangs pa'i/ /de nyid bdag gi mda''di 'bar bar byas
56a2(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /'dis ni cung zhig reg pa tsam gyis e la de/ /zla ba'i tsha bo yin yang sems med gyur pa ste/ /zhi ba'i lus zhes bya ba de yang der 'gyur nas/ /zad pa'i dus su kye ma mi gzhan smos ci dgos/ /de phyir skyen par longs la 'du shes thob gyis
56a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ yang yang shin tu ro myang mda' ni mnan pa ste/ /dga' ma'i byar 'os dga' zhing dges pa rnams la ni/ /gang zhig dad pa rnams la bzhin du mi 'phen no/ /gang ste de skad brjod kyang chags pa dang bral ba'i/ /shAkya thub pas gdan ni
56a4(mdo 'grel): bshig pa ma yin nyid/ /de nas 'di la bdud kyi mda' ni 'phangs pa ste/ /bu mo rnams dang bu rnams bdun nas byas nas so/ /der ni de yi mda' ni rab tu 'phangs na yang/ /chags par byas pa med cing brtan las g.yos pa med/ /de ltar
56a5(mdo 'grel): de mthong gyur nas bdud ni yi mug cing/ /bsam mno yongs su ldan pa dal bu smras par gyur/ /ri dbang bu mo la dmigs gang gis phug pa yi/ /bde 'byung lha yang yongs su g.yos par gyur pa ste/ /'dis ni mda' de nyid la sems par mi
56a6(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /sems med yin nam mda''di de ma yin nam ci/ /de phyir me rtog mda'i 'di 'os pa ma yin zhing/ /dga' ba ma yin sbyor ba 'os ma yin/ /'di ni zhi ba ma yin 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /'jigs dang bsdigs dang rdeg pa rnams
56a7(mdo 'grel): ni 'os pa'o/ /de nas bdud kyis rang gi sde ni dran pa ste/ /shAkya thub pa'i bgegs ni mnyam por byed 'dod pa/ /ral gri be con shing rtse ljon shing rtse gsum mdung lag rnams/ /sna tshogs bsam pa dang ldan rjes su 'brang rnams 'os//
56b1(mdo 'grel): phag dang nya dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong can rnams/ /stag dang dom dang seng ge gnyis 'thug gdon can rnams/ /mig gcig kha ni du ma mgo bo gsum ldan rnams/ /gsus pa 'phyang ba rnam dang gsus ba che ba rnams/ /brla rnams pus mo'i bar du bum pa'i pus
56b2(mdo 'grel): mo rnams/ mche ba'i mtshon cha rnams dang sen mo'i mtshon cha rnams/ /keng rus gdong can rnams dang gzugs ni mang po rnams/ /gdong phyed zhog ba rnams dang gdod ni chen po rnams/ /thal skya rnams dang thig le dmar po sna tshogs rnams/ /kha
56b3(mdo 'grel): TwAM ga rnams dang ni spe'u ltar dung sgra rnams/ /'phongs 'phyang rnams dang glang po'i rna ba'i rna ba rnams/ /pags pa'i gos can rnams dang gos dang bral ba rnams/ /gded phyed dkar po rnams dang lus phyed ljang khu rnams/ /zangs mdog dung mdog rnams dang ljang gu
56b4(mdo 'grel): dkar po rnam/ /sbrul gyi sham thabs rnams dang de bzhin lag pa rnams/ /rab tu sgra sgrogs dril bu 'khrugs pa'i ska rags rnams/ /ta la'i tshad mnyam rnams dang mdung rnams bzung ba rnams/ /byis pa'i tshad mnyam rnams dang mche ba gtsigs pa rnams//
56b5(mdo 'grel): lug gi gdong can rnams dang bya yi mig can rnams/ /byi la'i gdong can rnams dang mi yi lus can rnams/ /skra bkam rnams dar ral pa can dang byi bo rnams/ /gos dmar rnams dang rnam par 'khrugs pas dkris pa rnams/ /rab dga' i gdong can rnams dang
56b6(mdo 'grel): gnyed ma'i gdong can rnams/ /gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams dang yid ni 'phrog pa rnams/ /kha cig dag ni 'bo zhing drag tu phan tshun du/ /mtshan khung 'khyud cing de bzhin gzhan rnams mchongs/ /mkha' la 'gro ba rnams ni kha cig rtse ba ste/ /kha cig shing gi rtse mo
56b7(mdo 'grel): rnams la zhon pa'o/ /kha cig rtse gsum skor zhing gar ni byed pa ste/ /kha cig dbyug pa gdengs shing thog sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /kha cig dga' bas khyu mchog bzhin du skad 'don zhing/ /kha cig lus 'phos rnams las rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ /'dzin par 'dod
57a1(mdo 'grel): ba rnams dang 'joms par 'dod pa rnams/ /jo bo'i bka' ni rab tu skyong bar byed pa ste/ /rnam pa de ltar 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /mtshan mo snga ma la ni
57a2(mdo 'grel): shAkya'i khyu mchog dang/ /bdud kyi 'thab mo dus de rab tu mthong nas ni/ /nam mkha' gsal ba ma yin sin g.yos gyur la/ /phyogs rnams sgra dang bcas pa rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ /drag po'i shugs can rlung ni kun tu g.yos gyur la/ /skar ma
57a3(mdo 'grel): rnams ni mi snang zla ba gsal ma gyur/ /slar yang mtshan mor mun pa rnam par rgyas gyur la/ /rgya mtsho rnams ni thams cad kun tu g.yos par gyur/ /sa gzhi 'dzin cing chos dag 'dzin pa'i klu rnams ni/ /thub pa chen po'i bgegs la bzod pa ma
57a4(mdo 'grel): yin zhing/ /bdud las khros pas rnam par log pa'i mig can rnams/ /rngam pa bton zhing lus ni rnam par 'gyur pa'o/ /gtsang mar lhag par gnas pa'i lha yi drang srong ni/ /dam chos bsgrub pa'i don du mngon par zhugs pa rnams/ /bdud las
57a5(mdo 'grel): yid kyi rjes su brtse ba byas pa ste/ /chags dang bral ba las kyang khros par ma gyur to/ /'tshe ba'i bdag nyid bdud kyi dpung ni de yis ni/ /byang chub rtsa ba de ni khyab pa mthong nas ni/ /chos kyi bdag nyid 'jig rten thar pa 'dod rnams kyis/ /nam mkha' 
57a6(mdo 'grel): dag la ha ha'i sgra dag byas par gyur/ /chos kyi chog de ni nye bar nyams byed pa/ /bdud dpung gnas pa drang srong chen pos gzigs nas ni/ /ba lang rnams kyi dbus su seng ge gnas pa bzhin/ /g.yo 'gul med cing rnam par 'gyur bar yang ma gyur/
57a7(mdo 'grel): de nas de yi 'jigs pa'i ched du bdud kyis ni/ /'byung po'i sde ni drang po rnams la bka' stsal cing/ /de nas 'di yi sde des rang rang? mthu rnams kyis/ /de yi brtan pa dbye phyir blo gros byas pa'o/ /kha cig lce rnams g.yo zhing du mas rnam 'chad
57b1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /mche ba'i rtse mo rnams rno mig rnams ljang ser zlum/ /kha rnams gdangs shing phur bu'i rna ba rnams brtan cing/ /kun nas smrag par byed pa snyam du gnas zhes grag /des ni gzugs dang bsam pa dag gis mi zad pa/ /rnam pa de lta nyid du
57b2(mdo 'grel): de nas pa de rnams las/ /rtsed mo byed pa'i byis pa rgyags pa rnams las ni/ /drang srong chen po zug med skyo bar ma gyur to/ /de nas kha cig khros pas lta byed rnam 'gyur zhing/ /'di la dbyug pa brdeg par 'bad pa bya ba ste/ /sngon tshe grong khyer 'joms pa'i
57b3(mdo 'grel): rdo rje dang bcas ltar/ /de nas 'di yi dbyug pa dang bcas lag ma rengs/ /kha cig rdo dang shing rnams gyin du 'phyar ba ni/ /thub pa la ni rnam par 'phen par ma nus te/ /'bigs byed ri brag rnams ni rdo rjes bcom pa bzhin/ /shing rnams dang bcas rdo
57b4(mdo 'grel): rnams bcas pa de bzhin ltung/ /kha cig mkha' la gyen du 'phur bas rdo rnams dang/ /dgra sta rnams dang shing rnams rnam par 'phang ba rnams/ /kha dog gcig min mtshams sprin rkang pa rnams bzhin du/ /mngon par lhung ba ma yin nam mkhar gnas
57b5(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /gzhan ni de yi steng du 'phar ba'i khyu mchog gis/ /glang po ri bo tsam pa'i rwa can 'phangs pa ste/ /de ni 'phangs pa tsam na nam mkha' gnas pa nyid/ /de yi mthu las rnam pa brgyar ni gas par gyur/ 'jig rten 'jig tshe lhun po rab tu 'bar ba
57b6(mdo 'grel): yis/ /gser gyi bya skyabs? rnams kyi phye ma rnam bzhin du/ /kha cig nyi ma shar ba bzhin du 'bar ba yis/ /mi mdag char pa chen po mkha' las phab par gyur/ /byang chub shing gi rtsa bar rab tu rnam 'phangs pa'i/ /me stag 'phro ba dang bcas me mdag
57b7(mdo 'grel): chad ba de/ drang srong dam pa mchog gi byams pa'i gnas pa las/ utpal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i chad par gyur pa'o/ /lus dang sems la rnam par gnod par bya ba'i phyir/ /rnam pa de ltar phab pa de dang de rnams kyis/ /rang gi nges pa'i gnyen 'dun
58a1(mdo 'grel): nye bar 'khyud nas bzhin/ /shAkya thub pa gdan las g.yos par ma gyur to/ /de nas gzhan rnams 'khogs pa'i ljon shing rnam nas ltar/ /kha nas las ni sprul rnams rnam par skyugs pa ste/ /sngags kyis bcings bzhin de
58a2(mdo 'grel): rnams de yi drung du ni/ /song ba ma yin dbugs min g.yos par ma gyur to/ /gzhan rnams glog dang bcas shing thog dang bcas pa yis/ /chu 'dzin chen po gtum pa'i dbyangs ldan rnams gyur nas/ /ljon shing de la rdo pa'i char pa phab pa ste/
58a3(mdo 'grel): de ni me tog chad pa mdzes par 'gyur pa'o/ /dbang phyug ma yin sron par dka' ba'i mi yi ni/ /snying la yongs su g.yos pa'i khro ba bzhin du ni/ /de nas gzhan gyi gzhu la mda' dag bkod pa ni/ /de nyid du ni 'bar zhing lhung bar ma gyur to/ /yul
58a4(mdo 'grel): la rab tu 'jug la 'khor ba la 'jigs pa/ /yongs su rtog pa po yi dbang po lnga rnams bzhin/ /gzhan rnams dag gis mnga' lnga rab tu 'phangs pa rnams/ /nam mkhar gnas shing thub pa la ni ma ltung ngo/ /gzhan ni brdeg par 'dod pas
58a5(mdo 'grel): khros shing rab bskor zhing/ /dbyug pa bzung nas drang srong chen po'i mngon du phyogs/ /don med byed pa'i nyes pa rnams la 'jig rten las bzhin/ /des ni 'dod pa ma thob dbang med 'gyel bar gyur/ /bud med sprin pa nag mo lag na thod pa can//
58a6(mdo 'grel): drang srong chen po'i thugs ni rmongs par byed ces grag /g.yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi blo ni lung la bzhin/ /der ni nges pa med par skor zhing gnas ma yin/ /kha cig mig ni rab tu 'bar bar byas nas ni/ /mig gi me yi sprul gyi dgu bzhin bsreg
58a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas/ /'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis nyer gnas dpal bzhin du/ /der ni drang srong bzhugs pa mthong par ma gyur to/ /ye shes ting 'dzin dag gis 'gro bya nyes legs chos/ /lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis 'thob par 'dod pa bzhin/ /de
58b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin gzhan ni rdo ba lci mo bteg pa ni/ /rab tu 'bad pa rnams bcom don med ngal bar gyur/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams dred dang seng ge'i rnam pa yi/ /chen po'i sgra rnams mthon por rab tu sgrogs pa ste/ /rdo rjes bsnun pa'i nam mkha' 'gas pa zhes
58b2(mdo 'grel): snyam nas/ /sems can rnams ni gang gis kun nas 'khums par gyur/ /ri dags glang po rnams ni nyam dag skad 'don zhing/ /rnam par 'bros shing thig pa nyid du gyur pa ste/ /de yi mtshan mor phyogs rnams las ni nyin mo bzhin/ /nyam thag bya
58b3(mdo 'grel): rnams skad 'don yongs su babs par gyur/ /rnam pa de ltar de rnams kyi sgra de rnams kyis/ /'byung po thams cad rnams su g.yos pa yin na yang/ /khab rnams dag gi sgra rnams dag gis mkha' lding ltar/ /thub pa 'jigs pa ma yin 'khums
58b4(mdo 'grel): par ma gyur to/ /'jigs pa 'dron pa yongs su bskor ba'i tshogs rnams las/ /ji ltar ji ltar thub pa'i 'jigs pa ma yin pa/ /de lta de ltar chos 'dzin rnams kyi dgra bo yi/ /bdud rnams mya ngan las dang khros nas byer ba'o/ /de nas 'byung po cung
58b5(mdo 'grel): zhig gzugs ni mtho ba ma yin zhing/ /khyad par 'phags par gyur pa nam mkhar gnas nyid kyis/ /drang srong la gnod dgra ma yin la khros mthong nas/ /bdud lha chen po'i dbyangs kyis smras par gyur pa'o/ /don med ngal bar byed par 'os pa ma yin
58b6(mdo 'grel): bdud/ /'tshe ba'i bdag nyid spod la bde bar song mdzod dang/ /ri bo chen po lhun po rlung rnams kyis bzhin du/ /khyod kyis bskyod cing bsgul bar nus pa ma yin no/ /sa yi brtan pa nyid dang chu yis gsher ba nyid/ /me yis dro ba nyid ni rab tu 'dor ba
58b7(mdo 'grel): yang/ /bskal pa du mar bsrub pa'i bsod nams las mnga' ba/ /'dis ni nan tan des par 'dor ba ma yin no/ /'di yi des pa gang dang pha rol gnon pa dang/ /gzi brjid gang dang brtse ba skye dgu rnams la ste/ /'od zer stong gis mun rnams ma
59a1(mdo 'grel): bcom gnas bzhin du/ /'di ni de nyid ma thob nas ni ldang ma yin/ /shing la bsrubs nas me ni rnyed par 'gyur ba ste/ /sa la brkos na chu yang 'thob par 'gyur ba nyid/ /rigs pa dang ni ldan pa'i thams cad byas pa ste/ /brtson
59a2(mdo 'grel): 'grus ldan pa'i bsgrub bya ma yin ci yang med/ /de phyir chags sogs nang rnams dag la gnas pa yi/ /'jig rten nyam thag pa la thugs rje mnga' ba ni/ /ye shes dman gyi don du yongs su ngal ba po/ /smran pa chen po 'di la bgegs?
59a3(mdo 'grel): 'os ma yin no/ /lam ngan mang po rnams kyis 'jig rten stor ba la/ /gang zhig zhi bas dam pa'i lam ni rjes tshol ba/ /chung zos pa la legs par ston byed ded dpon bzhin/ /ston mdzad de ni bskyod par rigs pa ma yin no/ /mun pa
59a4(mdo 'grel): chen po sems can chung zos rnams la ni/ /ye shes sgron ma rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa 'di/ /mun pa la ni rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma bzhin/ /'phags pa'i mya ngan 'da' bar byed par 'os ma yin/ /'khor ba'i rnam 'gyur chu bo
59a5(mdo 'grel): chen por 'gro ba ni/ /pha rol ma thob par ni bying bar gzigs nas ni/ /gang gis de ni sgrol bar byed la rab zhugs te/ /de la sdig pa 'phags pa su yi sems par byed/ /bzod pa'i chu rgyus brtan pa'i rtsa ba brtan pa ste/ /spyod pa'i me tog
59a6(mdo 'grel): blo dang dran pa'i yal gcan/ /ye shes ljon shing chos kyi 'bras bu ster ba po/ /'phel bzhin pa ni zlog par 'os pa ma yin no/ /gang gis snying la smongs pa'i zhags pa sra rnams kyis/ /bcings pa'i skye dgu rnams kyis grol phyir blo mnga' zhing//
59a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba bcings pa thar pa'i ched du'o rgyal ba/ /de la brdeg pa khyod kyi 'thad pa ma yin no/ /byang chub ched du las gang dag ni mdzad pa rnams/ /de rnams kyi ni nges par de ring dus yin la/ /ji ltar thub pa snga ma rnams ni de bzhin du/ /gnas der de bzhin
59b1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /dbyig 'dzin sa gzhi yi ni lte ba 'di yin zhing/ /snying po dam pa mdza' dag dang ni ldan pa nyid/ /gang zhig 'di yi ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs bzod pa'i/ /sa yi phyogs de 'di las gzhan pa yod ma yin/ /de phyir khro bar
59b2(mdo 'grel): ma byed zhi bar nyer song la/ /bdud ni khyod kyi dregs pas nga rgyal ma gyur cig /dpal ni mi brtan blo gtad par ni nus min zhing/ /go 'phang g.yo la rgyags par mngon par nyer 'gro zhing/ /de nas de yi tshig de yang dag thos nas kyang/ /thub pa chen po'i g.yo ba
59b3(mdo 'grel): med? ba nyid mthong nas/ /gang gi mda' yi 'gro ba'i snying la rdeg byed pa'i/ /bdud ni 'bad pa bcom zhing yid mi bde bar song/ /dga' ba med cing 'bras med dal ba byas pa rnams/ /pha 'ong rnams ni khyu mchog ljon shing rnams gtor te/ /dgrar gyur dgra
59b4(mdo 'grel): bo'i dpung ni gtso bo bsad pa ltar/ /de nas 'di yi dpung ni phyogs phyogs bros pa'o/ /me tog tog can 'khor dang bcas pa bros shing nges par 'pham pa na/ /drang srong chen po mun pa 'pham zhing rdul dang dral ba rgyal ba na/ /rgod pa dang bcas lang tshom
59b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin zla ba dang bcas mkha' gsal zhing/ /chu yi snying po can gyi dri zhim me tog char ba bab par gyur pa'o/ /de ltar sdig pa can ni nges par pham pa na/ /de tshe phyogs ni rab snang mtshan mor byed pa mdzes/ /mkha' la me tog char rnams sa la bab pa
59b6(mdo 'grel): ste/ /lang tshom bzhin dal ba med par mtshan mo gsal/ /sangs rgyas kyi skyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas brtan dang zhi ba yi/ /bdud kyi
59b7(mdo 'grel): stobs ni pham mdzad nas/ /don dam rnam par mkhyen bzhed pa/ /bsam gtan mkhas te bsam gtan mdzad/ /bsam gtan cho ga thams cad la/ /dbang phyug dam pa rab bsnyes nas/ /sngon gyi skye ba rim pa ni/ /dang po'i thun la dran pa'o/ /che ge mo bdag
60a1(mdo 'grel): ming 'di ni/ /de nas 'phos te 'dir 'ongs pa'o/ /zhes ni skye ba stong phrag rnams/ /rjes su rmyong pa bzhin du dran/ /'thad pa de dang de rnams su/ /skye bar 'chi ba dran nas ni/ /de nas sems can la thugs rje/ /thugs rje'i bdag
60a2(mdo 'grel): nyid can gyis mdzad/ /rang gi skye bo bor nas ni/ /slar yang gzhan du bya ba rnams/ /nges par 'jig rten mgon med 'di/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor/ /de ltar nges pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /de yi dran par gyur pa ste/ /chu shing snying po snying po
60a3(mdo 'grel): med/ /'khor ba de ltar nges par ro/ /thun ni gnyis pa byung ba na/ /gnyis med pha rol gnon pa de/ /mig dang ldan pa kun gyi mchog /lha yi spyan ni thob par gyur/ /de nas nges ni lha yi spyan/ /yongs su dag pa de yis ni/ /me long dri ma med pa
60a4(mdo 'grel): ltar/ /'jig rten mdza' dag la gzigs so/ /mchog dang mchog min las rnams kyis/ /sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang/ /skye ba gzigs pa de yi ni/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'di rnams sdig pa'i las can rnams//
60a5(mdo 'grel): srog chags rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ /'di gzhan dge ba'i las can rnams/ /mtho ris su ni rab gnas so/ /shin tu mi bzad myal ba ru/ /rab tu 'jigs par gyur pa rnams/ /'di rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi/ /kye ma bkren par btser?
60a6(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /kha cig me yi kha dog gi /lcags khu khol ma 'thung bar byed/ /lcags kyi ka ba tshan mo la/ /gzhan rnams cho des 'debs shing 'dzegs/ /lcags zangs rnams su khas bub rnams/ /kha cig thug pa bzhin du 'chod/ /me bdag phung po
60a7(mdo 'grel): 'bar rnams su/ /kha cig snying rje rab sreg go /kha cig lcags kyi mtshan can/ /mi bzad khyi rnams kyis za zhing/ /kha cig ma rungs lcags mchu can/ lcags 'dra'i bya rog rnams kyi za/ /kha cig gdung bas yongs dal? rnams/ /bsil ba'i
60b1(mdo 'grel): grib ma mngon 'dod pas/ /ral gri'i lo ma'i nags sngon por/ /'di rnams bcings pa bzhin du zhugs/ /kha cig sta re rnams kyis ni/ /lag pa bteg rnams shing ltar 'gems/ /las rnams kyis bzung srog rnams ni/ /sdug bsngal na yang rnams mi smrin//
60b2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i don ched du/ /bde ba yin zhes las gang byas/ /da yi 'bras de dbang med kyis/ /sdug bsngal kho na nyer longs spyod/ /bde don mi dge ba byas nas/ /gang de shin tu sdug bsngal rnams/ /de dag rnams kyi ro myang des/ /bde
60b3(mdo 'grel): ba phra mo yang byed dam/ /sdig pa'i bdag nyid rgod rnams kyis/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pa gang/ /de ni sngon du gyur pa'i tshe/ /tshe? de rnams kyis rjes su myong/ /gal ge de ltar sdig las can/ /las kyi 'bras bu mthong ba ste/ /dmigs su mngon par
60b4(mdo 'grel): bsnun pa bzhin/ /skyen par khrag ni skyug pa nyid/ /lus kyi sdug bsngal rnams las dang/ /dmyal ba'i rnams las sems ldan gyi/ /'phags min rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs/ /ngal ba mchog ni bdag gi lugs/ /gzhan 'di sems kyi rnam g.yo
60b5(mdo 'grel): las/ byung ba'i las rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /byol song skye gnas sna tshogs su/ /nye bar skyes rnams gdung ba can/ /she lpags spu dang so yi phyir/ /chags pa las sam rgyags pa las/ /gnyen 'dun rnams kyis mthong na yang/ /gang du snying brje bar
60b6(mdo 'grel): bsod do/ /nus med ldan yang dbang med rnams/ /bkres skom ngal bas tser ba rnams/ /lcags kyis bsnun pa'i dbyibs can rnams/ /rta dang ba lang gyur rnams 'khol/ /stobs can rnams kyang stobs chung gi/ glang por gyur ba rnam 'khol te/ /lcags
60b7(mdo 'grel): kyus nyon mongs mgo bo rnams/ /rkang pa'i rting pa rnams kyis btags/ /phan tshun rnam par rtsod las dang/ /gzhan gyi dbang du gyur nyid gyis/ /sdug bsngal gzhan rnams la spyod kyang/ /gang la sdug bsngal khyad par ldan/ /phan tshun du ni rab phrad
61a1(mdo 'grel): nas/ /me gnas skam gnas rnams kyi dang/ /chur gnas chur gnas rnams kyis dang/ /mkhar gnas mkhar gnas rnams kyis 'joms/ sems nas non pa'i sems ldan rnams/ /yi dags 'jig rten snang med du/ /skyes
61a2(mdo 'grel): pa 'di rnams de bzhin du/ /bkran pa 'bras bu la longs spyod/ /khab mig lta bu'i kha rnams dang/ /ri bo lta bu'i lto ba rnams/ /bkres skom gyis bskyed sdug bsngal gyis/ /sdug bsngal skal can rnams bcer? to/ /ser sna'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba/
61a3(mdo 'grel): skyes bus gal te shes na ni/ /lus kyi cha shas rnams kyang ni/ /zhi ba bzhin du kun nas gtod/ /rang gi las rnams kyis bzung zhing/ /sred pas shin tu non pa rnams/ /bor ba'i mi gtsang pa rnams kyang/ /longs spyod par ni 'dis mi rnyed/ /'di
61a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan dmyal ba dang mchungs pa'i/ /mngal min mi gtsang khu ba ru/ /nye bar skyes rnams mi rnams su/ /'gro ba rnams ni sdug bsngal 'thob/ /de sngon skye ba tsam na yang/ /lag ba rnon pos bzung ba rnams/ /ral bri rnams kyis gshegs pa
61a5(mdo 'grel): ltar/ /gang du snying rje bar ni du/ /byams dang bsrung dang skyong rnams kyis/ /gnyen 'dun rnams kyis 'bad nas sos/ /sdug bsngal las slar sdug bsngal drag/ rang rang las kyis nyon mongs so/ /bya ba 'di dang bya ba 'di/ /zhes ni gang
61a6(mdo 'grel): du lhag par la/ /sred dang yongs ldan byis rnams gyis/ /rgyun chad med par rjes su myong/ /'di gzhan bsod nams las rnams kyis/ /mtho ris su ni skyes pa rnams/ /'dod chags ma yis drag tu ni/ /me ltar rab tu sreg bar byed/ /yul rnams
61a7(mdo 'grel): kyis ni ngoms med rnams/ /gang las 'di rnams gzi bcom ste/ /phreng ba yongs rnyings zhan pa rnams/ /gyen du mig phyogs rnam lhung ngo/ /gang du lha mo rnams kyis ni/ /sdug pa dbang med ltung ba la/ /snying la brtse ba ltos rnams kyis/ /lag pa
61b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis gos rnams 'dzin/ /gang zhigs la ltung ba bzhin/ /lud 'dod do shal g.yo rnams kyis/ /sdug rnams gzhal med khang rnams nas/ /snying rje dang bcas ltung la lta/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan phred can/ /gzhan 'dis sdug bsngal ltung rnams
61b2(mdo 'grel): la/ /gdung rnams brtse dang g.yo ba yi/ /lta byed rnams kyis rjes su 'gro/ /'dod pa can rnams ltung ba la/ /lag pa rnams kyis brang brdung zhing/ /'khrugs chen gyi ltar nyam thag pa/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis brten to/ /kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs
61b3(mdo 'grel): rdzing/ /kyi hud sdug pa gang na zhes/ /nyam thag pa rnams rnam zlos shing/ /lha la gnas rnams sa la lhung/ /las mad rnams kyis thob pa yi/ mtho ris mi brtan g.yo ba la/ /'bral bas byas pa'i sdug bsngal ni/ /gang du 'di 'dra thob par
61b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /kye ma nges las khyad par du/ /'jig rten mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ /'dod chags bral ba thob nas kyang/ /gzhan rnams lha nas nges par lhung/ /'di ni rtag par gnas pa ste/ /zhes ni nges pa'i sems ldan rnams/ /'jig rten
61b5(mdo 'grel): 'di yi rang bzhin ni/ /'di ltar bur ni mthong ma yin/ /dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal drag/ /dud 'gro rnams su phan tshun za/ /bkres skom sdug bsngal yi dags su/ /mi la tshol ba'i sdug bsngal lo/ /lha na sdug pa dang bral bas/ /bskyed
61b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sdug bsngal phul phyung ste/ /skor ba gson pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ /gang na zhi ba nges par med/ /'khor ba'i chu bo rten med du/ /'di ni 'chi bas bskor ba ste/ /tsam tsom du ni bskor ba yi/ /'gro bas gnas ni thob ma yin/ /de ltar
61b7(mdo 'grel): des ni 'gro ba lnga/ /lha yi spyan gyis gzigs pa ste/ /chu shing bshags pa bzhin du ni/ /srid par snying po rnyed ma yin/ /de nas de yi mtshan mo'i thun/ /gsum pa nye bar gnas pa na/ /'jig rten 'di yi rang bzhin ni/ /bsam gtan
62a1(mdo 'grel): rig pa mchog gis bsgoms/ /kye ma 'jig rten ngal thob gang/ /yang dang yang du skye ba dang/ /'khogs pa dang ni 'chi ba dang/ /'pho ba dang ni skye ba nyid/ /yang na sdug bsngal che 'di las/ /chags pas long min gyis bsgribs
62a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /skyes long shin tu dogs sa nas/ /phyi rol 'gro ba shes ma yin/ /de ltar bsams pa de yis ni/ /thugs kyi rnam dpyod gyur pa ste/ /gang du gyur na nges sam zhes/ /rga bas 'chi ba mngon par song/ /skye gnas nas de nyid bsgoms pa//
62a3(mdo 'grel): de yis mngon par rtogs par gyur/ /rga dang 'chi ba dag gis ni/ /skye ba yod na rdzogs pa'o/ /mgo bo yod na mgo bo yi/ /nad 'di 'byung ba mthong ba ste/ /shing gi skye ba yod gyur na/ /'gyel ba 'byung bar 'gyur pa'o/ /de nas de yi slar gyur pa//
62a4(mdo 'grel): skye ba 'di slar gang la zhes/ /de nas las srid las skye bar/ /skye ba yang dag mkhyen pa'o/ /des ni lha'i spyan gyis ni/ /las las 'jug par mkhyen pa ste/ /dbang phyug las min rang bzhin min/ /bdag las ma yin rgyu med min/ /ji ltar rig pa
62a5(mdo 'grel): las gling bu/ /dang po'i tshig ni bcad pa na/ /cho ga bzhin du kun myur 'gro/ /de ltar ye shes go rims so/ /de nas srid pa'i skye ba ni/ /mkhyen phyir thub pas blo gros mdzad/ /de nas srid pa'i skye ba des/ /nye bar len las byung bar mkhyen/ /tshul khrims
62a6(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin dang/ 'dod blo bdag tu lta rnams kyis/ /bud shing rnams kyis me bzhin du/ /'di yi las ni nye bar len/ /gang gis rgyu las len pa zhes/ /de nas de yi gyur pa ste/ /de nas nye bar len pa'i rkyen/ /sred par des ni mkhyen
62a7(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /chung ngu'i me yis nags kyi me/ /rlung gis bus te bskyed pa bzhin/ /'dod sogs nyon mongs rgya chen rnams/ /sred pa yis ni skyed par byed/ /de nas de yis bsam pa yi/ /sred pa gang las byung zhes so/ /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes//
62b1(mdo 'grel): de nas rnam par des pa mdzad/ /tshor bas mngon bcom skye dgu rnams/ /gnyen por byed la breng? pa ste/ /sgom pa med na chu la mi/ kha cig mngon par dga' ba yin/ /de nas slar yang tshor ba yi/ /skye ba'i gnas ni gang zhes bsams/ /tshor ba tshor ba mthar
62b2(mdo 'grel): byed gyis/ /reg pa'i rgyu can nyid du mkhyen/ /yul dang dbang po blo rnams kyis/ /'dus pa reg par brjod bya ste/ /gtsubs shing las ni me bzhin du/ /gang las tshor ba skye ba'o/ /de nas reg pa rgyu yin zhes/ /de yis bsam par gyur pa'o/ /de nas skye
62b3(mdo 'grel): mched drug gi ni/ /rgyu can nyid du des mkhyen to/ /long bas gzugs ni mi rig cing/ /mig ni blo yis mi sbyor phyir/ /mig yod gyur na des sbyor to/ /de phyir dbang po yang na reg/ de nas skye mched drug gi ni/ /skye ba mkhyen phyir blo gros mdzad/ /de nas
62b4(mdo 'grel): de'i rgyu ming dang gzugs/ /rgyu la mkhas pas mkhyen pa'o/ /ji ltar myu gu yod pa las/ /lo ma sdong bu yod par dran/ /de ltar ming dang gzugs yod na/ /skye mched drug ni 'byung ba'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu gang zhes/ /de ya de nas gyur de nas/ /de yi
62b5(mdo 'grel): skye ba rnams shes su/ /ye shes pha rol son pas mkhyen/ /rnam par shes pas mkhyen pa na/ /rnam par shes pa 'das pa na/ /ming dang gzugs ni rig gnas te/ /sa bon bskrun pa rdzogs pa na/ /myu gu rnam par 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas rnam par shes
62b6(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /gang las yin zhes bsam par gyur/ /ming dang gzugs la brten nas de/ de nas de yi skye ba mkhyen/ /de nas rgyu yi go rims ni/ /mkhyen nas de yi blor gyur te/ /sems na lugs 'byung bskor ba ste/ /gzhan du lugs las bzlog par min/ /rnam
62b7(mdo 'grel): par shes pa'i rkyen las ni/ /ming dang gzugs te skye ba ste/ /ming dang gzugs la brten nas ni/ /slar yang rnam par shes pa skye/ /ji ltar bru yis me 'dren zhing/ /de bzhin rnam par shes pa dang/ /ming gzugs phan rkun gyi rgyu'o/ /ji ltar lcags ni 'bar
63a1(mdo 'grel): yis/ /rtswa rnams 'bar bar byed na yang/ /'bar ba de yis de gdung ste/ /de bzhin phan tshun rgyu nyid do/ /de ltar rnam par shes pa las/ /ming gzugs 'byung ba me mkhyen gyur pa/ /de nas dbang po 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /dbang po
63a2(mdo 'grel): las 'byung reg pa'o/ /reg pa las skyes tshor ba mkhyen/ /tshor ba las skyes sred pa'o/ /sred pa las skyes len pa'o/ /len pa las ni de bzhin srid/ /srid pa las ni skye ba dag /skye las rga shi 'byung bar mkhyen/ /'gro ba dag ni rkyen rnams las//
63a3(mdo 'grel): skyes shes yang dag mkhyen pa'o/ /de nas 'di yi blo gros nges par song ba ni/ /skye ba zang las 'chi dang rga ba 'gag pa ste/ /srid pa nyams pa las skye ba nyams pa nyid/ /len pa 'gag pa las ni srid pa rnams ldog cing/ /de nas srid 'gags
63a4(mdo 'grel): pa las de ni 'gag pa ste/ /tshor ba yod pa min na sred pa yod ma yin/ /reg las chud zos gyur na tshor ba yod min zhing/ /skye mched 'jug pa med las reg pa zad pa'o/ /de bzhin ming dang gzugs ni yang dag 'gags pa las/ /skye mched drug po
63a5(mdo 'grel): thams cad rnam par nyams pa nyid/ /rnam par shes pa 'gags las de dag 'gag ba ste/ /'du byed 'gags pa las kyang de ni 'gag pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni mdza' dag med las de bzhin du/ /'du byed 'gag par drang song chen pos mkhyen pa ste//
63a6(mdo 'grel): 'di las mkhyen bya 'di ni yang dag mkhyen mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni 'jig rten na rab gnas par gyur/ /yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu shar ba yi/ /rtse mor myur 'gro dam pa'i lta ba'i lam gyis ni/ /srid rtse'i bar las mchog gyur ba dag
63a7(mdo 'grel): med rnams gzigs nas/ /bud shing tshig ba'i me bzhin zhi bar gshegs par gyur/ /de nas bdag nyid mdzad pa de yi gyur pa ni/ /mchog gi drang srong mchog dang mchog min mkhyen pa'i chogs/ /mna' ma rnams kyi don dam rgyu las gshegs pa
63b1(mdo 'grel): yi/ /snying po'i lam 'di bdag gis lhag par thob par gyur/ /thun ni bzhi pa'i skya rengs shar ba'i yud tsam na/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'byung po rnams ni zhi ba na/ /drang srong mchog gis 'gyur ba med pa'i go 'phang dang/ /kun gyi mgon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa
63b2(mdo 'grel): nyid brnyes so/ /de nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pa na/ /bud med chang gis myos bzhin sa ni g.yos gyur la/ /grub pa rnams kyis mngon gang phyogs ni rab snang ste/ /nam mkha' la rnga bo che rnams rab tu grag par gyur/ /dge ba'i rlung rnams
63b3(mdo 'grel): rab tu zhi bar g.yos gyur cing/ /sprin med 'o ma rnams ni lha yis char phab ste/ /ljon shing rnams las dus min me tog 'bras bu rnams/ /mchod pa rab tu sbyor ba'i ched bzhin bru bar gyur/ /mandar ba'i me tog rnams dang pad+ma dang/ /gser dang bai
63b4(mdo 'grel): DU rya yi rang bzhin pad+ma ni/ /mkha' las bab pa rnams kyis shAkya thub pa'i sa/ /de che mtho ris bzhin du kun nas bkram par gyur/ /yud tsam de ni kha cig khro ba med gyur la/ /nad med gyur cing mi dga' bar yang ma song ste/ /sdig pa bsnyen pa ma
63b5(mdo 'grel): yin rgyags par ma byas shing/ /grub pa brnyes pa bzhin du 'jig rten zhi bar gyur/ /thar pa 'dod pa'i lha yi tshogs rnams dga' ba ste/ /sems can 'og tu song ba rnams kyang dga' bar gyur/ /yon tan phyogs kyis 'phel bas chos ni rgyas pa
63b6(mdo 'grel): ste/ /rdul dang mun pa dag las 'gro ba gyen du byung/ /de yi las kyis ya mtshan dga' bas gang ba yi/ /bur ma shing pa'i rigs kyi mi skyong drang srong rnams/ /rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang drang srong che rnams kyis/ /yang dag mchod rnams mkha' 
63b7(mdo 'grel): la gzhal med rnams su gnas/ /mthong min 'byung bo'i tshogs kyi drang srong chen po yi/ /bstod pa rnams ni mthon por mthon zhing sgrogs pa ste/ /gson pa'i 'jig rten 'phel ba bzhin du dga' gyur zhing/ /ltung ba mchog la bzhin du bdud ni yi mug gyur
64a1(mdo 'grel): de nas nang mi mnga' ba zhag bdun bdag nyid kyi/ /sems la gzigs shing sbyan mi 'dzum par bzhugs pa ste/ /kho bos 'dir ni rnam par thar pa brnyes so zhes/ /thub pa yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur/ /de nas rkyen
64a2(mdo 'grel): nyid thob pa 'di ni thub pa nyid/ /bdag med cho gar rnam par bzhag pas gsan nas ni/ /zhi phyir 'jig rten dag la mchog tu brtse bas so/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis rnam par gzigs par gyur pa'o/ /lta ba ngan pas chud zos 'bad la 'khrugs pa
64a3(mdo 'grel): yi/ /'gro ba rdul ni rgya chen dang ldan gzigs nas dang/ /rnam thar chos ni mchog tu phra ba nyid gzigs nas/ /g.yo ba med pa nyid phyir thugs ni mdzad par gyur/ /de nas sngon gyi dam bca' yang dag mkhyen gyur nas/ /zhi ba'i gdams pa la ni so
64a4(mdo 'grel): sor nges par gshegs/ /de nas chen po'i rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid dang/ /ldan pa'i skye bor yid ni rnam par dpyad pa'o/ /de nas zhi ba'i don du gdams pa'i ched du nges par ni/ /gzung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ni shes gyur nas//
64a5(mdo 'grel): mngon par snang zhing 'gro la phan par 'dod pa can/ /mtho ris gnas pa'i gtso bo gnyis ni nye bar 'ongs/ /sdig pa spangs shing don mdzad gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /mchog gi chos ni gzigs pa de la mchog gnyis so/ /mchog tu zhi bas rab
64a6(mdo 'grel): tu bstod nas de gnyis kyis/ /'jig rten phan pa'i don du tshig 'di gsol ba'o/ /e ma 'gro ba 'di gang nor 'os 'di lta bu/ /skye dgu rnams la rjes su brtse mdzed khyod kyi thugs/ /'jig rten na yod skye bo rnam dpar bsre ma'i rgyu/ /chen po'i
64a7(mdo 'grel): rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid ldan pa'o/ /thub pa srid pa'i mtsho las rang nyid rab brgal nas/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal byid ba rab tu drongs mdzod cig/ /legs pa'i dbang phyug gis ni phun sum tshogs pa thob nas bzhin/ /gzhan rnams la yang
64b1(mdo 'grel): rang gi yon tan gyis sbyor mdzod/ /don mkhyen 'di na'i don dang pha rol du 'am gang/ /skye bo kha cig 'di ni bdag gi phan pa byed/ /gang zhig 'jig rten dge ba'i ched du rab zhugs de/ /mi yi 'jig rten dang ni mtho ris su rnyed dka' / /de ltar drang srong chen
64b2(mdo 'grel): la tshig 'di gsol nas ni/ /lha na gnas pa de nyid ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs/ /thub pa yis kyang de yis tshig de rab mnon nas/ /'gro ba rnam par thar phyir nges par rgyas par mdzad/ /de nas bsod snyoms dus su phyogs bzhir drang srong la/ /lha na
64b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pas lhung bzed rnams ni phul ba ste/ /gau ta mas ma zhi po de rnams rab pa zhes nas/ /de yi chos kyi ched du gcig nyid mdzad pa'o/ /de nas de tshe don bcas rab song tshong dpon gnyis/ /mdza' bshes nyid kyis lha yis rab tu bskul ba dag /rgya
64b4(mdo 'grel): chen thugs mnga' drang srong che la thog ma ru/ /dga' ba dang ldan phyag byas nas ni bsod snyoms phul/ /rtsi bas 'phur dang ni rangs byed bu ste de gnyis ni/ /chos 'dzin nus pa'i blo gros thub pas gzigs pa ste/ /de gnyis lhan gshegs par thug
64b5(mdo 'grel): kyis mngon gzigs nas/ /dge slong lnga po rnams la thugs kyis gshegs pa'o/ /de nas zhi ba'i gdams pa las ni gau ta mas/ /nyi ma shar bas mun bzhin mun pa rnam 'joms phyir/ /ba rA Na ses brgyan pa'i sna tshogs nags tshal can/ /'jigs
64b6(mdo 'grel): byed shing rtas bsnyen pa'i grong khyer dge bar gshegs/ /de nas khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' glang chen myos pa'i 'gros ldan pa/ /'gro ba mngon par rnam par 'dus phyir kA shis la gshegs bzhed pa/ /glang chen bzhin du rang gi sku lus ma lus
64b7(mdo 'grel): phyir la rab log nas/ /thub pas spyan mig mi 'dzum par ni byang chub shing gi rtsa bar gzigs/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi ba'o// //
65a1(mdo 'grel): zhi zhing mdangs ldan mdzad pa kun nas brnyes pa de/ /gcig pur rab gshegs mang po dang ni thabs cig bzhin/ /lam na dge slong chos ldan kha cig gis mthong nas/ /ya mtshan dang bcas thal mor bcas pas 'di skad gsol//
65a2(mdo 'grel): dbang po'i rta ni g.yo bar dbang po'i rta thul zhing/ /sems can chags rnams ji ltar chags ma gyur/ /shin tu ro ldan gsar ba'i shes rab ro yis ni/ /ri bong gis mtshan dang mtshungs tshim par gyur pa rnams/ /brtan pa khyod kyi zhal ni rab rgyas shing//
65a3(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni dbang po rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa ste/ /khyu mchog chen po'i spyan mnga' nges par don mdzad cing/ /khyod kyi bla ma su lags gang las grub pa gsungs/ /de rnams las des smras pa bdag la ston pa med/ /bdag la mchod bya med cing su
65a4(mdo 'grel): yang smad bya med/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob cing gzhan rnams dang mi mnyam/ /bdag ni chos la rang byung du ni shes par mdzod/ /gang phyir gzhan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i rtogs bya ni/ /bdag gis mdza' dag rtogs pa de phyir sangs rgyas te/ /gang phyir
65a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gi nyon mongs rnams ni dgra bzhin pham/ /de phyir zhi ba bdag ni kun nas shes par mdzod/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis nyam thag grogs la phan don du/ /zhi ba kho bo 'di yang ba rA Na ser 'gro/ /der ni 'chi med chos kyi rnga dag brdung ba ste/ /snyan grags
65a6(mdo 'grel): bde ba'i phyir min nga rgyal phyir ma yin/ /rgal bas 'gro ba rnams ni rgal bar 'gyur bgyi zhing/ /grol bas sems can rnams ni yongs su thar bar bgyi/ /de ltar gson pa'i 'jig rten nyam thag par mthong nas/ /sngon du bdag gi dam bca' 'di
65a7(mdo 'grel): ni gyur pa'o/ /'di na kha cig nor ni thob nas bdag nyid ni/ /gcig pu nyid gang 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar cing/ /skye bo chen po ma btsum mig la gang gis kyang/ /khyad 'phags thob nas rnam par 'dzin pa de don yin/ /gang zhig skam la gnas pas
65b1(mdo 'grel): mi ni chus khyer ba/ /'dren par 'dod min de ni legs pa'i gzugs ma yin/ /gang zhig gter ni thob nas skye bo dbul po la/ /nor gyis sbyor ba med pa de ni spyad po min/ /rang bzhin gnas pas nad kyis mngon par bcom pa la/ /lag tu song ba'i sman gyis gso
65b2(mdo 'grel): bar rigs pa ste/ /de ltar lam ngan song ba'i ched du lam dag ni/ /nges par bya ba'i lam gyis bshad par 'thad pa yin/ /ji ltar sgron ma rab tu gsal bar byed pa ste/ /de yi rgyu can dmar por 'gro ba ma yin nyid/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid kyis ye shes
65b3(mdo 'grel): rab gsal bar/ /mdzad de de phyir chags par 'gro ba ma yin no/ /ji ltar shing rnams la ni med dag nges pa dang/ /mkha' la rlung dang sa la chu ni nges pa ste/ /de bzhin gang yang rnams su thub pa rnams kyis ni/ /byang chub nges shing kA shi rnams dang chos
65b4(mdo 'grel): smra nges/ /de nas nye bar 'ongs las a la la zhes pa/ /rnam par rjod nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spangs nas/ /yang dang yang du ya mtshan mig ni g.yo ba yis/ /re 'dod skyes shing sangs rgyas la ni lta bzhin song/ /de nas thub pas rim gyis kA sa'i grong
65b5(mdo 'grel): khyer ni/ /nor gnas snying po dang ni rab mtshungs gzigs pa ste/ /grogs mo bzhin du 'khyur nas yang dag 'dus pa 'di/ /skal ldan shing rta dang ni ba rA Na se nyid/ /mthu dang gzi brjid ngag gis mngon par mdzes pa des/ /khu byug rnams kyis sgra sgrogs shing
65b6(mdo 'grel): gi tshogs ldan zhing/ /drang srong chen pos bsnyen pa'i ri dags nags nyid du/ /rnam par mdzes pas nyi ma bzhin du rab thob po/ /kau Na Di n+ya'i rigs dang de nas ming chen dang/ /rlangs pa dang ni rta thul de bzhin bzang rgyal te/ /dge slong ldi yas de ni rkyang ring
65b7(mdo 'grel): nas gzigs nas/ /phan tshun du ni tshig 'di smras par gyur pa'o/ /bde ba'i bdag nyid dge slong gau ta ma 'di/ /dka' thub de las phyir log mngon par 'ongs pa ste/ /mngon du 'gro bya ma yin nges par phyag 'os min/ /dam bca' bcom pa mchod par
66a1(mdo 'grel): 'os pa ma yin no/ /de ni brgya la gal te sdod par 'dod gyur na/ /de nyid la ni gtam ni rab tu gsol mdzod dang/ /'gron po nye bar 'ongs pa gang dang su la ni/ /'phags pa rnams kyis mi byed par ni 'os ma yin/ /de
66a2(mdo 'grel): ltar bya ba byas nas dge slong de rnams ni/ /nye bar gnas pa'i nye bar sangs rgyas gshegs pa ste/ /ji lta ji ltar de rnams la ni nye bar gshegs/ /de lta de ltar de rnams dam bca' nyams par gyur/ /de nas kha cig 'di yin bza' slangs pa ste//
66a3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin bzhan ni phyag 'tshal nas ni lhung bzed bzung/ /kha cig 'di la 'os pa'i gdan ni phul ba ste/ /de bzhin gzhan gnyis zhabs bsil nye bar phul ba'o/ /de ltar rab byed mchod pa mang po ldan pa rnams/ /'di la thams cad kyis ni bla mar
66a4(mdo 'grel): spyod pa byas/ /rigs su mngon brjod de rnams kyis kyang ma spangs shing/ /de rnams la rjes brtse bcas bcom ldan gyis smras pa/ /mchod 'os dgra bcom la ni gus pa ma yin pas/ /sngar gyis spyod pas dge slong rnams kye ma smra zhig /bstod
66a5(mdo 'grel): dang smad pa nges par bdag gis mnyam pa ste/ /khyod rnams bsod nams min las rnam par zlog par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa'i ched du sangs rgyas shing/ /'byung po kun la phan pas rab tu zhugs pa la/ /bla ma nye bar 'joms
66a6(mdo 'grel): las ming gis gang smra ste/ /ma rungs pa yi pha ma bzhin du chos 'chad do/ /de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis de skad gsungs pa ste/ /rmongs las snying po med pas chud zos de rnams kyis/ /gdong ni cung
66a7(mdo 'grel): zad bzhad pa dang ldan rgol smras pa'o/ /gau ta ma re zhig dka' thug mchog dang ni/ /dam pa de yis de nyid rtogs pa ma yin te/ /don ni dga' bas bsgrub bya bde bas gnas pa'o/ /khyod kyis mthong zhes bya ba 'dir ni gtan tshigs gang/ /gang tshe
66b1(mdo 'grel): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid la/ /de nas dge slong de rnams dad par gyur min te/ /byang chub pa yi lam ni de las gzhan du shes/ /de nas lam mkhyen pa yi lam ni dka' stsal pa/ /byis pa'i skye bo bdag nyid ngal bar ldan pa dang/ /dbang po'i
66b2(mdo 'grel): spyod yul rnams la de bzhin chags pa ste/ /'chi ba med pa'i lung gi lam ma yin pa'i phyogs/ /skyon dang ldan pa gnyis po de la bltos mdzod cing/ /gdung bar mngon par brjod pa'i lus kyi ngal rnams kyis/ /yongs su 'khrugs shing rnam par
66b3(mdo 'grel): gnon pa'i sems la ni/ /'jig rten tha snyad kyang ni brgyal shes min ni/ /dbang po las 'das de nyid lam ni kye ma ci/ /ji ltar sgron mas mtshan mo'i mun pa nyams pa ru/ /'dir ni mngon par nyer 'gro chu rnams gtor bas min/ /de bzhin ye shes me
66b4(mdo 'grel): yis mi shes mun pa ni/ /nyams par sngon 'gro lus kyi dal ba rnams kyis min/ /ji ltar me ni 'dod pas shing la 'bigs pa dang/ /rnam par 'gems pas me ni thob pa ma yin la/ /de nyid mngon pa'i thabs las bsrubs pas thob pa ste/ /de bzhin
66b5(mdo 'grel): sbyor las 'chi ba med thob ngal las min/ /de ltar don med 'dod pa rnams la chags pa ni/ /rdul dang mun pa dag gis zil non sems ldan rnams/ /bstan bcos don la nus kyang grub pa thob min na/ /chags bral 'gog pa'i cho ga la ni sngon nyid
66b6(mdo 'grel): do/ /ji ltar nad kyis mngon par bcom pa'i srog chags kyis/ /mi phan bza' ba za ba'i gso ba 'dir yod min/ /de bzhin mi shes nad kyis mngon par bcom pa'o/ /'dod pa rnams la chags pa'i zhi ba gang las so/ /ji ltar skam po'i
66b7(mdo 'grel): rten la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni/ /bus pa'i me yi zhi ba yod pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin 'dod pa'i rten la gnas pa'i chags pa yis/ /rjes su song ba'i sems kyi zhi ba yod ma yin/ /mdza' 'di gnyis pa dag kyang rnam par dor byas nas//
67a1(mdo 'grel): bdag gis lam gzhan dbu mas lhag par rtogs pa ste/ /shin tu sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i 'dren pa'o/ /bde ba dang ni dge ba nyid dang bral ba'o/ /yang dag lta ba'i nyams rab tu gsal byas shing/ /rnam dag yang dag
67a2(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa'i shing rtas drangs pa ste/ /yang dag brjod pa'i yang dag dag ni gtsug lag khang/ /dge ba'i bya ba'i skyed tshal brgya phrag mngon par dga' / /smad pa med pa'i 'tsho ba lo lags chen po ste/ /yang dag rtsol bas stobs rab rjes su 'gro ba can/ kun
67a3(mdo 'grel): tu yang dag dran pa'i spas pas spas pa ste/ /ting 'dzin gzigs mal dang ni gdan dang bzhugs pa yis/ /de ltar mchog gi yan lag brgyad 'dir 'di lam ste/ /'chi dang rga dang na ba rnams las 'dren pa'o/ /gang la drangs nas bya ba thams
67a4(mdo 'grel): cad byas pa ste/ /'di dang che ge mor ni slan chad 'gro ba med/ /'di ni sdug bsngal mdza' dag 'di ni mtshan ma ste/ /'di ni 'gog pa 'di ya lam ni 'di yin te/ /de ltar ma thos chos kyi cho ga sngar med pa'i/ /rnam par thar phyir bdag gi
67a5(mdo 'grel): spyan mig skyes pa'o/ /skye dang rga dang na dang de nas rgud pa dang/ /sdug pa dang bral mi sdug pa dang sbyor ba dang/ /'dod pa'i don ni rab tu thob pa med pa ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs su 'thob/ /'dod pa'i bdag can gyi 'am
67a6(mdo 'grel): bdag rgyal can gyi 'am/ /lus can gyi 'am yang na lus can ma yin pa'i/ /gang zhig yon tan med pa gang la rab zhugs kyang/ /mdor bsdus nas de sdug bsngal du ni shes par mdzod/ /de ltar 'bar bzhi pa'i me ni chung na yang/ /lhan
67a7(mdo 'grel): cig skyes pa dro ba'i ngo bo spong min nyid/ /de bzhin bdag tu 'du shes zhi sogs kyis phra yang/ /sdug bsngal bdag nyid can zhes bdag gi shin tu nges/ /ji ltar sa chu sa bon dus rnams myu gu'i bzhin/ /'dod chags la sogs rnam pa sna
67b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs skyon rnams dang/ /skyon las rab tu skyes pa'i las rnams nyid dag ni/ /sdug bsngal dag gi rgyud ni nges par shes par mdzod/ /mtho ris su 'am 'og tu srid pa'i rgyun las ni/ /'dod chags la sogs skyon gyi tshogs rnams rgyu yin
67b2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /dman dang 'bring dang mchog ste sna tshogs nyid kyi ni/ /de dang der ni las rnams dag ni rtsa ba'o/ /nyes pa zad las 'khor ba'i rgyu ni yod min te/ /las zad pa las sdug bsngal de ni yod ma yin/ gang phyir don gang yod pa las
67b3(mdo 'grel): ni kun 'byung ste/ /de phyir med pa las te slar yang 'byung pa med/ /gang du skye ba med cing rga med 'chi ba med/ /me med sa med chu med mkha' med rlung med la/ /thog ma bar dang mdza' med 'phags pa dbrog bya min/ /dge zhing 'gyur med
67b4(mdo 'grel): 'gog pa de ni shes par mdzod/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gang zhig mngon brjod de lam ste/ /lhag par rtogs phyir 'di yi thabs de'i gzhan ma yin/ /lam 'di yi ni ma mthong ba las 'jig rten rnams/ /de nyid dang ni nye du rnams
67b5(mdo 'grel): ni yongs su 'khor/ /sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya zhing rgyu 'di ni/ /spang bya 'gog pa yang ni dbang du bya ba'o/ /de bzhin lam 'di yang ni bsgom par bya ba ste/ /de ltar 'di ni bdag gi blo gros rab zhugs so/ /sdug bsngal 'di ni
67b6(mdo 'grel): yongs shes rgyu ni spangs pa ste/ /de bzhin du ni 'grog pa mngon du byas pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni 'di yi lam 'di bsgoms pa ste/ /da ltar 'dir ni bdag gi spyan mig rab zhugs so/ /ji srid du ni yang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa ni/ /bzhi pa'i
67b7(mdo 'grel): rkang pa 'di rnams mthong ba ma yin pa/ de srid bdag 'dir grol ba med par zhes brjod cing/ /bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang ma mthong/ /gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rtogs pa ste/ /rtogs nas kyang ni don byad 'os pa byas
68a1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de tshe bdag 'dir rnam par grol zhes brjod pa de/ /bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang mthong ngo/ /de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje mnga' ba yi/ /'dir ni chos dag de skad mngon par gsungs pa na/ /kauN+Di n+ya'i
68a2(mdo 'grel): rigs dang lha ni brgya phrag rnams/ /gtsang zhing rdul dang bral ba'i mig ni thob par 'gyur/ /bya ba thams cad des par byas shing zhi ba de la ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pas khyu mchog bzhin du mthon po'i dbyangs kyis gsungs/ /khyod kyis ye shes
68a3(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid chen pos des ni tshig gsol pa/ /legs so khyod kyi blo gros mchog ni bdag gis shes pa'o/ /legs so bdag gis shes shes de nas des ni 'jig rten ni/ /kauN+Di n+yas de'i go 'phang rigs ni bzung ba ste/ /bla ma dam pa de bzhin gshegs
68a4(mdo 'grel): pa slob ma rnams kyis ni/ /gtso bo nyid du chos la yang dag lhag par gshegs pa'o/ /sgra de sa la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis thos nas ni/ /rnam par rgyas pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu gsol bar gyur pa ste/ /'byung po rnams kyi 'chi med zhi ba'i ched
68a5(mdo 'grel): du nges par ni/ /dam pa gzigs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bde legs so/ /tshul khrims rtsibs dang zhi dang dul ba'i mu khyud blo rnams yangs/ /dran pas blo gros brtan pa brtson 'grus lte ba ngo tsha'i gzer/ /zab pa'i phyir dang rdzun med phyir
68a6(mdo 'grel): dad legs par bstan nyid phyir/ /'jig rten gsum na bstan zhing bstan bcos gzhan rnams kyis mi ldog /sa 'dzin gnod sbyin rnams las sgra ni nye bar thob byas nas/ /mkha' la lha yi tshogs rnams kyis ni dbyangs byas shing/ /de ltar
68a7(mdo 'grel): thos nas mtho ris rim dang rim rnams kyis mthon por/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du sgra yis nye bar 'dzegs pa'o/ /mtho ris dag na gnas pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa kha cig gis/ /drang srong che las 'jig rten gsum ni g.yos zhes thos nas
68b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /sna tshogs yul rnams la ni chags par gshegs pa ma yin zhing/ yang dag skyo las srid pa gsum na zhi ba nyid du gshegs/ /de ltar 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog tu zhi ba'i ched du ni/ /mtho ris dang nis na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tsam nas sprin bral
68b2(mdo 'grel): mkha' las me tog dang bcas chu yi char bab cing/ /srid gsum gnas pa rnams kyis rnga bo che rnams mngon par brdungs/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //
68b3(mdo 'grel): de nas thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /rta thul la sogs dge slong rnams/ /rab snyoms sems ldan de rnams kun/ /thar pa'i chos la bkod pa'o/ /nyi ma dang ldan skar ma lngas/ /nam mkhar zla ba ldan pa bzhin/ /lnga sde tham pa'i lnga sde yis/ /kun nas bskor ba
68b4(mdo 'grel): de mdzes so/ /de nas ngo tshe kha cig ni/ /mo rnams blo phab nyal mthong nas/ /grags pa zhes bya chen po'i bu/ /yang dag skyo bar nye bar song/ /'di kun nye bar brtse ba ste/ /zhes ni tshig dang brjod bzhin du/ /dpal ldan mchog gi rgyan ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas gal
68b5(mdo 'grel): ba der song/ /sems dang nyon mongs mkhyen pas des/ /gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /mya ngan 'das la nyer tshe med/ /tshur shog dge ba thob par gyis/ /de ltar rnam rgyas grags pa'i gsung/ /'di ni thos nas tshal ba yis/ /nyam
68b6(mdo 'grel): thag chu la 'dzul nas dang/ /mchog tu tshim pa nye bar song/ /sngon gyi rgyu yi stobs brten nas/ /de nas lus de nyid bzung ste/ /lus kyis dang ni sems kyis ni/ /dgra bcom nyid ni nye bar thob/ /ston ka'i chu yis bkrus pa yis/ /gos la tshon ni bkod pa
68b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /dkar po'i blo yi dam pa'i chos/ /thos nas rab tu rtogs pa nyid/ /cha lugs de yi ngo tsha bzhin/ /gnas pa de ni gzigs gyur na/ /don mdzad dam pa'i don mkhyen pa/ /smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis smros/ /rtags ni chos kyi rgyu min zhing//
69a1(mdo 'grel): 'byung po rnams la snyoms pa ste/ /zhi zhing dul la dbang po dul/ brgyan pa yin yang chos la spyod/ /gang zhig lus ni mthon po ste/ /sems kyis 'thon pa ma yin pa/ /nags na gnas kyang chags pa can/ /khyim na gnas
69a2(mdo 'grel): shes de shes bya/ /gang zhig sems ni mthon pa ste/ /lus kyis mthon pa ma yin pa/ /khyim na gnas kyang nga med pa/ /nags na gnas shes de shes bya/ /khyim na gnas par gyur pa'i 'am/ /rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i yang/ /gang gis bsgrubs pa yod na
69a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /de yi thar pa mngon par brjod/ /ji ltar rgyal 'dod dgra sde la/ /rgyal phyir go cha 'dzin pa ste/ /de bzhin nyon mongs dgra de la/ /rgyal phyir brtags ni 'dren pa'o/ /de nas dge slong tshur shog ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de la gsungs/ /des
69a4(mdo 'grel): ni dge slong rtags bzung ste/ /skad cig de nyid kyis grol to/ /de nas de yi rjes chags pas/ /de yi 'khor ni lnga bcu dang/ /gsum rnams nyid dang gcig nyid dang/ /chos de rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /'dag chal gyis bsgos gos rnams ni/ /chu
69a5(mdo 'grel): yi yang dag reg pa bzhin/ /sngon tshe bsgoms pa'i las can rnams/ /de rnams myur du dag par gyur/ /de nas de tshe dgra bcom slob ma yis/ /dang po don bcas drug cu thams cad la/ /dgra bcom rnams kyis mngon mchod dgra bcom pas/
69a6(mdo 'grel): ji ltar 'os par yang dag bka' stsal to/ /dge slong rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgal/ /rang gi bya ba legs chen byas/ /pha rol sdug bsngal rnams la yang/ /rjes su 'dzin pa byed pa'i rigs/ /de phyir re re thams cad kyis/ /sa 'dir yongs su gshegs
69a7(mdo 'grel): mdzod la/ /nyam thag 'jig rten ched du chos/ /rjes su brtse bas bstan par bya/ /grub phyir rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i spun/ /'od srungs drang srong rnams 'dul phyir/ /rgyal po'i drang srong gis bsnyen pa'i/ /ga yar kho bo 'di yang 'gro/ /de nas de nyid
69b1(mdo 'grel): mthong de rnams/ /de yi bka' las phyogs su song/ /rtsod bral bde bar gshegs pa ni/ /drang srong che yang ga yar gshegs/ /de nas dus su der gshegs nas/ /chos kyi dgon pa nye bar gshegs/ /dka' thub dngos su gnas pa bzhin/ /der ni 'od
69b2(mdo 'grel): srungs gzigs pa'o/ /ri rnams dang ni nags rnams su/ /gnas rnams yod pa na yang de/ /rnam par 'dul bzhed stobs bcu pas/ /rab tu brten nas blangs pa'o/ /de nas grub pa nyams tshad phyir/ /me khang lto 'phye ches bsnyen par/ /ma rungs gnas
69b3(mdo 'grel): des 'di la byin/ /der gzigs mtshan mor rang gnas shing/ /thos bral thub pa chen po la/ /mthong ba'i dug can khros pa yi/ /sprul nges mthong nas dbugs phyung ngo/ /de yi khro bas 'bar ba yi/ /me yi khang par gyur pa des/ /drang srong chen po'i sku
69b4(mdo 'grel): lus la/ /'jigs pa bzhin du mes ma reg /dus mdza' i me nyer zhi ba na/ /tshangs pa bzhugs pa mdzes pa ltar/ /me yi khang par bsregs na yang/ /gau ta ma rnams 'gyur med/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas der bzhugs tshe/ /gnod med g.yo ba med pa ste//
69b5(mdo 'grel): de tshe klu de ya mtshan zhing/ /drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri dags nags der skye bo yi/ /thub pa der bzhugs shes gyur nas/ /sdug pa 'o rgyal 'di 'dra ba'i/ /dge slong tshig ces rjes su brtse/ /de nas mtshan mo 'das pa na/ /rnam par 'dren pas
69b6(mdo 'grel): 'ong srungs la/ /sprul ni zhi bas lhung bzed kyis/ /blangs nas de la bstan pa'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas che bdag nyid/ /thos nas de ni ya mtshan gyur/ /de lta na yang bdag nyid kyis/ /che zhing gong na med pa snyam/ /de nas dus su rab sbyar ba'i/ /sna tshogs
69b7(mdo 'grel): rdzu 'phrul gzugs rnams kyis/ /de yis sems de mkhyen nyid las/ /zhi ldan thub pas thugs dgongs mdzad/ /ji ltar bdag las rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /sangs rgyas khyad par 'phags pa snyam/ /de yi chos ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /de tshe des ni nges par
70a1(mdo 'grel): byas/ /kun nas slar log gnas pa yis/ /lter rgyas 'od srungs mthong nas ni/ /slob pa rnams kyi tshogs rnams kyang/ /lnga brgyas de yi chos la bsnyen/ /der ni spun zla slob mar bcas/ /mthar phyin shun lpags spangs
70a2(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /g.yo chu klung zhes byas kyang/ /der song lam la bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas thub pas slob mar brdzas?/ /'od srungs gsum po de rnams la/ /sa 'dzin g.ya'i rtse mor ni/ /nges par mthar phyin gtam mdzad do/ /rnam par rtogs pa'i skye gnas dang/
70a3(mdo 'grel): gti mug rnam bkram du ba can/ /chag sdang me yi 'gro ba ni/ /thams cad dbang med par bsrag go /de lta nyon mongs mes tshig cing/ /rab tu ma zhi mgon med can/ /rga na 'chi ba'i me rnams kyis/ /slar yang rgyun mi chad par sreg /
