70a4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs mes tshig pa'i/ /'gro ba skyabs med 'di mthong nas/ /yid bcas dbang po dang bcas pa'i/ /gzugs la blo ldan skyo ba ste/ /skyo ba las ni chags bral 'gro/ /chags bral las ni rnam grol zhing/ /rnam grol de nas thams cad
70a5(mdo 'grel): na/ /rnam par grol zhes shes pa'o/ /skye ba'i rgyun ni yongs mdzad cing/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'dir gnas la/ /byed pa thams cad byas pa ste/ /sred pa gzhan ni yod ma yin/ /bcom ldan gyi gsung 'di thos nas/ /dge slong stong phrag dag gi sems
70a6(mdo 'grel): len pa med nas zag pa las/ /de ma thag tu rnam par grol/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims dul rnams kyis/ /chos ni dngos su yongs bskor bzhin/ /de nas shes rab rgya che ba'i/ /'od srungs gsum gyis sangs rgyas mdzes/ /chos don 'dod pa dang bral
70a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /sems can na ba'i srog bzhin du/ /bgres mchog de rnams kyis bor ba'i/ /dka' thub nags de mdzes ma gyur/ /de nas de rnams kyis yongs bskor/ /thub pa rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs/ /ma ga d+ha yi mi dbang phyir/ /sngon gyi dam
70b1(mdo 'grel): bca' dran pa'o/ /de nas 'od ma'i tshal yul ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu thob/ /blon po rnams ni rjes 'gro bas/ /thos nas rgyal po mngon du song/ /de nas rang gi skal mtshungs pa'i/ /rkang pa bzhon pas skye bo ni/ /ya mtshan gyis ni rnam yangs
70b2(mdo 'grel): mig /ri yi lam nas phyi rol byung/ /ma ga d+ha yi mi dbang gis/ /thub mchog rgyad ma? nas mthong nas/ /skyen pa dang bcas ma chos pa'i phyir/ /shing rta las ni sa la babs/ /des ni rnga yab rlung yab dang/ /rjes su 'brang ba rnams spangs nas/ /tshangs pa
70b3(mdo 'grel): la ni dbang pos bzhin/ /thub la rgyal po sngon du song/ /cod pan rab g.yo mgon po yis/ /drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sa yi 'ogs la rtswa 'jam la/ /mngon par rjes gnang bsdad pa'o/ /der mi rnams kyi bsams pa gyur/ /e ma
70b4(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub pa'i stobs/ /'od srungs bcom ldan drang srong ni/ /'di yi slob ma nyid du gyur/ /de nas de'i sems sangs rgyas kyis/ /mkhyen nas 'od srungs la smras pa/ /'od srungs yon tan gang mthong nas/ /khyed kyi me ni spangs pa'o/ /chu sbyin chen
70b5(mdo 'grel): po'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /bla mas de ltar de bskul te/ /mthon pos skye bo kun khyab par/ /thal mo sbyar zhing rnam par gsol/ /gang phyir mchod dang sbyin sreg gis/ /'bras bu yongs su 'khor ba ste/ /sems nang sna tshogs dang ldan te/ /de phyir mi rnams bdag gis
70b6(mdo 'grel): spangs/ /gang phyir yul la skoms pa yis/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg la sogs 'jug /yul rnams dag gis skom pa med/ /de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs/ /gang phyir bzlas nas sreg nas kyang/ /skye ba la? ni thar min zhing/ /skye ba yi ni sdug bsngal che//
70b7(mdo 'grel): de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs/ /gang phyir mchod sbyin dka' thub kyis/ /dge legs yin zhes 'di? 'gyur pa/ /de ni brdzun pa nyid yin te/ /de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs/ /gang phyir skye 'chi las drol ba/ /'gyur med go 'phang dge bar ni/ /brjod pa
71a1(mdo 'grel): bdag gis shes pa ste/ /de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs/ /de ltar de'i tshig dang skyed cing/ /don dang ldan pa'i gsan gyur nas/ /'dul ba'i slob dpon gau ta mas/ /dul ba'i 'od srungs la gsungs so/ /skal
71a2(mdo 'grel): chen khyod ni legs par 'ongs/ /'di ni legs byas byas min min/ /gang khyod tha dad chos rnams su/ /dge legs gang de nye bar thob/ /de phyir re zhig 'khor rnams ni/ /rnam rgyas yang dag 'phel ba bzhin/ /sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul ston bzhin du/ /yid ni
71a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag skyo bar gyis/ /de nas mchog ces smras nas ni/ /bdag la bdag ni yongs bsdus nas/ /mkha' 'gro'i bya ltar 'od srungs ni/ /klung gi lam la 'phur ba'o/ /de mkhar sdong dum bzhin gnas shing/ sa la bzhin du rnam par rgyu/ khri la bzhin du bzhugs
71a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /rdzu 'phrul mkhas gzims pa'o/ /slar yang me bzhin 'bar ba dang/ /slar yang sprin bzhin char 'bab ste/ /slar yang cig car shin tu ni/ /'bar ba dang ni 'bab pa'o/ /glog gi sna ba'i 'od ldan pa'i/ /rab 'bab chu gter sprin bzhin du/
71a5(mdo 'grel): 'bar ba dang ni 'bab pa yis/ /rgya cher rnam par gnon te mdzas/ /der ni mig rnams chags byas nas/ /ya mtshan gyen phyogs skye bo rnams/ /mchod mang po las phyag 'tshal zhing/ /seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs pa'o/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul bsdus
71a6(mdo 'grel): nas des/ /bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni/ /bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan zhes/ /thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong mchog la de bzhin du/ /phyag 'tshal 'od srungs rab mthong nas/ /bde bar gshegs la kun mkhyen zhes/ /ma ga d+ha pa rnam des so//
71a7(mdo 'grel): de nas zhing byas mkhyen nas ni/ /dge phyir dge legs la gnas pas/ /chos thos par ni 'dod pa yi/ /bzo sbyangs la ni bka' stsal pa/ /gzi chen ldan pa yid bcas shing/ /dbang po thul ba dbang por bcas/ /sa yi bdag po gzugs nyid ni/ /skye
71b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang ni rnam par nyams/ /yon tan 'phel phyir 'di yi ni/ /skye dang 'gag pa shes bya ste/ /zhes nas de gnyis yang dag par/ /lus ni yang dag rig par mdzod/ /skye dang 'gag pa'i chos can du/ /dbang po dang bcas lus shes nas/ /bdag ldan
71b2(mdo 'grel): bdag ces cung zhig ni/ /nye bar len min nye re 'gro min/ /lus dang dbang po blo rnams las/ /gzhan ni dmigs pa ma yin te/ /sdug bsngal nyid ni skye ba ste/ /sdug bsngal nyid ni 'gag pa'o/ /gang tshe 'di kun mden par 'gro/ /bdag med bdag gi ba
71b3(mdo 'grel): yang med/ /de tshe mchog tu mi g.yo ba'i/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob pa'o/ /dar 'dzin la sogs nyon mongs kyis/ /bdag tu 'dzin las 'ching ba ste/ /'jig rten bdag med par mthong na/ /chags pa rnams las rnam par grol/ /mi bden par mthong
71b4(mdo 'grel): 'ching ba ste/ /bden pang mthong ba rnam par grol/ /bdag yod ces ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /rab tu 'jug 'di bden mi 'dzin/ /gal te bdag yod gyur na de/ /rtag gam yang na mi rtag nyid/ /phyogs ni gnyis po 'di dag la/ /nyes pa chen po rab
71b5(mdo 'grel): tu chags/ /gal te re zhig mi rtag gyur/ /las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /yang srid yod pa ma yin zhing/ /thar pa 'bad pa med par gyur/ /ci ste rtag cing khyad par 'gyur/ /skye ba med dang skye ba min/ /nam mkha' khyab cing rtag pa ni/ /'god pa med
71b6(mdo 'grel): cing skye ba med/ /gal te bdag 'di khyab bdag 'gyur/ /gang du mi gnas pa ma yin/ /'di dang song nas dang thar par/ /thams cad 'du ni cig car 'gyur/ /khyab bdag nyid phyir bya med 'di'i/ /las kyi bya ba med par 'gyur/ /las rnams ma byas pa
71b7(mdo 'grel): las ni/ /'bras bur sbyor bar gang gis 'gyur/ /gal te 'di yi byed par 'gyur/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal byed ma yin/ /rang dbang gyur na sdug bsngal ni/ /bdag gis bdag gi byed pa su/ /bdag ni rtag pa nyid las ni/ /rnam par 'gyur ba skye min zhing//
72a1(mdo 'grel): bde dang sdug bsngal thob pa las/ /de yi rnam par 'gyur ba mthong/ /ye shes thob pas dang nyon mongs/ /spangs las thar ba yod pa ste/ /bya med khyab bdag 'di yi ni/ /de phyir thar pa yod ma yin/ /yod min gyur las de nyid gyis//
72a2(mdo 'grel): bdag ste 'di ni brjod min la/ /rgyur gyur pas kyang ma yin zhing/ /'di ni cung zad byed ma yin/ /bya ba las kyang gsal min zhing/ /gang rnams kyis 'di byas min la/ /rnam pa de ltar gyur min smra/ /de phyir bdag gi yod ma yin/ /byed pa po med
72a3(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni rig pa po yang med/ /bdag po med pa'i lus po 'di ni 'dren par byed/ /ji ltar 'khor ba'i chu bo rab tu bskor ba ste/ /smra ba de ni nyon mdzod nyan pa rnams kyi mchog /dbang po drug dang dbang po'i spyod yul drug rnams la/ /brten
72a4(mdo 'grel): nas rnam par shes pa rnam drug 'char pa ste/ /gsum po so sor rig pa'i cho ga rab bskor zhing/ gang las dran dang blo dang las kyi 'jug par yin/ /nor bu bud shing nyi ma yang dag phrad pa las/ /ji ltar me ni sbyar ba'i dbang gis skye ba
72a5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /de bzhin blo dang dbang don dbang po la brten nas/ /skyes bu la brten bya ba rnams ni thams cad 'gyur/ /ji ltar sa bon las ni myu gu skye ba ste/ /myu gu des ni sa bon de ni shes min zhing/ /gzhan las gzhan du ma yin de las de ma yin//
72a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin lus dang dbang po blo yi rim pa'o/ /de ltar thub pa mchog gi gsung ni mchog tu dge /dam pa'i don du bsngags pa yang dag thos nas ni/ /dri ma med pa'i rdul med gzhal du med pa'o/ /ma ga d+ha yi bdag po chos mig skyes
72a7(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /'khor der ma ga d+ha yi grong na gnas pa yi/ /mi ni du ma rnams dang lhan gnas pa rnams/ /thub pa'i gsung thob pa la rnam dag bsam ldan rnams/ /'gyur med 'chi ba med pa'i go 'phang thob par gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi
72b1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ slob ma mang po dang ldan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas rgyal po des ni thub la rnam gnas phyir/ /dpal ldan nags tshal 'od ma'i tshal ni rab phul nas/ /de nyid
72b2(mdo 'grel): khong du chud phyir kun nas gnyis pa ni/ /mngon par rjes gnang byas pa grong khyer la zhugs so/ /de nas gtsug lag khang der 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /ye shes las gyur dge ba'i sgron ma bsnams pa ste/ /tshangs dang lha dang de bzhin 'phags pa rnams
72b3(mdo 'grel): kyi ni/ /gnas pa de dang de yis sangs rgyas rnam par gnas/ /de nas rta thul dbang po'i rta ni kun bsdams shing/ /bsod snyoms 'dod pas rgyal po'i khab ni rab thob ste/ /gzugs kyi dang ni zhi ba yis dang rnam 'gyur gyis/ /skye bo chen po rnams
72b4(mdo 'grel): kyi mig rnams phrogs par gyur/ /ser skya'i rigs kyi dge slong slob ma du ma can/ /sha radwa ti'i bu zhes rab tu grags pa yis/ /dbang po zhi bar 'ongs pa de ni mthong ba ste/ /lam na rjes su gnas nas tshig ni mngon par smras/ /khyod kyi gsar ba'i
72b5(mdo 'grel): rtags mtshan dang ni zhi ba nyid/ /mthong nas kho bo'i blo gros ya mtshan mchog gyur te/ /de phyir re zhig gal te de nyid rig pa dang/ /khyod kyi ston pa'i mtshan ci smra ba gang yin smros/ /de ltar mchod mang sngon 'gro bram ze de yis ni/ /de skad brjod cing
72b6(mdo 'grel): rta thul gyis kyang smras pa ste/ /bu ram shing pa'i rigs su rab 'khyud thams cad mkhyen/ /bdag gi ston pa bla na med pa shes par mdzod/ /byis pa gser bu chos las skyes par gyur pa yis/ /khyod la ston pa brjod par nus pa ma yin no//
72b7(mdo 'grel): smras pa mkhyen pa'i mchog gyur thub pa chen po'i gsungs/ /nyung ngu cung zad tsam zhig nges par rtogs par mdzod/ /gang zhig chos rnams mtshan ma las ni byung ba ste/ /de dag rnams kyi mtshan ma bcom ldan gyis gsungs shing/ /gang zhig de
73a1(mdo 'grel): dag rnams kyis nges par 'gog pa dang/ /yang dag 'gog pa de yi thabs gang gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar rta thul gyis ni tshig 'di thos nas ni/ /gnyis skyes nyer rgyal zhes bya'i ming can de yi ni/ /skyen par chos la mig
73a2(mdo 'grel): ni rdul dang bral ba ni/ /dge zhing rnam par dag par nges par gyur pa'o/ /rgyu med pa dang bya ba med dang dbang phyug ste/ /zhing zhes pa ni nges par de yis sngon rig cing/ /rgyu las 'di rnams rab tu 'jug par thos nas ni/ /bdag med gyur pa mthong
73a3(mdo 'grel): nas dam pa'i bden pa gzigs/ /sbom po'i nyon mongs tshogs kyi rnam par nyams pa ni/ /grangs can lus las cha shas dang bcas mthong ba ste/ /spom po dang ni phra mo de yis nyams pa ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yi bstan las 'gyur zhes snyim par
73a4(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /bdag tu 'du shes skyes pa nye bar ma khyud nas ni/ /ngar 'dzin spong ba ma yin de nas nga yi nyid/ /sgron pa dang ni nyen mor byed ba yod pa na/ /'od kyi rnam par nyams par gtan tshigs shes bya ci/ /ji ltar pad+ma'i chu ba che bar gyur pa
73a5(mdo 'grel): yi/ /snal ma phra mo nyid ni gzhan dang brel ba ste/ /thar pa'i cho ga thar thug min par de snyam zhing/ /sangs rgyas pa yis rde ba phye dang mnyam par rtogs/ /de nas bram zes rta dul de la mngon mchod nas/ /tshim zhing rang nyid kyis ni khang par rnams
73a6(mdo 'grel): song zhing/ /bsod snyoms rim bzhin rta thul gyis kyang rab thob nas/ /rang bzhin gnas shing mkhas pa 'od ma'i chal du ni/ /de bzhin rab tu dang bas mchog dang ldan pa yi/ /nye rgyal kyang ni mngon du zhugs pa mthong nas ni/ /thos pa dang ni bsam
73a7(mdo 'grel): pas bya ba snyam pa yi/ /maung+ga la rigs su rab tu skyes pas smras pa'o/ /dge slong de nyid gang gis gzhan bzhin gyur pa ste/ /brtan yin yang dag dga' zhing nye bar song/ /khyed kyis 'chi med ci zhig de ring thob pa ste/ /bzhin ni rab tu dad 'di gtan
73b1(mdo 'grel): tshigs med ma yin no/ /de nas 'di ltar bgyi zhes 'di la nges bden smras/ /de nas des ni bdag la smos pa shes nges smras/ /de nas tshig de nyid ni de yis smras pa ste/ /thos nas nyid kyi yang dag mig ni skyes par gyur/ /las dang bsam pa rnam dag blo ldan
73b2(mdo 'grel): de gnyis ni/ /lag gnas sgron ma bzhin du de nyid mthong ba ste/ /shes pas ston la rnam par g.yo min bsam ldan dag /de ni blta ba'i don du da lta nyid du gshegs/ /slob ma'i sde bcas de nyid rgyang ma nas gzigs nas/ /bcom ldan drang srong
73b3(mdo 'grel): chen pos dge slong rnams la gsungs/ /shes rab can dang rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams kyi gtso/ /kho bo'i mchog gi slob ma 'di gnyis 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas zab dang brtan pa'i gsung ni zhi ba yi/ /thub pas de gnyis la ni gtam ngag mdzad
73b4(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /dge slong 'dir ni ma don par nyer 'ongs rab zhi'i phyir/ /chos 'di ji lta ba bzhin yang dag thob par gyis/ /myu gu gsum lag gtsug phud dang ldan gnyis skyes te/ /gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs te//
73b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas mthu yis ngur smrig gos dang ldan pa yi dge slong nyid du skad cig gis ni gyur pa'o/ /slob ma'i sder bcas cha lugs de yis de gnyis kyis/ /mgo bo dag gis thams cad mkhyen la mchod pa ste/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyis chos de
73b6(mdo 'grel): gnyis la gsungs shing/ /dus kyi nga gnyis kyis ni nges legs thob par gyur/ /de nas 'od srungs rigs kyi sgron ma gnyis skyes ni/ /kha tog dang ni gzugs dang ner dang nyer ldan pas/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ni bdag ldan bzang mo rnam spangs nas//
73b7(mdo 'grel): thar pa'i ched du ngur smrig bzung zhing gshegs pa'o/ /mdog bzangs gser gyi 'chod sdong dang mtshungs 'bar ba ni/ /bum das ming bcas mchod rten du ni des mthos nas/ /dngos po thams cad spangs shing ya mtshan dang bcas pas/ /thams
74a1(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen la thal mo rab sbyar mngon par song/ /thub pa la ni rgyang nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni ji lta ba bzhin mthon por gsol/ /bdag ni slob ma bcom ldan bdag gi ston pa lags/ /mun pa rnams su
74a2(mdo 'grel): brtan pa bdag gi sgron mar gyur/ /gnyis skyes skom pa skyes shing nye bar 'ongs par ni/ /mkhyen nas bsam pa rnam dag thar 'dod de la ni/ /sems la gsung gi chab kyis rab tu tshim mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas legs par 'ongs zhes
74a3(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal to/ /gsung 'di yis ni ngal ba rnam par sos bzhin te/ /nges par legs par rtogs pa'i ched du gnas pa ste/ /de nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'di la thugs rje can/ /thub pas chos ni mdor ma sdus pa yis gsungs pa'o/ /gang phyir thub pas
74a4(mdo 'grel): chos ni phra mor gsungs tsam na/ /de yis don ni mdza' dag yang dag thob gyur te/ /de phyir yang dag rig dang na tshod che nyid las/ /dgra bcom 'od srungs chen po nyid du mtshan gyur to/ /gang gi lus las gzhan dang yang na lus su ni/ /bdag dang
74a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gi ba zhes bdag tu rtogs pa ste/ /de yis bdag tu lta ba de ni des spangs shing/ /nyi tshe ba min sdug bsngal 'di ni mthong bar gyur/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs dag gis dag par byed cing gang/ /rgyu med pa dang rgyu las de yis rtogs pa ste/ /sdug
74a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal nyid du dang lam ni yang dag thob nas te/ /tshul khrims dang ni brtul zhugs mchog tu ma bzung ngo/ /phyin ci log tu gyur par song ba gang gi ni/ /mngon du bskor zhing mchog ni rab tu thob ma yin/ /bden pa bzhi po'i gong 'phang rnams ni mthong gyur nas/
74a7(mdo 'grel): the tshom som nyir gyur te yang dag mchod par gyur/ /'dod pa gang rnams su ni yang dag brgyar nyid dang/ /brgyal bar gyur dang brgyal bar 'gyur nyid 'jig rten pa/ /mi gtsang bden pa ma yin de rnams des shes nas/ /'dod chags shes bya'i yul
74b1(mdo 'grel): de spangs par gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni byams par gyur pa'i sems kyis des/ /bshes dang bshes min rnams su khyad par med pa ste/ /'byung po kun la rjes su gtso ba byas pa yis/ /nad du song ba'i gnod sems yang bar gyur pa'o/ /gzugs la brten pa rnams
74b2(mdo 'grel): dang grong khyer brten pa rnams/ /sna tshogs nyid dang ldan pa'i 'du shes rnams spangs nas/ /des ni gzugs kyi khams su chags pa rnams btsam ste/ /gzugs la 'jug pa'i nyes pa rnams ni rtogs nas so/ /rmongs las snyoms 'jug rnams su thar pa'i 'du shes
74b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /gzugs med lha rnams mdzad pa can du rtogs nas ni/ /zhi zhing mtshan ma med pa'i sems ni gzung nas su/ /gzugs med sred pa las ni chags dang bral bar song/ /chu bo sind+hu'i shugs chen rab tu 'jug pa bzhin/ /sems kyi g.yo zhing bskyod par byed pa
74b4(mdo 'grel): shes nas ni/ /brtan pa'i rten las rgod pa rnam par spangs pa ste/ /zhi zhing rdzing bu gang ba bzhin du gnas par gyur/ /snying po med pa'i phyir dang 'god pa'i chos nyid phyir/ /bdag med nyid phyir dngos rnams yang dag rab mthong nas/ /khyad 'phags nyid dang mnyam dang mchog
74b5(mdo 'grel): nyid mthong ba ste/ /nga rgyal rnam par spangs nas yod ma yin zhes rtogs/ /ye shes me yis mi shes mun pa rnams bcom nas/ /zad pa can dang zad pa med par sna tshogs mthong/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni rig pa nyid ni yongs bsgoms nas/ /ma rig pa ni mdza' dag ji
74b6(mdo 'grel): lta ba bzhin spangs/ /mthong dang bsgom pa dag gi kun tu sbyor ba ni/ /bcu po 'di dag rnams kyis rnam par gro 'gyur cing/ /thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas nyid la lta bzhin du/ /bya ba kun byas rang bzhin gnas te gnas par gyur/ /skar ma gsum gyi gnas skabs gsum skyod
74b7(mdo 'grel): rjes skyes lha dang ni/ /ldan pa'i lnga gsum tshes kyi dus su skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin/ /gsum ni chud zos gyur cing gsum ni lhag par thob pa yi/ /gsum rig slob ma gsum gyis bde bar gshegs pa rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan
75a1(mdo 'grel): dngags chen po las/ nyan thos chen po rab tu gshegs par mdzad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ //de nas 'ga' zhig tshe na nor ldan khyim bdag ni/ /skal ba med pa rnams la nor ni rab sbyin pa/ /bzang sbyin
75a2(mdo 'grel): zhes ni rab tu grags pa'i ming ldan pa/ /byang phyogs yul ko sa la rnams nas der song gyur/ /de yis der ni thub pa bzhugs pa thos pa ste/ /thos nas blta bar 'dod pas mtshan mo rab tu song ngo/ /rnam dag sems dpa' des ni rab sleb rab mkhyen
75a3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /rab tu phyag byas pa la bde bar gshegs pa bstan/ /gang phyir chos la bsgoms pas nyid ni rnam spangs nas/ /blo ldan mtshan mor bdag la lta 'dod rab slebs te/ /de lta nyid du 'ongs pa de yi de ma thag /nges par legs pa'i 'gron 'dir
75a4(mdo 'grel): rab tu longs jod cig /gang zhig khyod kyi lhag bsam gang zhig bstan pa dang/ /bdag gis grags pa nyid las gang zhig dang ba dang/ /gang zhig sngon gyi rgyu las blo gros rab zhugs te/ /des ni yon tan chen po rnams kyi snod yin no/ /de phyir 'jig
75a5(mdo 'grel): rten dag na grags dang gzhan du ni/ /'bras bu sbyin pa mchog las byung bar rig nas ni/ /bkur sti byas nas dus su snyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /chos las thob pa'i nor ni sbyin par bya ba'o/ /tshul khrims yang dag blangs nas spyad par bya ba ste//
75a6(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims nyid ni bsrungs pa dang ni rgyan yin zhing/ /'og tu song ba rnams kyi rnam par ldog byed do/ /nam mkha' i steng gi nges par rdzogs pa po nyid yin/ /'dod pa rnams su gcig min zhen pas rjes bcings pa'i/ /yongs su tshol ba la sogs skyon
75a7(mdo 'grel): rnams thos nas ni/ /nges par 'byung ba'i cho gar yon tan rnams shes nas/ rnam dbyen las skyes shi ba'i bden pa bsnyen par mdzod/ /'chi bas nye bar gzir zhing rga bas zil non pa'i/ /'jig rten rab tu bskor bar yang dag yongs shes
75b1(mdo 'grel): nas/ /zhi ba skye ba med phyir 'bad pa mdzod cig dang/ /skye ba bden pa med na rga med 'chi ba med/ /ji ltar mi rnams la ni mi rtag bdag nyid kyis/ /rab chags sdug bsngal mngon sum du ni rig mdzod la/ /de bzhin lha rnams la yang sdug bsngal rig
75b2(mdo 'grel): mdzod dang/ /'jug pa rtag pa nyid ni su yang yod ma yin/ /gang du mi rtag pa nyid der ni sdug bsngal zhing/ /gang du rang nyid med par der yang sdug bsngal te/ /gang du bdag ces pa dang bdag gi ba zhes pa/ /de tshe mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med gang la
75b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de phyir sdug bsngal las ni sdug bsngal 'di dag ni/ /mtshan ma las ni 'di yi mtshan ma ltos mdzod la/ /rnam par nye bar zhi las sdug bsngal zhi ba dang/ /lam las khyod kyis lam ni dge ba shes par gyis/ /'gro ba g.yo ba sdug bsngal 'di ni
75b4(mdo 'grel): shes nas su/ /me dang rab mtshungs dus kyi me yis 'jig rten ni/ /mdza' dag rab tu tshig par yongs su rtog bzhin du/ /srid dang srid min rnams su smon pa med par gyis/ /stong pa nyid dang bdag med bdag gi ba med pa/ /sgyu ma dang mtshungs 'jig rten 'di
75b5(mdo 'grel): ni shes byas nas/ /'du byed tsam zhig rab tu yongs su rtogs bzhin du/ /lus 'di la ni khams kyi 'du shes nyid du gyis/ /sems ni srid pa g.yos las yang dag g.yos nas dang/ /'khor ba'i 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas ni/ /rtog pa
75b6(mdo 'grel): med cing zhi la bden zhing chags med par/ /sems ni snyoms zhing mtshan ma med pa bsnyon par gyis/ /de nas drang srong chen po'i chos de thos pa las/ /chos kyi cho ga'i sngon gyi 'bras bu thob gyur cing/ /gang zhig thob nas 'di yi sdug bsngal las
75b7(mdo 'grel): lhag ma/ /rgya mtsho chen po las ni thig pa gcig bzhin gyur/ /chags bral rnams kyi dgon par yang dag gnas kyang ngam/ /lus med rnams kyi srid tser yang dag gnas na yang/ /nags sam lha na de nyid mthong min ma yin la/ /khyim na gnas pa yin
76a1(mdo 'grel): yang lta bas dge legs gyur/ rnam pa sna tshogs lta ba'i dra ba rnams kyis dang/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyi de rnams rnam mi grol/ /de phyir rab tu nyams shing de nyid ma mthong bar/ chags pa rnam par bsal
76a2(mdo 'grel): nas khyad par 'phags par gshegs/ lta ba legs skyes des ni lta ba ngan de rnams/ /ston ka'i sprin gyis rdo yi char bzhin spangs pa ste/ dbang phyug la sogs mi mthun rgyu las ma yin zhing/ des ni 'jig rten rgyu med par min zhes rtags so/
76a3(mdo 'grel): der phyir mi mnyam rgyud ni 'thad pa ma yin zhing/ /rgyu med par ni 'gal ba chen po yod pa nyid/ /'di yang rigs pas shes pas so sor mthong bas te/ the tshom med pas de nyid mthong ba kye ma ci/ /gal te dbang phyug gis na 'gro ba skyed gyur
76a4(mdo 'grel): na/ 'gro ba rim gyis rab tu 'jug pa ma yin la/ /skye dgu rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ma yin zhing/ /gang du gang zhig bskyes nas de dang de nyid 'gyur/ /lus can rnams kyi mi 'dod 'thab pa ma yin zhing/ /de yi bdag nyid rnams kyi 'dod
76a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i spyod pa med/ /gang zhig lus can rnams kyi dge dang mi dger gyur/ /de ni dbang phyug nyid phyir dbang phyug la yin no/ /de yi dbang phyug nyid la the tshom 'gyur min zhing/ /der ni mi rnams dag gis byams pa pha bzhin 'gyur/ /de la
76a6(mdo 'grel): nyam thag pas ni smos pa smra min zhing/ /lha rnams de dang de la 'jig rten mchod ma yin/ /gal te 'di mi skyed la dgongs par gyur na ni/ /bya ldan nyid phyir deng 'dir dbang phyug ma yin zhing/ /gal te 'di yi 'jug la 'dod par gyur na ni/ /de nyid
76a7(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug yod pa nyid la byed bar gyur/ /ci ste 'di yi skye la nus pa cung zhig med/ /byis pa bzhin du 'di yis spyod rnams rgyu med do/ /gal te dbang phyug gi ni bdag la mnga' nyid med/ /'jig rten bskyed la 'di yi stobs de ci zhig yod//
76b1(mdo 'grel): ji ltar 'dod la gal te bde sdug las bsnyen na/ /'byung po rnams ni 'jig rten na des byas pa nyid/ gang phyir 'dod la chags pa khong khro la 'jug ste/ /de phyir de yi dbang nyid yod pa ma yin no/ /de'i rten nyid la sems med rnams kyis gnas bya ste/ /skyes
76b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'bad rtsol tshang mar gyur pa nyid yin no/ /las 'bras med par 'gyur zhing lus ni byas min la/ /las kyi sbyor ba rnams ni de yi rten yin na/ /gal te dbang phyug rang gi las kyis 'gyur na ni/ /thun mong gyur pa'i las la dbang phyug gyur ma yin/ /ci
76b3(mdo 'grel): ste de yi khyab bdag rgyu med gyur na ni/ /'gro ba kun gyi dbang phyug nyid ni rab tu grub/ /ci ste de yi dbang phyug nyid gzhan las yin zhing/ /de nyid kyi yang byed pa po yi dbang phyug gzhan yin la/ /de yis gzhan zhes de ltar 'dir ni rnam gzhag med/ /de phyir 'gro
76b4(mdo 'grel): ba skyed pa yod pa ma yin nyid/ /dbang phyug skyed por gyur na rigs pas tha dad du/ /rnam par 'gal ba rnam pa du ma mthong ba ste/ /de yi phyir yang rang bzhin la ni nyes pa de/ /slar yang rab tu chags par 'gyur ba nyid yin no/ /rgyu shes rnams kyi rten ni
76b5(mdo 'grel): cung zad rnams log pa'o/ /rgyu ni bya ba'i cho gar smra ba ma yin zhing/ /bya ba'i cho gar sa bon la sogs de dang de/ ltos pa yin te de phyir rang bzhin rgyu ma yin/ /'bras mi rdzogs par byed pa po ni gcig pa nyid/ /'ga' zhig gi yang rgyu ni cung
76b6(mdo 'grel): zad yod ma yin/ /gcig gi bdag nyid can gyi rang bzhin rab bstan te/ /de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin/ /gang gi rang bzhin gyis ni khyab pa nyid 'dod pa/ de yi bya ba med pa nyid kyang rab chags shing/ /bya ba ma gtogs 'bras bu'i
76b7(mdo 'grel): cho ga mthong min te/ /de yi phyir yang bskyed la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin/ de yi khyab pa po nyid la ni rgyu nyid phyir/ /thams cad las ni thams cad rgyun mi chad par 'gyur/ /'bras bu'i rab tu 'jug la nges pa mthong ba ste/ /de phyir skyed pa la ni rang
77a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin rgyu ma yin/ /ji ltar 'di yi yon tan med nyid grub pa ste/ /de ltar 'bras bu la ni yon tan can rnams 'jig rten na mthong ste/ /de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin/ /rtag pa'i rgyu las khyad par 'gyur ba ma yin
77a2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan nyid ma yin/ /rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan zhugs pa ste/ /de phyir rang bzhin las ni skyed pa rigs ma yin/ /rang bzhin gyi ni bskyed pa'i bdag nyid can nyid la/ /'bras bu rnams su nyams pa'i rgyu ni grub ma yin//
77a3(mdo 'grel): gang phyir rnams gyur gyis ni nyams pa mthong ba ste/ /de phyir rtog par bya ba rgyu ni gzhan nyid do/ /nus par gyur pa'i sbyor la shin tu mthar thug pa'i/ /thar pa 'dod pa'i sdom brtson rnams kyi ma yin zhing/ /skye dgu rnams kyi rang bzhin rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir//
77a4(mdo 'grel): gang las mthar pa'i ched dang pha rol gnon par gyur/ /skyed pa'i bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis ni des nyid phyir/ /de yi bdag nyid rnams 'gyur la ni des nyid yin/ /'jig rten dag na rnam 'gyur la ni brtan nyid med/ /de phyir rang bzhin gyis ni skyed par
77a5(mdo 'grel): rigs ma yin/ /sems kyi spyod pa mi bsal rang bzhin zhes bya zhing/ /rnam 'gyur gsal ba 'di ni de nas grags pa ste/ /de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu min zhing/ /gsal ba'i rgyu la 'dir ni 'bras bu grub pa nyid/ /sems med rang bzhin
77a6(mdo 'grel): las ni sems dang bcas pa yi/ /rta glang bong bu la sogs 'bras bu rigs ma ma yin zhing/ /sems dang rnam par bral ba'i gyu rnams dag las ni/ /sems dang ldan pa cung zad zhig ni 'jug ma yin/ /gal te 'gro ba skyed phyir dus ni nges pa ste/ /de
77a7(mdo 'grel): phyir yongs su rtog byed rnams kyi thar pa med/ /gang phyir skye dgu rnams kyi mdza' ni byas min te/ /de phyir 'jig rten rgyu chad med par skye bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig yon tan rnams kyi gcig dang du mas byas/ /rjes rnams su ni rang nyid nges pa mthong ba
77b1(mdo 'grel): ste/ /gal te rgyu gcig nyid du gnas par gyur pa na/ /de yang tha dad khyad par gyur pa nyid/ /gang zhig smin pa las skyes rdzas kyi cho gar sar/ /yon tan shes pas yon tan tha dad nyid du mthong/ /gang phyir rgyu ni khyad par min pa 'dod pa ste/ /stong pa'i rdzas
77b2(mdo 'grel): rnams su yang nges par gyur pa nyid/ /gang gi mi gsal ba las rdzas ni 'char ba ste/ /de yi rjes su dpag pa nges par grub ma yin/ /'bras bu gsal ba yi ni yang dag rab 'jug pa/ /mi gsal ba las gang gis mngon du mthong ma yin/ /gsal ba
77b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa ngag las rab tu 'jug pa bzhin/ /mi gsal ba las gang gi 'bras bu dang por gyur/ /de yi 'dod pa las 'dir mi 'dod chen po'o/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis nyes pa gnyis ni rab tu chags/ /ji ltar gser gyi phreng ba khyad par 'phags pa ste/ /de
77b4(mdo 'grel): ltar rang bzhin gyi ni rnams gyur khyad par 'phags/ /'bras bu khyad par yin zhing rgyu yi ma yin te/ /de phyir bskyed la rang bzhin rigs pa ma yin no/ /gal te bya bar skyes bu de ni rgyu yin na/ /gang gis nges par gang 'dod nges de 'thob par 'gyur//
77b5(mdo 'grel): 'dod kyang kha cig don ni 'thob pa ma yin la/ /mi 'dod na yang dbang med 'dir mi thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis ba lang rta bong rnga mo'i skye gnas 'gro/ /mnga' bdag nyid du gyur na de ni bsnyen min zhing/ /de ru 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i las ni byed pa dang/ /sdug
77b6(mdo 'grel): bsngal mi 'dod su yis sdug bsngal byed par 'gyur/ /gal te 'jig rten dag na skyes bu byed par gyur/ /sdug bsngal byed pa ma yin bde ba kho na byed/ /'dod pa byed par 'dod kyang mi 'dod byed pa ste/ /dbang phyug chen por gyur na mi 'dod su yis
77b7(mdo 'grel): spyod/ /gang che mi ni chos min pa las rnam 'jigs shing/ /'bad pas chos ni rab tu son par byed pa nyid/ /sna tshogs nyon mongs rnams kyis dbang med 'phrog pa ste/ /de phyir 'di na mi ni pha rol rgyud du gyur/ /grang dang dro dang char dang thog dang glog
78a1(mdo 'grel): sogs kyi/ /bya ba rnams ni mi la bzlog nas mthong ba ste/ /gang phyir rang dbang ma yin mi ni gzhan ldan te/ /de phyir bya ba rnams su skyes bu dbang phyug min/ /gang tshe sa bon las dang sa chu'i rten las ni/ /dus sbyor rab tu 'jug
78a2(mdo 'grel): la lo tog phun tshogs shing/ /mar me dag las rab gsal shing las mo yin te/ /rgyu med las yin zhes pa rgyu med ma yin no/ /rgyu med pa las gal te 'gro ba'i rab 'jug na/ /mi yi byed pa yis ni med par 'gyur ba ste/ /thams cad kyis ni
78a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad nges par 'thob byed cing/ /rtag na 'di ni thams cad du ni song bar grub/ /de dang sdug bsngal gal te rgyu med las yin na/ /gang char kun gyi bde dang sdug bsngal skar min zhing/ /rgyu med las kyang bde dang sdug bsngal rtogs min te/ /de phyir
78a4(mdo 'grel): rgyu med pas shes 'di ni rgyu ma yin/ /de skad ces pa la sogs mi mnyam rgyu rnams nges/ /'jig rten rab tu 'jug la rgyu rnams shes ma yin/ /rgyu med par ni 'jig rten mthong ba ma yin zhing/ /nyes pa 'di rnams rgyu med las ni yang dag rtogs//
78a5(mdo 'grel): ba rtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i 'byung po rnams su yang/ /de dang de la brten nas de dang de 'byung ste/ /'jig rten dag na rgyu med ci yang yod min zhing/ /kun gyi rgyu ni 'jig rten pa yis shes ma yin/ /de nas sbyin pa bzang por byin pa'i bzang byin des/
78a6(mdo 'grel): rgya che'i chos kyi dam pa'i chos ni rnams shes nas/ /g.yo ba med pa'i blo gros nges par rab dang bas/ /drang srong chen po la ni tshig 'di gsol ba'o/ /mnyan yod rta ljang rta rid kyis bsnyen grong khyer ni/ /bdag gi gnas kyi gnas ni bsod nams
78a7(mdo 'grel): grags pa can/ /der ni bdag gis khyed kyi gnas ni byed 'dod de/ /sdig med gnas mchog dam ma de ni bsnyen par mdzod/ /gang lta na yang thub pa khyed kyi gnas su snyoms pa ni/ /gzhal yas khang gi logs sam rnam dben nags su ni//
78b1(mdo 'grel): bdag la rjes su brtse phyir gnas kyi ched du ni/ /dgra bcom rab tu gzhes par mdzad par 'os pa lags/ /de nas gtong bar lhag par mos pa 'di yis ni/ /rnam par grol ba'i sems ni rnam par mkhyen nas ni/ /chags pa med pa'i blo mnga' blos gros mkhyen
78b2(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /mchog tu zhi bas blo gros yang dag bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' brtan kye gang zhig rdzas glog g.yo rnams su/ /khyod kyi sems dpa' gtong la lhag par mos pa ste/ /rang bzhin gyis ni sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dgyes/ /de nyid mthong ba
78b3(mdo 'grel): khyod la de ni ngo mtshar min/ /gang zhig khyim ni tshig las phyi rol 'thon byed pa/ /de yi don de 'tshig gam byed pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin dus kyi me yis 'gro ba tshig pa na/ /gang gis gang zhig sbyin pa de yis de nyer thob/ /de phyir rnam spangs sems dpa' 
78b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis sbyin pa dang/ /yul rnams yang dag longs spyod par ni shes pa nyid/ /bkren pa 'jig rten dag ni zad pa'i skyon mthong bas/ /nye bar longs spyod ma yin 'jigs las sbyin ma yin/ /dus su smod la don ni rnam par gtong ba dang/ /dpa' dang
78b5(mdo 'grel): nga rgyal las ni de bzhin g.yul 'gyed par/ /sems dpa' lhag pa nyid kyis shes te gzhan gyis min/ /sems dpa' yis ni sbyin pa nyid dang g.yul 'gyed do/ /sbyin byed dga' ba nyid du 'gro la 'gro ba ste/ /snyan pa dang ni dam par grags pa rab tu 'thob
78b6(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa po yod gang zhes dam pa rnams sbyin nas/ /yang dag bkur ba dang ni mngon du 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin 'jig rten dag na blo gtad nyid 'gyur zhing/ /mi bzod pa rnams las kyang nyes pa 'thob ma yin/ /bsod nams rnams ni bdag gis byas zhes
78b7(mdo 'grel): tshim pa ste/ /'chi ba'i dus su skrag par mngon par 'gro ma yin/ /sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dir ni me tog tsam zhig ste/ /sbyin pa po yi 'bras bu gzhan nyid rab tu 'thob/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo la ni 'khor ba'i skye bo yi/ /gtong ba dang mnyam gnyen ni yod pa
79a1(mdo 'grel): ma yin no/ /mi yi 'jig rten na dang lhan skyes pa rnams/ /gtong pa las dang mnyam pa rnams las lhag par gyur/ /rta dang glang po'i skye gnas su yang gnas pa rnams/ /'bras du de ni gtso bo thob par 'gyur pa'o/ /sbyin pas longs
79a2(mdo 'grel): spyod rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ /tshul khrims kyis bsrungs mtho ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro ba can gyi zhi ba yis kyang ni/ /rten dang bral ba gang na grangs su 'gro ba 'gro ma yin/ /cha med bdud rtsi de yis 'thob pa'i
79a3(mdo 'grel): ched du yang/ /sdom par gyur pa rab tu sbyin pa yin pa yid/ /sbyin pa dran nas rab tu dga' bar gyur pa ste/ /yid ni rab tu dga' las nges par ting 'dzin yin/ /mnyam par bzhag na yang dag mtho ba 'di ru ni/ /skye dang 'god pa shes par rim gyis
79a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba ste/ /gzhan la sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sbyin pa bo yis ni snying la gnas pa'i nyon mongs rnams ni bsrab par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyin pa sbyin byed de yi don rnams su/ /chags par grags pa de ni dang por chos pa nyid/ /gang la rab tu byams pa'i sems
79a5(mdo 'grel): kyis sbyin pa ste/ /de phyir zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal spangs par gyur/ /rab tu len pa po ni bde ldan rnams mthong nas/ /gang zhig dga' ste des na ser sna yod ma yin/ /sbyin pa pos ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu mngon rtogs nas/ /med pa nyid dang mi shes
79a6(mdo 'grel): mun pa 'joms pa po/ /de phyir zhi ba 'phags min gyis bsnyen ser sna dang/ /sred pa gang las sbyin pa byed pas bcom pa ste/ /des na thar pa'i yan lag gyur pa sbyin pa ni/ yin zhing nyes pa rab tu nyams phyir thar pa'o/ /ji ltar gzhan rnams
79a7(mdo 'grel): grib ma'i don du shing 'dod cing/ /kha cig 'bras bu'i don du gzhin rnams me tog phyir/ /de ltar sbyin pa yongs su sgyur bar byed pa ste/ /kha cig zhi ba'i don du gzhan rnams nor gyi phyir/ /de phyir khyad par du ni khyim na gnas rnams kyis//
79b1(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa ji ltar nus pa mchog ni gter yin zhing/ /sbyin pa snying po med pa'i nor gyi snying po ste/ /dam pa rnams kyi rjes su song ba lam 'di yin/ /bza' ba rab tu sbyin par stobs ni rab ster zhing/ /bgo ba sbyin byed la yang lus ni ster ba'o/ gang gis
79b2(mdo 'grel): dam pa rnams la gnas ni sbyin byed pa/ /des kyang 'jig rten dag na thams cad byin pa yin/ /theg pa sbyin byed la yang bde ba sbyin pa ste/ /mar me sbyin byed la ni spyan mig sbyin pa nyid/ de nas dbrog bya ma yin 'chi med rab sbyin zhing/ /gang gis mthar
79b3(mdo 'grel): thug gyur pa'i chos kyis ston pa nyid/ /kha cig 'dod pa'i ched du sbyin pa gtong ba ste/ gzhan ni don gyis don du gcig ni grags pa'i phyir/ /kha cig mtho ris don du gzhan mi brtse ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni chags pa med pa yin/ /de phyir legs
79b4(mdo 'grel): so khyod ni sred pa de ltar gyur/ /gang zhig yang dag bsgrubs mdzod 'dod pa tshim par shog /rdul bcas mun pa dang ldan gang khyed 'ongs nas ni/ /ye shes rnam dag blo ni rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nyid de ni gshegs pas lam gyis yang dag par
79b5(mdo 'grel): dga' ba byas pa dang yang gzhug pa byas pa ni/ /gtsug lag khang de snying la rnam par byas nas ni/ /nye rgyal dang ni lhan cig dus su song bar gyur/ /song nas de na kau sham rgyal po'i khab dang ni/ /gtsug lag khang gi sa la so sor yang dag rgyus/ /
79b6(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan mnyam zhing mdze sla yid 'ong shing ldan pa/ /der ni de yis rgyal byed kyi ni tshal mthong ngo/ /de nas de yi don du rgyal byed la zhugs te/ /de yis chags pa las ni de la ma byin no/ /khyod kyi gal te don gyis kun nas bkram na yang/ /sa ni
79b7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis sbyin pa ma yin zhes smras so/ /de nas der ni bzang sbyin gyis de la smras pa/ /tshal de la ni rim byas shes ni mngon 'dod do/ /de nas des ni nor gyi sa ni yongs g.yogs nas/ /chos kyi tha snyad mthong zhing nyos par gyur pa'o/ /de yis
80a1(mdo 'grel): gtong ba des ni mthong nas rgyal byed kyis/ /sangs rgyas la ni mchog tu rab tu dang ba byas/ /nags tshal de yi lhag ma dag ni kun nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni phul bar gyur pa'o/ /de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis
80a2(mdo 'grel): ni drang srong chen po yis/ /nye rgyal gyis ni nges par gzigs par bya ba'i don ldan par/ /myur ba'i blo gros dang ldan ma chags grol ba'i sems kyi ni/ /mdzes shing dge ba mchog gi gtsug lag khang ni byed du bcug /nor gyi dbang phyug nyid kyi gnas
80a3(mdo 'grel): ni 'phongs pa lta bu dang/ /byang phyogs ko sha la yi khang pa'i bde ba lta bu dang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi gzhi ni mtshungs pa lta bu dang/ /rang gi nor dang stobs kyi dang ni lta ba yid yang ngo/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags
80a4(mdo 'grel): chen po las/ /mgon med zas sbyin la rjes su ston pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas thub pa sna tshogs tha dad blo can gyi/ /ston pas thams cad ye shes kyis ni zil mnan nas/ /bcu phyed phrag ri nas
80a5(mdo 'grel): dang grong khyer nas rim gyis/ /rgyal po bum pas bsnyen pa'i grong khyer du gshegs so/ /de nas slob ma stong phrag tsam ni dul ba ni/ /gshegs so des ni yab kyi yul ni rab tu thob/ /de nas de la rjes su 'dzin pa mdzad bzhed pa/ /rang gi grong gi
80a6(mdo 'grel): gnas la mdza' ru bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas 'dun na 'don dang blon po blo gros can/ /dga' ba'i gtam la dam pa rgyu ba de rnams kyis/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i rab rnyed 'phags pa ste/ /sa skyong rgyal po de la zhus shing gsol ba'o/ /de nas de ni
80a7(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa thos nas sa skyong ni/ /dga' ba yongs ldan sems kyis lta bar 'dod pa yis/ /grong khyer pa ni kun gyi rjes su 'gro byas pa/ /myur bas bstan pa spangs shing bsu ba la gshegs so/ /drang srong dbus su tshangs pa bzhin du ni/ /slob mas
80b1(mdo 'grel): bsgor ba de ni rgyang ring nas gzigs nas/ /drang srong chen po'i chos la rjes su 'gro bas ni/ /shing rta spangs nas rkang pa rnams kyis nye bar gshegs/ /myur bar de yi nye logs su ni yongs phyin nas/ /thub pa mthong ba nyid de des ni ma smras so/ /de lta bu zhes
80b2(mdo 'grel): smra bar nus pa ma yin zhing/ /de bzhin dge slong zhes ni nus pa ma yin no/ /de nas de yi dge slong cha lugs de mthong zhing/ /bdag tu song ba'i sna tshogs dpal la brtags nas ni/ /dbugs rings rgyus nas mchi ma rnam par bton pa ste/ /drag tu min par gyur
80b3(mdo 'grel): cing rnam par zlos pa nyid/ /lam 'gro sgom par gyur pa mngon par song ba yi/ /rgyang ring dag nas rdzing bu skam po mthong nas ltar/ /rang gnas rnam pa dang bral nye bar nyer bzhugs pa/ /mthong nas bdag gi nyam thag stobs ldan mchog tu gyur/ /'jig
80b4(mdo 'grel): rten mdza' ru gnas pa'i sems gyur thim pa na/ /sdug pa'i rnam 'gyur ri mor song ba ji lta bar/ /gzugs de nyid ni mthong ba na ni bdag la ni/ /dga' ba yod pa ma yin 'di la dga' ba thal/ /gang gi mdza' dag ri yis bzlums pas sa gzhi ni/ /dang
80b5(mdo 'grel): po'i dus su nga la nu ni gnas pa bzhin/ /gang zhig dbang po la yang slong par 'os min pa/ /bdag gi de ni pha rol rnams la slong mos 'tsho/ /ga sa 'di snying po lhun po la ni khyad 'phags shing/ /gsal bas nyi ma la dang mdzes pas zla ba la/ /'gros
80b6(mdo 'grel): kyis glang po che la dbyangs kyi khyu mchog la/ /des ni slong mo za zhing sa ni rdzogs la min/ /de nas bu yi 'du shes kyis ni 'phyo ba nyid/ /rgyal po'i bsam pa 'di ni rnam par mkhyen nas dang/ /'jig rten lhag ma lha yang rjes su brtse ba ste/ /de yi don
80b7(mdo 'grel): du sangs rgyas mkha' la 'phur bar gyur/ /nyi ma'i shing rta phyag gis reg par mdzad nas ni/ /rlung gis bsnyen pa'i lam la zhabs dag gis gshegs shing/ /sku la gcig tu gyur cing du mar 'gyur ba dang/ /mang po nyid du gyur nas gcig tu gyur
81a1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /sa la chu bzhin du yang zhugs shing thogs med la/ /chu yi logs la sa la bzhin du spyod pa dang/ /rab dang ni ri la thang kar mdzad pa dang/ /thogs pa med cing mkha' la bzhin du rab tu bzhugs/ /lus kyi phyed
81a2(mdo 'grel): kyis chu yi char ba 'bebs pa dang/ /phyed kyi me bzhin du ni 'bar bar gyur pa ste/ /ri bos 'bar ba'i sman dang rab tu 'bar ba bzhin/ /mkha' la gang zhig 'bar dang 'bar bas mdzes par gyur/ /dbang phyug mngon par 'dod pa'i skye bo de yi ni//
81a3(mdo 'grel): sems kyi rab tu dga' ba de ltar bskyed nas ni/ /nyi ma gnyis pa bzhin du mkha' la bzhugs nas su/ /mi skyong la ni chos dag bgro bar mdzad pa'o/ /mi skyong khyed kyi bdag la gang zhig ltos pa dang/ /mya ngan rjes su zhugs pa snying rje'i bdag
81a4(mdo 'grel): nyid shes/ /bu la dga' ba de ni chod mdzod zhi bar gshegs/ /bdag las bu yi gsar pa bsnoms mdzod cig /gang zhig sngon chad bu yis pha la ma byin zhing/ /sngon ni pha yis bu las rab tu ma thob pa/ /rgyal srid las khyad 'phags
81a5(mdo 'grel): shing mtho ris las khyad 'phags/ /rgyal po mchog gi bdud rtsi de ni bzhes mdzod cig /sa skyong las kyi bdag nyid las kyi skye gnas dang/ /las kyi rten dang? las kyi rnam smin skal ba dang/ /las kyi dbang gis gnas par 'gro ba shes nas
81a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /phan pa'i ched du las gang gyur pa de bsnyen mdzod/ 'jig rten de nyid rtogs nas dang ni btsal nas su/ /dam pa'i las ni mi yi bshes yin gzhan ma yin/ /thams cad bor nas las dang lhan cig khyod kyi ni/ /rten dang bral zhing
81a7(mdo 'grel): gcig pur 'gro bar bya ba'o/ /lha 'am dmyal ba dud 'gro mi yi 'jig rten du/ /las kyi rten las son pa'i 'jig rten 'gro ba ste/ /srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa gsum dang skye gnas gsum/ /sna tshogs las ni 'jig rten pa yis rab tu byed//
81b1(mdo 'grel): de phyir sde tshan gnyis ni yang dag 'jug par dang/ /lus dang ngag gi las 'di rnam par dag pa dang/ /yid kyi rab tu zhi la 'bad par bya ba ste/ /de ni bdag gi don yin gzhan don ma yin no/ /'gro ba chu yi dpa' rlabs g.yo bar shes nas ni//
81b2(mdo 'grel): brtags nas khyod kyi srid pa rnams su dga' mi bya/ /las ni yongs su zad phyir dam pa'i las gang des/ /mchog tu bde ba'i don du gang gyur bsnyen par bya/ /rgyu skar 'khor lo mkha' la bzhin du rtag par ni/ /'jig rten yongs su 'khor bar shes par
81b3(mdo 'grel): byas nas ni/ /rtse mo 'das nas lha nas lha yang lhung ba ste/ /kye ma mir gyur smos ci blo gtang byed pa su/ /bde ba rnams las mchog tu thar pa'i bde ba dang/ /dga' ba rnams las bdag tu dga' bas btsor shes nas/ /lag 'gro rnams kyi
81b4(mdo 'grel): brang la bzhin du bdag ldan ni/ /su zhig 'jigs pa du ma'i dpa' gyi bde la dga' / /de phyir rten pa khyim na med bzhin 'jig rten ni/ /'jigs pa chen po dang ni yongs ldan mthong nas ni/ /gang zhig skye 'chi ngal ba mya ngan dang bral ba/ /zhi zhing
81b5(mdo 'grel): brten pa'i go 'phang de ni slongs mdzod cig /don gyis ma yin yul gyis na yin mtshon gyis min/ gang la rta dang glang pos don ni yod ma yin/ /skyon ni dgra bo rnams kyi sde de mtshoms mdzod dang/ /de las rgyal na rnam par rgyal ba gzhal du med/ /
81b6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal dang ni bsdug bsngal gyi rgyu zhi ba dang/ zhi ba yi yang mngon pa'i thabs ni shes par mdzod/ /bzhi po 'di yi kun nas khong du chud pa las/ /'jigs pa chen po dang ni ngan 'gro rnams 'gog go /de nas bde bar gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul
81b7(mdo 'grel): gyis sngon du/ /zhing du byas pa'i sems la dga' ba skyes pa ste/ /thos nas mi skyong de yis chos ni rab thob cing/ /dga' bzhin thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /blo ldan dang bcas 'bras bu dang bcas khyed dgyis shing/ /sdug bsngal
82a1(mdo 'grel): chen po las ni rnam grol khyed dgyes so/ /mya ngan ched du don med sa sbyin bdag dga' la/ /bu yis 'bras bu dang ldan bdag ni dga' bar gyur/ /phun tshogs spangs nas gshegs pa khyed ni gnas su gyur//
82a2(mdo 'grel): ngal ba chen pos dub pas khyed ni gnas su gyur/ /dga' ba'i gnyen 'dun dga' ba khyod kyis bor ba rnams/ /bdag cag rnams ni snying rje bar du gnas su gyur/ /lha yi drang srong rnams sam rgyal po'i drang srong rnams/ /de rnams sngon dus na
82a3(mdo 'grel): yang gang la ma gshegs pa/ /nyam thag 'jig rten dag gi dge ba'i ched du lam/ /nges par legs pa 'di dang khyed kyis lhag par thob/ /khyed ni 'khor los sgyur bar gal te gyur na ni/ /bdag gi dga' ba de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin zhing//
82a4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa de ltar? rdzu 'phrul 'di dang khyod kyis chos/ /mthong ba? ji ltar bdag gi brtan pa dga' bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni yang srid nyid du sbyor ba'i chos la ni/ /'khor los sgyur bas skye dgu rnams ni skyong pa ste/ /'khor ba'i sdug
82a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal chen po rnams ni 'dzoms pa la/ /'jig rten ched du chos kyang thub pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /gang gi rdzu 'phrul 'di dang rnam gyis blo gros dang/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa mdza' dag nges par log pa ni/ /dpal dang bral yang 'jig
82a6(mdo 'grel): rten na khyod dbang phyug ste/ /dpal ni 'phel yang dbang med sred bcas ma yin no/ /brtse ba'i chos kyi bstan pa'i 'os gyur pa/ /shAkya'i rgyal pos mang po de skad smas nas ni/ /rgyal po nyid dang yab nyid du ni gnas na yang/ /sras la de nyid
82a7(mdo 'grel): khong du chud phyir phyag byas so/ /thub pa'i mthu ni lhag par thob pa mthong nas dang/ /de nyid rab tu 'bigs pa'i bstan bcos mthong nas dang/ /bla ma rgyal pos sbyar ba'i mchod pa mthong nas ni/ /du ma rnams kyis rab tu 'byung phyir re 'dod byas/ /de
82b1(mdo 'grel): nas gzhon nu mang po 'bras bu la gnas rnams/ /chos kyi cho ga de nyid rab tu thob gyur te/ /sngags dang 'dod pa chen po rnams la bltos med nas/ /byams pa'i gnyen 'dun du ba rnams ni spangs nas so/ /kun dga' mdzes dga' kra mi la dang ma 'gags
82b2(mdo 'grel): ba/ /dga' bo nye dga' dag dang de nas 'khyil ba 'dzin/ /slob ma'i lkog tu ston pa yis ni lhas byin te/ /thub pas rjes su bslabs pa de rnams byung bar gyur/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu ni bdag nyid che/ /'char kas lam de nyid la rab tu song ba ste//
82b3(mdo 'grel): de yis nges pa rab tu mthong nas de bzhin du/ /nye bar 'khor dang rgyun shes bu yis blo byas so/ /rgyal po yis kyang sras kyi mthu ni mthong nas dang/ /mchog gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu thob byas nas/ /chags pa med par rgyal srid spun zla la byin zhing//
82b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i drang srong spyod pas khyim rnams la bsnyen to/ /de skad ces pa la sogs legs pa'i gnyen rnams dang/ /'khor dang gnyen rnams rjes su brtul nas sangs rgyas ni/ /mchi ma dang bcas grong khyer ba yis mngon dga' ba/ /rang gnas grong khyer
82b5(mdo 'grel): la ni dus su rab zhugs pa/ /don kun grub pa zhes pa rgyal po'i sras po ni/ /don mdzad grub pa grong khyer du ni rab zhugs pa/ /zhes ni don thos khang pa rnams su mi mo rnams/ /sgo rnams dang ni skar khur rnams la mnyam par brten/ /mtshams
82b6(mdo 'grel): kyi sprin gyis phyed bka' 'od zer ldan pa bzhin/ /ngur smrig bsnams shing mdzes pa de ni rab mthong nas/ bud med de rnams mig nas mchi ma phyung ba ste/ /pad+ma dang mtshungs thal mo rnams kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi dang ni gzugs kyi
82b7(mdo 'grel): bsal bar gyur pa ni/ /'og tu zhal gzigs gshegs pa de ni mthong gyur nas/ /brtse ba dang ni gus pa rnam par ston pa ste/ /mchi mas rnyogs pa'i mig can rab myos ma rnam zlos/ /legs skyes dbu ni bzhar bar rnam par mdzad nas dang//
83a1(mdo 'grel): na bza' rnying pa yongs su gsol nas dang/ /sku las gser gyi kha dog rab tu g.yogs nas dang/ /des ni spyan mig rab tu bkod nas gshegs/ /gang zhig gdung ba skyob pa'i gdugs dkar bsnyen phyir dang/ /sras po rnam par
83a2(mdo 'grel): dul ba blta ba'i phyir 'ong zhing/ /kun nas gnas phyir 'os shing rgyal ba'i phyir 'os pa/ /des ni lhung bzed yang dag yongs su gzung nas gshegs/ /'gram par tam la yi lo ma rnam bkod pa'i/ /mdzes ma'i gdong dang gdung ba skyob pa'i
83a3(mdo 'grel): gdugs dkar ni/ /gang gis bsnyen par 'os zhing mgyogs 'gro 'os pa ste/ /des ni lhung bzed yongs su bzung nas rkang pas gshegs/ /sa skyong bdag skyes rnams kyi dgra rnams zad pa dang/ /dga' ba rnams kyi chags dang 'gro ba'i rjes chags
83a4(mdo 'grel): par/ /blta bar 'os shing sna tshogs dbu rgyan bsnams pa gang/ /des ni sa yi gnya' shing gang tsam gzigs shing gshegs/ /'di yi lta ba ci zhig mtshan nyid de ni ci/ /don gnyer ci zhig rol bas dgra bor gyur pa ci/ /gang 'di brtul zhugs
83a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni lhan cig rol pa ste/ /bu byis rnams dang mo btsun 'dzangs ma rnams dang min/ /rgyal po'i mna' ma nges par mya ngan 'dzin ma'o/ /grags 'dzin ma de shin tu dka' thub byed pa ste/ /gang zhig jo bo'i rab tu spyod pa 'di thos shing/ /thos nas kyang
83a6(mdo 'grel): ni gnas shing nyams par 'gro ba med/ /'di yi gzugs ni nges par rjes su mthun pa dang/ /kha dog ngan pa'i gzugs 'di snang ba mthong nas kyang/ /sras 'dod mi dbang rgyal po ji lta bur gyur cing/ /'tshe ba'i dgra bo la yang ji lta bur byed dam/ /mchi mas
83a7(mdo 'grel): gang ba'i sras po sgra gcan 'dzin mthong nas/ /gal te de lta nyid du 'di ni chags ma yin/ /byams pa'i gnyen rnams las kyang gzhan du kha bltas pa/ /'di 'dra nges pa'i brtul zhugs la ni dge legs shog /gzi mdangs dang ni lus kyi dbyibs dang/
83b1(mdo 'grel): 'thos? sam ste/ /bde ba'i rab tu 'jug la nges par tshad ma yin/ /yon tan des rnams dag gis 'di ni mdzes pa ste/ /zhi bas ldan zhing yul rnams kyis ni rnam par bral/ /sna tshogs ston ni rab mtshungs bsam pa yang dag yongs bzung nas/ /de skad
83b2(mdo 'grel): ces sogs rab myos ma rnams mang po rnam par labs/ /sangs rgyas ma chags thugs kyang rang gi grong khyer la gshegs nas/ /bsod snyoms bsnyes shing n+ya gro d+ha yi mtshan ba'i nags su gshegs/ /nyung ngu nyung ngu'i bsod snyoms sbyin pa rnams
83b3(mdo 'grel): kyis nor rdzas phra zhing dge ba ma byas skye bo sgrol bar mdzad bzhed pa/ /spyod pa 'di yis yang dag tshim pa ma yin dge sbyong skye bo bsam pa ma thul ba la brten pa mdzad bzhed la/ /'jigs rten dag na skyid de ba zhes rgol ba nub par mdzad bzhed de bzhin
83b4(mdo 'grel): yongs su bris nyid ston par mdzad bzhed pa/ /rtag par bsnyam pa bsod snyoms phyir ni yab kyi grong khyer la ni sred med thugs mnga' de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /yab dang sras
83b5(mdo 'grel): mdzal ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //nga rgyal nyid kyis skye bo dam pa ma rmong cig /bshes gnyen 'du shes dka' thub rnams 'joms shig /nyon mongs dbang gis dam pa'i brtul zhugs ma byed cig /dam pa min pa'i lta ba
83b6(mdo 'grel): cung zad ma bsnyan cig /mtshar la ma 'gro mi dge'i las la ma gnas shig /rgyags par ma 'gro dga' min ma bzod ma nyan cig /snyan grags mi bzang brdzun la blo gros ma 'dzin cig/ /bstan bcos mthong la lhag par btor ma ma 'phrog
83b7(mdo 'grel): cig /blo ni mnyam par zhog cing chos ni gyis mdzod cig /dam pa rnams dang sprel mdzod ri mo khong mdzod cig /ji ltar phul byung 'di ni thob nas slar yang ni/ /rgya cher mngon par 'gro ba de ltar gyis mdzod cig /brtson 'grus brtsams nas dang ni bstan
84a1(mdo 'grel): pa yongs bzung nas/ /rig pa rnams ni bskyed nas skyon rnams zil mnan nas/ /'chi pa yang dag dran nas 'phags pa'i bya ba gyis/ /che ba'i bdag nyid thob nas zhi lam thob par gyis/ /gang gi 'bras bu 'di ni zhi ba
84a2(mdo 'grel): skyong ba ni/ /las de nyid ni slar yang byed pa 'os pa ste/ /yid gzhungs ldan pa 'di dang byed pa byas pa nyid/ /'bras bu gang zhig mthong bas sa bon skrun? par byed/ /'di na mchog gyur gang zhig sdig pa byed pa ste/ /snang ba de ni mun par gnas
84a3(mdo 'grel): pa bdag gi lugs/ /chos ni btso bo skyes bu gtso bo ma yin pa/ /mun pa snang ba la ni gnas pa bdag gi lugs/ /khyad 'phags gang zhig chos kyi cho gar 'jug pa ste/ /dkar po dkar por mchog tu 'gro ba bdag gi lugs/ /dman pa gang
84a4(mdo 'grel): zhig sdig pa'i las ni byed pa ste/ /de yang mun pa mun pa'i mdza' ru 'gro ba lugs/ /de phyir phung po bzhi po de rnams shes byas nas/ /rgyal po 'bad pa gyis shig de ltar ji ltar 'dir/ /de nas bde bar gal te 'gro bar 'dod na ni/ /phyogs
84a5(mdo 'grel): ni gsum pa bsnyen zhing snga ma ma yin no/ /gzhan gyi gzhan la dge ba byed pa ma yin zhing/ /ci ste byed na de la rjes su 'gro ma yin/ /byis pa'i nyams pa yod min rang la thob pa ste/ /ma byas pa yi 'ong pa 'grub pa yod ma yin/ /ma byas pa
84a6(mdo 'grel): yang brgya la byed pa ma yin zhing/ /ma byas pa ni gzhan du dge legs 'gyur ma yin/ /der ni 'gro ba la yang nor ni yod min te/ de phyir dge ba'i las kyi cho gar 'bad pa gyis/ /gang zhig sdig pa lhag par spyod pa legs min zhing/ /gson
84a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'jig rten na de'i bdag la dga' ma yin/ /bdag gi ched du bdag gi sdig pa byas nas ni/ gzhan du 'bras bu bdag nyid kho na la longs spyod do/ /rgyal po chen po dri? bo chen po bzhi rnams ni/ /'ongs pa rnams su 'gro ba kun nas srub pa ste//
84b1(mdo 'grel): chos kyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsten las ni/ /ji ltar 'thad pas gzhan na bya ba ci zhig yang/ /rga dang rgud pa nad dang de nas 'chi ba ste/ /bzhi po 'di rnams de bzhin du ni 'ongs pa ste/ /chi bo rnams kyi kun nas bskor ba bzhin du ni/ /'jig rten mdza' 
84b2(mdo 'grel): ngag dbang med 'khol bar byed pa'o/ /de nas 'ongs pa rnams su dbang med sdug bsngal te/ /rten ni yod min mngon du 'thab min bsrung ba med/ /der ni byed pa'i ched du nor med chad pa med/ /chos las ma gtogs sman gzhan yod min no/ /de
84b3(mdo 'grel): ltar mi rtag gyur pa gson pa'i 'jig rten na/ /glog ni g.yo ba'i yul la rab tu zhugs pa na/ /'chi ba'i lag pa'i rtse la yongs su gnas pa ste/ /chos ma yin pas 'bras bu longs spyod par 'os min/ /dbang chen dang mtshungs mi dbang de dang de rnams
84b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /g.yul du lha yi mngon par 'thab la phyin nas kyang/ /rab tu rgyas pa rnams dang nges par zum pa rnams/ /dus kyi dus su de dang sdug bsngal skal ba'o/ /'byung po 'dzin pa'i sa yang zad par 'gro ba ste/ /'jig pa'i mes ni lhun po de bzhin sreg
84b5(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /rgya mtsho chen po yongs su bskams par 'gro ba ste/ /lbu ba dang mtshungs mi yi 'jig rten kye ma ci/ /shugs byas nas kyang rlung ni zhi bar 'gro ba ste/ /'jig rten gdungs nas kyang ni nyi ma nub par 'gro/ /bsregs nas kyang ni me nyid 'da' 
84b6(mdo 'grel): bar nyer 'gro ste/ /gang de de ltar gnas par 'gyur ba yin snyam mam/ /lus po 'di ni yun ring dus su bsrungs kyang ngam/ /sna tshogs longs spyod rnams kyis nye bar bskyangs kyang ni/ /de yis 'dir ni nyin zhag 'ga' zhig bzhugs nas su/ /skye bo
84b7(mdo 'grel): chen po'i rjes su brtse ba mdzad nas ni/ /sde rab 'pham byed kyis ni phyag gis mngon bsrungs pa'i/ /grong khyer la ni chen po'i tshogs kyi rab tu dpags/ /me tog rab rgyas mya ngan med pas gsal byas shing/ /yan lag dmar por gyur cing khu?
85a1(mdo 'grel): byug skad sgrogs pa/ /ti si'i gangs ltar mtho ba'i lding khar phreng ba can/ /dpal ldan rgyal byed tshal ni de nas rab tu thog /des ni gtsang ma'i chus gang phreng ba dkar po can/ /gser gyi bum pa dang bcas bum pa blangs
85a2(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /de nas dus su rgyal byed tshal ni bzang sbyin gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rab tu phul bar gyur/ /de nas shAkya thub pa lta 'dod rgyal po ni/ /sde rab 'pham byed rgyal byed tshal du song ba ste/ /song nas de nas bkur sti byas te
85a3(mdo 'grel): thub pa la/ /rab tu btud cing gdan byas tshig 'di gsol pa'o/ /thub pa grong khyer 'dir ni khyed kyi gnas bzhed pa/ /nges par dang ni ko sa la rnams kyi dge ba'o/ /de nyid gzigs pa 'di 'dra brten pa med pa ni/ /nye bar 'chi byas yul
85a4(mdo 'grel): ni skal ba med pa 'am/ /khyed mthong ba'am yang na mngon par phyag 'tshal ba/ /yang dag thob po bdag cag rnams kyi rjes bzung phyir/ /dam pa rnams kyi 'dus pa thob nas 'jig rten na/ /tshim pa med kyang ji ltar tshim pa nyid yin no/ /gang gi
85a5(mdo 'grel): rten can rlung ni rab tu g.yos pa ste/ /de yi bdag nyid las ni nye ba las 'gro ste/ /mkha' 'gro'i bya rnams lhun po'i 'dus pa nyer thob nas/ /rang bzhin rnam par spangs nas gser du 'gyur ba'o/ /de phyir 'di dang che ge mo rin mgon gyur
85a6(mdo 'grel): cing/ /skye bo legs pa'i rten las gzhan min bdag gi nags/ /gA d+hi'i sras po thub ba chen po rab thob nas/ /phur bu gsum pa'i khyil ltar lta na mdzes par gyur/ /'jig rten dag na snyed pa rab rnyed sna tshogs pa/ /chad dang/ ldan pa
85a7(mdo 'grel): dag ni mdzad pa can yin la/ /khyed kyi nye ba las ni don gang yin pa rnams/ /de dag rnams kyi grangs med nyams pa yod ma yin/ /legs pa khyed kyi nges pa'i lta ba'i lta ba las/ /'di las gzhan du rnyed pa shes pa ma yin zhing/ /khyab bdag
85b1(mdo 'grel): pa dag ni gnod pa rnyed la sdug bsngal ba/ /chags pa dang ldan rgyal po'i chos la spyod par gyur/ /de ltar dbang po dang/ tshungs rgyal por yis ni/ /rnam pa de ltar mngon du gyur te gsan nas ni/ /don dang 'dod pa dag gi chags pa mkhyen nas su//
85b2(mdo 'grel): nga yi bsam pa yang dag bskul ba thub pas gsungs/ /mi dbang khyod kyi tshig 'di ngo mtshar che ma yin/ /khyod kyi spyod pa 'di ni legs pa rnams la min/ /'og nas 'phos pa 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ /phan pa 'dod pa'i dam pa'i
85b3(mdo 'grel): skyes bu rnams la ni/ /gang phyir sa skyod khyed kyi dgongs pa de nyid ni/ /des na khyod la 'dir ni cung zad smra 'dod te/ /de ni shes par gyis shig bdag gi lta ba ni/ /'bras bcas ji ltar gyur pa khyed kyi de ltar gyis/ /mi skyong rgyal po'i dus kyis bcings
85b4(mdo 'grel): nas bkug pa na/ /mdza' bshes ma yin gnyen min phun tshogs rjes 'gro min/ /thams cad kyis ni dman zhing dbang med 'gro ba ni/ /grib ma bzhin du las cig rjes su 'gro ba nyid/ /de phyir mtho ris dang ni grags pa dam pa ni/ /mngon par
85b5(mdo 'grel): 'dod bzhin chos kyi rgyal srid rjes su skyongs/ /rmongs pa las ni chos la 'khrul pa'i rgyal po yi/ /rgyal srid de nyid mtho ris na yang ma yin no/ /'dir ni rgyal srid yang dag yongs su bskyangs nas ni/ /chos las rin min d+ha ring mtho
85b6(mdo 'grel): ris rab thob nas/ /'dir ni rmongs las mi yi bdag po ni kun b+ha/ /chos las 'phos shing ga shi rnams su sa la zhugs/ /'phags pa yi dang sdig pa yi ni las kyi ni/ /khyod la dper bstan zhi ba bdag gis de smras te/ /rang gis skye dgu rnams
85b7(mdo 'grel): ni rtag tu legs bsrung zhing/ /dpyad nas de phyir brtan pa dge la 'bad pa gyis/ /ji ltar srog chags rnams ni gtse bar ma byed cig /rtag par dbang po rnams ni rol par ma byed cig /'phags min gyis bsnyen khro ba 'dzin par ma byed cig/ /
86a1(mdo 'grel): mchog min bya bar sems ni g.yo bar ma byed cig /nga rgyal dang ni rgyags pa khur nas dus su ni/ /rab tu mthor? zhing shin tu gyur pa nyid log gyur/ /rnam pa de ltar 'jig rten 'gro ba shes nas su/ /de la mnyal
86a2(mdo 'grel): dge ba la ni gnyid ma log/ 'khor ba'i phyogs ni g.yo bar 'dzegs nas su/ /nges par ltung na sa gzhi bag med 'gyur ba'o/ /gang zhig bde la 'brel min de ni bsnyen bya min/ /gang gis 'bras bu legs min gang de bya ba min//
86a3(mdo 'grel): gang zhig dge la spyod min de ni bshes ma yin/ /sdug bsngal rnam par 'joms min gang de ye shes min/ /gal te ye shes yin na yang srid ma yin zhing/ /srid par gyur na lus med nyid la yin pa ste/ /lus su gyur na yul las
86a4(mdo 'grel): thar pa ma yin zhing/ /nyi tshe ma yin 'dod pa'i srid pa don med do/ /gang phyir lhan gnas rnams dus kyi dbang gis ni/ /gzugs med rnams kyang mdzad pa can phyir mi rtag ste/ /de bzhin 'jug pa min la blo gros zhugs bya zhing/ /gal te
86a5(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa med na sdug bsngal yod pa yin/ /gang phyir lus ni 'gro dang gnas pa la sogs pa'i/ /sna tshogs rten gyi sdug bsngal dag gi rtsa ba ste/ /de phyir lus med dus ni ye shes nus pa gang/ /de yod lus kyi bu lon yod pa ma
86a6(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /gang las 'gro bas 'dod pa'i ched du bskyed pa yis/ /sdug bsngal chen po du ma rnams la nyer 'gro ste/ /'di las 'dod pa'i srid pas rnam par dben nus shing/ /sdug bsngal chags med nyam thag yod ma yin/ /de phyir
86a7(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang bral ba'i lha rnams na yang ngam/ /'dod pa rnams dang ldan pa'i gzugs ldan rnams na yang/ /skor ba nyid phyir 'jug pa zhi ba ma yin na/ /'dod par spyod pa drug po rnams su sngon nyid do/ /rnam pa da ltar mi rtag sdug
86b1(mdo 'grel): bsngal ba med ci brtag par 'bar ba'i 'jig rten gsum po nyid mthong nas/ /bya cher shing la sgong skyes rnams kyi gdung ba ltar/ /gang du 'jug la smon lam rigs pa ma yin no/ /mchog de rig par bya zhing gzhan ni rig bya min/ /mchog de blo gros yin
86b2(mdo 'grel): zhing gzhan ni blo gros min/ /mchog de bya ba yin zhing gzhan ni grub pa min/ /chos 'di khyim dang ldan pa'i skye bo rnams kyis te/ /yod pa min zhes de ltar nges par rig bya min/ /nags sam khyim na gnas pa dag gi zhi ba ni/ /gang gis sgrub tha yod
86b3(mdo 'grel): pa de yi yod pa'o/ /tshad pas mngon par gdungs pa chu la rnam zhugs te/ /sprin las thams cad tshim pa nye bar 'gro ba nyid/ /sgron ma dang ldan mun pa ru ni mthong ba ste/ /rnal 'byor chad ma'o na tshad ma yin rigs ma yin/ /kha cig nags na gnas kyang
86b4(mdo 'grel): na tshong la mi sbyor/ /brtul zhugs zad cing ngan 'gro la ni bsnyen pa nyid/ /kha cig khyim na gnas kyang rnam dag las can ni/ /bag dang ldan pa des legs pa ni bsnyan pa'o/ /mun pa'i rgya mtsho la ni lta ngan dba' blabs can/ /srid pa'i chu la srog
86b5(mdo 'grel): chags rnam bar 'phyo rnam su/ shes rab gru po dran dang la rtson 'grus skye ba ni/ /gang gis yod pa de ni de la sgrol ba yod/ /de ltar yul la mchog tu song ba'i rgyal po de yis ni/ /thams cad mkhyen las chos kyi de nyid 'dzin nyer thob nas/ /rgyal
86b6(mdo 'grel): srid ngan pa mi rtag g.yo zhes nyer skyes blo can ni/ /myos pa dang bral gnyis 'thung bzhin du mnyan yod nyid du zhugs/ /sa dbang btud pa de ni shes nas mu stegs can gzhan rnams/ /der ni stobs bcu pa la rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gran bcug gyur/ /sa skyong
86b7(mdo 'grel): las ni rnam par gsol las de nas bdag pham pa'i/ /drang srong gis ni rdzu 'phrul ched du sdug pas gnas pa byas/ /de nas gsal zhing 'od zer 'gro ba dang bcas dkyil 'khor can/ /skar ma rnams ni 'bar ba gyur pa'i nyi ma shar ba gzhin/ /yang dag
87a1(mdo 'grel): dga' zhing rnam pa sna tshogs blo can ston pa rnams/ /der ni thub pas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa mang pos pham par mdzad/ /de nas mnyan yod kyis ni de las skyes pa'i grags pa dang/ /bkur sti nges pa mchog gi dpal gyis yongs
87a2(mdo 'grel): su spangs par gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni srid pa gsum las gyen du 'dzegs pa ste/ /de phyir chos dag bsrung bar bzhed cir yum la phan phyir ro/ /de nas thub pa mthe ris gnas pa'i yum ni ye shes kyis/ /rnam par brtul nas mtho ris
87a3(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa la ni rnam phul des/ /mkha' la lha yi rgyal po'i bsod snyoms cho ga bzhin bzhes nas/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag nas sAM ga sar ni yang dag babs/ /de la gzhal med gnam sa'i logs la babs pa yi/ /zhi ba thob cing ltos
87a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang bcas lha rnams rjes su 'ongs/ /sar gnas nam mkha' i logs la gyen du gdong phyogs rgyal po ni/ /de dang de rnams mgo bo rnams kyis btung cing rab tu bzung/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /rgyal
87a5(mdo 'grel): byed kyi tshal rab tu bzhes pa'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// //thar 'dod lha na gnas rnams dang/ /skyed ma mtho ris su btul nas/ /thub pas gdul bya rnams 'dul zhing/ /de nas de ni 'jig rten rgyus/ /ri lnga'i dbus kyi
87a6(mdo 'grel): grong khyer du/ /'od ldan 'tsho byed dbang po dang/ /gro bzhin skyes dang yan lag sbyin/ /rnam par 'dren pas de nas btul/ /rgyal po'i bu ni 'jigs med dang/ /dpal sbas dang ni nye bar 'khor/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs mthar ldan rnams/ /snga ma'i
87a7(mdo 'grel): lta ba las bzlog go /chos kyi thos pa nyid las ni/ /mi skyong dpal ni spangs pa can/ /spos 'dzin gyis ni dbang phyug 'dir/ /pad+ma zhes bya rnam par btul/ de nas gnod sbyin gar ldan dang/ /rtse mo rgyas pa de nas ni/ /rnam rgyas pha rol
87b1(mdo 'grel): gnon pa yis/ /rnam rgyas ri por btul pa'o/ /yon tan gzigs pas mi skyong ni/ /lta byed btsun mo'i 'khor bcas la/ /'tsho byed a mra'i nags tshal du/ /mtshan mo dang par sbyar bar mdzad/ /de nas pha rol 'gro ba can/ /bram ze zhi bar 'gro rnams
87b2(mdo 'grel): des/ /rdo ba'i ri bor pha mo yi/ /tshigs bcad don rnams klog tu bcug /de nas dam pa dran mdzad pas/ /dngos su nor sbyin mthong ba mo/ dga' ba'i skyed ma legs ldan ma/ /'od ma'i tsher ma can du btul/ /de nas brtan ldan grong khyer du/ /rtsegs sbyin
87b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis skyes dam pa ni/ /mchod sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mchod 'dod thar pa'i chos la bcud/ /de nas lus 'phags ri bo ru/ /bcud phyed rtse mo nyid dang ni/ /lha min skyes ma dang lha rnams/ /nges par 'dzin du bcud par gyur/ /de nas
87b4(mdo 'grel): ang+ga'i grang khyer du/ /gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang/ /mchog dang dbyug pa dkar dmar dang/ /gtum po lto 'phye che rnams btul/ /a pa Na yi grong khyer du/ /bram ze ke bya she la dag /dka' thub thob pa thar par sbyar/ /'tshe byed sor mo'i phreng ba
87b5(mdo 'grel): can/ /bran bzangs dang mtshungs gnyis skyes ni/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs kyis/ /phra mo rnams su btul bar mdzad/ /gang ba bzang po dang mtshungs rdzas/ /lug ces bya ba bzang pos 'tsho/ /nor sbyin bzang dang bzang po'i bu/ /bzang por
87b6(mdo 'grel): yang dag rtogs par mdzad/ /de nas tshangs pa'i tshe ldan ming/ /rnam rgyal tshangs pas tshe ldan pa/ /rang gi smra bar smra mchog gis/ /lus 'phags po yi grong du pham/ /yangs pa can gyi rdzing bu ru/ /srin bu sha za dang seng ge /la sogs lits+tsha bi rnams
87b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mchog dang bden byed nyid btul to/ /de nas las bzar pos gnod sbyin/ /bzang po bzang po'i sems ldan pa/ /rgyan byed dang mtshungs grong khyer du/ /chos kyi lam la bcud pa'o/ /de nas blo dang ldan pa yis/ /shin tu mi bzang 'brog tu ni/ /gnod
88a1(mdo 'grel): sbyin 'brog gnas zhes bya dang/ /gzhon nu legs 'ongs la bstan to/ /de nas gnod sbyin sdig med la/ /gnod sbyin bdag pos phyag byas pas/ /bde dga' i grong du thar pa ni/ /thar pa gzigs pas gdams pa
88a2(mdo 'grel): mdzad/ /thub pa dregs pa yangs rnams dang/ /gnod sbyin drag po'i las can dang/ /kha spu ldan pa gnyis la ni/ /g.yar drang srong gis bstan to/ /de nas drang srong dkar min gyi/ /tsha bo ka tyA ya ni na/ /ba ra NA si'i grong du mngon/ /gnyis
88a3(mdo 'grel): skyes stobs bcu ldan pas btul/ /mtsho 'obs bde bar pha rol 'gro'o/ /grong la rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs nas/ /dus su tshong pa sna stod la/ /de nas des ni rjes su bstan/ /rjes su bstan de rab dang bas/ /drang srong mchog gi gtsug lag khang
88a4(mdo 'grel): rtag par dri ldan mkha' la reg/ tsan dan rang bzhin byed tu bcug/ de nas gang du thub pa'i zhabs/ /rdo las 'khor lo'i mtshan mthong bar/ /ser skya dka' thub ldan pa ni/ /'od zer ldan par des btul lo/ /de nas gnod sbyin glang
88a5(mdo 'grel): po la/ /glang po ldan par bstan pa ni/ /de bzhin drag po bong bu ni/ /bcom rlag tu ni btul ba'o/ /yul 'khor skyong dang rdzas mnyam pa/ /yul 'khor skyong zhes dran pa ni/ /drong rdal rags pa'i mdzod ldan du/ /ston pas de nas
88a6(mdo 'grel): rnam par btul/ /tshangs pa dang 'dra skye bo mchog/ dgra can du ni btul ba ste/ /mkhas ba rgya chen skyes bu can/ /nyon mongs dul bar de bzhin no/ /'jigs bcas kyi dad mtshams bzangs kyi/ /bu'i bu mos 'jug bu dag dang/ /mu
88a7(mdo 'grel): stags gzhan rnams kyis mun pa/ /mnyan yod nyid du thub pas bcom/ /'dir ni bram ze mchod sbyin can/ /dge sogs rnams dang rigs gtsang dang/ /ko sha la yi dbang phyug ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi dad pas sbyar/ /de nas bram
88b1(mdo 'grel): ze mkhas pa ni/ /bram ze su ka sA ri la/ /she ta bika'i? 'brog zhi bar/ /bstan pa mchog gis bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'thob pa'i grong khyer du/ /grong khyer gtso dang dus byed dang/ /'jigs pa'i las can chu srin klu/ /rab tu ma zhi zhi bar mdzad/
88b2(mdo 'grel): de nas b+har gas rnams su des/ /gnod sbyin 'jigs byed btul mdzad cing/ /rigs med kyi ni bla ma gnyis/ /rgan po de bzhin rjes su bzung/ /nor ldan gyi mchog dbyangs ldan dang/ /bud med sgur mchog sogs rnams dang/ /skyes chen de
88b3(mdo 'grel): rnams de rnams ni/ /kau shAM bIr ni rjes su bzung/ /de nas spos 'dzin yul nyid dang/ /klu chen sogs ma med pa ni/ /dul ba'i bdag nyid dul ba la/ /nang gi pha rol son pa gshegs/ /'bar zhing 'jigs pa'i las can ni/ /mthar byed
88b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du sreg 'dod pa/ /rnam par btul nas mkhas pa des/ /dus su de nas gdams ngag bstan/ /de la sogs pa'i 'byung po rnams/ /sa la rnams dang mkha' 'gro rnams/ /btul nas tshigs su rgya mtsho bzhin/ /sangs rgyas grags
88b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /che ba'i bdag nyid de mthong nas/ /lhas byin rlom sem byas pa ste/ /bsam gtan rnams las 'khrul thob cing/ /dran pa min pa mang po byas/ /nye bar bcom pa'i sems ldan des/ /thub pa dge 'dun dbyen
88b6(mdo 'grel): byas shing/ /phye las 'dod pa ma byas te/ /de la gnod pa'i phyir brtsams so/ /de nas bya rgod phung po'i rir/ /rngo ba'i 'khrul 'khor byas pa ste/ /thub pa'i steng du gang 'phangs pa/ /ltung ba ma yin gnyis gyur/ /'jig rten dus su chu 'dzin sngon po
88b7(mdo 'grel): sgra sgrogs pa/ /zla ba 'gog pa la ni mkha' la rlung bzhin du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mngon du gdong phyogs par/ /glang po'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i lam la gtad pa'o/ /lus kyis bsnun? pas yan lag mchog ni nyer blangs shing// 
89a1(mdo 'grel): mche bas phug ? pas sgyu ma'i dra ba rab bkram pa'i/ /lus po rnams kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi lam rnams ni/ /rgyu bar dka' bar byed par byed la mngon par rab tu zhugs/ /sha ni 'dod pas mi yi brla la dmugs pa ste/ /mche
89a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtse mo reg cing g.yo ba'i rgyu ma'i phreng/ /khrag gis gsher ba'i mgo bo sna ljags drag po yis/ /'ben? pa'i don du rdo rnams bzhin du gyen du 'phen/ /gsum du rab dga' i chang gis mthor ma'i dri ldan zhing/ /rul ba'i khrag dang zhag gi dri yis
89a3(mdo 'grel): bsgos rnams kyis/ /de tshe bskor zhing mdza' med khro ba dang ldan pa/ /grong khyer skye bo de la skyo bas 'jigs par byed/ /gnyis 'thung myos pa dus kyi dbyug pa 'jigs 'dra ba/ /khengs las gdong? ni bcos shing sgra skang 'thon pa ste/ /khros
89a4(mdo 'grel): pas rnam par log pa'i mig can de mthong nas/ /ha ha zhes ba rgyal po'i khab nas byung bar gyur/ /kha cig yid mi bde bas phyogs su bros pa ste/ /gzhan ni mthong ba min pa'i yul rnams la thim zhing/ /de bzhin 'jigs pa las gzhan 'jigs
89a5(mdo 'grel): pa ma gzung nas/ /gzhan rnams gzhan rnams dag gi khyim rnams la zhugs so/ /kha cig rnams par 'dug pa'i seng ge'i sgra rnams ni/ /rang gi srog la the tshom yang dag ma bsams shing/ /sangs rgyas la ni mngon par 'tshe ba ma byed ces//
89a6(mdo 'grel): rab tu bzung nas gnyis 'thung de la rgyab nas 'bod/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams glang po skyod? la 'bod pa ste/ /gzhan rnams 'di la thal mo dag gis phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de la gzhan rnams de la bsdigs par byed pa ste/ /kha cig nor gyi sred cing
89a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod par byed ba'o/ /rlung 'gros skar khung dag nas rnam par lta bzhin du/ /lang tsho ma rnams lag pa g.yo zhing du ba ste/ /'jigs ma gzhan rnams gser gyi gdu bu dag dang ldan pa yis/ /zangs mdog lag pa rnams kyis mig rnams 'gebs
89b1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /yongs su ro myang glang pos 'joms par 'dod pa na/ /gyen du lag bteg skye bo du bar gyur na yang/ /gshegs pa 'byed pa med cing gnod pa mi mnga' bar/ /bde bar gshegs pa dang gnas rnam 'gyur med par gshegs/ /byams pas
89b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung po rnams la rjes su brtse ba ni/ /gus pas lha rnams kyis ni rjes su 'gro ba ste/ /de la dbang po ches kyang reg pa ru?/ /nus pa ma yin gang phyir thub pa brtan par gshegs/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas la ni rjes 'gro dge slong ste/ /des ni rgyad nas glang chen
89b3(mdo 'grel): mthong nas bros ba ste/ /sna tshogs bdag nyid 'jig rten rang nyid kyis bzhin du/ /kun dga' po gcig sangs rgyas la ni rjes su song/ /de nas glang chen khros pa de ni nyer 'ongs nas/ /thub pa'i mthu las 'du shes nye bar thob pa ste/ /mig sman ri bo no rjes
89b4(mdo 'grel): phye mar bcom pa bzhin/ /lus po rab tu zags shing spyi bos 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /de la shin tu mdzes shing 'dam skyes 'jam po yis/ /legs skyes sor mo'i dra ba'i phyag gis mgo bo la/ /zla ba chu 'dzin la ni 'od zer gyis gzhin du/ /gnyis 'thung
89b5(mdo 'grel): dbang po la ni thub pas reg par gyur/ /chu yi shin tu khur las dus kyi sprin bzhin du/ /zhabs kyi rtsa bar gnyis 'thung de ni bsdad? pa ste/ /thub pas rna ba'i ta la g.yo med la gzigs shing/ /de la sems can la 'os zhi bas bstan pa'o/ /sdig
89b6(mdo 'grel): med dang bcas rnam par 'joms pa sdug bsngal te/ /sdig mang nyid la glang chen gnod pa ma byed cig/ srid ba srid par sdig med bcom pa'i srog chags kyis/ /bde 'gro brgyad la glang chen 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang de
89b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin gti mug ste/ /glang chen gsum po bzod par dka' ba'i chang yin la/ /chang gsum rnams dang thub pa rnams ni bral ba ste/ /rims nad med cing mya ngan 'das pa mngon par bsnyes/ /de phyir mun par 'dod pa 'di ni spong 'dod pa/ /chang ni spong
90a1(mdo 'grel): la rang bzhin 'du shes thob par gyis/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam ni rgyas par chags pa ste/ /slar yang de ltar gnyis thung dbang po ma ltung zhig/ /de nas glang po des ni gsung 'di thos nas su/ /chang ni spangs
90a2(mdo 'grel): shing yang dag rig par song ba ste/ /bdud rtsi 'thungs nas nad rnams dag las grol ba bzhin/ /nang du song ba'i bde ba dam pa thob par gyur/ /slo ma bzhin du thub la rab btung de ma thag/ chang ni yongs spangs glang po'i dbang po de mthong nas//
90a3(mdo 'grel): kha cig gos rnams bskor zhing g.yug par gyur ba des/ /gzhan rnams lag pa rnams ni rdebs shing de 'don to/ /gzhan rnams kyis ni thub pa phyag 'tshal zhing/ /de nas de la gzhan rnams bskor ba byas pa ste/ /gzhan rnams 'phags pa
90a4(mdo 'grel): nyid las glang chen la bstod cing/ /ya mtshan dang bcas gzhan rnams rig par gyur pa'o/ /lding khang la gnas bud med gzhan rnams de la ni/ /gtsang zhing rin thang chen po'i gos rnams kyis mchod cing/ /gzhan rnams gsar pa'i phreng ba yon
90a5(mdo 'grel): tan yid 'ong dang/ /rgyan ni de dang de dag rnams kyis mngon par 'thor/ /dus dang mtshungs pa'i glang po dul bar gnas pa na/ /skye bo dad pa med pa dbus nas song ba ste/ /dbus nas khyad par las ni dang bar rab song zhing/ /dad? pa rnams kyang
90a6(mdo 'grel): gang de brtan par nye bar song/ /dad pa la gnas ma skyes dgra ni thub pa yi/ /glang chen dbang po de ni btul ba mthong nas ni/ /ya mtshan gyur cing de nas dga' ba skyes pa ste/ /sangs rgyas la ni mchog tu dad pa byas pa'o/ /nyon mongs rtsod ldan dus
90a7(mdo 'grel): ni nges par log pa na/ /rdzogs ldan dus ni 'ongs nas slar yang chos don bzhin/ /de ltar rdzu 'phrul dang ldan snyan grags mchog rnams kyis/ rab tu gnas pa'i dkal ldan thub pa mchog 'phel to/ /mi dge ba dang yongs su ldan pa'i lhas byin
90b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /nyon mongs sdig pa'i las ni mang po byas nas ni/ /mi skyod sten rgu ba gnyis skyes drang srong gi/ dmod pa las bzhin pa yi 'og tu phying bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ las kyi rgyun gyi le'u ste nyi
90b2(mdo 'grel): shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas 'jig rten rjes bzung nas/ /dus kyis smra ba rnams kyi mchog/ chos kyis ni khyab mdzad nas/ /mya ngan 'da' ba dang mtshungs dgongs/ /de nas dus su rgyal khab nas/ /pha? TA li yi grong du gshegs/ mchod?
90b3(mdo 'grel): rten pA Ta li mtshon pa/ /der ni 'phags pa de bzhugs so/ /dus ni de tshe grong khyer gyi/ /lits+tsha wi ni zhi ba'i phyir/ /ma ga d+ha yi rgyal po yi/ /blon po char dbyibs kyis byas so/ /lha rnams kyis der rang gi nor/ /nye bar len pa rab gzigs nas/ /grong
90b4(mdo 'grel): de 'gro na phul byung du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gsungs/ /de tshe char ba'i rnam pa yi/ /bkur byas byed pa rnams kyi mchog/ rgya mtsho'i chung ma gtse mo la/ /mngon phyogs slob ma dang bcas gshegs/ /gang+gA'i 'gram du de gshegs nas/ /ji ltar
90b5(mdo 'grel): rnyed gru de dang nges?/ /skye bo rnams ni sgrol ba gzigs/ /de rnams gzigs nas thugs mdzad do/ /'bad pas chu bo sgrol ba la/ /bdag gi de ltar 'dra ma yin/ /de phyir rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni/ /bdag gi gru med rab tu 'gro/ de ltar der ni slob mar bcas
90b6(mdo 'grel): lha yi rnams la mi snang zhing/ /rlung gi 'gros kyang phan mdzad nas/ /skad cig gis ni pha rol 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal mtsho yis pha rol sngon/ /ye shes gru pos de mkhyen nas/ /slar yang gru 'di ma dmigs nas/ /thub pas gang+gA bsgral ba'o/ /bcom
90b7(mdo 'grel): ldan nyi ma mdzes pa ni/ /gang gi sgo las nges 'byung pa/ /de ni de tshe gau tam sgor/ /de la mchod don nyid du byas/ /'gram gang dag las rnam 'dren pa/ /gang+gA'i pha rol tu gshegs pa/ /de ni stegs su 'gro la grags/ /de yi rigs kyi mngon par brjod//
91a1(mdo 'grel): de nas sgrol 'dod mi rnams dang/ /rgal ba rnams dang sgrol ba rnams/ ya mtshan rnams rgyas gdang rnams kyi/ /mig rnams de la ltung par gyur/ /de nas gang+gA'i 'gram nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun di'i? grong du gshegs//
91a2(mdo 'grel): der ni chos bstan gtam mdzad nas/ /nA dA'i kar ni mngon par gshegs/ /dus ni de tshe de na ni/ /skye bo chen po chung pa ste/ /gang gi gang du gang 'gro ba/ /de rnams la der thub pas gsungs/ /der ni mtshan mo gcig phul bas/ /yangs ba can
91a3(mdo 'grel): gyi grong du gshegs/ /de nas a mra skyod ma'i sa/ /dpal ldan tshal du dpal sdug gshegs/ /a mra skyong ma re ma'i gtso/ /rnam par 'dren pa der thos nas/ /rnam dul theg pa la gnas nas/ /mchog tu dga' bas rab tu song/ /phra ba'i gos
91a4(mdo 'grel): dkar 'dzin pa mo/ /phreng ba med cing byug bral ma/ /lha yi bya ba'i dus su ni/ /lags pa rigs kyi mna' ma 'dra/ /rang gi gzugs kyis khengs pa yi/ /dam pa lits+tsha wi rnams kyi/ /sems rnams dang ni nor rnams dang/ /yon tan mdza' 
91a5(mdo 'grel): dag rnams kyi phrogs/ /dpal dang mdzes pa brten pa yis/ /nags kyi lha mo'i gzugs 'dra ba/ /de ni theg pa la babs nas/ /skyen par nags der rab tu zhugs/ /rigs kyi mo btsun gdung ba mo/ /mig rab g.yo ba de gzigs nas/ /bde
91a6(mdo 'grel): par gshegs pas rnga dbyangs kyis/ /dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /stobs chung rnams kyis yid kyi rims/ /a mra skyong ma 'di sngon 'ongs/ /dran ldan bdud rtsi'i sems ldan rnams/ /ye shes kyis ni khyed rnams gnas/ /nye sar sbrul
91a7(mdo 'grel): ni mchog yin zhing/ /ral gri gdongs pa'i dgra bo mchog /dran dang ye shes rnam bral ba'i/ /nye sar bud med rnams ma yin/ /bsdad pa 'am ni nyal pa 'am/ /'gro ba 'am yang na gnas pa 'am/ /bud med ri mor bris pas kyang/ /mi rnams
91b1(mdo 'grel): kyi ni yin 'phrog go /'di rnams zhen pas nyam thag gam/ /gyen du lag bteg du na yang/ /skra ba gram rnams kyi bsreg pa ru/ /nus na mo btsun rnams sngon nyid/ /pha rol po 'bral rnam mang po'i/ /dbrog bya yon tan gyis bslus rnams/ /de yi rang
91b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin ma mthong ste/ /bud med rnams la byis rnams rmongs/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang/ /mi dge ba zhes mthong nas ni/ /lta zhing bsgom pa pa rnams kyi/ /sems ni zil gyis non ma yin/ /gnas de rnams su legs goms blo/ /spyod yul rnams su
91b3(mdo 'grel): ba lang bzhin/ /lha yi yul rnams kyis 'joms par/ /nus mi rnams kyi ci zhig smongs/ /de phyir shes rab mda''dzin zhing/ /brtson 'grus gzhu ni lag pa na/ /dran pa'i go cha yongs bgos shing/ /yul gyi 'du shes can du mnos/ /lcags kyi thur ma
91b4(mdo 'grel): tsha mo yis/ /mig la reg pa mchog yin zhing/ /g.yo ba'i mig?  can bud med la/ /ma rungs dran pas lta phyir min/ /gal te dus ni de yi tshe/ /chags pa'i sems kyi dus byed na/ /dud 'gro 'am ni 'og nyid du/ /dbang med bcings nas 'khrid par
91b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ de phyir 'jigs pa 'di shes nas/ /mtshan mar spongs pa mi bya zhing/ /lus po la ni gzugs tsam du/ /gang gis mthong ba de mthong ngo/ /dbang pos 'jig rten na yul rnams/ /'chi med dbang po rnams des min/ /gang zhig de rnams
91b6(mdo 'grel): la chags gyur/ /de ni de rnams las 'chid do/ /ba lang gnyis kyi sbyor ba'i phyir/ /sgyor ba la gcig ji ltar 'gyur/ /yul dang dbang po de dag ni/ /chags pa phan tshun de ltar min/ /mig gis gzugs ni 'dzin pa ste/ /sems kyis rnam par rtog
91b7(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /rnam par rtog las der skye zhing/ /chags dang chags bral nyid kyang ngo/ /rnam bar ma brtags dbang po'i don?/ gal te don med cher gyur na/ /dbang po'i spyod yul la spyod pa/ /thams cad don med kyis sbyor to/ /de phyir ma dor dran pas dang/ /ba g.yang
92a1(mdo 'grel): mchog tu 'gro bas dang/ /rang don rjes su mthong bas dang/ /gdung med sems kyis bsgom par bya/ /de ltar don mthar ma gyur pa'i/ /dge slong rnams de rjes bstan/ /ltos byas a ma skyong ma ni/ /thal mo sbyar byas nye
92a2(mdo 'grel): bar 'ongs/ /des ni thugs zhi drang srong ma/ /shing drung gnas pa mthong nas ni/ /nags kyi yongs su longs spyod kyis/ /mchog tu rjes su 'dzin pa snyam/ /de nas bkur ti mang po las/ /g.yo yang lta byed rab bkod nas/ /me tog tsam pa ka rgyas
92a3(mdo 'grel): ltar mgo bos thub pa la phyag 'tshal/ /kun mkhyen gyis kyang rjes gnas ma/ /de nas sa la bsdad pa ste/ /de yis blo la bzod gsung gis/ /thub pas de la bka' stsal to/ /bsam pa 'di ni yon tan ldan/ /rnam dag sems pa nyid bstan te//
92a4(mdo 'grel): bud med byis pa phul gnas pa/ /chos la 'dod pa rnyed par dka' / /gal te chos kyi bdag nyid gyur/ /zhen pas bcom pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /na rab mi? mo rnams kyis dang/ /blo ldan mi rnams kyi mtshar ci/ /rang bzhin gyis ni blo chung zhing//
92a5(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba'i sems ldan lang tsho ma/ /yul gcig ro yis 'jig rten na/ /chos shes shes pa ya mtshan no/ /khyod kyi chos la yid gyur pa/ /de ni khyod kyi bdag nyid don/ /mi rtag gson pa'i 'jig rten na/ /chos las gzhan na nor yod min/ /nad kyi nad
92a6(mdo 'grel): med 'joms pa ste/ /rga bas lang tsho gcod pa nyid/ /'chi bas srog ni len pa ste/ /chos kyis rgud pa yod ma yin/ /gang phyir dga' ba rnams dang bral/ /mi dga' ba rnams dang sbyor zhing/ /mngon par 'dod pa thob pa na/ /de phyir chos ni mchog
92a7(mdo 'grel): tu 'gro/ /gzhan dbang sdug bsngal chen po ste/ /rang dbang mchog tu bde ba nyid/ /ma nu'i rigs su skyes na yang/ /bud med thams cad gzhan dbang ngo/ /gang phyir gzhan dbang nyid phyir dang/ /de bzhin phru gu 'dzin pa'i phyir/ /bud med rnams kyi
