92b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal lhag /de phyir yang dag nges par 'os/ /de ltar thub pa chen po'i gsung/ rang bzhin gyis dang mkhas las dang/ /brtan las byis kyang byis min bzhin/ /thos shing mngon par dga' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi smra ba yis/ /'dod
92b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid can gyi sems la brabs pa ni/ /bud med nyid ni smrad cing yul las log pa ste/ /rang gi skye bo'i rten la brtsog par byas pa'o/ /je nas me tog khur las tsu ta'i mchod sdong bzhin/ /yang dag kun nas dud pa'i lus kyi mchod sdong
92b3(mdo 'grel): can/ /thub pa chen po la ni gus pas mig zhugs shing/ /yang yang chos ni rnam par dag pa'i lta bas gnas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni ngo tsha dang ldan bud med de/ /chos ni mngon par 'dod pas yang yang bskul ba ni/ /'dam skyes mdzod dang
92b4(mdo 'grel): 'dra bas thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /dal bud smra pa'i skad kyi gdangs kyi gsol ba'o/ /bcom ldan don mdzad bdag la rjes su gsung don du/ /nad par bsod snyoms dus su dge slong sder bcas pa/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i mdzad pa 'jig rten na//
92b5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bur 'gyur ba'i bdag la 'bras bur mdzad du gsol/ /de nas de yi gus pa de ltar gzigs nas dang/ /sems can rnams ni bza' ba'i dbang nyid mkhyen nas ni/ /gsung ma phye nas bde bar gshegs pas de ltar zhes/ /de la nges par
92b6(mdo 'grel): rnam 'gyur brda yis mdzad pa'o/ /skad cig mdzad pa dang ldan spyan yang mchog gi chos mnga' zhing/ /chos kyi snod la des ni dga' zhing mgu la rangs pa ste/ /gus pas rnyed pa mchog ni rnam par nges shing bstod par gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi
92b7(mdo 'grel): spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /a mra skyong ma'i nags gzigs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas thub pa'i thugs rig nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas kyang grong du song/ /de ni lots+tsha bas
93a1(mdo 'grel): thos nas/ /lta 'dod sangs rgyas la song ngo/ /dkar po'i rta dang shing rta gdugs/ /phreng ba rgyan dang bgo ba rnams/ /kha cig kha cig de rnams dang/ /dmar ser rnams dang de bzhin gzhan/ /kha cig baiDUrya ljang dang/ /gzhan
93a2(mdo 'grel): rnams rma bya'i mjug ma ste/ /de ltar cha lugs rgya chen po/ /bdag gi dga' byed rnams dang song/ /ri bo rnams rgyas ro stong can/ /gser gyi gnya' shing lag pa rnams/ /dpal ldan bong ring dngos su ni/ /de rnams mtho ris bzhin du mdzes//
93a3(mdo 'grel): mchams sprin rkang la sna tshogs rnams/ /glog ni rab tu snang ba bzhin/ /shing rta rnams las babs 'dod pas/ /de rnams gnas pa rnam par mdzes/ /dbu rgyan rnam g.yo rnam btud pa'i/ /brtan rnams thub la phyag 'tshal nas/ /nga rgyal
93a4(mdo 'grel): ldan rnams rgyags med bzhin/ /chos la dga' bas de rnams gnas/ /nyi ma sprin dang bral ba yis/ /logs su khyer 'jigs bzhu bzhin du/ /thub pa'i drung der de rnams kyi/ /chags bral dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o/ /sa la seng ge gnas
93a5(mdo 'grel): pa rnams/ /gser gyis spras pa'i seng ge'i gdan/ /seng ge la sogs de rnams la/ /mi yi seng ges de nas gsungs/ /gzugs dang dpal dang stobs la sogs/ /bkur mang rnams dang ldan pa ni/ /khyed kyi chos la gus 'dir gang/ /de las
93a6(mdo 'grel): lhag par mdzes pa nyid/ /tshul khrims la sogs yon tan gyis/ /ji ltar 'jig rten mdzes de ltar/ /lus ni sna tshogs gos sam rgyan/ /phreng ba rnams kyi ma yin no/ /gang du khyed cag bdag po rnams/ /chos shes 'dul ba 'dod ba rnams//
93a7(mdo 'grel): spong byed pa rnams rjes bzung zhing/ /skal ba bcas rnams bdag gi lugs/ /'phags kye rnyed bar dka' dus su/ /chos la gnas rnams srung byad gyur/ /phyis 'byung ma yin yul rnams kyi/ /skal bas dman pa rnams kyi min/ /dpal ldan
93b1(mdo 'grel): skal ba chen po rnams/ /chos shas srung bar byed rnams kyi/ /bsrung pa nyid kyi yul 'di ni/ /chos kyis kyang ni rjes su 'dzin/ /klung rnams rgal 'dod pa la rnams/ /khyu mchog rgyal ba rnams kyi bzhin/ /rgyal po rnams kyis gang bzung ba'i/ /yul la de nas skye
93b2(mdo 'grel): dgu 'gro/ /khyed cag rnams la tshul khrims de/ /rtag par 'gyur bar 'os pa ste/ /bdag gi don ni 'dod rnams kyi/ /'dir dang song? nas dbrog bya min/ /yid ni tshim zhing bkur mang dang/ /rnyed dang grang pa yid ches nyid/ /dga' ba nyid dang song nas bde/ /tshul
93b3(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi ni 'bras bu che/ /'byung po rgyu dang mi rgyu yi// rten ni ji ltar sa yin pa/ /de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi/ rten ni tshul khrims dam pa'o/ /'phrur 'dod gshog pa med pa dang/ /rgal 'dod gru med ji lta bar/ /mi ni tshul khrims rnam spangs bar/
93b4(mdo 'grel): dge legs 'dod pa de ltar shes/ /me tog 'bras bus khyab pa'i shing/ /tshor ma can gyur ji lta bar/ /thos dang gzugs don phun tshogs pa/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa de ltar re/ /sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan zhing/ /khang bzang rnams su gnas na
93b5(mdo 'grel): yang/ /tshul khrims dang ldan skye bo gang/ /de yi drang srong dang mnyam 'gros/ /ngur smrig shing shun zur phud dang/ /gtsug phud spyi bo ral pa rnams/ /tshul khrims nyams pa kun rnams kyi/ /bcos pa nyid du shes bar bya/ /stegs las dus gsum
93b6(mdo 'grel): khrus byas nas/ /ma la lan gnyis bsregs nas dang/ /gdung ba drag por gdungs nas kyang/ /tshul khrims med na bdag ma yin/ /sha za rnams la lus byin nas/ /ri yi legs nas bor nas sam/ /me 'am chur ni bdag mchongs na/ /tshul
93b7(mdo 'grel): khrims med na bdag ma yin/ /'bras bu rtsa ba chung za zhing/ /ri dags bzhin du rtswa za 'am/ /rlung gi bza' ba 'dod pa yang/ /tshul khrims med na dag mi 'gyur/ /mi gang tshul khrims kyis dman pa/ /de na bya dang ri dags mtshungs/ /rdol ba'i snod
94a1(mdo 'grel): ni chu yi bzhin/ /de ni chos kyi snod ma yin/ /'jigs pa dang ni gtam ngan dang/ /yid mi ches pa mi dga' i nyid/ /mngon sum 'dir ni thob pa ste/ /seng nas don med za bar 'gyur/ /de phyir tshul khrims gzhom mi bya
94a2(mdo 'grel): 'brog dgon dag ni lam mkhan bzhin/ /rang dbang dag ni rnyed dka' ba'i/ /tshul khrims mtho ris dag na gru/ /skyon rnams kyis bcom sems kyis ni/ /thams cad bcom nas 'jug pa ste/ /tshul khrims rab tu gnas byas nas/ /nyon
94a3(mdo 'grel): mongs 'joms la dad pa gyis/ de phyir dang por nga snyam pa/ /brgyan par 'dod pas spang bar bya/ /bsreg bya za ba'i du ba bzhin/ /yon tan rnams kyi nga snyom nyid/ /skar ma nyi ma zla ba rnams/ /sprin gyi dra ba chen pos bzhin/ /nga rgyal gyis
94a4(mdo 'grel): bcom yon tan rnams/ /yod par gyur kyang mjes ma yin/ /dregs pa ngo tsha 'joms pa ste/ /mya ngan gyis gtan dga' bas lus/ /yon tan rnams kyi rtsa ba nas/ /'joms phyir nga'o snyam pa skye/ /'gran pa dang ldan nga rgyal las/ /lha min
94a5(mdo 'grel): lha rnams kyis bcom zhing/ /mi skyong tA la'i byin pa dang/ /dong gsum pa rnams zad par gyur/ /gang zhig mi rtag dngos rnams su/ /mchog ni ma yin snyam pa dang/ /mi dman pa ni nga zhes snyam/ /de ni mkhas pa min par rtogs/ /gzugs
94a6(mdo 'grel): ni brtan pa ma yin zhing/ /'jig pa'i chos can g.yo ba yis/ /nga zhes gang zhig nga rgyal te/ /yongs su rtog pa min gzhan ci/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags stobs ldan pa/ /rab gab lhan skyes dgra bo ste/ /bshes min ngan na spyod pa bzhin//
94a7(mdo 'grel): gang gis bshes kyi sgo nas 'joms/ /'dod chags med dang me nyid ni/ /sreg pa'i bdag nyid kyis mnyam ste/ /'dod chags me ni 'bar ba na/ /mtshan mo de nyid ring bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags me'i stobs ji 'dra ba/ /me yi 'obs
94b1(mdo 'grel): ni de 'drar smin/ /me ni chu rnams kyis shes te/ /'dod chags me ni mtshos kyang min/ /dus su nags su mes tshig rnams/ /nags kyi shing rnams skye ba ste/ /'dod chags mes tshig blo me rnams/ /chos la skye ba ma yin no/ /chags las bde ba tshol
94b2(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ /bde phyir mi dge ba byed cing/ /mi dge ba las dmyal bar 'gro/ /chags pa dang mnyam dgra po med/ /chags las sred pa skye ba ste/ /sred las 'dod pa rnams la chags/ /'dod pa rnams las sdug bsngal 'thob/ /chags pa dang mnyam
94b3(mdo 'grel): yul med do/ /chags pa zhes bya'i nad chen po/ /de ni byis pas rtogs ma yin/ /mi rtag nyid las mi gtsang las/ /sdug bsngal nyid las bdag med las/ /gal te mthong nas mi chags te/ /log pa'i blo yis chags pa'o/ /de phyir
94b4(mdo 'grel): dngos po la chags pa/ /gang du nye bar skye ba na/ /der ni ji ltar 'gyur brtag ste/ /gyur pa mthong ba zhes brjod do/ /yon tan yongs su rtog pa na/ /ji ltar chags par nyer bar 'gro/ /yon tan med na yongs rtog na/ /de bzhin khro ba 'gugs par byed/ /
94b5(mdo 'grel): de phyir khro ba spong 'dod pas/ /zhe sdang yongs su brtag mi bya/ /dkar min 'gros las du ba bzhin/ /khro ba las ni zhe sdang 'dzag/ /khro ba gzugs ldan rnams kyi rga /mig ldan rnams kyi mun pa yang/ /chos don 'dod pa rnams kyi bshed/ /thos
94b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i mi mthun pa nyid do/ /khro ba blo yi mun pa mchog /mdza' bshes gyur pa'i dgra bo mchog /bkur sti mang po'i gcod pa po/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i byed pa po/ /de bzhin khro ba mi bya zhing/ /byas nas kyang ni dor bar bya/ /dmug pa'i rang bzhin
94b7(mdo 'grel): lto phye bzhin/ /khro ba'i rjes su 'jug mi bya/ /skor ba'i shing rta bzhin gang gis/ /khro ba brtan pas thag pas bzung/ /de bdag kha lo sgyur snyam ste/ /cig shes skye bo thag pa 'dzin/ /gang zhig khro ba 'dod pa ste/ /skye ba 'gog par 'dir ma yin/ /phyis de khro ba
95a1(mdo 'grel): med pa na/ /me la reg pa bzhin du bsreg /khro ba skyes pas sngon rol du/ /bdag nyid kyi ni sems sreg ste/ /rnam par 'phel zhing phyi nas ni/ /gzhan gyi sreg nas mi sreg gam/ /nad sogs nye bar 'tshe rnams kyis/ /
95a2(mdo 'grel): gang tshe 'jig rten btser ba na/ /lus can bshes ma yin rnams la/ /gnod sems byas nas yon tan ci/ /de phyir 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba/ /shes nas khro ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /'byung po kun la byams pa dang/ /snying rje nyid ni bsgom
95a3(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /de ltar nyon mongs lhag pa gang/ /de yi de tshe gzigs pa ste/ /de la brtse bas sangs rgyas kyis/ /de rnams la gsungs smad pa'o/ /sems can nyam thag rnams la ni/ /ji ltar rang bzhin gyis mkhas pa'i/ /sman pas sman
95a4(mdo 'grel): ni gsungs pa ste/ /nad rnams nye bar zhi phyir ro/ /de bzhin chags dang rga sogs kyi/ /nad kyis 'byung po nyam thag la/ /thub las bsam pa mkhyen nas ni/ /de nyid shes pa'i sman byin to/ /de ltar thub ba'i gsungs la ni/ lits+tsha bi rnams
95a5(mdo 'grel): mngon dga' ste/ /rab 'phyad gtsug gi nor bu can/ /mgo bo rnams kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas thal mo rnam sbyar nas/ /cung zhig dud pa'i lus rnams kyis/ /phung bu la ni lha rnams bzhin/ /sangs rgyas la ni byon par zhus/ /dang po
95a6(mdo 'grel): a mra skyong ma'i rigs/ /thub pas de rnams la gsungs shing/ /dam pa rnams kyi thog mar ni/ /snyan mnan 'dor bya min par gsungs/ /de rnams bud med de yis ni/ /bdag la bslus par shes ba ste/ /de bzhin gshegs la
95a7(mdo 'grel): mchod mang po/ /nyid 'gyur nyid du byas pa'o/ /legs brjod drang srong sngags rnams kyis/ /sprul rnams kyi ni dug bzhin du/ /kun mkhyen gyis bsten de rnams ci/ /rab tu zhi ba'i yid rnams song/ /de yi mtshan mo 'das nas ni/ /a
95b1(mdo 'grel): mra skyong mas bkur byas te/ /'o ma ldan ba'i grong du ni/ /dbyar rnams rnam par 'das pa na/ /yangs pa can nyid du gshegs shing/ /spre'u rdzing gi 'gram du ni/ thub la chen po bzhugs pa'o/ /shing gi rtsa bar de bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du ni 'bar ba
95b2(mdo 'grel): la/ /nags tshal de ni snang byas shing/ /nye bar 'ongs nas 'dud kyis smras/ /nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du sngon/ /thub pa khyod la bdag gis smras/ /bya ba byas pa mya ngan zlos/ /zhes 'dir khyod kyis lan smras so/ /nyam thag pa rnams 'jigs med cing/ /nyon
95b3(mdo 'grel): mongs rnams ni don byas par/ /bdag gis ji srid ma gyur bar/ /de srid mya ngan mi 'da' zhes/ /de 'di mang po rnam grol zhing/ /de bzhin grol bar 'dod rnams dang/ /grol bar 'gyur ba rnams nyid de/ /de phyir mya ngan 'da' bar 'os/ /de nas tshig
95b4(mdo 'grel): 'di gsan gyur nas/ /zla ba gsum na mya ngan 'da' / /mi brtan pa ni dor cig ces/ /dgra bcom rnams kyi mchog gi gsung/ /de nas dam bca' 'di shes nas/ /yid la re ba gang ba ste/ /rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba ni/ /de nyid du ni mi snang gyur/ /de nas drang
95b5(mdo 'grel): srong chen po'i thugs kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /rnam pa de ltar rnal 'byor stobs las mdzad pa nyid/ /sku tshe ji ltar gyur ba sngon du btang ba ste/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu las mtshungs pa med pa 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /des ni sku tshe btang ba'i yud tsam de la ni/ /bud
95b6(mdo 'grel): med? myos pa bzhin du sa ni g.yos gyur la/ /me yis tshos pa'i lhun po'i rdo ba rim bzhin du/ /phyogs rnams dag las sgron ma chen po rnams lhung ngo/ /de bzhin kun nas dbang po'i rdo rje mi zad rnams/ /glog dang bcas shing me yis snying po can
95b7(mdo 'grel): g.yos shing/ /bskal pa 'jig che 'jig rten bsreg par 'dod pa bzhin/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rnams su me dag 'bar bar gyur/ /shing rnams kyi ni phung po 'khogs pa rnams bor zhing/ /ri rnams kyis ni rtse mo rnams ni dor ba ste//
96a1(mdo 'grel): rlung gis mngon par gang ba'i rdo ba'i phug bzhin du/ /mkha' la rda rnams kyi ni ma rungs sgra rnams bsgrags/ /de nas de ltar kun tu bskyod tshe yang tsam la/ /mi yi 'jig rten na dang lha dang nam mkha' la/ /ting
96a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin chen po de las rnam par bzhengs mdzad nas/ /thub pa chen pos gsung ni 'di nyid gsungs pa'o/ /shing rta srog shing rnam par nyams pa dang 'dra ba'i/ che btang lus po nang gi stobs las 'dren bgyi zhing/ /sgo nga'i skye gnas pa
96a3(mdo 'grel): rnams sgo nga phye nas bzhin/ /srid pa'i 'ching las tshe dang lhan cig 'grol bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /sku tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //
96a4(mdo 'grel): de nas bskyod pa de mthong nas/ /kun dga' bo ni spu langs shing/ /ci zhig gyur zhes shugs 'ongs te/ /'dar bar gyur cing dga' ma gyur/ /kun mkhyen gtan tshigs mkhas pa la/ /des der gtan tshigs dris pa ste/ /de nas de la thub pas
96a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /khyu mchog mos pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs/ /rgyu mtshan gang gis g.yos pa 'di/ /bdag gi tshe 'di btang ba la/ /zla ba gsum ni yongs bgrangs par/ /byin gyis brlabs nas da ni 'tshe/ /de ltar thos nas kun dga' bo/ /tsan
96a6(mdo 'grel): dan ljon? pa'i thang chu ni/ /glang po che yis brabs pa bzhin/ /mchi ma phyung zhing g.yos par gyur/ /des gnyen nyid phyir bla ma'i phyir/ /chags bral min phyir sdug bsngal zhing/ /snying rje rab ni rnam blog ste/ /yongs su dga' ba med par dus
96a7(mdo 'grel): mgon gyi nges pa thos gyur nas/ /bdag gi lus ni ltung ba bzhin/ /bdag gi phyogs rnams sbobs pa med/ /bdag gi chos rnams thos pa rmongs/ /gangs kyis btser rnams lam me bzhin/ /rga ba rnyings pa'i gos rnams su/ /kyi hud mis
96b1(mdo 'grel): bsngags skyon par ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'da' / /nyon mongs 'brog dgon chen po ru/ /chud zos lus dang ldan rnams la/ /lam mkhyen shin tu skyen pa ru/ /lam mkhan nges par nyams par 'gyur/ /thag rings lam la rab zhugs
96b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /sred pa yongs ldan bdag rnams kyi/ /lam ni rdzing bu bsil ba'i chu/ /shin tu myur bar skam par 'gyur/ /blo ni rdzing ma zhi ba bzhin/ /'das dang ma 'das da ltar gzigs/ /ye shes rnam spangs 'jig rten gyi/ /mig ni nges par zum par
96b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /ngas bar lo tog skyes rnams su/ /chu ni don gnyer ngal rnams la/ /char phab gyur nas skyen pa ru/ /chu sbyin sprin ni nub par 'gyur/ /mi shes mun pas phrogs rnams su/ /sems can lam gol ba la rnams/ /rab tu gas pa'i sgron ma
96b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /shin tu skyen par zhi bar 'gyur/ /de nas de ltar mya ngan gyis/ /sems gzir kun dga' bo gzigs nas/ /zhi byed mgon pos de nyid ni/ /de nyid rig pa'i mchog gi gsungs/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin shes nas ni/ /mya ngan ma byed kun dga' 
96b5(mdo 'grel): bo/ /'dus byas ngo bo mi rtag cing/ /'gro ba 'di kun mdzad pa nyid/ /lus can brtsod pa'i skyed tshul du/ /sdug pa kun dang 'bral ba ste/ /brtse ba kun nas thong zhig ces/ /sngon du bdag gis smras pa nyid/ /'du byas g.yo ba skyes pa gang/ /rten
96b6(mdo 'grel): nas 'byung ba dbang med de/ /bdag gis rtag bar gyur cig ces/ /'di ni rnyed par mi nus so/ /sa steng 'byung po rtag gyur na/ l/'jug pa g.yo ba ma yin zhing/ /thar pas bya ba su yis 'gyur/ /de phyir mthar thug gdong pa'o/ /ci ste khyod dam
96b7(mdo 'grel): skye bo gzhan/ /bdag la khyod kyi sred pa ci/ /gang phyir ngal ba skyes pa 'di/ /khyod kyis bdag dang bral bas byas/ /lam ni mdza' dag khyed cag la/ /bdag gis brtan cing bshad pa de/ /sangs ryas rnams la slob dpon gyis/ /dpe ma khyud med
97a1(mdo 'grel): ces bzung mdzod cig /bdag gi gnas sam nyer zhi na/ /don ni de tsam nyid yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams chos kyi sku/ /lus kyis khyed cag la don ci/ /de phyir dang dam bdag 'das tshe/ /skyo ba yis
97a2(mdo 'grel): dang bag yod dang/ /bdag gi sgron mas gsal byas te/ /chos kyi sgron ma rtag par ro/ /der zhugs brtson 'grus brtan pa dang/ /rtsod med bdag gi don la mkhas/ /blo ni gzhan dbang ma yin pa/ /bdag gi sgron ma zhes shes bya//
97a3(mdo 'grel): rig pa dang ldan mkhas pa ni/ /gang gis sgron mas mun pa bzhin/ /shes rab sgron mes 'joms pa ni/ /chos kyi sgron mar shes par bya/ /dge legs nye bar thob bya'i phyir/ /de dag rnams kyi spyod yul zhi/ /lus dang tshor ba nyid dang
97a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /sems dang bdag med pa nyid do/ /rus lpags khrag dang rgyus pa dang/ /sha dang spu sogs rnams kyis dkris/ /mi gtsang lus su mthong bas ni/ /lus la chags pa ma yin no/ /de lta de ltar rkyen rnams kyis/ /'jug
97a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshor ba rnams su ni/ /sdug bsngal zhes de ltar mthong ba'i/ /bde ba'i shes rab rab tu 'joms/ /skye ba dang ni gnas pa dang/ /chos kyi 'god pa nyid dag ni/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis mthong ba yi/ /rtag par 'dzin pa ldog
97a6(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /rkyen rnams las ni skyes pa rnams/ /phung po rnams ni mthong ba yi/ /ngar 'dzin gyis ni skyed pa'o/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa 'jug ma yin/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ /bgrong ba gcig pa'i lam 'di ni/ /lam ni bzhi po
97a7(mdo 'grel): de rnams su/ /de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag /de ltar ram ni bdag 'das tshe/ /gang rnams 'di la gnas 'gyur ba/ /de rnams 'god med go 'phang mchog /nges par legs pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar kun dga' bo la gtams/
97b1(mdo 'grel): de rnams rnam par 'dren pas mdzad/ /li tsa ba'i rnams kyis thos nas/ /de la gus phyir skyen par song/ /thub la brtse dang gus pa'i phyir/ /gdung pas phrog pa'i sems can rnams/ /spyod mdza' bkod pa'i don rnams kun/ /myur las rdzu
97b2(mdo 'grel): 'phrul don rnams so/ /ston pa la ni smra 'dod na/ /de rnams btud nas nye bar gnas/ /smra bar 'dod rnams rton pa yis/ /mkhyen nas thub pas tshigs gsungs so/ /gang 'di bdag la song ba'i sems/ /khyed cag rnams kyi de kun shes/ /de nyid
97b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan bzhin mya ngan gyis/ /de ring khyed kyis spobs par gyur/ /dpal gyi sde rnams la gnas kyang/ /khyed cag rnams kyis thams cad nas/ /mngon par zhugs pa 'di yis ni/ /gsal ba nyid dang chos mkhas nyid/ /gal te ye shes bdag
97b4(mdo 'grel): las kyang/ /cung zhig thos shing shes pa na/ /bdag gi zhing ba rab dmigs te/ /gdung ba ma byed brtan par song/ /mi rtag 'dus byas dngos po rnams/ /g.yo zhing yongs su 'gyur pa can/ /snying po dang bral blo gtang min/ /cung zhig brtan
97b5(mdo 'grel): par gnas pa med/ /gnas 'jog rgyun shes la sogs dang/ /gang gzhan thig le gyen rnams dang/ /dus kyi dbang du song ba ste/ srid pa 'di ni ma rung nyid/ /sa 'dzin ral nu dang ni/ /brgya byin dang mtshungs dbyibs nor dang/ /bskal pa
97b6(mdo 'grel): che dang skal med min/ /'byung por mnyes gshin 'byung ba'o/ /'gro mgyogs de nas 'gro byar 'gro/ /skal ldan shing rta shing rta bzang/ /sgra ngan gyis smad sgra ngan rdzogs/ /rangs byed ri mo rdul ma skyes/ /mi skyong drang srong bdag nyid che/ de rnams dang
97b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan mang po rnams/ /dbang chen dang mtshungs nyams pa ste/ /mi nyams pa ni yod ma yin/ /nyi ma gnas las 'phos pa ste/ /nor lha rnams ni sa la song/ /dbang po brgya rnams 'das pa ste/ /rtag pa ci yang yod ma yin/ /gang gzhan yang dag sangs
98a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas rnams/ /'gro ba'i snang ba mdzad nas su/ /mar me snum zad bzhin du ni/ /de rnams mya ngan 'das par gyur/ /gang gzhan bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /'byung 'gyur de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang/ /bud shing tshig pa'i me bzhin du//
98a2(mdo 'grel): de rnams mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /thar 'dod dka' thub nags su bzhin/ /de phyir bdag kyang 'gro bar bgyi/ /bdag gi don med lus min ni/ /'dren pa la ni rgyu mtshan med/ /gang du gdul bya 'ga' zhig yod/ /gang phyir 'di nas 'gro bar blo//
98a3(mdo 'grel): nyams dga' yangs pa can la ni/ /khyed cag blo gzhan ma gyur cig /de phyir 'jig rten skyabs med cing/ /dbang med g.yo bar shes nas su/ /chags bral la ni 'gro bar dang/ /skyo ba 'thob par 'os pa'o/ /de ltar gtams bcas nas dus su/
98a4(mdo 'grel): ltos med de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /snron gyi zla bar snang byed bzhin/ /lus ngan phyogs su rab tu gshegs/ /de la mchi mas yongs gang mig /li tsa ba'i rnams rjes song zhing/ /rgyan bcas lag pa rgyas rnams kyis/ /thal mo sbyar nas rnam par
98a5(mdo 'grel): smras/ /kyi hud 'o rgyal gser mtshungs shing/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mda' ba/ /ston pa'i sku lus 'bye 'gyur zhing/ /thugs rje mnga' ba mi rtag nyid/ /srid cing 'o ma med pa yi/ /sems ma thob pa'i be'u ni/ /bkren rnams ye shes 'jo
98a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i bas/ /kye ma shin tu skyen par 'bor/ /'gro na mi ldan mi rnams kyis/ /rmong ba'i mun pa bcom mdzad nas/ /ye shes 'od zer skyen pa ru/ /thub pa nyi ma nub par 'gyur/ /mi shes rgyun gyi 'jig rten na/ /de las de las khyer ba la/ /rnams
98a7(mdo 'grel): yangs chos kyi zam pa ni/ /shin tu myur bar 'chag par 'gyur/ /brtse ldan sman pa chen po ni/ /ye shes mchog gi sman mnga' bas/ /sems nad kyis na 'jig rten ni/ /bor nas nges par gshegs par 'gyur/ /sems kyis gzer du'i
98b1(mdo 'grel): yo byad dang/ /shes rab rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /ltad mo la ni skom rnams kyis/ /dbang po'i tog ni 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal skal ba can/ /'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa la/ /gal te thar pa'i sgo 'di ni/ /dus kyis sdom par 'gyur
98b2(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de ltar rnam zlog lits+tsha ba'i/ /mig rnams mchi mas rnam 'khrugs pa/ /rjes su 'ongs pa de rnams ni/ /thub pas slar la bzlog par mdzad/ /de nas thub pas bcad shes nas/ /bstan pa rab tu bzung nas su/ /phyir la ldog phyir nges pa ni/ /sdug bsngal sdug
98b3(mdo 'grel): bsngal gyis byas so/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i me tog rnams/ /dkar ni ka ra'i ljon shing bzhin/ /gser gyi ri ltar dkar de rnams/ /thub pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal to/ /de la sems rnams kyis chags shing/ /rkang pa rnams kyang 'khyar ba ste/ /gnyen po'i klung
98b4(mdo 'grel): la chu gnyer bzhin/ /'gro ba med par de rnams log /zhes pa yin zhing dga' ma yin/ /dga' ba yin zhing zhes min/ /thub pa la ni de dag gis/ /dga' dang zhes g.yo ba med/ /'brog mdza' nas 'thon khyu mchog che/ /khyu mchog chen po rnams kyis bzhin
98b5(mdo 'grel): gnas na gnas nas de rnams kyis/ /yang yang stobs bcu ldan la lta/ /de bzhin gshegs par sems 'ong ba/ /lus dang ldan yang 'od med rnams/ /rkang pas de nas mya ngan 'das/ /log pa'i khrus bzhin rjes su 'ongs/ /rnam par ma 'khrugs mda'
98b6(mdo 'grel): gzhu rnams kyis dgra rnams zil mnan nas/ /de rnams nga rgyal ldan yang stobs dang ldan yang 'gugs ldan yang/ /'gro na dpal 'dod lits+tsha bI ni 'dod pa chen po rnams/ /mya ngan gyis 'khrugs gdong rnams rang gi khang pa rnams su 'ongs/ /sangs
98b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ lits+tsha bI rnams la thugs brtse ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //snang byed 'dzin par gyur pa na/ /mun bcas kyis 'khrugs nam mkha' bzhin/ /thub pa 'da' 
99a1(mdo 'grel): phyir gshegs pa na/ /de phyir yangs pa can ma mdzes/ /dpal ldan dregs pa mi ldan zhing/ /thams cad du ni nyams dga' yang/ /bdag po nyams las bud med bzhin/ /kun nas gdungs pas mdzes ma gyur/ /
99a2(mdo 'grel): thos pa'i dman pa'i gzugs bzhin dang/ /yon tan dang bral rig pa bzhin/ /ngag gis dman pa'i blo bzhin dang/ /'du byed dang bral ngag bzhin no/ /spyod pas dman pa'i dpal bzhin dang/ /dang po dang bral byams pa bzhin/ /rnam gnon phun
99a3(mdo 'grel): sum tshogs pa bzhin/ /chos kyi dman pa'i bya ba bzhin/ /ston dkar char ni log pa na/ /shA la'i bskams pa nor 'dzin bzhin/ /de che mya ngan las ma mdzes/ /gang du de ni ma btsos shing/ /zos pa ma yin mya ngan des/ /kun tu ngu zhing thams
99a4(mdo 'grel): cad kyis/ /grags ldan thub pa grags pa byas/ /gzhan ni ma gtam ma byas shing/ /sus kyang bsams pa ma yin la/ /mya ngan dang ni ngu ba ste/ /grong khyer pa kun bya ba gcig /de nas dga' 'dun gtso bo la/ /brtan kyang mya ngan gyis nyam thag /
99a5(mdo 'grel): bde chen bdag po seng ge ni/ /bsams shing rnam par zlos pa'o/ /lam log mu stegs rnams pham nas/ /'di 'dra'i lam la gshegs nas su/ /gang gis dam pa'i lam brtan te/ /slar mi ldog phyir gshegs pa nyid/ /nyam thag
99a6(mdo 'grel): nyams par gyur pa yi/ /snang med 'jig rten bor nas su/ /skye dgu mgon med mdzad nas ni/ /mgon pa de ni zhi phyir gshegs/ /rnal 'byor gtso bo bla ma mchog/ /mthar thug zhi la mngon phyogs nas/ /tshe zad pa las gzi mdangs bzhin/ /bdag
99a7(mdo 'grel): gi brtan pa nyams par 'gyur/ /mi skyong sgra ngan mtho ris las/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan ltung ba bzhin/ /de dang bral ba rtse byar gyur/ /sal mi shes bya ba ci/ /tsha bas dub pa chur bzhin dang/ /grang bas nyam thag me la bzhin/ /the tshom gcod pa
99b1(mdo 'grel): skye bo rnams/ /nga ni su la brten par 'gyur/ /me ni 'phel phyir spud ba bzhin/ /gang gis spud pa dge legs phyir/ /'jig rten slob dpon thub pa der/ /nyams tshe chos ni nyams par 'gyur/ /tshul med tshul ngan gyis bcings pa'i/
99b2(mdo 'grel): rga shi dbang bdag rnams kyi ni/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor chen po yi/ /gshig byed de 'dra su zhig yod/ /sin d+hur shing ni bskams pa rnams/ /dpyid mthar chu gter gyis bzhin du/ /chags skyes rgod pa'i mi rnams ni/ /gsung
99b3(mdo 'grel): gis tshim mdzad su zhig lags/ /gang du bla ma lhun po'i snying/ /kun mkhyen nyid kyang rgud 'gyur na/ /blo gros ldan pa 'jig rten na/ /blo gtad la 'gro 'os pa su/ /ji ltar gsad bya bskyang byas nas/ /'chi ba'i ched du 'khrid par byed/ /de bzhin
99b4(mdo 'grel): gson pa'i 'jig rten sdug /'chi ba'i ched du skye bar byed/ /ji ltar shing ni rno ba yi/ /sog le yis ni gshegs par byed/ /de bzhin 'gro 'di nyams pa yis/ /sog le yis ni gshegs par byed/ /nyon mongs mdza' dag bsregs nas kyang
99b5(mdo 'grel): ye shes kyi ni stobs ldan kyang/ /'gro ba'i mchog gi slob dpon ni/ /rab tu nyams phyir gshegs par 'gyur/ /lta ngan srog chags ngan pa chu/ /srid pa'i dba' rlabs rdul ni nya/ /ye shes gru bo chen po yis/ /gang gis srid pa'i mtsho las
99b6(mdo 'grel): rgal/ /rga ba'i yal ga nang me tog/ /'chi ba'i rtsa ba srid myu gu/ /ye shes mtshon cha chen po yis/ /gang gos srid pa'i ljon shing bcas/ /ma rig tsub shing las skyes shing/ /'dod chags me lce yul bud shing/ /gang gi ye shes
99b7(mdo 'grel): bsil ba'i chus/ /skyon gyi me ni zhi bar mdzad/ /gang gi zhi ba'i lam la gshegs/ /gang gis mun pa chen po spangs/ /gang gis dge legs mchog mkhyen zhi/ /mkhyen nas byams pa yis bstan to/ /des kyang nyon mongs kun mthar phyin
100a1(mdo 'grel): kun tu zhi ba gzigs pa ste/ /kun mkhyen kun la phan pa mdzad/ /kun spangs ched du gshegs pa nyid/ /mnyen zhing rnam yangs dbyangs mnga' ba'i/ /phyag ring thub pa chen po de'i/ /gal te mdza' na su yi mdza' 
100a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung 'gyur ma yin 'byung 'gyur min/ /'brog dgon dag na chu mthong nas/ /lam 'gro don bcas 'khrul pa bzhin/ /myur ba dang ldan mkhas pas ni/ /de phyir chos la bsnyon par 'os/ /nyams phyir khyad par med pa yi/ /sdig pa mi
100a3(mdo 'grel): rtag nyid shes nas/ /gang zhig chos la gnyid ma log /de ni nyal yang gnyid ma log /de nas mi yi seng ge yi/ /ye shes za pas seng ge des/ /skye ba'i nyes pa rnams smad cing/ /srid pa zang pa'i bstod pa nyid/ /srid pa'i rtsa ba
100a4(mdo 'grel): 'dor 'dod cing/ /brtul zhugs dam pa len 'dod la/ /g.yo ba'i sems ni thul 'dod de/ /dge ba'i lam la gnas par 'dod/ /zhi ba'i lam la 'go 'dod cing/ /srid pa'i mtsho las rgal 'dod la/ /rtag par sbyin pa gtong
100a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod de/ /yang srid gcod par 'dod pa'o/ /sbyin pa byin zhing nga rgyal spangs/ /chos ni bsams shing zhi bar song/ /thub pa mya ngan 'da' bzhed tshe/ /de yis sa ni stong par go /de nas sku lus thams cad kyis/ /gnyis 'thung rgyal po bzhin
100a6(mdo 'grel): bzlog nas/ /grong khyer la ni gzigs shin tu/ /thub pas 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /yangs pa can gyi bdag po 'di/ /khyod la lta ba'i phyi ma yin/ /gyang gnas kyi tshe tshod dus su/ /mya ngan 'da' phyir 'gro bar gyis/ /de nas gus ldan chos
100a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa/ /nye bar 'ongs pa rnams gzugs nas/ /de yi rab spyod las rnams la/ /thub pas mngon par rjes gnang mdzad/ /de nas rim gyis rnam 'dren pa/ /longs spyod grong la bsnyen pa ste/ /de zhugs thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /
100b1(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams la mngon par gsungs/ /da ltar ram ni bdag 'das nas/ /chos la mchog tu gzhol bar bya/ /de ni khyed kyis don mchog ste/ /gang gzhan de ni ngal par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sder ma zhugs shing/ /'dul ba na yang mi snang
100b2(mdo 'grel): la/ /rigs par so sor gnod pa ste/ /de ni cis kyang bzung mi bya/ /de ni chos min 'dul ba min/ /de ni bdag gi tshig ma yin/ /mang po rnams kyi tshig yin kyang/ /nag po'i gdams pa de dor byas/ /dag pa'i gdams pa bzung bya zhing//
100b3(mdo 'grel): gang la yod min bzlog pa ste/ /de ni chos yin 'dul ba ste/ /de ni bdag gis tshig yin no/ /de phyir bdag gi mdor bsdus nas/ /tshang ma 'di rnams bshad pa ste/ /gang zhig byed de tshang ma yin/ /'di las gzhan du tshang ma min/ /bdag
100b4(mdo 'grel): gis dgongs pa phra mo de/ /rnam par ma bzhag ma shes nas/ /rmongs nas chos ma yin pa la/ /chos kyi blo rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mun pa dang bcas blta bas sam/ /khyad par rnams ni shes min las/ /gser dang rab tu mtshungs pa yi
100b5(mdo 'grel): ji lta zangs kyis slu bar byed/ /shes rab khyab pa med pas sam/ /de nyid 'dzin pa ma yin pas/ /dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs bsnyan gyi/ /de ltar chos ma yin pa slu/ /brdar las bcad las bsregs pa las/ /mkhas pa rnams
100b6(mdo 'grel): kyi gser bzhin du/ /'dul ba mdo las rigs pa las/ /de phyir yongs su rtog par rigs/ /bstan pa ces rnam par mi shes pas/ /mkhas pa rnams ni ma yin zhing/ /tshul min la tshul blo gros dang/ /tshul la tshul min
100b7(mdo 'grel): mthong ba nyid/ de phyir don dang tshig gis ni/ /yang dag thos pas gzung bya ste/ /bstan bcos log par bzung ba yis/ /mtshon bya bzhin du rnam par 'joms/ /sngar med ldan pas 'khyogs mang pa'i/ /mtshan mo'i 'ong
101a1(mdo 'grel): byed khyim la bzhin/ /tshig ni log par brjod pa yi/ /don la sdug bsngal gyis 'jug go /don nyams pa las chos nyams shing/ /chos nyams pa las nus pa ste/ /de phyir ma log don la ni/ /gang gi blo de blo
101a2(mdo 'grel): ldan no/ /dge mangs de skad gsungs nas ni/ /dus su sdig pa'i grong la gshegs/ /der ni 'di la khyed rnams kyis/ /bsnyen bkur dam pa byed pa'o/ /de nas der ni gus ldan pa/ /skul byed legs pa'i khyim nyid du/ /bcom ldan 'das
101a3(mdo 'grel): kyis zas mdzad de/ /de yi phyir yin rgyas phyir min/ /de nas nyan thos tshogs bcas te/ /de bzhin gshegs pas zas mdzad nas/ /skul byed la ni chos gsungs te/ /ku sha ldan pa'i grong du gshegs/ /de bzhin nor ldan zhes byi'i klung/ /skul
101a4(mdo 'grel): byed bcas pa de brgal nas/ /grong khyer de ni zhi ba yi/ /pad+ma'i gnas bcas nags su bsnyen/ /gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od mnga' des/ /gser ldan la ni khrus mdzad nas/ /kun dga' bo ni dga' med la/ /'jig rten dga' la bka' stsal
101a5(mdo 'grel): to/ /kun dga' gshin rje'i ra ba yi/ /dbus su dag gi khri ba shom zhig /de ring nam gyi cha smad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'da' / /zhes gsungs kun dga' bos thos nas/ /mchi mas zhag na mig ldan pas/ /thub pa'i gzims
101a6(mdo 'grel): mal bshams pa ste/ /bshams nas bstod cing kyi hud do/ /de nas gzims mal stabs pa la/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog byon te/ /yang yang sang pa med phyir dang/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad phyir ro/ /de ni rtsibs logs
101a7(mdo 'grel): g.yas kyi ni/ /phyag la dbu ni rnam gzhag nas/ /zhabs la zhabs ni bkod nas su/ /slob mas mdun pa dar gzims pa'o/ /de nas yud tsam de na der/ /bya rnams skad ni mi sgrogs te/ /zags shing snyoms pa'i lus rnams kyis/ /
101b1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan la ni gzhol bzhin gnas/ /de tshe 'dab mi g.yos rnams las/ /rlung rnams kyis kyang ma g.yos pa'i/ /ljong shing rnams kyis mchi ma bzhin/ /mdog ngan me tog rnams gtor to/ /nub ril rtsel nyin mor byed/ /gnas la la mi 'gro rnam pa
101b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /khri lo thub pa lta bzhin du/ /don dam mthong rnams skyen par gyur/ /de nas mthar thugs gzims mal la/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gzims pa yis/ /mchi mas rnam 'khrugs kun dga' la/ /rjes su brtse bas bka' stsal to/ /bdag gi mya ngan 'da' 
101b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i dus/ /gyad? rnams la smros kun dga' po/ /mya ngan 'da' ba ma mthong na/ phyis na bdag la gdung bar 'gyur/ /de nas gsung ni rab bzung nas/ /mchi mas brgyal ba'i kun dga' bos/ /thub pa'i gzims mal mthar thug pa/ /gyad rnams la ni
101b4(mdo 'grel): smras pa'o/ /de nas de tshe kun dga' bo yi tshig thos nas/ /mig nas chu yi char ldan de rnams du bzhin du/ /seng ge'i 'jigs las sa 'dzin dag nas khyu mchog ltar/ /brtan min rnams par gnon rnams grong khyer nas thon to/ /zhen pa med pas gos
101b5(mdo 'grel): rnams g.yengs shing rnam bkram te/ /'gros kyis kun nas bskyod pas cod pan g.yo ba rnams/ /lhan gnas nams bsod nams yongs su zad las bzhin/ /de nas nyam thag 'ongs pa rnams ni nags der song/ /de ltar 'ongs pa rnams kyis thub pa mthong
101b6(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ /mthong nas mchi ma'i gdong ldan rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni yongs gdung sems rnams gnas pa ste/ /gnam pa de rnams la ni thub pas bka' stsal to/ /dga' ba'i dus su mya ngan byed pa rigs min zhing/ /yid mi bde bas
101b7(mdo 'grel): don med brtan pa bsnyen par gyis/ /bskal pa du ma rnams su bdag gis 'dod pa gang/ /shin tu rnyed dka' i don de bdag la nye bar gnas/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mkha' med pa'i/ /dge zhing 'gyur med dbang po'i dbang don las 'das pa/ zhi
102a1(mdo 'grel): zhing dprog bya ma yin mchog de gang thos nas/ /skye ba med cing 'pho ba med la mya ngan med/ /ga ya rnams su byang chub tshe na bdag gis sngon/ /dge min srid pa'i rgyu rnams sprul bzhin dor ba ste/ /sngon che bsags
102a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i las kyi rnam par gnas pa 'di/ /lus 'di nyid ni de ring nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyi ni gter chen phung po song ba na/ 'jigs pa chen po yang srid nye bar zhi ba na/ /gang tshe sdug bsngal chen po las ni byung ba ste//
102a3(mdo 'grel): gang gis du ba bdag la mya ngan 'os ci yod/ /rab tu zhi ba'i dus yin na yang 'brug gi dbyangs/ /shAkya thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams kyis thos nas/ /de nas kha rnams bye zhing smra 'dod gyur pa ste/ /de dag rnams kyi tshig de gnas brtan
102a4(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol to/ /gang gi du ba khyod kyi mya ngan 'os ci yod/ /me ni khang pa 'bar las rnam par mthon pa ltar/ /de ltar thub pa des ni lha gtso rnams kyis kyang/ /nges par bsnyen bya yin na mi rnams kyis smos ci/ /khyab
102a5(mdo 'grel): bdag skye bo gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das 'di mthon min des na mya ngan byad/ /'brog dgon dag na song ba'i lam mkhan bzang po ni/ /rnam par nyams tshe kun nas 'khrul par cis mi 'gyur/ /bla ma drang srong
102a6(mdo 'grel): chen po thams cad gzigs pa ni/ /dngos su mthong nas gal te khyad par ma thob na/ /gser gyi 'byung gnas dag nas dbul po song rnams bzhin/ /de tshe 'di na bzhad gang nyid du 'gro ba nyid/ /de ltar don ldan mang po de de smra ba rnams//
102a7(mdo 'grel): bu rnams la bzhin gus ldan thal mo sbyar ba rnams/ /dge zhing zhi la dam pa'i don ni bsngags pa yis/ /gyad rnams dag la mchog bdag rnams kyi mchog gis gsungs/ /de ltar nges pa de ni kho bo mthong ba las/ /rnal 'byor
102b1(mdo 'grel): cho gar 'bad rtsol med par grol min te/ bdag gis chos 'di gang zhig rjes su rtog byed pa/ /sdug bsngal dra ba las de ma mthong na yang grol/ /ji ltar sman ni bsnyen par mi byed skyes bu yis/ /sman pa mthong ba las kyang nad ni 'joms
102b2(mdo 'grel): min te/ /de bzhin bdag gi ye shes 'dir la bsgoms na/ bdag ni mthong ba las kyang sdug bsngal 'joms ma yin/ /'di ni bdag ldan gang zhig pa dag gi chos mthong ba/ /rgyang ring dag na gnas kyang nges ni bdag mthong ste/ gang zhig
102b3(mdo 'grel): dge legs la ni bzhol zhing mi 'jug pa/ /bdag gi nye bar gnas kyang de ni rgyang ring nyid/ /de phyir brtson 'grus ma spangs bsdams pa'i sems rnams kyis/ /dge ba'i las rnams la ni bag dang ldan par gyis/ /sdug bsngal du ma nye bar
102b4(mdo 'grel): 'dus shing g.yo ba ste/ /sreg ni tho rangs mar me dang ni mtshungs pa nyid/ /de ltar thub pa'i skyes mchog gis brtan de rnams ni/ /mig nas chu ni rnam byung nyam thag yid rnams kyis/ /chu bo'i gzhung ni so sor sgrol bar byed pa bzhin/ /ku
102b5(mdo 'grel): she zhes bya'i grong la dal bus dbang med zhugs/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bzang pos
102b6(mdo 'grel): yang dag nyer ldan legs bzangs ni/ /dbyu gu gsum 'dzin 'byung po'i tsho gsum mi mchod pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa lta 'dod dge slong thar 'dod pas/ /kun dga' byed pa'i kun dga' bo la smras pa'o/ /thub pa'i mya ngan 'da' ba' i
102b7(mdo 'grel): dus ni bdag gis thos/ /gang gi ched du bdag gis lta 'dod skyes pa ste/ /'jig rten dag na mchog gi chos kyi rtog pa'o/ /zla ba gnam stong la bzhin mthong bar bla ma min/ /sdug bsngal mdza' dag rnams kyi tha mar gshegs bzhed pa//
103a1(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi 'dren pa de ni lta bar 'dod pa ste/ /sprin gyi mngon par bkag pa'i mkha' la nyi ma bzhin/ /bdag gis ma mthong bar de nub par 'gro ma yin/ /de nas yongs su 'gro ba po ni 'ongs pa ste/ /smra bar
103a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod cing chos 'dod pa ni des shes nas/ /lab dang ni ldan pa'i sems ldan kun dga' bos/ /dus ma yin zhes mchi ma'i gdong gis smras pa'o/ /de ni zla ba'i 'od mda' bsam pa mkhyen pa'o/ /'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan yang rnam
103a3(mdo 'grel): par mkhyen nas su/ /gang phyir kho bo 'jig rten phan phyir skyes pa ste/ /kun dga' bo skyes gnyis skyes ma 'gogs zhes gsungs so/ /de las legs bzang mchog tu dga' zhing yid ches shing/ /dpal sdug dge legs mdzad
103a4(mdo 'grel): la mngon du song ba ste/ /de nas dus kyi rjes su mthun pas zhi ba yis/ /gsung ni mngon par gsung nas slar yang de gsol to/ /kho bo lta bu'i yongs su rtog pa po rnams las/ /thar pa'i lam gzhan lhag par thob ces grag /de
103a5(mdo 'grel): phyir bdag la gsungs mdzad bdag la 'dzin 'dod yod/ /bdag gi lta la dod brtse bar rtsod par phyir ma yin/ de nas gnyis skyes mngon par 'ongs pa de la ni/ /yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs shing/ /rab tu chung
103a6(mdo 'grel): zos lam ni yang dag dran pa bzhin/ /thos nas gang gis yang dag rtags/ /des ni sngon du mthong bar gyur pa'i lam gzhan la/ /des ni mthar thug dam pa nye bar ma thob ste/ /sngon du ma mthong lam ni lhag par thob nas su/ /snying la
103a7(mdo 'grel): mun pa dang bcas lam de dor bar gyur/ rdul dang lhan cig mun pa rab tu thob pa ste/ /de dag rnams kyi mi dge'i las ni sog ces grag/ /snying stobs dang bcas rdul ni rab tu 'phel ba ste/ /de dag rnams kyi dge ba'i las ni
103b1(mdo 'grel): byas zhes grag /thos dang blo dang 'bad pas snying stobs 'phel ba na/ rdul dang mun pa dag ni rnam pa med pa'i phyir/ /las nyams pa las las ni zad par 'gro ba ste/ /de dag rnams kyi las de 'bad pa min zhes grag /yid ni rmongs
103b2(mdo 'grel): par byed pa rdul dang mun pa dag /rang bzhin par ni 'jig rten dag na sma ba ste/ /de phyir de gnyis zad pa yod min brten nyid phyir/ /rang bzhin par ni brtan pa nyid du rab tu grub/ /snying stobs sbyor las de dag de bar gyur na yang//
103b3(mdo 'grel): dus kyi dbang gis slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ /bsil ba'i chu ni mtshan mo bzhin du rim gyis ni/ /dus kyi rim las rang bzhin du ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rtag pa'i bdag nyid snying stobs de ltar 'bel ba ru/ /thos pa blo dang 'bad pa rnams kyi ni
103b4(mdo 'grel): nus te/ /de ma 'phel na de dag nyams pa yod min zhing/ /de dag ma nyams pa las zhi ba yod ma yin/ /sngon du des ni rang bzhin las ni skyes snyam ste/ /des kyang der ni thar pa mthong ba ma yin zhing/ /me yi 'bar ba'i 'od kyi nyams pa ji lta
103b5(mdo 'grel): bar/ /rang bzhin las ni gnas na mthar thug gang las yin/ /sangs rgyas pa yi lam gyis de nyid mthong ba ste/ srid pa la ni brten nas 'jig rten des rtogs shing/ /de yis rnam par nyams bzhi ba rig pa ste/ /rgyun ni rab tu nyams phyir
103b6(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu nyams pa'o/ /gsal ba 'di yin rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i bdag /lus las gzhan ni de yis sngon du rtogs pa ste/ /thub pa'i gsung ni yongs su thob nas 'jig rten ni/ /bdag med pa dang bdag tu bya ba mang par shes/ /chos ni
103b7(mdo 'grel): du ma so sor brten nas skyes pa ste/ /rang nyid dbang med yongs su shes nas ni/ des ni rab tu 'jug pa sdug bsngal nyid du dang/ nges par ldog ste sdug bsngal nyid du kye ma mthong/ /ji ltar 'jig rten dag ni skye ba rtogs nas su/ /des
104a1(mdo 'grel): ni chad pa'i lta ba rnam par spangs pa ste/ /'jig rten dag gi nub par 'gro ba shes nas su/ /rtag pa'i lta ba brtan po skyen par spangs pa'o/ /drang srong chen po'i gsungs ni thos nas bzung ba ste/ de ltar 'di na
104a2(mdo 'grel): des ni sngon gyi lta ba btang/ /de yis sngon du yongs su las ni byas pas te/ /gang gis skyen par dam pa'i chos la rjes su song/ yid ni rab tu dang bas mchog dang ldan pa des/ /zhi zhing 'gyur med go 'phang de ni rab thob nas/ /thub pa gzim
104a3(mdo 'grel): pa la ni bsngags pa byas pa ste/ /lta bzhin 'di las blo 'di rnams ni byas pa'o/ /mchod 'os dam pa mya ngan 'da' bar 'os pa yis/ /mgon po mthong nas bdag ni gnas par 'os ma yin/ /ston pa thugs rje ldan pa mya ngan 'da' ba yis
104a4(mdo 'grel): sngon du re zhig bdag ni mthar thug la 'gro'o/ /de nas des ni thub pa la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ sprul bzhin g.yo ba med pa'i gdan ni bcings nas su/ /sprin rlung gis ni phra mor byed pa bzhin/ /de ma thag tu zhi ba mya ngan 'da' bar
104a5(mdo 'grel): gshegs/ /de nas de phyir gdung gi 'du byed cho ga ni/ /cho ga mkhyen pa'i thub pas bka' stsal pa/ /mthar gyur de ni skye ba mthar mdzad drang srong che/ /rgya chen slob ma mda' ba' i slob mar gyur pa'o/ /de nas nam gyi thun ni 'das
104a6(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /zla bas skar ma rnams kyi 'od ni phrogs pa na/ /nags rnams nyal ba bzhin du sgra med gyur pa na/ /dge slong rnams la thugs rje chen po mnga' bas bstan/ /slob dpon bzhin du sgron ma bzhin du don bzhin du/ /bdag 'das tshe
104a7(mdo 'grel): na so sor thar pa bsten bya ste/ /khyed kyi ston pa de yin de'i dbang gis 'gyur bya/ /kho bo gnas pa na yang de tsam nyid smra'o/ /lus dang ngag gi las ni rnam par dag 'dod pas/ /de bzhin 'jig rten tha snyad thams cad 'dor ba dang/
104b1(mdo 'grel): sa dang srog chags sa bon rdzas la sogs rnams kyi/ /rab tu 'dzin pa las ni me bzhin ldog pa'o/ /sa la skye ba gcod dang 'byed pa dag las dang/ /sa yi logs la rko dang rmo ba dag las dang/ /gso ba dang ni skar rtsis mtshan nyid rnams las
104b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /ngos par ldog pa bza' ba'i cho ga dus yin no/ /pho nya'i 'jig pa sman drang sngags ni bsnyen rnams la/ /sbyor min nyid dang 'chab pa nyid ni med pa nyid/ /chos las ma bkag pa yi sgrub pa rnams la ni/ /tshod shes nyid dang tshim dang srog pa ma
104b3(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /rnam pa de ltar tshul khrims yang dag bsdus pa 'di/ /thar pa'i rtsa ba so sor thar pa ste/ /'di las ting nge 'dzin rnams rab tu skye ba ste/ /ye shes thams cad rnams dang mthar thug rnams 'di'o/ /de phyir ma ral ma nyams 'brog bya ma
104b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i/ /gang gi tshul khrims gtsang ma yod pa de yi chos/ /de med gal te 'di yi thams cad med pa ste/ /tshul khrims yon tan dam pa rnams kyi rten yin no/ tshul khrims ma nyams rnam par dag pa gnas pa na/ /dbang po spyod yul rnams
104b5(mdo 'grel): la 'jug pa ma yin zhing/ dbyug pas ba glang tshogs rnams lo tog las bzhin du/ /brtan las dbang po drug rnams sgrib par bya ba'o/ /dang po'i rta rnams yul rnams la grol gang zhig gzhan/ /len zhing de rnams las ni de tsam nyid ma yin//
104b6(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba'i rta rnams kyis phrogs lam ngan la bzhin du/ /des ni de yi ched du don med thob par 'gyur/ /dgra bo chen po rnams kyi dbang du song ba rnams/ /'di na kha cig sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ba ste/ /rmongs pas yul rnams dag gi dbang
104b7(mdo 'grel): du song nas ni/ /song nas deng 'dir dbang med rnams ni sdug bsngal 'os/ /de phyir dgra bo ma rungs dbang po rnams kyi bzhin/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'gro ba 'gro bya ma yin zhing/ /dbang po rnams kyi dga' ba 'jig? rten na byas nas/ /dbang po
105a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi gshed ma 'jig rten na mthong ngo/ /rang gi g.yo ba'i sems las 'jig pa ji lta bar/ /rtag rnams las dang sprul dang 'bar ba'i me las dang/ /dgra bo las ni de ltar 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /gang gi
105a2(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi dang ni yang dag rtog pa med/ /lcags kyu med pa'i gnyis 'thung myos pa lta bu dang/ /yal ga'i ri dags shing la rab tu ma zhi ltar/ /sems ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin phyogs su bskor ba ste/ /g.yo zhing bskyod pa de la go skabs
105a3(mdo 'grel): sbyin mi bya/ /de ni rang dbang yin na zhi ba yod min zhing/ /de yis gnas par yin na byed pa byas pa nyid/ /de phyir sems 'di ji ltar rnam par mi g.yo ba/ /de ltar rab tu 'bad pa yis ni gyis mdzod cig/ bza' ba tsam ni sman
105a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin nges par bsten bya ste/ /'dir ni khong khro bya ba ma yin chags pa min/ /ji srid bkres pa nyid ni ldog pa'i ched du dang/ /lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'dzin pa yi ched du'o/ /ji ltar nags su bung ba rnams kyis me tog ro//
105a5(mdo 'grel): 'thung ste me tog rnams ni nyams par byed ma yin/ /de bzhin dus kyi dbang las bsod snyoms rgyu ba ste/ /pha rol dad pa rnams ni nyams par byed ma yin/ /drang pos rtag par khur bar byed ces khur bya dang/ /skye bo sbyin pa po yang
105a6(mdo 'grel): yod pa ma yin te/ /'di na sbyor ba min las khur ba ltung ba ste/ /ji ltar khur bu de ltar sbyin pa po yin no/ /rnal 'byor rim las nyin mo mdza' dag phul nas dang/ /mtshan mo'i dang po'i thun dang cig shos dag kyang ste/ /dran pa
105a7(mdo 'grel): dang bcas snga ma'i cig shos la nyol la/ /gnyid kyi tshe ni don med byed pa ma yin no/ /dus kyi me yis 'di na 'gro ba sreg pa ma/ mtshan mo mdza' dag la ni gnyis par 'os pa su/ /nyon mongs dgra bo dang mtshungs 'joms pa
105b1(mdo 'grel): po rnams ni/ /snying la gnas pa yin na su yi gnyid log 'gyur/ /de phyir khyim na nag po'i sprul rnams nyal ba ltar/ /yid la nyes skyon sprul rnams rab tu nyal ba rnams/ /rigs pa dang ni rkang pa'i smin gyis ston nas su/ /gnyid log par
105b2(mdo 'grel): 'os 'di las gzhan du ngo tsha'o/ /ngo tsha rgyan nyid dang ni mchog gi gos yin zhing/ /ngo tsha lam las 'khyogs pa rnams kyi lcags kyus te/ /ngo tsha ldan pas de ltar gyur na 'jug bya zhing/ /ngo tshas rnam par spangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi
105b3(mdo 'grel): spangs/ /ji srid pa la skyes bu ngo tsha dang bcas pa/ /de srid de yi ngo bo nyid yin te/ /don dang don min rnams la rnam dpyod med pa ni/ /ngo tshas rnam par dman pa phyug dang mnyam pa'o/ /gang yang yan lag nying lag rnams ni ral gris gcod//
105b4(mdo 'grel): dar yang yid kyi nyes pa bya ba ma yin zhing/ /zhi ba ma yin ngag gi brjod par mi bya ste/ /bdag gi de yi khyed cag rnams kyi bar chod yin/ /bzod pa dang mnyam dka' thub yod ba ma yin zhing/ /gang gi bzod pa de yi stobs dang brtan pa ste/ /gang
105b5(mdo 'grel): rnams pha rol rnams las rtsub mo mi bzod pa/ /de rnams chos byed rnams kyi lugs min grol ba min/ /chos kyi 'byed pa po dang grags pa'i 'joms pa po/ /gzugs kyi dgra bo dang ni snying gi me yin te/ /khro ba de yi go skabs rab 'jam mi
105b6(mdo 'grel): sbyin zhing/ /yon tan rnams kyi dgra bo de 'dra gzhan ma yin/ /yongs su bsil ba'i chu las glog gi me bzhin du/ /ji ltar rab byung las ni khro ba 'gal ba ste/ /de ltar khyim pa rnams kyi skyes pa mi 'gal te/ /chags ldan de rnams de
105b7(mdo 'grel): la dam bca' ma yin no/ /mdzes pa'i skra ni rgyang ring mgo la reg nas dang/ /rnam par 'gyur pa'i gos dang lhung bzod mthong nas dang/ /gzhan las mthar gyur spyod pa rnam par bsams nas su/ /snying la skyes pa'i nga rgyal rab tu spang bar bya/
106a1(mdo 'grel): phyi ma la brten pa khengs pa rnams kyi yang/ /nga rgyal rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir yin na/ /slo ma za bas bdag nyid yongs su rtogs pa bo/ /thar pa la dmigs skra bzhar rnams kyi sngon nyid do/ /ngan g.yo dang ni
106a2(mdo 'grel): chos kyi mtshams sbyor yod min te/ /gang phyir 'di las 'khyog po nyid ni bsnyen mi bya/ /na g.yo nyid dang sgyu ni sla ba'i don du ni/ chos kyi bdag nyid rnams kyi bslu bya yod ma yin/ /gang zhig rgya chen rnams las sdug bsngal 'ong ba
106a3(mdo 'grel): ste/ /nyung ngu 'dod la 'ong ba ma yin de dang bral/ /de yi phyir yang nyung ngu 'dod nyid bsnyen bya ste/ /gang zhig yon tan rnams kyi rdzogs byed kye ma ci/ /de ni bkren pa'i lta ba rnams la mi 'jigs shing/ /dbang po rnams las gang
106a4(mdo 'grel): zhig cung zad 'jigs min la/ /gang zhig thos nas med ces mya ngan med pa ste/ /gang gi nyung ngu 'dod de yi thar pa min/ /gal te grol ba 'dod na tshim pa bsnyen mdzod dang/ /tshim pa na ni 'di bde de 'di chos yin zhing/ /tshim pa
106a5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni sar yang bde par gnyid log ste/ /tshim med rnams ni mtho ris na yang nye bar bsreg/ phyug kyang tshim pa med pa rtag tu dbul po ste/ /dbul yang tshim pa dang ldan rtag tu phyug po nyid/ /tshim pa med pa sdug pa'i yul
106a6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang 'bye zhing/ /tshim par 'gro ba dal ba ldan la mya ngan byed/ /zhi ba'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'dod rnams kyis/ /de ltar tshogs la dga' ba rnams su 'gyur mi bya/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid gcig tu rgyu phyir 'jig rten na//
106a7(mdo 'grel): brgya byin la sogs lha rnams kyis kyang re 'dod byed/ /chags po sdug bsngal gyi ni gnas pa'i shing yin te/ /rang gi skye bo la 'am skye la chags pa spangs/ /chags pa rnams rgyas sdug bsngal la ni 'jig rten na/ /gnyis 'thung
106b1(mdo 'grel): 'khogs pa 'dam la bzhin du 'chags par 'gyur/ /rtag par rab zhugs chu yi rgyun ni mnyen na yang/ /rdo? ba'i logs la dus su rnam par 'bigs pa ste/ /brtson 'grus gyis ni rnyed par dka' ba ci yang med/ /de phyir khur rnams mi  '
106b2(mdo 'grel): bor bar ni bzo bgyis dang/ /gang zhig yang yang ngal gso nas ni srung byed pa/ /de yis shing la me ni rnyed par sla min zhing/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pas rnyed par sla bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de phyir sbyor ba yod na bya ba grub pa nyid/ /dran pa yod
106b3(mdo 'grel): na skyon rnams 'jug pa ma yin te/ /dran pa dang mnyam mdza' bo med cing bsrung ba med/ /dran pa nyams las nges par thams cad nyams pa ste/ /de phyir lus la song ba'i dran pa spang mi bya/ /ji ltar dpa' bo rnams na go cha bzung nas su/ /dgra
106b4(mdo 'grel): bo'i sde la 'jigs pa med rnams 'jug pa ste/ /de bzhin lus la dran pa'i go cha ba gos nas su/ /brtan ba rnams ni yul gyi g.yul rnams la spyod do/ /mnyam par bzhag pa blo dang sems ni yongs sdams shing/ /'jig rten dag gi skye
106b5(mdo 'grel): dang 'gog par shes pa ste/ de phyir ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'jug bya ste/ /ting 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i sems nad yod ma yin/ /rnam par 'thor ba'i chu ni rnam par 'dzin don du/ /ji ltar 'bad bas dong dang 'obs ni byed pa ste/ /ye shes chu ni gnas
106b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i don du ting nge 'dzin/ /de ltar dod dang 'obs dang mtshungs par rab tu bstan/ /shes rab ldan pa yongs su 'dzin pa btang ba yi/ /chos 'di nang la mchog tu gzhol ba dag gis te/ /de ltar gnas pa'i grol ba yod cing 'di yi ni/ /phyin ci log ni
106b7(mdo 'grel): khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/ /shes rab rga dang shi ba'i mtsho rchen dag la gru/ /rmongs pa'i mun pa rnams la ji ltar sgron ma ste/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms pa dag gis sman yin zhing/ /nyon mongs ljon shing 'joms byed mtshon cha rnon
107a1(mdo 'grel): po yin/ /de phyir thos pa bsam pa bsgom pa rnams kyi ni/ /shes rab rnams par 'phel la rab tu 'jug par bya/ /gang gis shes rab rang bzhin lta byed mig yod pa/ /de ni mig dang bral yang mig dang ldan pa
107a2(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /sems la rgyu ba'i spros pa de dang de rnams kyis/ /khyim na gnas pa spangs nas kyang ni grol min nyid/ /mchog tu zhi ba thob par 'dod pa rnams kyi 'di/ /shes nas spros pa med pa rnams su 'gyur bar bya/ /de phyir bag yod bla
107a3(mdo 'grel): ma bzhin du bsnyen mdzod la/ /bag med dgra bo bzhin du rnam par spongs mdzod dang/ /bag yod pa las brgya byin gyis ni dpal thob cing/ /bag med pa las lha min khengs rnams rnam par nyams/ /phan pa dang ldan rjes su brtse ba mnga' 
107a4(mdo 'grel): ba yi/ /ston pa thugs rje mnga' bas mdzad bya gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gis byas shing dang ni rab bsdams pa/ /khyed cag rnams kyi sems ni zhi bas byas pa'o/ /ci ste ri rnams dang ni khang pa stong pa rnams/ /dgon pa de ni gang dang der ni
107a5(mdo 'grel): yod pa na/ /rab tu sbyor la rtag tu 'bad pa bya ba ste/ /phyi nas yongs su gdung ba ldan par ma gyur cig/ sman pa rang bzhin yang dag legs par shes nas na/ /nad pa rnams la dam pa'i sman ni brjod bya ste/ /de yi dus kyis sbyar bar nges
107a6(mdo 'grel): par bstan pa la/ /nad pa gang de bdag po yin te sman pa min/ /dpal ldan drang zhing mnyam la 'jigs pa med pa yi/ /lam ni lam mkhan gyis ni rnam par bstan pa na/ /thos nas gang zhig mi 'gro de yi nyams pa ste/ /bstan pas
107a7(mdo 'grel): 'dren pa po ni bu lon yod ma yin/ /sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa bzhi po kho bo yis/ /bstan pa rnams la 'di ni gang gis 'dod pa yod/ /de ni myur zhing spobs par bdag la smros shig dang/ /the tshom shin tu rnam par dbyad bya bcad
107b1(mdo 'grel): par bgyi/ /de ltar mthon por gsung ba'i drang srong chen po la/ /the tshom med pa de rnams ci yang ma gsol to/ /sems kyi de dag rnams kyi sems kyi gting dpag nas/ /byed ldan ma 'gags pas kyang tshig 'di smras pa'o/ /rlung ni g.yo ba ma
107b2(mdo 'grel): yin nyi ma bsil ba dang/ /ri bong mtshan ma can ni dro ba nyid na yang/ /'jig rten dag na rkang pa bzhi po rnams la ni/ /bden pa min par byed par nus pa ma yin no/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal brjod pa de ni bde ba min/ /'di yi rgyu gang rab tu skye bo de
107b3(mdo 'grel): bzhan min/ /rgyu ni 'gags pa las ni nges par thar pa ste/ /gang zhig 'di yi lam ni thabs ma yin pa min/ /de phyir bdag nyid chen po bden pa bzhin rnams la/ /dge slong skye bo nges 'di gtam ci yod ma yin/ /sdom pa mya ngan 'da' ba brnyed par
107b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhes te/ /gang zhig don ni rdzogs pa ma yin sdug bsngal te/ /gang zhig tshogs pa 'di ni brtul zhugs gzhon nyid las/ /sngon du don ni mthong bar gyur pa ma yin pa/ /de yang khyod kyi gsung 'dis da ni de ma thag/ glog gi 'od kyi lam
107b5(mdo 'grel): bzhan yang dag mthong bar gyur/ /gang gi don gyi ltag ma yod pa ma yin zhing/ /gang yang srid pa'i mtsho yi pha rol phyin pa ste/ /mgon po shin tu brgyan pa nges par gshegs thos te/ /de dag gi yang snying la bsam bar gyur pa nyid/ /de ltar 'phags
107b6(mdo 'grel): pa ma 'gags pa yi tshig de yis/ /don ni rnam par shes kyang shes nas slar yang ni/ /gus ldan rnams kyi blo gros brtan po mdzad bzhed pa/ /byams pas slar yang sangs rgyas kyis ni bka' stsal to/ /gang phyir bskal par gnas
107b7(mdo 'grel): kyang de ni nyams pa ste/ /phan tshun du ni 'du ba nges par yongs ma yin/ /bdag nyid kyi rang? gzhan gyi don ni byas nas ni/ /kho bo'i gnas pa la ni dgos pa yod ma yin/ /gang rnams mkhar dang sa na bdag gi gdul bya rnams/ /de rnams thar
108a1(mdo 'grel): bar byas shing rgyun la bcug pa ste/ /'di las gzhan du slob ma rim dang rim rnams kyis/ /nga yi chos 'di skye dgu rnams la gnas par 'gyur/ /de phyir 'gro ba'i rang bzhin rnam par shes byas nas/ /bsam mno ma
108a2(mdo 'grel): byed? des par rnam par 'bral ba ste/ /rnam pa de ltar 'gral bar shes nas su/ /ji ltar 'di ltar ma yin da ltar gyis mdzod cig/ ye shes sgron mas mun pa rnam par bsal byas nas/ /srid pa rnams la snying po med par mthong
108a3(mdo 'grel): nus su/ /ji ltar nad ni nye bar zhi ba de ltar na/ /tshe? ni rnam par 'gags na tshim pa nyid yin no/ /dor bar bya zhing rtsod ldan lus zhes bya ba ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho yi rgyun ni rnam par 'gags pa na/ /don med byed pa'i dgra bo'i rnam par nyams
108a4(mdo 'grel): las bzhin/ /tshe ni nye bar zhi bas tshim pa ma yin su/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad rnam par 'god pa ste/ /de phyir khyed cag rnams ni legs par bag yod kyis/ /mya ngan 'da' ba' i dus ni yongs su gyur pa ste/ /khyed cag ma smra 'di ni
108a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gi phyi ma'i tshig/ de nas bsam gtan rig pa rnams kyi mchog gis ni/ /yud tsam de las sam gtan dang po thob mdzad nas/ /de las rnam par bzhengs nas gnyis par gshegs pa ste/ /rim gyi ma tshad med par
108a6(mdo 'grel): thams cad la gshegs so/ /de nas rjes su rim pas rab tu byed pa dgu/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs ni mdza' dag bsam gtan mdzad/ /de nas drang srong chen pos slar yang rim gyis ni/ /bsam gtan dang po de nyid la
108a7(mdo 'grel): ni babs pa'o/ /de las rnam par bzhengs nas kyang ni rim gyis ni/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni slar yang 'jigs pa ste/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i cho ga las de rnams bzhengs shing/ /mngon sum nyid du nye bar zhi ba la gshegs so/ /
108b1(mdo 'grel): de nas thub pa mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs pa na/ /tshar gyis bsnun pa'i ba lang bzhin du sa g.yos shing/ /phyogs kyi glang po rnams kyi sbyang ba bzhin du ni/ /nam mkha' las kyang sgron ma rnams ni lhung bar gyur/ /lha yi nags tshal sna tshogs shing
108b2(mdo 'grel): rta sreg 'dod pa'i/ /nags kyi me ni bar snang dag ma byung ba bzhin du bud shing med cing rlung med du ba med pa'i me/ /phyogs ni sreg par byed pa byung bar gyur pa nyid/ /lha min 'dzems par 'dod pa g.yul du 'jug pa na/ /khro ba brgya bas
108b3(mdo 'grel): khro ba rnam par gtong ba bzhin/ /de bzhin me stag brgya ba'i me ni skyug pa yi/ /dbang po'i rdo rje mi bzad pa rnams lhung bar gyur/ /'jig pa'i rlung rnams ngag gis btags pa rnams kyis bzhin/ /'dzin pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rtse mo rnams
108b4(mdo 'grel): lhung bzhin/ /'khri shing shing rnams dag ni zug rngu byed pa yi/ /phyag dar khur ba'i rlung ni drag tu g.yos par gyur/ /'dam gyis chus bsgos sdong bu gzhon nu rnams kyis ni/ /lus ni yongs su dkris pa'i dad pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /cung
108b5(mdo 'grel): zhig 'od zer kha dog ngan pa de rnams kyis/ /'od ni bcom ste zla ba mngon par gsal bar gyur/ /sprin dang bral yang mkha' la zla ba gnas na yang/ /mun pa mi bzad rnams kyis phyogs rnams rgyas pa ste/ /yud tsam de la mya ngan gyis
108b6(mdo 'grel): ni zil non zhing/ /chu bo rnams ni de ma thag tu chu dron 'bab/ /de nas nyes sar skyes pa'i shA li'i shing dag gis/ /rang gi me tog mdzes pa jug pa dus min la/ /rnam par btud nas drang srong chen po'i sku lus ni/ /gser gyi stegs
108b7(mdo 'grel): bu'i gzugs brnyen la ni yang dag gtor/ /mkha' la mgo bo lnga rnams mi g.yo klu rnams ni/ /mya ngan gyis slar so sor dmar ba'i mig can rnams/ /rab tu gnyid log gdengs ka bstod pa'i lus rnams kyis/ /thub pa la ni gus pas
109a1(mdo 'grel): lta bzhin gnas par gyur/ /nang du song ba'i kun nas gdung ba rnams/ /de rnams shin tu dron mo'i dbugs ni rgyus pa ste/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin mi brtag pa ni rtogs nas su/ /mya ngan 'ongs pa min
109a2(mdo 'grel): rnams mya ngan smad par gyur/ /nges par legs pa'i chos kyi cho gar rab zhugs pa/ /rgyal po rnams thos sras kyi 'dus pa dam pa de/ /chos la mngon par chags pa'i mya ngan ma byas shing/ /lha yi rten la mchi ma chung bar
109a3(mdo 'grel): ma gyur to/ /gcang mar lhag par gnas pa'i byed ldan lha rnams kyang/ /drang srong chen po'i yang dag shin tu gus ldan rnams/ /rang gnas gyur cing rnam par 'gyur ba ma song ste/ /'jig rten dag ni rang bzhin rnam par smad pa'o/ /dri za'i
109a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po rnams dang de nas klu yi rgyal po rnams/ /gnod sbyin rnams dang dam chos la dga' lha rnams ni/ /mya ngan byed cing mya ngan mchog la gzhal rnams kyis/ /rigs chen po yi nyam thag bzhin du mkha' 'gyur/ /yid la re ba thob pa'i bdud
109a5(mdo 'grel): kyi sde rnams ni/ /rab tu dga' bas skad ni mthon zhing rgod pa ste/ /'phyo zhing klu dbyangs gar byas dga' bar gyur pa rnams/ /rnga bo che dang rdza rnga pa Ta ha rnams brdungs/ /de nas rdo rje rtse mo bcom pa'i ri bo bzhin/ /chang dang bral ba'i gnyis 'thung
109a6(mdo 'grel): dga' ba med pa bzhin/ /nog gis rnam par dman pa'i dbyibs can khyu mchog bzhin/ /thub pa'i khyu mchog nub pan ni 'jig rten gyur/ /nyin mor byed pas rab tu dman pa'i nam mkha' bzhin/ /ba mos bsred pa'i pad+ma dang ldan rdzing bu bzhin/ /nor
109a7(mdo 'grel): dang bral zhing bya ba med pa'i rigs bzhin du/ /srid pa nyams mdzad rab tu nyams las 'gro bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//
109b1(mdo 'grel): de nas dad? pa stong? dang? ldan pa'i lha yin no/ /gzhal med khang nas gdong ni cung zhig rab btud nas/ /yud tsam thams cad mkhyen pa ni bltas nas su/ /lhan gnas pa chen po gzhan zhig gis smras so/ /kye ma 'gro na dngos po thams cad mi rtag cing/ /skye
109b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos can dang ni 'dzad pa'i chos can la/ /skye ba nams ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa ste/ /de dag rnams kyi lhag med zhi bas zhi ba nyid/ /skye ba'i bung shing tshad ma min pa bsregs mdzad nas/ /ye shes me lce grags pas rnam khyab du ba can//
109b3(mdo 'grel): chu yi me bzhin du ni dus kyi chu yis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i me de mya ngan 'da' bar bya/ /de nas mchog gi drang srong dang mtshungs drang srong bzhin/ /mtho ris gnas kyang 'bras bu rnams la ma chags pas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i dgra bcom drang srong mthong nas
109b4(mdo 'grel): su/ /ri dbang bstan pas tshig ni rnam par smas pa'o/ /'jig rten dag na dga' zhig nyams par mi 'gro med/ /de ltar 'gro ba med cing song ba med pa ste/ /mchog dang mchog mkhyen mchog gis don rig pa/ /ston pa mtshungs med gang du rab tu zhi bar
109b5(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /shes rab rnam par dag cing mchog gi spyan mnga' ba/ /yongs su 'dren pa po nyid 'di yis dman pa ni/ /rmongs pa nges par mig long gson pa'i 'jig rten no/ /'du shes nyams shing lam ngan la ni gnas par gyur/ /de nas 'gro ba'i 'gal ba
109b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin ma 'gags pa/ /rjes su chags pa nyams shing skye ba 'gags byas pas/ /'jig rten snang bas dman pa mthong nas su/ /thub pa zhi ba na ni zhi ba'i yid kyis smras/ /shes rab ldan pa 'du byed cho ga la gnas pa/ /dus 'dir nges par blo gtad bya
109b7(mdo 'grel): ba ma yin zhing/ /mi rtag nyid kyi rdo rje nges par ltung ba yi/ /gang du thub pa ri bo chen po bcom par gyur/ /snying po med cing de med rnam par nyams pa'i chos/ /'jig rten son pa'i 'jig rten gyi ma smod par shog/ gang du thub dga' drang srong chen po
110a1(mdo 'grel): seng ge yang/ /nyes pa'i gnyis 'thung rnams ni nyams par mdzad nas nyams/ /'dod chags bral ba min pa'i 'gro ba 'jug pa la/ /da ni 'jigs pa chen po ma yin su yi lags/ /thun mong las ni gang du de bzhin
110a2(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa yang/ /gser gyig ba lta bu kun nas chags par gyur/ /sa bon drug dang myu gu gcig dang gtor ma gcig/ /rtsa ba drug dang 'bras bu lnga dang yal ga gnyis/ /phung po gsum dang bdag nyid gcig la nyon mongs kyis/ /sdong
110a3(mdo 'grel): po 'di ni bcag nas thub pa gnyis 'thung gzims/ /'gro rgyal mnga' bzhin dgra bo rnams ni bcom nas su/ /chu med pa ni rma bya bzhin du chags bral zhing/ /mgyogs 'gro rta bzhin du ni rnam rgyal lam song ba/ /me bzhin thub pa skye
110a4(mdo 'grel): pa med cing zhi bar gyur/ /tho ris dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa mig 'phel na/ rab tu tshim byed rgyun bzhin gsung rnams gtang nas su/ /'od kyi nyam thag ba lang bzhin sar rnam rgyus nas/ /grags pas phyogs ni mngon par bkang
110a5(mdo 'grel): nas bla ma gzims/ /snyan grags ldan pa nyid dang 'od zer ldan pa ste/ /chu bi sin d+hu bzhin du gser skyug shugs ldan pa/ /rnam thos bu yi rdzu 'phrul mi skyong sder bcas pa/ /lam la bcug nas mi yi nyi ma nub par gyur/ /rmugs
110a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i do shal gyis ni phyogs dag bkris pa bzhin/ /rgya chen sprin rnams kyis dkris nyi ma'i 'od rnams bzhin/ /mchod sbyin rdzogs che mar gyi sman pa'i me bzhin du/ /thub pa zhi che de ring 'jig rten gsal ma gyur/ /mdud pa med pa bden ba'i
110a7(mdo 'grel): lam ni bsnyen nas su/ /mdud ba med pa zhi ba'i chos ni bsnyes nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni sku lus 'dren par nus na yang/ /sdug bsngal dag gis gter ni lus yin zhes spangs so/ /mun pa mun pa nyi mas bzhin du zil mnan nas/ /rdul ni rdul
110b1(mdo 'grel): ni char pa bzhin du mngon bcom nas/ /slar yang slar yang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor mi len te/ /thub pa thub pa skar rgyal bzhin du mngon par gshegs/ /gang zhig skye bas sdug bsngal 'joms phyir skyes pa skyes pa ste/ /gang la 'jig rten pas
110b2(mdo 'grel): ni zhi ba'i ched du bsnyen/ /gang zhig 'od zer mchog gi rnam par gsal ba dang/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i blo yis rnam par gsal bar gyur/ /gang gis skye dgu rnams ni dge legs la bcug ste/ /yon tan rgya chen rnams kyi sa la rgyas pa nyid//
110b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i snyan grags gsal ba rnams kyis 'phel ba ste/ /khyim na gnas pa yin kyang grags pas 'phel ba nyid/ /gang gis mkhyen zhes smod pas 'dong? ? shing/ /mi ni nyam thag rnams la brtse bas pos pa ste/ /bza' ba dan par rab tu
110b4(mdo 'grel): 'joms shing ma gsol la/ /bza' ba legs pa rjes su 'gro zhing ma gsol to/ /mi gnas dbang po zhi ba gang zhig yul rnams la/ /stobs rab dbang po nyid las yang dag mi gnas shing/ /gzhan rnams kyis ma thob pa'i lam bzangs thob pa
110b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /ro mkhyen pas ni nges par 'byung ba'i ro gsol to/ /gang gis sngar ma byin pa'i sbyin pa ste/ /'bras bu 'dod pas cung zad zhig ni ma byin la/ /mnyam nyid rjes mthun phun sum tshogs pa dor ba ste/ /dam pa rnams kyi yid rnams yon tan
110b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis phrogs/ /brtan pa rnams kyis g.yo ba'i spyan ni bsrungs pa ste/ /brtan par gshegs shing sems ni bsrung du bcug gyur la/ /dge legs rnams ni bsrungs shig 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ /chos skyes pa ni cung zhig 'dod par ma
110b7(mdo 'grel): mdzad do/ /brtan pas mi dge ba las mi dge rnams spangs nas/ /dge legs kyis ni dgra bo skyon rnams spangs pa ste/ /gang zhig blo yis nyes pa rnams ni kun spangs la/ /de ni 'phags min mi rtag nyid kyis nub par gyur/ /gang la chos ni yang dag
111a1(mdo 'grel): rjes song zhing/ dga' bas mchog tu nges pa rnam par bzung ba ste/ /me yis nor ni zos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /khyab bdag ye shes nor can de yang srog song ngo/ /brgyad po rnams la mchog tu sde mtshan lnga thul zhing//
111a2(mdo 'grel): gsum gzigs spyod pa gsum ni zad byed spyan gsum pa/ /gcig ni bsrungs nas gcig ni thob nas gcig rtogs nas/ /lci ba bdun rnams spangs nas bla ma gzims par gyur/ /gang gis zhi ba'i ched du lam ni gsal mdzad de//
111a3(mdo 'grel): legs pa'i skye bo zhi bas rab tu dang mdzad cing/ /nyon mongs ljon shing rab tu chags pa bcad pa ste/ /srid pa rnams las gus pa ldan pa rnams bsgral to/ /gsung gi bdud rtsis 'jig rten shin tu tshim mdzad cing/ /bzod pa yis
111a4(mdo 'grel): ni khro ba yongs su bzung ba ste/ /slob ma'i sde ni dge legs la ni rol mdzad la/ /dge legs don du gnyer rnams phra mo rtogs su bcug /legs pa rnams la chos kyi sa bon skyed mdzad cing/ /rgyu yi bdag nyid 'phags pa'i lam ni
111a5(mdo 'grel): thob mdzod la/ /'jig rten 'das pas 'phags pa min pa ma bstan cing/ /chos las ma gtogs gzhan la sbyar ba ma yin no/ /kA shi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ /blo dang ldan pa nyid kyis 'jig rten tshim mdzad cing//
111a6(mdo 'grel): gdul bya rnams kyi chos kyi cho gar spyad mdzad la/ /bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i ched du dge ba mdzad/ /gzhan rnams ma mthong ba yi de nyid mthong mdzad cing/ /yon tan rnams kyis chos byed rnams la sbyar ba ste/ /gzhan gyi lugs
111a7(mdo 'grel): rnams tshar bcad nas ni bskul gyur la/ /rtogs par dka' ba'i don ni rnam par shes par mdzad/ /thams cad mi rtag pa dang bdag med par gsungs shing/ /srid pa rnams su bde ba cung zad ma gsungs la/ /snyan pa'i ba
111b1(mdo 'grel): dan gyen du rnam par bsgreng ba ste/ /nga rgyal kab? mthon po rnam par bsgyel bar mdzad/ /smad kyang rang gi thugs ni bskyod pa ma yin zhing/ /thams cad la ni 'jug pa rnams la sred ma mdzad/ /rang nyid rgal zhing bying ba bsgral bar mdzad
111b2(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /zhi zhing pha rol 'khrul pa zhi bar mdzad rgyur la/ /grol zhing pha rol bcing ba grol bar mdzad pa ste/ /rtogs shing pha rol rmongs pas rtogs par mdzad pa'o/ /thub pa thub pas tshul dang tshul min mkhyen 'di nges/ /sems can rnams ni
111b3(mdo 'grel): yang dag gtam gyis rjes bzung nas/ /tshul min la dga' tshul min 'byung po rnams la ni/ /bskal pa 'jig pa'i chen chos bzhin rab tu gzims/ /tshu ldan sprin bzhin sa 'dzin ri bo nags tshal bzhin/ /'od ldan rgan po bzhin du 'od ldan
111b4(mdo 'grel): gzhon du bzhin/ /'jig rten dag gi lta byed bcom nas 'jig rten gyis/ /lta byed nye bar phrogs nas 'gros su 'di gshegs so/ /dbang phyug dam pa gang la ltung bas me reg cing/ /gang gi mchog tu zhi ba'i lam ni rnyed pa ste/ zhi ba
111b5(mdo 'grel): brnyes pa de ni gus pas mthong nas su/ /de ring 'jig rten gnyen bdun med cing gus pa 'dra/ /'joms par 'dod cing stobs ni rab zhugs bdud kyang ni/ /sde dang bcas pas gang ni thub par ma nus pa/ /'joms par 'dod cing stobs
111b6(mdo 'grel): zhugs bdud kyis de ring ni/ /de ni bdud kyis sbyor las 'joms par nus par gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni thams cad rnams ni 'dus pa rnams/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis zil non lha dang bcas pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa
111b7(mdo 'grel): gang rnams zad pa ma yin zhing/ /de ltar mchog tu mya ngan 'das pa thob ma yin/ /skye dgu'i rnams kyi snang mdzad gang gis 'jig rten ni/ /nye par skye ba me long bzhin du gzigs pa ste/ /rgyang ring du 'am nye bar mtho ris su 'am mthar//
112a1(mdo 'grel): lha yi rna bas sgra ni rnam par thos pa'o/ /bar snang dag la skar ma'i khang par 'dzegs pa ste/ /sa la rab tu zhugs kyang thig pa ma yin zhing/ /chu la rab tu gshegs kyang nub pa ma yin la/ /sku
112a2(mdo 'grel): yis rnam par 'gyur ba mang po rnams mdzad do/ /de rnams de rnams gnas rnams lam 'gros lam na bzhin/ /gang gis skye ba du ma rnams kyang dran pa ste/ /yid kyi pha rol rnams kyi yid kyi spyod pa rnams/ /dbang po las 'das sna tshogs
112a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang mkhyen pa'o/ /thams cad mnyam par rab zhugs thams cad mkhyen pa des/ /zag pa thams cad bcad cing bya ba thams cad mdzad/ /ye shes kyis ni nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /ye shes de nyid kun nas brnyes nas
112a4(mdo 'grel): gzims par gyur/ /skyes bu rnams kyi rno ba'i sems rnams btul ba de/ /rno ba ma yin blo rnams rim gyis drag bar mdzad/ /rigs las chos kyi nyes pa spang bar mdzad pa ste/ /'chi med ched du chos ni su yis ston par 'gyur/ /steng
112a5(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba'i 'jig rten nyam thag pa la ni/ /zhi ba'i ched du chos kyi 'thor ma su yis ster/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan las rang gi don mdzad nas/ /gzhan gyi nyon mongs dra ba su yis byed par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gzhol ba'i
112a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dag gi ni/ /zhi ba'i ched du ye shes dam pa su yis smra/ /shes pa med par gzhol ba'i 'jig rten dag gi ni/ /dge ba'i ched du ye shes dam pa su yis smra/ /ji ltar nyin mor byed pa 'od zer med pa dang/ /ji ltar chu bo sin d+hu
112a7(mdo 'grel): 'bab pa med pa dang/ /sa bdag rgyal srid dang ni rnam par bral ba 'am/ /de ltar 'jig rten 'jig rten mkhyen pas rnam par dman/ /blo yis rig pa bzhin du bde bas dbyangs bzhin du/ /dpal gyis mi skyod bzhin du bzod pas chos bzhin
112b1(mdo 'grel): du/ /de bzhin skyes bu mchog gis rnam par dman pa ni/ /'gro ba de ni yod pa dang ni med pa nyid/ /ji ltar kha lo sgyur bas shing rta bor ba dang/ /skya ba 'dzin pas gru dang tshul gyis sde dang ni/ /tshong dpon gyi mi tshong pa slan pas nad pa ste/ /de bzhin 'jig
112b2(mdo 'grel): rten bde bar gshegs pa rnam par dman/ /dbyar tha dang ni ston rar mkha' la sprin med na/ /rlung gis kyang ni mkha' ral bsnyen pa med pa na/ /'tsho bar 'dod pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal ji lta ba/ /de ltar thar 'dod rnams kyi nga ni nyam thag 'di/ /de ltar
112b3(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i don mdzad dgra bcom yin na yang/ /byed pa shes pa nyid kyi bla ma la zhugs pa/ de ni chags bral yin kyang srid pa'i skyon rnams dang/ /ston pas yon rnams la ni mang po rnams smras so/ /de nas chags bral mi rnams mchi ma 'thon pa ste//
112b4(mdo 'grel): stan pa btang nas dge slong tshogs ni mya ngan dang/ /'jig rten 'god pa'i bdag nyid can zhes rab bzung nas/ /bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams ni brtan las ma g.yos so/ /de nas dus kyi dbang gis gyad? rnams kyis thos nas/ /gung pa'i dbang gis skyen par 'thon
112b5(mdo 'grel): zhing song ba ste/ /khra yis stobs kyi zil mnan khrung khrung rnams bzhin du/ /kyi hud 'o rgyal zhes ni nyam thag 'thon pa'o/ /mun pa rab tu rgyas phyir thub pa rab gzims pa/ nyi ma 'ong med bzhin du de rnams kyis mthong nas/ /seng ge khyu mchog dmugs
112b6(mdo 'grel): tshe ba lang rnams bzhin du/ /gus pas drag tu cho des btab cing dus pa'o/ /chos dka' chos kyi bla ma rab tu zhi ba na/ /gus pa ji lta ba dang bsam pa ji lta bar/ /'o dod 'bod cing mchi mas mig bcom de rnams kyis/ /dpal ldan dam pa 'ga' zhig 'di ni
112b7(mdo 'grel): smras pa'o/ /gang zhig son pa'i 'jig rten gnyid tshe rab sad pa/ /'di de mthar thug gzims mal la ni gzims pa ste/ /chos ni rnam par 'dzin pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di de ni/ /mchod sbyin mdza' na dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bzhin du brtul/ /de
113a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma nges par blo gsal zhing/ /brtson 'grus tshad gdungs ye shes 'od zer stong ldan pa/ /nub par gyur tshe mi shes mun pa rnam bcom nas/ /'jig rten dag na slar yang mun pa 'di mdzad do/ /
113a2(mdo 'grel): 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gzigs nas su/ /da ni nges par 'jig rten mig ni bsgribs pa ste/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho chen po rgod pa'i dpa' rlabs las/ /'dren mdzad zam pa 'di ni nges par de ni rgud/ /de ltar 'di na kha cig snying rje bar
113a3(mdo 'grel): zlas shing/ /gzhan rnams shing rta'i rta rnams dud pa bzhin du sems/ /gzhan rnams skad bton gzhan rnams sa la 'gyel ba ste/ /bya ba de rnams de rnams sems can dbang gis byas/ /de nas dus su gser gyis spras shing sna tshogs pa/ /mche ba
113a4(mdo 'grel): rin thang chen po longs ma spyad pa'i khyogs/ /gyad rnams ngu bzhin drang srong la ni glang chen gyi/ /lag pa dang mtshungs lag pa rnams ni bcug pa'o/ /de nas dus dang mthun pa'i cho ga byas nas su/ de la phreng ba yid 'ong rnams pa sna tshogs
113a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /che ba dri mchog dam pa rnams kyis de rnams kyis mchod cing/ /de nas dga' dang gus pas mdza' dag bzung ba'o/ /re nas shin gzhon lus can gzhon nu ma rnams kyi/ /gdu bu rab 'khrol zangs mdog lag pa rnams kyis ni//
113a6(mdo 'grel): glog gi 'phan rnams dag gis sprin ni dkar po bzhin/ /'di la rin thang mchog gi bla bre bzung ba'o/ /de bzhin mi rnams kha cig dag gis gdugs rnams ni/ /phreng ba dkar po ldan rnams kun nas bzung pa ste/ /kha cig dag gis gser
113a7(mdo 'grel): gyi yo byad dang ldan pa'i/ /rnga yab dkar po rnams ni rnam par g.yabs pa'o/ /de nas khyu mchog rnams kyis bzhin du ngal ba yis/ /mig dmar gyad rnams dag gis khyogs ni bzung ba ste/ /sil snyan rnams ni rna ba'i yid du 'ong ba rnams
113b1(mdo 'grel): dbyar dus chu gter bzhin du mkha' la rab tu grags/ /phyogs kyi glang po'i dbang po rnams kyi bsgul ba yi/ /mdzes pa dang ni rtsub gyur shing rnams las bzhin du/ /me tog pad+ma la sogs de rnams de rnams ni/ /lha yi me tog rnams ni
113b2(mdo 'grel): lha nas lhung bar 'gyur/ /dbang po'i glang po las skyes glang po chen rnams kyis/ /nor gnas snying po'i chu skyes pad+ma rnams dang ni/ /man dA ra yi me tog 'bab bcas chags pa rnams/ /chu thigs zer mas 'thor ba rnams kyis mngon par
113b3(mdo 'grel): 'thor/ /de nas dga' ba'i tshal skyes lus mchog ldan pa yi/ /tsan dan dmar po'i ro ni rnam par dul ba dang/ /'bad pas ma bsgrubs bgo ba rnams ni dkar po rnams/ /dri za'i bu mo rnams kyis yang dag 'thor ba'o/ /rab tu g.yo ba'i
113b4(mdo 'grel): ba dan rnams ni bzung ba ste/ /phreng ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bkram pa ste/ /sil snyan rgya chen rnams kyis rjes su 'gro ba ste/ /zhi ba'i ched du zhi ba'i lam nas khyogs te drangs/ /gus pa dang ldan gyad rnams kyis te yongs bzung nas/ /thub  
113b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i mthu las lan brgyar mngon par phyag 'tshal zhing/ /de yi rnam par nyams pa kun nas ngu ba ste/ /grong khyer gyis ni dbus nas yongs su drangs pa'o/ /klu yi sgo nas zhugs te phyir rol byung nas ni/ /chu bo gser ldan zhes pa yang
113b6(mdo 'grel): dag rgal nas su/ /cod pan zhes bya'i mchod rten gyi ni rtsa ba ru/ /grags pas bsags pa de rnams kyis byas so/ /de nas shun pa 'dab ma dri bzangs a ka ru/ /tsan dan e la klu rnams kyis bsags bsags pa ru/ /mya ngan las
113b7(mdo 'grel): ni sprul bzhin dbugs sgyu de rnams ni/ /brtan min mig can rnams kyis thub pa'i sku bzhugs so/ /de nas lan gsum bkod kyang me yi sgron ma yis/ /de tshe drang srong chen po'i bsags pa ma 'bar ste/ /bab med ldan pa gzhu ni rnam par
114a1(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pa yis/ ma ning rang bzhin sa yi bdag po'i dpal bzhin no/ /lam dag tu ni rnam par 'ong ba'i 'od srungs ni/ /rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis sems ni gyur pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung tshangs
114a2(mdo 'grel): pa lta 'od de/ /gang gi mthu las me yis 'bar ba ma yin no/ /de nas de tshe bla ma blta ba'i don du ni/ /der ni dge slong skyen par nye bar song pa na/ /thub pa mchog la rab tu btung ba byas pa na/ /de ma thag tu me ni rang nyid 'bar bar
114a3(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis ma tshig thub pa'i sku gdung la/ /lpags pa sha dang spu dang cha shas rnams tshig nas/ /mar dang rlum dang bud shing yongs su rgyas na yang/ /mi yis rul pa tshig par nus pa ma yin no/ /de nas bdag
114a4(mdo 'grel): nyid chen po 'das pa'i de rnams ni/ /chu mchog gis ni dang bar byas nas dus su ni/ /mngon par bstod cing gyad rnams dag gi grong khyer du/ /gser gyi bum pa rnams kyis rab tu spyan drangs so/ /'di ni ri bo chen po'i rin chen khams
114a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ /dge legs gang ba chen po rnams ni 'dzin pa ste/ /mtho ris dag na lha yi gtso bo'i khams bzhin du/ /khams ni me yis log par sbyor ba ma yin nyid/ /byams pas yongs su rnam par bsgoms pa 'di rnams ni/ 'dod
114a6(mdo 'grel): chags me yis tshig pas rnam par spangs pa ste/ /de yi gus pa'i dbang gis bzung ba'i gdung rus rnams/ /bsil ba yin kyang bdag cag rnams kyi yid rnams sregs/ /sred pa 'joms mdzad gang gi mthu las khyab 'jug gi/
114a7(mdo 'grel): mkha' lding gis kyang khur bar nus pa ma yin pa/ /'jig rten dag na mtshungs med de yi rus pa rnams/ /mi ru gyur pa kho bo cag kis khur bar bgyi/ /e ma 'jig rten chos ni nges par stobs ldan te/ /chos la nus kyang nus
114b1(mdo 'grel): pas gang gis ma bzlog ci/ /gang zhig nyan pas 'gro ba mdza' dag khyab pa ste/ /de yi sku yi cha shas 'di ni bum par gnas/ /gang zhig bdag gi snang bas nyi ma bzhan snang zhing/ /de yi sa ni snang bas snang bar mdzad pa ste/ /gser gyi
114b2(mdo 'grel): mdog dang ldan pa de yi sku lus ni/ /me rnams kyis ni rus pa lhag mar byas pa'o/ /gang gis nyon mongs ri bo byas pa rnams phye ste/ /sdug bsngal thob pa na yang bstan pa ma phye zhing/ /sdug bsngal mdza' dag rnams ni bkag par gyur
114b3(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /drang srong de yi sku lus me yis bsregs pa'o/ /g.yul du dgra bo rnams kyi mchi ma phyung nas su/ /skyabs 'ongs rnams kyi mchi ma rnam par btul nas su/ /sdug pa na yang mchi ma ston pas ma bton pa/ /lam du mchi ma
114b4(mdo 'grel): 'thon zhing de rnams rnam par zlos/ /de rnams nga rgyal ldan zhing lag pa stobs dang ldan na yang/ /de ltar mya ngan byed cing nags bzhin grong khyer der zhugs shing/ /lam rnams su ni gdung de rnams ni skye pos mchod pa ste/ /mchod
114b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i don du gzhal yas khang par mdzes par byas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las mya ngan las 'da' ba bsngags pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //ji lta ba bzhin nyin zhag
114b6(mdo 'grel): 'ga' zhig de rnams kyis/ /de rnams mchod pa dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa ste/ /chab 'og rgyal phran pho nya bdun rnams rim gyis ni/ /de yi ched du grong mar deng ni nye bar 'ongs/ /de nas de'i tshe gang rnam thos nas dus su ni/ /nga rgyal las dang de
114b7(mdo 'grel): yi gus pa'i dbang las ni/ /gyad rnams thab mo la yang nges par song ba ste/ /sbyin pa la ni yid rnams byas pa ma yin no/ /de nas de dag rnams kyi rnam gzhan 'di rtogs nas/ /rlung bdun bzhin du mi dbang bdun po de rnams ni/ /gyen du zhugs
115a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gang gA'i shugs 'dra stobs tshogs ni/ /shin tu drag po rnams kyi ku sha zhes byar 'ongs/ /de nas grong ba'i skye bo nags mthar nas skyen par/ /mi skyong de dag rnams kyi 'khyogs 'gro'i sgra yis ni/ /'khras pa
115a2(mdo 'grel): las ni mgo bo rnams la bzung ba bzhin/ /'jigs pas rgyas pa'i gdong rnams grong khyer la zhugs so/ /de nas mi skyong de rnams grong khyer de bkag nas/ /glang po'i dbang po rnams bcings rtse mo'i nags rnams su/ /gyad mchog
115a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi mi mthun spyad du gyur pa rnams/ /rigs kyi rjes mthun cha lugs ldan rnams la gsos so/ /de nas mnga' yab mjes shing ring ba'i smin ma de/ /sgo yi mig ni rnam par btsums shing grong khyer de/ /mi dga' ba dang 'dus pa'i yan
115a4(mdo 'grel): lag ma bzhin du/ /dpung pa'i khyogs ni bteg pa nyam thag par gyur pa'o/ /rgyal po bdun po rnams ni bya ba gcig pa ste/ /dpal gyis 'bar zhing shugs kyis 'phro ba rnams kyis ni/ /mnyam du dus gcig la ni bza' bdun rnams kyi ni/ /'jigs pa dang bcas
115a5(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' bzhin du sa gyur to/ /sna rnams gnyis 'thung mos pa'i chang dri rnams kyis dang/ /mig rnams dpung gis bsnun pa'i rdul rnams dag gis dang/ /rna ba rnams ni rta glang rnga yi dbyangs rnams kyis/ /mi mo'i skye bo yi yang der ni bcom
115a6(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /de nas skyogs rnams nang du khu ba 'bab pa ni/ /mdun du bdar rnams sdogs byas rta ba'i tshogs rnams dang/ /glang po rnams kyis yongs bskor sgo ni phyed bkag ste/ /'gegs shing g.yul la phyogs rnams kyis byas so//
115a7(mdo 'grel): de nas shag ti ral gri mda' lag grong khyer pa/ /skrag pas dang ni dpa' bas ngo tsha btang ba rnams/ /khra rnams bzhin du dgra bo rnams la lta bzhin du/ /nye ba'i 'thab ra rnams su kun nas gnas pa'o/ /brtan min ldan pa kha cig 'od do?
