115b1(mdo 'grel): 'bod pa ste/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams tshogs nas dung ni rab tu sgrogs/ /drag tu dregs rnams kha cig rab tu 'phen pa ste/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams ral gri sngon po rnams 'debs so/ /de nas rgyal ba'i ched du gyad rnams 'thab 'dod cing//
115b2(mdo 'grel): gyad rnams bzhin du mtshan rnams sgrogs pa mthong nas ni/ /g.yul 'gyed yan lag ma rnams dag gis sems rnams dang/ /sman rnams dang mnyam mchod yon rnams ni g.yos par gyur/ /g.yul der thog mar 'gro bar 'dod pa'i bu la ni//
115b3(mdo 'grel): g.yul 'gyed yan lag ma rnams der ni yongs 'dar zhing/ /go cha bcings nas zhi ba'i shis pa byed pa ste/ /sems khral gdong rnams mchi ma bton pa ma yin no/ /sems khral gdong las gzhan rnams ri dags mo bzhin du/ /khyim thab 'gro bar
115b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i gzhu la 'phyangs pa ste/ /gang gi gdong ni 'thab la dpa' ba de mthong nas/ /bcings pa'i 'phro ba ma yin gnas ma yin/ /bum pa'i nang du yang dag bkag pa'i sprul rnams bzhin/ /stobs kyis de ltar rab tu 'phro ba de rnams ni/ /de ltar
115b5(mdo 'grel): rnam par bzhag pa'i gyad rnams mthong nas ni/ /mi dbang rnams kyis g.yul gyi ched du blo bsams so/ /shing rta glang po rta dang rkang thang dregs pa ni/ /g.yul la kun nas nye bar gzhol bar mthong nas ni/ /mkhas pa nyid kyis dang ni mdza' bo nyid kyis
115b6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gnyis skyes bre bos tshig ni 'di skad ces smras so/ /g.yul du dgra bo rnams kyi srog dang dregs pa ni/ /khyed cag rnams ni mda' yis 'joms par nus pa ste/ /rjod? pa tha dad gnas rnams bde bar mi nus na/ /pha rol bya ba gcig pa
115b7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni smos ci dgos/ /ci ste kun nas bkag pas pha rol 'joms pa la/ /blo ni byas rnams de ni rnam par zlog mdzod dang/ /nyes pa med pa'i grong ba'i skye bo 'gegs pa yi/ /rtser bar byed pa de ni chos ni ci zhig yin pa? dong du zhugs pa'i
116a1(mdo 'grel): nag po'i sprul rnams bgrod pa ni/ /gcig la gnas pa rnams kyis dus su dbugs pa bzhin/ /bkag nas rgyal ba mdza' gcig yod pa ma yin zhing/ /brgya la bkag pa rnams kyis rgyal ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /grong gi nang
116a2(mdo 'grel): du bkag pa'i gtam rnams bzhugs pa rnams/ /yid dang ldan pa nyid las mi rnams kyis thos nas/ /sreg bya rnams kyis mthong ba'i chung ngu'i me bzhin du/ /gzi brjid dman kyang legs pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi bdag nyid can rnams
116a3(mdo 'grel): grong du bkag na yang/ /'joms 'dod thob pa rnams ni dka' thub gyis gtor te/ /dpung ni zad par gyur kyang ku sha'i grong khyer du/? /lag pa sgra byed chos kyi stobs las rnam par rgyal/ /snyan grags ched dam yul ni 'thob pa'i ched dus/
116a4(mdo 'grel): mthar dag gang rnams kyis kyang mngon par thob pa ste/ /ba lang rnams kyis chu gnas nas chu 'thung nas bzhin/ /bor nas nor 'dzin bdag po de rnams sa la song/ /de phyir chos dang don ni yang dag mthong nas su/ /khyed cag rnams kyi zhi
116a5(mdo 'grel): pas 'bad pa mdzod cig dang/ /mda' yi 'pham pa rnams ni slar yang 'bar ba ste/ /zhi bas 'pham pa rnams kyi rnam 'gyur yod ma yin/ /'di kun khyed cag rnams kyi tshad ma ma yin te/ /khyed kyi stobs ni dgra'i stobs las 'gro bar nus/ /shAkya thub pa
116a6(mdo 'grel): gdal mchod par blo yod na/ /de nyid kyi ni gsung la bzod pas bsnyen mdzod cig /de skad ces sogs 'dod pa rnam par nges pa ni/ /bram ze'i drang pos dang ni rab tu dga' ba yis/ /rgyal po yin yang rjes su bstan nas legs pa nges/ /dge
116a7(mdo 'grel): legs smras? shing de nas de rnams kyis smras so/ /dus dang sbyar te mkhas shing phan la bshes kyis ni/ /tshig 'di khyed kyis rnam par smras pa ste/ /chos la dga' ba nyid dang stobs la rten pa las/ /rgyal po rnams kyis bsam pa nges par shes par mdzod/ /'dod pa'i
116b1(mdo 'grel): phyir dang khro phyir stobs phyir 'chi ba'i phyir/ /phal che bar ni bya bar song zhing 'gro ba ste/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas kho bo cag rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid la mchod pa la ni gzhu rnams bzung/ /nga rgyal don du mchod yon blangs la rtsod pa ni/
116b2(mdo 'grel): byis pa skyon dang drag po dag gis khyab 'jug byung/ /nga rgyal spang phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis/ /tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyi gang las yin/ /bu mo la ni sa skyong dag gi rgyal po rnams/ /gtum po long byed rnams ni rtsod par song ba
116b3(mdo 'grel): ste/ /'dod pa 'joms phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis/ /tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyid gang las yin/ /rgyal rigs zad phyir drang srong drag tu khros pa ni/ /ngan spong bu yis g.yul du mtshon rnams bzung ba ste/ /khro ba 'joms
116b4(mdo 'grel): phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis/ /tshe rnams dag kyang 'dod par mi bgyid gang las yin/ /lha mo sI tar mngon brjod 'chi ba yongs bzung nas/ /srin po shin tu dregs pa yang ni nyams pa ste/ /yongs 'dzin spong phyir mchod pa don du nged
116b5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis/ /tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyid gang las yin/ /e Di 'am ni pa ka zhes ni dgra 'phen zhing/ /rgyal rigs bya ba rnams ni de ltar nyams pa ste/ /rmongs min gtor phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis/ /tshe rnams dag kyang
116b6(mdo 'grel): 'dor bar mi bgyid gang las yin/ /de skad ces sogs 'jig rten dag na 'thab mo ni/ /skyon las skyes pa mang po rnams ni byung gyur te/ /ston pa bla na med pa'i gus pas 'chid ba dang/ /bcas pa yin yang 'thab mo mi bgyid gang las
116b7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de lta na yang bdag cag rnams kyi nges pa 'di/ /khyed kyi pho nyar gyur cig skyen par gshegs mdzod la/ /ji ltar don 'di 'thab mo min pas 'grub pa cig /de ltar bdag nyid kun gyis 'bad pa gyis mdzod cig /khyed kyi chos ldan tshig rnams
117a1(mdo 'grel): kyis ni ded? cag rnams/ /'thab par 'dod cing mda' yi tshe ba rnon po can/ /nang du rab tu 'phel ba'i dug ni 'thung ba rnams/ /sngags rnams kyis ni sprul rnams bzhin du bkag pa'o/ /de ltar bgyi zhes rgyal po
117a2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi tshig gzung nas/ /bram ze de ni grong khyer de la rab zhugs shing/ /ji ltar rim gyis gyad rnams dag ni mthong ba ste/ /mthong nas dus su tshig ni 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhu rnams lag na gnas pa'i mi dbang 'di rnams ni/ /nyi
117a3(mdo 'grel): ltar byi dor go cha 'bar rnams kyis/ /khyed cag rnams kyi grong 'dir nges par ro myang zhing/ /seng ge bzhin du rnam par 'gyid zhing gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyi ni shubs su bkod pa'i ral gri dang/ /gser gyi rgyab ldan gzhu rnams nges par
117a4(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa ste/ /thub pa'i chos dran nas ni chos min gyis 'jigs shing/ /zhu ba gsol bar byed de g.yul la 'jigs rnams min/ /de rnams mngon par 'ongs rnams sa yi phyir min zhing/ /nor phyir ma yin rgyags phyir ma yin dgra
117a5(mdo 'grel): phyir min/ /thub pa'i gus pas nged cag rnams kyi zhes 'di/ /de phyir khyed cag rnams kyi bya bas bkur sti mdzad/ /thub pa de la khyed cag gi dang deng cag gi /bla ma nyid du mnyam ste 'di las dal ba 'di/ /de phyir spun gyi tshogs ni
117a6(mdo 'grel): 'dus nas 'ongs pa ste/ /bla ma'i gdung rnams mchod pa la ni bya ba gcig /ji ltar chos kyi cho ga la ni ser sna nyid/ /nor rnams la ni ser sna de ltar skyon ma yin/ ser sna smra ba des pa nyid du skyon yin zhing/ /skyon ni chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa nyid yin no//
117a7(mdo 'grel): gal te mi sbyin par ni khyed rnams kyis nges na/ rdzong nas 'thon nas 'gron po rnams la bsnyen par mdzod/ /gang rnams kyis stobs mnga' rnams ma yin sgo glegs rnams/ /de rnams rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal rigs ma yin no/ /byams
117b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni gzi brjid ston par byed bzhin du/ /mi dbang rnams kyis khyed cag rnams la de skad smras/ /bdag gi smra 'dod gang yang rang gi rtogs nas su/ /dga' las bdag gis de ni khyed cag rnams kyis nyon/ /'ga' zhig rtsod pa dge ba
117b2(mdo 'grel): ma yin chos min te/ /rnam par 'gras par ma 'gro zhi ba bsnyen par mdzod/ /thub pa des ni bzod pa rab tu bsngags pa ste/ /gang gis gus pas me ni kun nas 'phel bar 'gyur/ /nor dang 'dod pa dag gi gcig gi ched du ni//
117b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtsod pa tshul ni nye bar gyur pa ste/ /chos kyi ched du slar yang 'phags par gyur pa ni/ /zhi ba dang ni dgra bo rnam par rtsod par smra/ /gang zhig nye bar zhi zhing byams pa'i thugs kyi ni/ /sems can thams cad rnams la brtsi ba
117b4(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa ste/ /thugs rje mnga' ba de la mchod pa ni/ /'tshe ba byas nas bdag gi lugs dang mtshungs ma yin/ /de phyir gdung ni rab tu sbyin las 'di rnams la/ /grags pa dang ni chos kyi yan lag bgo ba mdzod/ /de ltar gyur na khyed kyi
117b5(mdo 'grel): rtsod min de dag dang/ /de dag gis kyang chos dang grags pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /chos ldan skyes bu rnams kyis chos las g.yos pa ni/ /chos la 'bad pa las kyang ded? rnams kyis sbyor na/ /gang dag rnams kyi gzhan dag chos la sbyor
117b6(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyis chos ni gnas pa'i ched du 'jug /drang srong dam pa mchog gis chos kyis sbyin pa ni/ /sbyin pa thams cad kyis ni khyad par 'phags par gsungs/ /gang zhig la las nor la sbyor bar byed pa ste/ /chos kyi sbyin
117b7(mdo 'grel): pa po ni rnam par bsags pa yin/ /de nas snyan grags dang ni bde ba 'dren pa dang/ /chos kyi tshig ni de las nye bar thob nas ni/ /ngo tsha dang bcas phan tshun lta ba de rnams kyis/ /bre bo'i rigs mnyam bram ze la ni smras pa'o/ /e ma mdza' 
118a1(mdo 'grel): bo'i dge la khyod kyis nges pa ste/ /yon tan rnams la bram ze'i rjes su mthun pas chags/ /lam gzhan gyis ni 'khrul pa'i rta ngan rnams bzhin du/ /gang gis legs par bsnyen pa'i lam la bkod par
118a2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /ji ltar smras pa de ltar de ni ldan 'gyur zhing/ /brtse zhing gnyen pa'i tshig 'di 'dzin par rig pa ste/ /mdza' bo'i skye bo'i tshig la shin tu 'das nas su/ /phyi nas sdug bsngal nyid du lhung rnams mya ngan 'gyur/ /de nas 'gro ba'i khams
118a3(mdo 'grel): rig gdung ni gyad rnams kyis/ /de rnams brgyad du gus pas yon tan las bgos so/ /de nas rang nyid kyis ni cha shas bzung nas ni/ /bdun po so so so sor gzhan rnams la sbyin to/ /gyad rnams dag gis mngon mchong sa skyong
118a4(mdo 'grel): de rnams kyang/ /dga' zhing don byas rnams ni rang yul rnams su gshegs/ /de nas drang srong gyis gdung de rnams cho ga bzhin/ /rang grong rnams su mchod rten rab gnas rnams de byas/ /de nas rang gi yul du thub pa'i mchod rten ni/ /byed
118a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod bre bos so so bgos pa'i bum pa blangs/ /sol ba lhag ma rnams kyang pi sa la zhes pa'i/ /gus pas rjes su rab ldan rnams kyi bsgangs? par gyur/ /de nas gdung gi snying po can gyi sngon du brgyad/ /brag ri dkar po dang mtshungs/
118a6(mdo 'grel): mchod rten rnams gyur cing/ /de yi bum bas bsnyen pa bram ze'i dgu pa ste/ /sol ba'i snying po dang ldan bcu pa byung bar gyur/ /thub pa'i mchod rten sna tshogs pa ngan g.yo ba rnams/ /ti se'i gangs ri'i rtse mo dang mtshungs de rnams
118a7(mdo 'grel): la/ /rang gi skye bo dang bcas mi skyong de rnams dang/ /skye dgu dang bcas bram ze rnams kyis na mchod/ /phreng ba mngon sbyar rnams dang dri bzangs mchog rnams dang/ /phreng ba dge ba rnams dang sil snyan dbyangs rnams kyis/ /mchod
118b1(mdo 'grel): pa dam pa mi skyong de rnams de rnams kyis/ /rgyal ba'i gdung ni 'dzin pa de rnams la byas so/ /de nas dus su dgra bcom rnams kyi lnga brgya rnams/ /ri bo lngas mtshan grong khyer du ni yongs 'dus nas/ /slar yang ji lta ba bzhin chos ni
118b2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i phyir/ /thub pa'i gsung ni ri yi logs su yang dag bsdus/ /gnas skabs kun tu drang srong che las thos pa ni/ /kun dga' bo nyid yin zhes nges par gyur pa yi/ /dge slong de rnams kyis ni 'dus pa mthun pa ru/ /gsung
118b3(mdo 'grel): rab zhu zhes lus 'phags thub pa la zhus so/ /de nas de dag rnams kyi dbus su de bzhugs nas/ /smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshig /gang du gang la gang gi tshe na gang zhig dang/ /'di skad bdag gis 'di ni
118b4(mdo 'grel): thos zhes gsungs par gyur/ /de phyir dgra bcom rnams kyis rjes su bcings pa des/ /thub pa chen pos chos kyi bstan bcos gnas pa ste/ /gang zhig 'bad pas yang dag rab tu thob pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das shing 'da' la mya ngan 'da' 
118b5(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /dgra bo khengs pa rnams kyi mya ngan ster ba po/ /skye dgu sdug bsngal rnams kyi mya ngan gcod pa'o/ /me tog 'bras ldan mya ngan med ltar blta na sdug /dus su de gus sa bdag mya ngan med pa byung/ /'phags pa maurya? dpal
118b6(mdo 'grel): te skye dgu'i phan don du/ /'jig rten kun la mchod rten mtshan ma byed du bcug /gtum po mya ngan med nyid thob nas sa la ni/ /chos rgyal mya ngan med nyid las nges thob par gyur/ /mngon du byas pa'i mchod rten bdun po de rnams las//
118b7(mdo 'grel): drang srong de yi gdung rnams maurya des blangs nas/ /dpal ldan mchod rten ston ka'i sprin gyi 'od rnams kyi/ /stong phrag brgyad cur babs pa dus su zhag gis byas/ /dga' byed grong gnas mchod rten brgyad pa dang po ni/ /de yi dus su gus
119a1(mdo 'grel): ldan klu rnams kyis bsrungs te/ /de phyir gdung rnams thob pa ma yin rgyal po des/ /der byas pa lam dang rgya chen gyur pa'o/ /de phyir yid kyi dgra bo 'bras bu rnams la ni/ /kun nas gnas shing g.yo ba'i dpal
119a2(mdo 'grel): ni bsrungs na yang/ /mi skyong des ni ngur smrig gon pa las gzhan du/ /lta ba rnam par dag cing 'bras bu dang po thob/ /de las gzhan du gzhan gyis thub pa'i mchod pa ni/ /gang gis byas shing byed la byed par 'gyur ba ste/ /dam pa'i skye bos
119a3(mdo 'grel): bsnyen pa'i 'bras bu bla na med/ /de yis thob cing 'thob la 'thob par 'gyur ba nyid/ /drang srong bzhugs pa la ni mchod pa sbyar nas sam/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i gdung la phyag byas nas/ /yid kyi dang ba mnyam na 'bras bu mnyam
119a4(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mkhas rnams shes par mdzod/ /de phyir rtag tu mchog gi chos ni mkhyen pa'o/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur 'pho ba med pa brnyes ldan pa/ /brtse ba dang bcas thub pa blo gros chen po ni/ /mchod 'os mchog
119a5(mdo 'grel): la mchod pa dam pa 'ongs pa'o/ /mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan mchog gi thugs mkhyen pa/ /gzhan la phan phyir mchog tu ngal bar byon pa de/ /mdzad pa mkhyen pa nyid kyi dam pa mkhas rnams kyi/ /'di na gtang rag mchod pa gang
119a6(mdo 'grel): phyir 'os ma yin/ /sa na 'chi dang rga ba dang mnyam 'jigs pa dang/ /mtho ris dag na 'pho ba dang mnyam yod min te/ /'gro ba'i de gnyis mkhyen nas gang zhig gnas pa ste/ /de phyir mchod par bya ba dam pa su 'dra yod/ /skye ba yod
119a7(mdo 'grel): na bde ba min 'byung ba ste/ /yang srid med las shin tu bde bas bde ba med/ /de ni brnyes shing gang gis 'gro la byin pa ste/ /de phyir mchod par bya ba dam pa su 'dra yod/ /de ltar thub pa'i skyes mchog de yi gus pa yis//
119b1(mdo 'grel): mkhas nyid yon tan las min snyan dngags nus pas min/ /thub pa'i lung gi rjes su 'brangs nas 'di brtsams te/ /skye dgu rnams kyi phan dang bde ba'i phyir gyur cig /yul shA ke ta ka'i gser mig ma'i bu dge slong slob dpon snyan
119b2(mdo 'grel): dngags mkhan chen po/ /smra ba dang ldan pa phyogs su rnam par grags pa/ /btsun pa rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las sku gdung rnam par bgo ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yongs
119b3(mdo 'grel): su rdzogs so// //sa stengs brgya mtsho'i mthar thugs bstan pa'i bdag po'i mchog /yon tan mtshungs med phul byung du ma'i gter chen po/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi bla ma skye dgu rnams kyi dpal/ /bla ma dam pa chos kyi
119b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i bka' lung gis/ /'jig rten kun na zla bral skyes mchog de nyid kyi/ /phrin las sgrub pa brnyes pa'i thugs dgongs rnams dag dang/ /mi rje lha sras gung thang rgyal mo yum sras dang/ /chos la gcig tu dkar pa'i lha cig kun
119b5(mdo 'grel): dga' 'bum/ /mang yul skyi rong bzo mo yon tan skyid la sogs/ /chos ldan dam pa rnams kyis sbyin bdag 'gyid pa'i dor/ /'phags pa rta dbyangs kyis mdzad thub pa'i mdzad pa 'di/ /sa dbang? bzang po dang ni blo gros rgyal pos
119b6(mdo 'grel): bsgyur/ /'di bsgyur bsod nams rgyal po gang des pha ma dang/ /'gro rnams lam gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs te/ /nyes tshogs tshang tshing kun dang bdud bzhi'i rgyal po rnams/ /bcom nas chos kyi rgyal po thob par shog /dge des thub
119b7(mdo 'grel): bstan yun du gnas par shog/ //byang chub sems dpa' i skyes rabs chos kyi gaN+Da'i sgra sgrags pa slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi satwa dzA ta ka sya d+harmma gaN+Di/ bod skad du/
120a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa rabs kyi chos kyi gaN+Di/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab mtho brag ri'i rtse yi yul rab zhi bde ba'i longs spyod 'dug 'dug pas/ /de 'og
120a2(mdo 'grel): stag mo bkres pas rnam g.yos mdza' dag phyogs su mchi mar ldan zhum mig blta ba/ /bdag nyid bu yang bsad 'dod der ni thugs brtses rang gi lus byin mdag pa gang/ /de ni 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas 'dod lha'i stobs
120a3(mdo 'grel): 'joms chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 1 /rab tu dbang sbyor bdag po shi ba'i sa mi bdag dus rnam pa thams cad du/ /'jig rten gcig tu thugs brtses bskul te rgyas par sbyin pa'i chu yi char gyis mchi ma mdzad la/ /long
120a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i bram zes spyan ni gcig blangs pa las gnyis ka yang ni byin par gyur/ /rang dga' i mchog brnyes des ni srid pa gsum po'i 'jigs bcom chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra sgrags so/ 2 /grong khyer 'dir ni dman pa'i gla mis rang nyid
120a5(mdo 'grel): zas bcad don gnyer rang sangs rgyas zhig la/ /lhag zan changs pas yang dag bkur byas mchod pa de yis grong khyer der ni ko sa la'i/ /dbang phyug nyid thob dge ba yongs gyur rmad du byung ba'i rgyal por gyur te de la
120a6(mdo 'grel): 'dir/ /'jig rten gsum du ngo mtshar sgra sgrogs 'dir ni thub pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 3 /bsod snyoms don gnyer 'dod chags bral la bdag nyid mngon skyid bsod snyoms sbyin pa las/ /rab tu rab 'jigs
120a7(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba sprul te mngon par log brjod lha yi bu yis bkag pa las/ /de dag ma mnyan dmyal skyes pad+ma'i sdong bu mdzes la rim gyis gom pa dor nas ni/ /de 'dir bdud las rgyal gyur lha mi'i bla ma de yis chos kyi
120b1(mdo 'grel): gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 4 /sbyin la goms pas rab tu phul byung mdza' dag rtogs pa'i tshod dpon gang gi nor/ /lha yi dbang pos de yis nor spas na yang zad par ma nus de sbyin pa yi chos dang ldan/ /'di ltar des ni
120b2(mdo 'grel): phongs pa zil mnan nyams par byed bcom pa de yi/ /nyon mongs rab zad stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ston pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 5 /ri 'od lus 'dzin brgya byin lus gzhan bsgyur ba gang de rnam sprul du med pa yi me//
120b3(mdo 'grel): rab gsal gser gyi 'od 'tsher me stag tshogs 'phro mi bzad par ni mchongs nas byin par gyur/ /de ni dbang pos mngon par bsal bar bstan pa'i don du sbyin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar tshul/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mtshan de rjes thub pa
120b4(mdo 'grel): mchog gi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 6 /bram ze a ka ti zhes bya ba gang byung rgyas pa'i khyim skyes rtsa dang 'dra bar ni/ /bde bas yid byung rab zhi nges par byung ba'i gling ni nye gyur te/ /'dab ma bcos pa tsam zhig gis tshim de
120b5(mdo 'grel): yang dbang pos sbas byas mdza' dag rig mod kyi/ /gang 'dug des tshim bsten pas phun tshogs mdza' dag rtsod rgyal chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 7 /sa yi bdag po'i bla ma byams pa'i stobs ni byung gyur gang gi don gyi ming/ /bdag nyid
120b6(mdo 'grel): lus ni bdag gis bcad cing phug ste sha dang khrag dag zos shing 'thung gyur gang/ /gnod sbyin lnga ni thog mar mngon par byung pas de kho na nyid thob pas tshim mdzad rgyal ba nyid/ /gcig pu rjes brtse dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra
120b7(mdo 'grel): bsgrags so/ 8 /rang gi srog dang mnyam pa'i bu ni gsar ba'i lus dang yid 'ong btsun mo rjes su mthun pa dag /sdug bsngal zug rngur ldan pa'i mun sprul bram ze rab 'gyed bzhin yang rab dags? legs par byin/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub
121a1(mdo 'grel): tu ni smon lam mi g.yo gang gis thams cad sgrol de yi/ /srid gsum sman pa'i 'dod las rnam par rgyal par gyur pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ /mchod sbyin brtsams phyir rang gi 'jig rten dag
121a2(mdo 'grel): la 'di skad smras te skyes bu dag/ 'di ltar skye bo sdig pas mchod sbyin byad rnams myur du brlag byar 'gyur ro zhes thos kyis/ /'dir ni skye po'i tshogs rnams sdig pa las ldog dge ba bcu'i lam nyid la bzhag cing/ /'phel bar
121a3(mdo 'grel): byed pa gang yin thub de'i rjes su snyan pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 10 /lha min grong khyer tshal du lha rnams pa ma? gyur lhan cig bros tshe brgya byin gzugs 'dzin gyis/ /mkha' lding phru gu shing rta'i lam gnas nyams par mthong
121a4(mdo 'grel): ste lha rnams la smras brtse ba yis/ /bdag nyid gcig pu'i shing rta phyir log grong khyer sa gzhir zhugs te gang gis lha min las/ /rgyal gyur de'i rjes brtses 'gro ba gsum las rnam rgyal chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 11 /bram
121a5(mdo 'grel): ze gang zhig legs par spyod dang yul gzhan brtan zhing zab mo'i shas dang ldan dbul por/ /rang gi rnams gsal byas nas sus kyang ma tshor bar ni brkur rung zhes/ /mkhan po'i cho gas gzhan nor brlag bstan 'gog par byed
121a6(mdo 'grel): ldan de ni slob mas ma mnyan te/ /gzhan gyi nor brlag mi byed rnyog pa med pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so// 12 //bud med rin chen gang zhig ji bzhin don min mdza' dag 'jig rten myos byed byung bar gyur/ /sa yi bdag po shin tu gzhon
121a7(mdo 'grel): sdug de las skyes pa'i chags thob gyur na'ang gang de la/ /de las byung ba'i me yis bdag gi srog bsregs kyang ni tshul khrims lhod cing nyams ma gyur/ /de lha'i tshul khrims phung pos gsal zhing rab tu snyan pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra
121b1(mdo 'grel): bsgrags so/ 13 /gang zhig gru po'i chod pas 'gron bsgrubs 'dod pas gsol btab de dag bltas nas gru bor ni/ /dka' bas bdag nyid zhugs gyur rlung chen shugs rlabs kyis ni rgya mtshor bying? bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /bden pa'i tshig brjod pas
121b2(mdo 'grel): ni rlung gi grub bo phyir log dga' mdza' i ngos su khyer song gyur/ /rab mtho brten pa'i tshig des chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 14 /lteng ka nyi ma'i zer gyis bskams par gnyen tshogs dang bcas nya dag la ni kha la sogs/ /bya tshogs
121b3(mdo 'grel): rgyags pas phyogs kun nas bskor za bar 'dod pa rnams la bden pa'i tshig dag gis/ /byin rlabs gang brjod myur bar lha yi bdag pos char gyi rgyun phab? srog chags rnams la yid mthun pas/ /rjes su srung byed rab zhi'i rang bzhin blo gros
121b4(mdo 'grel): can de'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 15 /gang zhig chu 'dzin bzhin gyi zer las rgyal ba'i me yis bsregs te de dag rlung gis skyod pa yi/ /me rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khyab par byas te sreg pa phru gu za bar 'dod 'dra la /des ni zhi byed
121b5(mdo 'grel): bden pa'i tshig gi byin gyis brlabs brjod pa las zhi ba thob par gyur/ /rdzun gyi tshig las slar log bzod pa dang ldan de yis chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 16 /mi yi bdag po thams cad bshes gnyen chad 'thung ba las mngon par dga' ba
121b6(mdo 'grel): nyid gyur dbang pos ni/ /skyes bu de dag mthong ste bram ze'i gzugs bsgyur chad gis gang ba'i bum pa gang zhig thogs/ /mi bdag skye tshogs bcas pa de dag mdun du chang gi nyes pa gang dag bstan pa yis/ /de las des ni thams cad rnam
121b7(mdo 'grel): par btul te skyon spangs pa yi mthu ldan chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 17 /bdag nyid rigs dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig byung gyur 'dod pa rgyas pa'i khyim las yid byung nas/ /zhi bde 'dod pas zhi ba'i nags mthar song ste rab tu byung gyur pha
122a1(mdo 'grel): mtshungs nges/ /nye bar 'dod pa'i yid las gnyen cig de la rang khyim nyes pa mngon par bstan nas kyang/ /'dod bya?  min blo sa rab mchog gnas kyi bde rnyed de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 18 /pham dus 'das
122a2(mdo 'grel): khyim gyi bde las skyo bar gang gyur bas mdza' i nags su gnas bcas te/ /des ni dran gzhag bi sa la yi 'dab ma rtag tu rung ba kham gyi zas kyis 'tsho byed do/ /bstan de nyams sad phyir lha yi dbang po de song rang gang gi skal ba'i 'dab
122a3(mdo 'grel): min/ /nyin lnga brkus na'ang bsam gtan brtan pa bdud rtsi'i ros 'tsho de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 19 /rgyal po'i gnas chen gyur nas nor gyi bdag po na chod thog ma nad med pa ye? lus ldan zhing/ /gnyen tshogs rnams
122a4(mdo 'grel): la byams dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten dag gis de dpen mchog tu gyur pa gang/ /rab tu byung bar gyur ces 'di ltar mi bden par yang yon tan bsgrags pas bskul nas ni/ /legs par rab byung mdza' dag yon tan gtam gyi 'bras
122a5(mdo 'grel): bcas de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 20 /khyim gnas dga' yang nye bar spangs gyur gang gar brtse ba kho nas chung ma gcig yod las/ /bas mdza' gnas bcas rab ni? dga' bas gnas las der na rgyal po gang gis de
122a6(mdo 'grel): brtag phyir brtul zhugs legs zhes bston nas khyim 'thab 'phrog kyang rab tu khro ba nges? bcom ste/ /de la slar chos bstan rnams rgyal de'i rjes su chos kyi gaN+Di sgra bsgrags so/ 21 /sna tshogs yid bzhin mtsho ni dri ma med par
122a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin bzang mdun bdar dang pa'i rgyal po ni/ /rgyal po thob gyur blon por bcas bzung nas ni tshangs pas byin gyis rgyal po thob gyur te/ /chos bstan kun nas nyon mongs sra ba'i bya rnyi las grol gyur te 'gro ba gsum pa yi/ /nyon
122b1(mdo 'grel): mongs rnyi rnams rab tu bcom pa'i mkhas pa de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so// 22 /rgyal po gang gi gnas na gcig tu byams dang ldan pa'i kun tu rgyu zhig yod gyur la/ /de yi bka' rig nas ni bdag nyid de gnas log song?
122b2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gcig tu zhi ba'i nags mthar gnas/ /der ni mngon shes ye shes thob byas slar yang mi bdag gi yi log lta'i dra ba las/ /rab tu bspungs te lta bu spangs gyur sman ba de yis chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 23 /bas
122b3(mdo 'grel): mdza' gang du spre'u'i bdag nyid gyur nas mi yi yon tan las rgyal legs pa'i yon tan can/ /der ni mi zhig sdong po mchog chag g.yang sa cher lhung khud? bur tsho des 'don pa mthong bar gyur/ /mthong nas kyang ni 'di ltar snying la rjes
122b4(mdo 'grel): brtse yongs ldan gang des mchongs nas phyung ste ltas so/ /mi de rnams las srid gsum phan par mdzad pa de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrogs so/ 24 /mi bdag gang zhig dngos su ri dags shar b+ha yi ri dags bsad phyir rta la zhon nas ni//
122b5(mdo 'grel): mgyags brgyugs pa las khron par lhung nas de mngon song de g.yang sa las gang phyung gyur ba/ /mi nyes? pa dang bu yang mtshungs nyid lta bu kho nar byas te rjes su brtse ba yis/ /sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zang 'dzangs par gyur
122b6(mdo 'grel): de'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 25 /mi gang chu bos khyer gyur sna tshogs mdzes pa'i ru ru 'di tshigs kyis phyung nas su/ /'di skad mdags te 'jig rten su la 'ang ma smra kho bo gnas gang ma brjod ces pa las/ /des ni sa 'dzin ?
122b7(mdo 'grel): ni lag pas mi rnams la bstan 'khrig ma gcig ni tshang bar gyur/ /mi de'ang bskyabs shing ma'i bdag po la ni gdams byas de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 26 /gnas gang zhig na ljon pa'i ri dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu lhung gyur chu
123a1(mdo 'grel): pos khyer pa zhig/ rgyal po de yi mthu rtsal rjes su 'tshol bas rang gi gnyen rnams bsad 'dod ri ba'i rtser/ /rang gi rkang pa gnyis btsar rab tu sra bar bcings te sra bar byas nas mthar phyung nus/ /ngal bas
123a2(mdo 'grel): der ni bdag nyid dor gyur de yi rjes su chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 27 /brdzun las rab tu brtag pa'i skyon gyis nyams par 'os pa'i blo gros can yid rang gi lus/ /'dar zhing khro bas mi bdag 'jigs byed mig ni dmar
123a3(mdo 'grel): zhing nyon mongs ral gri rab tu bcom/ /bden pa'i don can bzod par smra bas rang lus ltos dor gang zhig 'gar yang mi bzod pas/ /rab tu gnod par byed la gnod bzod yid la byed pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 28/
123a4(mdo 'grel): mi yi bdag po yan lag byin ni mi dge chad lta rab tu bskyed la tshangs par gyur pa yis/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar gnas te rab tu gsal ba'i tshig gis sun phyung 'jig rten gzhan pa ni/ /thugs brtses bsrungs te mi shes pa yi
123a5(mdo 'grel): mun pas mdza' dag rab tu bcom nas mi bden pa'i/ /lta ba'i dra ba gcod byed blo gros ldan pa de yis chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 29 /shin tu 'thug pa'i nags su gnas nas phyung tshe mi bdun brgya mthong nas nye ba'i//
123a6(mdo 'grel): ri ba'i steng na glang chen mchog ni shi ba'i sha yod song la lam rgyags byos zhes smras/ /glang po'i rgyal po gang zhig brtse bar ldan bya'i ri bo'i rtse nas bdag nyid lus mchongs ngor/ /srog chags rnams la byams ldan rdul rnams
123a7(mdo 'grel): spangs pa de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 30 /gang zhig shin tu dul bas tsha gdung mi yi rgyu ma dang ni sha tshil glo bas mngon gang bar/ /su nga sa ni chos kyi dbyig gus dpe med brtse ba brtson 'grus bden pa rab tu
123b1(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs/ /de thabs smon pas srog chags sman pa dad ni bde ba'i chogs srid pa'i gnas/ /sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug bsngal slar bzlog pa yi don byas chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 31 /na dang skye ba la sogs zug rdur 'jigs pa
123b2(mdo 'grel): mang po mthong ste 'bar ba'i me stag rab 'phro ba'i/ /khang pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ni 'gro ba'i mdza' dag skyo ba'i sems gyur cing/ /rgyal po'i phun tshogs ji ltar rtsa bzhin gang spangs lcags khyim chen por bsrungs na yang/ /nags
123b3(mdo 'grel): mthar rab tu song gyur de yi rjes su legs pa'i spyod ldan chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 32 /rtag tu mang po'i rnam pa rnam par gnod byed yal ga ri dags gdug pa 'khrugs pas ni/ /gang 'dod mchog gi lus can lang
123b4(mdo 'grel): tsho ldan pa'i ma he la ni gnod sbyin gyis bskul nas/ /gang brjod mdza' dag shin tu bzod ldan yon tan gter gyur thar pa'i lam gyi gtso/ /bzod pa'i 'byung gnas dang mtshungs pa yi mi g.yo de yi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra
123b5(mdo 'grel): bsgrags so/ 33 /gang zhig 'dab shog rgyas pa yon tan brgya phrag rab mchog yang dag brgyan pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /bya zhig byung gyur ri dags dgra yi mgrin par rus pa'i dum bu ring po zug pa phyung byas te/ /ri dags nges
123b6(mdo 'grel): slar bsad cing za phyir brnyas thob gyur mong de ni nus na'ang khro ma gyur/ /bzod pa'i zhing de'i mchi med rang bzhin 'bras bu bcas gyur chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags so/ 34 /ji srid ri rab nyi ma zla bas rab gsal rtse nas 'ong chen 'phros pas
123b7(mdo 'grel): snang bar byas ljongs dang/ /ji srid chu bo 'dzin khri nya dang chu srin rlung rnams kyis dkrugs gnas ni lany+tshwa'i rgya mtsho dang/ /ji srid sa ni ri dang ljon shing nags chal grong dang grong khyer ljongs dang stong rgyun 'bab bcas gnas/ /de srid mdor na ston
124a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i bka' yis srid pa'i khang pa mi bzad lhung gyur 'gro ba mdza' dag rab zhi shog/ byang chub sems dpa' i skyes pa'i rabs kyi chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra bsgrags pa snyan dngags mkhan chen po slob dpon dpa' bos
124a2(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po la che shAkya sh+rI bzang? po dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur// //dge legs su gyur cig/ /
124a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ rA dza pa ri ka thA radna mA li/ bod skad du/ rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
124a4(mdo 'grel): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes pa kun las rnam grol zhing/ /yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig po/ /thams cad mkhyen la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rgyal po khyod la chos bsgrub phyir/ /gcig tu dge ba'i chos kyi
124a5(mdo 'grel): bshad de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi snod la ni/ /chos 'grub 'gyur te gang zhig la/ /dang bor mngon par mtho ba'i chos/ /phyi sa ni nges par legs 'byung ba/ /gang phyir mngon par mtho thob nas/ /rim gyis nges par legs pa 'ong/ /de la mngon mtho
124a6(mdo 'grel): bde ba ste/ /nges par legs pa thar par 'dod/ /de yi bsgrub pa mdor bsdu na/ /mdor na dad dang shes rab bo/ /dad can nyid phyir chos la brten/ /shes rab ldan phyir yang dag rig /'di gnyis gtso bo shes rab ste/ /'di sngon 'gro ba dad pa yin//
124a7(mdo 'grel): 'dun dang zhe sdang 'jigs pa dang/ /rmongs pas gang zhig chos mi 'da' / /de ni dad pa can zhes bya/ /des par legs pas snod mchog yin/ /gang zhig lus ngag yid kyi las/ /thams cad legs par yongs brtags te/ /bdag dang
124b1(mdo 'grel): gzham la phan shes nas/ /rtag tu byed pa de mkhas pa/ /mi bsod pa dang rku spod dang/ /gzhan gyi chung ma spong ba dang/ /log dang phra ma rtsub nyid dang/ /ma 'brel smra pa yang dag sdom/ /chags dang gnod sems
124b2(mdo 'grel): med pa la/ /nyid kyi lta ba yongs sped pa/ /'di dag las lam dkar bcu ste/ /bzlog pa dag ni nag po yin/ /chad mi 'thung rang 'tsho ba bzad/ /rnam mi 'che dad gus sbyin dang/ /mchod 'os mchod dang byams pa ste/ /mdod na
124b3(mdo 'grel): chos ni de yin na/ /lus gdung byed pa 'ba' zhig las/ /chos med 'di ltar de yis ni/ /gzhan la gnod pa spong med cing/ /gzhan la phan 'dogs yod ma yin/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod gsal ba// /dam chos lam po che
124b4(mdo 'grel): la gang/ /ma gus lus gdung gnag lam lta'i/ /lam gol dag nas 'gro ba de/ /'khor ba'i 'brog ni mi bzad pa'i/ /mdza' yas skye bo shing can du/ /nyon mongs gdug pas 'khyud pa'i lus/ /shin tu yun ring 'jug par
124b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gsod pa yis ni che thung 'gyur/ /rnam par 'che bas gnod pa mang/ /brku ba yis ni longs spyod phongs/ /byi bo byed pas dag dang bcas/ /brdzun du smra bas skur ba ste/ /phra ma yis ni bshes dang 'byed/ /tshig rtsub nyid gyis
124b6(mdo 'grel): mi snyan thos/ /ma 'brel ba yis tshig mi bcun/ /brnab sems yid la re? ba 'joms/ /gnod sems 'jigs pa sbyin par byed/ /log par lta bas lta ngan nyid/ /chang 'thung bas ni blo 'khrul te/ /sbyin pa ma gtang dbul ba nyid/ /log
124b7(mdo 'grel): par 'tsho? bsab slus pa ste/ /khengs pa yis ni rigs ngan nyid khrag dog gis ni gzi chung nyid/ /khro pas kha dog don ba nyid/ /mkhas la mi 'dri blun pa nyid/ /mi nyid la ni 'bras bu nyid/ /kun gyis dang po ngan 'gror ro/ /mi dge zhes
125a1(mdo 'grel): bya de dag gi/ rnam smin bsgrags ba gang yin pa/ /dge ba dag ni thams cad la/ /'bras bu de ni bzlog te 'byung/ /chags dang zhe sdang gti mug dang/ /des bskyed las ni mi dge ba/ /ma chags zhe sdang gti mug med/ /des
125a2(mdo 'grel): bskyed las de dge ba yin/ /mi dge ba las sdug bsngal kun/ /de bzhin ngan 'gro thams cad do/ /dge las bde 'gror thams cad dang/ /skye ba kun tu bde ba dag/ yid dang lus dang ngag gis ni/ mi dge kun las ldog bya zhing/ /dge la rtag?
125a3(mdo 'grel): tu 'jug bya ba/ /chos 'di rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /chos 'dis dmyal pa yi dags dang/ /dud 'gro dag las rnam grol zhing/ /lha dang mi yi nad dag tu/ /bde dpal rgyal srid rgyas pa 'thob/ /bsam gtan tshad med gzugs med kyi//
125a4(mdo 'grel): tshangs sogs bde ba myong bar byad/ /de ltar mngon mtho'i chos 'di dang/ /de yi 'bras bu mdor bsdus pa'o/ /nges par legs pa'i chos dag kyang/ /phra zhing zab par snang ba dang/ /byes pa thos dang mig ldan la/ /skrag par byed par rgyal bas
125a5(mdo 'grel): gsungs/ /bdag yod ma yin yod mi 'gyur/ /bdag gi yod min mi 'gyur zhes/ /byis pa dag ni de ltar skrag/ mkhas pa la ni skrag pa zad/ /skye dgu 'di ni ma lus pa/ /ngar 'dzin pa las byung ba dang/ /de yir 'dzin ldan skye dgu
125a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /phan pa gcig tu gsung bas gsungs/ /bdag yod bdag gi yod ces pa/ /'di ni dam pa'i don du log /gang phyir yang dag ji lta ba/ /yongs su shes pas gnyis mi 'byung/ /ngar 'dzin las byung phung po rnams/ /ngar 'dzin
125a7(mdo 'grel): de ni don du brdzun/ /gang gis sa bon brdzun pa de'i/ /skye ba bden pa ga la zhig /phung po de ltar mi bden par/ /mthong nas ngar 'dzin spong par 'gyur/ /ngar 'dzin ba dag spangs nas ni/ /phyis ni phung po 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar me long
125b1(mdo 'grel): brten nas su/ /rang bzhin gzugs brnyan? snang mos kyi/ /de ni yang dag nyid du na/ /cung bzad kyang ni yod min pa/ /de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas/ /ngar 'dzin pa ni dmigs par 'gyur/ /rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs rnyan bzhin/ /yang
125b2(mdo 'grel): dag nyid du de dga' med/ /ji ltar me long ma brten par/ /rang bzhin gzugs brnyan mi snang ltar/ /phung po rnams la ma brten par/ /ngar 'dzin pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo yis ni/ /de lta bu yi don thos nas/ /chos
125b3(mdo 'grel): la mig thob bdag nyid kyi/ /dge slong rnams la bzlas te smras/ /ji srid phung por 'dzin yod pa/ /de srid de la ngar 'dzin yod/ /ngar 'dzin yod na yang las te/ /de las yang ni skye ba yin/ /lam gsum thog mdza' dbus med pa//
125b4(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor mgal me yi/ /dkyil 'khor lta bur phan tshun gyi/ /rgyu can 'di ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de ni rang bzhin gnyis ka dang/ /dus gsum nyid duAng ma thob phyir/ /ngar 'dzin pa ni zad par 'gyur/ /de nas las dang skye ba
125b5(mdo 'grel): yang/ /de ltar rgyu 'bras skye ba dang/ /de dag zad pa nyid mthong nas/ /yang dag nyid du 'jig rten la/ /yod med nyid du mi sems so/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa yis/ /chos 'di thos nas rtog med pa/ /mi 'jigs gnas la sngar ba
125b6(mdo 'grel): dag/ yongs su mi shes phyir skrag go/ mya ngan 'das la 'di dag kun/ /med par gyur na khyod mi 'jigs/ /'dir de med par bshad pa la/ /khyod ni ji ste 'jigs par byed/ /mthar la bdag med phung po med/ /gal te thar ba de 'dra
125b7(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /bdag dang phung po gsal ba la/ /'dir ni khyod ko cis mi dga' / /mya ngan 'das pa dngos med pa'ang/ /min na de dngos ga la yin/ /dngos dang dngos med der 'dzin pa/ /zad pa mya ngan 'das shes bya'o/ /mdor na med par lta
126a1(mdo 'grel): ba nyid/ /las kyi 'bras bu med ces pa/ /bsod nams ma yin ngan song ba/ /de ni log par lta zhes bshad/ /mdor na yod par lte ba nyid/ /las kyi 'bras bu yod ces pa/ /bsod nams bde 'gro rgyu mthun
126a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /yang dag lta pa zhes bshad do/ /shes pas med dang yod zhi'i phyir/ /sdig dang bsod nams las 'das pa/ /de yi ngan 'gro bde 'gro la/ /de ni thar par dam pas bshad/ /rgyu dang bcas pas skye mdza' bas/ /med pa nyid
126a3(mdo 'grel): las 'das pa yin/ /rgyu dang bcas pas 'gag mthong bas/ /yod pa nyid duAng khas mi len/ /sngar skyes pa dang lhan cig skyes/ /rgyu min don du rgyu med do/ /gtags dang yang dag nyid du na/ /skye pa 'ang rab tu ma grags phyir
126a4(mdo 'grel): 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung dper/ /ring po yod pas thung ngu bzhin/ /'di skyes pas na 'di skyes dper/ /mar me skyes pas 'od bzhin no/ /ring po lta na thung du nyid/ /rang gi ngo bo las ma yin/ /mar me byung ba med ba'i phyir/ /'od
126a5(mdo 'grel): kyang 'byung ba med pa bzhin/ /de ltar rgyu 'bras skye mthong zhing/ /'jig rten 'di na ji bzhin du/ /spros las byung bar khas blangs pas/ /med pa nyid du khas mi len/ /'gog pa spros las ma byung pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin nyid gyur pa//
126a6(mdo 'grel): khas len yod pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /des na gnyis med rten pa grol/ /thag rings nas ni mthong ba'i gzugs/ /nye ba rnams kyis gsal bar mthong/ smig rgyu gal te chu yin na/ /nye ba rnams kyi cis mi mthong/ /ji ltar ring ba rnams
126a7(mdo 'grel): kyis ni/ /'jig rten 'di ni yang dag mthong/ /de ltar de dang nye rnams kyi/ /mi mthong mtshan med smig rgyu bzhin/ /ji ltar smig rgyu chu 'dra ba/ /chu min don du ma yin pa/ /de bzhin phung po bdag 'dra ba/ /de dag bdag min don du min
126b1(mdo 'grel): smig rgyu la ni 'di chu zhes/ /bsam de de ni song ba las/ /gal te chu de med do zhes/ /'dzin pa de ni blun pa nyid/ /de bzhin smig rgyu lta bu yi/ /'jig rten yod pa 'ang med pa zhes/ /'dzin pa de ni rmongs pa ste/ /rmongs pa yod na mi grol
126b2(mdo 'grel): lo/ /med pa pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ yod pa pa ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes phyir/ /gnyis la mi bden thar par 'gyur/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes pas/ /med dang yod par mi 'dod pa/ /de phyir med pa par gyur na/ /ci phyir
126b3(mdo 'grel): yod pa par mi 'gyur/ /gal te yod pa sun phyung bas/ /don gyis 'di ni med par bslan/ /de bzhin med pa sun phyung bas/ /yod par ci yi phyir mi ba slan/ /gang dag don gyi de nyid du/ /dam ni 'cha' zhing mi spyod pa/ /byang chub rten
126b4(mdo 'grel): phyir sems med na/ /de dag ji ltar med par bshad/ /gang zag phung por smra ba yi/ /'jig rten grangs can 'ug phrug dang/ /gos med bcas la gal te zhig/ yod med 'das pa sman dris/ /de phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /bstan pa
126b5(mdo 'grel): 'chi med yod med las/ /'das pa zab mo 'di bshad pa/ /chos kyi khud pa yin zhes kyis/ /zhig gnas 'gro med 'od med cing/ /skad cig kyang ni mi gnas pa/ /de ltar dus gsum 'das pa'i bdag/ 'jig rten don du ci
126b6(mdo 'grel): yod dam/ /gang phyir gnyis ka'ang yang dag tu/ /'gro dang 'od dang gnas med pa/ /de phyir 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /don du khyad par ji lta bu/ /gnas pa med phyir skye ba dang/ /'gag pa yang dag nyid min na/ /skye ba dang ni
126b7(mdo 'grel): gnas pa dang/ /'gag pa don du ga la zhig/ gal te rtag tu gyur na ni/ /ji ltar skad cig ma yin dngos/ /gal te 'gyur ba med na ni/ /don du gzhan nyid ga la 'gyur/ /phyogs gcig gam ni thams cad du/ /zad pa
127a1(mdo 'grel): skad cig 'gyur grang na/ /mi 'dra ba nyid mi dmigs phyir/ /de rnams gnyis ka rang rigs ldan min/ /skad cig yin na ril med phyir/ /rnying ba 'ga' lta ga la zhig/ brtan phyir skad cig min na yang//
127a2(mdo 'grel): rnying pa dga' lta ga la zhig/ ji ltar skad cig mdza' yod pa/ /de bzhin thog ma dbus brtag go /de ltar skad cig gsum bdag phyir/ /'jig rten skad cig gnas pa min/ /thog ma dbus dang tha ma yang/ /skad cig bzhin du
127a3(mdo 'grel): bsam par bya/ /thog ma dbus dang tha ma nyid/ /rang bzhin las kyang ma yin no/ /tha dang phyogs phyir gcig bu min/ /phyogs med pa ni 'ga' yang med/ /gcig med par ni du ma'ang med/ /yod pa med phyir med pa'ang med/ /
127a4(mdo 'grel): zhig pa'am ni gnyen po yis/ /yong nyid med par 'gyur gras? na/ /yod pa srid pa ma yin phyir/ /'jig pa'am gnyen por ji ltar 'gyur/ /de phyir mya ngan 'das pa yis/ /'jig rten don du 'grib mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten mdza' dang ldan
127a5(mdo 'grel): nam zhes/ /zhus na rgyal ba mi gsung phyir/ /de ltar zab pa'i chos rnams ni/ /snod min 'gro la mi gsung ba/ /de nyid phyir na mkhas rnams kyis/ /kun mkhyen thams cad mkhyen par shes/ /de ltar nges par legs? pa'i chos/ /zab mo
127a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su 'dzin med cing/ /gnas med ces ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thams cad gzigs pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /gnas med chos 'dis skrag pa yis/ /skye bo rnams la mngon dga' zhing/ /yod dang med las ma? 'das pa/ /mi mkhas pa
127a7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni 'phung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs min gnas 'jigs de dag ni/ /phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed/ /rgyal po phung pa de dag gis/ /ci nas mi phur de ltar gyis/ /rgyal po khyod ni mi phung bar/ /bgyi slad? 'jig rten 'das kyi tshul/
127b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis la mi rten yang dag pa/ /ji bzhin lung gi dbang gis bshad/ /sdig dang bsod nams bya ba 'das/ /zab mo bkrol ba'i don dang ldan/ /mu stegs gzhan dang rang gi yang/ /gnas med 'jigs pas ma myongs pa'o/ /skyes bu sa min
127b2(mdo 'grel): chu ma yin/ /me min rlung min nam mkha' min/ /rnam shes ma yin kun min na/ /de las gzhan don skyes bu gang/ /skyes bu khams drug 'dus pa'i phyir/ /yang dag ma yin ji lta ba/ /de bzhin khams ni re re la'ang/ /'dus phyir yang dag nyid
127b3(mdo 'grel): du min/ /phung po bdag min der de min/ /de la de min de med min/ /phung bdag me shing ltar 'dres min/ /de phyir bdag ni ji ltar yod/ /'byung gsum pa min 'di la min/ /de la 'di min de med min/ /re re'ang de bzhin de yi phyir/ /'byung
127b4(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyang bdag bzhin brdzun/ /sa chu me dang rlung rnams ni/ /re re'ang ngo bo nyid du med/ /gang gsum med par re re med/ /gcig med par yang gsum med do/ /gal te gsum med re re med/ /gcig med par yang gsum de min/ /
127b5(mdo 'grel): so sor yod pa ma yin te/ /ji ltar 'dus pa skyed par 'gyur/ /'on te so sor rang yod na/ /bud shing med par me cis med/ /g.yo dang thogs dang spud pa dang/ /chu dang rlung dang sa de bzhin/ /'on te mi'ang grags yin na/ /ji ltar khyod
127b6(mdo 'grel): kyis gsum gzhan rang/ /gsum po rten cing 'byung ba dang/ /chos mi mthun par rung ba'ang min/ /so sor rang yod de dag ni/ /ji lta bur na phan tshun yod/ /so sor rang yod ma yin pa/ /de dag ji ltar phan tshun yod/ /gal te so sor
127b7(mdo 'grel): rang med kyi/ /gang na gcig der lhag ma rnams/ /so so rang gi yod ce na/ /ma 'dres pa rnams gcig gnas med/ /'dres pa so sor rang yod min/ /so sor rang yod 'byung ba rnams/ /so so'i rang mtshan ga la yod/ /so so rang med
128a1(mdo 'grel): shas cher med/ /mtshan nyid dag ni kun rdzob bshad/ /kha dog dri ro reg pa dag /de da gla yang tshul 'di yin/ /mig dang rnam shes gzugs rnams dang/ /ma rig las dang skye ba dang/ /byed po las dang bya
128a2(mdo 'grel): ba grangs/ /ldan dang rgyu 'bras dus dang ni/ /thung dang ring sogs shes bya dang/ /ming dang ming can de bzhin no/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /ring thung phra dang spom nyid dang/ /dge sogs nyid ni rnams shes su/ /'gag par 'gyur
128a3(mdo 'grel): zhes thub pas gsungs/ /rnams shes bstan med mdza' yas pa/ /kun tu bdag po de la ni/ /sa dang chu dang me dang ni/ rlung gi gnas thos 'gyur ma yin/ /'dir ni ring dang thung ba dang/ /phra spom dge dang mi dge dang/ /'dir ni
128a4(mdo 'grel): ming dang gzugs dag kyang/ /ma lus par ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /gang ma shes phyir rnam shes la/ /sngon chad 'byung ba de kun ni/ /de shes phyir na rnams shes su/ /phyis ni ji ltar 'gag par 'gyur/ /rnam shes me yi bud
128a5(mdo 'grel): shing ni/ /'gro chos 'di kun yin par 'dod/ /de dag ji bzhin rab 'byed ba'i/ /'od dang ldan pas bsregs nas zhing/ /mi shes pa ni sngon brtags pa/ phyis ni de nyid nges pa dang/ /gang tshe dngos po mi rnyed pa/ /de tshe dngos
128a6(mdo 'grel): med dag la 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi dngos po ming tsam phyir/ /nam mkha' yang na ming tsam mo/ /'byung med gzugs lta ga la yod/ /de phyir ming tsam nyid kyang yin/ /tshor dang 'du shes 'du byed dang/ /rnam shes 'byung
128a7(mdo 'grel): ba lta bu dang/ /bdag nyid du ni bsam bya ste/ /de phyir khams drug bdag med do/ /rin po che'i phreng ba las/ /mngon par mtho pa dang nges par legs pa bston pa ste le'u dang po'o// //ji ltar chu shing yan lag dag/
128b1(mdo 'grel): ma lus bcas te bshig byas na/ /ci yang med ltar skyes bu yang/ /khams bcas bshig na de dang 'dra/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med ces/ /de phyir rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /khams drug de kun bdag med par/ /khyod
128b2(mdo 'grel): la gtan la phab pa yin/ /de ltar bdag dang bdag med par/ /yang dag ji bzhin dmigs su med/ /bdag dang bdag med lta ba dag/ /de phyir thub pa chen pos bzlog /mthong dang thos sogs thub pa yis/ /bden min brdzun pa min
128b3(mdo 'grel): par gsungs/ /phyogs las mi mthun phyogs 'gyur na/ /de ni gnyi ga don du min/ /de ltas dam pa'i don du na/ /'jig rten 'di ni bden brdzun 'das/ /de nyid phyir na yang dag tu yod ces med ces zhal mi gzhes/ /gang zhig
128b4(mdo 'grel): de ltar rnams kun tu/ /yod min de ni kun mkhyen gyis/ /mdza' yod mdza' med gnyi dag dang/ /gnyis ma yin zhes ji skad bstan/ /sangs rgyas grangs med gshegs de bzhin/ /byon gyur pa dang da ltar bzhugs/ /sems can mdza' ni
128b5(mdo 'grel): dus gsum skyes/ byed pa de dag las 'dod cing/ /'jig rten 'phel ba'i rgyu med la/ /zad pa dus gsum du srid na/ /thams cad mkhyen pas ji ltar de'i/ /phyin chad lung ma bstan par mdzad/ /so so'i skye bo la gsang ba/ /gang
128b6(mdo 'grel): yin de ni zab mo'i chos/ /'jig rten sgyu ma lta bu nyid/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yin/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i glang po la/ /skye dang 'jig pa nyid snang yang/ /de la don gyi yang dag du/ /skye dang 'jig pa nyid med ltar/ /de bzhin sgyu 'dra'i
128b7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten la/ /skye dang 'jig pa nyid snang yang/ /dam pa'i don du skye pa dang/ /'jig pa nyid ni yod ma yin/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i glang po ni/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ /sems rmongs tsam du zad pas nas/ /yang dag nyid du gnas
129a1(mdo 'grel): pa med/ /de bzhin sgyu 'dri'i 'jig rten ni/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ /sems rmongs tsam du zad pas na/ /yang dag nyid du gnas pa med/ /de ltar dus gsum 'das bdag nyid/ /tha snyad gdags par ma
129a2(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa/ /gang zhig yod dam med 'gyur ba'i/ /'jig rten don du ci zhig yod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rgyu 'di las/ /mdza' yod pa dang mdza' med dang/ /gnyis dang gnyis min rnam pa bzhi/ /lung bstan ma mjad gzhan las min
129a3(mdo 'grel): re zhig lus 'di mi gtsang nyid/ /rags shing mngon sum spyod yul ba/ /rtag tu snang ba gang gi tshe/ /sems la snang ba ma yin pa/ /de tshe dam chos gnas med pa/ /phra rab mngon sum ma yin pa/ /zab mo de ko ji lta bu re/ /sems
129a4(mdo 'grel): la bde blag 'char bar 'gyur/ /chos 'di zab phyir skye bo yis/ /shes par dka' bar thugs chud de/ /des na thub pa sangs rgyas nas/ /chos bstan pa las log par gyur/ /chos 'di log par shes gyur na/ /mi mkhas pa ni chud
129a5(mdo 'grel): kyang za/ /'di ltar med par lta ba yi/ /mi gtsang der ni bying bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang de ni log bzung nas/ /blun pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can/ /spong bsam rungs bdag nyid can/ /mnar med pa ni spyi'u tshugs 'gro/ /ji ltar kha
129a6(mdo 'grel): zas bza' nyes pas/ /phung po dag tu 'gyur ba dang/ /bza' legs tshe dang nad med dang/ /stobs dang bde bar 'gyur ba lta/ /de bzhin log par bzung ba de/ /phung po dag ni thob 'gyur zhing/ /legs par shes pas bde ba dang/ /byang
129a7(mdo 'grel): chub bla na med pa thob/ /de phyir 'di la spong ba dang/ /med pa'i lta ba spangs nas ni/ /don kun bsgrub phyir yang dag pa'i/ /shes la nan tan mchog mdzod cig /chos 'di yongs su ma shes na/ /ngar 'dzin pa ni rjes su 'jug /de las
129b1(mdo 'grel): dge dang mi dge'i las/ /de las skye ba bzang dang ngan/ /de phyir ji srid ngar 'dzin la/ /sel ba'i chos 'di ma shes pa/ /de srid sbyin dang tshul khrims dang/ /bzod pa'i chos la gus par mdzod/ /las rnams sngon du chos gtong zhing//
129b2(mdo 'grel): bar du chos ldan tha mar yang/ /chos ldan bsgrub pa'i sa bdag ni/ /'di dang gzhan du gnod mi 'gyur/ /chos kyis 'dir grags bde ba dang/ /'di dang 'chi gar 'jigs pa med/ /'jig rten gzhan du bde ba rgyas/ /de bas
129b3(mdo 'grel): rtag tu chos brten mdzod/ /chos ni lugs kyi dam pa ste/ /chos kyi 'jig rten mngon pa gar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dga' bar gyur pas kyang/ /'di dang gzhan du bslus mi 'gyur/ /chos min pas ni lugs 'dod gang/ /de yis
129b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten mi dgar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mi dga' nyid kyi phyir/ /'di dang gzhan du dga' mi 'gyur/ /don med rig pa ngan 'gro'i lam/ /gzhan bslu lhur len mi bzad pa/ /shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis ni/ /ji ltar don gyis
129b5(mdo 'grel): rig par byas/ /pha rol slu ba lhur len pa/ /don du ji ltar lugs ldan yin/ /des ni tshe rabs stong phrag tu/ /bdag nyid kho na bslus par 'gyur/ /dgra la gnod par byas na yang/ /skyon rnams btang ste yon tan bsten/ /des ni
129b6(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis rang phan 'thob/ /dgra bo yang ni mi dgar 'gyur/ /sbyin dang snyan par smra ba dang/ /phan dang don cig spyod pa ste/ /de dag rnams kyi 'jig rten dang/ /chos kyang bsdu ba nyid du mdzod/ /rgyal po dag la ji lta bur/ /bden
129b7(mdo 'grel): cig yid ches bstan bskyod pa/ /de las bzlog ste brdzun pa ni/ /yid ma ches par byed pa'i mchog/ /slu ba mi ldan bden min te/ /sems dpas bsgyur ba don du min/ /gzhan la gcig tu phan pas bar? ni/ /mi phan phyir ni
130a1(mdo 'grel): cig shos min/ ji ltar rgyal po'i nyes pa dag /sbyin gsal gcig gis sped pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dungs pa'ang de dag gi/ yon tan bdog pa thams cad 'joms/ /nye bar zhi ba zab pa'i phyir/ /mchog tu gus
130a2(mdo 'grel): pa byed par 'gyur/ /gus pas brjid la bka' yang btsan/ /de bas nye bar zhi ba bsten/ /shes rab ldan pas blo mi 'phrogs/ /gzhan gyi drid mi 'jog cing brtan/ /slu bas mi tshugs rgyal po ste/ /de bas shes rab lhur blang mdzad/
130a3(mdo 'grel): bden gtong zhi dang shes rab dang/ /bzang po bzhi ldan mi dbang ni/ /chos bzang rnam pa bzhi lta bur/ /lha mi rnams kyis stong par gyur/ /phebs par smra zhing dag gyur pa/ /shes rab snying rje dri med dang/ /lhan cig 'grogs na rtag tu 
130a4(mdo 'grel): yang/ /shes rab dang ni chos kyang 'phel/ /phan par smra ba dkon pa ste/ /nyan par byed pa shin tu dkon/ /de dag pas kyang mi snyan yang/ /phan pa'i rjes su byed pa dkon/ /de lta bas na mi snyan yang/ /phan par mkhyen nas myur du spyad?
130a5(mdo 'grel): nad gso'i don du bdag byams pa/ /mi bzad nga? ba'i sman yang 'thung/ /srog dang nad med rgyal srid dag /mi rtag nyid ni rtag dgongs te/ /deng nas yang dag brtson ldan par/ /chos la gcig tu nan tan mdzod/ /gdon mi za bor
130a6(mdo 'grel): 'chi 'gyur zhing/ /shi nas sdig pas sdug bsngal ba/ /gzigs te 'phral du bden yang/ /sdig pa bgyi bar mi rigs so/ /la lar 'jigs pa med mthong zhing ka dus 'gar 'jigs pa mthong gyur pa/ /gal te cig la yid brtan
130a7(mdo 'grel): na/ gcig la khyod ko cis ma 'jigs/ /chang gi 'jig rten bsnyad 'gyur zhing/ /don yal nor yang zad par 'gyur/ /rmongs pas khyab ma yin byed/ /de bas chad ni rtag tu spongs/ /rgyad po chags dang ming dga' dang/ /zhe sdang g.yo rgyu
130b1(mdo 'grel): dgod pa'i gnas/ /brdzun dang bkyal pa tshig rtsub sgyu/ /de bas rtag tu spang bar mdzod/ /bud med chags pa phal cher ni/ /bud med gzugs bzang sems las byung/ /bud med lus la don du ni/ gtsang ba cung zad yod ma yin/ /kha ni
130b2(mdo 'grel): kha chu rul ba dang/ /so skyag mi gtsang snod yin te/ /sna ni snag snab sna chu'i snod/ /mig ni mig sdul mchi ma'i snod/ /lto ba'i khong ni bshang gci dang/ /glo ba mchin sogs snod yin par/ /rmongs pas bud med ma mthong ba/ /de yi lus
130b3(mdo 'grel): la chags pa byed/ /mi shes 'ga' zhig mi gtsang ba'i/ /bum pa rgyan la chags pa ltar/ /'jig rten mi shes rmongs pa yis/ /bud med rnams la de bzhin no/ /lus yul shin tu dri nga ba/ /chags bral rgyu ni gang yin pa/ /de la'ang 'jig
130b4(mdo 'grel): rten ches chags na/ /gang gi 'dod chags bral bar bkri/ /ji ltar bshang dang gci bzhi la/ /ngan skyugs phag rab chags par ltar/ /de bzhin bshang dang gci bzhi la/ /'dod ldan ngan skyugs phag rnams chags/ /lus kyi grong khyer mi gtsang ba//
130b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i bu ga 'dod pa gang/ /de ni skye bo blun pa yis/ /dga' ba'i don du nye bar brtag /khyod bdag nyid kyis bshang gci sogs/ /so sor mi gtsang mthong nas ni/ /de 'dus yus la ji lta bur/ /yid du 'ong ba nyid du gyur/ /khrag dang khu ba 'dres
130b6(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /sa bon mi gtsang snying po bskyed/ /mi gtsang ngo bor shes bzhin du/ /'di la 'dod can gang zhig chags/ /mi gtsang phung po de'i brlan gyis/ /brlan pa'i pags pas g.yogs pa gang/ /nyal ba de ni bud med kyi/ /chu so'o khong/
130b7(mdo 'grel): nas nyal bar zad/ /gzugs bzang ba dang gzugs ngan nam/ /rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung/ /bud med gzugs kun me gtsang na/ /khyod chags khyad par gang la bskyed/ /gal te mi gtsang kha dog bzang/ /shin tu gsar la dbyibs
131a1(mdo 'grel): legs kyang/ /de la chags par mi 'os ltar/ /bud med gzugs la'ang de bzhin no/ /khong rul phyi rol phags pas g.yogs/ /ro myags 'di yi rang bzhin ni/ /shin tu mi bzad snang bzhin du/ ji lta bur na
131a2(mdo 'grel): mthong ma gyur/ /pags pa 'di yang mi gtsang min/ /ral bu bzhin du 'dug ce na/ /mi gtsang phung po'i pags pa ltar/ /ji lta bur na gtsa' mang 'gyur/ /mi gtsang ba yi bum pa ni/ /phyi rol bkra yang smad pa yin/ /mi gtsang ba yi rang
131a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin lus/ /mi gtsang gang ba cis mi snang/ /gal te khyod ni mi gtsang smod/ /dri dang phreng ba bza' btung ni/ /gtsang ma'ang mi gtsang byed pa gang/ /lus 'di ci yi phyir mi smad/ /ji ltar rang dam gzhan dag gi /mi gtsang smad par bya ba gang
131a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin rang dang gzhan dag gi /mi gtsang gzugs ko cis mi smad/ /ji ltar bud med gzugs mi gtsang/ /khyod kyi rang lus de dang 'dra/ /de bas phyi dang nang nyid la/ /'dod chags bral bar rigs min nam/ /snang gu dag nas 'jag pa
131a5(mdo 'grel): can/ /bdag nyid mngon sum 'khru byed kyang/ /lus mi gtsang bar mi rtog na/ /khyod la bshad pas ci zhig phan/ /gang dag mi gtsang lus 'di la/ /steg chos snyan dngags byed pa ni/ /e ma'o gzu lums e ma'o blun/ /e ma'o skye
131a6(mdo 'grel): bos khrel du rung/ mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa yi/ /sems can 'dir ni phal cher yang/ /'dod pa'i don du brtsod 'byung ba/ /mi gtsang don du khyi rnams bzhin/ /g.yan pa phrugs na bder 'gyur ba/ /de bas g.yan pa
131a7(mdo 'grel): med na bde/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'dod ldan pa de/ /'dod pa med pa de bas bde/ gal te de ltar rtags na khyod/ /'dod chags bral ba ma grub kyang/ /'on kyang 'dod chags srabs pa yis/ /bud med chags par mi 'gyur ro//
131b1(mdo 'grel): mthung 'jig dang sdug bsngal dang/ /dmyal ba'i rgyu ni mi bzang ba/ /ri dags lings te de lta bas/ /rtag tu gsod med brtan por mdzod/ /yan lag thams cad mi gtsang bas/ /bskus pa'i sbrul gdug 'jig pa ltar/ /gang la rten
131b2(mdo 'grel): nas lus can rnams/ /skrag par 'gyur ba de re ngan/ /char sprin chen po langs pa na/ /zhing pa rnams ni ji lta bar/ /gang la rten nas lus can rnams/ /dga' bar 'gyur ba de re bzang/ /de bas chos min yang bya ste/ /g.yel ba med par chos
131b3(mdo 'grel): la brten/ /bdag nyid dang ni 'jig rten 'dis/ /bla med byang chub 'thob 'dod na/ /de yi rtsa ba byang chub sems/ /ri dbang rgyal po ltar brtan dang/ /phyogs mdza' gtugs pa'i snying rje dang/ /gnyis la mi brten ye shes lags/ /rgyal po chen po
131b4(mdo 'grel): skyes chen gyis/ mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /ji ltar khyod sku brgyan gyur pa/ /de lta bu dag gsan par mdzod/ /mchod rten mchod bya 'phags pa dang/ /rgan rabs rnams ni legs bskur bas/ /dpal ldan phyag zhabs 'khor
131b5(mdo 'grel): lo yis/ /mtshan pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po chos la rtag par ni/ /yang dag blangs pa brtan par mdzod/ /des ni shin tu zhabs gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lags/ /sbyin dang snyan pa'i tshig dang ni/ /phan dang
131b6(mdo 'grel): don cig spyod pa yis/ /dpal ldan phyag sor dra ba yis/ /'brel pa'i phyag ris can du 'gyur/ /bza' ba dang ni btung ba'i mchog /rab tu mang po byin pa yis/ /dpal ldan phyag rang zhabs mnyen zhing/ /phyag dang zhabs dang thal gong
131b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ltog pa'i phyogs rnams mtho ba'i phyir/ /sku tshe bdun yang mtho bar 'gyur/ /'tshe med bsad pa thar byas pas/ /sku mdzes drang zhing che ba dang/ /tshe ring sor mo ring ba dang/ /rting ba yangs pha? dag? tu 'gyur/ /yang dag blangs pa'i
132a1(mdo 'grel): chos rnams ni/ /spel bas dpal ldan mdog bzang zhing/ /zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon dang/ /ba spu gyen du phyogs mtshan 'gyur/ /rig dang bzo la sogs pa'i gnas/ /gus pas len dang sbyin pas khyod/ /e Na ya
132a2(mdo 'grel): yi byin pa dang/ /yid rno shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /rang gi nor bdog blangs gyur na/ /myur du btang ba'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /phyag rgya bde dang 'jig rten gyi/ /rnam par 'dren pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gnyen bshes phan tshun bye ba dag/
132a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag bsdum par byas pa yis/ /dpal ldan 'doms kyi sba ba ni/ /spubs su nub pa'i dam par 'gyur/ /khang bzang gding ba brgyan dag ni/ /bde zhing bzang ba rab byin pas/ /gser ni gtso ma dri med pa/ /shin tu 'jam
132a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i dbang byin zhing/ /rigs par bla mas rjes 'jug pa/ /dpal ldan ba spu nyag re dang/ /zhal ni mdzod spus rgyan par 'gyur/ /snyan cing dga' bar smras pa dang/ /legs par smras dang
132a5(mdo 'grel): mthus byas pas/ /khyod ni dpung mgo zlum pa dang/ /ro stong seng ge 'dra bar 'gyur/ /nang pa rnams la rims gro dang/ /gsos pas thal gong rgyas pa dang/ /bdag nyid rnal du gnas pa dang/ /ro bro ba yi mchog tu
132a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /chos dang mthun pa'i bya ba la?/ /thog drangs khyod kyi dbu gtsug gtor/ /legs nas n+ya gro d+ha lta bur/ /chu zhed gab pa dag tu 'gyur/ /tshig ni bden pas ? po dag/ /yun ring dus su brjod pa yis/ /mi yin
132a7(mdo 'grel): dbang po ljags yangs shing/ /tshangs pa yis ni dbyangs ldan 'gyur/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad pa ru/ /bden pa'i tshig ni brjod pa yis/ /'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu dang/ /dpal ldan thub pa dka' bar 'gyur/ /lhag
132b1(mdo 'grel): par gus dang bkur sti dang/ /ji ltar rig par rjes 'jug par/ /tshems ni shin tu dkar ba dang/ /mdog ldan mnyam pa'i tshems su 'gyur/ /dbyen dang phra ma med pa yi/ /tshig ni yun rings goms pa yis/ /dpal
132b2(mdo 'grel): ldan tshems ni bzhi bcu tshang/ /mnyam par thags kyang bzang bar 'gyur/ /chags dang sdang dang rmongs med cing/ /byams pas sems can bltas pa yis/ /spyan ni bkrag can mtho na mthing la/ /rdzi ma ba yi lta bur 'gyur//
132b3(mdo 'grel): de ltar mdor na rgyur byas pa'i/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis de dag ni/ /skyes bu seng ge chen po yis/ /mtshan rnams legs par mkhyen par mdzod/ /dpe byad bzang pa brgyad cu ni/ /byams pa'i rgyu mthun las byung ba/ gzhung ni mangs
132b4(mdo 'grel): su dogs pa yis/ /rgyal po khyod la ma bshad do/ /'khor los sgyur ba thams cad la/ 'di dag yod par 'dod mod kyi/ /dag dang mdzes dang gsal ba ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi char mi phod/ /'khor los
132b5(mdo 'grel): gyur ba'i mtshan dang ni/ /dpe byad bzang po gang dag gcig /thub dbang po la sems dad pa'i yan lag gcig las 'byung bshad pa'i/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag ni/ /gcig tu bsags pa'i dge bas kyang/ /sangs rgyas ba slu? nyag?
132b6(mdo 'grel): gcig kyang/ /bskyed par nus pa ma yin no/ /nyi ma rnams kyi 'od byed pa/ /me khyer rnams dang bag 'dra ltar/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan yang ni/ /'khor los sgyu ba rnams dang 'dra/ /rin po che'i phreng ba las/ /spel ma zhes bya
132b7(mdo 'grel): ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab las/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas mtshan 'byung ba/ /theg pa chen po'i lung chen las/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gson/ /rang sangs rgyas kun las byung? ?
133a1(mdo 'grel): slob dang mi slob las byung dang/ /'jig rten ma lus kun bsod nams/ /'jig rten bzhin du dpag med gang/ /de bcur bsgres par gyur pa yis/ /ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'grub ste/ /sangs rgyas ba spu'i ba ga ni//
133a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad de dang 'dra bas 'byung/ /ba spu'i bu ba thams cad ni/ /skyed par byed pa'i bsod nams gang/ /de dag brgyar ni bsgyur ba yis/ /dpe byad bzang po gcig tu bzhed/ /bsod nams de snyed de snyed kyis/ /rgyal po dpe byed bzang
133a3(mdo 'grel): po ni/ /gcig mthar phyin te de lta bar/ /brgyad cu'i bar du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dag/ 'grub pa'i bsod nams tshogs gang yin/ /de dag brgyad ni bsgyur ba yis/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig go /
133a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni sum cu 'grub pa'i rgyu/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang yin pa/ /de dag stong du ba sgyur ba yis/ /zla ba nya 'dra'i 'dzod spu'o/ /mdzod spu yi ni bsod nams dag /stong phrag brgyar ni bsdoms pa yis/ /spyi gtsug bltar ni mi snang
133a5(mdo 'grel): ba/ /skyobs pa'i gtsug gtor skyed par byed/ /gtsug gtor bsod nams byed pa ni/ /'bum phrag brgyad ni bsgyur ba las/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba chos kyis gdung/ /gcig 'byung bar ni shes par bya/ /de ltar bsod nams tshang med
133a6(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /ji ltar 'jig rten phyogs kun na/ /bcur bsgres ma lus brjod la ltar/ /tshad dang ldan par bag tsam brjod/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas gzugs sku yi/ /rgyu yang de ltar 'jig rten bzhin/ /gzhal med de ltar chos sku yi//
133a7(mdo 'grel): rgyu lta de ltar gzhal du yod/ /thams cad kyis ni rgyu chud las/ /'bras bu rgya chen skyed 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas rgyu ni dpag med las/ /'bras bu dpag yod bsam thag chad/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs su ni/ /bsod nams
133b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs las byung ste/ /chos kyi sku ni mdor bsdu na/ /rgyal po ye shes tshogs las 'khrungs/ /de lnga bas na tshogs 'di gnyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob pa'i rgyu/ /de ltar mdor na bsod nams dang/ /ye shes 'di ni rtag brten
133b2(mdo 'grel): mdzod/ /rigs pa dang ni lung bstan pa/ /dbugs 'byin byed pa'i rgyu 'di yis/ /byang chub bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams ni/ /'di la bgyid lug mi bya'o/ /phyogs rnams kun tu nam mkha' dang/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /ji ltar mdza' yas
133b3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal sems can mdza' yas 'dod/ /sems can mdza' yas de dag ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i snying brtse bas/ /sdug bsngal dag las drang bya ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid la 'god par nges/ /de ltar brtan par gnas de ni//
133b4(mdo 'grel): mi nyal ba 'am nyal yang rung/ /yang dag blangs pa nas bzung ste/ /bag med gyur kyang sems can rnams/ /mdza' yas phyir na sems can bzhin/ /bsod nams mdza' yas rtag sogs 'gyur/ /mdza' yas des na sangs rgyas nyid/ /mdza' 
133b5(mdo 'grel): yas thob min dka' zhes bya/ /gang zhig dpag med dus gnas te/ /lus can dpag med don du ni/ /byang chub dpag tu med 'dod cing/ /dge ba dpag tu med 'dod pa/ des ko byang chub dpag med kyang/ /dpag tu med pa rnam bzhi yi//
133b6(mdo 'grel): tshegs kyis ring po mi thogs par/ /ji lta bur na 'thob ma 'gyur/ /bsod nams mdza' yas zhes pa dang/ /ye shes mdza' yas zhes pa des/ /lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal dag/ myur ba nyid du sel bar byed/ /sdig pas ngan 'gror lus
133b7(mdo 'grel): kyis ni/ /sdug bsngal bkres skom la sogs 'gyur/ /des sdig ma byas bsod nams kyis/ /srid la gzhan na de med do/ /rmongs pas yid kyi sdug bsngal ni/ /chags sder 'jigs dang 'dod la sogs/ /des rten med pa'i shes pa yis/ /de ni myur
134a1(mdo 'grel): ba nyid du spong/ /lus dang yid kyi sdug bsngal gyis/ /de ltar shin tu ma snam na/ /gal te 'jig rten mthas gtugs par/ /'jig rten 'dren kyang cis te skyo/ /sdug bsngal ba la yun thung yang/ /bzod dka' yun ring smos ci dgos/ /sdug bsngal
134a2(mdo 'grel): med cing bde ba la/ /mdza' yas dus kyang ji zhig gnod/ /de la lus kyi sdug bsngal med/ /yid kyi sdug bsngal ga la yod/ /de ni snying rjes 'jig rten sdug /de nyid kyis ni yun ring gnas/ /de bas sangs rgyas ring thogs shes//
134a3(mdo 'grel): bla dang ldan pa bgyid mi lug/ /nyes zad yon tan don du ni/ /'di la rtag tu 'bad par bya/ /chags dang zhe sdang gti mug dag /nyes par mkhyen nas yongs su spongs/ /ma chags mi sdang gti mug med/ /yon tan mkhyen nas gus
134a4(mdo 'grel): pas brten/ /chags pas yi dags 'gro bar 'gro/ /zhe sdang gis ni dmyal bar 'phen/ /rmongs pas phal cher dud 'gror 'gro/ /bzlog pas lha dang mi nyid do/ /skyon spangs yon tan 'dzin pa yis/ /mdor par mtho ba pa yi chos/
134a5(mdo 'grel): shes pas 'dzin pa yang zad pa/ /nges par legs pa pa yi chos/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs mchod rten dang/ /gtsug lag khang dag gus tshul du/ /shin tu rgya chen gnas lam sogs/ /rgya chen phyug pa bsgrub par mdzod/ /rin chen
134a6(mdo 'grel): kun la bgyis pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs dbyibs legs shing/ legs par bris pa pad ma la/ /bzhugs pa dag la rin po che/ /kun gyis brgyan pa bgyid du gsol/ /dam chos dge slong dge 'dun dag/ /nan tan kun
134a7(mdo 'grel): gyis bskyang bar mdzod/ /gser dang rin chen dra ba dag /nyid kyi mchod rten rnams la thogs/ /gser dang dngul gyi me tog dang/ /rdo rje byu ru mu tig dang/ /enda rnyil dang baiDUrya/ /mthon ka chen pos mchod rten mchod/ /dam chos
134b1(mdo 'grel): smra la mchod pa ni/ /rnyed dang bkur sti dang ldan pa/ /dga' bar gyur pa rnams bgyi zhing/ /chos drug gus par rten par mdzod/ /bla ma rim gro gus nyan dang/ /zham ring dang ni mdongs gsol dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
134b2(mdo 'grel): yang/ /rtag tu gus pas mchod par mdzod/ /mu stegs gzhan la gus pa yis/ /mchod dang phyag kyang mi bgyi ste/ /mi shes pa rnams de'i rkyen gyis/ /skyon dang bcas la chags 'gyur gdal/ /thub dbang gsung dang des byung ba'i//
134b3(mdo 'grel): gzhung rnams bri dang glegs bam ni/ /snag tsha dag dang smyu gu dag /sngon du 'gro ba sbyin par mdzod/ /yul du yi ge'i grwa khang du/ /slob dpon 'tsho ba'i bya ba dag /zhing brtsal ba yi nges pa ni/ /ye shes spel ba'i thabs su mdzod/ /rgan
134b4(mdo 'grel): dang byis pa nang pa dang/ /sems can sdug bsngal bsal slang du/ /yul du sman pa 'dreg mkhan dag /zhi zhing rngan pa 'jog tu gsol/ /'dron gnas kun dga' chu lon dang/ /rdzing dang mdun khang chu ra dag /mal zas rtswa dang shing
134b5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa/ /shes rab bzang po bgyid du gsol/ /grangs dang gtsug lag khang dag dang/ /grong khyer kun tu mdun khang dang/ /chu dkon lam rnams thams cad du/ /chu ra dag ni bgyid du gsol/ /nad pa dgon med sdug bsngal gyis/
134b6(mdo 'grel): nyam thag dman dang ngan pa dag/ /snying rjes rtag tu yongs bzung zhing/ /de dag gso phyir gus brtan mdzod/ /dus su 'byung ba'i zas skom dang/ bca' ba 'bru dang shing tog dang/ /de dag slong ba'i skye bo la/ /ma stsal bar du gsol
134b7(mdo 'grel): mi rigs/ /lham dang gdugs dang chu tshags dang/ /tsher ma dbyung ba'i cha sta dang/ /khab dang skud dang bsil yab dang/ /chu ra yi ni gnas su bzhag /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ mar dang sbrang rtsi mig sman dang/ /dug sel chu
135a1(mdo 'grel): rang bzhag bgyi zhing/ /grub pa'i sman dang sngags kyang bri/ /lus dang rkang pa mgo bsku dang/ /bal dang khri'u dang skyo ma dang/ /bum ba zangs dang dgra sta sogs/ /chur dag tu 'jog tu gsol/ /til dang 'bras
135a2(mdo 'grel): dang 'bru dang zas/ /bu ram snum dang ldan pa yi/ /chu ba chung ngu bsil grib du/ /rung ba'i chus bkang bgyid du gsol/ /grog bur tshad gi sgo dag tu/ /zas dang chub dang bu ram dang/ /'bru yi phung po rtag par ni/ /thugs brtan mi
135a3(mdo 'grel): rnams bgyid du gsol/ /bshos gsol sngon dang 'og dag tu/ /yi dags khyi dag gros spur dang/ /bya la sogs pa ci bde bar/ /rtag tu zas dag stsal bar mdzod/ /btses pa dang ni lo nyes dang/ /gnod pa dang ni yams nad
135a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /pham gyur yul du 'jig rten pa/ /rjes su bzung ba rgya chen mdzod/ /zhing pa nyam thag gyur rnams la/ /sa bon zas kyi rjes su bzung/ /nan gyi dpya khral btang ba dang/ /shas rnams kyang ni bskyung ba dang/ /chags nyen pa las
135a5(mdo 'grel): yongs skyabs dang/ /sho gam btang dang sho gam dbri/ /de dag sgo na sdod pa yi/ /nyon mongs las kyang bzlog par mdzad/ /rang gi yul dang yul gzhan gyis/ /tshom rkun rnams kyang zhi bar mdzod/ /dbyig gi spobs ni mnyam pa dang
135a6(mdo 'grel): rin thang rigs par bgyid du gsol/ /blon pos ci dang ci gsol pa/ /nyid kyis kun tu mkhyen mdzod la/ /'jig rten sman pa gang dag gang/ /de dang de kun rtag tu mdzod/ /bdag phan ci dang ci bya zhes/ /ji ltar khyed la gus
135a7(mdo 'grel): yod pa/ /gzhan phan ci dang ci bya zhes/ /de bzhin khyod ni gus par mdzod/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /sman dang nags kyi shing bzhin du/ /bdag nyid yud tsam gcig tu yang/ /'dod dgur spyad pa nyid du mdzod/ /gom pa bdun
135b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i dus su yang/ /bdog pa kun gtong sems 'chang ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ /bsod nams mkha' 'dra dpag med skye/ /bu mo gzugs bzang lus mdzes la/ /de don gnyer ba rnams bsal nas/ /des ni dam
135b2(mdo 'grel): chos yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /gzungs ni so sor thob par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams kun dang ldan pa yi/ /bu mo stong phrag brgyad cu dag /yo byad kun dang lhan cig tu/ /thub pa yis ni sngon stsal to/ /sna tshogs pa dang 'od gsal ba'i/ /bgo
135b3(mdo 'grel): ba dog dang rgyan rnams dang/ /dri dang phreng ba longs spyod dag /slong ba rnams la brtse bas stsol/ /gang la chos don gang med na/ /shin tu nyam thag gyur pa de/ /de yi mod la bde stsal na/ /de las sbyin mchog ma mchis so/ /gang la
135b4(mdo 'grel): dug ni phan gyur na/ /de la dug kyang sbyin par bgyi/ /kha zas mchog kyang mi phan na/ /de la de ni sbyin mi bgyi/ /sprul gyis zin la ji lta bur/ /sor mo bcad pa phan bshad na/ /de bzhin thub pas gzhan phan pa/ /mi bde ba yang
135b5(mdo 'grel): bya bar gsungs/ /dam pa'i chos dang chos smra la/ /nyid kyis bkur sti mchog dang ni/ /gus par byas te chos nyan zhing/ /chos kyi sbyin pa dag kyang mdzod/ /'jig rten gtam la dga' ma mdzad/ /'jig rten 'das la
135b6(mdo 'grel): dgyes par mdzod/ /bdag la ji ltar de bzhin du/ /gzhan la yon tan bskyed par mdzad do/ /gsan pa'i chos kyis mi ngoms shing/ /don gzung rnam par dbye ba dang/ /bla ma dag la yon dbul ba/ /rtag tu gus par
135b7(mdo 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /'jig rten rgyang pan sogs mi gdon/ /rtsod pa'i don gyi nga rgyal spang/ /rang gi yon tan mi bsngags shing/ /dgra la'ang yon tan brjod par mdzod/ /gnas la dbab par mi bgyi zhing/ /ngan sems
136a1(mdo 'grel): kyis ni gleng mi bgyi/ /gzhan rnams kyi dang bdag nyid kyi/ /'khrul ba so sor brtag par bya/ nyes pa gang zhig gzhan dag la/ /mkhas pas rtag tu kha bya ba/ /de ni rang gis yongs spang zhing/ /nus pa
136a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang bzlog par mdzod/ /gzhan gyis gnod pa bgyis pa la/ /sngon gyi las dgongs khro mi bgyi/ /sdug bsngal yang 'byung mi 'gyur bar/ /rang gi nyes pa med par bgyi/ /lan la re ba ma mchis par/ /gzhan dag la
136a3(mdo 'grel): ni phan par mdzod/ /sdug bsngal cig bus gnag bgyi zhing/ /bde ba slong dang lhan cig spyad/ /lha yi phun sum tshogs pas kyang/ /khengs pa nyid du mi bya zhing/ /yi dags bzhin du dbul ba yi/ /rgud pas kyang ni zhum mi bgyi/
136a4(mdo 'grel): bden pa gang gis rang don la/ /rgyal srid nyams par gyur na'ang de/ /rang gdon la rtag brjod cing/ /de la gzhan smra mi bgyi'o/ /ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /mdzad pa'i brtul zhugs rtag brten mdzod/ /des na
136a5(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan sa stengs su/ /tshad ma yin dam par 'gyur/ /khyod ni rtag tu thams cad la/ /legs par brtags te mdzad pa dang/ /yang dag ji bzhin don gzigs pas/ /gzhan gyi drid mi 'jog par mdzod/ /chos las
136a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal srid pa de ba dang/ /phyogs rnams kun tu grags pa yi/ /bla ra rgya chen 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /blon po rnams kyang kun tu 'dun/ /'chi ba'i rkyen ni mang ba ste/ /gson pa yi ni nyung zad gcig /de dag nyid ni 'chi ba'i
136a7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de bas rtag tu chos mdzad cig /'di ltar rtag tu chos mdzad na/ /'jig rten kun dang bdag nyid la/ /nyams bder 'gyur ba gang lags pa/ /de nyid re zhig rtog mod lags/ /chos kyi bde bar gnyid log
136b1(mdo 'grel): cing/ bde bar sad pa dag tu 'gyur/ /nang gi bdag nyid skyon med par/ /rmi lam dag kyang bde ba mthong/ /pham srid zhu lhur len dang/ /rigs kyi gtso la rim gro dang/ /longs spyod legs spyod bzod gtong dang/ /tshig
136b2(mdo 'grel): 'jam phra ma med bden pa'i/ /brtul zhugs rtse cig byas pa ste/ /lhag yi dbang po nyid thob nas/ /da dung du yang lha dbang bgyid/ /de bas de 'dra'i mchod rten mdzod/ /rje'u chos sum brgya'i kha zas dag/ /nyin re dus gsum byin
136b3(mdo 'grel): ba bas/ /byams pa yud tsam thang gcig gis/ /bsod nams dag las char mi phod/ /lha mi byams par 'gyur ba dang/ /de dag kyang ni bsrung ba dang/ /yid bde ba dang bde mang dang/ /dug dang mtshon gyi gnod med dang/ /'bab pa
136b4(mdo 'grel): med par don thob dang/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye 'gyur te/ /gal te grol bar ma gyur kyang/ /byams chos yon tan brgyad 'thob bo/ /sems can rnams ni byang chub tu/ /sems bskyed bcug cing brtan byas nas/ /ri dbang rgyal
136b5(mdo 'grel): po ltar brtan cing/ /byang chub sems ni rtag tu 'thab/ /dad pas mi khom 'gro mi 'gyur/ /khrims kyi 'gro ba bzang por 'gro/ /stong pa nyid la goms pa yis/ /chos rnams kun la chags med 'thob/ /g.yo med pas ni dran ldan
136b6(mdo 'grel): 'thob/ /sems par byed pas blo gros 'thob/ /bkur sti byed pas don rtogs ldan/ /chos srung shes rab can du 'gyur/ /chos mnyan pa dang sbyin pa dag /sgrib pa med par byas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa nyid/ /'dod
136b7(mdo 'grel): pa myur du thob par 'gyur/ /ma chags pas ni don 'bru ste/ /ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel/ /nga rgyal med pas gtso bor 'gyur/ /chos la bzod pa gzungs 'thob po/ /snying po lnga rnams byin pa dang/ /'jigs la mi
137a1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs phyin pa yis/ /bdud rnams kun gyis mi tshugs shing/ /stobs po che yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /mchod rten mar me phreng ba dang/ mun pa dag tu sgron ma dang/ /mar me 'bru mar byin pa yi/ /lha yi mig ni 'thob
137a2(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten mchod pa rol mo dang/ /dril bu dag ni phul ba dang/ /dud dang rnga ni rab phul bas/ /lha yi rna ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi gleng zhing/ /yan lag nyams pa rnams mi brjod/ /sems ni
137a3(mdo 'grel): rjes su bsrungs pas na/ /gzhan gyi sems ni shes pa 'thob/ /lha ma dang bzhon pa byin pa dang/ /nyams chung bkur pa byas pa dang/ /gzhon pas bla ma bkur pa yis/ /mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /chos kyi ched
137a4(mdo 'grel): dang de bzhin du/ /chos gzhung don dag dran pa dang/ /chos kyis byin pa dri med pas/ /tshe rabs dran pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med par/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes pas/ /mngon shes drug pa zag pa
137a5(mdo 'grel): kun/ /zad pa mchog ni 'thog par 'gyur/ /sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin nyid shes mnyam ldan pa/ /snying rjes brlan pa bsgoms pa yis/ /rnam pa'i mchog ldan rgyal bar 'gyur/ /smon lam
137a6(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs dag pa yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni dag par 'gyur/ /thub dbang rin chen phul ba yis/ /mdza' yas 'od ni rnam par 'phro/ /de bas de ltar las 'bras dag/ mthun par mkhyen mdzad don du ni/ /'gro la phan pa
137a7(mdo 'grel): brtag du mdzod/ /de nyid khyod la phan pa lags/ /rin po che'i phreng ba las byang chub kyi tshogs bsdus pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// //gang phyir bzod dam mi bzod pa/ /shes par dka' bas
137b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po ni/ /chos min rigs pa min spyod kyang/ /rjes su 'tsho ba phal cher stong/ /re zhig gzhan suAng rung ba la'ang/ /mi snyan phan pa brjod dka' na/ /sa chen mda' ba' i rgyal khyod la/ /dge slong bdag lta smos ci dgos/ /khyod kyis
137b2(mdo 'grel): dgyes pa mdzad slad? dang/ /'gro ba la yang rtse slad du/ /khyod la mi snyan yang sman pa/ /bdag lta cig pus te por gsol/ /bden 'jam don ldan 'phrod ba ni/ /brtse bas dus su slob ma la/ /brjod par bya zhes bcom ldan gsung/
137b3(mdo 'grel): de lta bas na de skad brjod/ /brtan pa khro ba med gyur pa/ /bden pa'i tshig ni bsgrags pa na/ /khrus byed bzang po'i chu bzhin du/ /mnyan 'os nyams su len par bgyid/ /khyod la bdag gis 'di dang ni/ /gzhan du phan pa brjod
137b4(mdo 'grel): bgyid pa/ /mkhyen par mdzod de bdag nyid dang/ /gzhan la sman par 'gyur de mdzod/ /slong ba sngon chad sbyin bgyis pas/ /don brnyes gyur nas mi sbyin na/ /byas mi bzod dang chags pa yis/ /phyi nas don rnams 'thob mi 'gyur/
137b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten 'di na las byed pa/ /bla med lam rgyags khyer mi btub/ /slong ba dman pa ma brngan par/ /phyi ma'i tshe na brgya 'gyur khyed/ /rtag tu thugs rje chen po dang/ /mdzad pa rgya chen las dgyes mdzod/ /rgya chen las las 'bras
137b6(mdo 'grel): bu ni/ /thams cad rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dman pa rnams kyis ni/ /yid la'ang bsams par ma gyur pa'i/ /chos bzhi dkon mchog gsum gyi rten/ /grags pa dpal dang ldan pa'i mdzod/ /chos bzhi gang zhig kun
137b7(mdo 'grel): 'byor pa'i/ /rgyal po ba spu mi ldang ba/ /shi na'ang snyan par mi 'gyur bas/ /rgyal po de ni ma byas bla/ /rgya rab che phyir rgya chen rnams/ /snyems bral spro ba skyed byed cing/ /sman rnams spro bar 'joms byed pa/ /bdog pa thams cad
138a1(mdo 'grel): gtugs te mdzod/ /khyod ni bdog pa kun por nas/ /dbang med gshed gshegs 'tshal bas/ /chos kyi slad du spyad pa kun/ /khyod? kyi mdun du mdor pa nyid/ /me dbang snga ma'i bdog pa kun/ /sar pa yis
138a2(mdo 'grel): ni dbang gyur na/ /snga ma'i chos sam bde ba 'am/ /grags pa dag tu 'gyur ram ci/ /nor spyad pa yis 'di la bde/ /byin pas gzhan du bde bar 'gyur/ /ma spyad mi byin chud zos pas/ /sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig ga la bde/ /'chi
138a3(mdo 'grel): khar blon po rjes ngan? can/ /gces par mi 'dzin rgyal po gsar/ /byams par 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang/ /dbang med byas pas sbyin mi spyod/ /de bas rnal nas myur du ni/ /bdog pa kun gyi chos bzhi mdzod/ /'chi bdag
138a4(mdo 'grel): rgyan gyis nang gnas pa/ /rlung dmar nang 'dug mar me bzhin/ /sngon gyi rgyal pos chos kyi gzhi/ /lha khang la sogs gzhan bgyis pa/ /gang dag lags pa de dag kyang/ /sngar lugs bzhin du bskyang bar mdzod/ /de dag
138a5(mdo 'grel): 'tshe mang? dge spyod cing/ /brtul zhugs la gnas glo bur byams/ /bden bzod 'thab grol ma mchis pa/ /rtag tu brtson rnams spyod du gsol/ /long ba nad pa dman pa dang/ /mgon med sdug phongs yan lag nyams/ /de dag
138a6(mdo 'grel): kyang ni zas dang skom/ /dgag pa med par snyoms thob mdzod/ /chos ldan don du mi gnyer ba/ /rgyal po gzhan yul gnas rnams la 'ang/ /rjes su bzung bar bgyid ba dag/ ci rigs pa ni rab tu mdzod/ /chos kyi gzhi ni
138a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad du/ /chos 'khor sna bos mi g.yel ba/ /mi zan mkhas shing chos mthun pa/ /de dag rnams la mi gnod skos/ /lugs shes chos dang ldan la 'byar/ /gtsang zhing snying nye mi bsngar ba/ /rigs bzang dang tshul
138b1(mdo 'grel): phun sum tshogs/ /byas pa gzo ba'i glon pos skos/ /gtong phod ma chags dpa' ba dang/ /'jam zhing ran spyod brtan pa dang/ /rtag tu bag ni yod pa dang/ /chos dang ldan pa'i dmag dpon bskos/ /chos kyi ngang tshul gtsang la
138b2(mdo 'grel): bzo/ /don shes gtsug lag la mkhas pa/ /tshul ldan snyoms shing dang 'jam pa/ /rgan rabs rnams ni sna bor skos/ /zla re zhing ni de dag las/ /nyid kyis 'du 'god kun gson te/ /gsan nas chos kyi gzhi sogs kyi/ /don
138b3(mdo 'grel): kun nyid kyis bka' stsol cig/ khyod kyis rgyal srid chos don du/ /grags don 'dod slad ma lags na/ /de ni shin tu 'bras bur bcas/ /de las gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis/ /mi dbang da lta 'jig rten na/ /phal cher phan tshun ltor
138b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzud pas/ /ji ltar khyod kyi rgyal srid dang/ /chos su 'gyur ba de bzhin gson/ /shes pas rgan zhing rigs bzang pa/ /rig pa shes la sdig la 'dzem/ nang gshin dgos pa mthong 'gyur ba/ /mang po rtag tu khyod kyis sogs/ /chad
138b5(mdo 'grel): pa gzung dang bsdeg la sogs/ /rigs pa'ang khyod kyi mig gyi ste/ /snying rjes brlan par bgyis nas ni/ /rtag tu rjes su bzung bar mdzod/ /mi bzad sdig pa byed pa yi/ /lus can dag ni thams cad la'ang/ /rgyal po khyod kyi rtag par
138b6(mdo 'grel): yang/ /snying rje phan sems kho na bskyed/ /mi zad sdig can gsong byed la/ /khyad par du yang snying rje bgyi/ /bdag nyid nyams pa de dag nyid/ /bdag nyid chen po'i snying rje'i gnas/ /nyin gcig bzhin nam zhag lnga bar/ nyams chung
138b7(mdo 'grel): btson rnams gtong bar mdzod/ /lhag pa rnams byang ci rigs mdzod/ /'ga' yang mi dgrol min par mdzod/ /khyod ni 'ga' la'ang btang sems med/ /de las sdom? pa min pa skye/ /sdom pa ma yin de las ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad
139a1(mdo 'grel): par sdig pa sogs/ /btson ni ji srid ma btang ba/ /de yi bar du 'dreg mkhan dang/ /khrus dang bza' dang btung ba dang/ /sman? dang ldan pas bde bar byi/ /snod med pa yi bu dag la/ /snod du rung bar bya
139a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod ltar/ /snying rje yis ni tshar bcad bya'i/ /sdang? bas ma yin nor phyir min/ /rab sdang gsod par byed pa'i mi/ /brtags te legs par shes bgyis nas/ /mi bsad gnod par mi bgyi par/ /yul nas bskrad pa gang
