209a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i lta ba'i mig log par lta bas g.yogs pa'i slos sangs rgyas yongs su spangs shing/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dang thams cad la skur ba 'debs pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thams cad mngon par dga' ba dang bral ba/ /nyes pa thams
209a7(mdo 'grel): cad kyi stobs kyi nad la gso ba mi byed pa lta bu'i bsam pa phyin ci log gis bya ba byed pa'i dmyal ba nyid do/ /de dag dus gang gi tshe nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhes kyang gsungs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma yis/ 'gro ba mthar
209b1(mdo 'grel): pa smin mdzad pa/ /gang dag yid kyi phug gnas pa'i/ /rmongs pa'i mun chen mi sel ba/ /me khyer dang 'dra'i mu stegs rnams/ /log lta'i yid ldan de dag gis/ /sel bar nus pa ma yin te/ /nyi bdun gyis kyang sel mi 'gyur/ /de bas na
209b2(mdo 'grel): gus par chos mnyan par bya ste/ phyis rjes su rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan thub ni rnam rgyas pa/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma ma byung bar/ /nyi ma med par pad+ma bzhin/ /zla ba ma shar bar du ni/ /ku mu ta yi nags bzhin du/ /gdul
209b3(mdo 'grel): bya yi ni pad+ma rnams/ /rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ma yin/ /mun pa yis ni mig bsgribs pas/ /rgyal po yi ni lam bzhin dang/ /gru skye med pa'i gru bzhin dang/ /tshong dpon spangs pa'i zod thogs bzhin/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams
209b4(mdo 'grel): kyi/ gru la kun nas ma zhol bar/ /de ni rtse gcig sems kyis su/ /rnam par grol ba'i dga' mi myong/ /khro bral bla ma thar la mos/ /'chi med grong khyer mchog lta ba/ /nyon mongs kun gyi gnyen po ni/ /skad cig gcig la dmigs pa yis
209b5(mdo 'grel): zhi ba'i bde ba'i lam la sbyor/ /'gro ba'i nam mkha' i che dkyil du/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma ma shar bar/ /bsgom spangs gdul bya'i pad+ma la/ /ye shes nyi mas rgyas ma yin/ /ngan 'gro'i dus ni thams cad du/ /chos smra ba yis gsal byas
209b6(mdo 'grel): pas/ gang zhig 'di la brten pa yi/ /'gro de dge ba'i bshes kyi thul/ /mi rnams thob par gyur pa ni/ /ri rtse glog 'gyu lta g.yo zhing/ /khyogs lta bur ni g.yo ba dang/ /mi bzad mi khom brgyad kyi rtser/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i gza' yis
209b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ ming pa las ni mthar gyur cing/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi rang gzhin gyi/ /dam chos gru la ma zhon par/ /gang zhig pha rol 'gro 'dod pa/ /blo gros shin tu dman pa yin/ /mi yis skye ba 'bras
210a1(mdo 'grel): bu med/ /mi khom pa brgyad kyi gtam/ slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rI a dzi ta b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur?//
210a2(mdo 'grel): legs bshad rin chen za ma tog slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ su b+hA Shi ta ratna ka raN+Da ka ka thA/ bod skad du/ legs par bshad? pa rin po che za ma tog lta bu'i gtam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
210a3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis glang chen mchog 'dri'i sems kyi lcags kyus ma yin ye shes lcags kyus btab nas thul/ /'dod chags mun pa'i dmag tshogs me yis ma yin ye shes me yis ma lus sregs
210a4(mdo 'grel): bdud kyi stobs rnams mtshon chas ma yin blo gros rab zhi bzod pa'i mtshon gyis bzlog/ gus la bsgom pa zhi mdzad sangs rgyas mkhyen pa rab? rgyas thub dbang de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dka' ba brgya yis rnyed pa yis/ /mi rnams
210a5(mdo 'grel): thob pa'i khom pa dkon/ /zlog pa med pa'i 'chi bdag ni/ /rtag tu mdun na gnas pas na/ /gang gis dug sbyin yang dag sdom/ /rgyags tshags mang po ma bsdogs pa/ /mi bzad 'khor ba'i mya ngan du/ /'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal thob/
210a6(mdo 'grel): mi rnams thob pa rnyed dka' ba/ /bar snang glog 'gyu lta bu yin/ /srid pa zad byed mkhas pa yin/ /srid pa rnams su phan pa byas/ /yang dag mi nyid thob pa ni/ /glog dang rba ltar mi brtan pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yis/
210a7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams rjes su skyes bus brten/ /da ltar mi rnams thob pa ltar/ /gang gis mthu yis phyis kyang thob/ /bsod nams mchog ni gang yin pa/ /de ni bde ba'i rgyu yin te/ gzugs dang gtong ba rigs mtho sogs/ /yon tan sna
210b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs ldan par 'gyur/ /bsod nams de nyid mdza' ba gcig 'khor ba kun tu 'gro ba gnyen/ /de ltar 'dir ni bsod nams kyis/ /phyi phyir yon tan phun sum tshogs/ gang tshe dpal gnas thob bsten pas/ /de sngags
210b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten bdag po nyid/ /phan pa'i phyogs su 'dren byed pa/ /bsod nams de nyid spel bar gyis/ /bsod nams che gyis sdig dga' spongs/ /yul la g.yo ba nyid kyi rta/ /rtag tu phyin ci log zhi gyis/ /dug stobs mi bzad 'chi sprul/
210b3(mdo 'grel): gyis/ sos ma bzung ba'i bar du ni/ /rtag tu khyed kyis thub dbang bzhin/ /gzhan phan la ni mngon dga' gyis/ /bsod nams la spro ba bskyed pa'i gtam ste dang po'o// //rgya mtsho gnya' shing bu ga ru/ /rul spal mgrin pa chud
210b4(mdo 'grel): ba bzhin/ /yud tsam 'dzom ba ngo mtshar che/ /mi brtan 'di la yang dag soms/ /rab tu zhi ba'i grong khyer lam/ /ngan song 'jigs pa 'joms byed pa/ /de ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs/ /skad cig tsam yang thob par dka' / /mi khom
210b5(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyi nyes spangs mi/ /gang zhig dkon la bskal pa brgyas/ /de ltar bde thob mkhas pa yis/ /dam chos mnyan la 'dir 'bad bya/ /dmyal ba yi dags 'gro ba dang/ /dud 'gro dbang po ma tshang ba/ /'chi med bla ma mdza' 'khob
210b6(mdo 'grel): skyes/ log par lta ba sel ba dang/ /thub dbang gsung rab bdud rtsi ni/ /skyes bu mkhas pas 'thung nus pa/ /shes rab 'od mnga' thub dbang ni/ /ma shar bar du yod ma yin/ /de phyir bya min spangs nas ni/ bdag gi bya ba kun shes
210b7(mdo 'grel): pas/ /'phags mchog dam chos mnyan par bya/ /chos 'di la ni gang 'bad pa/ /de la yon tan kun yod 'gyur/ /thub dbang gsung las rin chen 'byung/ /mkhas pa 'di yis thog mar dga' / /de ni gang gis thos pas kyang/ /rtag tu stobs
211a1(mdo 'grel): ldan brling ba yis/ /mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms par byed/ /bsams shing bsgoms na mthar thugs gsal/ /'jigs bcas skye ba 'khor ba'i rgyun/ nyon mongs ma lus rim gyis spongs/ /thams cad phun
211a2(mdo 'grel): tshogs rtag pa'i gter/ /mi bzad 'khor ba'i rgyun 'joms shing/ /bla na med pa'i dga' bde thob/ /thos pas 'dir yid dri ma med/ /de ltas thub dbang gsung 'di soms/ /chos nyan pa la spro ba skyed ba'i gtam ste gnyis pa'o// //
211a3(mdo 'grel): gang zhig thob nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho yi/ /pha rol phyin pa'i sa bon bskrun/ /byang chub dpal gyi sa bon mchog/ yid bzhin nor bu las lhag pa'i/ /yon tan rgyun gyi mi rnams ni/ /su zhig 'dir de 'bras med byed/ /gang zhig dge bas phyug pa'i
211a4(mdo 'grel): mi/ ba skal pa grangs med kyis thob nas/ /'dir ni smongs pas bsod nams gter/ /cung zad tsam yang mi gsog pa/ /de dag 'jig rten pha rol tu/ /mi bzad mya ngan khang par 'jug/ rin chen gling phyin tshong pa ni/ /lag pa stong par rang khyim
211a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /dge bcu las kyi lam med par/ /phyi nas yang ni thob ma yin/ /mi ma thob par de bar ni/ /ci ltar de de sdug bsngal nyid/ de las pha rol slus yod min/ /de las mchog tu rmongs pa med/ 'di 'di'i khom pa thob nas ni/
211a6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams tshogs ni mi gsog pa/ /skad cig gcig las sdig spyad nas/ /mnar med par ni bskal par gnas/ /skye ba du mar sdig spyad pas/ /bde 'gro dka' lta ci zhig smos/ /rgya mtsho cher g.yengs gnya' shing gi/ bu gar rus
211a7(mdo 'grel): sbal mgrin chud ltar/ /mi ni shin tu thob dka' bar/ /de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /mi'i skye ba dkon pa'i gtam ste gsum pa'o// //za skom mal bstan gos mchog dang/ /phreng ba gnas dang rgyan rnams dang/ /grags pa
211b1(mdo 'grel): yon tan khyad 'phags pa/ /de kun sbyin las myung bar gsungs/ /ngag snyan mdzes dang longs spyod ldan/ /khyad par 'phags gzugs g.yangs? ba dang/ /tshig snyan gzi ldan yid 'ong dag/ grags dang nad med tshe dag ste/ yid 'ong sdug pa de dang de//
211b2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ste/ /rta dang dar dang glang po dang/ /rnga yab gdugs dang me tog tshogs/ /khang bzang mdzes dang rol mor bcas/ /sgra snyan rol mo dang ldan zhing/ /me tog phreng ldan bud med dang/ /zas dang rin chen phreng pa gnas/ /gur
211b3(mdo 'grel): gum grong yul lha yi gnas/ /rdzogs sangs nyid dang sangs rgyas te/ /sbyin pa dpag bsam ljon shing gi/ 'di dang 'bras bu yin par gsungs/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'jam/ /skyus ring dri ma med pa dang/ /bud med gang zhig mig 'grub cing//
211b4(mdo 'grel): sked pa 'og bag g.yo bar ldan/ /dmar zhing mdzes pa'i gos ldan zhing/ /nur 'bur rgyas par rnam par g.yo/ /smin ma mdzes ldan de de dag/ de dag ser sna'i sgo phye nas/ /sbyin pa btang la rgyas par 'gyur/ /mgul pa rnga mas brgyan pa'i rta//
211b5(mdo 'grel): bzhon pa kha lo srab kyis skyogs/ /mi dbang glang chen dregs zhon nas/ /gdugs bsgrengs rgyan ldan 'khor bcas dang/ /'gro ba thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /rtag tu mchod cing gsol 'debs pa/ /snga mar 'di 'dra sbyin pa yis/ /'bras bu
211b6(mdo 'grel): yin par thub pas gsungs/ /gser gyi gdu bu rdo rjes sbras/ /dpung rgyan cod pan rin chen bkod/ /sa bdag mu tig phreng bas brgyan/ /rtag tu seng ge'i khri la gnas/ /'bangs sogs btsun mo'i 'khor brten cing/ /rtsed mo rtse bas rnam rol
211b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ seng ge lta bu'i rnam rol de/ /sbyin 'bras yin par thub pas gsungs/ /khang bzangs gser dang rin chen spras/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas brgyan/ /pi waM rdza rnga rig byed sgrogs/ /rin chen rnams kyi 'od 'bar ba/ /brgya byin bde sogs
212a1(mdo 'grel): dga' spyod cing/ /lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor ldan de/ /snga mar 'di 'dra byin pa yi/ /'bras bu yin par thub pas gsungs/ /sbyin pa'i skye po'i yid du 'ong/ /mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu brten pa phyogs rnams
212a2(mdo 'grel): dri med phreng bas khyab/ /snyan pa'i gnas ni de dang der/ /'dir ni dri med nye bar gnas/ /lus dang bral nas lha rnams su/ /snyog bral sna tshogs btung ba bsil/ /me tog sna tshogs mgo lcogs rgyas/ /dpag bsam gyi ni shing rnams
212a3(mdo 'grel): skyes/ /tsan dan la sogs kyis gang ba'i/ /skyed mos chal ni mchog rnams su/ /yun ring du ni bde spyod cing/ /lha mo gzugs mchog ldan pa yis/ /bsnyen bkur mchog tu byed par thob/ /sbyin ba zhes bya gter chen te/ /rkun sogs mi
212a4(mdo 'grel): khyer rjes su 'dred/ /sbyin pas sems kyi ser sna dang/ /chags pa'i rul gyi dri ma 'khru/ /'khor ba'i lam gyi dub pa sel/ /sbyin ba gzhon pa du ma ste/ /sbyin pa bde ba du ma'i rten/ /yang dag grogs mchog bde ba'i sgo/ /sked pa gser gyi ska rags ldan/ /ngag
212a5(mdo 'grel): 'jam zur mig bzhin skyob mdzes/ /mig gi skyus ring sna drung gsan/ /me tog phreng ba'i skra bcings mdzes/ /gang zhig rang 'khor yan lag dang/ /rkang gnyis 'gro ba mdzes pa yi/ /zas gtsang gi ni phun sum tshogs/ /de dag sbyin
212a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'bras bu yin zhes/ /bdag nyid chen pos bka' stsal te/ /ha sa ka ri'i dum bu dang/ /utpal gyis bsgos? dri zhim la/ /bkris gser gyi snod du blugs/ /ban du ka dang zad mdog sa dang/ /btung ba chung ma mna' skyel zhing/ /tshung
212a7(mdo 'grel): ma dang bcas yang yang 'thung/ /dga' ba'i bsam pas smra ba de'i/ /rgyu ni sbyin mchog bkra shis yin/ /zhi ba'ang sbyin pa'i yon tan te/ /mdzes pa 'dod pa bdag cag gis/ /sbyin pa 'di la 'bad par gyis/ /srid gsum mi bzad
212b1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs chen la/ /sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog med/ /sbyin pa'i gtam ste bzhi pa'o// //'gro ba gang zhig mdzes yid 'ong/ /gzugs dang rigs dang gnyen dang stobs/ /bde bar mthong ba gang yin pa/ /bsod nams bzo
212b2(mdo 'grel): bos de byas bad?/ /'di skad mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/ /gzhan phan byed pa'i skyes bu yis/ /bsod nams dang mnyam yod ma yin/ /rim pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i/ /rgyal mtshan dkar po mngon mtho btsugs/ /rta glang rkang thang shing
212b3(mdo 'grel): rta yi/ dpung gi tshogs kyis nges 'khrug cing/ yu ba sna tshogs mdzes pa yi/ /rnga yab rnams kyis g.yo ba byed la/ /bsod nams lhag pa dbang sgyur zhing/ /sa rnams la ni spyod byed de/ /dar dang ka sh+ri du gu la/ /sna tshogs gos dang mu tig phreng/
212b4(mdo 'grel): gser dang nor bus yan lag brgyan/ /gang dag lha 'dri'i skyes bu dpal/ /bsod nams gzhon pa la zhon pas/ /de bas yin par shes par gyis/ shin tu tshe ring rigs btsun zhing/ /lus mdzes nad kyi 'jigs pa med/ /nor mang g.yog 'khor
212b5(mdo 'grel): phun sum tshogs/ /bsod nams rnam smin chen po yin/ /gang yang 'khor los sgyur ba mchog/ bu ni dpa' bo stong dang ldan/ /rgya mtsho'i mtshams kyis la dbang/ /de dag bsod nams rin po che'i/ /'bras bu yangs pa chen po yin/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i
212b6(mdo 'grel): stan la 'dug/ lha dang lha dbang rtag phyag 'tshal/ /brjid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis gnon/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten snang byed pa/ /de dag nyid dang bsod nams las/ gang la lha klu lha min grub/ /dri za gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/ /mchog tu gyur
212b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ /rtag tu lha dbang mchod byed pa/ /de ni bsod nams rin po che'i/ /'bras bu yangs pa chen po yin/ /gzugs dang brtson 'grus bzo rnams ni/ /dbang med yang nas mi rnams ni/ /las kyi rlung gis mngags nas ni//
213a1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba na/ bsod nams gcig pu mchog yin te/ /rjes su 'gro zhing bde ba 'char/ /bsod nams gzhan gyi 'phrog mi nus/ /de phyir bsod nams gter gyi mchog /gang gi stobs kyi ro rab kyang//
213a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba'i/ /'jigs pa'i bskal pa'i rlung rnams kyis/ /des kyang bsod nams 'jig mi nus/ /'jig pa'i bskal pa'i chu yis ni/ /lcags kyang dbang med 'jig byed pa/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu rnams kyis/
213a3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams gzhu bar nus ma yin/ /'od zer rab cha gsal ba yi/ /nyi ma bdun shar me rnams kyis/ /sa rnams sreg par byed med kyi/ /bsod nams gcig pu sreg ma yin/ /bsod nams kyi gtam ste lnga pa'o// //
213a4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhengs gsol ba/ /dang por mya ngan sel bar byed/ /rtsod pa kun spangs mthong na dga' / /skal ldan gter tshogs dpal dang ldan/ /lus stobs ldan zhing snyan pa dang/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing gzugs mdzes
213a5(mdo 'grel): la/ gsung rab kun la mkhas gyur cing/ /dbang po'i rta ni thams cad thul/ /blo ldan gtod dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan sku gzugs mchod rten la/ /phra rab rdul ni ji snyed song/ /de snyed sa 'og sa steng 'dir/ /de snyed rgyal por nges
213a6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang gzugs med ting 'dzin 'grub/ /thams cad bde bar ma lus spyod/ /tha mar skye rga'i spangs nas/ /de dag byang chub go 'phangs thob/ /bde gshegs sku gzugs bzhengs gsol pa/ /mtshan
213a7(mdo 'grel): bzad gis mtshan 'khor los sgyur/ /sum cu gnyis ldan lus mdzes thob/ /nyes pa'i dgra 'joms rgyal par 'gyur/ /dbang po rnams ni ma tshang med/ /dpal ldan ngan 'gro rnams las ring/ /mi yi gis sku skye 'gyur zhing/ /ngag
213b1(mdo 'grel): ni brtsan pa nyid du 'gyur/ /skye bar thos dang dran ldan brtan/ /mngon par 'dod par 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /gnas la mngon par dad pa dang/ /'dod chags sogs kyis gnod pa med/ /'di rgyal rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /khyad 'phags
213b2(mdo 'grel): legs pa'i gzhung la brten/ gang 'di rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bzhengs/ /sangs rgyas sku 'am mchod rten nam/ /bzhengs byed srog dang ldan pa de/ bran dang dbul por mi skye zhing/ /mngag gzhug par min rigs dmar min/ /dbang po
213b3(mdo 'grel): rnams ni tshang bar 'gyur/ /sku gzugs kyi gtam ste drug pa'o// //dri zhing sna tshogs kyis bsgos pas/ /bde bar gshegs la khrus gsol ba/ /me tog dri yis yan lag mdzes/ /rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su/ /rol mo'i
213b4(mdo 'grel): sgra ni snyan pa yis/ /dal gyis 'bab dang stegs 'grun brjid/ /gser gyi rang bzhin pad+ma yi/ /ge sar rdul gyis khyab pa ru/ /zus gsol gang zhig mchod byed pa/ /de dag rnyog pa thams cad kyis/ /dri ma bkrus nas thar pa thob/ /lha yi bu
213b5(mdo 'grel): mo nu 'bur rgyas mthong zhing/ /sked pa la 'bab g.yo ba dang/ /'dzam bu'i chu 'dra'i pad+ma'i ge sar gyi/ /rdul rnams gtor ba yis ni dri zhim la/ /dal gyis 'bab pa'i nang du lta yi tshogs/ /rgyun tu chu rnams la ni rtse byed pa/ /gang zhig dga' ba sna
213b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs dri zhim chus/ /rje btsun khrus gsol ba yi 'bras de yin/ /gla rtsi ga pur tsan dan gur kum bsgos/ /dri zhim chu ni yid 'ong ba/ /kha dog dkar ser bye brag gis/ /yid 'ong thub pa khrus gsol 'dir/ /sems kyi dri ma spangs nas ni/
213b7(mdo 'grel): de ni 'gro ba'i bla mar 'gyur/ /khrus kyi gtam ste bdun pa'o// //khrus byed lha yi bu mo mchog /rked ldan brla dang chu ma rgyas/ /'dab skyes mgo lcags rgyas mthor zhing/ /lha dbang dal bab khrus byed cing/ /mdzes shes 'dod pas
214a1(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba ni/ /'gro mchog yang yang mnyes byas yin/ /de ni spos chu rol mo dang/ /mdug pa dang ni me tog phreng/ /sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu yin/ /gang zhig 'khor los sgyur rgyal la/ /mkha' la gur kum sprin tshogs
214a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ ga bur gyi ni chu rgyun dang/ /ma la ya yi tsan dan bzhin/ /rdza rnga bi wi rnga mchog gis/ /bde bar gshegs mchog mchod byed pa/ /lha dang mi yi sgra rnams thos/ /khyad 'phags lha yi rna ba thob/ /gur kum la sogs pa'i
214a3(mdo 'grel): gtam ste brgyad pa'o// //rta glang rkang thang shing rta dang/ rin chen sna bdun rnams dang ni/ /dpa' bo bu stong dang bcas par/ /mkha' la 'khor los sgyur 'gro zhing/ /zla ba lta bu'i gdugs kyis ni/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer sgrib byed
214a4(mdo 'grel): cing/ 'bras bu mang la rgya che ba/ /gdugs phul ba las byung ba yin/ /bud ba yid 'ong sgra yis bskyod/ me tog g.yo ba 'khor bar bkod/ /kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim pa'i/ /me tog tshogs kyis ri mor bris/ /gdugs mdzes sna
214a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs dar gyis brgyan/ /mchod rten rnams la phul ba yis/ /'khor los sgyur bas skyong ba/ /gling bzhi'i dbang phyug de yis 'thob/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer gser gdugs thogs/ /dpal ldan dul ba'i glang po mchog /rin chen du
214a6(mdo 'grel): mas brgyan pa zhon/ /rdzu 'phrul brgya byin dang 'gran pa'i/ /gling bzhi yi ni 'khor los sgyur/ /sa rnams ma lus skyong bar byed/ /de dag bde gshegs sku gdung la/ /me tog gdugs phul 'bras bu yin/ /gdugs phul
214a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i gtam ste dgu pa'o// //bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khrungs gnas dang/ /de yi yid tsam bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /rab tu gsal ba'i grags gyur pa/ /nus pa kun gyis gdung snod sku/ /shin tu khyad 'phags gtsug
214b1(mdo 'grel): tor mtho/ /sku gzugs bzhengs nas legs sbyangs la/ /skye bo gang gis sku bzhengs pa'i/ /nang du ring bsrel bcug byas nas/ /kun nas brgya byin las 'phags pa'i/ /mi dbang gling bzhi rnams su ni/ /dpal dang ldan pas longs spyod nas/ /mdza' 
214b2(mdo 'grel): cu rnam dag go 'phang thob/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung bcug las yin/ /zla ba dang 'dra ba lta na sdug/ /smin ma legs shing mig dkyus ring/ /mir skyes gser dang nor bur ldan/ /bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa/ /rgya mtshos gtugs pa'i sa rnams
214b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ skyong byed 'khor los sgyur rgyal yang/ /de dag sangs rgyas sku gzugs ni/ /ring bsrel dang bcas gus par 'thob/ /ring bsrel gyi gtam ste bcu pa'o// //bde bar gshegs pa mchog rnams kyi/ /pho brang mchog ni rgyan byed pa//
214b4(mdo 'grel): gser gyi mdog dang ldan 'gyur zhing/ /nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /lha dang mi las khyad 'phags shing/ /nyi ma'i 'khor lo lta bur mdzes/ /nor dang gser ni mang ba dang/ /rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum
214b5(mdo 'grel): gyis mchod pa yi/ /sangs rgyas la ni gang zhig 'dir/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas byed pa/ /'gro ba'i bdag po tshe ring zhing/ /sna tshogs nad kyis 'jigs las grol/ /gang yin de yis skad cig thob/ /bde gshegs maN+Dal byed de dag
214b6(mdo 'grel): pha rol phyin drug thob 'gyur to/ /chu dang sa bsres btang sbyin pa/ /grog mo sogs sel tshul khrims te/ /bsres nas nyes pa bzod pa yin/ /'bad pa byed pa brtson 'grus yin/ /skad cig de las rtse gcig tu/ /sems 'dzin byed
214b7(mdo 'grel): pa bsam tan yin/ /legs par gzo ba shes rab bo/ /sna tshogs bsod nams kyis brgyan la/ /sa gzhi bris pa 'bul byed pa/ /lha yi bde ba thams cad dang/ /longs spyod mchog dang ldan 'gyur zhing/ /mir skyes gser las lhag pa
215a1(mdo 'grel): yi/ kha dog dang ldan mdzes pa dang/ /pad+ma'i mdog ltar yan lag tshang/ /mig ni dkyus ring mdzes par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal gyi gtam ste bcu gcig pa'o// //pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i lag pa mdzes/ /'od gsal
215a2(mdo 'grel): kha dog dri bzang ldan/ /ro zhim? reg na bde ba dang/ /lha dang ma yi khang bzangs na/ /'od gsal gser gyi gzhod pa ru/ /lha yi bdud rtsis bkang za ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/ /dge 'dun yul du lhag pa la/ /zhal zas
215a3(mdo 'grel): drangs pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /rdo rje gdan la bzhugs nas ni/ /'dod pa'i dgra dang bcas pa yi/ /tshogs ni byams pas des pham mdzad/ /gang zhig mthar thug dka' ba'i yul/ /mdza' med par ni spyod 'gyur pa'o/ /nyon mongs dka' 
215a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i dgra las rgyal/ /phung po'i bdud kyang rab bcom nas/ /'chi bdag bdud la mnga' brnyes pa/ /zhal zas phul bar gyur pas yin/ /ro rnams bro ba'i mchog dang ni/ /yan lag chang zhing yongs rdzogs ldan/ /bde zhing dpal ldan
215a5(mdo 'grel): stobs dang ldan/ /tshe dang stobs dang kha dog dang/ /gzugs bzang ba dang ldan pa ni/ /mkhas pas zas mchog btang las byung/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi/ /rnam grangs las ni nges par rgyal/ /yang dag dpal thob mi
215a6(mdo 'grel): dbang gi /ro ldan kha zas longs spyod pa/ /rtag tu zas mchog sbyin nges yin/ /zas kyi gtam gyi ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //g.yo zhing utpal gyis bsgos pa/ /dri med pad+ma rA ga bzhin/ /yid 'ong gser gyi song du
215a7(mdo 'grel): blugs/ /dri zhim tsan dan gyis bsgos mngar/ /yid du 'ong dang bdar zhing 'thung/ /cung zad mig ni zangs mdog 'dra/ /glu len sgra dang nges ldan pa'i/ /mi mchog de dag sgom? rnams ni/ /sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /in+d+ra nI
215b1(mdo 'grel): la bai DUrya/ /rin chen mchog rnams kyis spras pa'i/ /gser gyi snod ni gang yin par/ /lha gang lha yi bu mo ni/ brang gi dkyil na nu ma ni/ /bum pa lta bu'i 'bur ldan pa'i/ /rab mdzes bcugs dang lhan cig tu/ /sbrang rtsi ltar mngar
215b2(mdo 'grel): btung 'thung ba/ /yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la ni/ /btung ba yid 'ong byin pa yi/ /'bras bu yin par mkhas rnams gsung/ /gang zhig kha dog dri zhim sogs/ /tshogs ldan skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel/ bad kan rlung drag rab zhi byed//
215b3(mdo 'grel): kha ra pi bi ling bsres tshor/ /tsan dan lta bur tsha ba sel/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i/ /snod du blugs nas de dag gis/ /gus par dge 'dun la phul bas/ /pha rol gyi ni skye gnas su/ /lha yi ltung ba thob par 'gyur/ /mngar zhim mngar
215b4(mdo 'grel): mchog gus pa yis/ /btung ba tshogs mchog la phul bas/ /lha dang mi yi gnas rnams su/ /lha yi bu mo mchog rnams dang/ /yun ring btung ba lha cig 'thung/ /gang zhig sa gnas mi rnams kyis/ /dang pa'i dad pa'i yid kyis ni/ /dge
215b5(mdo 'grel): 'dun la ni btung ba mchog /dus la bab par drang ba yis/ /'khor ba'i ri khrod gnas pa na/ /rtag tu btung ba'ang zhim bzang 'thob/ /btung ba'i gtam ste bcu gsum pa'o// //gang zhig sngo ser ljang dmar dkar/ /sna tshogs
215b6(mdo 'grel): kha dog 'od bzang la/ /mdzes gsal gos kyi phreng ba ni/ /yon tan mchog dang ldan pa yi/ /'jig rten bla ma la phul bas/ /bsngags pa'i gos mchog thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig dge 'dun mchog sogs la/ /gang zhig dad dang gus
215b7(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /gos kyi phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /de ni ngo tsha shes gos dang/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i chos kyi gos/ /nyon mongs gnyen po'i chos gos thob/ /kha dog sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i/ /sngon po ser po dkar po dang/ /gzhan yang dmar po
216a1(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong ba/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos dag dang/ /chos gos phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /bde 'gro yi ni bde bar 'gro/ /gzugs dang ldan zhing yid 'ong la/ /lha yi gos ni zad med dang/ /ngo tsha shes pa'i gos kyis
216a2(mdo 'grel): brgyan/ dag blo dang gis mkhas pa dang/ /de ni chos kyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /gos kyi gtam ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //me tog bzang po dge 'dun la/ /rab tu 'thor zhing mchod byed pa/ /brgya byin las lhag longs
216a3(mdo 'grel): spyod ldan/ /pad+ma'i dbang po lta bur mdzes/ /mchog tu grags pa dang ldan zhing/ /rtag tu de ni skad cig gis/ /dgra las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /sa rnams las ni spyod byed pa'i/ /rin chen mchog gi mir gyur pas/ /spos mchog dang
216a4(mdo 'grel): ni dri bzangs kyis/ /rgyal ba rnam la 'bul byed pa/ /lus kyi grags pa'i dri yis khyab/ /utpal sngo dang mnyam pa yi/ /mig ni dri med dkyus ring mdzes/ /bai DUrya dang mu tig dang/ /rin po che yis yan lag brgyan/ /lus kun ku
216a5(mdo 'grel): sha'i gos kyis g.yogs/ /skye ba kun tu mi yi mchog /gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa ni/ /dge 'dun dri bzang phul ba yin/ /sna tshogs pa yi sman rnams ni/ /de dge dge 'dun la phul bas/ /mdze la sogs pa'i nang rnams kyi//
216a6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las grol/ /bzhin ni mdzed shing gser rnams dang/ /mnyam zhing kha dog yid du 'ong/ /rgyal po yi ni 'tshe ba rnams/ /gang yin pa dang bral ba 'thob/ /me tog la sogs pa'i gtam ste bco lnga pa'o// //
216a7(mdo 'grel): sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur gang la/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /mkhur ba rna rgyan mdzes ltung bas/ /gus ldan legs par spyi bo yis/ /lan mang du ni phyag byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas phyag byed pa'i/ /'bras bu yin zhes
216b1(mdo 'grel): mkhas rnams smra/ /skyes pa tsam gyis gtsor 'gyur ba'i/ /rtag tu mthon po'i rigs skye zhing/ /rta dang glang pos rgyu byed pa/ /de dag bla ma 'phags pa la/ /legs par phyag ni byas pas yin/ /snyan pa yis ni khyab 'gyur zhing/ /nges par legs
216b2(mdo 'grel): par 'dzin pa dang/ /gsal bar byed pa'i 'od kyis ni/ /sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing/ /nad ni thams cad 'joms par byed/ /'jig rten du ni bde 'gror des/ /mi dbang gis ni rgyun tu gyur/ /'bras bu dpal dang ldan pa yang//
216b3(mdo 'grel): thub dbang phyug byas pa las yin/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal stobs grogs ldan/ /yan lag sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan/ /rgyal 'gyur sa steng gtso bo de/ /sangs rgyas la ni phyag byas pa'i/ /'bras bu yin par blo ldan gsungs//
216b4(mdo 'grel): de ltar yon tan tshogs shes par/ /lus 'di 'jigs par shes nas ni/ /mkhas pas sangs rgyas phyag bya zhing/ /lus kyi las ni legs par spyad/ /phyag gcig 'tshal bar gyur pa yis/ /'khor ba spongs pa'i rgyu 'thob cing/ /
216b5(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba'i 'jigs mthong gus pa yin/ /de ltar su zhig phyag mi byed/ /phyag gi gtam ste bcu drug pa'o// //griSh+Na sa ri ltar mdzes gzugs/ /stobs ldan 'jam zhing shin tu snum/ /dgun dus sro khang gos bzang bgos/
216b6(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong 'dzes ma la 'khyung nas/ /mi dbang gang zhig rtse byed cing/ /ro mchog sna tshogs ldan pa ni/ /rin chen snod blugs 'thung ba ni/ /de dag sgron ma phul ba yi/ /shin tu 'bras bu mngon yin par/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rin chen gsung
216b7(mdo 'grel): 'bar zhing me lce rgyas dang ldan/ /khang pa'i nang du me 'bar gsal/ /dgun dus grangs ba sel byed pa/ /sna pa thub pa'i dbang po ni/ /mchog tu gyur la phul ba yis/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten na/ /gsal zhing rab tu 'bar gyur dang/ /dri
217a1(mdo 'grel): za lha min mi 'am ci/ /byad bzhin mdzes dang lhan cig tu/ /ston zla dang 'dra rab mdzes pa/ /sdug pa yang bar 'khyud nas ni/ /lus ni yid du 'ong ba dang/ /mtho ris su ni spyod byed pa/ /de dag gang tshe 'phags tshogs
217a2(mdo 'grel): la/ /snang ba dang bas phul ba yin/ /rkyen ma las rgyal bzhon par ldan/ /sa? rnams ma lus rjes su skyong/ /byad bzang gser gyis yan lag brgyan/ /de dag gis ni snang ba rnams/ /phul ba'i 'bras bu 'di dag yin/ /snang ba'i gtam
217a3(mdo 'grel): ste bcu bdun pa'o// //ri rnams kyis ni bsgrib pa dang/ /mchog tu ring na gnas pa dang/ /shin tu phra ba'i dngos po dang/?  mtshan mo smag gis bsgribs pa dag /gang tshe lag mthil gnas pa ltar/ /dge slong ma 'gag pa
217a4(mdo 'grel): yi mthong/ /de ni bde bar gshegs pa la/ /zhu mar phul ba'i 'bras bu yin/ /spyan gyis dngos kun gzigs pa'i phyir/ /bde gshegs mar me phul ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni mnyen zhes grags/ /phul ba bcom ldan
217a5(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ /thub dbang dri med spyan la phul/ /ring dang phra dang bsgribs pa dang/ /dpag tshad kyis mchod mthong la ltos/ /rgyal la zhugs mar phul ba yi/ /de 'bras yin par thub pas gsungs/ /sa bdag rgyal po gang yin pa//
217a6(mdo 'grel): zla ba lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa/ /utpal lta bur mig dkyus ring/ /gang zhig yis 'jig rten na/ /gser mdog 'od kyis snang ba ltar/ /rang gi 'od kyis snang byed pa'i/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ /nor bu brgya phrag 'od zer
217a7(mdo 'grel): gyis/ sa rnams rgyu zhing sna byed pa/ /de dag shAkya seng ge la/ /gus par mar me phul ba yi/ /rgya cher 'phel bar gyur pa yin/ /lha gang 'jig rten gsal byed cing/ /utpal lta bu'i mig ldan la/ /smin ma legs shing gser mchog
217b1(mdo 'grel): ldan/ mig stong dang ni ldan pa yi/ /brgya byin lha yi bdag po nyid/ /lha yi stan la 'dug pa dang/ /gang zhig 'dod bral tshangs pa yi/ /'od gsal lha mchog phyag byed cing/ /lha yi shing rta g.yo byed pa/ /ston pa yi ni ring bsrel la/ /mar me'i
217b2(mdo 'grel): phreng ba mis phul bas/ /'bras bu rgya chen gyur pa yin/ /mar me'i gtam ste bco brgyad pa'o// //mi dbang dus ni thams cad du/ /nyams dga' ba yi khang bzangs mchog /rol mo'i gnas kyis nyams dga' bar/ /'tsho zhing rgyal
217b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i sgra sgrogs par/ /brtson ma'o 'khor dang rol byed pa/ /grang ba sel ba'i khang pa ni/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni byon pa yi/ /dge 'dun bzhugs gnas phul bas yin/ /thub pa 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bcas/ /gtsug lag khang gi don
217b4(mdo 'grel): du ni/ tshig gis rab tu bskul ba dang/ /tshogs pa yis ni grogs byed cing/ /nges par dus su 'gro byed pa/ /gnyid log pa 'am langs pa na/ /bsod nams rgyun ni tshad med 'phel/ /shes rab rdo rje'i mtshon tsha yis/ /phyin ci yog gi ri
217b5(mdo 'grel): bcom nas/ /sa dang bcas pa'i khang bzang 'gyur/ /dge 'dun la ni yo byad dang/ /longs spyod bzang po dang bcas pa/ /gtsug lag khang ni gang zhig byed/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs ni/ /rin chen mchog gi rang bzhin gyi/ /rtsig
217b6(mdo 'grel): pa ka ba dang ldan pa'i/ /mdzes ldan lhan cig dus kun tu/ /de ni lha yi 'jig rten 'dir/ /yun ring du ni mngon par dga' / /dpal dang ldan pa'i bla bre dang/ /sna tshogs kyis ni gos kyis spras/ /khang bzang mchog ni 'od phro ba/ /yang dag gnas
217b7(mdo 'grel): par gyur ba ni/ /yon tan tshogs ldan phul pa yis/ /brgya byin gyis ni khang bzang mchog /rnam par rgyal byed thob pa yin/ /gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa'i gtam ste bcu dgu pa'o// //khyogs dang sten ni mnyam pa ru/ /'bol stan la ni chung
218a1(mdo 'grel): ma ni/ nu ma rgyas dang lhan gcig tu/ /mal stan la ni sa bdag nyal/ /nyes pa'i tshogs spangs dam pa la/ /de yis mal stan phul ba yin/ /rkang rten dang bcas khri la ni/ /sna tshogs gos kyi rgyan la 'dug /dbyangs
218a2(mdo 'grel): snyan rol mo dang mgrin 'debs/ /rin chen rang bzhin stan la ni/ /dri zhim pas ni byug pa yis/ /dad ldan mal stan chen po la/ /dpung ba la ni mgo brtan nas/ /yun ring lha yi khang pa ru/ /'jigs pa med par bde bar nyal/ /de
218a3(mdo 'grel): dag mal cha stan rnams ni/ /dge 'dun rnams la phul ba yi/ /'di ni 'bras bu yin par bshad/ /ga bur tsan dan a ga ru/ /lus byug pa yi lha mo ni/ /num zung ldan lus brten nas/ /gos mchog 'bol stan la rtags
218a4(mdo 'grel): nyal/ de dag mchod rten rnams la ni/ /gdugs dang gos khri phul bas yin/ /mal cha dang stan gyi gtam ste nyi shu pa'o// //gling bzhi la ni rnam rgyal nas/ /stobs ldan brgya byin gnas yin te/ /nga la nu yis sum cu
218a5(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /bdag po'i stan phyed dbang byas nas/ /'dod pa'i bde ba'i dga' ba myong/ /zhag bdun bar du dbyig rnams kyi/ /char ni khang par dpag med phab/ /de dag lhung bzed du gtor ba'i/ /sbyin pa chen po de yis ni/ /'bras
218a6(mdo 'grel): bu ngo mtshar chen po yin/ /snod ni de dang de dag gis/ /rgyu bzhi dag la bsten pa yis/ /sdug bsngal la sogs bye brag gis/ /'bras bu tha dad tha dad 'gyur/ /de phyir mi dbang khyad 'phags rgyal/ /zla ba lta bu'i bzhin dang ni//
218a7(mdo 'grel): utpal lta bu'i kha dog dang/ /mi rnams nang du rtag par ni/ /dri med mig ldan ro sdod yangs/ /dga' zhing stan dang mal cha dang/ /zas dang snod du ldan pa yi/ mi rnams sbyin pas yang dag 'thob/ /mi mchog gis ni nad pa dang//
218b1(mdo 'grel): dman pa dang ni dbul ba rnams/ /snying rje can gyis sbyin btang bas/ /dpal ldan yang dag khyad 'phags 'gro/ /mi dbang brgya byin dang mnyam rtse/ /dga' zhing bu dang bran g.yogs bcas/ /zla ba dang 'dra bzhin gyi mchog /mig yangs lus ni nyi
218b2(mdo 'grel): ma bzhin/ /grags pa snyan pa dag dang ldan/ /mi dbang dgra yi stobs 'joms shing/ /bde ba thams cad thob pa ni/ /de yis rang gi bla ma dang/ /pha ma rnams la sbyin las byung/ /gang zhig rta dang shing rta glang/ /zhon la skye bo'i tshogs phyag 'tshal/
218b3(mdo 'grel): gser gyi yu ba dang ldan pa/ /zla ba'i dbyibs dang ldan pa yis/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer zlog byed thogs/ /mi dbang mchog tu gyur pa ste/ /'khor los sgyur byed rgyal po yin/ /sa rnams dbang phyug dang bcas pa'i/ /gang zhig rgyal por gyur pa
218b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ yang dag zhing la de dag gis/ /sbyin pa'i sa bon sbyangs pa yi/ /yon tan mchog gi 'bras de yin/ /dman pa'i snod la sbyin pa yis/ /mang du byin yang 'bras bu nyung/ /yur ma tsher ma'i skyon bcas dang/ /rdo ba'i steng gi zhing rnams la/
218b5(mdo 'grel): sa bon mang pa btab pa bzhin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang ti mug spangs/ /yon tan gyis bzhan zhing la sbyin/ /nyung ngu byin yang mang du 'byung/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i sa bon bzhin/ /zhing gi gtam ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// //gang gis chos kyi
218b6(mdo 'grel): sbyin byin zhing/ /bri ba dang ni nyan pa dang/ /rtag tu de dag sems nyid dang/ /gal te yang dag sgom byed na/ /skye ba dran pa rtag tu 'thob/ /gang zhig lha yi 'jig rten na/ /dpag bsam gyi ni shing gi mchog /don rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa//
218b7(mdo 'grel): lha tshogs bde ba'i mchog gyur pa/ /de ni ba mchog sbyin pa yin/ /rgya che ba yi 'bras bu yin/ /gang zhig mngal du rdzogs par ni/ gtsang zhing yid 'ong ro myong la/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi stobs dang ni/ /gang zhig 'o ma 'thung tshe yang/ /pad+ma'i ge sar
219a1(mdo 'grel): mdangs ldan pa/ /bu lce'i dus gang yin par 'thung/ /skyes rdzogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ /bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang 'thung byed pa/ /de ni pa mchog btang las byung/ /seng ge ni khi ni rab dga' zhing/ mdzes pa gus
219a2(mdo 'grel): pas chos la ni/ /rim pa bzhin du des phul bas/ /gzhig par mi nus rdo rje'i gdan/ /rab mchog seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /lha klu grub pa phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /gser gyi snod du rtag tu der/ /ro ldan 'o ma rlugs nas ni//
219a3(mdo 'grel): mi yi mchog ni 'thung byed cing/ /dpal ldan phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /pad+ma'i mdog ldan bud med snyed/ /de ni ma he mchog btang yin/ /rtag tu nad pa nyam chung la/ /bzhon pa mchog ni sbyin pa dang/ /bla ma rnams ni mnyams?
219a4(mdo 'grel): byas nas/ /btsun zhing mi rnams kyis bstod 'gyur/ /gser gyi chas kyi brgyan pa yi/ /rta ni yid du 'ong ba la/ /mi mchog rtag tu zhon nas rgyu/ /shin tu ring ba'i yul rnams su/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gro byed pa/ /bzhon pa mchog ni
219a5(mdo 'grel): byin pa yis/ /de lta bu yi mi ru 'gyur/ /do shal dang ni do shal phyed/ /'og bag dang ni ldan pa yi/ /yid 'ong lha mo rnams la rtse/ /sum cu gsum bdag dang 'gran pa/ /ltos pa med par byin pa las/ /byung bar mkhas
219a6(mdo 'grel): rnams rab tu bshad/ /bdud kyis zil gyi mi non cing/ /legs par gsung pa rtag tu ni/ /bdud rtsi lta bur mnyan par gyis/ /sa gzhi lta bur chos kyi yum/ /nyon mongs dgra ni spong bar byed/ /'khor ba'i bde ba nyams myong zhing/
219a7(mdo 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi/ /rab mchog nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /dub pa'i dus ni thams cad du/ /mkhas pa gnas ni phul ba yis/ /mtho ris phyin nas rtag tu dga' / /brgya byin dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rtag tu dga' ba myong
219b1(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /'dir ni skyang mos tshal phul gas? tshogs yin shing rnams la/ /me tog dri zhim dang ldan zhing/ /mngon par mtho ba'i mi thob nas/ /skyed mos tshal rnams longs spyod ldan/ /chu bo rgal ?dka' ba yi/ /gnas su zam pa 'dzugs
219b2(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /mi de longs spyod dang ldan pa'o/ /mtho ris gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gser mdog lta bu'i lus dang ldan/ /nyams dga' rdzing bu byed pa'i mi/ /mtho ris gnas ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di ru mir gyur nas/ /rgyal po yi ni
219b3(mdo 'grel): dga' bde thob/ /khron pa dang ni bu nyen khang/ /sems can rnams ni brten pa dang/ /snyan pa grang ba skyob gyur pa/ /byed pa'i mi mchog gar yin pa/ /lha yi bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha ba yi/ /shin tu sdug bsngal ldan pa
219b4(mdo 'grel): la/ gang zhig gdugs ni sbyin byed pa/ /gdugs dang 'dra bar de dag ni/ /dgra yi tshogs las rgyal 'gyur zhing/ /rtag tu bde ba mchog dang ldan/ /mchil lham rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/ /sems can thams cad dag la ni/ /gus pa yis ni
219b5(mdo 'grel): sbyin byed pa/ /de dag bzhon pa mchog rnams la/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du/ /yun ring zhon par skye bar 'gyur/ /yon tan rnams ni sgrogs pa yis/ /rgyal ba mchog gis bstod byed pa/ /thams cad dag ni bstod pa yis/ /lus kyi
219b6(mdo 'grel): phyag ni 'tshal byed pa/ /bla mar bsten pa'i rigs skyes zhing/ /de dag so sor rig pa 'thob/ /rdza rnga bi wang paTa tas?/ /bde bar gshegs mchog mchod byed pa/ /mir gyur nas ni dbyangs snyan la/ /sgra ni shin tu snyan par 'os/ /yid du 'ong ba'i
219b7(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang ldan/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /dga' bas srog shing 'dzugs byed cing/ /gdugs dang dril bu rnams dang ni/ /gdugs kyi phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /de dag ming ni rgya che zhing/ /dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa 'thob
220a1(mdo 'grel): mir gyur pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /bdag po nyid ni stobs dang ldan/ /dpung rgyan mu tig brgyan ldan pa/ /sa rnams sbyin par btang ba las/ /yin pa ru ni mkhas pa 'chad/ /mchod rten dang ni rgyal ba yi/ /sku
220a2(mdo 'grel): mchog rnams ni bzhengs byed pa/ /gdugs ldan sku gdung 'jug byed pa/ /mtho ris yang dag 'dir thob nas/ /mi rnams kyis ni bstod par 'gyur/ /gang zhig dang por sangs rgyas la/ /sa dang lci bas byugs nas ni/ /me tog 'bras
220a3(mdo 'grel): bu zas skoms phul/ /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /rgyal po'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal chen mar me sna tshogs dang/ /dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang/ /bu ram la sogs btung ba rnams/ /dge 'dun la ni 'bul byed pa/ /de yang
220a4(mdo 'grel): nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing/ /lha ma'i bde ba dag dang ldan/ /mchod rten gdung bcas gtsug lag khang/ /mi gang 'bad pas nyen 'khor 'chag/ /kun nas dri ma med byed pa/ /gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu snang ba 'bul
220a5(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /grang dus gos dang khang ba dang/ /rgyan dang bu mo btung ba byin/ /skye gnas rnams su bde ldan 'gyur/ /sa stengs du ni tshe ring zhing/ /thams cad nad las 'grol bar 'gyur/ /mnyam pa med pa'i bde ba thob/ /de dag rtag tu bde
220a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan/ /lha yi bde ba sna tshogs pa/ /nyams su myong zhing 'byung 'gyur pa/ /srog gcod spangs pa las yin par/ /nges par mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan/ /gzhan mthong brnab sems mi byed pa/ /chem rkun las ni dbyen gyur cing//
220a7(mdo 'grel): rdzas ni yongs su slang bar byed/ /gseng dang dpag med phun tshogs thob/ /rkun ma brgya phrag dag gis ni/ /mi dbang las ni dbral mi nus/ /chud ma gzhan la mi 'phyo zhing/ /legs bsrungs chung ma nyams med rnyed/ /skye bar dgrar
220b1(mdo 'grel): gyur cung zad med/ /'dir ni 'jig rten yid rten cing/ /de la yid mi ches yod min/ /de dang der ni skye ba na/ /utpal sngon po lta bur ni/ /dri ldan yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs/ /de ni mi 'gyur kha dri zhim/ /rdzun gyi tshig kyang smre ma yin//
220b2(mdo 'grel): dam pa yi ni grogs ldan zhing/ /mi dbang gis ni gus pas mchod/ /bu dang chung ma bran dang ni/ /longs spyod rgya ni chen po yis/ /dpag tu med pa'i bde 'thob pa/ /rtag tu phra ma spangs pas yin/ /yid du 'ong zhing sgra snyan la/ /ngag ni snyan
220b3(mdo 'grel): par 'os pa dang/ /rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang/ /mi rnams dang ni lha rnams su/ /de rgyal tshig ni tsub mo dag /mi de yis ni spangs pas yin/ /chos don dben pa dga' ba yis/ /smra ba de ni 'jig rten gyi/ /rtag tu mchog tu yid 'ong 'gyur
220b4(mdo 'grel): yang yang mchod pa ngo yis 'thob/ /rin chen mang dang bzhon pas phyug /mngon mtho 'jig rten sna tshogs pa'i/ /bde ba mdza' yas myong bar 'gyur/ /bdag gzhan chags pa spangs pa yis/ /de 'dir 'dod chags chung 'gyur zhing//
220b5(mdo 'grel): rtag tu longs spyod rgya chen ldan/ /ngag la dbang zhing grags ldan 'gyur/ /rab tu mdzes pa nyid thob cing/ /de ni rtag tu phyug cing bde/ /rgyal srid kyis mtho 'jig rten gyi/ /tshangs pa nyid ni thob 'gyur zhing/ /yang dag byams pa'i sems
220b6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa/ /dbang po yod pa'i mi ru skye/ /mtho ris thar 'bras bde ba thob/ /yang dag rdzogs dang mi de ldan/ /gang phyir 'di dag thams cad ni/ /yang dag lta ba mchog tu ni/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu yin/ /dang dang blo gros dang ldan pa'i//
220b7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams kyi ni zhing mchog las/ /sa gsum bde ba rgya chen skyes/ /de lta'i khyad par mi shes nas/ /yon tan rin chen thams cad kyi/ /gter du gyur pa'i dad pa ni/ /rtag tu de yis bsten par bya/ /dad pa yis ni ma bzhin du/ /dge ba
221a1(mdo 'grel): rnams ni bskyed par bya/ /de bas thog mar skyes bu yis/ /yid kyis legs par bsten par bya/ /'byung gnas dad pa spangs pa yis/ /dam chos rin chen byang chub phyogs/ /nges par gzung bar nus ma yin/ /rgyal po
221a2(mdo 'grel): las ni nyams pa yis/ /longs spyod 'bras las nyams pa ltar/ /dad pa'i dbang po las nyams na/ /de bzhin 'bras rnams thob ma yin/ /de phyir skyes bu mkhas pa ni/ /'jig rten bde gshegs byed 'dod pas/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba
221a3(mdo 'grel): yis/ rtag tu phan pa nyid du gyis/ /lhag mas nyes pa zhi ma yin/ /gzhan du dad pa dang ldan pa'i/ /nyes pa'i tshogs ni thams cad sreg/ dman zhing gos med rmongs pa dang/ /lag pa na ni thod pa thogs/ /'jig rten 'di na slong ba
221a4(mdo 'grel): snad/ sbyin pa med pa'i 'bras la ltos/ /tha dad khyim du slong zhing rgyu/ /rtag tu bkres par kun tu 'khor/ /gang zhig lus la lag rkyong yi/ /khyi dang 'dra bar ring na gnas/ /kun tu 'jug cing slong ba la/ /phyir zlog nyung shas cha gcig
221a5(mdo 'grel): kyang/ gang zhig kha zas mi ster ba/ /kha ni khab tsam lta ba ri/ /lus skam skra yi gos kyis ni/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer snang min la/ /yi dags skom gyis gdungs pa snang/ /'bras de lag gis ma byin cing/ /dus ma byin pa'i 'bras bur gsungs/
221a6(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs bsdus pa'i gtam ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //bsod nams spro ba bskyed pa mnyan par gyis/ /gtong dang bsod nams dkon pa ste/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la/ /sku gdung rnams ni bcug byas na//
221a7(mdo 'grel): khrus gsol gdugs ni 'degs pa dang/ /maN+Dal zas dang skom rnams dang/ /gos dang me tog la sogs dang/ /snang ba dang ni mar me dang/ /gtsug lag khang du mal stan dang/ /zhing dang sna tshogs phul nas ni/ /bstod cing phyag ni 'tshal
221b1(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /'di 'dra du ma? phun sum tshogs/ /gtam ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /yang yang sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /mtsho ni sgrul gyis gang bzhin du/ /me tog lo ma rgyas pa yi/ /ljon shing ched ma dang bcas bzhin/ /thos dang dpyod dang
221b2(mdo 'grel): rigs ldan zhing/ /de lta bu yi bye brag can/ /tshul khrims la ni rgyab phyogs yin/ /dbul yang khrims ldan mchog yin gyi/ /yon tan rgyan dang bral ba yi/ /nor ldan rnams dang mtshungs ma yin/ /dbul yang skyes bu dam pa rnams/ /de dag
221b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan ro myang bas/ /bdud rtsi lta bur khyad par 'phags/ /yang dag dran bya bla ma bzhin/ /yon tan ldan 'phags gzi brjid ldan/ /nor rnams dang ni rgyan dang ni/ /de dag rgyal po rnams kyis ni/ /drung du nye bar mchod 'dod pas/ /tshul khrims/
221b4(mdo 'grel): 'di ni bsrung bar gyis/ /'jig rten bde ba rnams rgyal ba'i/ /'jigs dang zhe sdang bcas pa la/ /chos kyi bdag nyid blo byas te/ /bde mchog phyir ni skyes bu yis/ /bde ba rgya chen mi 'phrogs pa/ /thob par 'dod pa de yis ni/ /tshul khrims
221b5(mdo 'grel): nyid ni bsrung bar gyis/ /tshul khrims las nyams 'dul zhing 'che/ /de yis 'jigs bcas nyams su myong/ /tshul khrims ldan la de dag med/ /de nas 'jig rten pha rol tu/ /mdza' yis gtugs shing 'gro ba na/ /bde ba'i yul rnams
221b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa yis/ /de yis tshul khrims 'di nyid bsrungs/ /tshul khrims brtan dang des ldan na/ /bde 'gro nyon mongs bdag nyid min/ /log par lta bas lam gol phyir/ /de phyir thar pa rab byung zhing/ /rtags ldan mtho ris 'dod ba yis//
221b7(mdo 'grel): de yis tshul khrims 'di nyid bsrungs/ /mi 'jigs dprog tu med pa'i rgyan/ /tshul khrims 'di yin bsrung bar gyis/ /tshul khrims nor gyi mchog yin te/ /gzhan gyi dbrog cing rkur mi tshugs/ /tshul khrims bstan te 'chi ba na/ /gzhan du
222a1(mdo 'grel): rjes 'brang lus ma yin/ /tshul khrims rjes su 'brang ba'i grogs/ /tshul khrims rgyan gyi mchog yin te/ /rgyan de la ni stor ba med/ /yid gtsugs pa yi grogs po yin/ /tshul khrims lta bu'i phan byed med/ /tshul khrims
222a2(mdo 'grel): yang dag nges pa'i gnyen/ /pha dang ma dang bu yin te/ /'dod pa ster ba tshul khrims te/ /mthu yis 'bras bu 'di sbyin byed/ /tshul khrims kyi gtam ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //bskal ba stong du bsags pa yi/ /sbyin dang  
222a3(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs mchod la sogs/ /legs spyad gang yin de kun yang/ /khong khro gcig gis 'joms par byed/ /zhe sdang dang mnyam sdig pa med/ /bzod dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub med/ /de phyid 'bad pas bzod pa bsgoms//
222a4(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs pa yi tshul gyis ni/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis ma bzung na/ /dga' dang bde ba myong ma yin/ /sdang pa'i zug rdu yid gnas la/ /gnyid med brtan pa yod ma yin/ /zhe sdang bral bar ma gyur na/ /ji srid 'tsho bar gnod dang bcas
222a5(mdo 'grel): khos ba gcig pu bcom pa yis/ /rnam par sdang ba thams cad bcom/ /rtog pa'i bud shing la mched pa'i/ /khro ba'i me yis 'gro ba sreg/ dang por bdag nyid sreg byed la/ /gzhan dag sreg pa 'am yang na min/ /rgas pa yis ni
222a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs bzhin dang/ /khros dang mun pas mig dang ni/ /blo dang bral bas 'dod don ldan/ /de bas khro ba 'joms par byed/ /dge ba'i las la 'di sbyar bya/ /bdag la gnod byed 'byung ba dang/ /de las bzlog par bya snyam na/ /
222a7(mdo 'grel): sdig ldan sems yin khrod ci yod/ mtshon sogs byed pa spangs nas ni/ /'phen pa ci zhig khro ru yod/ /rtsod byed zhe sdang yin pas na/ /de phyir zhe sdang la sdang bsngags/ /bzod pa'i gtam ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o/ //
222b1(mdo 'grel): yon tan rin chen thams cad kyi/ /gter du gyur pa brtson 'grus te/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho kun sgrol ba'i/ /rgya chen mchog ni brtson 'grus yin/ /brtson 'grus shing rta gang zhon pa/ /dngos po bsam pas mi 'thob pa/ /de 'dra
222b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro na yod ma yin/ /glang po rta dang rkang thang dang/ /mda' dar 'da' chen dgra sta dang/ /mtshon cha yis ni g.yul 'gyed cing/ /dgra bgegs mthar ni rgyal byed pa/ /'di de stobs dang ldan pa yi/ /brtson 'grus dpa' bo chen po yin//
222b3(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho chu srin tshogs gnas shing/ /chu rlabs mthon por rim rgyu ba/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i dpa' bo yis/ /ba glang rjes bzhin 'gom par byed/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen gyis/ /gter ni len par byed pa yin/ /'dod chags la sogs
222b4(mdo 'grel): sprul gdug rnams/ /lus la brtson 'grus can gyis spong/ /khrims ldan skye bo dam pa ni/ /sems ni dri med khyad 'phags pas/ /mir ni yang dag mnyam bzhig 'dzin/ /ri rab mdzes pa'i rtse mo ru/ /blta na sdug pa'i lha mo la/ /phang du
222b5(mdo 'grel): lag pas 'khyud pa yis/ /bde dang ldan zhing dga' bar byed/ /mkha' gnas lha ni gang yin pas/ /gnyis gnyis ldan pa des spangs nas/ /yang dag nyid kyi bde ba myong/ /shin tu 'bras bu rgya che ba'i/ /bskyed pa'i rgyu ni brtson 'grus te/
222b6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa la sbyor de sbyor byed/ /brtson 'grus kyi gtam ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //nyon mongs dgra yi sde tshan rnams/ /bsam gtan ldan pas zil mnan nas/ /yang dag byang chub dpal rnams 'thob/ /byang chub yan lag rab  
222b7(mdo 'grel): sbyin zhing/ /'chi med skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa/ /nyes pa thams cad sel ba yi/ /rgyu ni bsam gtan yin pa ru/ /blo ldan de yis rab tu gsungs/ /nam mkha' dang ni sems mnyam la/ /gser dang dong? bar
223a1(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa yis/ /bsam gtan sgom byed skyes bu yi/ /yon tan rnams kyi rgyu ru gsungs/ /nyon mongs dgra tshogs las rgyal ba'i/ /dge ba'i stobs kyis bsgrubs pa las/ /mtshan ni thams cad ldan pa yis//
223a2(mdo 'grel): yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal/ /yon tan rab mchog bdag nyid can/ /dkon pa'i rig pa thob par 'gyur/ /sems la ye shes bdag po yis/ /dgra yi 'jigs pa rnams spangs nas/ /gang gis mi yi dbang po
223a3(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /bsam gtan gcig pu de rgyu ste/ /yon tan kun gyi gter yin pas/ /'phags pa'i yon tan gyis phyug gsungs/ /rmongs pa'i mun pa sel mdzad cing/ /rgyun gyi rtal pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi
223a4(mdo 'grel): nyi ma dang/ /mi rnams dang ni lha rnams kyi/ /bde rgyu bsam gtan rab mchog yin/ /bsam gtan gyi gtam ste nyi shu drug pa'o// //shes rab stobs dang bral na yang/ /skyes pa'i gzugs brnyan 'ba' zhig ste//
223a5(mdo 'grel): snying po yangs pa'i mdza' thug par/ /ri mo bris pa'i gzugs dang mtshungs/ /blo ldan brtson 'grus yang ldan pa'i/ /blo ldan de la 'bras 'dod 'byung/ /bla med bdag gsod pa yi dgra/ /skye ba du mas gang chod dang/ /bdag nyid skye
223a6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur pa yis/ /rigs dang ming dang dus rnams dang/ /dbus bzhin du ni mdza' bzung la/ /rnal 'byor pa yi shes pa 'jug/ shes rab stobs kyis de shes gsungs/ /'jig rten rnams ni dri ma yi/ /rab rib tshogs ni sel byed
223a7(mdo 'grel): pas/ bde bas blo de chos mchog yin/ /ye shes snang ba bskyed pa yis/ /mi rnams kyis ni nyes pa'i tshogs/ /rtag tu stongs par byed pa yin/ /dang por dbang po 'di bsgrub bya/ /yid kyi phra rab rnam shes shing/ /rig pa thams cad gsal byed
223b1(mdo 'grel): yin/ shes rab de yang rtag par ni/ /stobs kyi dge ba skyed byed pa'i/ /rgyu yin par ni rtag tu grag/ bya ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/ /gdon mi za bar nub pa dang/ /g.yul gyi nang du shes rab gtso'o/ /shes rab stobs kyis rnam rgyal
223b2(mdo 'grel): thob? thos pa'i shes rab gang yin de/ /dge ba rnams kyi rgyu ru 'gyur/ /de lta yon tan thams cad ni/ /sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ /gdon mi za bar shes rab bsgrubs/ /shes rab med pa'i skyes bu ni/ /mi gsal the rangs
223b3(mdo 'grel): mar me bzhin/ /shes rab kyi gtam ste nyi shu bdun pa'o/ //mtho ris? thar pa'i yon tan ni/ /rin po che yi gter gyur pa/ /pha rol phyin pa drug 'di nyid/ /sa gzhi bzhin du shes pa'i mis/ /bdag phan bsgrubs pa de yis
223b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ /myur bar rtag par rgyun tu 'bab/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //legs par bshad pa rin po che'i za ma tog lta bu'i gtam snyan dngags chen po slob dpon
223b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' bos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ru tra dang/ dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur// //rgya gar skad du /tsa tur bi parya? ka tha/ bod skad du/ phyin ci log bzhi spong ba'i gtam/ 'jam dpal
223b6(mdo 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu dam pa yid 'ong yul rnams yongs smod sma bar gyur pa na/ /de la yid 'byung skyo bar byed na khyed yid skyo bar cis mi byed/ /khyed kyi lus sdug de yang nyes mang de la smad par byas pa ni/
223b7(mdo 'grel): yon tan mang yod de phyir bdag gi tshig ni cung zad mnyan par gyis/ /'di ni rtag par gyur tam mi rtag gyur kyang ji srid gyur par 'di ni bde pa'i don gyur tam/ /der ma gyur kyang gtsang bar gyur tam de med gyur kyang dbang yod gyur
224a1(mdo 'grel): rtag min bde ba'i rgyu min gtsang ba ma yin rang dbang can min na/ /ci phyir blo gros rab nyams khyed lus nyes brgyang bcas la chags byed smos/ /ri bo mthon po'i rtse mo'i steng nas sa la lhud? bar gyur pa
224a2(mdo 'grel): yis ? zhig par gyur che ci 'di bar snang la ni bde ba myong gyur tam/ /skyes nas brtsams te 'chi ba nyid phyir rtag tu rab tu rgyug pa na/ /sems can rnams ni bar skabs gang du bde ba ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis sa 'og 'dzul
224a3(mdo 'grel): te klu yi dbang po pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar 'byin byed/ gang gis mtho ris 'dzegs te dbang por bcas pa'i lha tshogs med par byed pa dang/ /gang gis stengs 'phyan 'phyan ni ga dang ni ra gu na la btus 'gyur ba'i/ /'chi bdag des ni tshugs
224a4(mdo 'grel): par gang bu gnas nas khyed ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /yun ring 'tsho yang lus ni rgas pas rab tu brnyings pa nyid du 'gyur/ /tshe ni thung 'gyur tshe ni mos la 'chi bdag khar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i bar na phongs par
224a5(mdo 'grel): bcas par gnas par 'gyur ba'i mi/ /nyams dang lhung bas 'di dang 'di las bde ba thob par yongs mi 'gyur/ /byis pa rnams la brtse med rgan la gus par gyur pa cung zad med/ /gzhon nu ma la ngor lta phra mo med cing nyams
224a6(mdo 'grel): thag rnams la rtse ded? pa/ /de ltar gzhung lugs med pa'i 'chi bdag gang yin de ni bdag la ni/ /dus la sdod ces gzhon lus sha rgyas sra bar khyed yin ma sems shig/ khyim drung gnas pa'i nor ni cung zad rkus zhes thos pa
224a7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa na/ rang gi khyim dag bsrung bar bya snyam sems pa 'di ni rig pa yin/ /mi ni khyim khyim dag nas nyin de drangs te khyed bar byed pa na/ /gshin rje la ci dogs med 'byung tam 'gro ba mel tshe cis mi byed/ /ji ltar gsang bya'i
224b1(mdo 'grel): me tog brang? po rtags? sil dkrol mis skor te/ /gsod? sar khrid la gom pa re re bor bas 'chi nye'i? sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de bzhin longs spyod la gnas nyin re 'chi bdag drung du 'gro byed kyis/ /kye khyod 'byor pa dag gis yid ni
224b2(mdo 'grel): dregs pa dag tu ma byed cig/ 'di? na? mi rnams tshe ni mchog tu  ring yang lo brgya kho nar zad/ /de las kyang ni dang po byis pa tha mar rgas pas don med byed/ /gnyid dang? nad sogs dag gis de dus med par kun nas re ba 'joms//
224b3(mdo 'grel): bde bar gnas pa'i mi nang 'gro ba'i tshe yi lhag ma ji tsam yod/ /sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po'i g.yul nas rgyal ba'i rgyal po de rnams ni/ /shes pa'i snang bas mun pa zad? byas drang srong de yang shi bar gyur/ /gshin rjes zin?
224b4(mdo 'grel): par gyur tshe longs spyod kyis min bshes pa dag gis min/ /skyes bu rtsol bas zlog mi byed na 'dir ni mi rnams su la ji ltar skyabs su 'gro/ /bstan bcos bklag dang bcas shing rig dang bzo yi bya ba dang bcas dang/ /yid rton
224b5(mdo 'grel): grogs bcas sdug pa'i chung ma dang bcas drung nas 'khor bcas pa'i/ /mi rnams 'chi bdag snying rje med pas sa steng 'dir ni khyab gyur pas/ /med par byed na kun gyis ci bya ma yangs dge ba legs par gyis/ /e ma'o skyes bu
224b6(mdo 'grel): rmongs rnams 'di na bde 'gror skyes ba bzad zhes grag/ rga dang 'chi dang na rnams kyis kyang 'di la brtse ba med par grag/ gzhan las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal brgya phrag 'di dag skyed pa nyid byed de/ /rang gis bskyed nas bu ni gsod
224b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i don du de dag la gtong byed/ sha ma'i rgyal par shin tu bsdams shing dbugs ma phyin par nyam ngar gnas/ /mi gtsang khron par lto ba'i mi yi cha ba mi zad pas bsregs nas/ /smra mi nus shing thos min bskyod pa'i dbang med nyal
225a1(mdo 'grel): ba ma yin par/ /mi ni mang yang zla bcu nye ba'i bar du sdug bsngal nyams myong 'gyur/ /dka' ba dag gis byung nas nyi ma'i gzer rnos mod la bsregs pa dang/ /tshad pa'i rlung gis bud shing sprad bu mchu sprad dag
225a2(mdo 'grel): gis gnod pa dang/ /nye du dgra bo dag gis lto ba bcas pas na tsha skyed byed pa/ mngal na gnas kyang bla yi snang ba dag tu gnas pa 'di mi rung/ /lus kyi bya ba lag pa dag dang rkang pa bskyod pa tsam du zad/ /smra ba'i yul gyur
225a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad la yang khyad par med par du bar byed/ /nyal ba'i tsha? na gan skyal? gnas pas nyin dang mtshan mo 'da' bar byed/ /sa steng dang na khu ljo ba ltar sdug bsngal nyam thag ngas ma mthong/ /'dug pa dag las ldang
225a4(mdo 'grel): bar mi nus nyal dang 'greng dang 'gro bar bskyod mi nus/ /'dug ste gnas dang lus mi brtan pas gom cig 'gro bar nus ma yin/ /tshig gi rang don bstan par mi nus phyed 'khrul lus dang ngag la ni/ /dbang byar med par
225a5(mdo 'grel): srog 'dzin byed pas kyi hud na tshod 'das sdug bsngal/ /mngal na sdug bsngal mang po yun rings rjes myong gyur kyang mi mthong la/ /'chi ba'i dus kyis gnas skabs skye bo 'dris pa'i mig gi yul ma yin/ /dregs ldan rga
225a6(mdo 'grel): pas bcom pa cho gas sar skyes pa bud med brgya phrag gi /mig ni 'ban du gyur ba mnga' char 'bab pas nyam thag lta bu yin/ /skom pas kha bskams tshon bsil cing dri zhim chu ni 'thung ba dang/ /bkres pas nyam thag
225a7(mdo 'grel): ba na 'bras chan sha dang bcas pa za ba dang/ /'dod chags me 'bar gyis gdungs tsha na chung ma dam du 'khyud nas byed pa yis/ /nang sel byed pa bde ba yin zhes skye bo phyin ci log par gyur/ /skyes bu zas nyung dag gis ri'i?
225b1(mdo 'grel): gyur zas mang dag la mngon dga' bas/ /dbugs mi thon cing sdug bsngal gyur la mi mthun zas kyis 'chi bar byed/ /zas mi 'jubs nad bskyed 'gyur zhing zhu bas bkres pa nyid du 'gyur/ /kye ma zas zos gyur na sdug bsngal mi bskyed
225b2(mdo 'grel): skabs de yod ma yin/ /shing lag dag ni rab tu 'bar ba'i skabs su me las tha dad min/ /de ni 'jig rten dag gis kyi hud me zhes za zhing yongs su spong/ /de bzhin lus la sdug bsngal shin tu chen po nyams myong gnas skabs
225b3(mdo 'grel): su/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lus 'di yin zhes khyad par med la 'jug mi byed/ /mi gtsang snom zhing srin bu'i tshogs ni brgya yis yongs su bskor gyur la/ /klad pa'i drod kyi gdugs kyis mtshungs pa med pa'i sdug bsngal nyams myong zhing/ /snang ba
225b4(mdo 'grel): med pa'i brtson da'i khyim nad lta bu'i ma yi lto na gnas/ /de bskyed pa na de yang de ltar min nam ci phyir khyod rig byed/ /ji ltar khyi dag rus skams sral ro med pa la bskam par 'cha'/ /rang gi kha chu khrag gis gos li rnya zhing zhim pa yin snyan
225b5(mdo 'grel): sems/ /de bzhin lus zhes bya ba shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i cho gos de la/ /rmongs rnams rang gis rtog pas yon tan brgya yis sgo btags dga' bar byed/ /sha rgyas mtho zhing zlum la nu ma'i blo yis kun nas 'khyud pa dang/ /kha ni kha chus
225b6(mdo 'grel): gang ba chang bcas snod ltar 'thung bar byed pa dang/ /reg pa'i sreg pas gcing brlan pa yi lam la chags pas na/ 'gro ba rmongs pa chen pos ldongs pa dag la yid du mi 'ong ci zhig yod/ /'khru bas dri mas spags dang dri zhim
225b7(mdo 'grel): skud pas mi ngo 'dre? 'dre dang/ so rtsi 'cha' la rtson par byed pas kha ni dri mi zhim pa nyid/ /gos kyis kun nas dkris pas shin tu mi sdug yin par 'di byed de/ /lus ni 'jigs su rung bas bdag nyid gzhon nu ma la smra zhing rton/ /yid brtan rung?
226a1(mdo 'grel): las nyan par mi byed bdag nyid kyis kyang rtogs med pas/ /khyed la rna ba dang ni snying med pa zhes bya bar shin tu rigs/ /zon byed 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug lus kyi dri ni mtshor ba/ /khyed la 'gro ba sna mang yid zhes kyang
226a2(mdo 'grel): ni ci yi phyir mi smra/ /shin tu gtsang ba'i ngar dang dri zhim me tog sbrang rtsi gur kum la/ /de dang de ni gang du reg na skad cig gis ni mi gtsang 'gyur/ /rma yi sgo dgu dag nas mi gtsang dri nga'i ljon shing 'dzag 'gyur gang/ /de la khyed ni
226a3(mdo 'grel): skal bzang yin zhes 'dir ni rlom sems ji ltar byed/ /phung po lnga po 'di la yul dang yul can nyid du brtags nas ni/ /bdag dang bdag gi med pa dag la nga dang nga ya? nges byas pa/ /'jig rten rmongs pa 'di ni 'jig rten skram
226a4(mdo 'grel): gyis gdungs pa mya ngan du/ /smig rgyu'i chu yi chu bur las byung snod du 'thung snyam sems dang mtshungs/ /bdag ni rtog pa yin zhing bde dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong 'gyur la/ /lus kyi yul ni gcig pu dag la bdag gi zhes blo
226a5(mdo 'grel): skyed du zad/ /bu dang chung ma phyug rnams zhes bya 'di dag las gzhan gyis bskyed pa/ /de la ji ltar bdag gi zhes rtsi 'dir ni gti mug stobs can yin/ /de ni rgyu las byung zhing gnas pa'ang rang gi rkyen gyis dbang las byung/ /dus
226a6(mdo 'grel): kyis rgas shing tshe dang bsod nams zas la sogs pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /skye la dbang byar ma yin nas las ma yin shi la dbang med na/ /bdag gi chung ma zhes smra ngo tsha bab? ni ji ltar de ma gyur/ /gang zhig rtag tu rang dbang gyur dang
226a7(mdo 'grel): gang zhig bde ba nyid gyur pa/ /gang zhig skad cig tsam yang 'dod mi 'gyur ba de ni bdag gang? bshad/ /lus 'di dbang byar med cing sdug bsngal dag kyang skyo bar 'dor gyur na/ /'di la rim pa gang zhig mthong na 'di la gang zhig mngon
226b1(mdo 'grel): zhen 'gyur/ /mi rtag pa la rtag snyam sems la sdug bsngal ba la bde mngon dga' / /mi gtsang lus la gtsang ba nyid du shas cher zhen par byed pa dang/ /bdag med pa la bdag ces 'dzin pa'i rdul rnams rnam par gsal nas ni
226b2(mdo 'grel): skye med dgag med 'chi ba med cing rtag pa'i gnas ni 'bad pas mngon du gyis/ phyin ci log bzhi 'gag par byed pa'i gtam/ 'di byas pa las bdag gis dge bsags pa/ /gang yang des ni 'gro gsum ma lus pa/ /phyin ci log bzhi
226b3(mdo 'grel): las ni yid grol shog /phyin ci log bzhi spong ba'i gtam slob dpon mA tri tsitras mdzad pa rdzogs// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha b+ha dra dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
226b4(mdo 'grel): la phab pa'o// //rtsod dus gtam mA ti tsitras mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ka lI yu ka pa ri kA thu/ /bod skad du/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
226b5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /tshul khrims las nyams thos pa'i nor bral 'dod pas 'di nyid cung zad mchod par byed/ /nyes med tshul khrims ldan la yon tan ro la rgyab phyogs zhe sdang cung zad nyes pa dgod/ /rab byung rnams la khyim pas las bsgo de
226b6(mdo 'grel): nas rab byung nges kyang khyim pa mgu bar byed/ /ci sbyang 'gro ba 'dir ni 'gro ba'i khyim du ma lus dus kyi snyigs ma zhugs pa yin/ /da ltar legs spyod pa yi skye bo ngo tsha sdig pa can bsngags dga' bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon nor rnams
226b7(mdo 'grel): mchog tu sems dpas 'joms phyir slob ma rnams ni zhum par gnas/ /'di na byis pa'i nye du'i 'khrul 'khor gyis bcings pa ni sun 'byin byed pa bzhin/ /da ltar rtsod pa'i dus na 'jig rten rnams la g.yo sgyu'i mtshon drag stobs
227a1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan/ /bcud rnams sas 'thung dngos rnams stobs chung lha rnams char ni 'bebs mi byed/ /rlung rnams rab tu grag ldan lo tog rnams ni mi smin skye mi 'gyur/ /skyes la ser 'babs rnams rtsod pa'i dus kyi dbang
227a2(mdo 'grel): sgyur 'bras bu med/ /dngos rnams mthu med dgos pa sgrub rnams nyams pa thob pa la brtag /'grol nad 'phel sa ni de dang de dag skye ba rnams kyis btang/ /ljon pa'i nags tshal bskams pas yal ga'i lag pa gyen du 'greng byed de//
227a3(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa'i dus kyi bcom byas bzang po'i dus nub ri bo tshe nges 'debs/ /yul bzang chags pa rnams spangs sa rnams su ni dus bzang yongs su zad/ /yon tan mkhas la mi bkur nor ldan rnams ni mchod bya min par mchod/ /skye rmongs
227a4(mdo 'grel): mchod byed gshin rjes 'jig rten sdug bsngal nges khrid gang gis bzlog /tshul khrims 'chal pa stobs ldan tshul khrims ldan pa bsdigs shing tshar gcod byed/ /sdig pa dga' ba'i stobs ldan g.yon can rnams kyis dam chos
227a5(mdo 'grel): bsnub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdom pa la gnas brtan pa'i mchog? la 'jug par byed pa nyung/ /the tshom yod min drang srong bstan pa ring po ma? thogs nub par 'gyur/ /g.yul 'gyed rtsod pa du mas gos ltar sa g.yogs lo
227a6(mdo 'grel): tog /skyes la 'dod min 'byung/ /rlung rnams mi zad ldan zhing de bzhin skye bo dam pa yang dag mchod mi byed/ /rgyal po dgra dang rkun ma'i 'jigs pas mi dag bag phebs nor rnams longs mi spyod/ /da ltar skye bo sdug bsngal bcas
227a7(mdo 'grel): 'tsho 'gro ba rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung/ /gang zhig dus su char med gang du lam zhugs ser ba mi mthun du ma 'bab/ /gang zhig pa nams 'o ma mi 'byung dus rnams 'khrugs shing sa las 'bru mi skye/ /sman rnams gang yin nus med
227b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin khyad par rnams ni rab tu nyams/ /yid ni des bcom chos min rtsod pas dngos po 'di kun nyes dang bcas/ /rtsod pa'i dus 'dir chos spangs mi bzad pa la yang dag zhugs pas na/ /gang du dbang pos char phab ljon shing
227b2(mdo 'grel): yal ga dag las me tog 'bras bu cung zad snang/ /sa gzhi brlan pa dang bcas sa rnams gang yin pa las me tog smin gyur pa/ /de kun tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag sdom ldan chos dang ldan pa'i mthu/ /dus rnams 'khrul
227b3(mdo 'grel): zhing sa la bcud rnams nub gyur nyi zla log par rgyu/ /chung ma khyo la bcugs pas 'brel ba'i sems med dman pa rnams ni mthon por 'gyur/ /rgyal po chos spangs nor rnams mchog tu don gnyer bu rnams pha la sdang/ /kyi hud sdug
227b4(mdo 'grel): bsngal rtsod pa'i dus ni nyer gnas bsod nams gnyer ba nags su song/ /chos dang rab byung dka' thub rnams 'bros bde ba rnams ni ring du song bar gyur/ /sa rnams 'bras bu nyung zhing rgyal po 'khrug byed mtshon gyi rgyal byed rnam par gnon/ /'jig
227b5(mdo 'grel): rten bud med la dang bud med kyang g.yem bram ze rnams ni 'dod chen bcas/ /legs pa rnams nub skyed ngan stobs ldan du ma rtsod pa'i dus su bzang po yi/ /dus song bde ba rnams 'das dus der sbyor ba'i skyes bu rnams kyang 'das/ /'dir
227b6(mdo 'grel): yang dus mthar de rnams mun bcas phug bzhin shes ma yin/ /legs spyad rgya phrag dri yis bsgos pa yis/ skal ldan nub cing dus ni 'das par gyur/ /pad gzhon rtsa ba'i skud pa bzhin/ /dkar po'i chos rnams phra bar 'gyur/ /blo
227b7(mdo 'grel): ldan skyes bu gtam mkhas dri mas sgod/ /'gro 'di dga' med dga' ston zin pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po 'di ni yang dag 'gags/ /gang na yon tan rnams kyi stobs phral/ /yon tan la bdud 'bab pas gcong byed cing/ /skye bo
228a1(mdo 'grel): smra ba la brten 'tsho bar byed/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam slob dpon mA tri tsi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dzi ta sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis
228a2(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ bi pe ka ka thA/ bod skad du/ dben pa'i gtam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dka' thub rnyed pa'i bde ba 'dod rnams kyis/ /'tshel ba
228a3(mdo 'grel): spyod pa rnams ni mthong gyur nas/ /rab tu dben pa yang dag brten pa yi/ /dge slong 'di skad tshig tu brjod pas smra/ /phongs pa spang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /rab sngags zhi ba'i dbang bskur nyer blangs nas/ /dka' thub
228a4(mdo 'grel): khyim dang 'dris pas rab chags pa'i/ /phongs nyid rgal dka' byin pa ji lta bur/ /'phags pa 'gran med shing drung gnas nas ni/ /'gro ba'i skye dang 'gag pa mthong bas na/ /zhi ba'i bde ba yongs smin tshe dge ba/ /mi las shin tu
228a5(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa thob par 'gyur/ /sems kyi rnam par 'chid ba gnyen po yi/ /stobs kyis gsal bas skye bral nags dag tu/ /rnal 'byor nyer zhi'i bdud rtsis tshim gyur pas/ /bde bar gnyid log pa dad sad par 'gyur ro/ /
228a6(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo zla ba'i snang dang rab gsal ba'i/ /skar ma'i me tog bkram par nyer mchod nas/ /dgon par brten pa'i yid ni nges zhi ba'i/ /lhag par dga' ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur/ /gang du dge slong dben pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/ /kha na ma tho med
228a7(mdo 'grel): pa zhi 'gyur bde/ /gang du yo byad yang dag brten chags pas/ /sems ni sna tshogs phongs pas gdungs par gyur/ /ji ltar chu shing myug ma 'o ma dag /'bras bu 'byin nas rang nyid 'jig pa ston/ /de bzhin dka' thub khyim las rnam
228b1(mdo 'grel): 'grol nas/ /bdag nyid zil gyis gnon la chags mthong 'gyur/ /sa yi rdul gyis gos pa'i ri dags dag /rtswa dang 'dab nas tsam zhig sgrub byed ltar/ /sems ni dben par gzhol bar 'dod 'gyur gyi/ /gling bzhi'i phun tshogs
228b2(mdo 'grel): rgya chen dag la'ang min/ /shing drung 'bab chu bsten pa'i dka' thub dag /yongs su 'dzin pa dag ni rnams spangs nas/ /rang sems tsam dang rab tu 'brel ba yi/ /bde 'byung gang de rgyal po rnams la med/ /ljon shing sngon po'i rtse mo
228b3(mdo 'grel): rlung dag gis/ /rnam g.yo phra la snyoms pa'i char 'bab pa'i/ /mi g.yo rnam brtags nas ri yi sul gnas ni/ /dge slong mtshan mo dga' ba skyed par byed/ /rnyog can 'dod la 'dris pas phod pa yi/ /bdag bsnyen pa yi chags spangs
228b4(mdo 'grel): ltos med cing/ /skye bral? nags gang yin par dga' bya yi/ /dge slong gyur nas don med 'gyur mi bya/ /dge slong rtags ni bdag nyid gnod med par/ /nyer blangs gang zhig sgrub par mi byed cing/ /dman la yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'dam
228b5(mdo 'grel): byid ba/ /de ni 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten slu byed yin/ /chu dang rdo khu rtsa ba med pa yi/ /sa dbang 'jogs nas mi bzad g.yang dag du/ /rtog dang ldan pas shi ba bzod bya yi/ /bslab pa yongs su nyams pas 'jug mi bya/ /rgya mtsho rnam par
228b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pa'i rlabs tshogs su/ /rin chen khur gyis 'bru dag nub pa bzhin/ /khyim dang 'dris pa'i rnyed chags khur dag gis/ /gang dag mchog brtan rgya chen snub par byed/ /nags na sten pa'i zhi ba'i yid dag ni/ /gzhon nu ma yi 'gro
228b7(mdo 'grel): bas dkrugs mtshon pa/ /mnyan po ji bzhin bdag nyid zhi 'dod rnams/ /sdom can rab tu dben nyid yang dag tsom/ /yul gyi ro yis dug gis nyer gdungs blo can dag /chags pa'i nyung ngu dag gis gdungs 'gyur na/ /de dag
229a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su spong la brtson med pa'i/ /dka' thub kyi hud e ma'o rab nyams 'gyur/ /sdom can rkang pas 'gro zhing 'jog pa ltar/ /de ltar 'dris pas 'dod pa 'phel 'gyur te/ /rang rlabs chab ngogs mngon
229a2(mdo 'grel): brdabs 'jigs rung bas/ /sprin chen char gyis ya mun na bzhin no/ /dka' thub ji ltar dman pa dag la yang/ /'dod lha'i dbang gis rjes su zhugs gyur pa/ /de ltar rang lag gis drang phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal chen khyim la khyim
229a3(mdo 'grel): pa chags pa med/ /rang gi khyim dang gdod dag 'chi 'dzag par/ /brlan ba'i gnyen dag spangs par gyur nas ni/ /dman pa gzhan gyi khyim la chags pa yi/ /rab byung 'di la shin tu ngo tsha med/ /thar pa 'dod gang rang khyim
229a4(mdo 'grel): spangs nas ni/ /mi shes gzhan gyi khyim dag 'dod byed pa/ /rgya mtsho rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rlabs tshogs las/ /bdag nyid rgyal nas glang rjes byin dang mtshungs/ /sdig pa spong byed de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /gnang ba'i bsgrub pa
229a5(mdo 'grel): dag gis 'di brtags gang/ /dman pa'i nor la 'dod pa'i sred pa yis/ /gzhan khyim la chags dri ma can du 'gyur/ /chu bo ni lus tsha yi me tog lhung ba'i dus bus mdza' mar bris/ /bye ma dkar po'i dogs dang dang pa ka dam
229a6(mdo 'grel): pa dag gnas/ /nags kyi glang chen khyu dag rtse bas tha dad 'thor rlabs can/ /dgon gnas brtul zhugs can la dga' ba rab tu bskyed par byed/ /srid pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba'i yid dag rnam bsal nas/ /ma bsams
229a7(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong bde ba brten pa rnams kyi gnas skabs ni/ /pad+ma kha phye bzhin du dka' thub rang gi grags pa yis/ /'jig rten yongs su dga' ba rab bskyed kun tu dpe las 'das/ /dka' thub ri dang nye ba'i shing rtsa rab yangs dang
229b1(mdo 'grel): 'brel bar/ /gnas pa'i tshom bu mi snyoms lhong ba'i bslugs par la chags pa'i/ /ba mo'i dum bu gos pa tho rangs nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /lag pa dag gis nyul ba bzhin du rnam par skems par byed/ /khong stong shing drung rlung ni rgyu
229b2(mdo 'grel): gyur kha ba'i tshogs chen 'bab/ /mdangs zad rab rtsub lo ma dag gis gdu bu bzhin bskor ba'i/ /'dod pa kun spangs shes rab rno ba'i brtul zhugs can dag la/ /mtshan mo rnam par skyo ba dag ni skyed par zad mi byed/ /shing gi lo ma'i
229b3(mdo 'grel): tha ma la chags pa me'i chu dag gis/ /dum bu nyi ma 'char tshe mdog gyur nor bu dang 'dra ba'i/ /thig pa dag ni shing drung gnas pa'i dge slong la/ /'gro ba'i skye dang 'jig pa ji bzhin rab tu ston par byed/ /rab zhi'i bde ro shes pas 'khor
229b4(mdo 'grel): los sgyur ba'i dpal 'byor kyang/ /yongs su spyad pas rnyings pa'i me tog phreng bzhin rnams spangs nas/ /lang tsho rang bzhin gyis g.yo dang tshul can dag yol byas te/ /dgon par ri dags 'drar 'chi zhi ba'i sems ni bsten par bya/ /'dod pa
229b5(mdo 'grel): la 'dzin phyin ci log pa'i sems la ku mu ta'i/ /dum bu ltar dkar mi thod so dang 'brel pas nyer dgod dang/ /rlung gis bus pa'i ro sregs me yis nye 'khor shing bsregs pa'i/ /dur khrod dka' thub gcig pu la ni mtshan mo dga' 
229b6(mdo 'grel): bar skyed par byed/ /ljon shing tshogs dang rgya ches ri yi rtsa ba sngor gyur cing/ /rdo bas khyab dang bsil la rab dang ba yi chu 'dzag 'bab/ /rma bya rab dga' sgra yis khyab pa'i ri sul nang du ni/ /khyim du 'chi ba'i skyo ba'i sems ni rab tu
229b7(mdo 'grel): dga' bar byed/ /'gro ba'i don ma byas pa'i 'chi bar 'gyur ba khyim dag la/ /dga' ba dag las dben pa mchog la slob byed sems can mchog /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems ni rnyed gyur pha rol tshogs 'thob pa/ /srid pa'i dug gis
230a1(mdo 'grel): sdong po'i rtsa ba brtan po 'byin par byed/ /nags tshig pa yi bya dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal brgya yi gzhir gyur pa'i/ /khyim gang yin pa yongs su spangs nas nags su 'gro byed pa/ /des ni srid pa'i gnyid rab
230a2(mdo 'grel): bsal ba 'gro ba kun gyi mgon/ /sangs rgyas rab tu mnyes par byed pa yin zhes de skad grags/ /ma skad sngon po dang 'dra ne'u sing tshogs dag ni/ /shing rtsa nye bar bkod dang yal ga me tog gis bskor ba'i/ /zhi ba'i nags
230a3(mdo 'grel): mdza' kye ma'o dge slong mchog gis spangs byed pa/ gsang phyir rngon po'i glu yis drangs par gyur pa'i ri dags mtshungs/ /'phags pa'i bzhed pa bde bar gshegs pa'i lam gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /nags dang 'dra bar
230a4(mdo 'grel): khyim na rang gi don dag sgrub byed kyang/ /rnam par 'tshe ba rang bzhin gyis med nags ni dben pa yis/ /sems ni 'ching ba dag ni 'bad pa med par gcod par byed/ /'dod chags gang dag de la dgos par 'gyur bas
230a5(mdo 'grel): kun 'thel zhing/ /legs spyad thub pa'i bstan pa dag kyang nyams byas nas/ /me dpung rab tu 'bar ba rgal dka' i khong ni mthar thug pa'i/ /ngan song dag tu dge slong bde chung la chags 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyes pa
230a6(mdo 'grel): ma lus gdung ba zad byed sangs rgyas pa'i/ /legs par bshad pa khas blangs nas ni ngan 'gror nges 'byin pa/ /utpal sngon po'i snying po'i dri mchog dag dang chu dum bu/ /ser la bsil ldan rlung gi de dag ji ltar tshim
230a7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /sa ra sa yi sgra ni rang bzhin snyan pa'i glu dbyangs dag /ldog pa med par sgrogs par gyur pas phyogs rnams khyab gyur pas/ /brtul zhugs can gyi 'gro dang gnas pa dag las du ba skyes dang/ /lus lhong rgyus pa'i
230b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan gyi gung thun gnyid dag sad par byed/ /rang gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis spras yongs su gnas pa yis/ /zla ba'i 'od zer tshogs kyi dpal 'joms shin tu zil gnon pas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba nyer bsags bskal ldan 'jig rten la
230b2(mdo 'grel): gzigs shing/ /rang byung 'phags pa mchog gi mgon po de yang brten par mdzad/ ci ste gang zhig nang gi dgra la nges rgyal bya ba byas pa yi/ /ston pa 'jig rten mdza' gzigs de yang nags dag bsten mdzad na/ /yang dag rtogs med
230b3(mdo 'grel): skye bo mi gtsang 'dam du bying gyur pa'i/ /sdom can zhi 'dod bde gshegs rjes su ci phyir 'jug mi byed/ /bdag tu log par 'dzin par gyur pas nyin dang mtshan/ /srin bus ji bzhin rnam rtog sdig can dag gis zos pas na/ /nyon mongs rnag
230b4(mdo 'grel): gis nyer gos zhi ba'i chu yi bum pa yis/ /bkrus ba bzhin du sems ni skye ba med nags ston par gyis/ /'bras bu'i lcid kyis yal ga gug pa'i tha ma lo ma yis/ /gsal gyur lcug ma me tog kha phye'i dga' byed rgyud ldan pa'i/ /nags
230b5(mdo 'grel): kyi shing ni dge slong phongs bral brtan pa la/ /mdza' bo bzhin du shin tu dbugs ni 'byin par byed/ /zla ba shar ba kha ba babs pas bsgribs pas 'gog 'gyur ba'i/ /dgun gyi mtshan mo dag ni rab zhi bde ba 'dod rnams kyi/ /rnal
230b6(mdo 'grel): 'byor rtswa yi stan la dga' ba dag la tho rangs dag /nags kyi shing na yib pa'i byin 'dra bar byed/ /shing dang nye ba'i ri yi rked du mi g.yo skyil krung bcas/ /me tog gis bskor rab dga' i rlung gis g.yo bar byed pa na/ /'gro bsnyen srid
230b7(mdo 'grel): gsum rnam rgyal dus na byang chub snying po yi/ /gdan la bzhugs bzhin sdom can mtshan mo rjes su sgrub par byed/ /dman pa'i 'gro ba'i sems kyis reg byas dregs pa'i chags pa dag /'dod bya don du gnyer ba rnams kyis khyad par spangs
231a1(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /'phags pas rjes chags bstan pa mi snang 'ching ba 'jigs pa yi/ /'dod pa lhag ma med par dga' bzhin nags su zhi bar bya/ /skye dang 'chi dang na pa'i sdug bsngal mthar ni ma byas par//
231a2(mdo 'grel): srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag tu bying 'gyur bag med ma byed cig /mthar byed kun gyi srog kyang 'phrog par byed pa gang 'di ni/ /rgyun mi chad par 'gro la sta re'i so dag 'dar bar byed/ /sa 'dzin pa yi chu bo'i tshogs dag
231a3(mdo 'grel): 'bab pa lta bu ni/ /chos kun gnas pa'i rang bzhin rjes su shes nas ni/ /rol sems ldan bzhan las dam pas legs par grol ba yi/ /srid pa chags bral rab zhi dga' ba dag la sten par gyis/ /smra ba tsam ni nus su zin
231a4(mdo 'grel): kyang tshig la gnas pa'ang grub med de/ /skyes bu tshig dag snying por byed pa ston gyi chu bral sprin dang mtshungs/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la sgrub pa snying po nyid/ /de phyir de nyid la 'jug blo gros
231a5(mdo 'grel): yin bzo'i tshig la mkhas/ /kun nas nyon mongs dgra 'di yi/ /bdag nyid bran du gyur pa ste/ /de bas bdag sems zhi byed cing/ /rang nyid yongs su smra bar byed/ /dben pa'i gtam slob dpon chen pos 'tsho byin
231a6(mdo 'grel): gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI baM kA nga dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //bkra shis so/ /
231a7(mdo 'grel): mang+ga laM/ /chos smra ba dam pa'i chos nyan pa la gus par bya ba'i gtam bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sat+tya? kri tyA d+harmA ba tsa na? sid+d+harmA sh+rA ba ka ka thA/ bod skad du/ tshes smra ba dam pa'i chos nyan pa
231b1(mdo 'grel): la gus par bya ba'i gtam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gser btso ma dang ka ni ka dang nyi ma shar ma thag gi 'od 'bar zhing gsal bar byed pa dang/ /rgya cher mi phyed pa'i 'od
231b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ bco lnga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa dang/ /tsaM pa ka dang/ a shA ka rab tu rgyas pa dang/ bai DUrya dang inda? nI la dang rdo rje dang ldong ros dang pad+ma dang glog gi 'od pas lhag pa dang/ /gser bzang po'i 'od
231b3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma/ /dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i gteng bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mgon du gyur pa/ bla mar gyur pa/ chos kyi rje/ spyod pa dang
231b4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis gnod pa med par kun tu spyod pa/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi yis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ khyu mchog gi mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dbang po dang/ nye dbang dang/ drag po dang/
231b5(mdo 'grel): gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus srul po dang/ nyi ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phyen chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mngon
231b6(mdo 'grel): par bstod pa/ byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyis bsam gtan mchog gi dran pa brnyes pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang yang dag par spong ba rnams la lhag par mos pa/ /zil gyis
231b7(mdo 'grel): gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched dang stong pa nyid dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par ston pa dang/ thugs rje chen pos yang dag par bskul ba/ gser dang dngul dang shel dang nor bu dang baiDUrya dang rdo rje in+d+ra nI la
232a1(mdo 'grel): dang zla ba'i 'od rnams las lhag pa'i 'od mda' ba/ rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ 'khor ba 'jig pa dang/ gser thub dang/ 'od srungs dang/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
232a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la sogs pas gsungs shing rjes su bstan pa 'di la/ kye dge slong 'di lnga ste/ chos bshad pa dang chos kyi gtan la dga' zhig tu tshogs shing 'dug ste/ 'dug nas bya ba gnyis pa gang yang rung ba gcig
232a3(mdo 'grel): la rjes su gnas par bya ste/ chos kyi gtam bya ba 'am yang na 'phags pa'i mi smra bas rjes su gnas par bya'o/ /de la 'phags ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i gtan du gyur pa dang/ 'phags pa'i mi smra bar gyur pa de gnyis ni nges par legs pa'i
232a4(mdo 'grel): rgyur 'gyur ba yin te/ phyis ma rtog pa'i phyir dang/ the tshom gcod pa'i phyir nges par stobs kyis gzung ba'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal cing 'di skad du gsungs so/ /dge slong dag gang zag gnyis po 'dis bsod
232a5(mdo 'grel): nams mang po bskyed de sdig pa'i rtsa ba 'byin cing bdud dang g.yul 'gyed par byed/ /bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol bar byed/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do/ /gnyis
232a6(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ gang gus par byas te chos 'chad pa dang/ gang 'di ni gus par byas te chos nyan pa'o/ /de bas na khyod kyis gus pas chos bshad par bya zhing bla ma rnams la gus par byas te chos nyan par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
232a7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni 'byung ba dkon no/ /mir skye ba ni rab tu dkon no/ /ngal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad ba ni dkon no/ /de bas na 'khor ba'i nyes pa la kun tu brtag pa la gus par byas te
232b1(mdo 'grel): chos mnyan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dir brjod par bya ste/ nges par dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur zhing chos kyi snang ba dang bral bar 'gyur/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu nub par 'gyur la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par mi
232b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dus nye bar gnas shing/ /chos dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur bar shes par byas nas gus par byas te chos mnyan par bya'o/ /cung zad chos kyi gru
232b3(mdo 'grel): ni zhig par 'gyur/ /ye shes kyi ri ni rdib par 'gyur/ chos kyi nyi ma ni nub par 'gyur/ chos kyi chu bo ni skams par 'gyur/ chos kyi gtam gyis ni dben par 'gyur/ dbang po'i rtod thag ni chad par 'gyur/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
232b4(mdo 'grel): bdun gyi me tog ni skams par 'gyur/ gsung rab kyi rgya mtsho ni bo bar 'gyur/ dran pa'i lcag ni chag par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur la
232b5(mdo 'grel): ring por mi thogs par yang dag pa'i spang leb bshig pas bcos legs byas pa/ dran pa'i gru skyabs yongs su srung ba/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan legs par btsugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi zhal che bas rtsong pa
232b6(mdo 'grel): yongs su skyod ba/ dad ba'i lam rgyags dang ldan pa/ brtse ba'i bdud chu'i tshogs dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi lam gyi rin po ches yengs su bskang ba dang/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i tshogs yongs su rgyu ba/ chos smra ba'i
