256b2(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs yin no/ /de'i phyir nus pa can gyi rgyu mthong ba las rjes su dpog pa ma 'ongs pa'i yul can ni rgyu'i chos rje su dpag pas bsal ba ma yin no/ /'o na ci zhe na/ lhag cig 'byung ba'i rgyu bsal ba yin no/ /gal te ma 'khrul bas
256b3(mdo 'grel): yin na de yang ji ltar bsal bar byed pa yin/ /tshogs ba gcig la rag las pa nyid nam 'khrul pa 'di yin pas don rdzogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi tha snyad ces bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid 'dzin par byed pa'i
256b4(mdo 'grel): tshad ma nye bar bstan pa yin no/ /bud shing rlon pa la sogs pa yod kyang me med ma mi 'byung ba yin la/ me yod kyang dang po ma mthong ma yod na 'byung ba'i du ba ni me drangs par rtogs pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid yin gyi ma 'khrul ba tsam las
256b5(mdo 'grel): ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la/ gzhan du yang 'di tsam nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste mes drangs ba nyid ces bya ba 'dis kyang ma 'khrul ba yin zhes bya bar bstan pa'i don to/ /de yod pa nyid na 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu nyid ma yin nam/ 'byung
256b6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba yod pa kho na ni ma yin te/ ma 'ongs pa nyid yin no snyam du sems pa ni/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji ltar rgyu yin zhes bya ba'o/ /de yod pa kho na ni zhes bya bas ma 'khrul pa'i yul nyid kho na brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni/ de la
256b7(mdo 'grel): te 'bras bu la mi 'khrul ba'i phyir te/ de la mi 'khrul ba'i yul nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de la mi 'khrul pa'i yul nyid ni rgyu nyid ma yin te/ 'o na ci zhe na/ phan 'dogs pa nyid yin la phan 'dogs pa ni/ gang zhig yod pas phan 
257a1(mdo 'grel): bya zhing dge ba yid la byed pas gnas pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun mang du rjes su dran pa dang/ byams pa'i sems dang gal te sman chos ston pas gnas par bya'o/ /gzhan dag na re
257a2(mdo 'grel): dur khrod pas dur khrod du spyil po 'am mal stan la sogs pa mi bya zhing dur khrod kyi gong gi cha 'am 'og gi char gnas par mi bya'o/ /glos phab ste nyal bar mi bya'o/ /nya dang sha dang 'o ma dang til dang/ bag zan dang/
257a3(mdo 'grel): me sha'i sran chan bza' bar mi bya/ khyim du zhugs par mi bya/ lhung bzed btang bar mi bya/ skye bo'i 'dus pa chen po 'ongs pa slar song nas gos kyi gnas dang stan blangs la ro bsregs pa dang/ shin tu mi ring bang bor ba
257a4(mdo 'grel): 'phangs pas nod pa tsam gyis gnas kyi nang du 'dug pa la nam langs nas gos kyi dang bstan blangs pa la 'gro bar bya'o zhes zer ro/ /shing drung bas kyang rnyings pa dang/ khong stong dang/ dbyar gyi dus ma gtogs pa gzhan
257a5(mdo 'grel): du ljang ljin bcas pa'i shing gi rtsa ba spang bar bya'o/ /bla gab med pas kyang sbrang? bu dang/ chu sbrang? nyung ba/ sdig sbrul dang/ srog chags gdug pa dang/ grog spur med pa/ tsher ma dang bral ba'i gnas bsten pa'i bya ba
257a6(mdo 'grel): dbyar gnas pa'i dus su ni ba/ yongs pa'i gnas su 'dug par bya'o/ /dur khrod pas kyang gnas g.yogs pa yod nar byad gnas kyi bar du 'dug pa la 'gal bar med la/ dbyar gyi gnas med na steng g.yogs yod par
257a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar bya'o/ /de la dgon pa nyid kyang bar gyi nyes pas grong nang du dus cung zad? cig 'dug na yang dam bcas pa mi gtong ba yin pa'i phyir nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du chos nyan pa dang/ gso sbyong dang/
257b1(mdo 'grel): dgag dbye'i don dang/ kun la mngon par grags pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa dang/ yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba dang/ ltur? ba las ldang ba dang/ ldang ba byed du gzhugs pa dang/ nang gso ba dang/ nad g.yog
257b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis 'gro ba la nyes pa med do/ /de bzhin du shing drung bas kyang de dag lta bu'i bya ba'i gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang/ char 'bab pa na skya rengs shar bar gyur gyang shing drung pa nyid la nyams par mi/
257b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /shing drung dang/ bla gab med pa dang/ dur khrod pa'i nyes par 'byung ba yang dgon pa pa dang 'dra'o/ /phyag dar khrod pa nyid kyis kyang kha tshar bcad pa dang/ mdza' ma bcad pa dang/ bkod? gis zos pa dang khyim zos pa dang/ mis tshig pa dang/
257b4(mdo 'grel): bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir lam du dor ba dang/ dur khrod du gtogs pa dang/ sems te bor ba dang/ 'jug sogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ dge slong gis byin pa'i gos rnams gyon pa la 'gal ba med do zhes kha cig 'dod dag de
257b5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni phyag dar khrod pa dang 'dra bar 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /phyag dar khrod gnyug ma tshol ba'i phyir zhugs pa la gal te khyim bdag gis sri zhing gsar ba'i dar la sogs pa byin pa na de blangs kyang phyag dar khrod
257b6(mdo 'grel): las nyams par mi 'gyur ro zhes grag go /de bzhin du ched du bya ba'i kha zas dang/ tshul shing gis bab pa'i kha zas dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ gso sbyong ba dang/ dge 'dun gyi zas dang/ gtsug lag khang gi kha zas rnams ni
257b7(mdo 'grel): mgron du bos pa ma yin pa'i phyir bsod snyoms pa nyid las nyams par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /stan gcig pa nyid du za ba yang glang po che de tum po dang/ rta dang/ khyu mchog gi mi bsun pa dang/ sprul la sogs pa'i 'jigs
258a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang/ tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus pas phral du langs nas zas la spyod kyang stan gcig pa nyid las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la sbyangs pa'i
258a2(mdo 'grel): yon tan 'di rnams las dgon pa pa nyid dang/ cog? bu pa nyid dang/ gzhi ji bzhin pa nyid dang/ dur khrod pa nyid dang/ shing drung ba nyid dang/ bla gab med pa nyid de drug ni mal stan dang rab tu ldan pa yin no/ /phyag
258a3(mdo 'grel): dar khrod pa nyid dang/ chos gos gsum pa nyid dang/ phyid ba pa nyid de gsum ni chos gos dang rab tu ldan pa yin no/ /bsod snyoms pa nyid dang/ stan cig pa nyid dang/ zas phyis mi len pa nyid de gsum po nyid ni bsod?
258a4(mdo 'grel): snyoms dang rab tu ldan pa yin no/ /de dag las kyang bsod snyoms dang/ chos gos dang/ mal stan la sred pa nye bar skyed pa'i rgyu gyur pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ 'phags pa'i rigs dang rjes su mthun par
258a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i phyir yang dag par blang bar bya ste/ de la gnas na spong ba la mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis srid par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu can gyi sred pa rnam par gcod pa yin pas bde ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /kha cig
258a6(mdo 'grel): na re sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang po gsum ni gtso bor gyur pa yin la lhag ma rnams ni 'khor du gyur pa yin no zhes 'dod de/ 'phags pa mdzes dga' la mngon par dgyes pa ston pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang
258a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo khyod nam ngas mthong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /la la na re gang gis gnas brtan rnams mchog nyid du bstan cing grags pa'i lnga po 'di
258b1(mdo 'grel): dag gi gtso bor gyur pa yin la/ /de la gzhan pa bdun ni 'khor du gyur pa yin no/ /'di dag thams cad kyang dad pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang/ yon tan du mas phul du byung ba yin pa'i phyir dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang
258b2(mdo 'grel): 'dra bar smad par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang/ de rab tu zhi ba yin pa'i phyir dang/ rab tu zhi ba 'phel bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir bkra shis pa'i mchog yin no/ /legs pa'i lam bstan pa'i gtam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis
258b3(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa zhes bya ba phun sum tshogs pa gnyis pa'o/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag blangs/ /don dran pa la yang dag gnas/ /shes bzhin ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /spyod pa thams cad don yod 'gyur/ /ji skad du bshad pa'i ldang pa
258b4(mdo 'grel): dang 'dug pa na shes bzhin dang ldan pa kho na bya'o/ /de la lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las thams cad shes bzhin nyid kyis so sor legs par brtags nas bya ste 'di ni 'di'i rgyur bsgrub par bya'o/ /'di ni 'di'i rgyur spyad par
258b5(mdo 'grel): bya'o snyam pas don med pa ci yang sgrub par mi bya na dge ba rnams lta ci smos/ /'di ni shes bzhin don dang ldan pa yin no/ /ji skad du 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin la gdams pa las/ sgra gcan 'dzin de bas na lus kyi las
258b6(mdo 'grel): byed par 'dod pas lus 'di ni rus pa sum brgya 'dus pa/ rgyus pas sprel ba/ sha'i ris brgya phrag du mas zhal zhal byas pa/ /pags pa rul bas g.yogs par blta bar bya'o/ /sems kyi dbang gis 'jug par byed pa/ me dang
258b7(mdo 'grel): rlung gis rgyu bar byed pa/ sa dang chu dag shas cher bar gyur pa na mal dang stan la sogs pa la 'jug pa/ rkyen las rag las pas mi brtan ba nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal ba de nyid gyi phyir bdag dang bdag gi ba med pa zhes gsungs pa
259a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ ji skad du dge slong dag lus 'di ni khyed cag gi yang ma yin/ gzhan gyi yang ma yin pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang/ nges par bya ba yongs su
259a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs nas kyang 'dug ste/ gang gi'i goms pa dang rjes su mthun par mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba la 'jug par bya ba ni des gang 'byung ba yid la byed pa la mngon par phyogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ rjes su mthun
259a3(mdo 'grel): pa la mngon par phyogs pa 'di yid la bya ste/ 'di ni rang gi spyod yul shes pa nyid yin no/ /shes bzhin du bya ba 'di dag las gang zhig gang gi dus su bsgrub par bya ba de dus ji lta bzhin du bsgrub par bya ste/ 'di ni ma rmongs
259a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i yang dag pa shes pa nyid yin te/ ji skad du dge slong gis dus shes par 'gyur ba ji lta ba yin zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no/ /de ltar yang dag pa'i shes bzhin nyid la sogs lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las
259a5(mdo 'grel): shin tu rnam par dag pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba tsam bsgrub bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /lus dang ngag gi nyes pa 'bring dang ni/ /sems byung ba yin phra mo zhi gyur na/ /sa rdul bkrus pa'i gser ni phra mo bzhin/ /dge ba'i rnam
259a6(mdo 'grel): rtog lhag ma lus par 'gyur/ /de ni ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'dus byas pa las thob pa sems bsdus nas/ 'jog pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /ji skad du phyag dar khrod par byed pa'i mdo las/ yang dag mtshan ma la ni legs gnas
259a7(mdo 'grel): la/ mnyam zhing rgod dang zhum pa'i sems nyid ni/ /btang snyoms zhi dang 'dzin par byed nyid du/ /sems de la ni mngon brtson mnyam par bzhag/ gser gyi phye mas rdul sbyangs pa ni/ /se'u'i? khar bzhag 'ju bar 'dod pa na/ /me
259b1(mdo 'grel): stobs mnyam zhing rno? dang chung ba ni/ /btang snyoms bzhag dang dpal bsad sbyar dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnam g.yeng 'dis mnyam par bzhag pa'i phan yon la bsam par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
259b2(mdo 'grel): thob pa ni kha na ma thob med pa dang/ gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba'i ro sten par byed pa na mi las 'das pa'i dga' ba yid du 'ong ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ ji skad du dge slong khyim
259b3(mdo 'grel): stong par zhugs pa ni mi'i las 'das pa'i dga' ba thob bo zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du lus 'di nyid la dbyen pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba bde ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems 'jam zhing las su rung
259b4(mdo 'grel): ba sgrib pa'i rnyog pa dang bral ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin bde blag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ngag ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shing ting nge 'dzin mang du bya zhing bag yod pa dang/
259b5(mdo 'grel): sdig pa dang bral ba dang/ nad du yang dag par 'jog pas rnal 'byor la mnyam par bzhag par bya zhing sems nang du zhi bar bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ khyad par de dang de thob par 'gyur te/
259b6(mdo 'grel): ji skad du/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyi tshe 'phrul gyi cho gas mngon sum du bya bas sems la dbang sgyur zhing de rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba dpag tu med ba nyams su myong bar byed do zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ ting nge 'dzin
259b7(mdo 'grel): thob pa mi slob pa'i sa ma thob par ma nyams par dus byas na ting nge 'dzin ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa thob bar 'gyur ro/ /ji skad du skye ba rnam par 'byed pa las ting nge
260a1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyi nye bar spyod pas nye bar bsags pa'i las kyi lha'i bdag po dang/ 'khor los bsgyur ba la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang/ ji skad du/ dge slong dag
260a2(mdo 'grel): de lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du gyur na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de lta na/ ting 'dzin grub par yid ni brtson gyur pa/ /de yi
260a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag yon tan la lta ba/ yon tan la dags bya ba 'grub pa dang/ /sems ni spro ba brtan pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de la ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni byid? ba dang/ zhum pa dang/ rnam par g.yengs ba dang/ mi mnyam pa spang pa'i phyir
260a4(mdo 'grel): sems dang sems las byung ba dmigs pa gcig la gtod pas ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'am/ sems dang sems las byung pa dmigs pa gcig yang dag par sdud pas na ting nge 'dzin yin pa 'am/ phyin ci ma log pa
260a5(mdo 'grel): yin pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gtor cing 'jog pa na phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par ye shes dang mthong ba re dang de bskyed pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin to/ /de yang gang rnam par dag pa'i sems dmigs pa gcig la nye bar
260a6(mdo 'grel): zhi ba'i yon tan gyis yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus 'jug cing mi g.yeng bar gnas pa 'am/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rlung gis ma bskyod par khang pa'i nang gi mar me dang 'dra bar sems rtse gcig par 'jug pa ni ting nge 'dzin
260a7(mdo 'grel): ces bya ste/ sems gnas pa dang yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /yang na rnam pa gcig pa dang/ sbyor ba gcig pa dang/ sgo gcig pa dang/ dmigs pa gcig pa la sems yang dag par
260b1(mdo 'grel): 'jog pa'o/ /de yang sems rtse gcig ba'i mtshan nyid de/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'gyod pa med pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs bas kun nas bslang ba'i
260b2(mdo 'grel): gzhi'i gnas yin no/ /de ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam pa gcig yin no/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbye bas ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang rab tu ldan pa ni 'jig rten las
260b3(mdo 'grel): 'das ba'o/ /de las gzhan pa ni 'jig rten ba rnams so/ /yang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ log pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam pa gnyis te/ dge ba la sems rtse gcig pa ni yang dge ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mi dge ba la sems rtse gcig
260b4(mdo 'grel): pa ni log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gzhan yang lung du bstan pa dang/ lung du ma bstan pa gnyis te/ lung du bstan pa ni dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dag go /de gnyi ga las go bzlog pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /gzhan dag ni ting nge
260b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin rnam pa gnyis su 'chad de/ nye bar bdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag las snga ma'i cha dang nye ba ni nye bar gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /rigs su gyur ba'i chos kyi rjes thogs la ni
260b6(mdo 'grel): gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no/ /gzhan yang rnam pa gnyis te/ dga' ba dang bcas pa dang/ dga' ba med pa'o/ /dga' ba dang bcas pa ni bsam gtan dang po dang/ gnyis pa dang/ de'i nyer bsdogs? dang/ de'i mthus gnas pa'i snyoms
260b7(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa rnams so/ /dga' ba med pa ni de yan chad kyi bsam gtan dang/ nyer bsdogs? dang/ de'i mthus gnas pa rnams so/ /yang gnyis te/ gzugs la spyod pa dang/ gzugs med pa la spyod pa'o/ /gzugs la spyad pa ni slob
261a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ so so'i skye bo rnams bsam gtan bzhi dang/ de'i nyer bsdogs dang/ de'i mthus snyom par 'jug pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa ni gzugs med pa la spyod pa rnams so/ /gzhan yod rnam pa gnyis
261a2(mdo 'grel): te/ smon pa dang bcas pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag can ma yin pa/ srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa ni smon pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag dang bcas pa srid pa sped par byed pa ni smon pa med pa'o//
261a3(mdo 'grel): yang rnam pa gsum ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa tsam dang/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dang/ rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'o/ /de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa ni bsam gtan dang po dang
261a4(mdo 'grel): de'i mthus snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rtog pha med pa la dpyod pa tsam ni bsam gtan dang po'i bsam gtan khyad par can dang de'i mthus snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rtog pa med la spyod pa med pa ni bsam gtan
261a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la sogs pa dang/ de'i nyer bsdogs dang/ de'i mthus snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /yang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bzhi ste/ nyams pa dang/ gnas pa dang/ khyad par dang/ nges par 'byed pa'i skal ba can no/ /
261a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang 'dug pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ sems dang/ dpyod pa'i dbang du byas pa bzhi'o/ /de nyid dmigs pa dang/ rnam pa dang/ chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po'i dbye bas ting nge 'dzin rnam pa mang po yod do/ /de  
261a7(mdo 'grel): yang shin tu bsdus pa dang/ brgyas pa ma yin par rim pa bar ma la gnas nas 'di dag tsam zhig rnam par bzhag pa yin te/ 'di lta ste bsam gtan bzhi dang/ de'i nyer bsdogs gsum dang/ gzugs med pa rnam
261b1(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi dang/ rjes su dran pa drug dang/ tshad med pa rnam pa bzhi dang/ dbugs dbyung ba dang rdug? pa rjes su dran pa dang/ 'du shes bcu dang/ zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang/ yongs su chad pa bcu dang/ zil gyis gnon pa'i
261b2(mdo 'grel): skyed mchad brgyad dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ zil gyis gnon pa dang/ 'du shes med pa'i snyom par nga 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang smon pa med pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang/ rjes su mthun pa la rjes su
261b3(mdo 'grel): mthun par 'du shes pa la sogs pa snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid gsum dang/ yan lag lnga dang/ shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyis tshogs 'di dag rnal 'byor pas gzhung dang bon
261b4(mdo 'grel): gyi sgo nas yang dag par rtog par byas nas kyang de rdzogs par bya ba ni don du gtam bcu bzhi'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/ mkhon bo 'am/ slob dpon nam/ tshangs pa mtshungs par sbyor ba de
261b5(mdo 'grel): lta bu bsten par bya ba 'am/ gang zhig la brten na ma thos pa thos pa dang/ thos pa rnams yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ the tshom spong bar 'gyur ba dang/ lta ba drang por byed pa dang/ tshig zab mo'i don so sor shes rab kyis
261b6(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa dang/ gang zhig la bslabs pa na tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brten par bya'o/ /gang yang sdug dang bla ma dang/ /dad bya smra mkhas tshig smra
261b7(mdo 'grel): nus/ zab mo'i gtam ni ston byed pa/ gnas min pa ni mi sbyar ro/ /gal te rnyed na sdig med shes rab can/ /zhes bya ba la sogs dang/ kun dga' bo 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa
262a1(mdo 'grel): ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de la sdug pa ni tshul khrims dang thos pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byams pa'i lus dang yid kyis sam/ sbyin pa dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ don mthun pa dang/ don spyod
262a2(mdo 'grel): pas ni sdug par 'gyur ba yin no/ /nye bar zhi ba la snyoms? pa dang/ tshigs 'chal ba dang/ ldan pa nyid dang/ chog shes pa nyid kyis ni bla ma yin no/ /shes pa dang yon tan phun sum chags pa dang/ khyad par rtogs par 'os
262a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa'i phyir dad par bya'o/ /chos la gus pa dang/ gzhan la phan pa la brtson pa'i blo can nyid dang/ yang dag pa dang/ dus dang/ 'jam pa dang/ don dang ldan par tshig smra ba la mkhas pa dang/ bdag nyid
262a4(mdo 'grel): gzhal ba shes pas na smra ba la mkhas pa'o/ /rang bzhin bzang ba nyid dang/ rab dang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs shes pa dang/ gtam gyi bya ba la mkhas pas na tshig smra ba nus pa'o/ /'jug pa dang ldog ba'i rim pa shes pa dang/ nges par
262a5(mdo 'grel): dpyad pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas zab mo'i gtam sten par byed pa'o/ /legs par brtags nas byed pa dang/ spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ bslang ba dang/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes pas gnas ma yin par mi sbyor ba'o/ /yang
262a6(mdo 'grel): na dag? gi phya'o dags nyams par byed pa'i tshig dang las la mi sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can rnams ni phal cher nyes pa de de de de la spyod par yin pa dang/ dad pa dang/ blo dang/ rtag pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i
262a7(mdo 'grel): chags la spyod pa dang/ zhe sdang la spyod pa dang/ gti mug la spyod pa zhes de dang de ltar ston te/ dad pa la sogs pa la spyod pa yang dag sum po 'di dag gi nang du 'dus pa yin te/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug ni nyon
262b1(mdo 'grel): mongs pa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang/ dad pa dang/ bu? dang/ rnam par rtog pa ni 'di'i rigs kyi bskal ba can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod chags ni kun tu sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can te/ de ming ltar byung ba'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin
262b2(mdo 'grel): pas zhen pas na 'dod chags zhes bya la/ ma 'ongs pa'i nyon mongs pa can la don du gnyed pa'i sgo nas zhen pa la ni sred ba zhes bya bar bshad do/ /de'i bdag nyid can gyi gang zag ni dge bar 'gyur ba'i don la tshul bzhin sbyor
262b3(mdo 'grel): bas na dad pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de bas na 'dod chags dang/ sred pa dang/ dar ba la spyod pa gcig tu rab tu skye ba yin pa'i phyir dang/ 'byar ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du bral ba'i
262b4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid can ni zhe sdang ste/ de zhe sdang ba'i sgo nas 'bral bar 'gyur pas na zhe sdang zhes bya'o/ /bdag la bstong ba'i sgo nas 'bral bar byed pas nga rgyal zhes bya'o/ /de'i bdag nyid can gyi gang zag ni skyo ba mang ba yin/ khams gsum
262b5(mdo 'grel): po dang 'bral bar byed pas na shes rab kyi sgo nas blo zhes bshad do/ /de bas na 'di dag kyang gcig pa nyid yin no/ de bzhin du rtogs pa med pa'i bdag nyid can ni gti mug ste/ de ni rnam pa thams cad du rtog pa med pas na rmongs pa zhes
262b6(mdo 'grel): bya la/ log par rtog pas na lta ba zhes bya'o/ /de ni bdag nyid can gyis gang zas ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'jug pa yin du zin kyang rnam par rtog pa mang par 'gyur zhing ma nges pa'i blo can yin te/ de bas na 'di dag kyang
262b7(mdo 'grel): gcig pa nyid yin no/ /yang na 'dod chags dang/ sred pa dang/ dad pa ni rtse gir yon tan tshol la yongs su mi spong ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas 'dod pa la chags pa ni 'dod chags dang sred pa zhes bya la/ dge ba la dga' ba ni dang
263a1(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang srid pa'i yon tan rtsol ba'i bdag nyid can ni 'dod chags dang sred pa zhes bya la/ /dge ba tshol ba'i bdag nyid can ni dad pa yin no/ /phan pa ma yin pa yongs su mi 'dor
263a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod chags dang sred pa yin la phan pa yongs su mi 'dor ba'i mtshan nyid ni dad pa yin te/ de ltar na 'di dag kyang gcig pa nyid yin no/ /'di las gos bzlog pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal
263a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ blo'i spyod pa rnams kyang gcig pa nyid yin te/ brtse ba nyid dang/ nyes pa tshol ba dang/ yongs su 'dor ba'i rang bzhin can nyid yin pa'i phyir zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal can gyi gang zag brtse ba'i med pa'i rang bzhin can yin la
263a4(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas shes pa ni blo yin te/ zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal ni gang zag nyes pa tshol ba'i bdag nyid can no/ /blo ni 'dus byas kyi nyes pa tshol ba'i bdag nyid can no/ /zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal ni gang zag yongs su 'dor pa yin la/ blo
263a5(mdo 'grel): ni 'dus byas yongs su 'dod pa shes pa'o/ /de bas na tshan nyid mthun pas zhe sdang dang nga rgyal dang blo la spyod pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid yin no/ /de bzhin du gti mug dang/ lta ba dang/ rnam par rtog pa la spyod
263a6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams ni mi brtan zhing rnam par g.yo ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir gti mug ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na mi brtan pa yin la/ lta ba ni log pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir mi brtan pa yin no//
263a7(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog par bya ba'i dngos po mang po la rgyugs pas na mi brtan pa yin no/ /gti mug ni chos kyi mtshan nyid ma rtogs pas g.yo ba yin la/ lta ba ni log pa'i chos la rnam par g.yengs pas g.yo ba yin
263b1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ rnam par rtog pa ni yang ba yin pas g.yo ba yin no/ /de bas na mi brtan zhing g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir gti mug dang lta ba dang rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa rnams spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi gcig pa yin no/ /'di dag ni las kyis phan
263b2(mdo 'grel): tshun du tha dad par gyur pa yin te/ dge slong dag las kyi mtshan nyid kyis byis pa yin zhing las kyi mtshan nyid kyis mkhas pa yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/ des na tshul de ltar shes par bya'o/ /'gro dang lta dang spyod
263b3(mdo 'grel): dang smra ba dang/ /nyal dang zas dang gos gyon 'dod pas las/ /'jam dang rtsug dang kun nas g.yo ba'i mi/ /'dod dang khro dang gti mug la spyod bshad/ /nyes pa'i rang bzhin rjes 'jug byed pa rnams/ /'di dang pha rol dag tu/ de'i dbang
263b4(mdo 'grel): gis/ spyod ma sna tshogs 'gyur ba de yis phyir/ de las go bzlog tshul gyis 'di la sbyar/ /de ltar dpyod pa dang mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs shes pas gnas pa ma yin pa la sbyor bar mi byed do/ /gang ga
263b5(mdo 'grel): phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa rang nyid 'phal bar 'dod pas 'di lta bu'i bla ma la yang dag par brten te gnas par bya ba 'am/ slob dpon nam mkhan po yon tan de lta bu dang mi ldan par gyur na gang na yon tan de lta bu'i bla ma yod pa
263b6(mdo 'grel): der 'gro bar bya'o/ /dam pa rang gi yon tan gyis/ /mtho ba ring po nas kyang snang/ dri med sa phyogs mdzes pa yis/ /ston ka yi ni ring por mtshungs/ /der 'gro ba ni nyon mongs dang/ bar chad mang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mi nus pa
263b7(mdo 'grel): 'am de lta bu dang ldan pa gang na yang yod par thob mar ma gyur na/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid slob dpon gyi mchog yin pa las brten par bya ste/ de'i dbang gis rang la phan pa 'byung bar 'gyur
264a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir te/ mdo sde las ji skad gsungs pa ston pa ni de skad gsungs pa yin la/ ji skad gsungs pa mdo sde las de skad ston pa yin te/ slob dpon yang rjes su ston pas 'di dag nyid rjes su ston pa nyid yin pa'i
264a2(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ gal te sdig bral shes rab can lhan cig /spyod pa brtan pa'i legs gnas ma rnyed na/ /rgyal po rnam rgyal grong khyer spangs pa ltar/ /dgon pa'i glang chen lta bur gcig pur spyad/
264a3(mdo 'grel): ces gsungs pa dang/ de yang rang sangs rgyas kyis dam pa shes rab can la yang dag brten/ /grogs kyi phun tshogs rab tu bsngags yin gyis/ /gal te nyes med de ni ma rnyed na/ /bse ru lta bur gcig bu spyod par bya zhes/
264a4(mdo 'grel): ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o/ /gcig pu gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba ji skad thos pa bag yod pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma'i nus pa la yid sbyar bar mi bya ste/ de la brten pa'i
264a5(mdo 'grel): sems ni legs pa phul du byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir phul du byung ba'i chos la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /dal 'byor gyi mchog 'di ni lta'i bu'i 'gro ba'i snying po bas kyang shin tu mgyogs par 'gro ba
264a6(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /de bas na yang dang yang du nyon mongs pa spong par 'os pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang/ nus pa che bas zag pa zad pa'i rten du gyur pa 'am/ de'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gcig gi dbang du byas nas de las gzhan pa'i
264a7(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan skyes pa dang ma skyes pa'i nyes pa rnams zhi bar byed pa rnams kyang yid la bya'o/ /'dod chags la spyod pa yin na yang zhe sdang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams la kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba
264b1(mdo 'grel): yin pa/ zhe sdang la spyod pa la yang 'dod chags dang gti mug la sogs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing gti mug la spyod pa rnams la yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na bcom
264b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gal te 'dod pa la 'dun pa skyes bar gyur na mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa nges par gsungs pa yin no/ /dge slong dang dge slong ma ltag pa'i
264b3(mdo 'grel): sems la mngon par brtson pas gnas lnga yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing mtshan ma gsum pa yang dang yang du yid la bya'o/ /thams cad bag yod pa dang ldan par bya ste/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ji
264b4(mdo 'grel): skad du/ bag yod pa'i rgyu dang/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyu dang/ rtag tu bya ba'i rgyu dang/ rjes su sbyor ba'i rgyu dang/ yang dag par yid la byed pa'i rgyus de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang/ sems kyi
264b5(mdo 'grel): yang snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ gnas pa dang ldan pa la mkhas pa nyid du bya'o/ /gus par bya ba dang/ rtag par bya ba dang/ rjes su mthun par bya bas dmigs pa gang zhig gam/ rnam pa dang mtshan ma gang gis sems kyi nyon
264b6(mdo 'grel): mongs pa nye bar zhe bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag par shes par bya'o/ /ji skad du/ g.yos mkhan lta bu'i mdo las/ mtshan ma legs par bzung ba ni sems bskyed pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang
264b7(mdo 'grel): ji skad du/ mtshan ma legs par bzung ba'i phyir gom pa 'dor ba yang ting nge 'dzin la snyom par 'jug par byed do zhes 'dren pa'i tshig nyes par bzung ba'i rjes su nyams par 'gyur ro zhes gnas brtan gyis bshad pa
265a1(mdo 'grel): lta bu'o/ /mtshan mam brjod pas ni myur du snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma legs par bzung ba yin pa'i phyir snyoms par 'jug sna bstan pa yin no/ /dran pa yang? rnal 'byor sbyod
265a2(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyi nus pa che ba'i chos yin te/ de ni thams cad du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir de'i dbang gis 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs dang/ mtshan ma rnams las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na thams cad du legs par smras pa'i
265a3(mdo 'grel): dran pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /de ltar yang mdo las/ mnyam par bzhag pa 'di ni dran pa la nye bar gnas pa rnams kyi yin gyi/ /chos 'di ni dran pa nyams pa rnams kyi ma yin no zhes gsungs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin las
265a4(mdo 'grel): g.yang ba'i nyes dmigs rnams ba du mas shin tu bsams par bya zhing/ snga ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan mthong ba la 'bad par bya ste/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin la sems yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ro//
265a5(mdo 'grel): ji skad du/ khyim bdag gon gyi dbang du mdzad de/ ting nge 'dzin thob nas de dbang du byas la dregs par gyur pa med pa dang/ mi smra bar de'i gong ma'i khyad par thob pa'i phyir sems rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /ji skad du ri bo'i
265a6(mdo 'grel): chu dpar mdzad de/ rnal 'byor spyod pa la gces par byed pa'i chos smra ba nyung ba la sogs pa spang bar mi bya'o/ /dus su chos nyan pa la brten par bya'o/ /rang gi sems la so sor brtags pa mang du bya'o zhes ji skad bshad
265a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang ldan ni yid gang la nye bar sbyar ba yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa de thogs pa med pa nyid du ting nge 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i gter thob par
265b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /bag med nyes dang yan lag nyams pa ni/ /sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/ /ting 'dzin de 'dras de phyir de rnams kyi/ /yan lag la ni 'bad pa nyid du gyis/ /legs pa'i lam bstan pa'i gtam las
265b2(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba phun sum tshogs pa gsum pa'o// //bslob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa sogs pa'i lam bstan pa'i gtam rdzogs so// //
265b3(mdo 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de'i pi ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /bam po phyed dang gsum mo/ /dge bar gyur cig/
265b4(mdo 'grel): mang+ga laM/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa gzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ d+ha sha ku sha la kar ma pA phA ni rad+he sha/ /bod skad du/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa/ dkon mchog gsum
265b5(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba bcud po 'di dag mngon par mtho ba dang/ des? par legs par thams cad kyi rgyu yin pas na/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma dag gis 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /de la bcu gang zhe na/ lus kyi las
265b6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsum ste/ srog mi gcod pa dang/ ma byin par mi len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par mi g.yem? pa'o/ /ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi ste/ rdzun mi smra ba dang/ phra ma mi smra ba dang tshig rtsub po mi smra ba dang/ tshig
265b7(mdo 'grel): 'khyal bar mi smra ba'o/ /yid kyi las rnam pa gsum ste/ brnab sems spangs pa dang/ gnod sems spangs pa dang/ log par lta ba spangs pa'o/ /de yang mi dge ba bcu spang pa ni/ dge ba bcu yin pas spang bar bya ba
266a1(mdo 'grel): bcu brjod par bya ste/ de ni 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod las ji skad du/ srog gcod pa'i sems can dang/ /gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa dang/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang
266a2(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal ba'i bar du 'gro /dbyen byed pa dang tshig rtsub dang/ /rdzun du smra zhing mi sdom pa/ /byis pa 'khyal par smra ba rnams/ /so so'i skye bo bslus pas bcings/ /gzhan gyi spyod la bsnab sems dang//
266a3(mdo 'grel): gnod sems dag ni mang ba dang/ /mi gang lta ba log zhugs pa/ /ngan 'gro dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lus kyi sdig pa rnam gsum dang/ /ngag gi sdig pa rnam bzhi dang/ /yid kyi sdig pa rnam gsum ni/ /sdig byed pa
266a4(mdo 'grel): dag rab tu byed/ /sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas na/ /de phyir ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ci nas ngan 'gro'i mi btang bar/ /bskyab ba'i phyir ni rab tu 'byung/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dag gi/ ji ltar
266a5(mdo 'grel): na nyes pa de dag rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ srog gcod pa ni/ gzhi sems can yin pa dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ gsod par bsams pa dang/ sbyor ba byas pa dang/ sbyor ba byas pa de nyid kyi che 'am/ gzhan gyi tshe shi ba
266a6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa yan lag lngas rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ma shi bar 'gyod pa las shi ba ni na smad do/ /myos pa dang sems 'khrug pa dang/ tshor bas gzir pa la nyes pa med par thams cad la sbyar ro/ /ma byin par len pa ni de yan
266a7(mdo 'grel): lag bzhis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ blang? bar bya ba gzhin gyis yongs su bzung bar gyur pa yin pa dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ brku bar bsams pa dang/ gnas nas spos ba'i?/ /'dod pas logs? bar g.yem pa ni/
266b1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa bdun te/ bdag nyid las byung ba dang/ rang gi chung ma las byung ba dang/ chung mar mi rigs pa chung mar byas pa las byung ba dang/ chung ma yin pa las byung ba dang/ skyes pa las byung ba dang/ dud 'gro las
266b2(mdo 'grel): byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo las byung ba'o/ /de la bdag nyid las byung ba ni/ mi rigs pa'i yul dran pas dbang po las rang 'am/ gzhan gyis khu ba 'byin par byed pa'o/ /rang gi chung ma las byung ba ni/ dus ma yin bar
266b3(mdo 'grel): nyin par dang/ bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang/ na ba dang/ sprum pa dang/ mya ngan gyi gdungs pa dang/ zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang/ bang? pa? ma? sar? pa la sogs dag dang/ gnas ma yin pa pha ma dang/ bla ma dang/ dkon mchog
266b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ mchod rten la sogs pa'i gnas dang/ yan lag ma yin pa kha dang/ bshad pa'i lam dang/ lte ba la sogs te/ mdor na bud med kyi dbang po las gzhan pa thams cad do/ /de ltar dus dang/ gnas dang/
266b5(mdo 'grel): yan lag min pa drag tu rang gi chung ma la 'khrig pa sbyod pa ni/ rang gi chung ma las byung ba'i 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'o/ /chung ma de mi rigs pa chung mar byas pa la byung ba ni/ tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen
266b6(mdo 'grel): ma 'am/ dge slong ma 'am dge slong ma 'am/ dge tshul ma 'am bsnyen gnas la gnas pa'i bud med chung mar blangs te/ de dag mi dga' ba 'am/ dga' yang rung ste/ sdom pa gtod ba'i rkyen byas pa ste/ 'di ni chung
266b7(mdo 'grel): mar mi rigs par chung mar byas pa las byung pa'o/ /chung ma ma yin pa las byung ba ni/ bud med gang khyim thab gzhan gyis bzung ba dang/ rang gi bdun rgyud las ma 'das pa'i 'brel bar gyur pa dang/ /chos kyi
267a1(mdo 'grel): mtshan can dang/ sdom pa can dang/ pha ma dang/ ming po dang/ spun zla dang/ rus chags dang/ tshe 'brang du smos pas bsrungs pa dang/ gyos? rgyug dang/ skud po la sogs pa khyo'i? phyogs
267a2(mdo 'grel): smos pas gsungs pa dang/ mi mnyam pa'i rigs dang yon tan gyis bsrungs pa dang/ smad 'tshong ma dag kyang skyes bu gzhan gyis rin sngar byin pas bzung ba dang/ skyes bu gzhan gyis chung ma dang 'dra bar
267a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gir byas pa rnams te/ de dag dang 'khrig pa spyod pa rnams ni gzhan gyis tshor na ches sdig pa che la/ ma tshor du zin kyang 'dod pas g.yem pa'i rnam par smin pa 'byung ngo/ /skyes pa las byung ba ni skyes bu gzhan
267a4(mdo 'grel): gyi kha dang bshad pa'i lam la sogs par mtshan sbyor ba'o/ /dud 'gro las byung ba ni/ ba lang dang/ ra lug dang/ rta bong la sogs pa'i mtshan dang bshad pa'i lam la sogs mtshan sbyor ba'o/ /khye'u dang bu
267a5(mdo 'grel): mo las byung ba ni/ 'khrig pa spyad mi bzod pa'i khyi'u dang bu mo'i gdang? mtshan dang/ bshad pa'i lam du mtshan sbyor ba'o/ /de ltar 'dod pas log par g.yem? pa de dag ni/ yan lag gsum gyis rdzogs
267a6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur te/ dus la sogs pa de dag la de dag tu 'du shes pa dang/ sbyor ba byas pa dang/ rjes su mthun pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba'o/ /de ltar de dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum mo/ /rdzun du
267a7(mdo 'grel): sma ba ni yan lag gsum gyi rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gzhi mnor? bar khong du chud pa dang/ de la 'du shes bsgyur ba dang/ log par smras pa'o/ /phra ma ni yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbye bar bya ba
267b1(mdo 'grel): sems can nyid dang/ dbyen gyi tshig smras pa'o/ /tshig rtsub mo ni yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ /gzhi sems can yin pa dang tshig rtsub mo smras pa'o/ /tshig 'khyas? pa ni/ yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs
267b2(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur te/ chos dang ldan pa der bsams pa dang/ tshig 'khyal ba smras pa'o/ /de dag ni dag gnyis par spyod pa bzhi'o/ /brnab sems ni/ yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gzhi gzhan gyi yin pa dang/
267b3(mdo 'grel): de la bsnab sems skyed pa'o/ /gnod sems ni yan lag gnyis kyis rdzogs bar 'gyur te/ gzhi sems can yin pa dang/ de la kun nas mnar sems par gyur pa'o/ /log par lta ba ni/ yan lag gnyis gyis
267b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par 'gyur to/ gzhi phyin ci ma log pa dang/ de nyid la bsam pa phyin ci log pa skyed pa'o/ /de dag ni khyad par gyi yan lag gi/ thun mong gi yan lag ni/ sems gtso zhes bya ba'o/ /de dag ni yid kyi nyes par
267b5(mdo 'grel): sbyod pa gsum mo/ /de ltar na kun nas slong ba'i sems pa dang/ rjes su spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang/ /sbyor ba'i gzhi bsams pa de nyid dang/ sbyor ba'i 'bras bu dngos gzhi nyid spyad pa dang/ mjug rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yan
267b6(mdo 'grel): lag lnga rdzogs na ni mi dge ba gang yang legs par rdzogs pa yin no/ /thams cad ma tshad na ni cung zad spyad pa ci rigs par sbyar ro/ /cung zad du na gzhi ma nor ba nyid ni kha cig tu ma nges pa srid do/ /de ltar mi dge ba bcu po
267b7(mdo 'grel): de dag sbyad pa'i 'bras bu rgya cher ni/ dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las shes par bya zhing/ /mod rang sdus pa ni ji skad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las gsungs pa/ srog gcod
268a1(mdo 'grel): pas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ /byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta
268a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ tshe thung ba dang/ nang mang ba'o/ /ma byin par len pas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ /byol? song gi skye? gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa
268a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ longs spyod chung ba dang/ mthun mong gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o/ /'dod bas log par g.yem pas ni/ /sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ khyol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /
268a4(mdo 'grel): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mar skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ lhod pa dang bcas pa'i chung ma dang/ g.yog 'khor ma bsrungs pa'o/ rdzun du smra bas ni/ sems
268a5(mdo 'grel): can dmyal bar 'khrid do/ /byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes ni yang /rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ skur pa mang ba dang/
268a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis bslu ba'o/ phrams ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ /byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub
268a7(mdo 'grel): pa 'di lta ste/ g.yog mi mthun pa dang g.yog ngan par 'gyur ba'o/ /tshig rtsub pos ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ /byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir
268b1(mdo 'grel): skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos pa dang/ 'thab mo'i tshig thos par 'gyur pa'o/ /ngag 'khyil bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ /byol song gi
268b2(mdo 'grel): skyed gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngan par bsgrub ba ni 'di lta ste/ tshig mi btsun pa dang/ spobs pa med pa'o/ /brnab sems kyis ni/
268b3(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ /byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ chog mi shes pa dang/ 'dod pa che ba'o//
268b4(mdo 'grel): gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid dog byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ gnod pas glags
268b5(mdo 'grel): lta ba dang/ pha rol gyis mnar pa'i/? logs lta bas ni /sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ /byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/ /de nas ci ste mir skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par
268b6(mdo 'grel): bsgrub pa ni 'di lta ste/ lta ba ngan par ltung ba dang/ g.yo sgyu can du 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs te/ de dag kyang mtshon pa ste/ mi dge ba bcu po 'di dag ni/ re re la yang rnam par smin pa yang shin tu mang po yod par rig par bya'o/ /da ni
268b7(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gi lci ba dang/ yang pa nyid brjod par bya ste/ de ni 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo las gsungs pa/ 'ong srungs pha yang yin la/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yin pa gsod pa gang yin pa 'di ni srog gcod pa'i
269a1(mdo 'grel): nang na ma rungs pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa 'di ni ma sbyin par len pa'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no/ /ma yang yin la dgra bcom ma yang yin pa las nyal po byas pa 'di ni 'dod
269a2(mdo 'grel): pas log par g.yem pa'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa 'di ni/ rdzun du smra ba'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no/ /dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa 'di ni phra ma'i nang na ma rung pa yin no/ /'phags
269a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la mi snyan par brjod pa 'di ni/ dag rtsub mo rnams kyi nang na ma rung pas yin no/ /chos thos par 'dod pa rnams la rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa 'di ni tshig 'khyal pa'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no/ /yang dag par song ba dang
269a4(mdo 'grel): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi nyed pa 'phrog par sems pa 'di ni/ /brnag sems kyi nang na ma rungs pa yin no/ /mtshams med pa byed pa 'di ni/ gnod sems kyi nang na ma rungs pa yin no/ /lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'di ni/
269a5(mdo 'grel): log par lta ba'i nang na ma rungs pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /mdor bsdu na rgyun tu spyod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa drag pos spyod pa dang/ rten gyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems dang/ dkon mchog gsum la mi brten cing
269a6(mdo 'grel): rnam par sum 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa la sogs pa med pa dang/ yon tan dang gtso bo 'phags pa'i gzhi las byung ba ste/ de dag dang gang ldan pa'i mi dge ba bcu ni lci ba nyid do/ /de bas na 'phags pa nA gArdzu nas
269a7(mdo 'grel): kyang/ rtag dang mngon par zhen dang gnyen po med/ /yon tan gtso ldan gzhi las byung ba'i las/ /dge dang mi dge rnam lnga chen po ste/ /de bas dge ba spyod la brtson par bgyi zhes bshad do/ /nga ni de dag rtsa ba'i nyon mongs
269b1(mdo 'grel): pa gang gang gis rdzogs par byed pa bstan ce na/ de ni chos mngon pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las/ /gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub dag /zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed/ /log g.yem bsnab sems ma byin len//
269b2(mdo 'grel): chags pa yis ni mthar phyin byed/ /log par lta ba gti mug gis/ /lhag par lta ba gti mug gis/ /lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod/ ces bshad pa las shes par bya'o/ /da ni de dag gis gnang ba nyid brjod par bya ste/ gang bdag gi don
269b3(mdo 'grel): la rjes su lta ba cung zad tsam yang med la/ byed pa gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig 'dod cing thams cad du snying rje dang ldan pa dag la ni/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum ma gtogs pa 'am/ log par lta ba nyid gtogs pa dag la
269b4(mdo 'grel): lar rjes su gnang ba ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa gtan la phab pa'i gtsug lag dag la blta'o/ /de ltar blang bar bya ba dang/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang yan lag dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lci yang dang rgyu dang/ rjes
269b5(mdo 'grel): su bstan pa dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa yin no/ /dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam/ /legs brjod bsod nams dri med gang/ deng 'dir bdag gis bsgrub pa des/ /'gro ba mi dge bcu spang shog /
269b6(mdo 'grel): bdag kyang dge bcu'i yon tan gyis/ /brgyan cing ngan 'gro spangs pa dang/ /'gru ba'i mi dge'i las lam bcu/ /gtan nas rgyud bcad byed par shog /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bram ze
269b7(mdo 'grel): btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra ba mang ngo/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
270a1(mdo 'grel): rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i mya ngan sa la ba/ /mi dge ba bcu'i lam bstan pa/ /dran pa nyer gzhag gi tshig le'ur byas pa 'gro ba drug gi tshig le'ur byas pa/ /btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa/ /'dod yon lnga'i nyes dmigs
270a2(mdo 'grel): slob dpon dbyen gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ /dge slong gzhon nu rab gsal la sprid pa rnams gzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ sho ka ba'i no ngan/ bod skad du/ mya ngan bsal ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
270a3(mdo 'grel): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dga' bral nyam thag ste/ /rab tu mya ngan me 'bar ba/ /bsgrims nas shin tu spro srid zhing/ /rang gi sems nyid brjod par bya/ /las kyi lam zhugs thob pa yi/ /sgron ma med par
270a4(mdo 'grel): skye bo yang/ /nyes pa ma byas song gyur pa/ /de la ci zhig yongs su gdung/ /ci ste de nyid 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan ni su yang min nag go/ 'di ni byur chen non ba zhes/ /cho de chen po gdab par rigs/ /'di ltar thams cad skye ba yi/ /mdun
270a5(mdo 'grel): na gnas pa 'chi ba ste/ /kun kyang 'pho bar snang ba'i phyir/ /mya ngan bya bar 'os pa min/ /mdza' dang 'grogs pa brkam pa yi/ /skye bo mya ngan gyis gdung ba/ /rnga rtsing? dag la chags pa'i 'bri/ /rngon pas nags kyi nang du bzhin//
270a6(mdo 'grel): gnang tshe kun gyis bgrong bya zhing/ /de dang der ni 'gro ba yi/ /snga nas de der song ba la/ /ci yi phyir na mya ngan byed/ /mi bzang 'chi ba'i bdag po la/ /rab tu myos pa'i skye bo 'di/ /nags na gsod sred seng ge yi/ /mdun na ri dags gnas
270a7(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /'chi ba bzlog par bya ba yi/ /gang tshe thams kun med pas na/ /spro bsring ba dag mi bskyed par/ /chu la nya bzhin ci zhig 'gre/ /sa'am ci ste mtho ris na/ /skyes nas la la ma shi ba/ /'ga' zhig khyod kyi mthong ba'am/
270b1(mdo 'grel): thos sam 'on te the tshom za/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad la/ /mi rtag me yis bsreg gyur pa/ /dgon par me ni 'bar ba yis/ /dgon pa'i me tog ji lta bzhin/ /rtag par 'du shes rnam log na/ /srid rtsa las kyang 'bro ba rnams/ /'chi
270b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i zhags pas grangs gyur pa/ /zhags pas glang po bzhin du'o/ /bsam gtan las skyes pa de myong ba/ /tshangs pas tshangs pa'i gnas las kyang/ /mi rtag phyir ni lhung gyur pa/ /chu yis klung gis 'grams bzhin/ /brgya byin dag ni stong rnams
270b3(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /'khor los sgyur pa brgya dag dang/ /dus kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni/ /mar me 'bar la rlung gis bzhin/ /drang srong chen po lnga mngon shes/ /mkha' la rgyang ring 'gro ba yang/ /gang na spyod yul 'chi med pa/ /der ni 'gro bar nus pa
270b4(mdo 'grel): med/ /gang dus rnams bsregs 'gyur te/ /lhun po 'di thal bar 'jig pa dang/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yang skams gyur na/ /lus can de dag lta ci smos/ /ci ste sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ /rdo rje'i sku yang mi
270b5(mdo 'grel): rtag ma /chu gang snying po'ang med 'dra ba'i/ /lus can gzhan rnams smos ci dgos/ /gnyen gyi phang du blangs pa yi/ /skye bo rnams kyang 'chi bas phrogs/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa yi/ /klu la nam mkha' lding gis bzhin/ /kyi hud mi
270b6(mdo 'grel): sog kye gnyen zhes/ /shin tu sdug bsngal ngu 'bod pa/ /ji ltar sbrul gyis sbas pa bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams ni 'chi bas ming/ /rab tu bgrod dga' don gyi mthar/ /ma phyin par ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rab tu 'chi ba'i khar bcug pa/ /chu
270b7(mdo 'grel): sin gnas su chu 'bab bzhin/ /gang dus 'jig rten pha rol tu/ /'gro ba'i rjes 'gra dga' med na/ /dgra 'am ci ste mdza' spug rnams/ /'di la bye brag med par 'gyur/ /skye bo gzhan la byams byed phyir/ /skye bo rang 'khor 'du
271a1(mdo 'grel): shes pa/ /bsam pa'i 'dam du bying ba ni/ /glang po 'dam du bying ba bzhin/ /khyod kyi ji snyed bshes gnyen rnams/ /'khor ba'i nad na blangs bor ba/ /gang+gA'i bye ma rnams la yang/ /de snyed tsam du
271a2(mdo 'grel): yong ma yin/ /gang nyid khyod kyis rab bsgrims te/ brtse ba'i bu yi 'du shes pa/ /de nyid tshe rabs gzhan dus na/ /rdeg par byed cing dgrar 'du shes/ /rang gis shes pa'i nu ma yang/ /khyod kyis 'thungs pa'i srid gzhan na/ /de
271a3(mdo 'grel): yis khrag nyid 'thungs pa dang/ /rgyab nas sha yang zos pa yin/ /gang khyod 'di ltar 'khod gyur te/ /mgo la lan grangs brgyar brjed pa/ /de nyid bran gyur khyod yin te/ /rtog pas lan grangs brgyar yang btags/ /'gro ba'i rgyu yi
271a4(mdo 'grel): dngos po yis/ /sngon chad gzhan du snang gyur pa/ /gzhan na yongs su 'gyur ba ste/ rme bdun drang srong bdun tshogs bzhin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' i chang thigs ni/ /tshogs shing rnam par 'jig 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i srog
271a5(mdo 'grel): chags kyang/ /tshogs shing rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /ldan pa dang ni bral ba yi/ /lus can rnams ni yud tsam ste/ /'bab chu dpa' klong 'khyil shugs la/ /shing dag ji ltar btsugs pa bzhin/ /ngo
271a6(mdo 'grel): mtshar che'o ma rig mthu/ /gang gis 'gro ba rnam rmongs pa'i/ /bral ba'i sdug bsngal dran nyams shing/ /ldan pa rnams la sred par byed/ /gtsang ma'i gnas rnam ma gtogs par/ /sna tshogs las kyis
271a7(mdo 'grel): chas nas su/ /bros sa gang duAng mi ltung ba/ /sems can 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /yang dang yang du dmyal phan/ /zangs bzhun bskol ba gang 'thungs pa/ /rgya mtsho nang gi chu la yang/ /? tshang ci yo dam che
271b1(mdo 'grel): khyi dang phag tu gyur pa ni/ mi gtsang ba ni gang zos pa/ /ri yi rgyal po lhun pa yi/ /tshad las shin tu lhag par 'gyur/ /mdza' bshes rab tu bral ba yis/ /'khor ba'i gnas su gang dus pa/ /mig gi mchi ma'i thigs pa yi/ /snod du
271b2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho'ang rung ma yin/ /phan tshun dag tu rtsod pa'i phyir/ /mgo ba bcad pa gang yin pa/ /spungs na de ltar mtho ba ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las kyang thal/ /srin bur gyur cing rab bkres pa/ /sa lus zos pa gang yin pa/
271b3(mdo 'grel): 'o ma'i rgya mtsho che nang du/ /de yis bkang na shin tu 'gang/ /yi dags 'jig rten mi bzad par/ /bkres skom sdug bsngal gang myong ba/ /de ni dran phyir rang gi snying/ /rang gi sha yang 'dod mi 'gyur/ /mi la dbul ba'i nyes pa yis//
271b4(mdo 'grel): tho tsam pa ni gang myong de/ /brjod pa bdag la mthu med pa/ /rang gi lce la ngo tsha zhing/ /ri bo'i ngos la yun rings dus/ /lha yi bde ba myong gyur pa/ /lha rdzas yul gyis mi ngoms te/ /shing skam po la me bzhin no/ /dge ba'i
271b5(mdo 'grel): las rnams yongs zad pas/ /bde 'gro las kyang shi 'phos te/ /tshe zad sa la ltung ba ni/ /'dab chags bya ni mkha' la bzhin/ /las kyi shugs kyis 'gro ba 'di/ /gang phyir 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor/ /bde bas chags pa yongs
271b6(mdo 'grel): spangs shing/ /thar pa la ni blo zhen bya/ /mya ngan bsal ba zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dza ti sh+rA b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo
271b7(mdo 'grel): tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ nga sha kun sha la karma pa thA nir de she/ bod skad du/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa/ 'jam dpal
272a1(mdo 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi dge las kyi lam bcu ni/ rang bzhin kha na ma tho bcas/ /bde ba don du gnyer ba yis/ /'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya/ /bcu pa de dag gang zhe na/ lus kyi dbye
272a2(mdo 'grel): ba rnam gsum ste/ /dag gi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rab tu dbye ba gsum/ /mi dge bcu du de dag 'dod/ /de rnams rab tu bshad par bya/ /de la re zhig lus kyi ni/ /srog gcod ma byin len log g.yem/ /ngag gi rdzun tshig
272a3(mdo 'grel): phra ma dang/ /tshig rtsub dang ni 'khyal pa rnams/ /yid kyis log lta brnabs sems gnod/ /nga la srog gcod gang zhe na/ /srog dang ldan par gyur pa la/ /srog dang ldan par 'du shes dang/ /gsod sems nye bar gnas
272a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /rim pa bzhin du byas ldan dang/ /srog ni gcad par gyur pa ste/ /yan lag lnga po de dag dang/ /ldan pa srog gcod yin par bshad/ /ma byin len pa gang zhe na/ gzhan dag gi ni yin pa dang/ /gzhan gyis bdag
272a5(mdo 'grel): gir byas pa dang/ /gzhan gyi yin par 'du shes dang/ /rku sems nye bar gnas pa dang/ /rim pa bzhin du byas ldan dang/ /gnas nas spags par gyur pa ste/ yan lag drug po de dag dang/ /ldan pa ma byin len par
272a6(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /de la log g.yem gang zhe na/ log bar g.yem pa rnam bzhi ste/ /yul min pa dang dus min dang/ /yan lag min dang bgrod min pa'o/ /de la 'ang yul min bya ba ni/ /dam chos mchod rten sku gzugs dang/ /byang chub sems
272a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' i bzhugs gnas sogs/ /mkhan po dang ni slob dpon dang/ /pha ma dur na gnas pa ni/ /yul min de du mi bya'o/ /de la dus min bya ba ni/ /bla mtshan 'jig na spun ma dang/ /bu chung dang bcas mi myos dang/ /sdug bsngal
272b1(mdo 'grel): yid mi bde sogs dang/ /yan lag brgyad gnas dus min yin/ /yan lag min pa gang zhe na/ /ba dang bshang lam byas pa dang/ /bsla bsdams lag pas bskyod pa yin/ /bgrod par bya min zhes bya ste/ /gzhan bzur chos kyi rgyas
272b2(mdo 'grel): mtshan ldan/ /rigs kyis bsrungs dang rgyal mor gnas/ /gzhan gyis blangs dang smad 'tshong dang/ /nye du dag dang 'brel pa ni/ /de dag bgrod bya min pa yin/ /rnam pa de dag rnams la ni/ /rang gi chung ma brten pa yang/ /'dod log
272b3(mdo 'grel): spyad par 'gyur pa yin/ /rdzun du smra ba gang zhe na/ /dngos po gnas par gyur pa dang/ /dngos po las ni nyams gyur dang/ /'du shes gzhan du bsgyur pa dang/ /rdzun du smra bar gyur pa dang/ /rim pa bzhin du byas ldan dang//
272b4(mdo 'grel): yan lag lnga ba de dag dang/ /ldan pa rdzun du smra bar 'gyur/ /de la phra ma gang zhe na/ /gzhan dag dbye phyir phra ma yin/ /de la tshig rtsub gang zhe na/ /gzhan gyi gnad snun byed pa ni/ /yid du mi 'ong tshig smras yin/ /de la khyab pa gang
272b5(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ /'dod pas nye bar blang ba dang/ /tshigs pa yas ni nyer bskyed nas/ /'brel med smra ba 'khyal ba yin/ /de la brnab sems gang zhe na/ /gzhan gyi nor dang longs spyod la/ /mchog tu mngon par chags pa yin/ gnod
272b6(mdo 'grel): sems zhes bya gang zhe na/ /sems can rnams la sdang? ba yi/ /rdeg dang 'ching dang gsod pa ste/ /de dag sems can la byed pa'o/ /log lta zhes bya gang zhe na/ /sbyin med mchod sbyin yod min dang/ /'jig rten pha rol yod
272b7(mdo 'grel): min zhing/ /dag sbyong bram ze lha rnams med/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom dang/ /rang sangs rgyas dang legs spyod dang/ /nyes par spyod pa yang min zhes/ /bya ba log pa'i lta ba yin/ /'phags pa dran pa nye bar
273a1(mdo 'grel): gzhag dang/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo rnams las/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas gsungs pa/ /'di ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin/ /mi dge las kyi lam btsun/ /dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu ru bshad/ /dge
273a2(mdo 'grel): bcu las kyi lam bsten pas/ /dmyal la sogs par ltung ma yin/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /skye zhing skye ba rnams su ni/ /gang zhig skye ba las rgyal ba'i/ /byang chub rang bzhin nges 'grub shog /mi dge bcu'i
273a3(mdo 'grel): las kyi lam bstan pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dzi ta sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur
273a4(mdo 'grel): ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sad+d+harma smri ti u pa sha nA kwa ri kA/ bod skad du/ dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan ldan zhing
273a5(mdo 'grel): dbab bya phebs/ /yang dag ye shes snang ba ldan/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi don mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum gtso phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la byed po gzhan med pa/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las/ /dge dang mi dge rang byas gang/
273a6(mdo 'grel): de yi 'bras bu 'jig rten spyod/ /de ltar mkhyen nas thugs brtses non/ /'jig rten gsum gtso gcig po nyid/ /'gro ba'i don du las gang dang/ /'bras bu gang dag yin gsungs pa/ /de ni bdag gis mdor bshad kyis//
273a7(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis nyon la dam pa dang/ /dam pa min pa'i rgyu yi las/ /bya ba dang ni spang ba'i rigs/ /chags dang gti mug 'jigs dang 'khor/ /mi gang mi ni gsod pa dang/ /gzhan yang bskyed nas gsod byed pa/ /de dag
273b1(mdo 'grel): nges par yang sos 'gro/ /gang gi phyir na lo stong phrag/ mang por yang ni de dag tu/ /btags shing btags shing yang 'tsho bas/ /de phyir yang sos yin par bshad/ /pha ma dang ni grogs dang gnyen/ /bshes gnyen la
273b2(mdo 'grel): ni 'khu byed dang/ /phra ma rdzun ni smra ba'i mi/ /thig nag du ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir de la shing bzhin du/ /thig nag btab nas sog le dag/ 'bar ba yi ni shog byed de/ /de phyir thig nag yin par bshad/ ra dang lug dang wa
273b3(mdo 'grel): dag dang/ /ri bong byi ba ri dags phag/ gzhan yang bskyed nas gsar byas nas/ /lus can bsdus 'joms 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir bsdus nas der 'dor dang/ /yang dag sreg par byed pas na/ /de yi phyir ni bsdus 'joms te/ /
273b4(mdo 'grel): de ltar ming ni don mthun grags/ /'dir ni lus can gang dag gi/ lus dang ngag yid nyon mongs byed/ /gang dag lhar? 'jug gzhan g.yo byed/ /mi de dag ni du 'bod 'gro/ /der ni drag po'i me dag gis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par
273b5(mdo 'grel): bsregs pas na/ /gang phyir skad ni drag 'byin pa/ /de phyir de dag ngu 'bod yin/ ? gis lha dang bram ze dang/ /bla ma'i rdzas phrogs sdug bsngal byas/ /gang dag gtams pa 'phrog byed pa/ /de dag ngu 'bod chen por 'gro/ /mes
273b6(mdo 'grel): bsregs pa ni drag phyir dang/ ngu 'bod pa yang che phyir dang/ /lci zhing che ba nyid kyi phyir/ /de ni ngu 'bod chen po yin/ /yon tan dag gis che ba la/ /gnod pa drag po byas pa 'am/ /pha ma bla ma bsad byas na/ /nges par bskal par
273b7(mdo 'grel): mnar med 'tshed/ /me dag der ni lus ngag gis/ /rus pa dag kyang lhag par 'gyur/ /gang phyir bde ba'i skabs med pa/ /de phyir mnar med yin par bshad/ /lus can gang dag gcig la gcig/ gnod par dka' 
274a1(mdo 'grel): bas? g.yul der gsong/ /sdig can de dag sdug bsngal dang/ /ldan pa'i ral gri sems can skye/ /gang phyir de yi sen mo ni/ /lcags byas 'bar rno de dag gis/ gcig gis gcig gsod gang
274a2(mdo 'grel): yin des/ /ral gri rtse mo can du bshad/ /byi bo byed pa shal ma ri/ /lcags kyi rtse mor me? 'bar/ sor ni bcu drug yod pa la/ /ngu zhing stobs kyis 'dzeg par 'gyur/ /bud med shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /mchu rno lus chen 'bar
274a3(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /gzhan gyi bus med 'phrog pa la/ /'jus nas za ba kho nar 'gyur/ /bag phab pa la gnod byed mi/ /nags tshal ral gri 'dab can du/ /gtubs byas ngu zhing bya rgod khyi/ /'ug pa bya rog za bar 'gyur/ /gang dag
274a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs pa/ /de dag lcags kyi tho lum? ni/ /tsha ba dag kyang za ba dang/ /yang dang yang du zangs bskol 'thung/ /rtag tu mngon la dga' ba dang/ /lo ni bye bar ngu zhing yang/ /khyi ni lcags kyi mtsho ba can/ /mi
274a5(mdo 'grel): bsrun shin tu dbang med za/ /chu skyes nya la sogs bsad na/ /chu bo rab med 'bar ba yi/ /zangs kyi khu ba'i tshur 'gro zhing/ /mi de mos kyang sreg par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rang don tsam rmongs nas/ /chos dang mi ldan shags
274a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar de du zhing/ /'khor los mngon par gzir bar 'gyur/ /'di la gang gis gzugs can la/ /gnod pa rnam pa mang byas pa/ /de dag yun rings 'khor lo dang/ /ri dang tho ba 'phar bas
274a7(mdo 'grel): gzir/ /gang zhig chos kyi mu stegs 'jig cing/ /yang dag ma yin lam smra ba'i/ /mi de dag ni spu gri'i sos/ /gtams pa'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sen mos shig la sogs bcom na/ /de dag lus ni cher 'gyur la/
274b1(mdo 'grel): ston brgyad yang dang yang du ni/ /brag sgor po yis 'joms par 'gyur/ /gang zhig brtul zhugs bzang mnos nas/ /legs par srung bar mi byed na/ /de ni nges par sha dang rus/ /'jeg pa'i me mar mur du bsregs/ /gang du 'tsho
274b2(mdo 'grel): ba log pa ni/ /cung zad kyis kyang 'tsho byed pa/ /de ni skyags 'jim nub gyur nas/ /srin bu rnams kyi za bar 'gyur/ /'bru yi nang na 'khod pa yi/ /srog chags mthong nas 'joms pa gang/ /de ni lcags kyi gtun shing gis
274b3(mdo 'grel): yang dang yang du brdung bar 'gyur/ /shin tu khro zhing gtum pa dang/ /g.yo byed rdzun du smra ba dang/ /gzhan la gnod byed dga' ba ni/ /gshin rje'i srin por skye bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal kun gyi sa bon ni/ /chung ngu la sogs dbye
274b4(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa ste/ /de mi phra yang spang bar bya/ /sems can dmyal ba'i rabs rdzogs so/ /'dod chags kyis ni rmongs pa dag /ngang pa phug ron la sogs dang/
274b5(mdo 'grel): bong bu 'dod cha can rnams kyi/ /skyes nas srin sogs skye gnas skye/ /khong khro 'dzin pas sbrul du skyes/ /nga rgyal khengs sems seng ger 'gyur/ /che ba yis ni nga rgyal gyis/ /khyi dang bong bu'i skye gnas skye//
274b6(mdo 'grel): ser sna phrag dog la sogs pa'i/ /skyon gyis lus can shi nas spro'u/ /mu tshor smra dang spyi btol che/ /rang bzhin mi rtan khrar skye'o/ /gsong dang 'ching dang ser sna yis/ /lus can pa yang khyi la sogs/ /
274b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro mi bsrun las kyis ni/ /sdom dang sdig pa mi sdug skye/ /khro dang ser sna can gyi mi/ /shi nas sha ni za byed pa/ /rtag dang spre'u wa dang dom/ kha rgod spyang ki la sogs skye/ /mi bsrun khro gnyer sbyin
275a1(mdo 'grel): byed mi/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klur skye'o/ /gtong zhing khro dang dregs pa yis/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang phyug skye/ /rang gi lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /sdig pa'i las ni gang byas pa/ de ni dud 'gror skye pas na//
275a2(mdo 'grel): de ni chung yang ma byed cig /dud 'gro'i rabs rdzogs so// //rtse log can gang sbyin pa spangs/ /bza' dang bca' ba 'phrog byed pa/ /de dag yi dags lus srul po/ /ro rnams za bar byed par skye/ /gang zhig byis pa
275a3(mdo 'grel): rnams la 'tshe/ bsnyed pas 'drid par byed pa de/ /khong gi dri ma za byed pa'i/ /lus srul por ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mi gang spyod pa dman pa dang/ /shin tu zhum dang ser sna ldan/ /rtag tu 'dod byed de shi nas/ /yi dags wa ba can du
275a4(mdo 'grel): skye/ /gang zhig ci yang mi ster la/ /sbyin pa zlog par byed pa de/ /yi dags bkres pas rnyengs pa yi/ /gsus che kha ni khab tsam 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyod? de'ang? mi byed/ /rigs kyi don du nor bsrung na/ /de ni yi dags mtshan gtor
275a5(mdo 'grel): spyod/ /shin du sa bsngos za der skye'o/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod/ /byin nas 'gyod par byed pa de/ /shi nas mchil ma skyugs pa la/ /za bar byed pa'i yi dags skye/ /gang zhig khros pas mi snyam smra/ /mtshang 'dru ba ni
275a6(mdo 'grel): smra byed pa/ /las des shin tu yun ring bar/ /yi dags kha 'bar skye bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'thab mo byed pa dang/ /ma chags sems ni khro byed pa/ /de ni yi dags me 'bar ma?/ /srin dang sdig sbrul phye lob? za/ /gang zhig grod
275a7(mdo 'grel): bca' 'beb shing ster/ /byin zhig gnod par byed pa de/ /grul bum byed ni mi sdug pa/ /mchod par 'os par skye bar 'gyur/ /zas kyi ched du brtse med pas/ /srog chags bsad cing sbyin byed gang/ /de dag shi nas nges par ni/ /
275b1(mdo 'grel): srin po'i bza' dang bca' bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu dri dang phreng la dga' / /sbyin byed khro ba chung ba ni/ /lha rnams dga' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba/ /dri za rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /gang dag kha cig phra mtsho/ /khro zhing dgos pa'i ched sbyin na/ de ni shas ma rungs
275b2(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /bzhin mi sdug par skye bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu rab sdang rtabs bag can/ /gzhan la gnod pa byed pa dang/ /rtag tu sbyin la dga' ba ni/ /de dag shi nas 'byung por skye/ /ma rung khro zhing sbyin byed la/ /chang zhim dag la dga' ba'i mi/ /shi
275b3(mdo 'grel): nas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa/ /chad la dga' ba rnams su skye/ /gang dag pha ma bla ma rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod par bzhon pas 'degs/ /de dag gzhal med khang rgyu ba'i/ /gnod sbyin bde ba ldan par skye/ /sred dang ser sna'i skyon gyis ni/ /shi nas
275b4(mdo 'grel): yi dags skye bar 'gyur/ /de phyir de ni spang bar bya/ /yi dags kyi rabs rdzogs so// //mi 'tshe ba yi lha dang mi/ /lha min rnams su tshe ring 'gyur/ /'tshe bas thung ngur skye bar 'gyur/ /de phyir 'tsho
275b5(mdo 'grel): ba rnam par spang/ /mje dang smon pa zad byed rims/ /mi nad gzhan yang gang dag yin/ /'byung po rnams la gsad dang bcing/ /brdeg par byas pa rnams kyis 'byung/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog cing/ /ci yang sbyin par mi byed pa/ /
275b6(mdo 'grel): de ni 'bad ba chen pos kyang/ /rdzas ni rnyed par mi nus so/ /gang zhig rdzas ni ma byin par/ /len cing sbyin pa sbyin byed pa/ /de ni rdzas dang ldan gyur la/ /phyis nas de ni med par 'gyur/ /mi gang mi 'phrog sbyin mi byed/ /ha cang 'jungs pa ma yin
275b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de dag tshogs ni chen po yis/ /nges par rdzas ni brtan pa thob/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor mi 'phrog /gtong dang ldan zhing ser sna spangs/ /mi de rdzas ni mi 'phrog pa/ /rgya chen yid du 'ong ba 'thob/ /gang zhig 'di la zas sbyin pa/
276a1(mdo 'grel): tshe dang mdog dang stobs ldan zhing/ /dpal dang ldan zhing nad spangs pa/ /rtag par bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gos ni sbyin byed pa/ /'dzems bcas gzugs bzang longs spyod ldan/ /byin can srog
276a2(mdo 'grel): chags rnams la sdug /gos rnams kyang ni rnyad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di la rab dga' ba'i/ /sems kyi gnas ni sbyin par byed/ /lus can de la khang bzangs ni/ /'dod pa kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mi gang lham dang zam pa la//
276a3(mdo 'grel): sogs pa sbyin bar byed pa de/ /rtag tu bde dang ldan pa dang/ /bzhon pa dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur/ /bsti sa khron pa mtshe'u la sogs/ /rten rnams byed du bcug na ni/ /de dag bde dang ldan pa dang/ /gdung bral skom nad med par
276a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun dga' ra ba 'bul/ /de ni dbus bkur dpal dang ldan/ /lus can kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur/ /rtag par 'byor ba ldan par 'gyur/ /rig pa sbyin dang shes rab la/ /gom pas mkhas pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sman
276a5(mdo 'grel): dang mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis/ /nad med par ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mar me byin pas mig ldan 'gyur/ /sil snyan byin pas dbyangs snyan 'gyur/ /mal stan dag ni byin pa yis/ /mi de bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di la
276a6(mdo 'grel): ba lang sogs/ /spyang bya'i 'o ma yon tan ldan/ /sbyin byed mi de stobs ldan zhing/ /mdog ldan tshe ring longs spyod ldan/ /bu mo byin pas 'dod rnams rnyed/ /'khor rnams dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ /sa gzhi byin pas nor ldan
276a7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /'bru rnams 'byor bar skye bar 'gyur/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang/ /chu dang mi 'jigs tshig rnyan dang/ /gang gang ji ltar 'dod pa de/ /de 'dod pa la gus pa sbyin/ /'di la bskol nas sbyin byed dam/ /mtho ris ched du
276b1(mdo 'grel): 'am 'jigs pas sam/ /snyan pa'i bde ba 'dod phyir na/ /de ni 'bras bu nyon mongs 'thob/ /rang gi don la mi bltos shing/ /snying rjes non pa'i sems kyis ni/ /gzhan gyi don du 'dir byin la/ /de yi 'bras bu mthar thug yin/ /dus dang tshul ni ji
276b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ /gang ci gzhan la sbyin byed na/ /rnam pa de dang de lta bur/ /de kun nye bar gnas par 'gyur/ /gzhan la gnod pa med pa nyid/ /rang gi don du ci 'dod pa/ /chos dang mi 'gal gang phan pa/ /mi bskol bar ni sbyin par bya/ /de ltar sbyin
276b3(mdo 'grel): pa sbyin byed na/ /de lta bu yi 'bras bu 'byung/ /bde ba dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rgyu ba'i gtso bo sbyin pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi bud med rnams spong na/ /bud med sdug gu rnyed par 'gyur/ /yul dang dus min rang gi yang/ /spong ni skyes pa nyid thob 'gyur//
276b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gzhan gyi chung ma la/ /chags pa'i sems ni mi sel dang/ /yan lag min la chags byed pa/ /skyes pa de ni bud med 'gyur/ /gang zhig bud med smos byed cing/ /khrims btsun 'dod chags chung byed la/ /rtag tu skyes par 'dod byed
276b5(mdo 'grel): pa/ /mi mo de ni skyes par 'gyur/ /gang zhig yang dag skyon med par/ /tshangs par spyod la brten pa de/ /gzi ldan yang dag don dang ldan/ /dpal ldan lha rnams kyis kyang bkur/ /chang 'thung ba ni ma bsten pas/ /mi de dran pa brtan
276b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /rmongs med bden par smra ba dang/ /snyan pa'i bde dang ldan par skye/ gang zhig sems dang 'byed par yang/ /byed pa 'di ni mi byed pa/ /de yi 'khor rnams mi phyed cing/ /brtan pa'i bde dang ldan par skye/ /gang zhig rtag pas
276b7(mdo 'grel): yid dga' bas/ /phan dang mi phan ston pa'i mi/ /de yi tshig ni btsun par 'gyur/ /gzhan brnyas pa yis smad par 'gyur/ /bzlog pa yis ni mthon por 'gyur/ /bde ba byin pas bde dang ldan/ /sdug bsngal byin pas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /
277a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan la 'drid? par dga' ba dang/ /g.yo byed brdzun ni smra ba dang/ /gang dag gzugs kyi nga rgyal can/ /sgur? la lus ni thung bar 'gyur/ /skye bo bshes gnyen ser sna byed/ /lkugs gyur kun la mi sdug
277a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i rang bzhin phan pa'i tshig/ mi bzod pa ni 'on par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i sdug bsngal bsod nams kyis/ /bde'o 'dren ma'i 'dren ma ste/ /las rnams kyis ni 'bras bu kun/ /'dra ba rgyu mthun yin par brtag/ mi'i rab rdzogs
277a3(mdo 'grel): so// //rtag tu g.yo dang rgyu sbyod cing/ /sdig pa dag na mi byas la/ /'thab la dga' zhing sbyin byed ba/ /de ni lha min dbang phyug 'gyur/ /lha ma yin gyi rabs rdzogs so// //
277a4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig bdag med mi 'dod cing/ /yongs su bzung ba la mi dga' ba/ /de ni gza' rnams dag gi mchog/ rgyal chen bzhi pa dag tu 'gyur/ /pha mar tshan gtso bo la/ /bkur byed stong ldan bzod par ldan/ /'thab mo la ni dga' ba gang/
277a5(mdo 'grel): de ni sum cu rtsa gsum skye/ /rtsod pa mi dka' 'thab mo la/ /yid ni dga' bar mi byed la/ /gcig tu dge la brtson pa gang/ /de dag 'thab bral nyid du 'gro /thos pa mang dang chos 'dzin dang/ /shes rab ldan zhing thar pa 'dod/ /yon
277a6(mdo 'grel): tan rnams la dga' pa'i mi/ /de dag dga' ldan nye bar 'gro/ /mi gang rang nyid dul ba la/ /zhugs shing tshul khrims 'bog pa la/ /sgro ba che dang ldan pa ste// gdon mi za bar 'phrul dgar 'gro/ /sems can gang zhig dman
277a7(mdo 'grel): min mchog/ sbyin dang dul dang yang dag sdom/ /phul byung yon tan lhag gyur te/ /nges par gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'gro/ /tshul khrims kyis ni mthor si thob/ /bsam gtan gyis ni khyad par 'gyur/ /yang dag ji bzhin
277b1(mdo 'grel): yongs shes bas/ /mthar ni yang srid med par 'gyur/ /mi dge bas ni bde mi 'thob/ /dge ba yis ni bde ba 'thob/ /de ltar dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /las kyi 'bras bu gsal bar bstan/ /sdug ba dang ni bral ba dang/ /mi sdug pa dang phrad
277b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /las rnams rang gi 'bras bur bcas/ /'chi dang rga dang na ba nyid/ /gsum po 'di la bsam par bya/ /de lta na ni chags bral thob/ /chags dang bral na bsod nams 'dod/ /de bzhin sdig pa spong bar byed/ /de dag nyid kyang mdor
277b3(mdo 'grel): nyon cig/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed dang/ /gzhan la gnod byed spong pa ni/ /bsod nams bzlog pa sdig yin par/ /bdag nyid chen pos de skad gsungs/ /lha'i rabs rdzogs so// //dam pa'i chos dran pa nye
277b4(mdo 'grel): bar gzhag ba'i 'gro drug gi tshig le'ur byas pa/ slob dpon btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyongs? kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rtsangs? de ben? tra rak+Shi
277b5(mdo 'grel): tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri dags glang po phye ma leb dang nya/ /sprad ma lnga po de yang lnga
277b6(mdo 'grel): yis bcom 'gyur te/ /gcig gis bcom na gang zhig lnga rnams ni/ /rtag tu brten pa ci phyir bcom mi 'gyur/ /rtswa yi myu gu gtsang ma za/ /shin tu ring du 'gro nus pa/ /ri dags rngon ba'i glu dbyangs kyis/ /nges par gsor? pa tshol
277b7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /sa srungs dad ni rab 'gran cing/ /ri yi rgyal po rgyun shes 'dra'i/ /ban glang mo yi nye rig gis/ /nges par glang po gsad par song/ /'bar ba chen po'i tshogs dag gi mi chen dag ni mthod nas kyang/ /gzugs la chags
278a1(mdo 'grel): pa chen po yis/ /phye leb me la 'jug par 'gyur/ /bkag pa med pa'i lam 'gro zhing/ /rtag tu rnam par rgyu ba yi/ /ro myag pa la chags pa yis/ /nya ni lcags kyus rlag bar byed/ /rtag
278a2(mdo 'grel): tu nam mkha' la rgyu zhing/ /gzugs ni shin tu yid 'ong ba'o/ /bud ba dri yi nyes pa yis/ /nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /ri dags nyid ni sgra tsam gyis/ /reg pas glang po brlag par 'gyur/ /gzugs nyid kyis ni phye leb ste/ /ro
278a3(mdo 'grel): yis nya ni rnam par brlag/ bung? ba dril chags ba ste/ 'di dag rgyu ni ro yis/ /skyes bu? dag? ni? re re yis/ /skyes bu dag ni gcig la yang/ /lnga po 'di dag rtag ldan zhing/ /nyin mtshan du ni rab 'joms na/ /bde gnas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ /'dod
278a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa/ /slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ zha? chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos zhus te
278a5(mdo 'grel): gtan la phab pa'o// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ /dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la springs pa'i phrin yig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo
278a6(mdo 'grel): sngon 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu gnyis dang por byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed de grogs por 'thams nas/ gang gi lam sngon du grub pa des/ /cig shos la btang bar
278a7(mdo 'grel): dam bcas pa las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lam sngon du grub ste/ /dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la btang ba'i phyir 'phrin yig gis bzlugs pa/ grogs byed? ci bde 'am ram bcas brjod dam
278b1(mdo 'grel): ci/ /'dod pa me mdag dod rtse 'dra 'di la ci zhig chags/ /shin tu skyo ba'i yid kyis rab tu mi 'bad par/ /srid rgyu 'dod pa nga dung gang ba gal srid/ /theg pa mchog gi des 'byung 'gro ba'i don byos la/ /rgyu dang kha gsag grags pa rnyed
278b2(mdo 'grel): la mi gdung zhing/ /'gro las rnam grol lam la myur du ma 'bad na/ /dus gsum rgyal bas bskyab dka' phan thag chad du 'ong/ /rtog med rtog bral dus gsum thub pa kun gshegs shul/ /phra zhing shes dka' tshig gi spyod yul ma yin
278b3(mdo 'grel): yang/ /phyogs tsam rtogs pas sgro btags rgyal ba'i mthus brjod na/ /shin tu legs par rab nyon yid la gzung nus sam/ /dge slong rab gsal gzhon nus slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gsol ba/ mtho
278b4(mdo 'grel): la mtho sems mi mdzad mnyam la 'gran mi mnga' / /dma' la sdan? can mi mdzad yongs la snyoms pa'i mgon/ /dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lam mer bzhugs pa yi/ /mdangs bzang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag da ltar gdan bzhugs/
278b5(mdo 'grel): khri lan bdud ris 'pham mdzad thar pa'i lam ston gsol/ /nyes bcu tha ba'i rdul bral stobs bcu rtsal 'phags gso na/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen gyur skyong pa dam pa gson/ /dpa' gtan bdud las shin tu mtshams med
278b6(mdo 'grel): gcig tu brtan pa gson/ /bdag ni mun bcas bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa ste/ /thar pa'i lam stor 'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams lags na/ /cis 'dul gar legs thabs kyis myur du mi skyob par/ /dus rings bgrangs? kyi bar
278b7(mdo 'grel): du mgon khyod ci la gzhes/ /lha dang mi yi chu mchog tshogs rab mdza' yas dgongs/ /mu stegs wa brgya pham mdzad skyes bu seng ge dgongs/ /yid bzhin dbyig gi tog ltar re ba kun skod?  dgongs/ /thugs rje chu bo rgyun
279a1(mdo 'grel): 'bebs rgyal sras thu bo dgongs/ /srid gsum sgyu mar chos bstan ngo bo med bzhin du/ /bden spangs log pa'i lam zhags srid pa'i lam gyur pa/ /'khor ba'i gdos? can grangs med bskyab kyis
279a2(mdo 'grel): mi lang zhes/ /dang che lha yi thugs kyang skyo bar rung mod kyi/ /'on kyang legs rgyu chos nyid gzod nas mya ngan 'das don du/ /'gro ba yongs kyi ched la go ba gis mdzad lags kyis/ /mgon po rab gsal gzhon nu rjes dgongs nyag
279a3(mdo 'grel): bsring zhing/ /thugs rje'i thugs kyis bzod ba bzhes te bskyab du gsol/ /stobs mchog dpal gyi mgur nas yi ge 'brus bsnyad pa/ /mkha' la tshon bkye? bzhin du spyod yul ma lags pas/ /rgyal sras 'khor bcas rnams
279a4(mdo 'grel): kyis gzhal bar ma bstan na/ /bdag 'dra mtshan mar 'dzin pas gzung bar ga la nus/ /'on kyang don gyi dam pa srid pa'i dpyis 'byin pa/ /gdams ngag bka' drin mchog 'dis sbyi bor blang slad du/ /ci nus sems kyi brtsal gyis
279a5(mdo 'grel): log par bzung mi bgyi/ /bla ma'i sar bzhugs che ba'i mthus kyang btang du gsol/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la springs pa'i phrin yig rdzogs so// //
279a6(mdo 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA? nga ba dang/ lo tsA ba bande dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o?// //dbu ma bshes pa'i phrin yig bzhugs/ slob ma la sprid pa'i sprid yag slob dpon
279a7(mdo 'grel): tsan tra go mis mdzad pa/ sems rin po che rnam sbyangs pa zhes bya ba'i sprid yig dge slob dpon pa pos mdzad pa// [rgya gar skad du] su h+rid? le kha/ bod skad du/ bshes pa'i phrin yig/ /'jam dpal
279b1(mdo 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rang bzhin dge 'os bdag gis ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung bsnyan las byung ba'i/ /bsod nams 'dun slad 'phags pa'i dbyangs 'di dag/ cung zad cig bsdebs khyad kyis gsan
279b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i rigs/ /ji ltar bde gshegs sku gzugs shing las kyang/ /bgyis pa ci 'dra 'ang rung ste mkhas pas mchod/ /de bzhin bdag gi snyan ngag 'di ngan yang/ /dam chos brjod la brten slad smad mi bgyid/ /thub pa chen po'i bka' ni snyan
279b3(mdo 'grel): dgu zhig/ khyod kyis thugs su lta yang chud med kyi/ rde thal las bgyis dgung zla'i 'od kyis ni/ /ches dkar nyid du ci ste mi bgyis lags/ /rgyal bas sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /gtor dang tshul khrims lha rdzas dran pa drug
279b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu bka' stsal de dag so so yi/ /yon tan tshogs kyis rjes su dran par bgyi/ /dge ba'i las lam bcu po lus dang ni/ /ngag dang yid kyis rtag tu brten bgyi zhing/ /chang rnam las ldog de bzhin dge ba yi/ /'tsho ba la yang mngon
279b5(mdo 'grel): par dgyes par mdzod/ /longs spyod g.yo ba snying po med mkhyen nas/ /dge slong bram ze bkren dang bshes rnams la/ /sbyin pa tshul bzhin rtsal bgyi pha rol tu/ /sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog ma mchis so/ /khyod kyis tshul
279b6(mdo 'grel): khrims ma nyams mong mi dma'/ /ma 'dres ma lcags pa dag bstan par mdzad/ /khrims ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sa bzhin du/ /yon tan kun gyi gzhi rten lags par gsungs/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson bsam gtan dang/
279b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin shes rab gzhal med pha rol phyir/ /'di dag rgyas mdzod srid pa'i rgya mtsho yi/ /pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i dbang po mdzod/ /gang la pha dang ma dag mchod byed pa'i/ /rigs de tshangs bcas slob dpon bcas pa'ang? lags/
280a1(mdo 'grel): de dag la mchod grags par 'gyur ba dang/ /slad ma la yang mtho ris 'gyur ba legs/ /tshe dang chom rkun 'khrig pa rdzun dang ni/ /chang dang dus min zas la chags pa dang/ /mal stan mtho la dga' 
280a2(mdo 'grel): dang glu dag dang/ /gar dang phreng ba'i khyad par rnams spong zhing/ /dgra bcom tshul khrims rjes su byed pa yi/ /yan lag brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na/ /gso sbyong 'dod sbyod lha yul yid 'ong ba/ /skyes ba bud med dag la stsol bar
280a3(mdo 'grel): bgyid/ /ser sna g.yo sgyu chags dang snyoms las dang/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'dod chags zhe sdang dang/ /rigs dang gzugs dang thos pa lang tsha? dang/ /dbang thang che bas rgyags pa dgra bzhin gzigs/ /bag yod bdud rtsi'i gnas
280a4(mdo 'grel): te bag med pa/ /'chi ba'i gnas su thub pas bka' stsal to/ /de bas khyod kyis dge chos spel slad du/ /gus pas rtag tu bag dang bcas pas mdzod/ /gang zhig sngon chad bag med gyur pa las/ /phyis nas bag dang ldan par
280a5(mdo 'grel): gyur de yang/ /zla ba sprin bral lta bur rnam mdzes te/ /dga' bo song phrang? mthong ldan bde byed bzhin/ /'di ltar bzod mtshungs dka' thub ma mchis pas/ /khyod kyis khro ba'i go skabs dbye mi bgyi/ /khro ba spangs pas phyir mi ldog
280a6(mdo 'grel): pa nyid/ /thob par 'gyur bar sangs rgyas zhal gyis bzhes/ /bdag ni 'dis spyos? 'dis btags pham par byas/ /'di yis bdag gi nor phrogs gyur to zhes/ /'khon? du 'dzin pas 'khrug long rnams bskyed do/ /'khon
280a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin rnam spangs bde bar gnyid kyis log/ sems ni chu dang sa dang rdo ba la/ /ri mo bris pa de 'drar rig par gyis/ /de'i nang nyon mongs can la dang po ni/ /mchog ste chos 'dod rnal tha ma lags/ /rgyal bas snying la
280b1(mdo 'grel): 'bab dang bden pa dang/ /log par smra ldan skyes bu rnams kyis ni/ /sprang rtsi me tog mi gcing? lta bu'i tshig/ rnam gsum bka' stsal de las tha ma spangs/ /snang nas snang ba'i mthar thug mun pa nas/ /mun pa'i mthar thug snang nas
280b2(mdo 'grel): mun mthar thug/ mun nas snang ba'i mthar thug gang zag ni/ /bzhi ste de dag rnams kyi dad po mdzod/ /mi ni a mra'i 'bras bzhin ma smin la/ /smin pa dang 'dra smin lam smin 'dra/ /ma smin ma smin par snang smin la ni/ /smin bar snad zhes bgyi
280b3(mdo 'grel): ba 'drar rtogs mdzad/ /gzhan gyi chung ma mi lta mthong na yang/ /na chod mthun par ma dang bu mo dang/ /sring mo'i 'du shes bskyed bgyi chags gyur na/ /mi gcang? nyid du yang dag bsam par bgyi/ /g.yo ba'i sems ni thos mtshungs bu
