280b4(mdo 'grel): lta bur/ /gter bzhin srog dang 'dra bar bsrung bgyi ste/ /gdug ba dug dang mtshon dang dgra bo dang/ /me bzhin 'dod pa'i bde la yid 'byung mdzod/ /'dod pa rnams ni phung khrol skyed pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i dbang pos kim? pa'i 'bras 'drar
280b5(mdo 'grel): gsungs/ /de dag spangs bgyi de yi lcags sgrog gis/ /'khor ba'i btson rar 'jig rten 'di dag bcings/ /gang dag dbang po drug yul rnams la ni/ /rtag tu mi brtan g.yo dang gang dag gcig /g.yul ngor dag tshogs las rgyal
280b6(mdo 'grel): de dag las/ /mkhas rnams dang po dpa' rab lags par 'chal/ /bud med gzhon nu'i lus ni logs shig tu/ /dring ba dang sgo dgu dong pa dang/ /mi gtsang kun snod 'dra ba dgang dka' ? dang/ /pags pas g.yogs dang rgyan yang
280b7(mdo 'grel): logs shig gzigs/ /ji ltar mdze can srin bus nyen pa ni/ /bde ba'i don du ma la kun bsten kyang/ /zhi bar mi 'gyur de dang 'dra bar ni/ /'dod pa rnams la chags pa 'ang mkhyen par mdzod/ /don dam gzigs par bgyi slad dngos
281a1(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de goms mdzod/ /de dang 'dra bar yon tan ldan pa yi/ /chos gzhan 'ga' yang mchis pa ma lags so/ /skyes bu rigs gzugs thos dang ldan rnams kyang/ /shes
281a2(mdo 'grel): rab tshul khrims bral ba skur ma lags/ /de ltas gang la yon tan 'di gnyis ldan/ /de yi yon tan gzhan dang bral yang mchod/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa rnyed dang ma rnyed dang/ /bde dang mi bde snyan dang mi snyan dang/ /bstod smad ces
281a3(mdo 'grel): bgyi 'jig rten chos brgyad po/ /bdag gi yid yul min par mgo snyoms mdzod/ khyod kyi bram ze dge slong lha dang ni/ /mgon dang yab yum dag dang btsun mo dang/ /'khor gyi slad duAng sdig pa mi bgyi ste/ /dmyal ba'i rnam smin
281a4(mdo 'grel): skal nod 'ga' ma mchis/ /sdig po'i las rnams spyad pa 'ga' yang ni/ /de yi mod la mtshon bzhin mi gcod kyang/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab na sdig pa yi/ /las kyis 'bras bu gang lags mngon par 'gyur/ /dang ngan tshul khrims
281a5(mdo 'grel): thos dang gtong ba dang/ /dri med ngo tsha shes dang khrel yong dang/ /shes rab nor bdun lags par thub pas gsungs/ /nor gzhan phal po don ma mchis rtogs mdzod/ /rgyan po 'gyed dang 'dus la blta ba dang/ /le lo sdig pa'i
281a6(mdo 'grel): grogs la brtan pa dang/ /chang dang mtshan mo rgyu ba ngan song ba/ /grags pa nyams par 'gyur ba de drug spongs/ /nor rnams kun gyi nang na chog shes pa/ /rab mchog lags par lha mi'i ston pas gsungs/ /kun tu
281a7(mdo 'grel): chog shes mdzod cig chog mkhyen na/ /nor mi bdog kyang yang dag 'byor pa lags/ /des pa bdog mang ji ltar sdug bsngal ba/ /'dod pa chung rnams de lta ma lags te/ klu mchog rnams la mgo bo ji snyed pa/ /
281b1(mdo 'grel): de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal de snyed do/ /rang bzhin dgra 'brel bshed ma lta bu dang/ /khyim 'thab bsnyad bgyid rje mo lta bu dang/ /chung nguAng brku ba chom rkun lta bu yi/ /chung ma gsum po de dag rnam par spang/ /srid mo lta bur rjes
281b2(mdo 'grel): mthun gang yin dang/ /mdza' mo bzhin du snying la 'bab pa dang/ /ma bzhin phan par 'dod dang bran mo bzhin/ /dbang gyur gang yin rigs kyi lha bzhin bkur/ /kha zas sman dang 'dra bar rig pa yis/ /'dod chags zhe sdang med par
281b3(mdo 'grel): brten bgyi ste/ /rgyags byir ma lags bsnyems pa'i phyir ma lags/ /mtshar phyir ma lags lus gnas 'ba' zhig phyir rigs pa'i bdag nyid nyin par mdza' dag dang/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi stod smad bzlas nas ni/ /mnal
281b4(mdo 'grel): tshe 'ang 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar/ /dran dang ldan par de dag par du mnos/ /bya nas dang snying rje dag dang dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms rtag tu yang dag sgoms mdzod cig /gong ma brnyes par ma gyur de lta na 'ang/ /tshangs
281b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'jig rten bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /'dod spyod dga' dang bde dang sdug bsngal dag /rnam par spangs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa yis/ tshangs dang 'od gsal dag dang dge rgyas dang/ /'bras bu che lha rnams dang skal mnyam
281b6(mdo 'grel): 'thob/ /rtag dad mngon par zhen dang gnyen po med/ /yon tan gtso ldan gzhi las byung ba'i las/ /dge dang me dge rnam lnga chen po ste/ /de bas dge ba spyod la brtson par bgyi/ /lan tshwa rang 'ga' chu ni nyung ngu zhig /ro bsgyur
281b7(mdo 'grel): bgyid kyi gang+gA'i klung min ltar/ /de bzhin sdig pa'i las ni chung ngu yang/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs la mkhyen par bgyi/ /rgod dang 'gyod dang gnod sems rmugs pa dang/ /gnyid dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste/ /sgrib pa lngas
282a1(mdo 'grel): po 'di dag dge ba'i nor/ /'phrog pa'i tshom rkun lags par rigs par mdzod/ /dang dang brtson 'grus ngag dang dran pa dang/ /ting 'dzin shes rab chos mchog lnga nyid de/ /'di la mngon brtson mdzad
282a2(mdo 'grel): cig 'di dag ni/ /stobs dbang zhes bgyi rtse mor gyur pa'ang lags/ /na rga 'chi sdug bral dang de bzhin du/ /las ni bdag gir byas las la 'das zhes/ /de ltar yang dang yang du sems pa ni/ /de yi gnyen po'i sgo nas rgyags
282a3(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /gal te mtho res thar pa mngon bzhed na/ /yang dag lta la goms pa nyid du mdzod/ /gang zag log par lta bas legs spyad kyang/ /thams cad rnam par smin pa mi bzad ldan/ /mi ni yang dag nyid du mi bde zhing//
282a4(mdo 'grel): mi rtag bdag med mi gtsang rig par bgyi/ /dran pa nye bar ma gzhag rnams kyis ni/ /phyin ci log bzhir lta ba 'phud bkrol ba/ /gzugs ni bdag ma yin zhes gsung ste bdag /gzugs dang ldan min gzugs la bdag gnas
282a5(mdo 'grel): min/ /bdag la gzugs mi gnas te de bzhin du/ /phung po lhag ma bzhi yang stong rtogs bgyi/ /phung po 'dod rgyal las min dus las min/ /rang bzhin las min ngo bo nyid las min/ /dbang phyug las min rgyu med can min te/
282a6(mdo 'grel): mi shes las dang srad las byung rig mdzod/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin rang lus la/ /phyin ci log par lta dang the tshom ste/ /kun tu sbyor ba 'di gsum thar pa yi/ /grong khyer sgra 'gags lags par mkhyen par
282a7(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /thar ba dag la rag las 'di la ni/ /gzhan gyis grogs bgyid ci yang ma mchis pas/ /thos dang tshul khrims bsam gtan ldan pa yi/ /bden pa rnam pa bzhi la 'bad bar mdzod/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims lhag pa'i
282b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab dang/ /lhag pa'i sems la rtag tu bslab par bgyi/ /bslab pa brgya rtsa lnga bcu lhag gcig ni/ /gsum po 'di nang yang dag 'du bar 'gyur/ /dbang phyug lus gtogs dran pa bde gshegs kyis/ /bgrod pa gcig pa'i lan
282b2(mdo 'grel): de nye bar bstan/ /de ni bsgrims nas mngon par bsrung bgyi ste/ /dran pa nyams pas chos kun 'jig par 'gyur/ /tshe? ni gnod mang rlung gis btab ba yi/ /chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na/ /dbugs rdub dbugs 'byung gnyid kyi log
282b3(mdo 'grel): pa las/ sems de khom gang lags de ni ngo mtshar che/ /lus mdza' thal ba mthar skam mthar 'brul zhing/ tha mar mi gtsang snying po ma mchis pa/ /rnam par 'jig dangs myugs par 'gyur ba ste/ /so sor 'gyes chos can du mkhyen
282b4(mdo 'grel): par mdzod/ /sa dang lhun po rgya mtsho nyi ma bdun/ 'bar bas sregs pa'i lus can 'di dag kyang/ /thal bar yang ni lus bar mi 'gyur na/ /shin tu nyam chung mi lta smos ci 'tshal/ /de ltar 'di kun mi rtag bdag med de/ /skyabs med mgon
282b5(mdo 'grel): med gnas med de slad du/ 'khor ba chu shing snying po med pa la/ /mi mchog khyod kyis thugs ni dbyung bar mdzod/ /rgya mtsho gcig gnas gnya' shing bu ga dang/ /rus sbal phrad pa bas kyang dud 'gro las/ /mi nying ches thob dka' bas
282b6(mdo 'grel): mi dbang gis/ /dam chos spyad pas de 'bras mchis par mdzod/ /gang zhig gser snod rin chen smras pa yis/ /ngan skyags 'chag par bgyid pa de bas ni/ /gang zhig mi ru skyes nas sdig pa dag /bgyid pa de ni ches rab blun pa
282b7(mdo 'grel): lags/ /mthun par gyur pa'i yul tu gnas pa dang/ /skyes bu dam pa la ni brten pa dang/ /bdag gi legs smon sngon yang bsod nams bgyid/ 'khor lo chen po bzhin khyod la mnga' / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen brten par
283a1(mdo 'grel): pa tshangs par spyod/ /yongs su rdzogs par thub pas gsungs de'i phyir/ /skyes bu dam pa brten bgyi rgyal ba la/ /brten nas rab tu mang pos zhib thob/ /log par lta ba 'dzin dang dud 'gro dang/ /yi dags
283a2(mdo 'grel): ni de rang dmyal bar skye ba dang/ /rgyal ba'i bka' med pa dang mdza' khob du/ /kla klor skye dang glen zhing lkugs pa 'di?/ /tshe ring lha nyid gang yang rung ba ni/ /skye ba zhes bgyi mi kho ma skyon brgyad po/ /de dag dang bral khom pa rnyed nas ni/
283a3(mdo 'grel): skye ba bzlog pa'i slad du 'bad par mdzod/ /des pa 'dod pas phongs dang 'chi ba dang/ /na dang rga sogs sdug bsngal du ma yi/ /'byung gnas 'khor ba la ni skyo mdzad cing/ /'di yi nyes pa'i shas kyang gsan par mdzod/ /pha ni
283a4(mdo 'grel): bu ? ? ni chung ma nyid/ /skyes bo dgrar gyur pa dag bshes nyid dang/ /bzlog pa nyid du mchis pas de slad du/ /'khor bdag na des pa 'ga' ma mchis/ /re res rgya mtsho bzhi pas lhag pa yi/ /'o ma 'thungs te da dung so so yi/ /
283a5(mdo 'grel): skye bo'i rjes su 'breng ba'i 'khor ba pas/ /de bas ches mang nyid cig btung 'tshal lo/ /re re'i bdag nyid rus pa'i phung po ni/ /lhan po mnyam pa ? cig 'das gyur te/ /ma mi thug mdza' rgya shug tshig gu tsam/ /ri lus dgrangs
283a6(mdo 'grel): kyang sa yis lang mi 'gyur/ /brgya byin 'jig rten mchod 'os gyur nas kyang/ /las kyi dbang gyis phyir yang sa steng lhung nge/ /'khor los sgyur ba nyid du byung nas kyang/ /'khor ba dag tu yang bran nyid du 'gyur/ /mtho ras
283a7(mdo 'grel): bu mo'i nu ma rked pa la/ /reg pa'i bde ba yun ring myong nas slar/ /dmyal bar 'thag gcod dprad pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi/ /reg pa shin tu mi bzad bsten 'tshal lo/ /rkang pa'i reg pas nems par bde bzod pa/ /lhun po'i spo
283b1(mdo 'grel): la yun ring gnas nas ni/ /slar yang me mur ro myags rgyu ba yi/ /sdug bsngal mi bzang phog snyam bgyid 'tshal lo/ /mtho res bu mo 'brongs shing dga' ba dang/ /rnam par mdzes 'tshal son par rtsis nas slar/ /'dab ma ral gri 'dra
283b2(mdo 'grel): tshal nags rnams kyis/ /krang lag rna ba sna bcod thob par 'gyur/ /ngal gyi 'bab pa lha yi bu mo ni/ /gdod mdzes gser gyi pad+ma ldang zhugs nas/ /slar yang dmyal ba'i chu bor ba med par/ /tsha sgo bzod brlag chu tshan 'jug 'tshal la//
283b3(mdo 'grel): lha yul 'dod pa de shin tu chen po dang/ /tshangs nyid chags bral bde ba thob nas slar/ /mnar med me yi bud shing gyur pa yis/ /sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa bsten 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma zla ba nyid thob rang lus kyi/ /'od kyis 'jig
283b4(mdo 'grel): rten mdza' dag snang byas te/ /slar yang mun gnag stag tu phyin gyur nas/ /rang gi lag pa brkyang ba 'ang mi mthong 'gyur/ /de ltar nongs par 'gyur 'tshal bsod nams ni/ /rnam gsum mar me'i snang ba rab bzhes shig/ gcig
283b5(mdo 'grel): bu nyi ma zla bas ma rdzi ba'i/ /mun nag mdza' yas nang du 'jug 'tshal lo/ /sems can nyes par spyad pa spyod rnams la/ /yang sos thig nag rab tu che ba dung/ /bsdus 'joms ngu 'bod mnar med la sogs pa'i/ /dmyal ba
283b6(mdo 'grel): rnams su rtag tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /kha cig til bzhin 'tsher te de bzhin gzhan/ /phye ma zhi ba mo bzhin du phye mar rlog/ /kha cig sog les 'dra ste de bzhin gzhan/ /sta re mi bzang so rnon rnams kyi gshags/ /de
283b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin gzhan dag khro chu bzhus pa yi/ /khu ba 'bar ba 'khrigs pa lhung bar bgyid/ /kha cig lcags kyi gsal zhing rab 'bar ba'i/ /tshad ma can la kun d+ha rgyud par bgyid/ /kha cig lcags kyi mche ba ldan
284a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i khyi/ /gtum pos dprad cing lag pa gnam nga bsgreng/ /dbang med gzhan dag lcags mchu rnon po dang/ /sen mo bzang ldan pa yi khwa rnams 'thob/ /kha cig srin bu spung ba sna tshogs dang/ /
284a2(mdo 'grel): sha sbrang sbrang ma nag so khri phrag dag /reg na mi bzad rma sol char 'byin pas/ /za bar bgyid cing 'gre ldog smre sngags 'don/ /kha cig me dag me 'bar ba'i tshogs su ni/ /rgyun ma chad par rab sreg kha yang dgrang/ kha cig lcags
284a3(mdo 'grel): las byas pa'i zangs chen du/ /spyi'u tshugs 'bras kyi cung pa de bzhin du 'tshed/ /sdig can dbugs 'byung 'gog pa tsam zhig gi /dus kyis ? du tshod rnams dmyal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal gzhal yas thos nas rnam stong dug mi
284a4(mdo 'grel): 'jigs gang lags rdo rje'i ring bzhin/ /dbyal ba bris pa mthong dang thos pa dang/ /dran ? glags dang gzugs su bgyis rnams kyang/ /'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur ni mi bzed pa'i/ /rnam smin nyams su myong na smos
284a5(mdo 'grel): ci 'chal/ /bde ba kun gyi nang na sred zad pa'i/ /bde ba bdag por bgyid pa ji lta bar/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal kun gyi nang na ni/ /mnar med dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rab mi bzad/ /'di na nyid cig mdung thung sum brgya yis//
284a6(mdo 'grel): rab tu drag btab sdug bsngal gang lags pa/ /de ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chung ngu la'ang/ /'ol yang mi bgyi char yang mi phod do/ /de ltar sdug bsngal shin tu mi zad lo/ /bye ba phrag brgyar nyams su myong yang ni/ /ji
284a7(mdo 'grel): srid mi dge de zad mi gyur pa/ /de srid srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dge'i 'bras 'di rnams kyi sa bon ni/ /lus ngag yid kyis nyes spyad khyod kyis ni/ /ci nas de rdul tsam yang ma mchis pa/ /de ltar nyid kyi
284b1(mdo 'grel): rtsal gyis 'bad par mdzod/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas na yang gsod pa dang/ /bcings dang rdeg sogs sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /zhi 'gyur dge ba spangs pa rnams la ni/ /gcig la gcig za shin tu mi bzad pa/ /kha cig mu tig bal
284b2(mdo 'grel): dang rus pa khrag/ sha dang pags pa'i ched du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbang med gzhan dag rdog pa lag pa dang/ /lcag dang lcags kyu btab pas btab ste bkol/ /yi dags na yang 'dod pas phongs pa yi/ /bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal rgyun
284b3(mdo 'grel): chags mi 'chos pa/ /bkres skom grang dro ngal dang 'jigs pa yis/ /bskyed pa shin tu mi bzad bsten 'tshal lo/ /kha cig kha ni khab kyi mig tsam la/ /lto ba ri yi gtos tsam bkres pas nyen/ /mi gtsang gyi nor bor pa
284b4(mdo 'grel): cung zad kyang/ /'tshal ba'i mthu dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /kha cig pags rus lus shing gcer bu yi/ /ta la'i yang tog bskams pa lta bu lags/ /kha cig mtshan zhing kha na 'bar ba ste/ /zas su 'bar ba'i khar babs
284b5(mdo 'grel): bye ma 'tshal/ /smad rigs 'ga' ni gnag dang phyis dang/ /khrag sogs mi gtsang ba yang mi rnyed de/ /phan tshun gdong du 'tshog cing mgrin pa nas/ /lba? ba byung ba smin pa'i rnag 'tshal lo/ /yi dags rnams la sos ga'i dus su ni/
284b6(mdo 'grel): zla ba 'ang tshal dgun ni nyi ma'ang grang/ /ljon shing 'bras bu med 'gyur 'di dag gis/ /bltas pa tsam gyis klung yang bskams par 'gyur/ /bar chad med par sdug bsngal rten gyur pa/ /nyes par spyad pa'i las gyi zhags pa ni
284b7(mdo 'grel): sra bas bcings pa'i lus can kha cig lo/ /lnga stong dag dang khrid yang 'chi mi 'gyur/ /de ltar yi dags rnams kyi sna tshogs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal ro gcig thob pa gang lags pa/ /de yi rgyu ni skye bo 'thugs dga' ba//
285a1(mdo 'grel): ser sna 'phags min lags par sangs rgyas gsung/ /mtho ris na yang bde chen de dag ni/ 'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal nyid ni de bas che/ /de ltar bsams nas ya rabs rnams kyis ni/ /
285a2(mdo 'grel): zad 'gyur mtho ris slad du sred mi bgyi/ /lus kyi kha dog mi sdug 'gyur ba dang/ /stan la mi dga' me tog phreng rnying dang/ /gos la dri ma chags dang lus la ni/ /sngon chad med pa'i rdul 'byung zhes bya ba/ /mtho ris 'chi 'pho sbron
285a3(mdo 'grel): byed snga ltas lnga/ /lha yul gnas ba'i lha rnams la 'byung ste/ /sa steng mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag/ sbron par byed pa'i 'chi ltas rnams dang 'dra/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag nas 'phos pa la/ /gal te dge ba'i lhag ma 'ga' med na//
285a4(mdo 'grel): de nas dbang med dud 'gro yi dags dang/ /dmyal bar gnas pa gang yang rung bar 'gyur/ /lha min ngag na'ang rang bzhin gyis lha yi/ /dpal la sdang phyir yid kyi sdug bsngal che/ /de dag blo dang ldan yang 'gro ba yi/ /bsgribs pas
285a5(mdo 'grel): bden pa mthong ba ma mchis so/ /'khor ba de 'dra lags pas lha mi dang/ /dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dags rnams dag tu/ /skye ba bzang po ma lags skye ba ni/ /gnod pa du ma'i snod gyur lags mkhyen mdzod/ /mgo 'am gos la glo bur
285a6(mdo 'grel): me shor na/ /de dag phyir bzlog bgyi ba btang nas kyang/ /yang srid med par bgyi slad 'bad 'tshal te/ /'di bas ches mchog dgos ba gzhan ma mchis/ /tshul khrims dag dang shes rab bsam gtan gyis/ /mya ngan 'das
285a7(mdo 'grel): zhi dul ba dri med pa'i/ /go 'phang mi gos? mi 'chi zad mi 'tshal/ /sa chu me rlung nyi zla bral thob mdzong/ /dran dang chos rab 'byed dang brtson 'grus dang/ /dga' rang shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin dang/ /btang snyoms 'di bdun byad
285b1(mdo 'grel): chub yan lag ste/ /mya ngan 'das thob bgyid ba'i dge tshogs lags/ /shes rab med bar bsam gtan yod min te/ /bsam gtan med par yang ni shes rab med/ /gang la de gnyis yod pas srid pa yi/ /rgya mtsho gnag rjes lta
285b2(mdo 'grel): bur 'tshal bar bgyi/ /lung ma bstan pa bcu bzhi 'jig rten na/ /nyi ma'i gnyen gyis rab gsungs gang dag lags/ /de dag rnams la bsam bar mi bgyi ste/ /de yi blo ni zhi bar bgyid ma lags/ /ma rig pa las las
285b3(mdo 'grel): te de las ni/ /rnam shes de las ming dang gzugs rab byung/ /de las skye mched drug ste de dag las/ /reg ba kun tu 'byung bar thub pas gsungs/ /reg pa las ni tshor ba kun 'byung ste/ /tshor ba'i gzhi las sred ba 'byung bar
285b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /sred pas len pa bskyed par 'gyur ba ste/ /de las srid pa srid las skye ba lags/ /skye ba yod na mya ngan na rga dang 'dod pas phongs dang 'chi dang 'jig sogs kyi/ /sdug bsngal phung po shin tu chi 'byung ste/ /skye
285b5(mdo 'grel): ba 'gags pas 'di kun 'gags par 'gyur/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung 'di rgyal ba yi/ /gsung gi mdzod kyi ces pa zab mo ste/ /gang gis 'di ni yang dag mthong ba ste/ /sangs rgyas de nyid rig pa rnam mchog mthong//
285b6(mdo 'grel): yang dag lta dang 'tsho dang rtsol ba dang/ /dran dang ting nge 'dzin dag las mdza' dang/ /yang dag rtog nyid lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /'di ni zhi bar bgyi slad bsgom par bgyid/ /skya 'di sdug bsngal sred pa zhes bgyi ba//
285b7(mdo 'grel): de ni 'di yi kun 'byung rgya chen te/ /'di 'gog pa ni thar pa lags te lam/ /de thob 'phags lam yan lag de brgyud lags/ /de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag /mthong bar bgyi slad rtag tu brtson par bgyi/
286a1(mdo 'grel): bdan dpal gnas khyim pa rnams kyis kyang/ /shes pas nyon mongs chu bo las rgal gyi/ /gang dag chos mngon bgyid pa de dag kyang/ /gnas las babs pa ma lags lo tog
286a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /sa rum nas 'thon ma legs de dag sngon/ /nyon mongs rag las so so'i skye bor bas/ /bsnyengs dang bral la mang du gsol ci 'tshal/ /ban pa'i gdams ngag don po 'di lags te/ khyod kyis thugs dul
286a3(mdo 'grel): mdzod cig bcom ldan gyis/ /sems ni chos kyi rtsa ba lags par gsungs/ /khyod la de skad gdams pa gang lags de/ /bas par dge slong gis kyang bgyi bar dka' / /'di las gang zhig spyod pa'i ngo bo de'i/ /yon
286a4(mdo 'grel): tan bsten pas sku tshe don yod mdzod/ /kun gyi dge ba kun la yi rang zhing/ /nyid kyis legs par spyad pa rnam gsum yang/ /sangs rgyas nyid thob bgyi slad yongs bsngos nas/ /de nas dge ba'i phung po 'di yis
286a5(mdo 'grel): khyod/ /skye ba dpag tu med par lha mi yi/ /'jig rten kun gyi rnal 'byor dbang mdzad nas/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang spyod pa yis/ /'gro ba nyam thag mang po rjes bzung ste/ /'khrungs nas na rga 'dod
286a6(mdo 'grel): chags zhe sdang rnams/ /bsal te sangs rgyas zhing du bcom ldan 'das/ /'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon po sku tshe dpag tu med par mdzod/ /shes rab tshul khrims gtong 'byung grags
286a7(mdo 'grel): chen dri ma med/ /lha yul nam mkha' dang ni sa steng rgyas mdzed nas/ /sa la mi dang mtho ris lha ni na chung mchog /bde dga' dga' ba nges par rab tu zhi mdzad de/ /nyon mongs nyam thag sems can tshogs
286b1(mdo 'grel): kyi 'jigs skye dang/ /'chi ba zhi mdzad rgyal ba'i dbang po 'di brnyes nas/ /'jig rten las 'das ming tsam zhi la mi bsnyengs pa/ /mi bgres nongs pa mi mnga' i go 'phang brnyes par mdzod/ /bshes pa'i phrin yig
286b2(mdo 'grel): slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/ /mdza' bo rgyal po bde spyod la bkur ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus
286b3(mdo 'grel): te/ gtan la phab pa'o// / ` / /rgya gar skad du/ shik+Sha le kha/ /bod skad du/ slob ma la springs pa'i spring yig/ dkon mchog gsum
286b4(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis mdzad pa shin tu dka' spyad mngon byung ba/ /mi 'am ci dang lha mo rnams kyi rab bsnyad no/ /bdud kyi bu mo bzhin ras pad+ma'i nags tshal dag/ da ltar zla ba'i zer gyis phog pa bzhin du
286b5(mdo 'grel): zum/ /bkra shis yid 'ong shin tu rmad byung sku mnga' ba/ /bsod nams chung ngu'i skye bos rnyed dka' ba/ /'jig rten mngon par 'dod pa'i de ba bsgrub pa gang/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gzhan don ro gcig spyod/ /
286b6(mdo 'grel): gang zhig rtag tu pha rol bde bas bde 'gyur zhing/ /gzhan dag sdug bsngal gyur pas mchog tu'o brgyal ba/ /thugs rje chen pos yon tan shin tu bskrun pa gang/ /de nyid ngang? gi bde sdug spangs te bzhugs pa yin/ /
286b7(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gzhan gyi don du dbu rnams gcod byed kyang/ /pad+ma lta bur dgyes ba'i spyan 'gyed gzigs mdzad cing/ /nyid kyi don du gdugs dkar gcig gis khams pa lta'i/ /sa yang ral gri sob dar rnon po lta bur
287a1(mdo 'grel): dgongs/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar yon tan gsal ba rdzogs/ /nyes pa'i mun pa sel mdzad gcig po yid du 'ong/ /'jig rten phan la brtson pa rab tu gsal ba 'byung/ /de shar zla ba bzhin du
287a2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba bsil bar mdzad/ /bstan pa rin chen mchog ltar bzang la 'phan med pa/ /rnam par dag tshul gang yin klu mgo gdengs ka can/ /chen po rnams kyis gtsug gi rgyun bzhin gus mnos nas/ /sa yi gting na gnas pa'i
287a3(mdo 'grel): rab rib sel bar mdzad/ /chos kyi sprin de phan pa mdzad pa'i don du g.yos/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa mchog gi rgyu/ /ro gcig gdung ba sel ba char chu bzhin du bab/ /de ni snod la brten nas ro rnams du mar gyur/ /snod yangs
287a4(mdo 'grel): zab la dri ma med cing gsal ba yi/ /bsam pa dang ldan khur kun bzod pa gang dag la/ /skye bo kun gyis nye bar spyad bya de gnas pa/ /mtsho chen mi yi gzugs can de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig skye nas rga shi sel ba'i bdud rtsi
287a5(mdo 'grel): de/ /thob par mi byed mi sbyong 'dzin par mi byed pa/ /de dag nyes mar gti mug thibs khos bslad pa ste/ /yun ring nad kyis thabs pa sman chen ma bsten bzhin/ 'gro ba kun gyi mig gcig dri ma med pa gang/ /de ni sa rnams gsum po'i spyi mthun sgron ma ste/ /bstan pa legs
287a6(mdo 'grel): par rnyed nas gang zhig 'dod pa de/ /gti mug shin tu rma byung dag gi gces par mdzod/ /byang chub khang bzangs bgrod lam them skas lta bu yi/ /bslab gzhi bcas pa rnams la rkang tshugs ston pa rnams/ /rjes su sgrub
287a7(mdo 'grel): pa go 'phang che dor phyin 'gyur te/ /ldog par byed pa rang gi sa ni gnyung mar ltung/ /skye ba'i rgya mtsho shin tu rgyal dka' rgal 'dod pa/ /su zhig tshul khrims gzings gyur lag tu 'ongs par spongs/ /'phags pa'i ded?
287b1(mdo 'grel): dpon dang bral lam rgyus mi shes pa/ /'brog dgon 'khyams na ci ste yun ring gdung mi byed/ /'khor ba'i ris su la khrod kyi g.yang sar lhung gyur pa/ /mun nag 'thibs po'i nang nas ldang bar brtson ba gang/ /yon tan smyug ma'i phreng
287b2(mdo 'grel): ba bar ma dor 'dor ba/ /de dag shugs drag nyam nga'i ltung bar 'og tu ltung/ /gang dag gcig bu yid kyi nges par brtags pa ste/ /yang dag la ma dang lhan cig 'grogs par byed pa de/ /sa steng dkyil na gtso bor 'gyur pa dam
287b3(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /slob ma mchog nges bla mar bkur ba nyid du gyur/ /ngo tsha yon tan tshogs bskyed ma gcig ya rabs mo/ /mchog tu g.yo med byams pa lta bu'i rjes 'brang pa/ /bden dang gzhungs la dga' ba'i gzi brjid ldan pa rnams so/ /srog
287b4(mdo 'grel): ni bde blag gtong bar byed kyi dam bcas min/ /re zhig skye bo kun gyi dpyad deng sdig pa yi/ /'gro ba kun dang dmyal pa mi zad phar zhog gi/ rang bzhin rnal ma bor nas smod pa sdug bsngal ba/ /mkhas las steng de las sdug
287b5(mdo 'grel): bsngal gzhan ci yod/ /gang zhig thub pa rnams kyi srol bstod chos kyi lam/ /rgya chen gru dang 'dra ba rnyed nas slar 'dor ba/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i klong 'khyil gang mkhan 'dri rnams la/ /dga' bas nges par de yi sems
287b6(mdo 'grel): bslus 'gyur ba snyam/ /gang zhig 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor gyur pa'i/ /nang du zhugs nas bsti sa tsam la bder sems pa/ /de ni nges par dbang med rim gyis rgya phrag tu/ /'gro dang mnyam dang mi mnyam kun tu
287b7(mdo 'grel): 'khyam par 'gyur/ /shin tu mi bzang dri nga mi gtsang bcer bas bgags/ /rab tu dog pa mun nag 'thibs por 'dug pa'i mi/ /mngal gnas dmyal ba lta bu'i nang du de zhugs nas/ /lus yongs bskum la sdug bsngal
288a1(mdo 'grel): chen po mnag dgos so/ /de ni rim gyis til mar bcir bcad sra ba yis/ /btsir ba ltar byas de nas ci zhig ltar de btsa'/ /'on kyang mod la de srog mi 'dor gang yin pa/ /sdug bsngal nye
288a2(mdo 'grel): par spyad pa'i rnam par tho ba tsam mo/ /mi gtsang de nad gnas bcas 'phel ba'i lus de ni/ /mngal gnas rlon pas dkris shing dri nga mi bzad ldang/ /gzir bas gnod pa bod de rma rmen zhig pa ltar/ /gyur pa de yi skyon gyis dran pa
288a3(mdo 'grel): spong/ /byis lus nye bar spyod pa kun la mi 'bongs pa/ /mi bstan 'khor ba spangs te mkhrangs pa'i dngos gyur nas/ /dar la bab pa'i ri dbang btson po'i ri sul du/ /sbrul gdug gnas gyur mun la bag skyong spyod par byed/ /bsam
288a4(mdo 'grel): rlab/ de ni de nas kyang lhung la/ /lhung zhing mi gtsigs spyod pa mi 'dor ba/ /byis pa bdag lus sdug pa rga ba dang/ /'chi ba med pa nyid du sems pa lta/ /rmongs pa de ni thub dbang gis bstan pa'i/ /lam bzang rnam par spangs nas
288a5(mdo 'grel): lam smin par/ /glang po myos pa lcags kyu med pas gzhan/ /bab dgu phye mar rlog pa bzhin du 'gro/ /de nas de ni mi 'dod bzhin du mgor/ /gtse med dga' bas rdog pas nan mnan nas/ /skra dkar lcags kyu ba dar ba rnon
288a6(mdo 'grel): po yis/ /glang chen rdzi bos glang chen bzhin du 'debs/ /'on kyang de ni spyod la skyor 'byin pas/ /dge ba 'am 'jigs pa bzhin du spong bar 'gyur/ /rmongs pa bya min byed pa gang skyes pa/ /smyug ma 'bru chags lta bur
288a7(mdo 'grel): brlag bar zad/ /de nas de ni 'chi ba dag dga' i ba'i spun/ /gzhil ba'i bcos thabs med pas bzung nas ni/ /rgas pa'i no bo 'chi bdag 'ongs nas ni/ /rgod pa bzhin du sbyi na 'dzin par byed/ /de nas de ni lhu tshigs
288b1(mdo 'grel): rnams 'bye zhing/ /blo yang bslar 'gyur 'gro ba nyams par 'gyur/ /lus kyang dengs nas shig shig por 'gyur la/ /nges par sdig pa 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur/ /dbang po rnams kyang rim gyis zhum nas ni/ /yul la chags kyang nus
288b2(mdo 'grel): pa nyams par 'gyur/ /gnas skabs gang du 'di 'gro gyur pa de/ /gal te dmyal na yod na de nyid 'jigs /bdag gis ji ltar de bzhin 'dis ma byas/ /ci ste de ltar de byas 'gro ba nyams/ /bdag gis ci ste 'di ltar 'chi bdag
288b3(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /mgo bor sdog pas gnon pa 'phrigs ma gyur/ /mya ngan rdo rje de lta de lta bur/ /sems la gnod pa rnams kyis de gtses nas/ /nye du'i skye bo dud mo'i mchi rgyun can/ /sdug bsngal snying ni snying rje lta bus bltas/ /gnad
288b4(mdo 'grel): kyi gshis su 'dzebs par gzir nas ni/ /shin tu mi bzad mun rum 'jug par 'gyur/ /'bad pa lhur blangs bsrung ba byas pa'i lus/ /yid 'ong 'dris pa rnam par 'dor bar 'gyur/ gshin rje'i zhags pas dam du btags
288b5(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /tso to 'bal zhing cho de 'debs byed kyang/ /de yis glengs pa nyid du skye bo yis/ /rang gi dus sgra ldir ba gzhan mi thos/ /bgrod dka' chu dang pha bong thag thug 'doms pa'i bar/ /tsher ma rnon pos 'dzings pa nyam nga'i lam dag
288b6(mdo 'grel): tu/ /dus kyi zhags pas ske nas btags te gshin rje'i mi/ /gtum po rnams kyis dbyug pas bda' zhing 'khrid par 'gyur/ /mi bzad skom pas rgyad nas chu rlung dri med pa/ /mthong nas btung bar 'dod de song na de nyid kyang/ /
288b7(mdo 'grel): skra shad nya lci bas tshogs dang sna gsungs 'dres pa dang/ /'dam rdzab khrag dang phyi mas gang ba'i chur 'gyur ro/ /dus rlabs rlung langs chu 'thor ri rtse bsil 'gyur zhing/ /tsan dan ljon pa sngo 'khrungs ma la yar song nas/ /de
289a1(mdo 'grel): yang 'di la nags sreg me lce rnos 'khrigs shing/ /mgal dum 'gyel ba mang pos rang rong can du 'gyur/ /chu ltar rlabs 'jigs 'phangs mtho gyes pa las byung ba'i/ /dbu ba 'tsher ma
289a2(mdo 'grel): lhag ge stug ber song na yang/ /de yang 'di la bye tshan khu ba dmar rtsub pa'i/ /rlung dmar 'jebs 'tshub pa'i mya ngan nyid du 'gyur/ /'di ni de gnas char sprin ldang bar 'dod na yang/ /sprin las lcags mda'i char pa dung 'thul
289a3(mdo 'grel): mdag mar bcas/ /tsha tsha rdo rje'i pha bong dmar 'phro gser mdog lta bu yi/ /glog phreng dmar ser 'gyu ba lus la char du bab/ /tsha bas nyen la bu yug kyang ni tshar 'gyur la/ /lhags pa nyam thag pa la me yang grang byed do/ /
289a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu mi bzad las yongs su smin pas rnam rmongs pa 'di la sna tshogs 'di kun phyin ci log tu snang/ /khab mig tsam gyi kha la dpag tshad mang 'jigs pa'i/ /lto can nyam thag rgya mtsho chen po'i chu 'thungs kyang/ /
289a5(mdo 'grel): mgul phugs yangs pa nyid du phyin par ma gyur par/ /kha yi dug gyis chu yi thigs pa'ang bskams par 'gyur/ /ral pa'i tshogs mang spungs pas bsgyings pa'i khyi dag gi/ mche ba bzangs ring rdo rje'i rtse mos
289a6(mdo 'grel): lus 'bad cing/ /chu bo rab med thal skyos me lces gang ba'i dogs/ /rdob zur rnon mi bzad rtse rnon can du bdas/ /spu gri rno gtams lcug tshal lo ma ral gri yis/ /nang du thang chad bsgyugs na lus smad skyabs
289a7(mdo 'grel): med pa/ /rtse gsum mdud? thung dang ni ral gri rnos gang ba'i/ /khron pa gshin rje'i kha bas spu ba'i nang du lhung/ /nyin tshan gyis gdungs bzod dka' rlag par dga' ba'i lus/ /ljon shing lo ma sngo stug mthong nas song
289b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /de yi lo mas mtshon brgya ltung bas lus dbang cing/ /de na yun ring dung mo las shes brlag par gnas/ /bud med kun nas me lce brgya phrag mthon pa'i me/ /me stag phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i rgyan gyi gzhigs gyur cing/ /
289b2(mdo 'grel): sog le lta bu'i rtsub pa'i lus kyis zon med pa/ /shin tu sdug pa'i tshul du bcum nas 'khyud par byed/ /ri dang mnyam du lug rings 'jigs su rung ba gnyis/ /'dus pa'i phrag tu lus kun phye mar rlog cing 'joms/ /cung
289b3(mdo 'grel): zad bsil ba'i rlung zhig langs pas rtas nas de/ /de bzhin phyir yang lan brgyar kun nas phye mar rlog/ bse khyi bong bu ce spyad stong phrag gis bred nas/ /shal ri mtho la mi bzad de la myur 'dzegs na/ /tsher ma'i tshogs kha
289b4(mdo 'grel): thur du bltas pas thal 'byin cing/ /zug rngu tshabs po che dag khong rlag nub par 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i lag na thogs pa dus kyi zhags pa lta'i/ /sbrul gdug mgo 'phang bstong pas dam gzhag gzhungs nas ni/ /gson  por kha dang bya kar kang ka bya rgod kyis/ /de na gnas pa'i mig dag tsham tshom med par 'dru/ /de lus de dag gi mchu rdo rje rtse mo ltas/ /tsam pa me dbang nyam thag nga ro 'byin byed cing/ /thur du babs na lcags tsher gyen du
289b5(mdo 'grel): kha bltas pa/ /spom la rno ba mang pos lus phug dran pa nyams/ /de nas kha cig mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar ba dang/ /zug rngu rnon pos lus dbang thur du 'bab mi nus/ /de tshe mtshon cha bdar ba'i chu can kha rnams kyis/ /
289b6(mdo 'grel): kun tu drangs pa rgyu lto brang bred nar zhing 'thor/ /kha cig ri bo'i g.yangs ya ngar g.yang du ltung/ /kha cig 'bru mar bskol ba zangs chen nang du ltung/ /gzhan dag bye ma ba spegs pa me stag 'phro ba yi/ /sa gzhi rkang pa
290a1(mdo 'grel): bzhag pa'i gnas mi thod par lhung/ /kha cig 'bru sprang phra mo lcig lcig 'dug pa yi/ /tshogs kyi lus rmugs bam zhing rnam par 'dul/ /las kyi rang bzhin snying la 'tsho ba thogs pa rnams
290a2(mdo 'grel): bskyod pa tsam yang bya bar mi nus bzhin du gson/ /lhags pa dpe med rus pa la yang thim pa yis/ /lus sbrebs 'dar shing bskur nas gum gum por 'dug pa/ /chu bur brgya 'byung rdol ba las skyes srog chags
290a3(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /ral gris dbang nas zhag dang chu ser rkang bcas 'dzag kos thags so 'thams skra dang spu rnams g.yengs gyur pa/ /mig dang rna ba lkog ma gnod pas kun gzir zhing/ /lus dang sems kyi bar dag rab tu blong gyur nas//
290a4(mdo 'grel): grang ba'i dmyal bar gnas shing shin tu 'o 'dod 'bod/ /dmyal me du ba che dku mnam pa 'thul bas gnam mdog 'gyur/ /me lce'i lag mang rnam par 'phros nas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor khebs/ /rus gong dkar dum phreng ba'i
290a5(mdo 'grel): rgyan gyis spud pa skyi g.ya' ba/ /glang chen pags gyen sdig thabs kye ma kyid hud zer ba bzhin/ /la lar me stag che 'phro 'khrug pa 'ur sgra tog yar la/ /zhag gis bab na skad ngan bod pa'i rtse zhing chil chil 'bar/ /brang
290a6(mdo 'grel): gi rus pa'i khong du thal la lhag lhag sgra grags pa/ /bskal pa'i dus kyi me yis bskyod du med pa'i nang du lhung/ /glo gnas rtswa skam snying la sbar ba lta bur me tshogs 'bar/ /mgrin dang kha nas me lce 'bar ba dus bcas
290a7(mdo 'grel): bstud mar 'byung/ /khong lto gas pa nas lug nang khrol nar bas kun bred cing/ /brda mi phrad pa'i skad chen tsam zhig 'don par byed par zad/ /sdug bsngal che las thar par 'dod pas de dag yang dang yang/ /sgo bye gseb
290b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan mthong nas thag ring ci zhig ltar ste 'byer/ /gang tshe las kyi sgo 'phar dam pos de yang bcas gyur pa/ /de tshe yi mug bzod rlag sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mda' chen rno tshogs 'bar ba char bzhin 'bab pa'i
290b2(mdo 'grel): rjes la yang/ /dmyal ba'i srung mas dbyug pas btab cing 'chi ma 'dzag bzhin du/ /lcags bzhun khu ba me stag 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa ldud/ /kha sna rna ba'i bu ga dag nas dud 'thul gyen du 'byung/ /mig dang glang
290b3(mdo 'grel): spris rdol gyi bar du kun sreg cing/ /glang ba'i rgyas la 'bar ba'i me lce smug nag tshogs/ /me de khros pa lta bur de yi lus phug la/ /bud shing skam po lcer la sbar ba bzhin du mchod/ /skye bo de srog ri gzar klung gi chu ltar
290b4(mdo 'grel): g.yo/ /dmyal ba'i mi yang der zad tshe ba 'ang der zad de/ /las rnams ji ltar thams cad shin tu mi bzad pa/ /snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sgyur bar byed/ /skye bo rang gi las kyi dbang med 'tshal skyod pa/ /brgya la sdig gnas
290b5(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba dag nas thar na yang/ /'jig rten 'gro ba mdza' yas bye ba phyed rnams su/ /mi yis dngos po shin tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid/ /gal te kla klo dmyal ba'i srung dang spyod mtshungs sam/ /dud 'gro phan tshun za bar byed pa'i nad?
290b6(mdo 'grel): dag du/ /skye ba thob par 'gyur na gang gi phyir yang ni/ /g.yang du lhung bar 'gyur ba'i ngang tshul de nyid bsten/ /gang zhig thob nas skye ba'i rgya mtsho'i mthar 'byin cing/ /byang chub mchog gi sa bon dge ba'ang 'debs gyur pa/ /yid
290b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin nor bu bas kyang yon tan lhag pa yi/ /mi nyid de ni su zhig 'bras bu med par byed/ /bde gshegs lam rten 'gro ba 'dren par chas gyur cing/ /sems kyi stobs chen mi yis rnyed pa gang yin pa'i/ /lam de lha dang klu yis
291a1(mdo 'grel): mi rnyed lha min dang/ /mkha' lding rig 'dzin mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye min/ /mi yi dngos po shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed gyur nas/ /don du brnag pa gang yin de ni bstun te bsgrub/ /mar me'i me lce
291a2(mdo 'grel): shugs drag rlung gi bskyod pa lta'i/ /tshe ni skad cig gnas pa'i gdengs yang yod ma yin/ /'di ni sang bya 'di ni thang cig 'og tu bya/ /'di ni de'u re bya zhes skye bo sems pa na/ /gshin rje bo can nag thog zur gyi lta ba yi/ /mig rtsa
291a3(mdo 'grel): dmar khros ma rangs gang mos ra snyam 'debs/ /sos ka me tog rgyas pa'i dus 'di 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba gsal bas mtshon pa'i don 'dus 'di byung zhes/ /skye bo thams cad dga' 'gyur bdag gi tshe 'di ni/ /zad par
291a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhes shin tu mi dgar 'gyur ba med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa nye bar brgyan byas shing/ /sked tshings char chen sprin gyis 'khrigs pas 'khyud gyur pa/ /ri'i rtse'i nags kyi mthongs der chags pa med par ni/ /rlung
291a5(mdo 'grel): ltar g.yo ba'i rang bzhin che gtugs skal ba che/ /nags mthongs ri dags dkyu ba'i tshogs kyis rten byas pa/ /kun nas nyams dga' bzang po de ni skyid pa gang/ /de ci dga' ba'i nags tshal lha mo'i nyam bag du/ /
291a6(mdo 'grel): thol gyis 'bebs pa'i rdo leb can la yod gyur tam/ /nags klung chu gtsang ngogs kyi dben par skyid pa gang/ /de ci lha yi bu mo dri zhim byugs pa yi/ /lan bu'i rgyan du thogs pa'i rgyun ldan me tog tshogs/ /mdzes pa'i
291a7(mdo 'grel): zil gnon lha yi chu la'ang yod 'gyur ma/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu shun pa le ma phun sum tshogs pa'i ljon shing ldan/ /nags tshal ltos med ri bo'i chu rgyun bsil 'bab chags pa med pa'i gnas/ /chu klung yangs pa'i
291b1(mdo 'grel): mdza' ru 'bras bu me tog lhung bas brgyan ba yi/ /nyams dga' i bas mthar ci zhig med de dmyal stang khyim gyis bslus te sdod/ /ri sul yangs par skye bo bun long med pas rab bde ba/ /nyer spyod rgya chen nags tshal sngo 'khrungs
291b2(mdo 'grel): phreng bar sbrengs/ /chu? dogs bsnyen pa phu chu'i rgyun sgra rnga ltar snyan pa yis/ /bdag cag nyon mongs yul ma yin zhes 'don la sgrog pa bzhin/ /'dod pa rnams dang 'byor dang srid gsum rgyal ba yis/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla ba
291b3(mdo 'grel): rlabs 'dra bar gsungs/ /rmi lam lta bu'i ngan spyod 'khrul pas bsrus pa yi/ /byis pa gang dag de la chags pa dmyal bar ltung/ /yul dang dug mtshungs dang po myong ba tsam na bde/ /yul dang dug mtshungs rnam smin rtsub pos mi
291b4(mdo 'grel): bzang pa/ /yul dang dug mtshungs gti mug mun pas thibs por byed/ /yul dang dug mtshungs shugs bzlog dka' zhing g.yo ba yin/ /dug dang yul rnams blo yis nges par brtags byas na/ /nyis na dug bla mi bzad rang yul
291b5(mdo 'grel): rnams la min/ /dug ni skye ba gcig la dug tu 'gyur bar zad/ /yul ni tshe rabs gzhan yang dug du 'gyur bar byed/ /dug ni dug dang bsres nas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags mchog dang dug sel sman gyis gos
291b6(mdo 'grel): bar nus/ /dug ni thabs ldan spyad na mi la phan 'gyur gyi/ /dug chen yul ni nam yang de lta ma yin no/ /ji ltar glang bu khron zab kha nas 'khrungs pa yi/ /rtsa lo kham 'ga' tsam la yid ni chags gyur pa/ /rnyed pa
291b7(mdo 'grel): grub pa med par g.yang du ltung ba ltar/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten bde ldan 'dod pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /lha yi bu mo dal gyis 'bab pa'i chu rgyun gyis/ /'phral thabs slongs pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse myong nas/ /phyir yang
292a1(mdo 'grel): chu bo rab med rba drag 'bog pa yis/ /rmas pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad bsten par bya dgos so/ /lha tshal dpag bsam shing lo'i gding ba kun bkram par/ /lha yi bu mo dang stan bde bar gnas
292a2(mdo 'grel): nas kyang/ /phyir yang mtshon rnon mang po 'bab pas lus dbang pa/ /lo ma ral gyi lta bu'i nags tshal bgrod dgos so/ /rkang bzhag nems dang 'phar byed reg na bde ba yi/ /ri rab po yi dkyil du yun rings gnas gnas
292a3(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /phyir yang bye ma bsregs pa'i me ma mur gyi tshogs/ /brla dang rkang lag kun tu zhig par khyam par 'gyur/ /dril bu mdzes 'khrol mu tig phreng tshogs lhag ge ba/ /gzhal med khang du zhugs te lha yul bgrod nas
292a4(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /phyir yang mi bzad skyabs med mun nag thibs po dpag med pa/ /pha mdza' med pa'i nang du spyi tshugs ltung bar 'gyur/ /gang du lha klu mi 'am ci yi mgo brgyan gyi/ /'od kyi tshogs kyis rkang bsten dmar ba'i brgya
292a5(mdo 'grel): byin yang/ /las kyi rlung 'khrugs 'gro ba ngan par 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de la skyes bu su zhig 'jigs pa rten mi byed/ /me tog rab tu rnyings shing lus rdul 'thon pa dang/ /gos rnying smre zhing nye du rnams la lta ba yi/ /
292a6(mdo 'grel): lha rnams 'chi ba'i rab tu sdug bsngal gang yin de/ /'tsho ba chu bur lta bur g.yo ba mi la med/ /sdug bsngal me tshogs phungs pas 'jigs pa'i 'jig rten 'dir/ /skye bo bde snyam mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa gang//
292a7(mdo 'grel): de ni gshin rje'i kha yang 'byed par byed pa skye/ /de ni skye ba phyi ma'i ljon shing sa bon yin/ /de ni gshin rje srid mtshor rgyu ba'i sems can la/ /log par smon pas 'jigs pa dbyug pa nag po'i rtser/ /srid pa'i tha
292b1(mdo 'grel): gu ring pos dam bzhag btags pa yi/ /'chil bas nya la bya ba bzhin du btab pa yin/ /dmyal rnams zangs chen lhag lhag bskol ba tsha ba'i shugs drag nas/ /skad cig tsam zhig mgo bstod dbugs 'byin 'gyur ba
292b2(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /lcags kyi tho ba rab tu mang po khros te gzas pa yis/ /brgya ba na de nyid mchog tu bde ba yin par sems pa ltar/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal mi bzang pa yis dbang med rtag gzir cing/ /re zhig tsam zhig ji zhig ltar
292b3(mdo 'grel): te skye shi'i 'khrug med nas/ /skad cig sdug bsngal gnyug mar bzod dka' me lce zhil gyur na/ /'jig rten thams cad bde ba 'ga' la yang sred par byed/ /ji lta ji ltar 'gro ba kun la bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed/ /de lta de
292b4(mdo 'grel): ltar gti mug mun pa shin tu stug por 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar 'gro ba kun la sdug bsngal 'du shes bskyed/ /de lta de ltar gti mug mun pa shin tu srab mor 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar sdug pa bsgom pa shin tu rnam 'phel ba//
292b5(mdo 'grel): de lta de ltar 'dod chags me lce shin tu 'phro bar 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar mi sdug bsgom pa shin tu 'phel 'gyur ba/ /de lta de ltar 'dod chags me lce shin tu rtse zhil 'gyur/ /bud med yan lag dri nga rul pa mi
292b6(mdo 'grel): sdug dang/ /pad+ma zla ba utpal dag tu snyoms byed pa/ /snyan dngags mkhan gyi rdzun de'i 'bras bu mi zad pa/ /de dag de yi mngal gnas 'jug pa de yin no/ /'gro bar lan brgyar ma son 'gro de gang zhig
292b7(mdo 'grel): yod/ /sngon chad lan mang ma myong ba de gang zhig ni/ /rnga yab dkar mdzes lta bu'i dpal gang mthob pa/ /de yang gang zhig yod na 'on kyang 'dod chags 'phel/ /gang gi gling bar ma gnas chu bo de yod
293a1(mdo 'grel): min/ /yul phyogs gang du gang ma bcas pa'i gnas de med/ /gang du ma song nam mkha' i phyogs de'ang yod min na/ /'on kyang 'dod chags dgang dka' 'phel bar 'gyur pa nyid/ /sngon chad
293a2(mdo 'grel): lan mang ma myong sdug bsngal de yod mi 'gro bar/ /gang gis tshim gyur 'dod pa de dag med/ /gang gi ltor ma nyal ba'i sems can de med na/ 'on kyang ji ltar 'khor ba can la chags bral med/ /skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa 'gro
293a3(mdo 'grel): pa rgya chen 'dir/ /bde dang sdug bsngal dag du lan mang 'gre ldog pa/ /'gro ba gnyen ma gyur pa'i skye bo de gang med/ /'on kyang zhe sdang sprul gyi rang bzhin 'jigs par gnas/ /gang dang lhan cig 'dus nas rgod cing rtses
293a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /glu blangs dga' mthun byas shing gcig tu zos 'thungs dang/ /dus kyi rim pas me tog sna rgyan dengs byas dang/ /gnas skabs ci zhig ltar mnyam mi mnyam byas pa yi/ /nye du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i
293a5(mdo 'grel): khongs su chud gyur pa/ /klong gi nang du lhung ba lta bu snang bzhin du/ /skye shi phongs pas ngo ma shes pa de bor nas/ /gal te gcig thar byed na de las khrel bor med/ /byis pa phang na bca' ba ci yang mi nus par//
293a6(mdo 'grel): gang gi nu zho byams pa'i shugs kyis gzags 'thungs pa/ /ngal ba mang sten byams pa bstan pa de dag 'dir/ /shin tu ma rabs zhig na'ang spong bar su zhig spro/ /gang gi khong na 'di skabs rnyad nas gnas gnas
293a7(mdo 'grel): shing/ /gang gis brtse bag sems kyis zon bcas 'di blangs pa/ /nyon mongs de dag sdug bsngal skyabs med 'dir bor nas/ /'gro ba ma rabs tha shal zhig na'ang su zhig spro/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal mi bzad mang
293b1(mdo 'grel): pos dbang med skyabs med 'dir/ /gzhan gyi don du sdug bsngal gang de bde zhes skyes mchog gsung/ /skad cig gzhan bkres skom dang tshang la bral bas rangs byos pas/ /des dga' gang yin de dang 'dra ba 'di na'ang gang zhig yod/ /
293b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan phan bde ba skyed par brtson pas dga' ba rnyed pa gang/ /de ni yul de'i longs spyod lhur len rnams kyis ji ltar yang/ /bzhon pa des mi thob mi dbang 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams kyis min/ /chung mas ma byin gzhan min lha gnas lha
293b3(mdo 'grel): min 'gro bas min/ /shin tu rnyed sla rtswa kham 'ga' lta phyugs kyang drang nyid za/ /shin tu skom pas gdungs pa chu zhig rnyed na dga' mgur 'thung/ /'di na skyes bu gzhan don byed par brtson pa gang yin pa/ /de 'di'i brjid bag? yin
293b4(mdo 'grel): te de bde skyes bu'i rtsal de 'phags/ /nyi ma rlabs chen rta zhon rgyu ba snang byed gang yin dang/ /khur la mi rtsegs sa yis 'jig rten 'degs pa gang yin de/ /rang don 'ga' med chen po rnams kyis rang bzhin de 'dra ste/ de dag
293b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i ro la gcig tu gzhol/ /'jig rten ma rig dung sprin 'khrigs pas 'gro ba 'khrugs gyur pa/ /sdug bsngal me rab 'bar ba'i nang du dbang med lhung mthong nas/ /thod la me lce 'bar ba lta bur yid brel
293b6(mdo 'grel): brtson pa gang/ /'di na de dag skyes bu yin te mkhas pa 'ang de dag yin/ /gzhan gyi don du me lces gang ba'i mnar med dmyal bar yang/ /gangs dang zla 'od bsil ba lta bur rab tu dga' bzhin 'jug /nyid kyi don du pad+ma kha
293b7(mdo 'grel): bye lhag ger 'dug pa yi/ /mtsho yang de la me lce'i tshogs bzhin rab tu gdung bar byed/ /gzhan la phan par byed par chas pa'i mkhas pa rnams/ /lo ma ral gri tshal na 'ang bde blag gnas byed kyi/ /skad cig tsam yang
294a1(mdo 'grel): lha yi bu mo dang 'grogs nas/ /dga' ba'i tshal gyi nang du skyid par byed mi 'gyur/ /rgal bar gyur pa skyabs med skye bo bsgral ba'i phyir/ /phyir yang chu bo rab med nang du 'jug byed kyi/ /lha
294a2(mdo 'grel): yi chu bo rba rlabs chil chil 'dug pa yis/ /reg pa'i bde ba dag nyid sten par byed ma yin/ /de ltar rgyan gyi brgyan gyur legs spyad rin po che/ /gsal ba'i nang na gsal ba zhi ba'i bdud rtsi yangs/ /dga' ba'i dga' ba byas
294a3(mdo 'grel): pa mi gzos rnyed dka' ba/ /bkra shis rnams kyi bkra shis zhi ba'i bde rgyud sten/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung gi me tog rtag brten bya/ /ljon shing me tog de la 'bras bu rgya chen 'byung/ /bde gshegs me tog gsung
294a4(mdo 'grel): las don tshogs bsten bya ste/ /sbrang ma sbrang rtsi la mchog dga' bar byed la ltos/ /skad cig gcig la zad cing rtag tu 'khrugs pa'i yul rnams spong/ /zhi ba'i bde 'bras 'chi ba'i tsher med gcig pu dben pa bsten/ /rnam thar
294a5(mdo 'grel): sgo yi gtan pas gti mug 'khrugs pa'i rab rib sol/ /rta mchog rte'u ni shin tu yun ring gnyid log 'gyur ba yin/ /khyod cig gdung pas nyam thag rnams la srid pa'i mya ngan du/ /shing chen sdong bstan rgya chen kun gel
294a6(mdo 'grel): bzod dang dul ba'i lo ma can/ /zhi gnas me tog shes rab yal ga rab smin lo bran stug /smon lam rtse mo tshul khrims grib ma rab zhi 'bras bcas kyis/ /khyod cig dungs pas nyam thag rnams la srid pa'i mya ngan du//
294a7(mdo 'grel): mtsho chen yangs gsal byin gzhol gting zab bsam pa rab tu dangs/ /rtag bsil sprul gdug snyi yis bag med 'jigs spang rang bzhin gyis/ /rab tu gtsang zhing sred pa gcod byed rtul pa'i khur bzod kyis/ /
294b1(mdo 'grel): khyod cig gdung bas nyam thag rnams la srid pa'i mya ngan du/ /sprin chen skye bo mang phan mi 'jigs smra ba'i sgra chen sgrogs/ /grags pa rgya chen char gyi shugs drag snying rje'i rlung gis bskyod/ /rdul bral zhi bas tshul khrims grib mas
294b2(mdo 'grel): sa stengs brgyan par gyis/ /bdag gis de skad brjod pas bsod nams cung zad bsgrubs pa gang/ /de yis skye bo ma lus bde gshegs spyod la dang byed cing/ /rtag bde longs spyod bzang ldan yid la re ba 'byor pa dang/ /gzhan
294b3(mdo 'grel): la phan dga' rim gyis kun mkhyen bgrod par shog /dmyal ba lag mthil ltar mnyam snang gsal me rab zhi ba dang/ /skam 'khrungs pad+ma'i lo mas khebs shing rtsa ba'i khyi song 'thon/ /gtsang zhing dri zhim pad+ma kha byes sa rnams
294b4(mdo 'grel): brgyan pa dang/ /rgyas shing bzang la sor bu'i dad bcas char zim 'bab par shog /bdud dpung pham pa cho nges 'debs pas mi snyengs sgrags pa po/ /lha bu'i rtsed mo bas kyang dga' mdzad lha dang mi 'dul ba/ /skye shi nyon mongs
294b5(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal rgyun rnams 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas dag /phyogs dang phyogs su brnag pa bzhin du nam zhar 'byung bar shog /'gro ba chos kyi kun dga' 'phel dga' ba'i ston che bar shog /'chi ba dag re ba shin tu yun ring goms pa don
294b6(mdo 'grel): med shog /thub pa'i skye bo gtam tshogs 'phel bar zhi ba bdud rtsi yi/ /char gyi zla ba'i snang ba rab bzangs bsil bas don byas shog /slob mi la spring ba'i 'phrin yi ge slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //
294b7(mdo 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande dpal rtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ mahA
295a1(mdo 'grel): rA dzi ka ni ke le kha/ bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po ka ni ka la springs pa'i 'phrin yig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgrod par bgyi 'os khyod lags na/ /
295a2(mdo 'grel): bkug kyang ma mchis gang lags de/ ma gus ma lags brnyas ma lags/ /rga dang nad kyi bar chad bgyis/ /bdag ni sems can thams cad dang/ /'dra bar khyod la brtse mod kyi/ /khyod kyi yon tan gyis khyod la/ /
295a3(mdo 'grel): lhag par nye mgon khyad par bgyid/ /gdams kyi phal cher mchis mod kyi/ /thams cad gdams par su rngo thogs/ /khyod kyi yon tan gang lags des/ /bdag ni spyi brdol skyes bar 'gyur/ /zlogs pa med
295a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i yon tan gyis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bsgos pas ni/ /mi mchog rnams kyang thugs thub par/ /mdza' bshes bzhin du 'dzem pa med/ /de ltas snyan gtod nyid kyi ched/ /bdag gi gsol ba 'di gson
295a5(mdo 'grel): te/ /bsgrub dang btang ba yid gnyis las/ /gang rigs de ni nyams su bzhes/ /dga' bar bgyid pa'i yul rnams dang/ /rgyags par bgyid pa'i lang tsho dang/ /bdag nyid rang dgar spyod pa dang/ /kun tu don
295a6(mdo 'grel): med bgyid pa'i sgo/ /phung bar byed pa de gsum spang/ /mkhas pas dam pa sten pa dang/ /dbang po gdul dang shes rab kyi/ /stobs mthus nyams ni smad nas spyad/ /khyod kyis nyes pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i//
295a7(mdo 'grel): cha ni gsum po de dag rnams/ /chos lugs dag dang 'dul ba yis/ /bcos nas yon tan nyid du mdzod/ /ci ste rgyal po blon po dag /dkyel che snying rje'i bdag nyid ni/ /rtag tu nyon mongs med pa yi/ /
295b1(mdo 'grel): las kyi rgyal srid bya bar rung/ /'jig rten 'di na blo gros kyi/ /nyam chung gyur dang mgon med pa/ /bya ba ma yin byed pa la/ /gdon mi za bar 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bas ji srid sa de la/ /myur du ma sgal bar du ni/ /blo mthu
295b2(mdo 'grel): bskyed phyir mkhas pa dag /bsdu bar dgyes pa'i nan tan mdzod/ /chos kyi bstan bcos gdon bgyi zhing/ /de yi don gyi tshul gson la/ /gsan pa'i chos rnams rnam dpyad de/ /dpyad pa la ni mkhas par mdzod/ /
295b3(mdo 'grel): mya ngan gyis ni ma gdungs shing/ /na gzhon nad med longs pa yi/ /dngos po da ltar byung ba yi/ /blo gros la ni mi nus med/ /'dir ni skyes bu dam pa las/ /dus dus su yang nyung zang gson/ /nyung du bsags na'ang/ /
295b4(mdo 'grel): nges par ni/ /ring por mi thogs mang por 'gyur/ /rtag tu chu thigs re re'i rgyun/ /bar chad med par 'bab pa yis/ /gang zhig gang bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /snod de ji lta bu zhig mchis/ /de ltar dpe gsal de lta bu/ /rgyal
295b5(mdo 'grel): po tshad mar mdzad nas ni/ /dam pa'i chos ni gsan pa la/ /rtag tu dges pa nyid du mdzod/ /yon tan nor ni gnyer la gnyen/ /mkhas shing snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /byas gzo phongs chos mi bgyid pa/ /bzang po khyod kyis
295b6(mdo 'grel): slad du zhog /khyod kyis blun dang 'phongs chos can/ /brkam zhing byas pa mi gzo dang/ /kha gsag gtum po mi bzang ba/ /yul na'ang gnas su ma stsal cig /rtag tu so so'i skye bo yis/ /khyad par mkhyen par mdzod
295b7(mdo 'grel): cig dang/ /de yi khyad par mkhyen tsam la/ /phun sum tshogs pa rag las so/ /mi gang dka' ba spyod byed dang/ /dor bar bya dka' dor ba dang/ /bzod par dka' ba bzod byed dang/ /bkur dka' nyams su len pa dang/
296a1(mdo 'grel): gnas min las ni zlog byed dang/ /gnas su 'jog par brtson pa dang/ /de yi bsam pa mthun gus dang/ /bde bar 'dod cing 'o byams pa/ /de dag rnams ni mdza' bshes
296a2(mdo 'grel): te/ /gnyen 'dun grogs po 'ang de dag lags/ /rang don tsam phyir 'brang ba'i mi/ /gzhan dag skye bo phan pa bas/ grogs po phan par 'dod pa'i tshig /mi snyan yang ni phan pa dang/ /'jam dang bde ba lags pa dag /
296a3(mdo 'grel): thugs la bzhag par mdzad du gsol/ /tshig snyan phan pa ma lags dang/ /'jam dbyangs bden pa ma lags pa/ /dam pa ma yin rnams kyi tshig /khyod kyi thugs la ma bzung zhig /phan par smra ba khro yang ni//
296a4(mdo 'grel): khyed kyis gnang chen dag tu mdzod/ /mi phan smra ba bstod bgyid kyang/ /dgyes pa dag tu ma mdzad cig /rab dang mtsho la ngang pa yi/ /rgyal po dang ni chus 'jigs bzhin/ /dam pa rnams kyis bsnyen bla dang//
296a5(mdo 'grel): dam pa min pas bsnyen dka' mdzod/ /khyod kyis mkhas rnams tshim bgyis pas/ /'byor pa don du gnyer mi bgyid/ /yon tan dgyes phyir khyod kyis ni/ /yon tan rnams kyis mi ngoms mdzod/ /longs
296a6(mdo 'grel): spyod byed dam bde ba dang/ /sdug bsngal phrad pa 'am spyod pa 'am/ /spyod lam kun tu spyod pa na/ /khyod kyis dam pa bsten pa dang/ /dran pa'i grogs kyis bskor ba na/ /bag yod par ni gnas 'gyur
296a7(mdo 'grel): te/ /sA la'i shing la 'khri shing bzhin/ /bzang po dpal gyis 'khyud par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis bzhom pa bden pa dang/ /khyad par zhing la sbyin pa dang/ /dran dang bral bas 'dod pa dbye/ /chad pas
296b1(mdo 'grel): gang duAng bcad mi bgyi/ /log pas 'thab bcugs byed pa dang/ /bkren la dman par lta ba dang/ /tshul khrims ldem? rnams mi dga' dang/ /dka' thub sdom pa 'khrul byed pa/ /bzhi po 'di dag 'dod min te/ /rtsa ba
296b2(mdo 'grel): 'joms par bgyid pa lags/ /rab brtson khyod kyi yul na ni/ /de dag gtan ma mchis par mdzod/ /stobs dang ldan pa stobs chung ba/ /gnang chen gyis ni mi gnang dang/ /mchod 'os rnams kyis mi mchod dang/ /
296b3(mdo 'grel): smos 'dris kyis ni mi shes pa/ /gang yang rung ba gang gis kyang/ /brnyas pa med par khyod kyis mdzod/ /tha snyad rnams ni dag pa yis/ /kun la 'dri bar gzigs su gsol/ /kun gyis rang gi chos thob cing/ /chos kyis
296b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'tsho bar mdzod/ /mi sdug kyang ni nyes med na/ /thams cad bde bar mdzad du gsol/ /pha yi bu la ji lta bar/ /khyod kyis 'khor la byams bgyis na/ /bu yis pha la ji lta bar/ /khyod la zha 'bring dga' bar bgyi/
296b5(mdo 'grel): phal rnams rang bzhin bzang na ni/ /khyod kyis dgongs pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /phal rnams rang bzhin ngan na ni/ /khyod kyis dgongs pa bzhin mi 'gyur/ /gal te gzhung lugs bzang zhe na/ /gong nas gong du 'phang bar
296b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /ci ste ngan pas spyod mdzad na/ /'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /dam pa'i las la gnas nas ni/ /khyu mchog dang ni khyu lta bu/ /rjes su 'tsho ba'i skyes bu'i tshogs/ /'di kun rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /khyed
296b7(mdo 'grel): kyi gya gyu la zhugs na/ /gya gyu kho na'i rjes 'brangs pas/ /skye dgu khyod mdzad rjes 'brang ba'i/ /skye dgu de ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas bdag gzhan bsrung slad du/ /thugs kyis rab tu bsgrims nas ni/ /gna'
297a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal drang srong rnams kyi lugs/ /nyams pa sar par bcos su gsol/ /gna' yi rgyal po'i spyod pa las/ /gang dag bzang ba de mdzod la/ /mi rigs pa ni gang lags de/ /smad par
297a2(mdo 'grel): mdzod la spang du gsol/ /sngon gyi bka' khrims skyon chags ba/ /gna' nas mchis kyang rgyun chod la/ /rgyal po ka ni kas mtshan pa'i/ /khrims su bca' ba gsar pa mdzod/ /
297a3(mdo 'grel): lha khyod yon tan don gnyer bas/ /yon tan lha bzhin kho nar mdzod/ /lha khyod skyon rnams mkhyen pa yis/ /lha bzhin nyes med kho nar mdzod/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin du/ /nyes pa'i tshogs rnams 'grib ba dang/ /
297a4(mdo 'grel): zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du/ /rtag tu yon tan gyis brgyan mdzod/ /yab sems bzhin du bdag nyid kyis/ /chos kyis sa stengs bskyang ba dang/ /yab mes bzhin du lha khang gi/ dus ston 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/ /
297a5(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis/ mtho ris byang grol gyis/ /them skas mi mnyam mnyam pa'i phyir/ /bsod nams las byung bzo rig che/ /rtag tu lha khang dag tu sogs/ /rga dang 'chi bam bsnyengs mdzod de/ /chos bzhin rgyal srid
297a6(mdo 'grel): dpal dpyad nas/ /bgres kar dgon par gshegs su gsol/ /dam chos ston pa'i 'bras mchis mdzod/ /rang byung rnams kyi rjes su bslab/ /ku sha'i rigs su 'khrungs khyod kyis/ /yab mes 'phags rigs
297a7(mdo 'grel): nyi ma yi/ /gdung rgyud chos lugs ma nyams mdzod/ /skye ba can la nges par ni/ /rgas dang 'chi dang na mchis na/ /ma bgres ma bslungs ma grongs zhes/ /legs smod gsol yang ci la sman/ /srid pa
297b1(mdo 'grel): dag ni gang yang rung/ /de nyid rgas dang 'chi ba lags/ /yongs su bsgyur bas rga pa ste/ /skad cig 'jigs pas 'chi ba yi/ /ma rgas ma na mi 'chi zhes/ /smra ba ngag ni smra ba na/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun 'bar na/ /yang srid
297b2(mdo 'grel): med las gzhan ci yod/ /gang na mi mthun yod ma yin/ /gang du 'du byed 'jig mi 'gyur/ /gdan gcig tu bde bar gnas/ /gang du song na 'chi med 'gyur/ /srid pa kun nas nyon mongs dang/ /sdug bsngal 'gyur
297b3(mdo 'grel): ba cir mi mkho/ /de slad nges pa srid pa rnams/ /med par bsgom pa rgyas par mdzod/ /'dir ni bgyi ba 'di nyid de/ /de las gzhan pa'i bgyi mi 'tshal/ /bgyi ba de ni bgyis pa yis/ /mi bgyi ba yi tshar phyin to/ /bgrang
297b4(mdo 'grel): phreng bzhin du 'khor ba ru/ /lan mang yongs su 'khor ba ni/ /lan brgya 'am yang na stong dag du/ /'jig rten dag tu ci ma bgyis/ /'di ma bgyis smas byis pa yis/ /yang dang yang du bgyi 'tshal bas/ /thog ma med
297b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i dus can 'dis/ /da dung bar du ma log go /'chi bdag su dang mi shes pa/ /glo bur dag tu 'bab 'gyur bas/ /sang dag bya zhes ma bzhes par/ /dam pa'i chos la smyur te mdzod/ /'di sang deng 'di mi bya zhes/
297b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba mi la bzang po min/ /nam zhig khyod ni med 'gyur ba'i/ /sang de gdon mi za bar 'ong/ /'chi bdag brtse ba med pa can/ /skyes rtsal don med gsod 'gyur ba/ /bsod pa mngon du 'ong bzhin du/ /mkhas pa su
297b7(mdo 'grel): zhig bag skyong spyod/ /de slad dpag chen bzod med des/ /mda' ni mi bzad 'tshor med pa/ /de ni ji srid ma 'phangs pa/ /de srid rang gi don la 'bod/ /rnam smin 'byin pa sngon las kyis/ /khyod ni yongs su btang
298a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /sar pa'i las dang rjes 'brel cing/ /'chi bdag gis ni drangs pa na/ /dge dang sdig pa ma gtogs par/ /'gro ba thams cad phyir log nas/ /'ga' yang
298a2(mdo 'grel): khyod rjes mi 'brang bar/ /mkhyen par mdzad la legs par spyod/ /bdag ni snying rjes zil non cing/ /yid mi dga' ba'i rlan gyis ni/ /shin tu brlan pa'i smre sngags 'di/ /re zhig gsan par mdzad du gsol/
298a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba sman pa log ltung ba/ /mgon med nyes med phal cher ni/ /rtswa dang chu dang 'bras bu ni/ /phal pas 'tsho ba sgrub bgyid pa/ /bya dang ri dags phyugs dag la/ /rgyal pos gsod dam gsod 'jug bar/ /
298a4(mdo 'grel): ci ga rigs sam mi rigs pa/ /bde la gnas pa khyod nyid gsungs/ /khyod ni chen por mi khro zhing/ /gnod pa bgyid pa 'ang bzod ces gda' / /khyod kyi thugs rjes dud 'gro ba/ /kye ma su zhig dgag par bgyi/ /
298a5(mdo 'grel): gnod pa bgyid la bzod mdzad pa/ /gnod mi bgyid pa 'gums mdzad pas/ /khyod la brtse dang mi brtse bas/ /rgyu mthun pa ni gnyis ka gda' / /sngon chad bgyis pa'i sug las kyis/ /'di ltar 'phen du gyur pa la/ /
298a6(mdo 'grel): khyod nyid gnod pa mdzad nag go/ su la skyabs su 'gro ba gsungs/ /gzhan gyis gnod pa bgyis na yang/ /nyid kyis phyag gis bshugs 'tshal na/ /khyod bzhengs mngon du mnod mdzed na/ /phyogs kun mun par ma gyur
298a7(mdo 'grel): tam/ /kun la srog ni phangs pa ste/ /kun la gsan pa sdug pa lags/ /thams cad mchi ba'i chos can te/ /thams cad sdug bsngal rnams kyis gdung/ /'di ltar gang zhig mi 'tshal ba/ /de nyid kyis
298b1(mdo 'grel): ni sdug bsngal te/ /mkhas pa su zhig dga' ba ltar/ /tshig pa la ni yang sreg bzhin/ /khyod ni srog gcod mi dgyes shing/ /srog gcod dgyes las phyir log na/ /rgyal srid nyams par 'gyur ram ci/ /lugs 'di ci zhig
298b2(mdo 'grel): lags pa gsungs/ /mtshon cha'i thabs la mkhas khyod kyis/ /g.yul dor srol btong mthong lags na/ /gzhan du khyod la ri dags la/ /ci slad gnod pa'i las rnams mdzad/ /ri dags gzhon nu'i spyan lam khyod/ /
298b3(mdo 'grel): spyan dang 'dra ba'i ri dags rnams/ /rtabs nas rig rig lta ba la/ /ci yi slad du thugs mi rje/ /khyod kyi spyan dang mig 'dra'i phyir/ /khyod la dga' ba gang legs te/ /ri dags la yang dga' bgyid na/ /khyad ni ji ltar dgyes
298b4(mdo 'grel): mi mdzad/ /log par lhung dang spyan 'dra dang/ /mgon med yul na gnas pa nyid/ /re re yang ni ri dags dag/ mi 'gums pa yi rgyur rung ngo/ /mi rnams la ni mdzad pa bas/ /sdug bsngal lhag par brtags pa yi/ /dud
298b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro rnams la ches lhag par/ /khyod kyis thugs rjes mdzad du gsol/ /khyod nyid srung ba'i don 'di la/ /bdag gis thal mo sbyar mi 'tshal/ /rgyud gzhan gsol bas gus bgyis par/ /legs par thugs tshod mang lags
298b6(mdo 'grel): grang/ /co nas bzung ste bslab spyang ba/ /dam pa rnams kyi lugs su gnas/ /de ltar lags pas rgyal po la/ /bu sdug bzhin du gsol ba lags/ /gal te bdag gis mi phan pa/ /gsol na bdag la chad pas khum/ /
298b7(mdo 'grel): ci ste gcig tu phan gsol na/ /bdag gis gsol ba bzhin du mdzod/ /gal te mi dgyes mdzad par ma gyur na/ /bdag gis yang dang yang du gsol bar 'tshal/ /ci ste bdag tshig khyad du 'gums mdzad na/ /bka' mchid
299a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni nges par gtang bar bgyi/ /dgyes par gyur na slar dgyes mi 'gums te/ mi dgyes gyur na dogs bzung bar 'tshal/ /gnod bgyid nyi ma ltar jo mi thogs pas/ /sa bdag zla ba zla ba bzhin du mdzod//
299a2(mdo 'grel): sa bdag tsher ma'i shing la sbrang rtsi ltar/ /dgra bo las kyang legs par smras pa gzung/ /gser gyi ri las dug rgyun ji bzhin du/ /yid 'ong skye bo'i tshig ngan spang 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog gal te legs par mdzad pa'i sbyor bas
299a3(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs gyur te/ /pha rol gnod pa sel ba'i dpal 'di yon tan rgyan rnams kyis/ /phyug par bgyis na legs spyad brgya la chags phyir g.yo ba'i snying/ /mi brtan pa yang dang dbang med par yun ring khyod la chags/ /slob dpon
299a4(mdo 'grel): mA tra tsi tras rgyal po chen po ka ni ka la springs ba'i 'phrin yig rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidya ka ra pra ba dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ /
299a5(mdo 'grel): a tsArya dpal rtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ /tsit+ti ratna bi sho d+ha na kra ma nA ma le kha/ bod skad du/ sems rin po che rnam par
299a6(mdo 'grel): spyang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i spring yig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa gsum dbang phyug skye dgu chos kyis skyong mdzad pa/ /lha mi'i bla ma 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi
299a7(mdo 'grel): yab/ /rgol ba tshar gcod rang gi 'khor gyi dga' bskyed pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po gcig bu de ni rgyal gyur cig /blo zhan bdag 'dras gzhan la bskul bar mi nus shing/ /bskul bas phan par 'gyur ba 'ang deng sang nyung? mod
299b1(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /'on kyang sa yi bdag po khyod kyis nongs pa yal bor na/ /'gro mang de 'drar 'gyur 'di ma bzod khyod la bskul/ /mi skyong khyod kyi dbang phyug 'di ni sngon tshad nyid kyi thugs/ /gdul dka' legs par btul las brnyes kyi gzhan gyis
299b2(mdo 'grel): byin pa dang/ /sa yi rum nas 'thon dang gnam babs lta zhig ga la lags/ /sa bdag dpal 'di mi nyams bzhed na da dung thugs thul 'tshal/ /gang zhig phan na de ni brtags te dka' yang mdzad rigs la/ /
299b3(mdo 'grel): gang zhig mi phan de ni bsgrub par sla yang btang ba'i rigs/ /de phyir sngon tshe thub chen rgyal bu zla bar gyur pa yis/ /rgyal po su ta sa'i bu la gdams pa smras pa yang/ /rgyal po
299b4(mdo 'grel): gcig pos g.yul dor dmag gi dpung las rgyal/ /sems tsam tshar gtsang phyir ni sngar ma ma mdzad cig /mi yi bdag po 'jig rten phyi ma 'ang gzigs pa'i rigs/ /de bas dgyes kyang phan pa ma yin bsten mi rigs zhes so/
299b5(mdo 'grel): de phyir gang gis dman pa'i rigs su ltung byed ba/ /nga rgyal dgra spangs bdag gi tshig 'di sang phyir yang/ /mi bdag khyod kyis gus pas gsan rigs te/ /legs smras byis las blang zhes thub chen gsal bar gsungs/ /sa
299b6(mdo 'grel): bdag tsher ma'i shing las sbrang rtsi bzhin/ /dgra bo las kyang legs smras gzung bar bya/ /gser gyi ri? las dug gi chu rgyun bzhin/ /yid 'ong skye bo'i tshig ngan spang 'tshal lo zhes so/ /gang zhig ma btul mnar med sogs/ /sdug bsngal
299b7(mdo 'grel): bzod dka' skye byed cing/ /de nyid btul bas lha mi dang/ /'jig rten min pa'i bde ba 'ang 'thob/ /rab tu mthu ldan sems 'di ni/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dul mi byed/ /'dir sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rtag tu rnam
300a1(mdo 'grel): par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin mod kyi/ lus dang ngag bran lta bu dang bcas pa blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag gis dkrugs pa ste/ /de'i phyir 'di dag rnam par sbyangs te nor bu chu shel
300a2(mdo 'grel): gyi 'od ltar rab tu 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin dkrugs ma dang bral ba bskyed de/ 'di tsam ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de la 'dir bsdus na sems te dkrugs pas rtog pa can du byed cing/ /lus dang ngag bran ltar 'khor
300a3(mdo 'grel): ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ thams cad kyi rgyu rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug shas che ba'o/ /de la gang rnam par rtog pa med pa des ni rlung gi ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pas re spang bar bya ste/ bgrang
300a4(mdo 'grel): dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa dang/ /rtog pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang/ /yongs dag rnam pa drug du 'dod/ /de ni bgrang ba dang/ rjes su 'gro ba dang/ 'jog pa dang/ nye bar rtog pa dang/ sgyur ba dang/ yongs su dag pa ste rgyu drug dang ldan na/ yongs
300a5(mdo 'grel): su rdzogs pa yin no/ /de la bgrang bzhes bya ba ni dbugs rdub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dag la sems gtad nas mngon par 'du bya ba med par lus dang sems rnal du bzhag ste/ dran pa tsam gyis gcig dang gnyis nas bcu'i bar
300a6(mdo 'grel): du bgrang bar byed pa'o/ /sems mngon par bsdus pa rnam par g.yeng bar dogs pas ha cang mang ba dang nyung ngur ni ma yin no/ /de la skyon ni gsum yod de/ /gal te gcig la gnyis su brtsis na lhag par bgrangs pa'i skyon no//
300a7(mdo 'grel): gal te gnyis la gcig tu 'dzin ni ma tshang bar bgrangs pa'i skyon no/ /gal te dbugs rdub ba la dbugs 'byin par 'dzin tam dbugs 'byin pa la rdub par 'dzin na 'tshol bar 'dzin par skyon no/ /de las gzhan pa ni yang
300b1(mdo 'grel): dag par bgrang ba yin no/ /bar skabs su sems rnam par g.yeng na/ /yang mgo nas ji srid du ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du bgrang bar bya'o/ /rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'di dag ji srid gcig tu 'byung ngam 'jug /ci 'di dag lus thams
300b2(mdo 'grel): cad la khyab pa dag gcig gam phyogs 'ga' zhig nas rgyu ba dag yin zhes mngon par 'du bya ba med par dbugs rdub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de 'jug pa na lkog ma dang/ snying ga dang/ lte ba dang/ rked pa dang/ brla dang/
300b3(mdo 'grel): byin par 'jug pa'i rim gyis rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du rjes su 'gro la/ 'phyur? ba na mtho gang dang 'dom gang gi bar du 'byung ngo/ /gzhan dag na re rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'thor byed kyi rlung gi bar du'o/ /zhes zer te/ 'di ni de kho
300b4(mdo 'grel): na yid la byed pa'i phyir rig pa ma yin no/ /'jog pa zhes bya ba nor bu'i phag pa bzhin du sna'i rtse mo nas rkang pa'i mthe bo'i bar du gnas par lta zhing ci 'di dag phan 'dogs par byed pa zhig gam/ /gnod pa byed pa zhig gam/ /
300b5(mdo 'grel): grang ngam dro ba zhig ces rtog pa'o/ /nye bar rtog pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gi rlung 'bal zhig ma yin gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po ngag dang 'byung ba dag las mngon par grub pa'i rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang
300b6(mdo 'grel): de dag la brten pa'i sems dang sems las byung pa rnams kyang yod do/ /zhes phung po lnga nye bar rtog pa'o/ /sgyur ba zhes bya ba ni rlung la dmigs pa'i blo bsgyur te chos kyi mchog gi bar du blo gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
300b7(mdo 'grel): la yang dag par sbyor ba'o/ /yongs su dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o/ /gzhan dag na re sgyur ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar yin la/ /rnam par dag pa ni zad pa
301a1(mdo 'grel): shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhes zer ro/ /'di lta bu ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi zhal snga nas ji ltar bris pa kho bos 'dir yang byis par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar rim pa drug po de dag gis las
301a2(mdo 'grel): ni ji skad du 'phags pa sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu ba'i mdo las gsungs pa bzhin te/ de las ni ji ltar dran pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ce na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bgrang
301a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rjes su 'gro ba dang/ zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong dang/ 'jug pa dang/ yongs su dag pa la rtog go /de la bgrang bas ni bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ /rten du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang
301a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par dpyod pa thul ba dang/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa'o/ /rjes su 'gro bas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ yang dag par 'byung ba la rten cing rnam par rtog pa dang
301a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par dpyod pa dang bral ba dang/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba'o/ /zhi gnas kyis ni bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'bri
301a6(mdo 'grel): bar mngon du ston pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog la gnas par nus pa'o/ /lhag mthong gis kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba zad par mngon du ston pa dang/ sems
301a7(mdo 'grel): dang sems las byung ba'i chos so so bar rtogs pa la gnas pa'o/ /'jug pas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po spong ba'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang/ /'phags
301b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sar 'jug pa la sbyor ba'o/ /yongs su dag pas kyang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa spong pa dang/ lta ba yongs su dag pa'o zhes so/ /de ltar dbugs thung ngu rdubs na yang dbugs thung
301b2(mdo 'grel): du rdubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so snyam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcu drug kyang legs par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /'dir rnam par rtog pa mang ba la bstan pa ni gtsor byas kyi yon tan ma lus pa 'di la brten
301b3(mdo 'grel): pas na thar pa'i grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pa ni dbugs rdug pa dang 'byung ba dran pa yin te zhes gsungs so/ /ji ltar zhen rab tu gdul dka' ba'i sems zhes brjod pa de ni rlung las gud du ma dmigs pa'i phyir te/ /de bas na sems zhes
301b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba de ni rlung du brjod do zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar mi bdag khyod kyis rlung gi phra dang zab mkhyen nas/ /yun ring dus nas rnam rtog dgra yis rab tu gces pas shin tu yang/ /mnyel zhing skyo ba'i thugs ni deng nas ngal? bsos rtog
301b5(mdo 'grel): dgra bzlog pa dang/ /lo yis ma yin gus par sbyor bas zhag gi rim pas rtog bral mdzod/ /de nas rim gyis yongs su dag pa'i mthar yang khyod kyi thugs gzhal na/ /sa bdag khyod kyis skye ba 'bras bcas de nas chos kyi rgyal por
301b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de yi bar du lha mi'i bde ba tshad med rnams la dgyes bzhin du/ /thugs btul mthu yis spyod par 'di la the tshom med par mngon sum gnas/ /rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po bshad zin te/ /sems kyi rtog pa spyad pa'i
301b7(mdo 'grel): rim pa'o/ /mi skyod khyod kyi thugs ni gal te bud med kyis phrogs na/ /'di nas yi bdag po mthu rtsal rab tu dman pa ste/ /gang gis g.yul chen 'jigs rung ba gzhom pa'i thabs mkhyen na/ /mi gtsang kun smod mngon gyur
302a1(mdo 'grel): bud med mtshan nyid mi mkhyen 'di mtshar che/ /shin tu yid 'ong tsher ma'i gnod pa'ang mi bzod lus 'di ni/ /bud med bsten pa'i rgyu las 'di dang slad ma mgo gcod sogs/ /rab tu bzod dka' i
302a2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal 'byung 'di nyid kyi mngon sum na/ /'on kyang bla ma bka' yis 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa mdor brjod bgyi/ /chags pa can rnams kyi gnyen po ni rus gong yid la bya ba yin te/ keng rus chags can thams cad la
302a3(mdo 'grel): zhes bshad pas so/ /ji ltar zhe na/ rus pa rgya mtsho'i bar du mi/ /spro zhing sdud pas las dang po/ /rkang rus dang ni thod phyed par/ /tang bas spyad pa byas par bshad/ /smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas/ /yid la byed pa rdzogs
302a4(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /zhes bshad pa'i rim pas so/ /gzhan yang byis pa rnams ni phal cher kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ reg pa 'jam pa dang/ bsnyen bkur la chags te/ de dag gi gnyen por ni rnam par bsngos pa dang/ rnam par dmar
302a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rnam par tshig pa dag yid la byed pas kha dog la chags pa dag sel to/ /rnam par rnags pa dang/ rnam par zos pa dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dag yid la byed pas ni dbyibs la chags pas sel to/ /rnam par
302a6(mdo 'grel): 'bus zhigs pa dang rus gong rgus pas 'brel ba dag yid la byas pas ni reg bya 'jam pa la tshigs pa sel to/ /rnam par bam pa'i ro mi g.yo ba rkyal ba steng pa bus pa lta bu/ rdo ltar bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral ba
302a7(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pas ni rkang pa bkru ba la sogs pa'i bsnyen bkur la chags pa sel bar byed do/ /gzhan yang rnam par phye ste brjod na/ sngo bsangs la sogs pa'i kha dog la chags pa zhig na rnam par bsngos par yid la bya'o//
302b1(mdo 'grel): tsanda dang ga pur la sogs pa'i dris byugs pa'i lus la chags pa lta na rnam par rnags par yid la bya'o/ /mtshan sprang pa'i reg bya la chags pa zhig na rnam par 'bus zhig par yid la bya'o/ /dbyigs phun sum tshogs ba lta na rnam
302b2(mdo 'grel): rnam par bam par yid la bya'o/ /rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i lus la chags pa zhig na rnam par dmar bar yid la bya'o/ /sha rgyas pa'i lus la chags pa zhig na rnam par zos par yid la bya'o/ /'khyud pa dang 'o byas pa la sogs pa'i rtsed 'jo
302b3(mdo 'grel): la chags pa'i dus na rnam par 'thor bar yid la bya'o/ /kha dog dang dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa la chags par gyur na rnam par tshig par yid la bya'o/ /so rnams dkar ba la chags pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rab tu mi bzad nags bsregs
302b4(mdo 'grel): me lce'i tshogs/ /char rgyun drag pos skad cig zhi byed ltar/ khyis pa'i nags tshal thal bar byed pa yi/ /'dod chags me chen mi sdug char gyis 'joms/ /'jig rten gnod pa'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa/ /kun gyis phul byung 'khrig pa'i 'dod
302b5(mdo 'grel): chags te/ /sa bdag 'di mkhyen 'dod las phyir ltos dang/ /rab tu dgyes pa byis pas ma myong ba/ /bsam gtan 'debs lus la phan 'dogs shing/ /kha na ma tho med pa myang ba'i rigs/ /'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems
302b6(mdo 'grel): spyad pa'i rim pa ste/ 'dod chags kyi gnyen po bshad zin to/ /lha mi'i bla mas gang du 'bad pas bkag /de ni 'gro la byams dang snying rje med pa ste/ /de phyir mi dbang khyod kyis thub la gus pa dang/ /nyid kyi thugs kyang dam
302b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i grangs su 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /gang la skra rtses gzung bya'i skye bo de la yang/ /nyid kyi sras bzhin gces shing byams pas bskyod pa'i rigs/ /bshes gnyen dam pa'i lung gis goms par byas pa las/ /srin po sha za seng ge
303a1(mdo 'grel): sogs kyang 'gro la byams/ /de phyir mi dbang khyod kyi thugs ni 'jams pa dang/ /'gro ba bskyang las nam yang phyir ldog ma mdzad cig /legs pa'i lam ni ji snyed bstan pa dag las kyang/ /
303a2(mdo 'grel): gtso bor gyur pa byams dang snying rjer dam pas gsungs/ /'di ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na/ dang por rang gi ma 'am pha 'am bu 'am bu mo 'am/ 'brel pa gnyis sam/ /gang yang rung ba gcig la bde ba ma lus pa dang phrad par gyur
303a3(mdo 'grel): cig snyam pa dang/ bdag gis de dang phrad par bya'o/ /zhes pa dang nus pa lta na dngos su de bsgrub pa dang/ phrad pa la phrag dog med pa nyi ma 'ga' zhig gus par bsgom mo/ /de nas ni de bas cung zad mi btsugs pa'o/ /rim gyis
303a4(mdo 'grel): bar ma la'o/ /de nas dgra bo dman pa la'o/ /de nas de bar ma la'o/ /de nas de dgra bo rab tu ma rungs pa la'o/ /de la ma la sogs pa dang mnyam pa thob pa na grong dang grong khyer pa la'o/ /de nas ni yul dang ljongs dang gling gcig dang
303a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis la sogs pa nas stong spyi phud dang/ stong gnyis bar ma dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sogs par byams pas khyab par byas te/ de nas gzhung
303a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig ces pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang bral ba la dga' ba dang/ de dag 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la dgod par bya'o zhes pa'i rim pas snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms rnams
303a7(mdo 'grel): bsgom mo/ /dang po nyid du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid can byams pa yid la ma byas par ni sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i snying rje ga la 'jug ste/ de ltar rim pa gzhan yang ngo/ /gnod par sems pa'i yid tsam bor
303b1(mdo 'grel): bas kyang/ /'khor los sgyur nyid thob par thub pas gsungs/ /byams sogs goms las 'chi med ma brnyes kyang/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bde ba rgya chen 'thob/ /de phyir mi rje khyod kyi ci spyod pas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi
303b2(mdo 'grel): yis ni gnas par rigs khyod kyis 'byor pa dug can zas bzhin du/ /bor nas gcig pu gzhan du gshegs 'tshal na/ /grogs bzang 'dor med dge ba de bkra'i phyir/ /thugs ni rnam par sbyang bar cis mi mdzad/ /zhe sdang
303b3(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa'i sems sbyang ba'i rim pa ste/ zhe sdang gi gnyen po bshad zin to/ /rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las skye dang/ /rgyu med 'byung zhes smra ba gang lags pa/ /'di dag log par smra ba phung khrol ba/ /legs par spyad kyang
303b4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu mi 'dod 'byin/ /de phyir khyod kyis rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /lta ngan des 'joms thub pa'i man ngag mchog/ bdud rtsi'i mchog 'di myur du gsol ba yis/ /dkar mchog ma lus rgyas shing brtan por mdzod/ /rten
303b5(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyis rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang/ gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched/ de'i rgyan gyis
303b6(mdo 'grel): reg pa/ de'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ de'i rkyen gyis len pa/ de'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ de'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ de'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ sme sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/
303b7(mdo 'grel): 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes/ /shes rab kyi mig gis blta bar byas te rgyu med pa la sogs pa bsal lo/ /don 'di ni 'phags pa
304a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod las/ gang du ma rig skye 'gyur ba/ /nyon mongs rgyu ni tshul bzhin min/ /de yi rkyen ni 'du byed de/ /sdug bsngal bar du skye bar 'gyur zhes pa dang/ gang gis
304a2(mdo 'grel): sems can dag 'gyur ba/ /rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis te/ /gzhan las rjes su mthun sgra dang/ /nang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o/ /de bzhin rgyu ni zhi gnas te/ /lhag mthong yang ni rkyen yin no/ /zhes gsungs so//
304a3(mdo 'grel): de ltar srid pa 'byung ba'i rim pa la yid ches par byas nas yang ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gags pa nas sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la bya'o/ /
304a4(mdo 'grel): de nas rtag par ma yin pa dang/ chad par ma yin pa dang/ 'pho bar ma yin pa dang/ de dang 'dra ba'i rgyu 'jug pa dang/ rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung zhes nges par gzung ste/ phyi rol yang sa bon lam myu gu dang/
304a5(mdo 'grel): de las 'dab ma dang/ de las sdong bu dang/ de las me tog dang/ de las 'bras bu 'byung zhing/ rgyu de dag dang rkyen dang 'brel bar 'byung bar 'byung ba khams bzhi dang/ nam mkha' dus kyi khams te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag
304a6(mdo 'grel): tsam mo zhes 'byung ba dang/ 'gag pa la rgyu med pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i rgyu spangs te/ 'di ni mdor bsdus nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la byas pas rig pa bskyed pa dang/ ma rig pa'i ngo bo 'am/ de las
304a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i log par lta ba spang ba'o/ /gal te rgyas par yid la byed pa lta zhig na rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang/ ming gi don dang/ las tha dad pa dang/ yan lag lngas yang dag par bsdus pa dang/ yan lag gsum
304b1(mdo 'grel): gyis yang dag par bsdus pa dang/ gsum las gnyis 'byung ba dang/ gnyis las bdun 'byung ba dang/ bdun las gsum 'byung ba dang/ dus gsum pa'i ngo bor bzhag pa dang/ rkyen dang 'brel ba dag yid la bya'o/ /
304b2(mdo 'grel): sa bdag rten cing 'brel 'byung mkhyen na snang bas mun pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi thugs la gnas pa'i gti mug go skabs ga la mchis/ /'di mkhyen srid pa'i 'khor lo phra zhing zab pa gzigs pa'i phyir/ /shes rab ye shes
304b3(mdo 'grel): spyan gnyis dri med lung gi sman byugs gzigs/ /ji skad du 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung 'di rgyal ba yi/ /gsung gi mdzod kyi gces pa zab mo ste/ /gang gis 'di ni yang dag
304b4(mdo 'grel): mthong ba des/ /sangs rgyas de nyid rig pa rnam mchog mthong zhes bstan to/ /gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems spyad pa'i rim pa ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la byed pa bshad zin to/ /mi yi bdag po gal
304b5(mdo 'grel): te phra ba'i thugs kyi go skabs su/ /thog ma'i rtsom dus can sdig pa'i rtsa ba'i rtog dgra 'di/ zhen pa gnas snyam zhu ma pa'i rtog pa mi bzad zhugs gyur na/ /de yi gnyen por rten cing skyes pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin
304b6(mdo 'grel): gzigs/ /dri med me long ngos la skyes pa'i bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gang/ /gal te yang dag gnas na rkyen la rag las mi 'gyur zhing/ /slar 'di rnam par 'jig 'gyur go skabs can du ga la 'gyur/ /de phyir
304b7(mdo 'grel): dngos med rkyen la rag las gcig pu rnam par spangs/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin 'di yang legs par rnam par dpyad na/ /rab tu phra rdul bar du 'gyur zhes dam pas dang por gsungs/ /gal te dngos
305a1(mdo 'grel): yod de dag shes rab cis mi 'bab/ /de phyir de yang phyogs cha'i bye brag ngag gis ga la gnas/ /rin chen sems kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig sna tshogs snang zhe na/ de bzhin 'di la'ang skad cig ces bya rab
305a2(mdo 'grel): phra dam pas gsungs/ /skad cig skad cig ces bya'i gang ngag phra la rnam par rmongs/ /de yang ji lta thog ma dbus mdza' blta mi nus/ /de'i phyir rin po che yi phreng ba las/ skad cig ji ltar mdza' yod ltar/ /thog ma dang
305a3(mdo 'grel): dbus de ltar brtag /skad cig rang bzhin gsum gyi phyir/ /'jig rten skad cig la mi gnas/ zhes bstan to/ /de ltar 'di dag phyi dang nang du bcas pa gcig min zhing/ /de nyid phyir na de yi rang bzhin rnam bsags du ma'ang
305a4(mdo 'grel): min/ /'di dag las dben dngos po shes rab mig gi 'ga' ma dmigs/ /des na 'di dag mdza' gnyis grol bar dam pas gsal bar gsungs/ /de bzhin gcig gis gcig nyid skyed pa mngon sum 'gal mthong ste/ /
