394a7(mdo 'grel): su sbyin pa rme/ /rdzas rnams myur du thong cig dad pa can/ /byin rlabs 'dir 'byung phyi ma gdong na sdod/ /bde skyid 'dod dang sdug bsngal spong 'dod dang/ /rigs mtho bzhin legs bde ba'i gnas thob dang/ /bde mthong mos shing sdug bsngal spong
394b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas/ /dam chos 'di ni rtag tu spang par bya/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba thob 'dod pas/ /dge bcu spyad de lus kha bsrung ba ni/ /'dod log g.yem dang srog gcod bsku ba dang/ /brdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub 'khyal ba dang/ /brnab sems gnod sems log par lta ba dang/
394b2(mdo 'grel): rang don lags kyis sdig bcu rgyab tu bor/ /rang la byams shing brtse bas 'bad par bya/ /rngon pa mi rgod kun po dag? pa sogs/ /sdig pa'i rkyen sogs grogs pa gdug pa spongs/ /kun tu dge ba'i slob dpon sman bzhin bsten/ /'on long zhar sgur lus thob rgud
394b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /dbul 'phongs bzhin ngan las las nad mang rnams/ /rnam smin lags kyis gzhan la yus mche/ /mtho ris ngan song gnyis la gang mos pa/ /rang dbang yod kyis skyid sdug khyad par nyon/ /gal te mtho ris mthar pa mngon zhen na/ /yang dag lta ba
394b4(mdo 'grel): goms pa dag tu mdzod/ /rnam rtog ri bos mnan pa'i sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal 'di la bzod pa'i bdag med de/ /'khor bas 'khor te zo chun khyung mo 'dra/ /rnam rtog rlung gis khyer te rtsi shing lo 'dab 'dra/ /rnam rtog rgyud la skyes te rtswa la me mched 'dra/ /ye shes
394b5(mdo 'grel): skad cig mi gnas dbyer kha'i shes mun 'dra/ /phyi yi sdug bsngal bzhi ni rang sems myong/ /yod na mi thub med na brtsal mi rnyad/ /byams dang bral dogs sdang dang phrad kyi dogs/ /nang gi sdug bsngal bzhis ni rang lus 'joms/ /ma lus 'byung che brag
394b6(mdo 'grel): par btsir ba 'dra/ /ma yis mchongs tshe g.yang la phyin pa snyam/ /lhung tshe cher ma'i dong du bskyur ba snyam/ /blangs na bye chung khra yis khyer pa snyam/ /skye ba'i sdug bsngal rang lus rdul bzhin rlog /lo zla 'das shing rgas pa shugs kyis 'ong/ /rgas tshe mgo
394b7(mdo 'grel): la skra dkar so yang med/ /rna bas mi thos mig gis rang mi mthong/ /'dug na rang lus sa rdo chad? pa 'dra/ /'das na spangs la phur ba 'byin dang mtshungs/ /phyi rgod 'gro yang sgur nas gog cing 'gro /zas skom 'dod na gzhan la rag las slong/ /bu tshas mthong
395a1(mdo 'grel): yang mi mos yid mi 'ong/ /dug po bskon zhing sgo rtsa srung du gtong/ /gzhan dag 'ong na ngo tsha bar zung zar/ /khyim tshe byis pa gshe zhing 'tshe ru 'ong/ /'tshog ser phyin na skyug bro par song zer/ /shi skal chad de rgan rgon yi dags skye//
395a2(mdo 'grel): ngo tsha khrel 'dzem shor de gzhan gyis skur/ /bu smad kun yang shi na rung zhes smra/ /rkang lag 'dar zhing kha mig chu yis khengs/ /lus kyi stobs shor ber ga grogs su tshol/ /legs par smras kyang gzhan gyi rnar mi snyan/ /bde bar nyal kyang lus
395a3(mdo 'grel): tshigs khol cing na/ /gzhan la gtam smras rgas pa'i dag mi snyan/ /rgas pa'i sdug bsngal bshad na kun la 'ong/ /lus la nad med bde sdug re ba rnams/ /nges pa 'dod pas nongs dang 'chi ba dang/ /na rga la sogs sdug bsngal du ma yis//
395a4(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas 'khor ba la ni skyo mdzod cig /de yis nyes pa shas kyang mkhyen par mdzod/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i lam la bde ba med/ /rigs drug sems can nad la grangs re mang/ /dug lnga dug gsum nad kyi dpal re tsha/ /thog mdza' med
395a5(mdo 'grel): pa nad kyi yun re ring/ /de ltar lags te ma rig bde ru re/ /'chi bdag bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa'i tshe/ /lus ngag yid gsum nad kyis thebs pa'i tsho/ /ngag gi sdug bsngal rnga mo bu stor 'dra/ /lhang lhang tser tser cis kyang nad kyi dbang/ /lus
395a6(mdo 'grel): kyi sdug bsngal skam la nya skyur 'dra/ /rgal bu stong stong 'phar yang nyam stobs med/ /'bros par bsams kyang thar pa'i dus mdza' med/ /gzer gyis lus btab ngo tsha khrel 'dzems shor/ /gnyen 'dun bskor yang sdug bsngal rang gis
395a7(mdo 'grel): myong/ /zas skom kha ru bcug kyang bro brlag med/ /nye ba bos kyang kha na skad mi thon/ /ji lta nyal kyang bde ba'i bar skabs med/ /sdig la 'gyod pa skyes kyang bshags lor med/ /na ba'i sdug bsngal la ste kun la 'ong/ /des na mi ni yang
395b1(mdo 'grel): dag nyid du mi bde zhing/ /mi gtsang bdag med pa ru rig par bgyi/ /'chi ba'i tshen dag sdig las kyis 'byed/ /dge ba can ni 'chi tshe bde ba mthong/ /mun pa'i khams nas bde ba byung ba dang/ /lus la chags pa med cing lus sems bral na dga' / /bde gshegs
395b2(mdo 'grel): bskor ba byed cing chos bshad mthong/ /bde ba'i zhing khams byung bas mos pa 'byung/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchod pa'i rdzas 'bul dang/ /'gro drug gnas mthong snying rje'i sems 'byung ste/ /de dang ldan na bde ba'i gnas su skye/ /sdig can dag ni 'chi tshe
395b3(mdo 'grel): nyes skyon mthong/ /snang ba'i khams ni mun pa rnam sros bzhin/ /mtho na spyi gtsugs thur la song ba mthong/ /lag na 'dug pa gdug pa'i mtshon char mthong/ /sgra skad thams cad gdug rtog sgra ru thos/ /sdig pa byas pa ngan song lam du ston/ /'chi ba dag
395b4(mdo 'grel): gshin rjes rgyab nas bul ning brdeg /srog gcod bdud kyis gdod nas btson bzhin khrid/ /gcan zan gdug pa'i 'brug sgra bzhin du sgogs/ /mtshon cha gdugs pa'i dpal ni rtsang bzhin 'dzugs/ /'khor ba'i g.yang sar ri gzar rbab bzhin
395b5(mdo 'grel): 'dril/ /yi dags gnas na sdug bsngal dpag tu med/ /bkres sbom grang dro ngal rang? 'jigs pa yis/ /bskyed pa shin tu mi bzad bsten 'tshal lo/ /mgo lus skam par mi mthun rgyu las byung/ /skom skrug po zer sna yis rgyu las byung/ /sdug
395b6(mdo 'grel): bsngal che ste lus la zad dus med/ /gal te tshe zad dmyal ba'i gnas 'gro ste/ /skad cig yud kyis gnas der myur bar phyin/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rigs na mchi ma 'ong/ /brtsod khu rgyal po 'phrang du bsdad nas ni/ /gson po pags
395b7(mdo 'grel): pa bshus shing yang lag 'don/ /de ltar byas kyang rnam par smin 'chir mi 'dod/ /bye ba phrag brgya nyams su myong yang ni/ /dzis? ngi mi dge de zad ma gyur pa/ /de srid srog dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i lcags khang mthong na dga' snyam sems//
396a1(mdo 'grel): las kyi sgo phye nang du dbang med 'gro/ las rlung phug nas sgo gcod mun pa 'thibs/ /phyogs mtshams kun nas me 'byung 'bros sa med/ /sha rus tshig kyang 'chi ru las kyis 'tsho/ /rang nyid zangs su 'tshod cing sha rus bral/ /phur? bzhi
396a2(mdo 'grel): brgyangs shing steng 'og lcags kyis btab/ /lcags gzer steng 'og lus la gang bar 'debs/ /gal te mgul na lhu tshigs rus pa 'bral/ /lcags kyi bya khra mkha' la lding zhing 'debs/ /mtshon cha'i 'khor los lus la dum bur gcod/ /lcags kyi
396a3(mdo 'grel): tho chen mkha' la lding shing brdeg /sog les spyi bo'i gtsug nas rkang thil gshog /pu gri gtams pa'i ri la dbang med 'dzeg /rnag khrag bshul ba'i dri ma dpag tshad khyab/ /rang gi rang bsregs skye bo rang gis lan/ /mchod pa de ltar lags te lha mi
396a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro rnams dag tu/ /skye ba bzang po ma lags skye ba ni/ /gnod pa du ma'i snod gyur lags mkhyen mdzod/ /des na 'jig rten bde nus ci la phan/ /de phyir bdag gis bshad pa'i man ngag nyon/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad bla
396a5(mdo 'grel): ma dam pa yis/ /ma 'ongs sems can skye bo'i don dag tu/ /man ngag dang bskyed sgron ma 'di brtsams pas/ /'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas thob par shog /slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa dang skyed sgron ma rdzogs so// //
396a6(mdo 'grel): dpe'i phreng ba bzhugs/ /mya ngan med pa'i sgo nas klu btul ba'i le'u bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ driSh+TA na ta mA lya/ bod skad du/ dpe'i phreng ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por smra ba rnams
396a7(mdo 'grel): kyi rab mchog ston pa dang/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'dod chags rnams 'joms chod dang ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i bstan pa bdud rtsi'i snod gyur pa/ /gang zag mchog brgyad kyis brgyan dge 'dun rab brtul cing/ /bsam rdzogs rtsi ba logs 'tsher la
396b1(mdo 'grel): sogs pa de dang de/ /thams cad yod smra'i khyu mchog dad pas mchod byas te/ /dpe yi phreng ba 'di ni bdag gis bshad par bya/ /rab blo'i legs sbyar ma spas 'di na de bstan gyis/ /yon tan dang skyon gyi mtshan nyid khong du chud pa las mchod par bya ba dang/ mchod par bya ba ma
396b2(mdo 'grel): yin pa rtogs par 'gyur bas yon tan dang skyon gyi mtshan nyid khong du chud pa las rab tu 'bad par bya'o/ /de yang 'di ltar rjes su thos te/ yul gan d+ha ra nas tshong pa kha cig bcom rlag tu song ba dang/ de de na mchod rten rnams la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing
396b3(mdo 'grel): dge sbyong rnams la yang bsnyen bkur dang bcas pas phyag byed par gyur pa dang/ de la 'di ni dge bsnyen yin no snyam du shes nas bram ze rnams kyis bzhad gang byas par gyur to zhes grag go /de nas re zhig na de sos ka'i dus kyi phyi dro'i tshe bram ze zhig gi lam srang na
396b4(mdo 'grel): 'dug go /der bram ze kha cig khrus byas shing dris byugs pa dang zas la spyad pas dbang po tshim pa dang khang pa sgo'i phyogs na lag na rnga yab thogs shing mchod phyir dkar po thogs la/ gcig tu shas cher brgad de gtam la rjes su chags shing dga' bas kun
396b5(mdo 'grel): tu 'khod par gyur pa dang/ de rnams kyis dge bsnyen de bltas nas rab tu brgad do/ /bram ze gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen khyod tshur shog /stan yod par 'dug cig /de der 'dug pa dang/ bram ze zhig gis dris pa/ gang lha chen po
396b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i lha rnams spangs nas sangs rgyas la mchod pa byed pa gan d+ha ra pa rnams kyi rang bzhin 'di ci zhig yin/ des bgad de smras pa/ bdag cag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams kyi phyogs gcig shes kyi lha chen po
396b7(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi yon tan mi shes te/ rgyu de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa yin no/ /des de'i tshig de thos pa dang/ bram ze kha cig gis smras pa/ legs ldan lha chen po'i yon tan mi shes ma 'di ni/ khyod glen pa yin te/ gang
397a1(mdo 'grel): gi phyir 'di na lha min grong khyer mkha' la rgyu/ /skyes pa bud med rgan dang gzhon bcas pa/ /gzhu chen blangs nas 'bar ba'i mda' yis ni/ /me yi rtswa bzhin skad cig dag gis bsregs/ /dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang rang bzhin
397a2(mdo 'grel): gyis 'chi ba'i chos can gyi srog chags rnams la gsad pa'i phyir 'bad pa dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi khyad par de 'dra ba la ni kho bo mi dga' o/ /su zhig zil pa'i thigs pa ni/ /rtswa yi rtse la chags pa dag /ngang gis 'jigs pa'i chos can la//
397a3(mdo 'grel): gzhig pa'i phyir ni 'bad par byed/ /re zhig gzhan thams cad lta zhog gi /ci khyed rnams pha rol la gnod pa byed pa yon tan yin par shes sam/ de nas bram ze de dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu smras pa/ /lha ma yin gsod pa ni yon tan yin
397a4(mdo 'grel): par rab tu shes so/ /dge bsnyen gyis dbugs phyung ste smras pa/ las gang las ni dam pa rnams/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa de nyid la/ /dam pa min pa dregs gyur pa/ /kye ma 'jig rten ngo mtshar che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pas legs par smras pa
397a5(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /mdor na/ yon tan skyon sogs pa brtags la bya ba dang/ /bya min sad pas rgyal ba'i yon tan ni/ /rgya chen rjes la yon tan nges dga' rnams/ /mchod pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rgya chen yin/ /skyon la yon tan dag tu 'du shes shing/ /
397a6(mdo 'grel): skyon dang ldan pa dam par shes pas mdzod/ /'bras bu rgya chen thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ /lta ba ngan pa dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ /tshig de bram ze rgan po kha cig gis thos pa dang/ khro bas 'bar ba'i mig gis dge bsnyen de la lta zhing brnyas pa dang
397a7(mdo 'grel): bcas lag pa g.yon pas ston cing smras pa/ gan d+ha ra pa rmongs pa rnams de skad ma smra zhig /gal te lha ma yin gsod par dga' ba'i lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams mchod par bya ba ma yin na mchod par bya bar su zhig 'gyur/ /dge
397b1(mdo 'grel): bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang yon tan yang dag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ bram ze chen po ltos shig /gang zhig stobs ldan 'tshe ba rnams/ /gal te mchod byar de 'gyur na/ /dreng dang gzigs dang stag la yang/ /'gro ba rtag tu mchod par 'gyur/ /yon tan
397b2(mdo 'grel): skyon mkhas dam pa ni/ /su la yang ni 'dod mi byed/ /dreng la sogs pa'i gdug pa rnams/ /yon tan med la mchod mi byed/ /mi tshe la sogs yon tan yin/ /'tshe sogs skyon du shes par bya/ /yon tan skyon rnams mi shes pas/ /skyon ni yon tan dag
397b3(mdo 'grel): tu shes/ /gang gis shin tu drag po'i las/ /'jig rten byis pas mchod nas su/ /mchod pa'i yul las mi mkhas pas/ /de nyid la ni mchod byar shes/ /gan d+ha ra pa ni nges par yang/ /skyon dang yon tan rtog dang ldan/ /des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
397b4(mdo 'grel): la/ /dad kyis lha chen sogs la min/ /bram zes smras pa/ /kye gan d+ha ra pa re zhig sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di su zhig yin/ /dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rigs su legs 'khrungs pa/ /kun mkhyen nyes pa kun las rgyal/ /sems can kun
397b5(mdo 'grel): la phan bzhed pa/ /drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yin/ /bram zes smras pa/ gal te sangs rgyas drang srong chen po yin par shes na gzhan la gnod pa byed pa de mchod par bya ba ma yin par smra ba 'am/ 'di na 'pho ba dang/ me 'bar ba dang/ rgyas pa dang gnas
397b6(mdo 'grel): 'jog dang/ rgyun shes dang/ phur bu gsum pa dang/ rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyi dmod pa 'debs so/ zhes 'jig rten na grags so/ /gal te sangs rgyas de drang srong chen por gyur na nges par des kyang dmod pa 'debs par
397b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /dge bsnyen gyis rna ba bkag nas smras pa/ sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dmod pa 'debs par mi mdzad do/ /bram zes smras pa/ sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig ces 'dir ci'i phyir smra/ gal te sangs rgyas dmod pa
398a1(mdo 'grel): 'debs par mdzad na ni/ /de yang dag par 'tshe ba can du 'gyur ro/ /'on te su la yang dmod pa mi 'debs na sangs rgyas 'di la mthu ci yang med do/ /de nas bram ze de dag rnams kyis gnyi ka ltar 'gal ba'i tshig gis gan d+ha ra pa
398a2(mdo 'grel): khyad par du bsad nas gsang mthon pos brgyad par brtsams so/ /dge bsnyen des ma 'khrul ba nyid du smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po mi mnga' ba yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang dmod pa'i rgyu dang bral bas gang la yang dmod pa
398a3(mdo 'grel): mi mdzad do/ /bram ze chen po ltos shig /chags can gang la kun tu chags/ /de dang bral na de khros te/ /bya dang bya min rnam rmongs pa/ /phyin nas dmod pa gtong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags bral/ /rmongs pa dang bral khro las
398a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal/ /sems can thams cad phan mdzad na/ /de ni dmod pa ji ltar mdzad/ /de nas bram ze de rnams yid la bzung ba'i rgyu rnams rjes su dpog cing dge bsnyen de la smras pa/ kye gan d+ha ra pa gal te sangs rgyas dmod pa mi byed na/ /nges par phan
398a5(mdo 'grel): 'dogs par yang mi byed do/ /dmod pa dang/ phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa dang bral na ni/ /drang srong chen por yang mi 'gyur ro/ /dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dmod pa'i nus pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni de ltar bden mod? kyi/ /
398a6(mdo 'grel): 'on kyang phan 'dogs par spyod pa nyid yin te/ khyed rnams kyang ltos shig /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal la sngar bas/ /de ni dmod pa mi mdzad kyi/ 'jig rten phan 'dogs brtson pas na/ phan par yang ni mdzad pa yin/ /rga nad 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/
398a7(mdo 'grel): ngang gis 'jig rten sdug bsngal na/ /rma la lan tshwa ji bzhin du/ /mkhas pa su zhig dmod pa 'debs/ /de yang byams pa la gnas shing/ /rtag tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsil ba'i/ /chu yis 'jig rten
398b1(mdo 'grel): tshim par mdzad/ de nas bram ze de rnams yud tsam zhig mgo thur du smad nas bsams te/ dge bsnyen de la rjes dang bcas pa'i mig gdangs pas bltas te/ smras pa/ kye gan d+ha ra pa shin tu brtags pa'i gnas red nas khyod kyis rab tu dad pas bdag cag ngo
398b2(mdo 'grel): mtshar du byas so/ /mang du smras pas ci zhig bya ste/ gan d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni don phyin ci ma log par grags pa yin te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ go zhes bya bas ru bshad/ /sa de gang zhig yang dag 'dzin/ /skyes bu dam pa de rnams ni/ /dam pas
398b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ces bshad do/ /ci'i phyir na sa 'di ni/ khyed cag rnams kyis 'dzin mi byed/ /gang phyir khyed kyi yon tan bsngags/ /mgon po sangs rgyas la rten yin/ /de nas dge bsnyen nges bram ze rnams kyi sems snod du rung bar byas par shes te/
398b4(mdo 'grel): nga ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bshad pa'i dus yin no snyam nas/ yang dag par dga' ba'i gzhin gyis gzed bstod de smras pa?  gang khyod rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes par gyur pas bdag ni mchog tu yang dga' ba skyes par
398b5(mdo 'grel): gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dad pa 'di nyid 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir yon tan dang skyon gyis mtshan nyid rjes su dran par bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang tshe 'gro ba yon tan rab rtog tshe/ /rgyal ba yon tan rgya mtsho gcig pur mthong/ /zhi dang dga' ba skyes
398b6(mdo 'grel): par gyur mod kyi/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab kyis/ /sangs rgyas dang mnyam gang na'ang yod ma yin/ /dper na ri rab mnyam pa'i ri ni med/ /rgya mtsho mnyam pa'i mtsho ni yod ma yin/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas dang mnyam sa stengs sam//
398b7(mdo 'grel): mkha' la lus can mchog de yod ma yin/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog des ni gang phyir dal bas dka' bar ma zhugs ci zhig yod/ /thub pas phan pa'i don du lan mang dgongs te ma gzigs de ni gang zhig yod/ /de la skyabs song drang srong des ni phan
399a1(mdo 'grel): gdags ma byas de ni gang zhig yod/ /'di na nges gsungs lam la rab gnas nyon mongs dgras bcom de ni su zhig yod/ /mu stegs kun las rgyal te bde bar gshegs shes yon tan rnam rgyas dri med grags pa'i kha bye gzhan su
399a2(mdo 'grel): yod/ /phug na seng ge lta bur lha yul sa stengs dag na 'jigs med rang gis gsung mchog sgrogs pa gzhan su yod/ /rtag tu yid 'ong gsung gis las dang nyon mongs dag gis gnas skabs rjes su ston pa mdzad pa'ang gzhan su yod/ /gang
399a3(mdo 'grel): gi mchod rten mkha' la sprin dkar lta bur 'gro ba yang dag brgyan pa 'ga' yang 'di na yod ma yin/ /de nas bram ze de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos pa dang/ sangs rgyas la mngon par dad par gyur to/ /'dis
399a4(mdo 'grel): ci zhig ston pa ston pa yin zhe na/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thos pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dang par shes pas/ drang? pa la ni gzhan rnams kyang yang dag par gzhug par bya'o/ /zhes nye bar ston pa'i mdo brtsams pa yin no/ /
399a5(mdo 'grel): de yang dge slong dag khyed rnams kyis rjes su brtse ba dang gang snying brtse bar bya'o/ /zhes rgya cher gsungs pa'i phyir te/ sangs rgyas mchog la gsungs pa'i phan yon gyi mdo sde dag la yang nye bar sbyar bar bya'o/ /gus par byas te chos
399a6(mdo 'grel): nyan pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /yang 'dis ci zhig ston ce na/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thos pa don gzhan la mngon par zhen pa'i bram ze rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dang par 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thos pas
399a7(mdo 'grel): rna dkrugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ khyed rnams sangs rgyas kyis yon tan thos pas dang pa rnam par 'phel bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur te/ de bas na sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dag gi bsngags pa mnyan par shin tu 'dod
399b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i khyim na gnas pa dang/ rab tu byung ba khyed rnams kyis ma yengs par mnyan par bya'o zhes 'di ni yang dag par skul bar byed pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi dpe de dang po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA sh+rI b+ha dra dang/
399b2(mdo 'grel): lo tsA ba bande tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur cing/ dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos nas zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ a sho ka mu kha nA ga bi na ya pa ri ts+tsha da/ bod skad du/ mya ngan med pa'i sgo nas klu btul
399b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i le'u'o/ /'di ltar rjes su thos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na/ grong khyer pa ta li bu trar rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba 'khor lo sgyur pa'i rgyal po bzhi cha la dbang byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /des nor gyi don
399b4(mdo 'grel): du tshod pa lnga brgya bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed song la rgya mtsho chen po nas rin po che sna tshogs pa long la shog cig /gang gi tshe de dag rim gyis song ste rgya mtsho chen por phyin nas/ rin po che dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ rdo rje dang/ bai DUrya dang/ shang
399b5(mdo 'grel): ka shi la dang/ byi ru la sogs pa rin po che'i tshogs du mas de dag gis gru yongs su bkang ste dzam+bu'i gling du phyogs te chas so/ /de dag log nas 'ongs pa na rgya mtsho'i dkyil du klus gru bcom nas/ de nas tshod pa de dag srog gi lhag ma 'ba' zhig dang grus
399b6(mdo 'grel): 'ongs te/ gang gi tshe rim gyis grong khyer pa ta li pu trar phyin pa dang/ rgyal po mya ngan med kyis chod pa rnams 'ongs so zhes thos so/ /de skad ces bya ste/ rtswa yi se me ni ngoms mi sreg /rgya mtsho chu yis ngoms pa med/ /'dir ni lha yul yid 'ong bas/ /'gro
399b7(mdo 'grel): rnams dbang drug ngoms pa med/ /ces bya ba yin pas de 'dod pa'i rgyus sems bskyed cing nor dum dgram pa'i gnas bya'o snyam du bsams te/ de nas des rdzing bu dang bcas pa'i bskyed mos tshal du gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ba dan dang rgyal
400a1(mdo 'grel): mtshan bsgreng ba/ bla bre dang/ gos kyis spras par yid du 'ong ba'i spos rnams ni gtul/ /gangs ltar bsil ba'i chus gang ba'i rdzing bu na shel lta bu'i phye ma dang ldan pa utpa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta dang/ puN+DA rI ka rnams kyis khebs
400a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ ngang pa dang/ khu byug dang/ rma bya dang/ ne tso dang/ ri skegs dang/ dur pa dang/ ka la pingka dang/ shang shang ti'u dang/ bya skad snyan pa sgrogs pas nyams dga' ba/ pi wang dang/ gling pu dang/ rdza rnga dang/ sgra bzangs dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ pa Ta ha
400a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ rnga bo che dang/ dung rnams rgyun tu brdung ba/ blon po dang/ grong mi dang/ ljongs kyi mi dang/ skye bo rnams ni 'dus/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer bu pa dang/ kun tu 'tsho ba la sogs pa ngo mtshar gyis 'dus te/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai
400a4(mdo 'grel): DUrya dang/ shang ka shi la dang/ byu ru dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ mu sa la gar ba dang/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ mthon ka chen po la sogs pa'i rin po che'i bye brag rnams blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po nor dgram sar 'dug ste tshong pa lnga brgya po
400a5(mdo 'grel): de dag kyang rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang/ thams cad stod g.yogs gcig pu dang ldan zhing gcer bur gnas so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur/ tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gru bcom pas 'di ltar gyur
400a6(mdo 'grel): to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis gru bcom par gyur/ /tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/ ba tshwa can gyi rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klus bcom lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ /tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di
400a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su btsal du gsol/ /gal te tshol bar mi mdzad na/ phyis nas yang tshong pa 'ga' yang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe 'khor de na dge slong dbang po zhes bya ba bsod nams che ba zhig yod de/ de rgyal po dang ha cang
400b1(mdo 'grel): yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa dbang po la smras pa/ slob dpon bdag gis 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dbang pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po zangs ma'i byang bu la yi ge bris la rgya mtshor rdzongs shig /ci tsam
400b2(mdo 'grel): na rgyal pos zangs ma la spring yig tu bris te smras pa/ sa 'di rgya mtshos gtugs pa skyong/ /rgyal po stobs ldan mya ngan med/ /rab tu drag cing btsan pa yis/ /nor khyer mtshor gnas gang yin pa/ /de dag 'dir ni myur pa ru/ /nga yi drung du bskyal bar
400b3(mdo 'grel): bgyi?/ zhes yi ger bris te/ zangs ma'i byang bu rgya mtshor bskyur ro/ /de nas klu ma rangs nas/ rgya mtsho nas slar 'dzam+bu'i gling du bskyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po'i pho nyas zangs ma'i byang bu de blangs nas slar pa ta li pu trar 'ongs te/ rgyal po la skabs de bsnyad pa dang/
400b4(mdo 'grel): de nas rgyal po mya ngan med sems khong du chud nas mtshan mo stan gyi stengs su nyal te/ ji ltar 'di la bsgrub par bya snyam du sems so/ /de nas nam mkha' i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas rgyal po la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal ma byed cig /'jig rten gsum
400b5(mdo 'grel): mchog lha mis mchod/ /stobs phyug chu srin rgyal mtshan can/ /mthar byed bde gshegs sku gdung la/ /mchod pa rnams kyis rab mchod kyis/ /de rjes khyod kyis dgong 'grub 'gyur/ /lha gnyis pas smras pa/ gang zhig bya min rgyal chen mya ngan ma mdzad
400b6(mdo 'grel): par/ /sngags dang rigs sngags sman sbyor ma bgyid par/ /mi dbang dbang du bya bar nus 'gyur ba/ /bde gshegs bstan la lhag mar gus pa yis/ /de yis klu rgyal gang yin dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas zhag gnyis pa la rgyal po mya ngan med skra
400b7(mdo 'grel): bkrus te/ /gos dkar po bgos nas dri dang/ me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa rnams thogs nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /phyogs mtshams mkha' bzhugs rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /shar gyi phyogs dang gzhan bzhugs la/ /bdag ni gsol 'debs spyan 'dren
401a1(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /bdag la thugs rjes gzung du gsol/ /rgyal pos de skad ces smras ma thag tu shar phyogs dang/ /lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs rnams nas dgra bcom pa stong phrag drug cu byon zhing 'dus par gyur to/ /
401a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal pos me tog dang/ spos dang/ dri dang/ byug pa rnams thogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nad pa dang ni rgas dang sdug phongs gzhan yang 'chi gzigs
401a3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /rgyal bas yul dang 'byor pa btsun mo'i 'khor dang nye du spangs/ /sa bdag zas gtsang drung gshegs bskrad nas rgyal po'i dpal spangs pa/ /bcom ldan de la bdag gus dang bas de yi sku gdung mchod/ /gang gi stobs kyis bdud
401a4(mdo 'grel): ni shin tu stobs ldan blta bar dka' rnams bcom/ /gang gi bA ra Na ser 'khor lo legs bskor srid spang zhi bar mdzad/ /gang gis lnga sde skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdung 'chi ba bkrol/ /shAkya thub de'i sku gdung dpe med 'di la bdag gis
401a5(mdo 'grel): yang dag mchod/ /gang zhig gang du mya ngan 'das gshegs 'dir ni mar me 'gags pa bzhin/ /glang po stong stobs las lhag de ni mi rtag stobs kyis phye mar brlag /sa bdag mchog gis cha brgyad mnyam bgos sku gdung yang dag
401a6(mdo 'grel): mchod gyur pa/ /de yi sku gdung dpe med 'di ni 'jig rten mkhas pas yang dag mchod/ /de nas dge slong gis dge 'dun la gdugs tshod drangs nas mchod do/ /de nas rgyal pas tshe dang ldan pa dbang po la smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig mchog tu
401a7(mdo 'grel): bsgrub par bgyi tshe dang ldan pa dbang pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dang ni khyod kyi gzugs gnyis pa klu'i gzugs te/ sku gzugs legs pa gnyis mdzod la gser gyi snod chen po byas pa'i nang du de gnyis stsol cig dang de las mngon
401b1(mdo 'grel): sum du gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byas te/ phyis rgyal pos bltas pa dang/ klu'i gzugs 'dug pa la rgyal po'i gzugs phyag byed pa rgyal pos mthong ngo/ /rgyal po yid la gcags par gyur pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dbang pos smras pa dang/ rgyal po
401b2(mdo 'grel): chen po dus 'dir yang dang yang du nyi ma re re la khyad par gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ dri dang/ spos dang/ byug pa rnams kyis mchod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang rang gi lag nas
401b3(mdo 'grel): bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams tshim par bstabs shing rgya cher mchod par byas te/ chos kyang gus par mnyan pa de lta de ltar rgyal po'i gzugs langs pa la klu'i gzugs phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /yang de'i rdzas la klu'i gzugs de yan lag thams cad
401b4(mdo 'grel): kyis rgyal po'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa mthong bas de rgyal po yid rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa dbang po la smras pa/ kye ma dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i/ 'bras bu ci 'dra 'di la gzigs/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas
401b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i klu/ bdag gis btul zhing 'di dbang bgyis/ /blo gros chung ba'i mi rnams kyang/ /su zhig sangs rgyas mchod mi bgyid/ /gang zhig 'bras bu phral bskyed la/ /su zhig yid kyis sems mi bgyid/ /bdag nyid che ba 'thob 'dod pa'i/ /lha rnams
401b6(mdo 'grel): dang ni mi rnams kyis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag mchod/ /skye ba zad cing yang sred med/ /slob dpon dbang pos skabs la bab par shes nas smras pa/ rgyal po'i chen po zangs ma'i yi ge yang da spring ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos yang zangs ma'i
401b7(mdo 'grel): yi ge de skur nas btang ngo/ /de rgya mtshor bskyur ba dang/ /klu'i rgyal pos yi ge de spyi bos blangs so/ /de nas rgyal po la lan mang du lha tshong ba de dag 'dir rdzongs shig /so so'i rin po che gang lags pa skur la slar brdzang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ de
402a1(mdo 'grel): nas rgyal po'i pho nya slar 'ongs nas rgyal po la phrin de smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos tshong pa bos nas smras pa/ khyed cag song la so so'i rin po che gang yin pa long la slar shog cig /de nas gnas brtan dbang pos
402a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po la brgyad pa chos kyi rgyal po la sa rdul ngan pa 'bul bar byed pa yin mod/ de nas rgyal pos gnas brtan dbang po la smras pa/ slob dpon 'o na ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ gnas brtan dbang pos smras pa/ khyod la chad pa yin gyis
402a3(mdo 'grel): rang gi phrag pa la khur la 'dir skyol cig ces zangs ma la yi ge slar btang bar gyis shig /de nas rgyal pos spring yig du bris pa/ dzam+bu'i gling gi dbang phyug dam pa'i bka' bcag pa'i chad par rang gi phrag par khur la
402a4(mdo 'grel): skyol cig ces yi ge btang ba dang/ yi ge bklags ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po skrag par gyur nas smras pa/ lha de lta lags na gdugs bdun na 'tshal mchi'o/ /de rgyal pos thos pa dang/ ba ta li pu tra'i grong khyer thams cad du dril
402a5(mdo 'grel): bsgags te/ gang zhig grong khyer 'di na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang bud med bsod nams kyi khyad par dang/ rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'dod pa dag zhag bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang du shog cig /de nas rgyal pos
402a6(mdo 'grel): zhag bdun pa la grong khyer pa rnams dang/ blon po dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs kyi mis yongs su gang bar bskor te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ mthu chen po dang 'byor pa chen pos 'khor gyi khyams su song nas seng ge'i khri
402a7(mdo 'grel): la 'dug go /de nas klu'i rgyal po klu du mas yongs su bskor nas mi'i cha byad du sprul te/ rang rang gi phrag pa la rin po che'i khur thogs nas rgyal po chen po mya ngan med ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khur rnams phog nas rkang pa gnyis
402b1(mdo 'grel): phyag byas so/ /skye bo'i tshigs chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo zhes ca co'i sgra bsgrags te 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /'di 'dra'i bsod nams stobs kyis ni/ /rgyal po yongs su gzung bar gyur/ /skye bo rnams ni ngo mtshar skyes lha
402b2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang ni 'di ru yang/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa yis/ /bsod nams gang yin zhes bya ba/ /'di lta'i bye brag su me bsgrub/ /bsam du med pa'ang gang bsams pa/ /don de 'bad pa med pa ru/ /mi rnams la ni 'bras bur smin/ /rkang thang
402b3(mdo 'grel): glang chen myos pa dang/ /rta dang shing rtas rgya mtsho na/ /gnas pa'i klu dang lhan cig g.yul/ /stobs chen sna tshogs mtshon chas min/ /sdug bsngal mgo bo'i gdengs ka can/ /bsod nams rang bzhin 'di 'dra ba'i/ /zhags pa yi ni des bcings nas/
402b4(mdo 'grel): mya ngan med rgyal zhal mthong ba/ /bka' drin bsams pas rjes mthun 'jug /des kyang de dag sna tshogs pa'i bka' bas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' i yon tan rjes su brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /
402b5(mdo 'grel): bsod nams me yis mi tshig ste/ /rlung gi 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams chu yis 'ju mi 'gyur/ /sa bzhin du ni khyer mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/ /dpog tu med par bsod nams gnas/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med kyis//
402b6(mdo 'grel): dbrog par nus pa ma yin no/ /bsod nams bde ba skyed par gter/ /'dir ni lus par ma 'gyur te/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa ru/ /de dang der ni rjes su 'brang/ /da nas blon po gzhan zhig ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad ces smas so/ /yongs su
402b7(mdo 'grel): bskor ba'i 'khor dbus na/ /bsod nams rgyan gyi rgyal po mdzes/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /ston ka yi ni zla ba bzhin/ /chu dang mkha' la 'gro ba'i rlung/ /bsod nams kyis ni nges pham byas/ /sa la gnas pa'i dgra yi
403a1(mdo 'grel): tshogs/ /bsod nams kyis ni zad par byed/ /ji ltar yid la bsams pa yis/ /bde ba bsod nams kyis thob byed/ /bsod nams 'di ni bsags pa ru/ /sems dang ldan pa su mi byed/ /spangs pas grub ces bya ba'i blon pos smras pa/
403a2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /bsod nams 'di ni dag byed yin/ /bsod nams des la 'bar stegs te/ /mtho ris su ni 'gro ba'i lam/ /mi rnams bde rol bsod nams yin/ /bsod nams rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi/ /mya ngan 'das par
403a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i lam/ /yang blon po gsum pa gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bsod nams kyis ni khyod kyi bzhin/ /zla ba dangs pa shar dang mtshungs/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs pa yang/ /bsod nams kyis ni gtor ma mchis/ /yid du 'ong ba thob byed pas/ /bsod
403a4(mdo 'grel): nams 'gro bas phyag byas 'os/ /bsod nams yang dag bsags pa la/ /'bad par mi rnams su byed pa/ /bsod nams kyis rgyal skyes bu ni/ /rta mis ma yin glang pos min/ shing rtas bsod nams las rgyal min/ /mnga' dang ral gris ma yin no/ /
403a5(mdo 'grel): nor rnams dang ni yal dang ni/ /g.yal gyis bsod nams las rgyal min/ /bsod nams kyis ni rgyal ba la/ /rigs dang stobs dang gzugs kyis min/ /bsod nams kyis 'phags mi rnams kyi/ /sa rnams gsum gyi steng na gnas/ /bsod nams mi
403a6(mdo 'grel): rnams gnas yin te/ /bsod nams thar ba thob byed mchog /bsod nams 'jig rten grags byed yin/ /de phyir bla med bsod nams btsal/ /mtho ris thob byed ngan song spong/ /mi yis rtag tu brten bya ste/ /mkhas pas bsod nams bya ba yin/ /de
403a7(mdo 'grel): nas rgyal pos tshor ba de dag rnams la smras pa/ khyed rang rang gi rin po che rnams khyer cig /de nas de dag gis blangs nas rgyal po la rab tu bstabs te/ gzhan yang lha'i sbyor bas 'gas kyis/ /lha 'di dag legs par snoms shig /rgyal pos
403b1(mdo 'grel): smras bkab dag la cung zad kyang dgos pa med kyis khyer la song la the tshom med par longs spyod cig /de nas rgyal pos rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis dkon mchog la bstod pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o bstan pa phun sum
403b2(mdo 'grel): tshogs/ /sa rdul snyim gang phul ba yis/ /rnam par smin pa 'di 'dra thob/ /de nas rgyal pos yang smras pa/ /ding 'dir klu ni bdag dbang gyur/ /thub chen khyod kyis bka' drin las/ /legs spyod rgyal po bdag bgyid pa/ /bdag gis skye ba 'bras bcas lags/ /
403b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan mchog ldan thub pa yi/ /bstan mchog 'di la su mi 'jug /dper na sa bon rdul btab pas/ /'bras bu chen po skyed byed na/ /rin chen phul ba smos ci 'tshal/ /de nas klu chos la sbyar nas slar song ngo/ /mya ngan med pa'i sgo nas klu btul ba'i le'u
403b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gnas brtan a dzi ta sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur pa// //gnas brtan spyan drang ba bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ s+tha bI ro pa ni man+t+ra
403b5(mdo 'grel): na bod skad du/ gnas brtan spyan drang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ /dgongs nas kyang shel dang/ nor bu dang/ dngul dang/ ku mu ta dang/ kha ba'i phung po dang/ zla ba'i 'od zer dang/ ston gyi chu
403b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /nam mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa lag ltar dri ma med par mdzod la/ rlung gi stobs kyis shing gi lcug phran bskyod pa dang/ smig rgyu dang/ sgyu ma dang/ rmi lam dang/ glog dang/ rta'i shing rta'i rdul dang/ ba glang gi phru gu'i rna mchog dang/ sprul gyi lce dang/ zil
403b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rgya mtsho bskyod pa'i rlabs ltar g.yo ba'i yid/ skad cig re re la yang mi sdod par 'gro ba/ rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yud tsam zhig rgyu ba nang du dgag tu gsol/ /smras pa/ ri gzar 'bab pa'i dpa' rlabs gyur pas kyang/ /gang
404a1(mdo 'grel): gis dpa' rlabs 'gyur la bsgrun med par/ /'jigs pa thogs med g.yo ba'i yid de ni/ /yud tsam rtse gcig mdzod cig btsun pa rnams/ /lha yi bu mo yi chad shugs phyung skad cig zim mer byas pa'i mig /ring zhing gzir ldan bkra la
404a2(mdo 'grel): 'ong 'tsher mig chags lta ba g.yo ba yis/ /gang gi thugs ni skye ba rgyun gcod rgyu las 'khrugs par ma gyur pa/ /bdud kyang 'joms mkhas gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa de la phyag mdzod cig /skye ldan gang du brten nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas
404a3(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal gzhi dang/ /yi dwags 'jig rten gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur sdug bsngal 'jigs byed pa/ /'khor ba gang na 'gro ba chen po rnams kyi grogs gyur 'phags gcig po/ /zhi bde grong khyer sgor gzhol de la shin tu gus pas/
404a4(mdo 'grel): brten par mdzod/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid gang zhig bde gshegs gsung rab mthar phyin 'byung smra zhing/ /gang la gus? par cung zad tsam zhig byon yang sbyin pa 'phel gyur la/ /ye shes snang bas mun pa zad byas dge slong dge 'dun de la ni/ nyon mongs
404a5(mdo 'grel): gcad pa'i ched du thams cad kyis kyang gus par phyag mdzod cig /lcang lo chun pa'i skra mang mgo la thogs shing dpung mgo gnyis g.yogs la/ /rang gi 'od zer phyogs mthar 'phro ba rnams kyis 'jig rten kun 'gengs pa/ /lha dbang rgya byin
404a6(mdo 'grel): cod pan btud de tshangs la phyag byas gang yin de/ byin nas dga' byas sems kyi ting 'dzin shin tu chen po'i 'bras bu yin/ /rdo rje 'od 'phro phreng bas dpung rgyan 'dres nas mdzes gyur cing/ /lha la bka' stsol dbang po mtho ris skyong ba gang yin
404a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de dag dge ba dag 'byung rnam smin 'gyur dus nyams dga' zhing/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu rnams yin/ /kha nas rgyags 'gyur dri zhim 'byung zhig mig gi mdza' dmar la/ /dbugs 'byung ngo shar g.yos pas
404b1(mdo 'grel): nu ma 'bur la 'drung byed pa/ /sdug gu lhan cig nor bdag dga' tshal 'dug pa gang yin pa/ /de yang 'gro ba nyams dga' sbyin pa'i bdag nyid chen po yin/ /'brug sgra sgrog cing sprin rnams chu ni kun tu len byed pa/ /rlabs 'byung dus na nor bu byu ru dang nya phyis 'byung/ /rin
404b2(mdo 'grel): chen gnas ni chu lha nyid kyi 'byor pas gang bsrung ba/ /der yang rgyu ni sbyin pa mchog ces thub pas bka' stsal to/ /gang yang 'od zer rnams kyis mkha' la skar ma'i 'khor lo zil mnan cing/ /ku mu ta yi rdzings yangs rnams su dpal ni rab tu rnam phye nas/ /glang
404b3(mdo 'grel): po'i mche pa'i dpal dang ldan zhing mtshan mo shin tu rab mdzes pa/ /de yang nges par sbyin pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ro bro mang po yin/ /ri rab rtse la shing ltas lam kha 'dug pa'i rin chen rdo gcog cing/ /rta yi rkang lag rnams kyis dgu tshigs chu bo rlabs ni gcod byed la//
404b4(mdo 'grel): mun pa bsal phyir nyi mas skar ma zil mnan lha ma me gang yin pa/ /de rgyu yid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa'i sbyin par thub pas gsungs/ /rgyal mtshan rtse btags rin chen 'od zer snang bas nam mkha' dmar gyur cing/ /rta rmig 'dor bas mkha' la sprin gyi
404b5(mdo 'grel): phreng ba dag kyang 'dral byed la/ /rnga yab dkar pos g.yabs shing 'khor los sgyur pa song ba gang yin pa/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu de yang sbyin pas bsgrubs shes thub pas bka' stsal to/ /gser gyi pad+ma'i rdul gyi bye mas dmar bris tshon ni khrus byas te/ /de yi
404b6(mdo 'grel): nags 'dab bud ba sgra 'byin rnams su nyal pa'i bde rnyed nas/ /rigs 'dzin chud ma lhan cig 'jigs med mkha' las 'gro ba gang yin pa/ /de yang ser na 'dzil zhing skyon med dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i gzi brjid yin/ /ma la ya yi ri rtse tsan dan grib
404b7(mdo 'grel): mas bsil bas yangs pa dang/ 'bigs byed ri dang gangs dang lhan po'i ri dang manda ra yi ri bo la/ /grub pa'i tshogs chen chud ma lhan cig 'jigs bral dga' ba gang yin pa/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di'i snying po 'byor ba de yang gtor? bas yin/ /bud med rkang
405a1(mdo 'grel): gdung 'khrol bas 'grogs nas 'phur ba'i phug ron gnas pa yis/ /khang pa mthon po rnams dang 'bigs byed ri rtse 'gron pa'i ban glad dang/ gdugs dang rnga yab bud med g.yog 'khor rin chen gser dang rta rnams dang/ bzang
405a2(mdo 'grel): mdzes de dag kun kyang sngon gyi sbyin pa'i dag ba'i rnam smin yin/ /ban du ka ltar rtsa dmar rgun chad gser snod bzang por legs blugs pa/ /yongs dag a mra smin ltar dri zhim utpal 'gying zhing ldem/ /na chung zhim ba sna sgog dus kyis stobs shing
405a3(mdo 'grel): yams grangs mang 'drim pa/ /mchog tu dge ba de rgyu sbyin pa yin zhes blo gros dag pas gsungs/ /gser gyi phag skas rked ba chings snyan smra 'jam zhing smin ma ya gcig bskyod/ /mig yangs rnar thug dkar nag 'byes la skra bgab me tog phreng
405a4(mdo 'grel): dkrigs pa'i/ /na chung bzang mo brla rgyas bdag nyid legs byas rnams kyis bran ltar byed/ /tshogs bsags 'bras de sbyin pa'i che ba nyid ces zas gced sras pos gsungs/ /de lta lags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mdza' dag
405a5(mdo 'grel): thugs su chud pa/ shin tu sbas pa'i chu ltar gyur pa/ snying dri ma med pa dang/ lha'i skye bo dang klu'i gnas su gyur pa/ tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin zhing rgya che ba'i chu dang ldan pa/ dge ba la rnam par rtogs pa'i zla ba shar ba'i dbang gis/ ting nge 'dzin
405a6(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs rgyas pa'i dus kyi rlabs kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag la skyon med pa'i nor bu mang po kun tu g.yengs pa/ sems kyi 'og gzhi la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ri bo chen po brten pa/ /'bras bu'i bye brag thob pa/ gang zag
405a7(mdo 'grel): chen po'i chu srin rgyu ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i shing ljon pas mdzas par byas pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dogs dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa'i ro mi gnas pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan goms
405b1(mdo 'grel): pa dag pa'i mu tig gi nya phyis kyi kha dog lus dang ldan pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid gting mi dpogs shing zab pa/ rgyun mi 'chad par klog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa'i sgra rgya cher 'byung ba/ 'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rgya mtsho chen po la
405b2(mdo 'grel): bdag gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste srid pa'i 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa du ma nas dge ba'i sa bon btab pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa/ gzhal med khang gi sa gzhi gcig par gyur pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa dang byams pa dang
405b3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims dang thos pa dang zhi ba'i gnas bdag dang gzhan gyis gzhung gi don gyi de kho na/ ma lus par rtogs pa/ yongs su shes bas bsgoms pas dran pa nye bar gnas pa yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong bas log par lta ba'i rab rib bsal ba//
405b4(mdo 'grel): legs par brjod cing shis la rgya che ba'i mig dang ldan pa/ skye bo bla ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ sngon du smra ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i tshul bzang po dang ldan zhing/ mdong sol che bas snyan ba rnams bskyed pa/ ston gyi zla ba nya ba'i
405b5(mdo 'grel): 'od zer dag pa lta bu'i yid 'byung ba/ sbyin bdag chen po che ba'i bdag nyid can ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di ni/ khyim bdag legs sbyin dang/ bzang ldan dang/ btsun mo 'khor gyi bla dang/ mu shil dang/ tra pus dang/ go shi la dang/ ta pa kar ni ka dang
405b6(mdo 'grel): mgon med zas sbyin dang/ drag po dang/ nag po dang/ nam gru la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la yid la mngon par dad pa/ gsal rgyal dang/ tshangs bas sbyin dang/ rgyal po shar pa'i bu dang/ gtum po rab snang la sogs
405b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i steng la dbang ba'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i legs pa spyad pa'i rjes su slob ste/ lus dang longs spyod srog la/ sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ mgal me bskor ba dang/ rmi lam dang ri'i 'bab chu ltar g.yo bar reg nas stobs
406a1(mdo 'grel): bcu mngal bas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ chos mngon pa dang/ 'dul ba dang/ mdo sde 'dzin cing/ dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes bsod nams kyi sa bon bskyed pa'i rgyu 'khor ba'i dge ba
406a2(mdo 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi/ skye bo ngan pas rnyed par dka' ba ser sna can gyi yid 'joms pa sgrub pa na ston gyi zla ba dri ma med  pa ltar dang ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ srid pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen po/ grags
406a3(mdo 'grel): pa 'jig rten gsum du khyab pa/ bdud kyi bu mo steg pa rgyun gcod pa'i rgyu/ skyabs su 'os pa chos ston pa/ 'gro ba la dge ba'i bye dka' ba'i phran las rnams kyis/ chos thams cad thugs su chud bas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i/ sangs
406a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gsal bas reg nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa ltar ring zhing rdzi ma legs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu chen pos zhabs kyi ser mo kun tu bskor ba/ gser gyin chod sdong
406a5(mdo 'grel): ltar gsal ba/ sku la rdo rje dang/ lcags kyu dang/ pad+ma dang/ nya dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyi mtshan mnga' ba/ pad+ma'i 'byung gnas rnams la/ snang mdzad kyi 'od kyi phreng ba/ bye brag med par
406a6(mdo 'grel): khyab pa rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bung ba'i tshogs ltar sngo ba'i gtsug tor gyi nang nas kun tu byung ba'i 'od kyi dra bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus par bkra bar byas pa/ kha na ma tho ba med par bzhugs pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ston pa/ zhi
406a7(mdo 'grel): bar gzhol ba'i lam du 'dren pa/ 'jig rten sgrol ba mnyes gshin pa/ gnyen gcig bu/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i sgrol ba rnams kyis gsung dang dpa' ba dang/ mthu la mi gnod pa gtsang ma'i sras yul rnams kun la/ sred pa 'byung
406b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyun skams byed pa'i rgyu/ skye bo mkhas ba rnams ni sad bar bya phyir shar gyur pa/ /bag la nyal gyi rab rib sel ba ye shes snang ba'i mchog /sa rnams mdza' dag snang ba phyogs rnams thams cad snang mdzad pa/ /phyag dang zhabs dang dbu ni rab tu byin zhing
406b2(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims dang/ /smon lam dag gis byang chub lam bzang yang dag bsgrubs gyur pa/ srid pa'i 'gro ba'i dug gi snye mi'i steng du lhung ba yis/ /skye dgu rnams la kha na ma tho med pa ston mdzad pa/ /srid pa rnam pa gsum 'jig pa/ bcom ldan 'das
406b3(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi mnga' ba/ dpa' ba dang/ mthu kha na ma tho ba med pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pas sku brjid pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang dka' ba brgya phyag dums dam pa'i chos dkon mchog
406b4(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs pa/ brtsal ba tsam gyis sems can mdza' dag gi bsams pa thugs su chud pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rab tu zhi ba dang/ tshul khrims dang thos pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang/ byams pa
406b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rab rib dang/ ling tog ma lus par bsal ba/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rig pa dang/ phyogs phyogs kyi gtsug lag khang dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang ri dang nags 'dab dang/ khrad khrod dang/ chu
406b6(mdo 'grel): dang ba ri sul dang/ gsher sa dang/ ne'u sing dang/ shing gi grib pa rnam pa sna tshogs la dgyes pa/ yul dang ljongs du ma la phan gdags par rtsol ba mdzad pa/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ dga' ba thob pa las ma nyams pa
406b7(mdo 'grel): phung po lnga spyir skad cig par yang dag par so sor rtog pa'i yid la byed pa bskyed pa/ mdo dang 'dul ba dang/ chos mngon pa dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/ gleng gzhi dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ rtogs pa brjod ba dang/ de lta bu byung ba dang /
407a1(mdo 'grel): gtan la dbab pa'i gtam gyis sems sbyangs pa/ rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa dran pa nye bar gnas par rgyu ba dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ bden pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam dang/ dran pa nye bar
407a2(mdo 'grel): bzhag pa goms pas dad pa thob pa la tshe rabs gzhan dang gzhan na bsags pa dge ba'i rnam par smin pas grub pa/ ji ltar 'byor par nus pa dang mthun pa'i rtsom pas tshogs bsags pa/ phan yon lnga'i rgyu sems can thams cad gnas
407a3(mdo 'grel): par byed pa/ 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba thob par byed pa/ kha dog dang ro dang dri dang reg pa dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang/ ldag pa dang/ rdub pa dang/ gzhib pa la sogs pa zhal zas bshams par bya
407a4(mdo 'grel): pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhal zas khyad par can gyis spyan 'dren to/ /de la thog mar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i tshe/ gang dag ye shes kyi mes nyon mongs pa'i shing thams cad ma lus par bsregs pa/
407a5(mdo 'grel): stong pa'i ngang las tshul can gyis sbyin pa'i sa bon 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur pa phra ba gzigs pa mkhas pa de kho na la bsgoms pa 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan pa ra d+ha dza bsod snyoms len dang/ 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang/ sbyin byed dang/ lam
407a6(mdo 'grel): brtan dang/ skyed byed dang/ gser be'u dang/ rtogs byed dang/ rdo rje can gyi bu dang/ 'phags pa bsrung ba'i klu dang/ klu sde la sogs pa slob ma bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnod par gyur kyang lus kyi khur khyer ba rnams dang/ gzhan
407a7(mdo 'grel): yang gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i skye po la phan pa'i phyir/ gser gyi rdo leb chen po'i steng na 'dug pa'i rig sngags 'chad du ma glu len pas glang po che yur la bung pa'i mchu pad+ma la 'jib cing 'khod pa'i man da ra ba'i rdzing gi chu dang
407b1(mdo 'grel): ?/ /ldan zhing yal ga gsal ba'i steng na rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba bris pa'i shing yongs 'dus kyis kun tu mdzes par byas pa'i ri'i lhun po 'bab chu 'bab pa'i sa gzhi la 'khod ba rnams dang/ yang gang dag gser gyi ri rkeng nas bsil
407b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i chu 'bab ba/ /chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan byung gyur cing/ zla ba'i 'od kyis ku mud kha phye ste/ /ku mud tshal na skad snyan ngang pa gnas/ /deng mo mtshe'? na sgra skad snyan pa 'byin/ /mtsho dogs rma bya dgar bcas rgyags pa gnas/ /rma bya rgyags sgras ri sul
407b3(mdo 'grel): snyan pa grags/ /ri sul yal ga glags bas ri rtse 'khrigs/ /ri rtse stong rnams na ni sbrin chags la/ /lang ling sbrin gyi sman ljongs khra khro snang/ /sman ljongs skyes pa'i nor bu ldum bu gsal/ /ldum bu las zul lhung ba'i me tog ldan/ me tog rgyas pa'i dpag
407b4(mdo 'grel): bsam shing tshal mdzes/ /mdzes pa'i lha mos gser gyi phag skad drung/ /gser gyi phag skas sgras ni bya 'drogs shis/ /byas 'chos shing tog rtsa las chad cing brul/ /rtsa 'phyang khu zags pa sbos kyi dri/ /spos glang dbang po 'dreg zag dri rab
407b5(mdo 'grel): zhim/ dri rab zhim pa'i li shi ri 'khor mang/ /bal glang mo rlags drag 'gro lang long gyur/ /bung ba'i khyu yis me tog zas gyur cing/ /yal ga me tog rgyas par gad ba dkar/ /gad pa chad pas nor bu'i dum bu snang/ /me tog mgo lcogs
407b6(mdo 'grel): brul bas rnam par bkra/ nor bu gsil ma mang pos ril gzhol spras/ /me tog chegs pa'i shing gis yal gar gnas pa'i dung ba dga' bas 'phur rnams dang/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dkar po dang ba lta bus nye 'khor rdo ba chag chag btab/ /lhun
407b7(mdo 'grel): po mtho ba'i ri la thub pa gang dag rab tu zhi ba'i thugs kyis bzhugs/ /de dag dri med zla ba 'dra'i grags ldan 'di yi sbyin pa'i gnas la brten du gsol/ /rgya mtsho'i nye ba'i chu 'gram ri bo ma la ya'i/ /ri ngos tha mal sbal mig mthon pa'i
408a1(mdo 'grel): phreng ba can/ /sbrul mang 'khrigs pa'i tsan dan shing gi nags tshal na/ /brtan pa gang dag bzhugs par gyur pa de dag dang/ /nyi ma'i rta yi rmig pas rdo bcag cing/ /mi 'am ci bu mo phrugs kyis nyams dga' la/ /ri sul mthon po
408a2(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam nags mang dang/ /ri sgab rnams na gang dag bzhugs pa dang/ /shing gi me tog 'brul bas dri zhim byas pa'i gser bu dang ldan zhing/ /nags na glang po dregs pa zag pas bsgoms pa'i rin chen 'khri shing khyim/ /khyim la chags
408a3(mdo 'grel): pa med pa'i lha yis brten pa'i bsod nams chu gling gi /gnya' shing 'dzin khri bya rgyags khyu gnas pa na gang dag bzhugs pa dang/ /ba lang mos bsnyogs snang ba rtsub 'gyur tshal/ /me tog ldan zhing bser bu ngad ldang ba/ /sa hya ri bo ngos rab yangs
408a4(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /yongs dag thugs mthar thub pa bzhugs dgu dang/ /pad+ma utpal rgyas pa 'byung ba'i gnas/ /nyin re nyi ma'i shing rtas rdos snad can/ /srid pa'i 'jigs bral rab tu yid 'ong ba/ /'char ba'i ri steng gang dag bzhugs pa dang/ /ri yi rtse mos
408a5(mdo 'grel): sngo bsangs sprin thal sman ljongs can/ /ngogs ldan chu bo mnad? ras ni ri sul bkrus/ /glang po'i che bas bsnyoms pas phyogs rlog pa'i ri/ /'bigs byed rma bya rgyags gnas ba na bzhugs dgu dang/ /sna tshogs 'byung gung tshon gyi kha bsgyur
408a6(mdo 'grel): phug dang ldan zhing sprin kyang chags gyur la/ /ko lpags ldan pa gtsang ma'i chu yi dogs kyi rdo ba mang po bkrus gyur cing/ ngos la ba lang mjug ma mang po dag gis 'chang zhing glog 'gyus snang byas pas yongs 'dus ri rtse phrag na gcig tu sred
408a7(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba gang dag bzhugs pa dang/ /yang gang dag shing dang 'khri shing dang 'khri shing rnam pa mang po 'dab chags sar gnas pa/ ne'u sid 'jam la sngo ba'i steng na rma bya'i khyu gar byed cing/ sgra snyan pa 'byin pa ri dags kyi tshor ?  ba g.yangs su
408b1(mdo 'grel): gnas ba'i sos bcad ba'i rtswa'i myu gu yod pa me tog dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i bser pu 'jam zhing bsil ba'i bad ldang pa'i nags 'dabs rnams su gnas bcas te bzhugs pa rnams dang/ yang gang dag dus su rlabs 'byung ba'i chu yi dpa' rlabs kyis
408b2(mdo 'grel): g.yengs pa'i na le zham dang li shi dang la ba la'i 'bras bu sngon po mang po 'khrigs pa'i tshal dang a ka ru'i shing khrod na gnas pa'i sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka gdengs shing 'jigs su rung ba yod pa/ glang po che drags pa dang bcas pa'i gnas byu ru'i
408b3(mdo 'grel): sdong bu bsgyel ba dang ldan zhing/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis reg pa'i dbang gis mu tig yod pa'i nya phyis kha bye ba'i thog mas rnam par spras pa nye bar 'bul ba dang ldan la nor bu mchog gi rdo la grub pa'i chung ma'i skye bo gnas shang bya'i khyung dga' ste sgra 'byin pas
408b4(mdo 'grel): glu len pa lta bu yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i gling dag na/ klu'i bdag po'i lus chen pos sku dkris te/ gdengs ka'i gdugs kyis nyi ma'i 'od zer bsgribs shing bsam gtan mdzad pa rnams dang/ sman ljongs dag na phyogs kyi glang chen brang gi rdo ba khebs pa'i khyu//
408b5(mdo 'grel): 'khor bcas lhan cig ma yin nga ngor gyur pa'i gnod sbyin mo dag gnas gyur la/ /klu yi rgyal po mgo bo bstod de kho nas 'od 'bar 'byung bas shing sreg cing/ /gangs ri ti se la ni blo gtsang gang dag zhal ston mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang/ /rgya mtsho'i
408b6(mdo 'grel): rlabs kyis bshal ba'i ri sgab ldan pa ma smad ba/ /ri bo man da ra la nyin phyed tshun chad bzhugs bzhugs shing/ /nyi ma phyed par gyur nas gang dag gzhan du bzhugs pa'i phyir/ /nor bus rtse mo bkram pa'i khor yug ri la brten pa dang/ gang dag 'khri shing
408b7(mdo 'grel): gzhon nus rdo ba khebs gyur pa'i/ /dbang chen rtse mo nyid du 'ong bar bder gnas te/ /mkha' lding shugs kyis nang du klu rnams dkrugs pa yi/ /rgya mtsho rin chen gnas la rnam par gzigs pa dang/ /dang pa'i tshogs can shin tu gtsang ba drag 'bab char gyi chu
409a1(mdo 'grel): yis ri sgab bkrus gyur cing/ /myogs kyi glang pos bsgyel ba'i sa la ki yis rdo pa chen po mang po khebs gyur pa/ /gcan gzan dbang po ral pa 'khyil cing gsal bas dpung pa'i phyogs 'bar nyal bas dgar gyur cing/ /sbal mig mthon
409a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i lcug mas 'khor bas grub pa ngal sos ri bo bkron dzar gang gshegs dang/ /gang dag mun bsal khyad par can gyi blo mnga' shing ljon sna tshogs me tog rgyas gyur cing/ /ri dags rgyu bas ne'u seng gzhon snad pa/ /gzi rngo nags rnams mi spong bzhugs
409a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /yang gang dag nub kyi ba lang spyod dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan dang/ gling gzhan dag na skyes pa'i lcug phran mdog snum zhing sngo la 'jam pa mang pos sa gzhi kun tu khebs pa/ /shing gi grib me'i dkyil 'khor
409a4(mdo 'grel): bsil ba dang/ 'khri shing gis 'khor cing/ ri dags mang po gnas pa'i nags tshal de dang de dag na bzhugs pa rnams dang/ yang gang dag dar da dang/ gan dar dang/ gu zan da li dang/ shi ri da dang/ ba le dang/ bri sha dang/ kha che'i yul dang/
409a5(mdo 'grel): rgya yul dang/ grong khyer zas 'dra dang/ rdo 'jog zas 'dra dang/ skyes pa'i grong khyer dang/ phyogs mtshams dang/ kun ti ma la ba dang/ srung byed dang/ grong khyer dang/ tsha thu ka dang/ tsha ta dang/ b+ha du skad tsha dang/ ko shAm ba'i dang/ ser skya'i gnas
409a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ mnyan yod dang/ mi thub pa dang/ grong khyer me tog dang/ ti? ra dang/ bcom rlag dang/ grong khyer longs spyod dang/ tsam pa kaM dang/ rgyal po'i khab dang/ dbang po'i brag phug dang/ 'brog dang/ ko na'i grong dang/ kun dga' i grong dang/ mchod
409a7(mdo 'grel): rten gyi grong dang/ 'khrur bcug gi grong dang/ yangs pa dang/ li kha ri shing 'phel ba dang/ 'phel byed dang/ zangs kyi g.yogs dang/ rdo snyogs 'dzin dang/ ko sa li dang/ an dra dang/ a long? ga dang/ bar ba dang/ nas gling dang/ sing ga
409b1(mdo 'grel): la'i gling dang/ ka la sha'i grong khyer dang/ gser gyis dang/ ha ri ka la dang/ bo ra sha ka ta ha dang/ na li ke ra dang/ phan sa'i gling dang/ shur pa dang/ ni? ma pa'i grong khyer dang/ dpal gyi shing dang/ dngul chu'i gnas la sogs pa/ yul dang/ cha byad dang/ ? ?
409b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ gnas pa dang/ cho ga dang/ rigs dang/ rus dang/ tshul khrims dang/ tshul khrims can du ma'i yul mi gnas pa'i yul gzhan dag na bzhugs pa rnams dang/ gang dag sngon chad nyi zla'i 'od kyis ma phog cing/ /she sha sprul gyi lus kyi 'obs gnas
409b3(mdo 'grel): ri'i drung/ /de yi gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyis mun bsal ba'i/ /sa 'og tu ni ring por mi thogs gshegs gyur dang/ /gang dag chu ltar sa la thogs med bye'u zul mdzad pa dang/ /gang dag sar gnas phyag gi rtse mos zla ba ?? mdzad dang/ /gang dag bya
409b4(mdo 'grel): ltar nam mkha' la ni shugs kyis rgyu mdzad cing/ /na bza' i tha mas sprin thang reg pas sprin ling 'jigs mdzad dang/ /gang dag lha dang klu dang grub pa dang/ /'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa'i ri 'jigs med dang/ bung ba'i ri dang/ chu srin
409b5(mdo 'grel): byis pa gsod kyi ri dang/ ri nag po dang/ gnas kyi ri dang/ ser skya'i ri dang/ me tog ri dang/ tsan dan gyi ri dang/ klu'i ri bo dang/ tsan dan gyi ri bo dang/ tsher ma'i ri bo dang/ lha yul babs dang/ a sa sim+b+ha dang/ /kun dga' stong ldan dang/ ri? bo'i
409b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal mtshan dang/ bzhi bkrus dang/ rang gi mchod rten dang/ sa lu spungs ldan dang/ pho brang 'khor dpal yon can dang/ bya rgod kyi phung po dang/ ri dags kyi gnas dang/ ka sho da dang/ gtsug lag khang gsar ka ni sa ka sha nyi la sogs pa cho
409b7(mdo 'grel): 'phrul rmad du byung ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams dang/ dar ma ra dzi ka'i mchod rten du ma dang/ sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan khri yod pa bsod nams su gyur pa'i sa phyogs rgyun ma 'chad par klog pa dang/ kha ton dang/ bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin
410a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'jug pa dag pa'i dgra bcom pa rnams bzhugs bzhugs pa/ chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang/ mal cha dang/ na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad dang/ mtshon cha rnams
410a2(mdo 'grel): kyis legs par byas pas/ mdza' mdza' na/ na'i chu'i gnas yod pa la nye bar spyod pas nyams dga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis bcags pas gtsang bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi can/ zhi ba thub pa'i skye bo gnas pa rnams na/ de kho na
410a3(mdo 'grel): bsgoms pas nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa/ tshe'i lhag ma gnas par mdzad pa rnams dang/ /gang dag glog 'gyu bya gar dag gis sku lus bkra byas sprin snum 'dra gyur nas/ /bkres pa'i sdug bsngal snod gyur mnga' rtse rnon po lta bu'i spu
410a4(mdo 'grel): yis rab gang zhing/ /bsgom pas mig zhu me stag bcas pa'i me rnams kyis ni kun nas lus bskor ba'i/ /yi dags gnam du lta ba rnams la thugs rjes steng nas char gyi rgyun 'bebs dang/ /rin chen bye ma'i phreng bas gya gyur dkrigs
410a5(mdo 'grel): mtho la/ /ngang khyu bag yangs gnas shing lang long nyal gyur cing/ /chu dang nye bas chu yi zegs mas bsil gyur pa/ /ma na sa yi mtsho gling bsam gtan mdzad dgu dang/ gang dag mi ro mang po'i sha dang khrag gi ro bro ba sa dga' bar
410a6(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i kha'o tshogs kyis gang bar gyur pa'i sa phyogs mgo'i thod pa gas nas tshil thigs zag pa'i snum gyis mched pa'i mes tshig cing/ rang gi me lces shing bcer bar skams shing rnyings pa'i lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ so dang/ skra'i dum

410b1(mdo 'grel): spyad ma bzad pa'i kha nas/ du ba dang bcas pa'i me lce 'byung ba'i dur ro khrod chen po dag na bud med kyi ro spos shing lto sgang der gyur pa'i steng na 'dug cing/ /dga' ba'i bya rgod kyi mchu dang/ sder mos lto 'brad cing lto'i nang nas srin bu'i rigs rnams gnas pa/ ce spyang gi
410b2(mdo 'grel): stobs kyi shugs kyis drangs pa'i nang grol dri mi zhim pa'i dum bus 'khor la/ bya khwa bkres pas mig gis sha brus pa dag la gzigs shing/ rtag tu mi sdug pa bsgoms te/ gang dag kha cig ro'i gnas mal dong nas ni/ /khrag dang sa chags
410b3(mdo 'grel): dmar zhing rtsub pa'i skra 'khyil dang/ /bya yi mchu dang sder mos rmig skog brus pa lnga/ /mi ro bor ba'i lus la gzigs par gyur pa dang/ /sgo dang srang bar la lang? me 'bar me lce'i rtse mo mang pos mgo rmongs shing/ /ral gri gtun dang rdo bas bsnun cing
410b4(mdo 'grel): brdungs nas skye ba'i ku cha 'don gyur la/ gshin rje'i pho nya snying rje med pa sded cig zer ba'i bzang rlag sgras gang ba'i/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams suAng srog chags 'don phyir gang dag skad cig 'jug pa dang/ gzhan yang shA ri bu mi'i dug mangs?
410b5(mdo 'grel): glang po che 'khrugs pa'i mdun lags na yal ga bregs pa'i sdong bu yod pa/ phyogs kyi bar nas rlung chen po langs pas 'ong ma'i tshal bskyod nas 'khri shing gi dra ba dang 'dud pa las me byung ba'i me lces shing mchog sna tshogs tshig nas ri dags
410b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ phag rgod mchog mgyogs pa brgya dag skrag cing mgo rmongs pa yod pa shing lo mang pa lhags shing rnyings pa can/ bsil ba'i grib ma seng seng med pa/ nyams dga' ba'i longs spyod yod pa/ nags kyi ma he dang phag rgod kyis me tog
410b7(mdo 'grel): u ta pa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ka la ra bskyod pas chu dri zhim por gyur pa'i mtshe'u 'gram na/ shing la spre'u khyu gnas pa nye 'khor gyi ri las chu rlabs mi grags par 'bab pas 'khor nas/ ni'u sing mod pa'i sa gzhi yod pa'i 'brag dag? na
411a1(mdo 'grel): zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ 'chag pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton dang/ bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa/ gang dag bag med pa'i gnas/ dar la bab pa bsil bar mdzad pa rnams dang/ ri bo rdo leb che zhing yad la rab tu bsnun pa
411a2(mdo 'grel): 'dra gyur cing/ /glog gi phreng bar me tog yod la 'ja' yis bkra ba'i bdag nyid can/ /chu bsil sprin chags rnams la chu 'bab zer phran chags pa'i gzi ldan can/ /bser bus na bza' g.yo ba gang dag nyi ma'i gung la bzhugs pa dang/ /de bzhin
411a3(mdo 'grel): du rtag tu goms pa'i lam nas 'dod pa'i glang po'i khyu'i rmig rjes yod la nags kyi ma he 'khrugs pa'i rwas grog na khang chen po bshag pa'i shol gyi khung bu nas/ /sbrul gyi lus phyed byung ste/ nags kyi rlung 'gam pa yod pa/ spa tshal stug
411a4(mdo 'grel): po dang/ ldam bu dang/ shing ka sha stug po'i khrod na/ stag zung du gnas pa can/ phag rgod kyi snas rlogs pa'i gla rgad gi rtsa ba 'dzin sa? pa ral pa ltar 'dug pa yod pa shing ni rtsu la'i me tog brul/ rdo ba tsa dmang bar gyur pa yod pa/ shong?
411a5(mdo 'grel): gi phyogs su ri dags kyi khyu 'dam rdzob la thogs pa yod pa/ shing lo sngon po stug por skyes pa mang po yod pa'i/ gsher ba'i chu rgyun dag mngon par dgyis shing dge ba'i phyogs ston pa rnams dang/ rin po che'i 'od zer gyis chu rtsa dmar
411a6(mdo 'grel): bar gyur la/ thugs bsam gtan la zhen pas dpag bsam gyi shing gi lcug mas rtse mor rag pa'i ri spos kyi dang ldang gi sul na rtsol ba med pa gang dag bzhugs pa dang/ gang dag seng ge bsgyings pa yod pa/ ri dags rgyu ba dang ldan
411a7(mdo 'grel): par chu 'dus te 'bab pa yod pa g.yos pas steng gi rtse mo ldem pa'i sdabs? kyis skar ma'i tshogs 'phangs pa/ sa'i steng na lci ba lhun po yang lcug phran la bya ba bzhin du sgrim mi dgos par/ zhabs kyi sod mos sa'i 'og gi rmang dang bcas
411b1(mdo 'grel): par gsal bar 'phen pa dag dang/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa gang dag char pa'i chus rdol ba'i bu ga du ma nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba/ zla ba lta bu yod cing/ rmad rdo? dang/ rtsig ngos shag shig tu gyur pa'i mtshams su pa brgya chags la/ sbrul gso rlung gis gang ste slad
411b2(mdo 'grel): der 'dug cing 'greng ba rtag tu yod cing/ nags kyi ri dags kyi lces cha sgo rdul can rtsub mo 'dag pas/ shing rtsa seng seng por 'gyur ba yod la/ rtsig mang du srin bu go de'i tshogs ring nas gnas par gyur cing/ sre mod? mgo bstod do phyogs su blta
411b3(mdo 'grel): bas byi ba skags pa yod la/ nang du rtswa sngon po stug po skyes pa'i 'jag ma'i drung gi gseb na phya ma leb rgyu ba yod cing/ 'ug pa mang po sgra 'byin cing glu len pa lta bu yod pa'i grong stong sus kyang ting nge 'dzin ma byas pa rnams na/ ston pa'i bka' nan tan
411b4(mdo 'grel): gyis bsgrub pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang gang dag g.yag gis rmig pas rdo bcag yod cing sprin ldings ldan gyur la/ /mthu mar sa ra la dang thang shing skyes la chu bsil mi khebs 'bab yod cing/ /bsam gtan zhen pa'i glas na kha ba bab pas
411b5(mdo 'grel): chos gos lci zhing zag gyur kyang/ gangs ri dag gi ltong na 'gro ba shing gi drung du bzhugs par dgyes pa dang/ /nang na chu srin 'khrugs te/ g.yas pas nya rnams kun 'byer zhing/ /skom pas gshong du 'khyil par sprul dbugs phyung bas rba rlabs rgyun chad
411b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /rgya mtsho la yang mtshan mo brtan pa gang dag 'chag mdzad pa/ /snod gyur dag nyid thugs ldan gtsang ma'i lhung bzed phyag bsnams shing/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i sku lus na bza' chos gos rab tu gos pa de dag sang gi gdugs ni nam
411b7(mdo 'grel): gyi gung du phyin pa na/ /gaN+Di bsdungs pa'i sgra snyan skad gsang grags par gyur pa'i tshe/ /bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi de kho na goms pa'i chu blugs pas mi shes pa'i sems kyi dri ma bkrus pa'i mkhas pa'i tshogs 'dus pa/ nyi ma shin tu mang po nas
412a1(mdo 'grel): 'dres pa'i spros pa bcas pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab rin po che'i sgron? du gyur pa/ dge ba'i tshogs bdud rtsi'i btung ba bzhi po/ /ye shes kyi gser ma gtogs pa bdar ba'i bdar sngon por gyur pa/ legs par spyad pa stong
412a2(mdo 'grel): gi? tshogs bsags pas grags brgya che ba dang ldan pa/ sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid chen po can/ ston gyi nam thang ba lta bu'i yid dang ldan pa/ ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nga'i gnad du/ ma he'i rwa ltar sngo zhing dri med mkha' las nya phur/ /gzi brjid kyis
412a3(mdo 'grel): ni nyi ma'i 'od zer stong mthor zhing/ /mngon du phyogs nas 'ong ba'i sprin ni dral nas su/ /skye bo 'am? phyir thub rnams sang 'dir gshegs su gsol/ /rgyun mi 'chad par ting nge 'dzin dang/ klog pa dang/ 'chag pa dang/ skye bo bla ma la brten par mngon
412a4(mdo 'grel): du dga' ba'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi rjes su mthun pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rig pa gsum rab tu sgrub pa/ nyon mongs pa las grol par 'dod pa'i dge slong gang dag 'di na gnas pa/ 'dul ba'i cho ga la goms

412a6(mdo 'grel): klung dang nags dang ri rnams spros pa'i bsam bral gi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dri bral zhi 'os 'gro ba'i ma lta bu/ /de dag dgyes par mdzod la sbyin bdag phan bar bzhed pas sad 'dir sbyon/ phyag na rdo rje ba sogs pa la gnod sbyin gtso
412a7(mdo 'grel): po dang/ /grub pa rnams dang gang dag lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang/ /sangs rgyas la ni rab tu dad pa'i lha mchog gang yin pa/ /de dag rnams kyang sbyin bdag 'di la phan phyir sad 'dir sbyon/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ rig sngags 'chad par grub
412b1(mdo 'grel): rab dag me'am ci dang/ nam mkha' lding la sogs pa 'byung po chen po rnams dang/ stobs bcu mda' ba' i yon tan bsgrub pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang/ dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba dang/ /sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba 'di/ snod bzang po la sbyar ba dang/ sbyin
412b2(mdo 'grel): bdag chen po 'di la grogs bgyi bas nyid kyis dag pa'i yon tan skyed pa la nan tan mdzod cig/ rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ bskyang pa la brtson par mdzod cig /yang dul ba dang/ tshul khrims dang/ thos pas shin tu che ba'i 'phags
412b3(mdo 'grel): par dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /lhun po las byung sbrul mgo lnga 'dra rdo rje ka na ka/ nya dang gdugs dang 'khor lo dag dang lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' ba/ /pad+ma gsar gyi dpal ldan phyag sor srab srab mos 'brel/ /sen mo'i 'od
412b4(mdo 'grel): kyis khyab pa rgyal ba'i phyag gis skyob par shog /sred pa'i 'dod chags nyon mongs zhags pa bsal cing sred med la/ /chu yi chu gtar lta bur yon tan rnams kyis gnas gcig po/ /thub pa'i sras mchog dge 'dun bdag gis gus bar spyan drangs pas
412b5(mdo 'grel): de ring? dge ba gang bsags de ni byang chub thob gyur cig /ji srid mkha' la 'od dro 'od kyis gsal ba rnam par snang byed cing/ /ri dags rtags can 'od kyi ral pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan pa 'char ba dang/ /rgya mtsho rgyas par gnas pa de srid lha dang lha min phyag
412b6(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa thogs pa med pa sal? gnas par shog /gnas brtan spyan drang ba slob dpon b+ha ba kanda da sya zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //A tsarya dzi na mi tra dang/ bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
412b7(mdo 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ //dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel gyi lung bstan pa/ //dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
413a1(mdo 'grel): slob dpon gyis bshad pa thos pa na/ yul 'di'i gtsug lag khang brung? zhes bya ba'i dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel zhes bya ba gsum rig pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa zhig tu gzhan zhig na/ slob ma zhig dang
413a2(mdo 'grel): thabs cig tu dbyar zla gsum 'jig tshogs kyi ri zhes bya ba la bzhugs te/ slob ma bande? chos 'dul ba slob pa zhig lags na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyis stong lon pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rgya gar gyi yul kau shAm bI zhes bya bar nub
413a3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ro zhes thos nas 'di snyam du/ rgya gar yul gyi chos dus de tsam zhig na/ yul kau shA ma bIr nub par 'gyur blta zhig na/ li yul la sogs pa gzhan gyis chos yun ji srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur/ nam 'jig rkyen ni gang gis 'jigs
413a4(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur snyam du the tshom skyes so/ /de na dgra bcom pa de phyed 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs pa dang/ slob ma des mkhan po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces the tshom zhus so/ /slob dpon ston pa bcom ldan
413a5(mdo 'grel): 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa lo nyis stong nas 'jig par lung bstan na/ li yul 'di la sogs pa yul gzhan gyi bstan pa ji srid du gnas par 'gyur/ nam 'jig/ rkyen gang gis 'jigs par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas mkhan pos bka' stsal pa/
413a6(mdo 'grel): bu khyod kyis li yul la sogs pa'i skye bo mang po'i don dang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir the tshom dris pa legs kyis/ legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang/ li yul la sogs pa'i bstan pa ji srid du
413a7(mdo 'grel): gnas par 'gyur/ nas 'jig pa dang/ rkyen gang gis 'jig par 'gyur ba ngas so sor lung bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo stod lnga brgya lon pa dang yul yul du dad pa med pa rnams
413b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung zhing dam pa'i chos 'jig du rgol lo/ /de'i tshe li yul 'dir dad pa med pa'i rgyal po yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ yul yang rgyal pos phan tshun rto/ cing 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/ /de phyir chad ni yul yang nyin cig bzhin du nyams par 'gyur/ grong dang gtsug lag khang la
413b2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa yang phal cher stongs par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyang nyin cig bzhin du phyir yang dkon mchog gsum la dad pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu des na dkon mchog gsum dang/ chos smra ba dang/ bsam gtan pa kun kyang mchod gnas su mi byed cing/ mu stegs kyi rgyal
413b3(mdo 'grel): po dang/ blon po dang/ yul 'dzin pa dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyang chos mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'dzin cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /chos dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang/ ma rtags pa dang/ bab chol gyi longs spyod kyang sogs par byed
413b4(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong dang/ dge slong ma rnams 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi phyir g.yan spyo bar 'gyur te/ chos 'dul ba las 'byung ba dge sbyong gi tshul dang spyod pa zhi ba dang/ dul ba dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa la sogs pa yal bar
413b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ zhing dang/ ldum ra dang/ nyo tshong dang/ skyi ba rnya dang/ slong mo ba rnams kyis 'tsho bar byed do/ /khyim pas bslab par bya ba'i bzo dang/ khyim gyi so nam dang/ 'thab rtsod dang/ sgo gsol rngams po che yang byed par 'gyur ro/ /pho nyar yang 'gro bar
413b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ las kyi go 'phang dang/ rtsa 'jid yang tshol bar byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe gtsug lag khang dang/ dgon pa la mi gnas shing bde bar gshegs pa'i gdams ngag yal bar bor te/ yang dang yang du mkhar dang/ grong dang/ tshong dus dang/ srang dang
413b7(mdo 'grel): sum mngon gnas par sems dga' bar 'gyur/ bran dang bran mo dang/ rkang 'bros kyang tshol bar byed do/ /rgyu nges khyim bdag dang/ yul 'dzin pa dang/ blon po la sogs pas kyang de dgang rim gro mi byed cing/ dad pa phyir log nas/ dkon mchog dang
414a1(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyi dkor la yang 'phrog par byed do/ /khyim pa de dag gis kyang nor rdzas de dag la brten cing spyad pas bsod nams 'bri bar 'gyur ro/ /rgya des na li yul la sogs par gnod pa sna tshogs 'byung zhing lo re bzhin dma' bar 'gyur
414a2(mdo 'grel): te/ rtsod pa dang nad dang/ dus ma yin pa'i chang dang rlung dang/ dgra mang po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i sa de dang/ srin bu dang/ bya ba dang/ byi ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe na sems can rnams mi mthun par 'gyur zhing dus
414a3(mdo 'grel): tshigs kyang 'tshol bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na yul gang dang gang du chos lugs pa bde ba de dang der ni gnod pa de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshol yul la sogs par rgyal po dang/ blon po la sogs ya rabs las kyang dkon mchog la snying thag
414a4(mdo 'grel): pa nas dad pa 'ga' las mi 'byung na phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rgyu de lta bus li yul la sogs pa'i dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod gnas thams cad kyi thams cad du smeg med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas la yul la srogs par dge slong
414a5(mdo 'grel): gi gnas sdom rgyal po la sogs pa dad pa can gyis byas pa yang blon po la sogs pa dad pa med pa rnams kyis btsan phrogs su phrogs nas bdag nyid gnas par byed do/ /dge slong rnams kyang 'khyams nas 'tsho ba dang/ chos gos dang gnas
414a6(mdo 'grel): kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ro/ /blon po la sogs pa de dag gis dge slong gi zhing chu dang/ ldum ra la sogs pa yo byad rnams kyang btsan thabs su 'phrog par byed/ lha 'bangs dang/ nang gi g.yogs rnams kyang dge slong gi dag mi nyan cing
414a7(mdo 'grel): gnya' rengs su byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang de lta bur zhes nas yi mug ste/ li yul gyi dge slong rnams phan tshun du gcig 'di skad du yu bu cag rnams gtsug lag khang tshar ma zhes bya ba dang po chos 'byung ba'i
414b1(mdo 'grel): gnas der 'dus te/ dpyid zla tha chung tshes bco lnga'i nub mo gso sbyong byas nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du yu bu cag rnams sngon bag med par gyur nas mkhas pa chos dang mthun pa rnams la dbang zos pa'i rgyus da ltar khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rtsis med par byas
414b2(mdo 'grel): te/ nga ni 'tshe ba yang mi 'byor na da phyin chad gang du 'dod/ thabs ni gang gis 'tsho bar bya zhes smra ste/ de'i tshe thams cad kyi tshe de chen po 'debs par 'gyur te/ de nas de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byas pa
414b3(mdo 'grel): gzo ba thams cad kyang gtsug lag khang der 'dus te gcig la gcig blta zhing 'di skad du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni yun ring po mi gnas so/ /yul 'di yang stobs par 'gyur ro zhes mya ngan byed cing du bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe dge slong
414b4(mdo 'grel): de dag 'di snyam du yul 'dir ni 'tsho ba mi sbyor na 'di bor te yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du sems mthun par gyur pa gang du 'dod par bya zhes gros byas te/ yul te ba gzhan dang gzhan na ni dad pa med pa dag gis gang/ rgya gar yul du 'dod du na
414b5(mdo 'grel): lam mthar bas bod kyi yul na dkon mchog gsum la mchod gnas su byed ces grags pas der 'gro bar byas nas/ nyi ma 'di la 'dod do zhes dus btab nas da'i nub mo gtsug lag khang tshar ma bzhag go nam langs pa dang/ bud med dad pa can
414b6(mdo 'grel): zhig gis gdan chung la spyan drangs te/ de nas gaN+Di brdungs nas dge 'dun spyis gtsug lag khang bskor te mchod pa byas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi gdan khri zhig gis pa'i gseb nas sgrom bu thar bas can zhig snang bar gyur te/ de nas sgron
414b7(mdo 'grel): bu de phye ba dang/ de'i nang nas gser las byas pa'i kha zas kyi sder cha bdun byung ste/ dge slong kun gyis de blangs te/ 'brur bsgyur nas dge 'dun kun dbyar zla ba gsum gtsug lag khang tshang mar tshul du 'jug pa'i 'tshog sbyar nas chos? lhag ma las yul
415a1(mdo 'grel): nas byung ste 'gro ba'i lam rgyags dang khur khal sbyar ro/ /dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ 'di skad du yu bu rnams byin gyis brlab brlab ba'i yul 'di bltas la 'gro bar bya'o zhes smras te song nas/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i
415a2(mdo 'grel): gnas gtsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya bar drung du phyin pa dang/ de'i tshe de na brag la mchod rten gyi 'og gzhi rnying pa zhig rdibs pa'i nang nas/ gser phor chen po mu tig gis gang ba zhig byung ba dang/ de yang blangs te 'brur bsgyur nas phyogs
415a3(mdo 'grel): der dgun zla ba gsum gnas pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar te/ de nas dpyid byung ste 'gro ba'i dus la bab nas song ste/ shel chu 'og ma rgal ba dang/ yul mi bstod pa rnams kyis sa lam yogs su gdugs tshod sbyar nas/ nyi ma re re zhing gtsug
415a4(mdo 'grel): lag khang dag tu gdugs chos gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe yul mi smed pa rnams kyis kyang dge slong rnams yul byung ste 'gro zhes thos nas dge 'dun de dag gtsug lag khang cong zhes bya bar spyan drangs nas/ zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos
415a5(mdo 'grel): sbyor bar 'gyur ro de'i tshe li yul na gnas pa'i klu thams cad 'di snyam du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni smeg med par gyur la thug go snyam du mya ngan byed cing bstan pa gnas par byas pa'i phyir char chen po phab ste/ char pa des gtsug
415a6(mdo 'grel): lag khang cong zhes bya ba'i nang na mchod rten gyi gzhi zhig yod pa nas gser por gser phyes gang ba zhig byung ba dang/ de yang dge 'dun gyis btsongs nas dpyid kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang yul mi smad pa rnams kyis
415a7(mdo 'grel): gtsug lag khang sa la'i tshal zhes bya bar dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar gyi gdugs tshod gsol nas/ zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin par yul stod smad kyi mi thams cad gtsug lag 'des? na bar 'dus nas dge 'dun la
415b1(mdo 'grel): rdzongs dang khur khal 'bul lo/ /de'i tshe mi rgan rgon rnams ni bslab pa 'dzin par byed/ gzhon pa rnams ni rgyang nas lta zhing gang mos 'debs pa dang grogs byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe ma khang dge ba can gyi nang nas kyang mi rgan rgon kha cig gos kha dog bsgyur ba
415b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ lam du 'jug pa'i yo byad so so nas thogs nas so so'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dge slong gi dge 'dun du legs nas 'phags pa rnams bzod par bzhes shig ces smras shing mchis te/ phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe mchod pa de ni dper na ku sha'i
415b3(mdo 'grel): grong khyer gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar shes nas mya ngan byed pa bzhin du mchod pa byed pa dang 'dra bar li yul du dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i tha ma yin no/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong rnams gtsug lag khang de nas bod yul ngos su chas pha
415b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ lam kha na mchod rten rnying ba zhig gi drung du dpal lha mo chen mos dge 'dun gyi ched du gser gyi dod tse phu rung gang bzhag pa rnyed nas dge 'dun gyis bgos te lam gyi chas rdzas sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe li yul gyi mkhar gtsug lag khang ka sar
415b5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar rgyal rigs las skyes pa'i yon bdag gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ yon bdag des dge 'dun rnams zhag bdun mchod ston gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe mchod ston gsol ba de ni li yul du dge 'dun mchod ston gsol ba'i tha ma yin no//
415b6(mdo 'grel): de nas dge slong rnams me skar gyi lam du zhugs te song ba dang/ de'i tshe dge slong pho mos gsar bu las cher rang rang gi slob dpon dang/ mkhan po la chos gos phul te bzod par gsol nas slar yul du ldog par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong pho mo gsar
415b7(mdo 'grel): bu kha cig ni rab tu byung ba'i dngos po mi gtong zhing pha mal sogs pa'i gnyen skyel du 'ongs pa rnams la mya ngan gyi tshig smra zhing dus nas gnyen rnams phyir bzlog ste/ dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu mi dga' ba'i yod kyis phyir byin gyi brlabs pa'i yul dang
416a1(mdo 'grel): gnyen gyi rjes bzhin du me skar gyi lam du zhugs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar song ba dang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu dang/ dpal lha mo gnyis mchog tu snying rje skyes te/ 'brog mi pho gnyis kyi lus su bsgyur nas dge 'dun rnams spyan
416a2(mdo 'grel): drangs te/ yul me skar du zla ba gsum gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol te lam du 'jug pa'i yo byad ci dgos pa yang song bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de dag mdo lo'i lam du zhugs nas ri dang lung ba'i su la gtugs te song ba dang/
416a3(mdo 'grel): 'brog dgon par lam stor nas ngu zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang li yul gyi lha thams cad kyi ming nas 'bod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu snying rje skyes nas g.yog dkar po sgal ba dang snal chu can cig tu sbrul nas/
416a4(mdo 'grel): dge slong de dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyi de mthong nas g.yag 'di na me'i khal g.yag cig yin te/ 'di'i phyi bzhin song na gdon mi za bar mi rnams dang phrad par 'gyur bas da ni mi 'chi'o snyam du yi sos te/ g.yag des
416a5(mdo 'grel): kyang lam drangs nas gseb lam du byung ste/ tshal phyir bskyal nas gal gnyid mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe dge slong rgan rgon mang po zhig ni lam kar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yul tshal byi'i bong rnams kyis dge slong de dag mthong nas
416a6(mdo 'grel): bsu ste/ 'phral du yo byad rnams spyar nas bod yul 'dir li yul gyi dge slong mang po lhags na ji ltar bgyi zhes pho nyar gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe rgya rje'i bu mo byang chub sems dpa' i rigs can gcig btsas pa bod kyi rgyal ba'i khab tu len
